atk-s0402a0:3_0: 1. Dukanipātassa paṭhame vajjānīti dosā aparādhā. Diṭṭhadhammikanti diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0402a0:3_1: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve uppannaphalaṃ. Samparāyikanti samparāye anāgate attabhāve uppannaphalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:3_2: Āgucārinti pāpakāriṃ aparādhakārakaṃ. Rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārenteti
atk-s0402a0:3_3: coraṃ gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā rājapurisā karonti, rājāno pana tā kārenti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:3_4: Taṃ coraṃ evaṃ kammakāraṇā kāriyamānaṃ esa passati. Tena vuttaṃ – “passati coraṃ
atk-s0402a0:3_5: āgucāriṃ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārente”ti. Addhadaṇḍakehīti muggarehi,
atk-s0402a0:3_6: pahārasādhanatthaṃ vā catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ dvedhā chetvā gahitadaṇḍakehi. Bilaṅgathālikanti
atk-s0402a0:3_7: kañjiyaukkhalikakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā sīsakaṭāhaṃ uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena
atk-s0402a0:3_8: gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti, tena matthaluṅgaṃ pakkuthitvā uttarati. Saṅkhamuṇḍikanti
atk-s0402a0:3_10: cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena veṭhetvā uppāṭenti, saha
atk-s0402a0:3_11: kesehi cammaṃ uṭṭhahati. Tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:3_12: karonti. Rāhumukhanti rāhumukhakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā saṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0402a0:3_13: antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti, kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khananti, lohitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:4_0: Jotimālikanti sakalasarīraṃ telapilotikāya veṭhetvā ālimpenti. Hatthapajjotikanti
atk-s0402a0:4_1: hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya pajjālenti. Erakavattikanti erakavattakammakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:4_2: Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgīvato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe kantitvā gopphake ṭhapenti, atha naṃ
atk-s0402a0:4_3: yottehi bandhitvā kaḍḍhanti. So attano cammavaṭṭe akkamitvā akkamitvā patati. Cīrakavāsikanti
atk-s0402a0:4_4: cīrakavāsikakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a0:4_5: kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā gopphakesu ṭhapenti, uparimehi heṭṭhimasarīraṃ cīrakanivāsananivatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:4_6: viya hoti. Eṇeyyakanti eṇeyyakakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca ubhosu
atk-s0402a0:4_7: jāṇukesu ca ayavalayāni datvā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti. So catūhi ayasūlehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahati.
atk-s0402a0:4_8: Atha naṃ parivāretvā aggiṃ karonti. “Eṇeyyako jotipariggaho yathā”ti āgataṭṭhānepi
atk-s0402a0:4_9: idameva vuttaṃ. Taṃ kālena kālaṃ sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
atk-s0402a0:5_0: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanhārūni uppāṭenti. Kahāpaṇikanti
atk-s0402a0:5_1: sakalasarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ, kahāpaṇamattaṃ pātentā
atk-s0402a0:5_2: koṭṭenti. Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:5_3: ghaṃsanti, cammamaṃsanhārūni paggharitvā aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāva tiṭṭhati. Palighaparivattikanti
atk-s0402a0:5_4: ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇacchiddena ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:5_5: karonti. Atha naṃ pāde gahetvā āviñchanti. Palālapīṭhakanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:5_6: acchinditvā nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati, maṃsarāsiyeva
atk-s0402a0:5_7: hoti. Atha naṃ keseheva pariyonandhitvā gaṇhanti, palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvā puna veṭhenti.
atk-s0402a0:5_8: Sunakhehipīti katipayāni divasāni āhāraṃ adatvā chātakasunakhehi khādāpenti. Te muhuttena
atk-s0402a0:5_9: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikameva karonti. Sūle uttāsenteti sūle āropente.
atk-s0402a0:6_0: Na paresaṃ pābhataṃ vilumpanto caratīti paresaṃ santakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ parammukhaṃ ābhataṃ
atk-s0402a0:6_1: antamaso antaravīthiyaṃ patitaṃ sahassabhaṇḍikampi disvā “iminā jīvissāmī”ti vilumpanto
atk-s0402a0:6_2: na vicarati, ko iminā atthoti piṭṭhipādena vā pavaṭṭetvā gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:7_0: Pāpakoti lāmako. Dukkhoti aniṭṭho. Kiñca tanti kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya. Yāhanti
atk-s0402a0:7_1: yena ahaṃ. Kāyaduccaritanti pāṇātipātādi tividhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Kāyasucaritanti
atk-s0402a0:7_2: tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tividhaṃ kusalakammaṃ. Vacīduccaritanti musāvādādi catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:7_3: akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ. Vacīsucaritanti tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ catubbidhaṃ kusalakammaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:7_4: Manoduccaritanti abhijjhādi tividhaṃ akusalakammaṃ. Manosucaritanti tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a0:7_5: tividhaṃ kusalakammaṃ. Suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatīti ettha duvidhā suddhi – pariyāyato
atk-s0402a0:7_6: ca nippariyāyato ca. Saraṇagamanena hi pariyāyena suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:7_7: Tathā pañcahi sīlehi, dasahi sīlehi – catupārisuddhisīlena, paṭhamajjhānena…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanena,
atk-s0402a0:7_8: sotāpattimaggena, sotāpattiphalena…pe… arahattamaggena pariyāyena suddhaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:7_9: pariharati nāma. Arahattaphale patiṭṭhito pana khīṇāsavo chinnamūlake pañcakkhandhe
atk-s0402a0:7_10: nhāpentopi khādāpentopi bhuñjāpentopi nisīdāpentopi nipajjāpentopi nippariyāyeneva
atk-s0402a0:7_11: suddhaṃ nimmalaṃ attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:8_0: Tasmāti yasmā imāni dve vajjāneva, no na vajjāni, tasmā. Vajjabhīrunoti vajjabhīrukā.
atk-s0402a0:8_1: Vajjabhayadassāvinoti vajjāni bhayato dassanasīlā. Etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhanti etaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:8_2: etaṃ avassaṃbhāvīti attho. Yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇavacanaṃ vā yena kāraṇena parimuccissati
atk-s0402a0:8_3: sabbavajjehi. Kena pana kāraṇena parimuccissatīti? Catutthamaggena ceva catutthaphalena
atk-s0402a0:8_4: ca. Maggena hi parimuccati nāma, phalaṃ patto parimutto nāma hotīti. Kiṃ pana khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0402a0:8_5: akusalaṃ na vipaccatīti? Vipaccati, taṃ pana khīṇāsavabhāvato pubbe kataṃ. Tañca
atk-s0402a0:8_6: kho imasmiṃyeva attabhāve, samparāye panassa kammaphalaṃ nāma natthīti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:10_0: 2. Dutiye padhānānīti vīriyāni. Vīriyañhi padahitabbato padhānabhāvakaraṇato vā padhānanti
atk-s0402a0:10_1: vuccati. Durabhisambhavānīti dussahāni duppūriyāni, dukkarānīti attho. Agāraṃ ajjhāvasatanti
atk-s0402a0:10_3: padhānanti etesaṃ cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppadānatthāya padhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:10_4: durabhisambhavanti dasseti. Caturatanikampi hi pilotikaṃ, pasatataṇḍulamattaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:10_5: bhattaṃ, caturatanikaṃ vā paṇṇasālaṃ, telasappinavanītādīsu vā appamattakampi bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0402a0:10_6: paresaṃ dethāti vattumpi nīharitvā dātumpi dukkaraṃ ubhatobyūḷhasaṅgāmappavesanasadisaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0402a0:15_0: Agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānanti gehato nikkhamitvā agārassa gharāvāsassa hitāvahehi
atk-s0402a0:15_1: kasigorakkhādīhi virahitaṃ anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagatānaṃ. Sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggatthāya
atk-s0402a0:15_3: paṭinissaggasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa atthāya vipassanāya ceva maggena ca sahajātavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:15_4: Tasmāti yasmā imāni dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni, tasmā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:17_0: 3. Tatiye tapanīyāti idha ceva samparāye ca tapantīti tapanīyā. Tappatīti cittasantāpena
atk-s0402a0:17_1: tappati anusocati kāyaduccaritaṃ katvā nandayakkho viya nandamāṇavo viya nandagoghātako
atk-s0402a0:17_2: viya devadatto viya dvebhātikā viya ca. Te kira gāvaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0402a0:17_3: akaṃsu. Tato kaniṭṭho jeṭṭhakaṃ āha – “mayhaṃ dārakā bahū, imāni me antāni dehī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:17_4: Atha naṃ so “sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ dvedhā vibhattaṃ, puna kiṃ maggasī”ti paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:17_5: pāpesi. Nivattitvā ca naṃ olokento mataṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ me kammaṃ kata”nti cittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:17_6: uppādesi. Athassa balavasoko uppajji. So ṭhitaṭṭhānepi nisinnaṭṭhānepi tadeva kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:17_7: āvajjeti, cittassādaṃ na labhati. Asitapītakhāyitasāyitampissa sarīre ojaṃ na pharati,
atk-s0402a0:17_8: aṭṭhicammamattameva ahosi. Atha naṃ eko thero disvā – “upāsaka, tvaṃ pahūtaannapāno,
atk-s0402a0:17_9: aṭṭhicammamattameva te avasiṭṭhaṃ, atthi nu kho te kiñci tapanīyakamma”nti? So “āma,
atk-s0402a0:17_10: bhante”ti sabbaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ thero “bhāriyaṃ te upāsaka kammaṃ kataṃ, anaparādhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:17_11: aparaddha”nti āha. So teneva kammena kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto. Vacīduccaritena
atk-s0402a0:17_12: suppabuddhasakkakokālikaciñcamāṇavikādayo viya tappati. Sesamettha catutthe ca uttānatthameva. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:19_0: 5. Pañcame dvinnāhanti dvinnaṃ ahaṃ. Upaññāsinti upagantvā guṇaṃ aññāsiṃ, jāniṃ paṭivijjhinti
atk-s0402a0:19_1: attho. Idāni te dhamme dassento yā ca asantuṭṭhitātiādimāha. Imañhi dhammadvayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:19_2: nissāya satthā sabbaññutaṃ patto, tasmā tassānubhāvaṃ dassento evamāha. Tattha asantuṭṭhitā
atk-s0402a0:19_3: kusalesu dhammesūti iminā imaṃ dīpeti – “ahaṃ jhānamattakena vā obhāsanimittamattakena
atk-s0402a0:19_4: vā asantuṭṭho hutvā arahattamaggameva uppādesiṃ. Yāva so na uppajji, na tāvāhaṃ santuṭṭho
atk-s0402a0:19_5: ahosiṃ. Padhānasmiṃ ca anukkaṇṭhito hutvā anosakkanāya ṭhatvāyeva padhānakiriyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:19_6: akāsi”nti imamatthaṃ dassento yā ca appaṭivānitātiādimāha. Tattha appaṭivānitāti
atk-s0402a0:19_7: appaṭikkamanā anosakkanā. Appaṭivānī sudāhaṃ, bhikkhave, padahāmīti ettha sudanti
atk-s0402a0:19_8: nipātamattaṃ. Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, anosakkanāyaṃ ṭhito bodhisattakāle sabbaññutaṃ patthento
atk-s0402a0:20_0: Idāni yathā tena taṃ padhānaṃ kataṃ, taṃ dassento kāmaṃ taco cātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:20_1: pattabbanti iminā pattabbaṃ guṇajātaṃ dasseti. Purisathāmenātiādinā purisassa ñāṇathāmo
atk-s0402a0:20_2: ñāṇavīriyaṃ ñāṇaparakkamo ca kathito. Saṇṭhānanti ṭhapanā appavattanā osakkanā, paṭippassaddhīti
atk-s0402a0:20_3: attho. Ettāvatā tena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:20_4: hi kāmaṃ taco cāti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, nhāru cāti ekaṃ, aṭṭhi cāti ekaṃ, maṃsalohitanti ekaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:20_5: imāni cattāri aṅgāni. Purisathāmenātiādīni adhimattavīriyādhivacanāni. Iti purimehi
atk-s0402a0:20_6: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatena hutvā evaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ vīriyaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0402a0:20_7: vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā tena bodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyapaṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:21_0: Idāni tāya paṭipadāya paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ kathetuṃ tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:21_1: Tattha appamādādhigatāti satiavippavāsasaṅkhātena appamādena adhigatā, na suttappamattena
atk-s0402a0:21_2: laddhā. Sambodhīti catumaggañāṇañceva sabbaññutaññāṇañca. Na hi sakkā etaṃ suttappamattena
atk-s0402a0:21_3: adhigantunti. Tenāha – “appamādādhigatā sambodhī”ti. Anuttaro yogakkhemoti na kevalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:22_0: Idāni attanā paṭiladdhaguṇesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samādapento tumhe cepi bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:22_1: Tattha yassatthāyāti yassa atthāya, yaṃ upasampajja viharitukāmā hutvāti attho. Tadanuttaranti
atk-s0402a0:22_2: taṃ anuttaraṃ. Brahmacariyapariyosānanti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ ariyaphalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:22_3: Abhiññā sacchikatvāti abhiññāya uttamapaññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā. Upasampajja viharissathāti
atk-s0402a0:22_4: paṭilabhitvā pāpuṇitvā viharissatha. Tasmāti yasmā appaṭivānapadhānaṃ nāmetaṃ bahūpakāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:24_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe saṃyojaniyesu dhammesūti dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ paccayabhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu.
atk-s0402a0:24_1: Assādānupassitāti assādato passitā passanabhāvoti attho. Nibbidānupassitāti nibbidāvasena
atk-s0402a0:24_2: ukkaṇṭhanavasena passanabhāvo. Jātiyāti khandhanibbattito. Jarāyāti khandhaparipākato.
atk-s0402a0:24_3: Maraṇenāti khandhabhedato. Sokehīti antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇehi sokehi. Paridevehīti
atk-s0402a0:24_6: Pajahatīti maggena pajahati. Pahāyāti ettha pana phalakkhaṇo kathito. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0402a0:26_0: 7. Sattame kaṇhāti na kāḷavaṇṇatāya kaṇhā, kaṇhatāya pana upanentīti nipphattikāḷatāya
atk-s0402a0:26_1: kaṇhā. Sarasenāpi vā sabbākusaladhammā kaṇhā eva. Na hi tesaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:26_2: hoti. Ahirikanti ahirikabhāvo. Anottappanti anottāpibhāvo. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:28_0: 8. Aṭṭhame sukkāti na vaṇṇasukkatāya sukkā, sukkatāya pana upanentīti nipphattisukkatāya
atk-s0402a0:28_1: sukkā. Sarasenāpi vā sabbakusaladhammā sukkā eva. Tesaṃ hi uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:28_2: hoti. Hirī ca ottappañcāti ettha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī, bhāyanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:28_3: ottappaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vitthārato vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:30_0: 9. Navame lokaṃ pālentīti lokaṃ sandhārenti ṭhapenti rakkhanti. Nayidha paññāyetha
atk-s0402a0:30_1: mātāti imasmiṃ loke janikā mātā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti garucittīkāravasena na paññāyetha.
atk-s0402a0:30_2: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Sambhedanti saṅkaraṃ mariyādabhedaṃ vā. Yathā ajeḷakātiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:30_3: ete hi sattā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti vā “mātucchā”ti vā garucittīkāravasena na jānanti.
atk-s0402a0:30_4: Yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya uppannā, tattheva vippaṭipajjanti. Tasmā upamaṃ āharanto “yathā
atk-s0402a0:32_0: 10. Dasamaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Kataraaṭṭhuppattiyaṃ? Manussānaṃ ujjhāyane. Bhagavatā
atk-s0402a0:32_1: hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni vassūpanāyikā appaññattā ahosi. Bhikkhū anibaddhavāsā
atk-s0402a0:32_2: vassepi utuvassepi yathāsukhaṃ vicariṃsu. Te disvā manussā “kathañhi nāma samaṇā
atk-s0402a0:32_3: sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṃ carissanti haritāni tiṇāni sammaddantā
atk-s0402a0:32_4: ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādentā. Ime hi nāma aññatitthiyā
atk-s0402a0:32_5: durakkhātadhammā vassāvāsaṃ allīyissanti saṃkasāyissanti, ime nāma sakuṇā rukkhaggesu
atk-s0402a0:32_6: kulāvakāni katvā vassāvāsaṃ allīyissanti saṃkasāyissantī”tiādīni vatvā ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:32_7: Tamatthaṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā imaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:32_8: desento paṭhamaṃ tāva “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃ upagantu”nti ettakamevāha. Atha
atk-s0402a0:32_9: bhikkhūnaṃ “kadā nu kho vassaṃ upagantabba”nti uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ sutvā “anujānāmi,
atk-s0402a0:32_10: bhikkhave, vassāne vassaṃ upagantu”nti āha. Atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “kati
atk-s0402a0:32_11: nu kho vassūpanāyikā”ti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā sakalampi idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:32_12: suttaṃ desento dvemā, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha vassūpanāyikāti vassūpagamanāni.
atk-s0402a0:32_13: Purimikāti aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā purimakattikapuṇṇamipariyosānā paṭhamā
atk-s0402a0:32_14: temāsī. Pacchimikāti māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā pacchimakattikapariyosānā pacchimā temāsīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:33_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame balānīti kenaṭṭhena balāni. Akampiyaṭṭhena balāni nāma, tathā
atk-s0402a0:33_2: Bhāvanābalanti brūhanabalaṃ vaḍḍhanabalaṃ. Suddhaṃ attānanti idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0402a0:33_3: veditabbaṃ. Tatrāti tesu dvīsu balesu. Yamidanti yaṃ idaṃ. Sekhānametaṃ balanti sattannaṃ
atk-s0402a0:33_4: sekhānaṃ ñāṇabalametaṃ. Sekhañhi so, bhikkhave, balaṃ āgammāti sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:33_5: ñāṇabalaṃ ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca. Pajahatīti maggena pajahati. Pahāyāti iminā pana
atk-s0402a0:33_6: phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Yaṃ pāpanti yaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ. Yasmā panetāni dvepi vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0402a0:33_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā ettha etadaggaṃ nāgatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:34_0: 12. Dutiye satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetītiādīsu ayaṃ heṭṭhā anāgatānaṃ padānaṃ vasena
atk-s0402a0:34_1: atthavaṇṇanā – vivekanissitanti vivekaṃ nissitaṃ. Vivekoti vivittatā. Svāyaṃ tadaṅgaviveko
atk-s0402a0:34_4: satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo. Tathā hi satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto
atk-s0402a0:34_5: yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:34_6: maggakāle pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṃ, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:34_7: satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti. Pañcavidhavivekanissitampīti eke. Te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesuyeva
atk-s0402a0:34_9: uddharanti, na ca paṭisiddhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi. Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:34_10: pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ. Yathā ca “vipassanākkhaṇe ajjhāsayato
atk-s0402a0:34_12: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo virāganissitantiādīsu. Vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo.
atk-s0402a0:35_0: Kevalaṃ hettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:35_1: pariccāgavossaggoti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena
atk-s0402a0:35_3: pana ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṃ. Tadubhayampi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramissake
atk-s0402a0:35_4: atthavaṇṇanānaye vaṭṭati. Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese
atk-s0402a0:35_5: pariccajati, nibbānañca pakkhandati. Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena
atk-s0402a0:35_6: vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca, paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:35_7: hoti. Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:35_8: nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṃ
atk-s0402a0:36_0: Idha pana nibbānaṃyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko, sabbesaṃ virāgabhāvato
atk-s0402a0:36_1: virāgo, nirodhabhāvato nirodhoti vuttaṃ. Maggo eva ca vossaggapariṇāmī, tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0402a0:36_2: bhāveti vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṃ, tathā virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:36_3: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṃ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:36_4: ca pariṇataṃ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo sesabojjhaṅgesu. Iti
atk-s0402a0:36_5: ime satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā. Imesupi dvīsu balesu etadaggabhāvo
atk-s0402a0:37_0: 13. Tatiye vivicceva kāmehītiādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ pāḷiattho ca bhāvanānayo ca
atk-s0402a0:37_1: sabbo sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritoyeva. Imāni pana cattāri jhānāni eko bhikkhu
atk-s0402a0:37_2: cittekaggatthāya bhāveti, eko vipassanāpādakatthāya, eko abhiññāpādakatthāya, eko
atk-s0402a0:37_3: nirodhapādakatthāya, eko bhavavisesatthāya. Idha pana tānipi vipassanāpādakāni adhippetāni.
atk-s0402a0:37_4: Ayaṃ hi bhikkhu imāni jhānāni samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0402a0:37_5: hetupaccayapariggahaṃ katvā sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpañca vavatthapetvā indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni
atk-s0402a0:37_6: samodhānetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Evametāni jhānāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:38_0: 14. Catutthe saṃkhittena ca vitthārena cāti saṃkhittadhammadesanā vitthāradhammadesanā
atk-s0402a0:38_1: cāti dveyeva dhammadesanāti dasseti. Tattha mātikaṃ uddisitvā kathitā desanā saṃkhittadesanā
atk-s0402a0:38_2: nāma. Tameva mātikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma. Mātikaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:38_3: ṭhapetvāpi aṭṭhapetvāpi vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma. Tāsu saṃkhittadesanā
atk-s0402a0:38_4: nāma mahāpaññassa puggalassa vasena kathitā, vitthāradesanā nāma mandapaññassa. Mahāpaññassa
atk-s0402a0:38_5: hi vitthāradesanā atipapañco viya hoti. Mandapaññassa saṅkhepadesanā sasakassa uppatanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:38_6: viya hoti, neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti. Saṅkhepadesanā ca ugghaṭitaññussa
atk-s0402a0:38_7: vasena kathitā, vitthāradesanā itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena. Sakalampi hi tepiṭakaṃ saṅkhepadesanā
atk-s0402a0:39_0: 15. Pañcame yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇeti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:39_1: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ yasmiṃ adhikaraṇe.
atk-s0402a0:39_2: Āpanno ca bhikkhūti āpattiṃ āpanno bhikkhu ca. Tasmetanti tasmiṃ etaṃ. Dīghattāyāti
atk-s0402a0:39_3: dīghaṃ addhānaṃ tiṭṭhanatthāya. Kharattāyāti dāsa-koṇḍa-caṇḍāla-venāti evaṃ kharavācāpavattanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:39_4: Vāḷattāyāti pāṇi leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharaṇavasena kakkhaḷabhāvatthāya. Bhikkhū ca na
atk-s0402a0:39_5: phāsuṃ viharissantīti aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne bhikkhusaṅghe yepi uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ
atk-s0402a0:39_6: vā gahetukāmā padhānaṃ vā anuyuñjitukāmā, te phāsuṃ na viharissanti. Bhikkhusaṅghasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:39_7: hi uposathapavāraṇāya ṭhitāya uddesādīhi atthikā uddesādīni gahetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a0:39_8: vipassakānaṃ cittuppādo na ekaggo hoti, tato visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkonti. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:39_9: bhikkhū ca na phāsuṃ viharissanti. Na dīghattāyātiādīsu vuttapaṭipakkhanayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:40_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evaṃ paccavekkhati. Akusalaṃ āpannoti
atk-s0402a0:40_1: ettha akusalanti āpatti adhippetā, āpattiṃ āpannoti attho. Kañcideva desanti na sabbameva
atk-s0402a0:40_2: āpattiṃ, āpattiyā pana kañcideva desaṃ aññataraṃ āpattinti attho. Kāyenāti karajakāyena.
atk-s0402a0:40_3: Anattamanoti atuṭṭhacitto. Anattamanavācanti atuṭṭhavācaṃ. Mamevāti maṃyeva. Tatthāti
atk-s0402a0:40_4: tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe. Accayo accagamāti aparādho atikkamitvā madditvā gato, ahamevettha
atk-s0402a0:40_5: aparādhiko. Suṅkadāyakaṃva bhaṇḍasminti yathā suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā nīte bhaṇḍasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:40_6: suṅkadāyakaṃ aparādho abhibhavati, so ca tattha aparādhiko hoti, na rājāno na rājapurisāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:41_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo hi raññā ṭhapitaṃ suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā bhaṇḍaṃ harati,
atk-s0402a0:41_1: taṃ saha bhaṇḍasakaṭena ānetvā rañño dassenti. Tattha neva suṅkaṭṭhānassa doso atthi,
atk-s0402a0:41_2: na rañño na rājapurisānaṃ, pariharitvā gatasseva pana doso, evamevaṃ yaṃ so bhikkhu
atk-s0402a0:41_3: āpattiṃ āpanno, tattha neva āpattiyā doso, na codakassa. Tīhi pana kāraṇehi tasseva
atk-s0402a0:41_4: bhikkhuno doso. Tassa hi āpattiṃ āpannabhāvenapi doso, codake anattamanatāyapi doso,
atk-s0402a0:41_5: anattamanassa sato paresaṃ ārocanenapi doso. Codakassa pana yaṃ so taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:41_6: addasa, tattha doso natthi. Anattamanatāya codanāya pana doso. Tampi amanasikaritvā
atk-s0402a0:41_7: ayaṃ bhikkhu attanova dosaṃ paccavekkhanto “iti mameva tattha accayo accagamā suṅkadāyakaṃva
atk-s0402a0:41_8: bhaṇḍasmi”nti evaṃ paṭisañcikkhatīti attho. Dutiyavāre codakassa anattamanatā ca
atk-s0402a0:41_9: anattamanatāya coditabhāvo cāti dve dosā, tesaṃ vasena “accayo accagamā”ti ettha
atk-s0402a0:42_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe aññataroti eko apākaṭanāmo brāhmaṇo. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti
atk-s0402a0:42_1: bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tasmā yattha bhagavā, tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho
atk-s0402a0:42_2: veditabbo. Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:42_3: upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo?
atk-s0402a0:42_5: viya. Upasaṅkamīti gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:42_6: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:43_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā ca khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena, evaṃ sopi
atk-s0402a0:43_1: bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi, sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:43_2: agamāsi. Yāya ca “kacci, bho gotama, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci bhoto gotamassa
atk-s0402a0:43_3: ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya
atk-s0402a0:43_4: sammodi, taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātassa sammodassa jananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca
atk-s0402a0:43_5: sammodanīyaṃ, atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:43_6: araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ. Suyyamānasukhato vā sammodanīyaṃ, anussariyamānasukhato
atk-s0402a0:43_7: sāraṇīyaṃ, tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti
atk-s0402a0:43_8: evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0402a0:43_9: yenatthena āgato, taṃ pucchitukāmo ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:44_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti, tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:44_2: Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nisīdīti upāvisi. Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhānīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:44_3: upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti. Ayañca nesaṃ aññataro, tasmā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:45_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti? Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0402a0:45_1: – atidūraṃ, accāsannaṃ, uparivātaṃ, unnatappadesaṃ, atisammukhaṃ atipacchāti. Atidūre
atk-s0402a0:45_2: nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno
atk-s0402a0:45_3: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno
atk-s0402a0:45_4: agāravaṃ pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca
atk-s0402a0:45_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:45_6: hoti. Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ “ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:46_0: Etadavocāti duvidhā hi pucchā – agārikapucchā, anagārikapucchā ca. Tattha “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:46_1: kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusala”nti iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatā. “Ime nu kho, bhante, pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti
atk-s0402a0:46_2: iminā nayena anagārikapucchā. Ayaṃ pana attano anurūpaṃ agārikapucchaṃ pucchanto
atk-s0402a0:46_3: etaṃ “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha hetu paccayoti
atk-s0402a0:46_5: visamacariyāya hetu, taṃkāraṇā tappaccayāti attho. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – adhammassa
atk-s0402a0:46_6: cariyā adhammacariyā, adhammakāraṇanti attho. Visamaṃ cariyā, visamassa vā kammassa
atk-s0402a0:46_7: cariyāti visamacariyā. Adhammacariyā ca sā visamacariyā cāti adhammacariyāvisamacariyā.
atk-s0402a0:46_8: Etenupāyena sukkapakkhepi attho veditabbo. Atthato panettha adhammacariyāvisamacariyā
atk-s0402a0:46_9: nāma dasa akusalakammapathā, dhammacariyāsamacariyā nāma dasa kusalakammapathāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:47_0: Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamāti ettha ayaṃ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanesu
atk-s0402a0:47_1: dissati. “Abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:47_2: hi khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0402a0:48: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0402a0:50: Ādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ, bhante”tiādīsu abbhanumodane. Idhāpi abbhanumodaneyeva. Yasmā ca abbhanumodane, tasmā sādhu sādhu, bho gotamāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:52: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:53: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Atha vā abhikkantanti abhikkantaṃ atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ, atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:54_0: Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ. Ayañhettha
atk-s0402a0:54_1: adhippāyo – abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:54_2: yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti. Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:54_3: dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi – bhoto gotamassa vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato,
atk-s0402a0:54_4: abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhājananato, paññājananato, sātthato, sabyañjanato,
atk-s0402a0:54_5: uttānapadato, gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṃsanato, aparavambhanato,
atk-s0402a0:55_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:55_1: heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti uparimukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādichāditaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:55_2: Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:56_0: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā – yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:56_1: asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya, evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:56_2: kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:56_3: vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggappaṭipannassa
atk-s0402a0:56_4: me saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāre
atk-s0402a0:56_6: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0402a0:57_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto
atk-s0402a0:57_1: esāhantiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṃ. Bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhavaṃ
atk-s0402a0:57_2: me gotamo saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:57_3: gotamaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi, evaṃ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti. Yesañhi
atk-s0402a0:57_4: dhātūnaṃ gati attho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. Tasmā gacchāmīti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti
atk-s0402a0:57_5: ayamattho vutto. Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe
atk-s0402a0:57_6: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. So atthato
atk-s0402a0:57_7: ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca. Vuttañhetaṃ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo
atk-s0402a0:57_8: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro. Na kevalañca ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca,
atk-s0402a0:57_9: apica kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammopi. Vuttañhetaṃ chattamāṇavakavimāne –
atk-s0402a0:60_0: Ettha rāgavirogoti maggo kathito. Anojamasokanti phalaṃ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:60_1: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0402a0:60_2: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṃhatoti saṅgho. So atthato aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho. Vuttañhetaṃ tasmiyeva vimāne –
atk-s0402a0:62: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a0:63: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0402a0:64: Idāni tesu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati, saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanaphalaṃ, saṃkileso, bhedoti ayaṃ vidhi veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:65_0: Seyyathidaṃ – padatthato tāva hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ, saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena
atk-s0402a0:65_1: bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiparikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho, ratanattayassevetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:65_2: adhivacanaṃ. Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti
atk-s0402a0:65_3: buddho, bhavakantārā uttāraṇena lokassa assāsadānena ca dhammo, appakānampi kārānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:65_4: vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena saṅgho. Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:65_6: Taṃsamaṅgīsatto saraṇaṃ gacchati, vuttappakārena cittuppādena “etāni me tīṇi ratanāni
atk-s0402a0:65_7: saraṇaṃ, etāni parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ upetīti attho. Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yo
atk-s0402a0:65_8: ca saraṇaṃ gacchati idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:66_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañcāti. Tattha lokuttaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:66_2: hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena
atk-s0402a0:66_3: ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati. Taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu saddhāpaṭilābho,
atk-s0402a0:66_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:67_0: Tayidaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena
atk-s0402a0:67_1: paṇipātenāti. Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa
atk-s0402a0:67_2: niyyātemi, dhammassa, saṅghassā”ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃ attapariccajanaṃ. Tapparāyaṇatā
atk-s0402a0:67_3: nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo, dhammaparāyaṇo, saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṃ
atk-s0402a0:67_4: dhārethā”ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo. Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ
atk-s0402a0:67_5: buddhassa antevāsiko, dhammassa, saṅghassa iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ sissabhāvūpagamo.
atk-s0402a0:67_7: buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomi iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0402a0:67_8: Imesañhi catunnampi ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:68_0: Apica “bhagavato attānaṃ pariccajāmi, dhammassa, saṅghassa attānaṃ pariccajāmi, jīvitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:68_1: pariccajāmi, pariccattoyeva me attā, pariccattaṃyeva me jīvitaṃ, jīvitapariyantikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:68_2: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇa”nti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:68_3: veditabbaṃ. “Satthārañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ, sugatañca vatāhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:68_4: passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ, sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva
atk-s0402a0:68_5: passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamane viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:69: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0402a0:71_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā. “Atha kho brahmāyu
atk-s0402a0:71_1: brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā
atk-s0402a0:71_2: bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti
atk-s0402a0:71_3: – ‘brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo; brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo”’ti evampi paṇipāto veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:72_0: So panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyavasena catubbidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātena
atk-s0402a0:72_1: saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, na itarehi. Seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṃ gaṇhāti, seṭṭhavasena ca
atk-s0402a0:72_2: bhijjati. Tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati, aggahitameva
atk-s0402a0:72_3: hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandiyamāno anatthampi
atk-s0402a0:72_4: kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato
atk-s0402a0:72_5: santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0402a0:75: Evarūpaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvā “ācariyo me”ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo pana “ayaṃ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo”ti vandati, teneva gahitaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:76_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ
atk-s0402a0:76_1: “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṃ. Tathā rājānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:76_2: bhayavasena vandato. So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti. Tathā
atk-s0402a0:76_3: yaṃ kiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyaṃ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti
atk-s0402a0:77: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ, sabbadukkhakkhayo ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:78: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0402a0:84: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasenapetassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:85_0: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato
atk-s0402a0:85_1: upagaccheyya, sukhato upagaccheyya, kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya, mātaraṃ jīvitā
atk-s0402a0:85_2: voropeyya, pitaraṃ, arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, paduṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:85_3: uppādeyya, saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:86: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:92_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0402a0:92_1: tenupasaṅkami…pe… ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0402a0:92_2: etadavoca – ‘sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhasaraṇagamanaṃ hoti. Buddhasaraṇagamanahetu
atk-s0402a0:92_3: kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:92_4: upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena
atk-s0402a0:92_5: sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi phoṭṭhabbehī”’ti.
atk-s0402a0:93: Eseva nayo dhamme saṅghe ca. Apica velāmasuttādivasenāpi saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo. Evaṃ saraṇagamanaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:94_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
atk-s0402a0:94_1: na mahājutikaṃ hoti na mahāvipphāraṃ. Lokuttarassa natthi saṃkileso. Lokiyassa ca
atk-s0402a0:94_2: saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca. Tattha sāvajjo aññasatthārādīsu
atk-s0402a0:94_3: attasanniyyātanādīhi hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. Anavajjo kālakiriyāya, so avipākattā
atk-s0402a0:94_4: aphalo. Lokuttarassa pana nevatthi bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:94_5: na uddisatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:95_0: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretūti maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0402a0:95_1: jānātūti attho. Upāsakavidhikosallatthaṃ panettha ko upāsako, kasmā upāsakoti vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:95_2: kimassa sīlaṃ, ko ājīvo, kā vipatti, kā sampattīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:96: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci saraṇagato gahaṭṭho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:97: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:98: Kasmā upāsakoti. Ratanattayassa upāsanato. So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ upāsatīti upāsakoti.
atk-s0402a0:100_0: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā, kāmesumicchācārā,
atk-s0402a0:100_1: musāvādā, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:101: Ko ājīvoti. Pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvikakappanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:102_0: “Pañcimā, bhikkhave, vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca. Satthavaṇijjā, sattavaṇijjā,
atk-s0402a0:102_1: maṃsavaṇijjā, majjavaṇijjā, visavaṇijjā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:103_0: Kā vipattīti. Yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti, ayamassa vipatti. Apica
atk-s0402a0:103_1: yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca, sāpi tassa vipattīti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:103_2: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a0:104_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca
atk-s0402a0:104_1: upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca. Katamehi pañcahi? Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kotūhalamaṅgaliko
atk-s0402a0:104_2: hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti no kammaṃ, ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati, tattha
atk-s0402a0:105: Kā sampattīti. Yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca, sā sampatti. Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a0:106_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca
atk-s0402a0:106_1: upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca. Katamehi pañcahi? Saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, na kotūhalamaṅgaliko
atk-s0402a0:106_2: hoti, kammaṃ pacceti no maṅgalaṃ, na ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ gavesati, idha ca
atk-s0402a0:107_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. “Ajjatagge samma,
atk-s0402a0:107_1: dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati. “Teneva
atk-s0402a0:107_2: aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya. Ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”ntiādīsu koṭiyaṃ. “Ambilaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:107_3: vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena
atk-s0402a0:107_4: vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:107_5: aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe. Idha panāyaṃ ādimhi daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ
atk-s0402a0:107_6: ādiṃ katvāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Ajjatanti ajjabhāvaṃ. Ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho,
atk-s0402a0:107_7: dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:108_0: Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṃ, yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ, anaññasatthukaṃ
atk-s0402a0:108_1: tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu
atk-s0402a0:108_2: jānātu. Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya, neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti
atk-s0402a0:108_3: vā dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti vā saṅghaṃ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti evaṃ attasanniyyātanena
atk-s0402a0:108_4: saraṇaṃ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0402a0:109_0: 17. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti jāṇussoṇiṭhānantaraṃ kira nāmekaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ, taṃ yena kulena
atk-s0402a0:109_1: laddhaṃ, taṃ jāṇussoṇikulanti vuccati. Ayaṃ tasmiṃ kule jātattā rañño santike ca
atk-s0402a0:109_2: laddhajāṇussoṇisakkārattā jāṇussoṇīti vuccati. Tenupasaṅkamīti “samaṇo kira gotamo
atk-s0402a0:109_3: paṇḍito byatto bahussuto”ti sutvā “sace so liṅgavibhattikārakādibhedaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0402a0:109_4: amhehi ñātameva jānissati, aññātaṃ kiṃ jānissati. Ñātameva kathessati, aññātaṃ kiṃ
atk-s0402a0:109_5: kathessatī”ti cintetvā mānaddhajaṃ paggayha siṅgaṃ ukkhipitvā mahāparivārehi parivuto
atk-s0402a0:109_6: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Katattā ca, brāhmaṇa, akatattā cāti satthā tassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:109_7: sutvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo idha āgacchanto na jānitukāmo atthagavesī hutvā āgato, mānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:109_8: pana paggayha siṅgaṃ ukkhipitvā āgato. Kiṃ nu khvassa yathā pañhassa atthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:109_9: evaṃ kathite vaḍḍhi bhavissati, udāhu yathā na jānātī”ti cintetvā “yathā na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:109_10: evaṃ kathite vaḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “katattā ca, brāhmaṇa, akatattā cā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:110_0: Brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvā “samaṇo gotamo katattāpi akatattāpi niraye nibbattiṃ vadati, idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:110_1: ubhayakāraṇenāpi ekaṭṭhāne nibbattiyā kathitattā dujjānaṃ mahandhakāraṃ, natthi mayhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:110_2: ettha patiṭṭhā. Sace panāhaṃ ettakeneva tuṇhī bhaveyyaṃ, brāhmaṇānaṃ majjhe kathanakālepi
atk-s0402a0:110_3: maṃ evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – ‘tvaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ mānaṃ paggayha siṅgaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:110_4: gatosi, ekavacaneneva tuṇhī hutvā kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi, imasmiṃ ṭhāne kasmā kathesī’ti.
atk-s0402a0:110_5: Tasmā parājitopi aparājitasadiso hutvā puna saggagamanapañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0402a0:110_6: ko nu kho, bho gotamāti imaṃ dutiyapañhaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:111_0: Evampi tassa ahosi – “uparipañhena heṭṭhāpañhaṃ jānissāmi, heṭṭhāpañhena uparipañha”nti.
atk-s0402a0:111_1: Tasmāpi imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Satthā purimanayeneva cintetvā yathā na jānāti, evameva
atk-s0402a0:111_2: kathento punapi “katattā ca, brāhmaṇa, akatattā cā”ti āha. Brāhmaṇo tasmimpi patiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:111_3: asakkonto “alaṃ, bho, na īdisassa purisassa santikaṃ āgatena ajānitvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:111_4: sakavādaṃ pahāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ anuvattitvā mayhaṃ atthaṃ gavesissāmi, paralokamaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:111_5: sodhessāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā satthāraṃ āyācanto na kho ahantiādimāha. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:111_6: nihatamānataṃ ñatvā satthā upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento tena hi, brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:111_7: tena hīti kāraṇaniddeso. Yasmā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa atthaṃ ajānanto vitthāradesanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:112_0: 18. Aṭṭhame āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ. Ānandoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Ekaṃsenāti ekantena.
atk-s0402a0:112_1: Anuviccāti anupavisitvā. Viññūti paṇḍitā. Garahantīti nindanti, avaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0402a0:113_0: 20. Dasame dunnikkhittañca padabyañjananti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitapāḷipadameva hi atthassa
atk-s0402a0:113_1: byañjanattā byañjananti vuccati. Ubhayametaṃ pāḷiyāva nāmaṃ. Attho ca dunnītoti parivattetvā
atk-s0402a0:113_2: uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitā aṭṭhakathā. Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi
atk-s0402a0:113_3: dunnayo hotīti parivattetvā uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitāya pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathā nāma dunnayā
atk-s0402a0:113_4: dunnīhārā dukkathā nāma hoti. Ekādasame vuttapaṭipakkhanayena attho veditabboti.
atk-s0402a0:114_0: 22. Tatiyassa paṭhame accayaṃ accayato na passatīti “aparajjhitvā aparaddhaṃ mayā”ti
atk-s0402a0:114_1: attano aparādhaṃ na passati, aparaddhaṃ mayāti vatvā daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā na khamāpetīti
atk-s0402a0:114_2: attho. Accayaṃ desentassāti evaṃ vatvā daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā khamāpentassa. Yathādhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:114_3: nappaṭiggaṇhātīti “puna evaṃ na karissāmi, khamatha me”ti vuccamāno accayaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0402a0:114_4: yathādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ na paṭiggaṇhāti. “Ito paṭṭhāya puna evarūpaṃ mā akāsi,
atk-s0402a0:114_5: khamāmi tuyha”nti na vadati. Sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:115_0: 23. Dutiye abbhācikkhantīti abhibhavitvā ācikkhanti, abhūtena vadanti. Dosantaroti
atk-s0402a0:115_1: antare patitadoso. Evarūpo hi “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammo”tiādīni
atk-s0402a0:115_2: vadanto sunakkhatto viya tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhati. Saddho vā duggahitenāti yo hi
atk-s0402a0:115_3: ñāṇavirahitāya saddhāya atisaddho hoti muddhappasanno, sopi “buddho nāma sabbalokuttaro,
atk-s0402a0:115_4: sabbe tassa kesādayo bāttiṃsa koṭṭhāsā lokuttarāyevā”tiādinā nayena duggahitaṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0402a0:116_0: 25. Catutthe neyyatthaṃ suttantanti yassa attho netabbo, taṃ netabbatthaṃ suttantaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:116_1: Nītattho suttantoti dīpetīti kathitattho ayaṃ suttantoti vadati. Tattha “ekapuggalo,
atk-s0402a0:116_2: bhikkhave, dveme, bhikkhave, puggalā, tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā, cattārome, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:116_3: puggalā”ti evarūpo suttanto neyyattho nāma. Ettha hi kiñcāpi sammāsambuddhena “ekapuggalo,
atk-s0402a0:116_4: bhikkhave”tiādi vuttaṃ, paramatthato pana puggalo nāma natthīti evamassa attho netabbova
atk-s0402a0:116_5: hoti. Ayaṃ pana attano bālatāya nītattho ayaṃ suttantoti dīpeti. Paramatthato hi
atk-s0402a0:116_6: puggale asati na tathāgato “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave”tiādīni vadeyya. Yasmā pana tena
atk-s0402a0:116_7: vuttaṃ, tasmā paramatthato atthi puggaloti gaṇhanto taṃ neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ nītattho
atk-s0402a0:116_8: suttantoti dīpeti. Nītatthanti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ kathitatthaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:116_9: hi aniccameva dukkhameva anattāyevāti attho. Ayaṃ pana attano bālatāya “neyyattho
atk-s0402a0:116_10: ayaṃ suttanto, atthamassa āharissāmī”ti “niccaṃ nāma atthi, sukhaṃ nāma atthi, attā
atk-s0402a0:116_11: nāma atthī”ti gaṇhanto nītatthaṃ suttantaṃ neyyattho suttantoti dīpeti nāma. Pañcamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:117_0: 27. Chaṭṭhe paṭicchannakammantassāti pāpakammassa. Pāpaṃ hi paṭicchādetvā karonti.
atk-s0402a0:117_1: No cepi paṭicchādetvā karonti, pāpakammaṃ paṭicchannamevāti vuccati. Nirayoti sahokāsakā
atk-s0402a0:117_2: khandhā. Tiracchānayoniyaṃ khandhāva labbhanti. Sattamaṭṭhamāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:118: 30. Navame paṭiggāhāti paṭiggāhakā, dussīlaṃ puggalaṃ dve ṭhānāni paṭiggaṇhantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:119_0: 31. Dasame atthavaseti kāraṇāni. Araññavanapatthānīti araññāni ca vanapatthāni ca.
atk-s0402a0:119_1: Tattha kiñcāpi abhidhamme nippariyāyena “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña”nti
atk-s0402a0:119_2: vuttaṃ, tathāpi yaṃ taṃ “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āraññakaṅganipphādakaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:119_3: vuttaṃ, tadeva adhippetanti veditabbaṃ. Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:119_4: anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasīyati na vapīyati. Pantānīti pariyantāni atidūrāni,
atk-s0402a0:119_5: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti lokiyalokuttaraṃ phāsuvihāraṃ. Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamānoti
atk-s0402a0:120_0: 32. Ekādasame vijjābhāgiyāti vijjākoṭṭhāsikā. Samathoti cittekaggatā. Vipassanāti
atk-s0402a0:120_1: saṅkhārapariggāhakañāṇaṃ. Kamatthamanubhotīti katamaṃ atthaṃ ārādheti sampādeti paripūreti.
atk-s0402a0:120_2: Cittaṃ bhāvīyatīti maggacittaṃ bhāvīyati brūhīyati vaḍḍhīyati. Yo rāgo, so pahīyatīti
atk-s0402a0:120_3: yo rajjanakavasena rāgo, so pahīyati. Rāgo hi maggacittassa paccanīko, maggacittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:120_4: rāgassa ca. Rāgakkhaṇe maggacittaṃ natthi, maggacittakkhaṇe rāgo natthi. Yadā pana
atk-s0402a0:120_5: rāgo uppajjati, tadā maggacittassa uppattiṃ nivāreti, padaṃ pacchindati. Yadā pana
atk-s0402a0:120_6: maggacittaṃ uppajjati, tadā rāgaṃ samūlakaṃ ubbaṭṭetvā samugghātentameva uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:121_0: Vipassanā, bhikkhave, bhāvitāti vipassanāñāṇaṃ brūhitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Paññā bhāvīyatīti
atk-s0402a0:121_1: maggapaññā bhāvīyati brūhīyati vaḍḍhīyati. Yā avijjā, sā pahīyatīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0402a0:121_2: vaṭṭamūlikā mahāavijjā pahīyati. Avijjā hi maggapaññāya paccanīkā, maggapaññā avijjāya.
atk-s0402a0:121_3: Avijjākkhaṇe maggapaññā natthi, maggapaññākkhaṇe avijjā natthi. Yadā pana avijjā
atk-s0402a0:121_4: uppajjati, tadā maggapaññāya uppattiṃ nivāreti, padaṃ pacchindati. Yadā maggapaññā
atk-s0402a0:121_5: uppajjati, tadā avijjaṃ samūlikaṃ ubbaṭṭetvā samugghātayamānāva uppajjati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:121_6: – “avijjā pahīyatī”ti. Iti maggacittaṃ maggapaññāti dvepi sahajātadhammāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:122_0: Rāgupakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā, bhikkhave, cittaṃ na vimuccatīti rāgena upakkiliṭṭhattā maggacittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:122_1: na vimuccatīti dasseti. Avijjupakkiliṭṭhā vā paññā na bhāvīyatīti avijjāya upakkiliṭṭhattā
atk-s0402a0:122_2: maggapaññā na bhāvīyatīti dasseti. Iti kho, bhikkhaveti evaṃ kho, bhikkhave. Rāgavirāgā
atk-s0402a0:122_3: cetovimuttīti rāgassa khayavirāgena cetovimutti nāma hoti. Phalasamādhissetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:122_4: Avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttīti avijjāya khayavirāgena paññāvimutti nāma hoti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:123_0: 33. Catutthassa paṭhame asappurisabhūmīti asappurisānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ. Sappurisabhūmiyampi
atk-s0402a0:123_1: eseva nayo. Akataññūti kataṃ na jānāti. Akatavedīti kataṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:123_2: Upaññātanti vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ pasatthaṃ. Yadidanti yā ayaṃ. Akataññutā akataveditāti
atk-s0402a0:123_3: parena katassa upakārassa ajānanañceva pākaṭaṃ katvā ajānanañca. Kevalāti sakalā.
atk-s0402a0:124_0: 34. Dutiye mātu ca pitu cāti janakamātu ca janakapitu ca. Ekena, bhikkhave, aṃsena
atk-s0402a0:124_1: mātaraṃ parihareyyāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā mātaraṃ paṭijaggeyya. Ekena aṃsena
atk-s0402a0:124_2: pitaraṃ parihareyyāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā pitaraṃ paṭijaggeyya. Vassasatāyuko
atk-s0402a0:124_3: vassasatajīvīti vassasatāyukakāle jāto sakalaṃ vassasataṃ jīvanto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0402a0:124_4: – sace putto nāma “mātāpitūnaṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇe aṃsakūṭe
atk-s0402a0:124_5: mātaraṃ, vāme pitaraṃ ṭhapetvā vassasatāyuko sakalampi vassasataṃ jīvamāno parihareyya.
atk-s0402a0:124_6: So ca nesaṃ ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanenāti so ca putto nesaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:124_9: hatthapādādīnaṃ ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanasaṅkhātena sambāhanena upaṭṭhānaṃ kareyya. Te
atk-s0402a0:124_10: ca tatthevāti te ca mātāpitaro tattheva tassa aṃsakūṭesu nisinnāva muttakarīsaṃ cajeyyuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:124_11: Natveva, bhikkhaveti, bhikkhave, evampi natveva mātāpitūnaṃ kataṃ vā hoti paṭikataṃ vā.
atk-s0402a0:125_0: Issarādhipacce rajjeti cakkavattirajjaṃ sandhāyevamāha. Āpādakāti vaḍḍhakā anupālakā.
atk-s0402a0:125_1: Puttā hi mātāpitūhi vaḍḍhitā ceva anupālitā ca. Posakāti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:125_2: pāyetvā posakā. Puttā hi mātāpitūhi puṭṭhā bhatā annapānādīhi paṭijaggitā. Imassa
atk-s0402a0:125_3: lokassa dassetāroti sace hi mātāpitaro jātadivaseyeva puttaṃ pāde gahetvā araññe
atk-s0402a0:125_4: vā nadiyaṃ vā papāte vā khipeyyuṃ, imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ na passeyya.
atk-s0402a0:125_5: Evaṃ akatvā āpāditattā positattā esa imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ mātāpitaro
atk-s0402a0:125_6: nissāya passatīti tyāssa imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma honti. Samādapetīti gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0402a0:125_7: Imasmiṃ sutte saddhāsīlacāgapaññā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā. Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherasadisova
atk-s0402a0:126_0: 35. Tatiye tenupasaṅkamīti so hi brāhmaṇo “samaṇo kira gotamo kathitaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-s0402a0:126_1: pucchāyassa virajjhanaṃ nāma natthi. Ahamassa virajjhanapañhaṃ abhisaṅkharissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:126_2: paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā gabbhadvāraṃ pidahitvā nisinno cintetuṃ ārabhi. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:126_3: etadahosi – “imasmiṃ ṭhāne uccāsaddamahāsaddo vattati, cittaṃ na ekaggaṃ hoti, bhūmigharaṃ
atk-s0402a0:126_4: kāressāmī”ti bhūmigharaṃ kāretvā tattha pavisitvā – “evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ kathessati,
atk-s0402a0:126_5: evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ kathessatī”ti ekaṃ gaṇhitvā ekaṃ vissajjento sakaladivasaṃ kiñci
atk-s0402a0:126_6: passituṃ nāsakkhi. Tassa imināva nīhārena cattāro māsā vītivattā. So catunnaṃ māsānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:126_7: accayena ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ nāma addasa. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “ahaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:126_9: nāma tumhe kiriyaṃ vadethā’ti naṃ niggaṇhissāmi. Sace ‘akiriyavādimhī’ti vakkhati,
atk-s0402a0:126_10: ‘kusaladhammānaṃ nāma tumhe akiriyaṃ vadethā’ti naṃ niggaṇhissāmi. Idañhi ubhatokoṭikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:126_11: pañhaṃ puṭṭho neva uggilituṃ sakkhissati na niggilituṃ. Evaṃ mama jayo bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:126_12: samaṇassa gotamassa parājayo”ti uṭṭhāya apphoṭetvā bhūmigharā nikkhamma “evarūpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:126_13: pañhaṃ pucchantena na ekakena gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nagare ghosanaṃ kāretvā sakalanāgarehi
atk-s0402a0:126_14: parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Kiṃvādīti kiṃladdhiko. Kimakkhāyīti kiṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:126_15: sāvakānaṃ paṭipadaṃ akkhāyīti pucchi. Athassa bhagavā catūhi māsehi pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā
atk-s0402a0:126_16: “diṭṭho me samaṇassa gotamassa parājayapañho”ti mānaṃ paggayha āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0402a0:126_17: ekapadeneva taṃ pañhaṃ bhindanto kiriyavādī cāhaṃ, brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Atha brāhmaṇo
atk-s0402a0:126_18: attano mānaṃ apanetvā bhagavantaṃ āyācanto yathākathaṃ panātiādimāha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:127_0: 36. Catutthe dakkhiṇeyyāti dakkhiṇā vuccati dānaṃ, tassa paṭiggahaṇayuttā kati puggalāti
atk-s0402a0:127_1: pucchati. Sekhoti iminā satta sekkhe dasseti. Ettha ca sīlavantaputhujjanopi sotāpanneneva
atk-s0402a0:127_2: saṅgahito. Āhuneyyā yajamānānaṃ hontīti dānaṃ dadantānaṃ āhunassa arahā dānapaṭiggāhakā
atk-s0402a0:127_3: nāma hontīti attho. Khettanti vatthu patiṭṭhā, puññassa viruhanaṭṭhānanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:128_0: 37. Pañcame pubbārāmeti sāvatthito puratthimadisābhāge ārāme. Migāramātupāsādeti
atk-s0402a0:128_1: visākhāya upāsikāya pāsāde. Sā hi migāraseṭṭhinā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapitattāpi, sabbajeṭṭhakassa
atk-s0402a0:128_2: puttassa ayyakaseṭṭhinova samānanāmakattāpi migāramātāti vuccati. Tāya kārito sahassagabbho
atk-s0402a0:128_3: pāsādo migāramātupāsādo nāma. Thero tasmiṃ viharati. Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtoti
atk-s0402a0:129_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti kasmiṃ kāle āmantesi? Kānici hi suttāni purebhatte bhāsitāni atthi,
atk-s0402a0:129_1: kānici pacchābhatte, kānici purimayāme, kānici majjhimayāme, kānici pacchimayāme.
atk-s0402a0:129_2: Idaṃ pana samacittapaṭipadāsuttaṃ pacchābhatte bhāsitaṃ. Tasmā sāyanhasamaye āmantesi.
atk-s0402a0:130_0: Na kevalaṃ cetaṃ thereneva bhāsitaṃ, tathāgatenāpi bhāsitaṃ. Kattha nisīditvāti?
atk-s0402a0:130_1: Visākhāya ratanapāsāde nisīditvā. Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso
atk-s0402a0:130_2: hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti, tattha tattheva gantvā vasi. Paṭhamaṃ antovassañhi
atk-s0402a0:130_3: isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa mahābrahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0402a0:130_4: upanissāya isipatane vasi. Dutiyaṃ antovassaṃ rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane, tatiyacatutthānipi
atk-s0402a0:130_5: tattheva, pañcamaṃ antovassaṃ vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:130_6: antovassaṃ makulapabbate, sattamaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavane, aṭṭhamaṃ bhagge susumāragiraṃ
atk-s0402a0:130_7: nissāya bhesakaḷāvane, navamaṃ kosambiyaṃ, dasamaṃ pālileyyake vanasaṇḍe, ekādasamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:130_8: nālāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme, dvādasamaṃ verañjāyaṃ, terasamaṃ cāliyapabbate, cuddasamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:130_9: jetavane, pañcadasamaṃ kapilavatthusmiṃ, soḷasamaṃ āḷavakaṃ dametvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni
atk-s0402a0:130_10: amatapānaṃ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṃ, sattarasamaṃ rājagaheyeva, aṭṭhārasamaṃ cāliyapabbateyeva,
atk-s0402a0:130_11: tathā ekūnavīsatimaṃ, vīsatimaṃ pana antovassaṃ rājagahaṃyeva upanissāya vasi. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:130_12: vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti, tattha tattheva vasi.
atk-s0402a0:131_0: Tato paṭṭhāya pana dve senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogāni akāsi. Katarāni dve? Jetavanañca
atk-s0402a0:131_1: pubbārāmañca. Kasmā? Dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ guṇamahantatāya. Anāthapiṇḍikassa hi visākhāya
atk-s0402a0:131_2: ca guṇaṃ sandhāya guṇaṃ paṭicca satthā tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñji.
atk-s0402a0:131_3: Utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ caritvāpi hi antovasse dvīsuyeva senāsanesu vasati. Evaṃ vasanto
atk-s0402a0:131_4: pana jetavane rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0402a0:131_5: piṇḍāya pavisitvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ karoti. Pubbārāme
atk-s0402a0:131_6: rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase pācīnadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā dakkhiṇadvārena
atk-s0402a0:131_7: nikkhamitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karoti. Tasmiṃ pana divase sammāsambuddho jetavaneyeva
atk-s0402a0:131_8: vasi. Yattha katthaci vasantassa cassa pañcavidhakiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti. Taṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0402a0:131_9: vitthāritameva. Tesu kiccesu pacchimayāmakiccakāle bhagavā lokaṃ olokento sāvatthivāsīnañca
atk-s0402a0:131_10: samantā ca sāvatthiyā gāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanaparame ṭhāne aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhisamayabhāvaṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a0:132_0: Tato “kasmiṃ nu kho kāle abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “sāyanhasamaye”ti disvā
atk-s0402a0:132_1: “mayi nu kho kathente abhisamayo bhavissati, sāvake kathente bhavissatī”ti “sāriputtatthere
atk-s0402a0:132_2: kathente bhavissatī”ti addasa. Tato “kattha nisīditvā kathente bhavissatī”ti olokento
atk-s0402a0:132_3: “visākhāya ratanapāsāde nisīditvā”ti disvā “buddhānaṃ nāma tayo sāvakasannipātā honti,
atk-s0402a0:132_4: aggasāvakānaṃ eko. Tesu ajja dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa sāvakasannipāto bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:132_5: addasa. Disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā nivatthanivāsano sugatacīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0402a0:132_6: selamayapattaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya
atk-s0402a0:132_7: caranto bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā vātappahatā viya nāvā paṭinivattitvā
atk-s0402a0:132_8: dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā bahidvāre aṭṭhāsi. Tato asīti mahāsāvakā bhikkhuniparisā
atk-s0402a0:132_9: upāsakaparisā upāsikāparisāti catasso parisā satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:133_0: Satthā sāriputtattheraṃ āmantesi – “sāriputta, tayā pubbārāmaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati, tava
atk-s0402a0:133_1: ca parisaṃ gahetvā gacchāhī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero attano parivārehi pañcahi
atk-s0402a0:133_2: bhikkhusatehi parivuto pubbārāmaṃ agamāsi. Eteneva niyāmena asīti mahāsāvake pubbārāmameva
atk-s0402a0:133_3: pesetvā sayaṃ ekena ānandatthereneva saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Ānandattheropi vihāre
atk-s0402a0:133_4: satthu vattaṃ katvā vanditvā “pubbārāmaṃ gacchāmi, bhante”ti āha. Evaṃ karohi ānandāti.
atk-s0402a0:133_5: Satthāraṃ vanditvā tattheva agamāsi. Satthā ekakova jetavane ohīno.
atk-s0402a0:134_0: Taṃ divasañhi catasso parisā therasseva dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā ahesuṃ. Kosalamahārājāpi
atk-s0402a0:134_1: balakāyena parivuto pubbārāmameva gato. Tathā pañcasataupāsakaparivāro anāthapiṇḍiko.
atk-s0402a0:134_2: Visākhā pana mahāupāsikā dvīhi jaṅghasahassehi parivuto agamāsi. Sattapaṇṇāsāya kulasatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:134_3: vasanaṭṭhāne sāvatthinagare gehapālakadārake ṭhapetvā sesajano gandhacuṇṇamālādīni
atk-s0402a0:134_4: gahetvā pubbārāmameva agamāsi. Catūsu dvāragāmesu gāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanaparamaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:134_5: sabbeyeva manussā gandhacuṇṇamālādihatthā pubbārāmameva agamaṃsu. Sakalavihāro missakapupphehi
atk-s0402a0:135_0: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi kho vihāraṃ gantvā vihārapariveṇe aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:135_1: Bhikkhū therassa āsanaṃ paññāpayiṃsu. Thero tattha nisīditvā upaṭṭhākattherena vatte
atk-s0402a0:135_2: kate bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:135_3: So paricchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya aciravatiṃ gantvā rajojallaṃ pavāhetvā
atk-s0402a0:135_4: paṭippassaddhadaratho otiṇṇatittheneva uttaritvā nivatthanivāsano saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0402a0:135_5: aṭṭhāsi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi sammukhasammukhaṭṭhānena otaritvā sarīre rajojallaṃ pavāhetvā
atk-s0402a0:135_6: paccuttaritvā theraṃ parivārayiṃsu. Antovihārepi therassa dhammāsanaṃ paññāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:135_7: Catassopi parisā attano attano okāsaṃ ñatvā maggaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu. Sāriputtattheropi
atk-s0402a0:135_9: ratanapallaṅke cittabījaniṃ gahetvā puratthābhimukho nisīdi. Nisīditvā parisaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0402a0:135_10: – “mahatī vatāyaṃ parisā, imissā na appamattikā parittakadhammadesanā anucchavikā,
atk-s0402a0:135_11: kataradhammadesanā nu kho anucchavikā bhavissatī”ti tīṇi piṭakāni āvajjamāno imaṃ
atk-s0402a0:136_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ desetukāmo bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso, bhikkhaveti. Āvusoti
atk-s0402a0:136_1: hi avatvā, bhikkhaveti vacanaṃ buddhālāpo nāma hoti, ayaṃ panāyasmā “dasabalena samānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:136_2: ālapanaṃ na karissāmī”ti satthu gāravavasena sāvakālāpaṃ karonto, “āvuso bhikkhave”ti
atk-s0402a0:136_3: āha. Etadavocāti etaṃ “ajjhattasaṃyojanañca, āvuso, puggalaṃ desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañcā”ti
atk-s0402a0:137_0: Tasmiṃ pana ratanapāsāde adhivattho eko sotāpanno devaputto atthi, so buddhehi vā
atk-s0402a0:137_1: sāvakehi vā desanāya āraddhamattāyayeva jānāti – “ayaṃ desanā uttānikā bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:137_2: ayaṃ gambhīrā. Ayaṃ jhānanissitā bhavissati, ayaṃ vipassanānissitā. Ayaṃ magganissitā
atk-s0402a0:137_3: ayaṃ phalanissitā, ayaṃ nibbānanissitā”ti. So tasmimpi divase therena desanāya āraddhamattāya
atk-s0402a0:137_4: evaṃ aññāsi – “yena nīhārena mayhaṃ ayyena dhammasenāpatinā sāriputtattherena desanā
atk-s0402a0:137_5: āraddhā, ayaṃ desanā vipassanāgāḷhā bhavissati, chahi mukhehi vipassanaṃ kathessati.
atk-s0402a0:137_6: Desanāpariyosāne koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti, sotāpannādīnaṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:137_7: devamanussānaṃ paricchedo na bhavissati. Desanāya anucchavikaṃ katvā mayhaṃ ayyassa
atk-s0402a0:137_8: sādhukāraṃ dassāmī”ti devānubhāvena mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā – “sādhu sādhu ayyā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:138_0: Devarājena sādhukāre dinne parivārakapāsādasahasse adhivatthā devatā sabbāva sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:138_1: adaṃsu. Tāsaṃ sādhukārasaddena sabbā pubbārāme vasanadevatā, tāsaṃ saddena gāvutamatte
atk-s0402a0:138_2: devatā, tato aḍḍhayojane yojaneti etenupāyena ekacakkavāḷe, dvīsu cakkavāḷesu, tīsu
atk-s0402a0:138_3: cakkavāḷesūti dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sādhukāramadaṃsu. Tāsaṃ sādhukārasaddena
atk-s0402a0:138_4: pathaviṭṭhakanāgā ca ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā ca. Tato abbhavalāhakā, uṇhavalāhakā, sītavalāhakā,
atk-s0402a0:138_5: vassavalāhakā, cātumahārājikā cattāro mahārājāno, tāvatiṃsā devatā, sakko devarājā,
atk-s0402a0:138_6: yāmā devatā, suyāmo devarājā, tusitā devatā, santusito devarājā, nimmānaratī devatā,
atk-s0402a0:138_7: sunimmito devarājā, vasavattī devatā, vasavattī devarājā, brahmapārisajjā, brahmapurohitā,
atk-s0402a0:138_8: mahābrahmāno, parittābhā, appamāṇābhā, ābhassarā, parittasubhā, appamāṇasubhā, subhakiṇhā,
atk-s0402a0:138_9: vehapphalā, avihā, atappā, sudassā, sudassī, akaniṭṭhā devatāti asaññe ca arūpāvacarasatte
atk-s0402a0:138_10: ca ṭhapetvā sotāyatanapavattiṭṭhāne sabbā devatā sādhukāramadaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:139_0: Tato khīṇāsavamahābrahmāno – “mahā vatāyaṃ sādhukārasaddo, pathavitalato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:139_1: yāva akaniṭṭhalokaṃ āgato, kimatthaṃ nu kho eso”ti āvajjento “dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero
atk-s0402a0:139_3: amhehipi tattha kāyasakkhīhi bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tattha agamaṃsu. Pubbārāmo
atk-s0402a0:139_4: devatāhi paripuṇṇo, samantā pubbārāmassa gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ, yojananti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0402a0:139_5: heṭṭhā pathavitalena tiriyaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantena paricchinnaṃ dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
atk-s0402a0:139_6: sannipatitāhi devatāhi nirantaramahosi, āragganitudanamatte ṭhāne uparimakoṭiyā saṭṭhi
atk-s0402a0:140_0: Athāyasmā sāriputto “mahantaṃ vatidaṃ halāhalaṃ, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjento dasasahassacakkavāḷe
atk-s0402a0:140_1: ṭhitānaṃ devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitabhāvaṃ addasa. Atha yasmā buddhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:140_2: natthi, parisaparimāṇeneva passanti ceva saddañca sāventi. Sāvakānaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:140_3: vaṭṭati. Tasmā thero samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya mahaggatacittena
atk-s0402a0:140_4: adhiṭṭhāsi – “cakkavāḷapariyantā parisā sabbāpi maṃ passatu, dhammañca me desentassa
atk-s0402a0:140_5: saddaṃ suṇātū”ti. Adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya dakkhiṇajāṇupasse ca cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyañca
atk-s0402a0:140_6: nisīditvā “dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero nāma kīdiso dīgho rasso sāmo odāto”ti vattabbakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:140_7: nāhosi, sabbesampi sabbadisāsu nisinnānaṃ abhimukheyeva paññāyittha, nabhamajjhe
atk-s0402a0:140_8: ṭhitacando viya ahosi. Dhammaṃ desentassāpissa dakkhiṇajāṇupasse ca cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyañca
atk-s0402a0:141_0: Evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā thero ajjhattasaṃyojanañca, āvusoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:141_1: Tattha ajjhattanti kāmabhavo. Bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo. Kiñcāpi hi sattā kāmabhave
atk-s0402a0:141_2: appaṃ kālaṃ vasanti kappassa catutthameva koṭṭhāsaṃ, itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu kāmabhavo
atk-s0402a0:141_3: suñño hoti tuccho, rūpabhave bahuṃ kālaṃ vasanti, tathāpi tesaṃ yasmā kāmabhave cutipaṭisandhiyo
atk-s0402a0:141_4: bahukā honti, appakā rūpārūpabhavesu. Yattha ca cutipaṭisandhiyo bahukā, tattha ālayopi
atk-s0402a0:141_5: patthanāpi abhilāsopi bahu hoti. Yattha appā, tattha appo. Tasmā kāmabhavo ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:141_6: nāma jātaṃ, rūpārūpabhavā bahiddhā nāma. Iti ajjhattasaṅkhāte kāmabhave chandarāgo
atk-s0402a0:141_7: ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma, bahiddhāsaṅkhātesu rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo bahiddhāsaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:141_8: nāma. Orambhāgiyāni vā pañca saṃyojanāni ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma, uddhambhāgiyāni
atk-s0402a0:141_9: pañca bahiddhāsaṃyojanaṃ nāma. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, tattha
atk-s0402a0:141_10: upapattinipphādanato taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni. Uddhaṃ vuccati rūpārūpadhātu,
atk-s0402a0:141_11: tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyāni.
atk-s0402a0:142_0: Evaṃ vuttappabhedena ajjhattasaṃyojanena saṃyutto puggalo ajjhattasaṃyojano, bahiddhāsaṃyojanena
atk-s0402a0:142_1: saṃyutto puggalo bahiddhāsaṃyojano. Ubhayampi cetaṃ na lokiyassa vaṭṭanissitamahājanassa
atk-s0402a0:142_2: nāmaṃ. Yesaṃ pana bhavo dvedhā paricchinno, tesaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:142_3: etaṃ nāmaṃ. Yathā hi mahāaraññe khadiravanasālavanādīni thambho tulāsaṅghāṭoti nāmaṃ
atk-s0402a0:142_4: na labhanti, khadiravanaṃ sālavananti nāmameva labhanti. Yadā pana tato rukkhā tiṇhāya
atk-s0402a0:142_5: kuṭhāriyā chinditvā thambhādisaṇṭhānena tacchitā honti, tadā thambho tulāsaṅghāṭoti
atk-s0402a0:142_6: nāmaṃ labhanti. Evamevaṃ aparicchinnabhavo bahalakileso puthujjano etaṃ nāmaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:142_7: labhati, bhavaṃ paricchinditvā kilese tanuke katvā ṭhitā sotāpannādayova labhanti.
atk-s0402a0:143_0: Imassa ca panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ idaṃ vacchakasālopamaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vacchakasālaṃ
atk-s0402a0:143_1: hi katvā anto khāṇuke koṭṭetvā vacchake yottehi bandhitvā tesu upanibandhanti, yottesu
atk-s0402a0:143_2: appahontesu kaṇṇesupi gahetvā tattha vacchake pavesenti, antosālāya okāse appahonte
atk-s0402a0:143_3: bahi khāṇuke koṭṭetvāpi evameva karonti. Tattha koci antobaddho vacchako bahinipanno
atk-s0402a0:143_4: hoti, koci bahibaddho antonipanno, koci antobaddho antova nipanno, koci bahibaddho
atk-s0402a0:143_5: bahiyeva nipanno. Koci antopi abaddhova carati, bahipi abaddhova. Tattha antobaddhassa
atk-s0402a0:143_6: bahinipannassa bandhanaṃ dīghaṃ hoti. So hi uṇhādipīḷito nikkhamitvā bahi vacchakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:143_7: abbhantare nipajjati. Bahibaddhe antonipannepi eseva nayo. Yo pana antobaddho antonipanno,
atk-s0402a0:143_8: tassa bandhanaṃ rassaṃ hoti. Bahibaddhe bahinipannepi eseva nayo. Ubhopi hi te divasampi
atk-s0402a0:143_9: khāṇukaṃ anuparigantvā tattheva sayanti. Yo pana anto abaddho tattheva vacchakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:143_10: antare vicarati. Ayaṃ sīlavā vacchako kaṇṇe gahetvā vacchakānaṃ antare vissaṭṭho
atk-s0402a0:143_11: divasampi aññattha agantvā tattheva carati. Bahi abaddhe tattheva vicarantepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:144_0: Tattha vacchakasālā viya tayo bhavā veditabbā. Vacchakasālāyaṃ khāṇukā viya avijjākhāṇuko.
atk-s0402a0:144_1: Vacchakabandhanayottaṃ viya dasa saṃyojanāni. Vacchakā viya tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattā.
atk-s0402a0:144_2: Antobaddho bahisayitavacchako viya rūpārūpabhavesu sotāpannasakadāgāmino. Te hi kiñcāpi
atk-s0402a0:144_3: tattheva vasanti, saṃyojanaṃ pana tesaṃ kāmāvacarūpanibaddhameva. Kenaṭṭhena? Appahīnaṭṭhena.
atk-s0402a0:144_4: Rūpārūpabhavesu puthujjanopi eteheva saṅgahito. Sopi hi kiñcāpi tattha vasati, saṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:144_5: panassa kāmāvacarūpanibaddhameva. Bahibaddho antosayitavacchako viya kāmāvacare anāgāmī.
atk-s0402a0:144_6: So hi kiñcāpi kāmāvacare vasati, saṃyojanaṃ panassa rūpārūpabhavūpanibaddhameva.
atk-s0402a0:144_7: Antobaddho antonipanno viya kāmāvacare sotāpannasakadāgāmino. Te hi sayampi kāmāvacare
atk-s0402a0:144_8: vasanti, saṃyojanampi tesaṃ kāmāvacarūpanibaddhameva. Bahibaddho bahinipanno viya
atk-s0402a0:144_9: rūpārūpabhavesu anāgāmī. So hi sayampi tattha vasati, saṃyojanampissa rūpārūpabhavūpanibaddhameva.
atk-s0402a0:144_10: Antoabaddho antovicaraṇavacchako viya kāmāvacare khīṇāsavo. Bahiabaddho bahivicaraṇavacchako
atk-s0402a0:144_11: viya rūpārūpabhave khīṇāsavo. Saṃyojanesu pana sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāsoti
atk-s0402a0:144_12: imāni tīṇi gacchantaṃ nivārenti, gataṃ paṭiānenti. Kāmacchando byāpādoti imāni pana
atk-s0402a0:144_13: dve saṃyojanāni samāpattiyā vā avikkhambhetvā maggena vā asamucchinditvā rūpārūpabhave
atk-s0402a0:145_0: Katamo cāvusoti idaṃ thero yathā nāma puriso dve ratanapeḷā passe ṭhapetvā sampattaparisāya
atk-s0402a0:145_1: dve hatthe pūretvā sattavidhaṃ ratanaṃ bhājetvā dadeyya, evaṃ paṭhamaṃ ratanapeḷaṃ
atk-s0402a0:145_2: datvā dutiyampi tatheva dadeyya. Evamevaṃ “ajjhattasaṃyojanañca, āvuso, puggalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:145_3: desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañcā”ti imāni dve padāni mātikāvasena ṭhapetvā idāni aṭṭhavidhāya
atk-s0402a0:146_0: Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Sīlavā hotīti catupārisuddhisīlehi sīlasampanno hoti.
atk-s0402a0:146_1: Iti thero ettāvatā ca kira catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti
atk-s0402a0:146_2: iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassesīti dīpavihāravāsī summatthero āha.
atk-s0402a0:146_4: vutto. Pātimokkhasaṃvaroyeva hi sīlaṃ, itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:146_5: atthī”ti ananujānanto uttari āha – indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārarakkhāmattakameva,
atk-s0402a0:146_6: ājīvapārisuddhi dhammena samena paccayuppattimattakaṃ, paccayasannissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye
atk-s0402a0:146_8: sīlaṃ. Yassa so bhinno, ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso hatthapāde sesāni rakkhissatīti
atk-s0402a0:146_9: na vattabbo. Yassa pana so arogo, ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ sesāni puna
atk-s0402a0:146_10: pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti. Tasmā sīlavāti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā
atk-s0402a0:147_1: ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno. Aṇumattesūti appamattakesu. Vajjesūti akusaladhammesu.
atk-s0402a0:147_2: Bhayadassāvīti bhayadassī. Samādāyāti sammā ādiyitvā. Sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti taṃ
atk-s0402a0:147_3: taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati. Apica samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci
atk-s0402a0:147_4: sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā, taṃ sabbaṃ sammā
atk-s0402a0:147_5: ādāya sikkhati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana sabbānetāni pātimokkhasaṃvarādīni
atk-s0402a0:147_6: padāni visuddhimagge vuttāni, catupārisuddhisīlañca sabbākārena vibhajitvā dassitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:147_7: Aññataraṃ devanikāyanti chasu kāmāvacaradevaghaṭāsu aññataraṃ devaghaṭaṃ. Āgāmī hotīti
atk-s0402a0:147_8: heṭṭhā āgāmī hoti. Āgantā itthattanti itthattaṃ mānusakapañcakkhandhabhāvameva āgantā
atk-s0402a0:147_9: hoti. Tatrūpapattiko vā uparūpapattiko vā na hoti, puna heṭṭhāgāmīyeva hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:147_10: Iminā aṅgena sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno heṭṭhimaṃ maggadvayañceva
atk-s0402a0:148_0: Aññataraṃ santaṃ cetovimuttinti aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu aññataraṃ catutthajjhānasamāpattiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:148_1: Sā hi paccanīkakilesānaṃ santattā santā, teheva ca kilesehi cetaso vimuttattā cetovimuttīti
atk-s0402a0:148_2: vuccati. Aññataraṃ devanikāyanti pañcasu suddhāvāsadevanikāyesu aññataraṃ. Anāgantā
atk-s0402a0:148_3: itthattanti puna imaṃ pañcakkhandhabhāvaṃ anāgantā, heṭṭhūpapattiko na hoti, uparūpapattiko
atk-s0402a0:148_4: vā hoti tattheva vā parinibbāyīti dasseti. Iminā aṅgena samādhikammikassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0402a0:148_5: tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:149_0: Kāmānaṃyeva nibbidāyāti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ nibbindanatthāya ukkaṇṭhanatthāya. Virāgāyāti
atk-s0402a0:149_1: virajjanatthāya. Nirodhāyāti appavattikaraṇatthāya. Paṭipanno hotīti paṭipattiṃ paṭipanno
atk-s0402a0:149_2: hoti. Ettāvatā sotāpannassa ca sakadāgāmino ca pañcakāmaguṇikarāgakkhayatthāya anāgāmimaggavipassanā
atk-s0402a0:149_3: kathitā hoti. Bhavānaṃyevāti tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ. Iminā anāgāmino bhavarāgakkhayatthāya
atk-s0402a0:149_4: arahattamaggavipassanā kathitā hoti. Taṇhākkhayāya paṭipanno hotīti imināpi sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:149_6: imināpi anāgāmino bhavalobhakkhayatthāya arahattamaggavipassanāva kathitā. Aññataraṃ
atk-s0402a0:149_7: devanikāyanti suddhāvāsesveva aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ. Anāgantā itthattanti imaṃ khandhapañcakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:149_8: anāgantā, heṭṭhūpapattiko na hoti, uparūpapattiko vā hoti, tattheva vā parinibbāyati.
atk-s0402a0:150_0: Iti paṭhamena aṅgena sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno heṭṭhimāni dve
atk-s0402a0:150_1: maggaphalāni kathitāni, dutiyena samādhikammikassa tīṇi maggaphalāni, “so kāmāna”nti
atk-s0402a0:150_3: “so bhavānaṃyevā”ti iminā anāgāmissa upari arahattamaggavipassanā, “so taṇhākkhayāyā”ti
atk-s0402a0:150_5: “so lobhakkhayāyā”ti iminā anāgāmino bhavalobhakkhayāya upari arahattamaggavipassanā
atk-s0402a0:150_6: kathitāti evaṃ chahi mukhehi vipassanaṃ kathetvā desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0402a0:150_7: koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, sotāpannādīnaṃ paricchedova nāhosi. Yathā
atk-s0402a0:150_8: ca imasmiṃ samāgame, evaṃ mahāsamayasutte maṅgalasutte ca cūḷarāhulovādasutte ca
atk-s0402a0:150_9: koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, sotāpannādīnaṃ devamanussānaṃ paricchedo nāhosi.
atk-s0402a0:151_0: Samacittā devatāti cittassa sukhumabhāvasamatāya samacittā. Sabbāpi hi tā attano
atk-s0402a0:151_1: attabhāve sukhume cittasarikkhake katvā māpesuṃ. Tena samacittā nāma jātā. Aparenapi
atk-s0402a0:151_2: kāraṇena samacittā – “therena samāpatti tāva kathitā, samāpattithāmo pana na kathito.
atk-s0402a0:151_3: Mayaṃ dasabalaṃ pakkositvā samāpattiyā thāmaṃ kathāpessāmā”ti sabbāpi ekacittā ahesuntipi
atk-s0402a0:151_4: samacittā. Aparampi kāraṇaṃ – “therena ekena pariyāyena samāpattipi samāpattithāmopi
atk-s0402a0:151_5: kathito, ko nu kho imaṃ samāgamaṃ sampatto, ko na sampatto”ti olokayamānā tathāgatassa
atk-s0402a0:151_6: asampattabhāvaṃ disvā “mayaṃ tathāgataṃ pakkositvā parisaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0402a0:151_7: sabbāpi ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā. Aparampi kāraṇaṃ – anāgate kocideva bhikkhu
atk-s0402a0:151_8: vā bhikkhunī vā devo vā manusso vā “ayaṃ desanā sāvakabhāsitā”ti agāravaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0402a0:151_9: sammāsambuddhaṃ pakkositvā imaṃ desanaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karissāma. Evaṃ anāgate
atk-s0402a0:151_10: garubhāvanīyā bhavissatīti sabbāva ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā. Aparampi kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:151_11: – sabbāpi hi tā ekasamāpattilābhiniyo vā ahesuṃ ekārammaṇalābhiniyo vāti evampi samacittā.
atk-s0402a0:152_0: Haṭṭhāti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā āmoditā pamoditā. Sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto. Anukampaṃ upādāyāti
atk-s0402a0:152_1: na therassa anukampaṃ kāruññaṃ anuddayaṃ paṭicca, na ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne therassa anukampitabbakiccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:152_2: atthi. Yasmiṃ hi divase thero sūkarakhataleṇadvāre bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa
atk-s0402a0:152_3: vedanākammaṭṭhāne kathiyamāne tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ bījamāno ṭhito parassa
atk-s0402a0:152_4: vaḍḍhitabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā khudaṃ vinodento viya parassa sajjitapasādhanaṃ sīse paṭimuñcanto
atk-s0402a0:152_5: viya ca sāvakapāramiñāṇassa nippadesato matthakaṃ patto, tasmiṃyeva divase bhagavatā
atk-s0402a0:152_6: anukampito nāma. Avasesānaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ anukampaṃ
atk-s0402a0:153_0: Balavā purisoti dubbalo hi khippaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, balavāva
atk-s0402a0:153_1: sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sammukhe pāturahosīti sammukhaṭṭhāne puratoyeva pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:153_2: Bhagavā etadavocāti etaṃ “idha sāriputtā”tiādinā nayena attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a0:153_3: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “sace koci bālo akataññū bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā
atk-s0402a0:153_4: upāsikā vā evaṃ cinteyya – ‘sāriputtatthero mahantaṃ parisaṃ alattha, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0402a0:153_5: ettakaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto usūyāya parisaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ āgato’ti. So imaṃ mayi manopadosaṃ
atk-s0402a0:153_6: katvā apāye nibbatteyyā”ti. Athattano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathento etaṃ “idha sāriputtā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a0:154_0: Evaṃ attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathetvā idāni samāpattiyā thāmaṃ kathetuṃ tā kho pana,
atk-s0402a0:154_1: sāriputta, devatā dasapi hutvātiādimāha. Tattha yasavasena vā atthaṃ āharituṃ vaṭṭati
atk-s0402a0:154_2: samāpattivasena vā. Yasavasena tāva mahesakkhā devatā dasa dasa ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:154_3: tāhi appesakkhatarā vīsati vīsati ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu, tāhi appesakkhatarā…pe… saṭṭhi
atk-s0402a0:154_4: saṭṭhi ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu. Samāpattivasena pana yāhi paṇītā samāpatti bhāvitā, tā
atk-s0402a0:154_5: saṭṭhi saṭṭhi ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu. Yāhi tato hīnatarā, tā paññāsa paññāsa…pe… yāhi
atk-s0402a0:154_6: tato hīnatarā samāpatti bhāvitā…pe… tā dasa dasa ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu. Yāhi vā hīnā
atk-s0402a0:154_7: bhāvitā, tā dasa dasa ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu. Yāhi tato paṇītatarā bhāvitā, tā vīsati
atk-s0402a0:154_8: vīsati. Yāhi tato paṇītatarā…pe… tā saṭṭhi saṭṭhi ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:155_0: Āraggakoṭinitudanamatteti āraggakoṭiyā patanamatte okāse. Na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti
atk-s0402a0:155_1: evaṃ sambādhe ṭhāne tiṭṭhantiyopi aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti na ghaṭṭenti, asampīḷā
atk-s0402a0:155_2: asambādhāva ahesuṃ. “Tava hattho maṃ bādhati, tava pādo maṃ bādhati, tvaṃ maṃ maddantī
atk-s0402a0:155_3: ṭhitā”ti vattabbakāraṇaṃ nāhosi. Tattha nūnāti tasmiṃ bhave nūna. Tathācittaṃ bhāvitanti
atk-s0402a0:155_4: tenākārena cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ. Yena tā devatāti yena tathābhāvitena cittena tā devatā
atk-s0402a0:155_5: dasapi hutvā…pe… tiṭṭhanti, na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti. Idheva khoti sāsane vā
atk-s0402a0:155_6: manussaloke vā bhummaṃ, imasmiṃyeva sāsane imasmiṃyeva manussaloketi attho. Tāsañhi
atk-s0402a0:155_7: devatānaṃ imasmiṃyeva manussaloke imasmiṃyeva ca sāsane taṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ, yena
atk-s0402a0:155_8: tā sante rūpabhave nibbattā, tato ca pana āgantvā evaṃ sukhume attabhāve māpetvā
atk-s0402a0:155_9: ṭhitā. Tattha kiñcāpi kassapadasabalassa sāsane tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbattetvā brahmaloke
atk-s0402a0:155_10: nibbattadevatāpi atthi, sabbabuddhānaṃ pana ekāva anusāsanī ekaṃ sāsananti katvā
atk-s0402a0:155_11: “idheva kho, sāriputtā”ti aññabuddhānaṃ sāsanampi imameva sāsanaṃ karonto āha. Ettāvatā
atk-s0402a0:156_0: Idāni sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha tantivasena anusāsaniṃ kathento tasmātiha, sāriputtāti
atk-s0402a0:156_1: āha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā tā devatā idheva santaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā sante bhave
atk-s0402a0:156_2: nibbattā, tasmā. Santindriyāti pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ santatāya nibbutatāya paṇītatāya
atk-s0402a0:156_3: santindriyā. Santamānasāti mānasassa santatāya nibbutatāya paṇītatāya santamānasā.
atk-s0402a0:156_4: Santaṃyeva upahāraṃ upaharissāmāti kāyacittūpahāraṃ santaṃ nibbutaṃ paṇītaṃyeva upaharissāma.
atk-s0402a0:156_5: Sabrahmacārīsūti samānaṃ ekuddesatādiṃ brahmaṃ carantesu sahadhammikesu. Evañhi vo,
atk-s0402a0:156_6: sāriputta, sikkhitabbanti iminā ettakena vārena bhagavā desanaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:156_7: akāsi. Anassunti naṭṭhā vinaṭṭhā. Ye imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ nāssosunti ye attano pāpikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:156_8: tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya imaṃ evarūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ na labhiṃsūti
atk-s0402a0:157_0: 38. Chaṭṭhe varaṇāyaṃ viharatīti varaṇā nāma ekaṃ nagaraṃ, taṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0402a0:157_3: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yvāyaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya uppajjati kāmarāgo, tassābhinivesādihetu.
atk-s0402a0:157_4: Kāmarāgena abhiniviṭṭhattā vinibaddhattā tasmiṃyeva ca kāmarāge mahāpaṅke viya paligedhattā
atk-s0402a0:157_5: anupaviṭṭhattā teneva ca kāmarāgena pariyuṭṭhitattā gahitattā kāmarāgeneva ca ajjhositattā
atk-s0402a0:157_6: gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahitattāti. Diṭṭhirāgādipadesupi eseva nayo. Diṭṭhirāgoti
