atk-s0402a0:157_7: panettha dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo nissāya uppajjanakarāgo veditabbo. Puratthimesu janapadesūti
atk-s0402a0:157_8: therassa vasanaṭṭhānato sāvatthijanapado puratthimadisābhāge hoti, thero ca nisīdantopi
atk-s0402a0:157_9: tatomukhova nisinno, tasmā evamāha. Udānaṃ udānesīti udāhāraṃ udāhari. Yathā hi yaṃ
atk-s0402a0:157_10: telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ avasesakoti vuccati. Yañca
atk-s0402a0:157_11: jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ oghoti vuccati, evamevaṃ
atk-s0402a0:157_12: yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi
atk-s0402a0:157_13: nikkhamati, taṃ udānanti vuccati, evarūpaṃ pītimayavacanaṃ nicchāresīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:158_0: 39. Sattame gundāvaneti evaṃ nāmake vane. Upasaṅkamīti “mahākaccānatthero kira nāma
atk-s0402a0:158_1: attano pitumattampi ayyakamattampi disvā neva abhivādeti na paccuṭṭheti na āsanena
atk-s0402a0:158_2: nimantetī”ti sutvā “na sakkā ettakena niṭṭhaṃ gantuṃ, upasaṅkamitvā naṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:158_3: bhuttapātarāso yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami. Jiṇṇeti jarājiṇṇe. Vuddheti vayovuddhe.
atk-s0402a0:158_4: Mahallaketi jātimahallake. Addhagateti dīghakāladdhānaṃ atikkante. Vayoanuppatteti
atk-s0402a0:158_5: pacchimavayaṃ anuppatte. Tayidaṃ, bho kaccāna, tathevāti, bho kaccāna, yaṃ taṃ amhehi
atk-s0402a0:158_6: kevalaṃ sutameva, taṃ iminā diṭṭhena sameti. Tasmā taṃ tatheva, na aññathā. Na hi
atk-s0402a0:158_7: bhavaṃ kaccāno brāhmaṇeti idaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo –
atk-s0402a0:158_8: amhe evaṃ mahallake disvā bhoto kaccānassa abhivādanamattampi paccuṭṭhānamattampi
atk-s0402a0:158_9: āsanena nimantanamattampi natthīti. Na sampannamevāti na yuttameva na anucchavikameva.
atk-s0402a0:159_0: Thero brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo neva vuddhe jānāti na dahare, ācikkhissāmissa
atk-s0402a0:159_1: vuddhe ca dahare cā”ti desanaṃ vaḍḍhento atthi brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tattha jānatāti
atk-s0402a0:159_2: sabbaṃ neyyaṃ jānantena. Passatāti tadeva hatthe ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya passantena.
atk-s0402a0:159_3: Vuddhabhūmīti yena kāraṇena vuddho nāma hoti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Daharabhūmīti yena kāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:159_4: daharo nāma hoti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Āsītikoti asītivassavayo. Nāvutikoti navutivassavayo.
atk-s0402a0:159_5: Kāme paribhuñjatīti vatthukāme kilesakāmeti duvidhepi kāme kamanavasena paribhuñjati.
atk-s0402a0:159_6: Kāmamajjhāvasatīti duvidhepi kāme ghare gharassāmiko viya vasati adhivasati. Kāmapariyesanāya
atk-s0402a0:159_7: ussukoti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ pariyesanatthaṃ ussukkamāpanno. Bālo na therotveva
atk-s0402a0:159_8: saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti so na thero bālo mandotveva gaṇanaṃ gacchati. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:160: “Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṃ siro;
atk-s0402a0:162_0: Daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbanena samannāgato. Susukāḷakesoti suṭṭhu kāḷakeso. Bhadrena
atk-s0402a0:162_1: yobbanena samannāgatoti yena yobbanena samannāgato yuvā, taṃ yobbanaṃ bhadraṃ laddhakanti
atk-s0402a0:162_2: dasseti. Paṭhamena vayasāti paṭhamavayo nāma tettiṃsa vassāni, tena samannāgatoti
atk-s0402a0:162_3: attho. Paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti so evarūpo puggalo paṇḍitoti ca theroti
atk-s0402a0:163: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0402a0:164: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a0:165_0: 40. Aṭṭhame corā balavanto hontīti pakkhasampannā, parivārasampannā, dhanasampannā,
atk-s0402a0:165_1: nivāsaṭṭhānasampannā, vāhanasampannā ca honti. Rājāno tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontīti
atk-s0402a0:165_2: tasmiṃ samaye rājāno tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti. Atiyātunti bahiddhā
atk-s0402a0:165_3: janapadacārikaṃ caritvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ. Niyyātunti “corā
atk-s0402a0:165_4: janapadaṃ vilumpanti maddanti, te nisedhessāmā”ti paṭhamayāme vā majjhimayāme vā
atk-s0402a0:165_5: pacchimayāme vā nikkhamituṃ phāsukaṃ na hoti. Tato uṭṭhāya corā manusse pothetvā
atk-s0402a0:165_6: acchinditvā gacchanti. Paccantime vā janapade anusaññātunti gāmaṃ vāsakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0402a0:165_7: setuṃ attharaṇatthāya pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpanatthāya sālādīnaṃ karaṇatthāya paccantime
atk-s0402a0:165_8: janapade anusaññātumpi na sukhaṃ hoti. Brāhmaṇagahapatikānanti antonagaravāsīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:165_9: brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ. Bāhirāni vā kammantānīti bahigāme ārāme khettakammantāni.
atk-s0402a0:165_10: Pāpabhikkhū balavanto hontīti pakkhuttarā yasuttarā puññavanto bahukehi upaṭṭhākehi
atk-s0402a0:165_11: ca upaṭṭhākīhi ca samannāgatā rājarājamahāmattasannissitā. Pesalā bhikkhū tasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:165_12: samaye dubbalā hontīti tasmiṃ samaye piyasīlā bhikkhū tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena
atk-s0402a0:165_13: dubbalā honti. Tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtāva saṅghamajjhe saṅkasāyantīti nissaddā hutvā
atk-s0402a0:165_14: saṅghamajjhe nisinnā kiñci ekavacanampi mukhaṃ ukkhipitvā kathetuṃ asakkontā pajjhāyantā
atk-s0402a0:165_15: viya nisīdanti. Tayidanti tadetaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:166_1: attho. Ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ. Evarūpo hi sahavipassanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:166_2: maggaṃ ārādhetuṃ sampādetuṃ pūretuṃ na sakkoti. Sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:166_3: Imasmiṃ sutte saha vipassanāya maggo kathito.
atk-s0402a0:167_0: 42. Dasame duggahitehīti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitehi. Byañjanappatirūpakehīti byañjanaso
atk-s0402a0:167_1: patirūpakehi akkharacitratāya laddhakehi. Atthañca dhammañca paṭibāhantīti suggahitasuttantānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:167_2: atthañca pāḷiñca paṭibāhanti, attano duggahitasuttantānaṃyeva atthañca pāḷiñca uttaritaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:167_3: katvā dassenti. Sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo. Imasmiṃ sutte sāsanassa vuddhi
atk-s0402a0:168_0: 43. Pañcamassa paṭhame uttānāti pākaṭā appaṭicchannā. Gambhīrāti guḷhā paṭicchannā.
atk-s0402a0:168_1: Uddhatāti uddhaccena samannāgatā. Unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā, uṭṭhitatucchamānāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:168_2: hoti. Capalāti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā cāpallena yuttā. Mukharāti mukhakharā kharavacanā.
atk-s0402a0:168_3: Vikiṇṇavācāti asaṃyatavacanā divasampi niratthakavacanapalāpino. Muṭṭhassatīti vissaṭṭhasatino.
atk-s0402a0:168_4: Asampajānāti nippaññā. Asamāhitāti cittekaggatāmattassāpi alābhino. Pākatindriyāti
atk-s0402a0:168_5: pakatiyā ṭhitehi vivaṭehi arakkhitehi indriyehi samannāgatā. Sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:169_0: 44. Dutiye bhaṇḍanajātāti bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgo, taṃ tesaṃ jātanti
atk-s0402a0:169_2: sañjātakalahā. Ayaṃ tāva gihīsu nayo. Pabbajitā pana āpattivītikkamavācaṃ vadantā
atk-s0402a0:169_3: kalahajātā nāma. Vivādāpannāti viruddhavādaṃ āpannā. Mukhasattīhi vitudantāti guṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:169_4: chindanaṭṭhena dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccanti, tāhi vitudantā vijjhantā.
atk-s0402a0:169_5: Samaggāti ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti etesaṃ karaṇena samaggatāya sahitā. Piyacakkhūhīti mettācakkhūhi.
atk-s0402a0:170_0: 45. Tatiye aggavatīti uttamapuggalavatī, aggāya vā uttamāya paṭipattiyā samannāgatā.
atk-s0402a0:170_1: Tato viparītā anaggavatī. Bāhulikāti cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā. Sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ
atk-s0402a0:170_2: gaṇhantīti sāthalikā. Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:170_3: pañca nīvaraṇāni, tena pañcanīvaraṇapūraṇe pubbaṅgamāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paviveketi upadhiviveke
atk-s0402a0:170_4: nibbāne. Nikkhittadhurāti tividhepi viveke oropitadhurā. Na vīriyaṃ ārabhantīti duvidhampi
atk-s0402a0:170_5: vīriyaṃ na karonti. Appattassa pattiyāti pubbe appattassa jhānavipassanāmaggaphalavisesassa
atk-s0402a0:170_6: pattiatthāya. Itaraṃ padadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Pacchimā janatāti saddhivihārikaantevāsikajano.
atk-s0402a0:170_7: Diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatīti ācariyupajjhāyehi kataṃ anukaronto diṭṭhassa tesaṃ ācārassa
atk-s0402a0:170_8: anugatiṃ āpajjati nāma. Sesaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:171_0: 46. Catutthe ariyāti ariyasāvakaparisā. Anariyāti puthujjanaparisā. “Idaṃ dukkha”nti
atk-s0402a0:171_1: yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:171_2: ettakameva dukkhaṃ, ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ natthīti yathāsabhāvato nappajānanti. Esa
atk-s0402a0:171_3: nayo sabbattha. Sesapadesu pana tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayo
atk-s0402a0:171_4: nāma, tassāyeva taṇhāya, dvinnampi vā tesaṃ saccānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppatti dukkhanirodho
atk-s0402a0:171_5: nāma, aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā nāmāti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0402a0:171_6: catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā ca cattāri ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:172_0: 47. Pañcame parisākasaṭoti kasaṭaparisā kacavaraparisā palāpaparisāti attho. Parisāmaṇḍoti
atk-s0402a0:172_1: pasannaparisā sāraparisāti attho. Chandāgatiṃ gacchantīti chandena agatiṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0402a0:172_2: akattabbaṃ karontīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Imāni pana cattāri agatigamanāni
atk-s0402a0:172_3: bhaṇḍabhājanīye ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne ca labbhanti. Tattha bhaṇḍabhājanīye tāva attano
atk-s0402a0:172_4: bhārabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ amanāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento chandāgatiṃ
atk-s0402a0:172_5: gacchati nāma. Attano pana abhārabhūtānaṃ manāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0402a0:172_6: amanāpaṃ dento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Bhaṇḍakabhājanīyavatthuñca ṭhitikañca ajānanto
atk-s0402a0:172_7: mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Mukharānaṃ vā rājādinissitānaṃ vā “ime me amanāpe bhaṇḍake
atk-s0402a0:172_8: dinne anatthampi kareyyu”nti bhayena parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati
atk-s0402a0:172_9: nāma. Yo pana evaṃ na gacchati, sabbesaṃ tulābhūto pamāṇabhūto majjhatto hutvā yaṃ
atk-s0402a0:172_10: yassa pāpuṇāti, taññeva tassa deti, ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:172_11: Vinicchayaṭṭhāne pana attano bhārabhūtassa garukāpattiṃ lahukāpattīti katvā kathento
atk-s0402a0:172_12: chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Itarassa lahukāpattiṃ garukāpattīti katvā kathento dosāgatiṃ
atk-s0402a0:172_13: gacchati nāma. Āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ pana samuccayakkhandhakañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati
atk-s0402a0:172_14: nāma. Mukharassa vā rājapūjitassa vā “ayaṃ me garukaṃ katvā āpattiṃ kathentassa anatthampi
atk-s0402a0:172_15: kareyyā”ti garukameva lahukāti katvā kathento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo pana sabbesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:172_16: yathābhūtameva katheti, ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:173_0: 48. Chaṭṭhe okkācitavinītāti dubbinītā. No paṭipucchāvinītāti na pucchitvā vinītā.
atk-s0402a0:173_1: Gambhīrāti pāḷivasena gambhīrā sallasuttasadisā. Gambhīratthāti atthavasena gambhīrā
atk-s0402a0:173_3: dhammamattameva pakāsakā asaṅkhatasaṃyuttasadisā. Na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentīti vijānanatthāya
atk-s0402a0:173_4: cittaṃ na upaṭṭhapenti, niddāyanti vā aññavihitā vā honti. Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti
atk-s0402a0:173_5: uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe ca. Kavitāti kavīhi katā. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:173_6: Cittakkharāti vicitraakkharā. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Bāhirakāti sāsanato bahibhūtā.
atk-s0402a0:173_7: Sāvakabhāsitāti tesaṃ tesaṃ sāvakehi bhāsitā. Sussūsantīti akkharacittatāya ceva
atk-s0402a0:173_8: sarasampattiyā ca attamanā hutvā suṇanti. Na ceva aññamaññaṃ paṭipucchantīti aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:173_9: atthaṃ vā anusandhiṃ vā pubbāparaṃ vā na pucchanti. Na ca paṭivicarantīti pucchanatthāya
atk-s0402a0:173_10: cārikaṃ na vicaranti. Idaṃ kathanti idaṃ byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabbaṃ kinti ropetabbaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:173_11: Imassa ko atthoti imassa bhāsitassa ko attho, kā anusandhi, kiṃ pubbāparaṃ? Avivaṭanti
atk-s0402a0:173_12: paṭicchannaṃ. Na vivarantīti na ugghāṭenti. Anuttānīkatanti apākaṭaṃ kataṃ. Na uttāniṃ
atk-s0402a0:173_13: karontīti pākaṭaṃ na karonti. Kaṅkhāṭhāniyesūti kaṅkhāya kāraṇabhūtesu. Sukkapakkho
atk-s0402a0:174_0: 49. Sattame āmisagarūti catupaccayagarukā lokuttaradhammaṃ lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā.
atk-s0402a0:174_1: Saddhammagarūti nava lokuttaradhamme garuke katvā cattāro paccaye lāmakato gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:174_2: ṭhitaparisā. Ubhatobhāgavimuttoti dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto. Paññāvimuttoti paññāya vimutto
atk-s0402a0:174_3: sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo. Kāyasakkhīti kāyena jhānaphassaṃ phusitvā pacchā nirodhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:174_4: nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā ṭhito. Diṭṭhippattoti diṭṭhantaṃ patto. Ime dvepi chasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0402a0:174_5: labbhanti. Saddhāvimuttoti saddahanto vimutto. Ayampi chasu ṭhānesu labbhati. Dhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:174_6: anussaratīti dhammānusārī. Saddhaṃ anussaratīti saddhānusārī. Ime dvepi paṭhamamaggasamaṅgino.
atk-s0402a0:174_7: Kalyāṇadhammoti sundaradhammo. Dussīlo pāpadhammoti nissīlo lāmakadhammo. Imaṃ kasmā
atk-s0402a0:174_8: gaṇhanti? Sabbesu hi ekasadisesu jātesu sīlavantesu balavagāravaṃ na hoti, ekaccesu
atk-s0402a0:174_9: pana dussīlesu sati sīlavantānaṃ upari balavagāravaṃ hotīti maññantā gaṇhanti. Te
atk-s0402a0:174_10: tena lābhaṃ labhantīti te bhikkhū ekaccānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ ekaccānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā cattāro
atk-s0402a0:174_11: paccaye labhanti. Gathitāti taṇhāya ganthitā. Mucchitāti taṇhāvaseneva mucchitā.
atk-s0402a0:174_12: Ajjhopannāti ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhitā. Anādīnavadassāvinoti apaccavekkhitaparibhoge
atk-s0402a0:174_13: ādīnavaṃ apassantā. Anissaraṇapaññāti catūsu paccayesu chandarāgaapakaḍḍhanāya nissaraṇapaññāya
atk-s0402a0:174_14: virahitā idamatthaṃ etanti ajānantā. Paribhuñjantīti sacchandarāgā hutvā paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0402a0:175_0: Sukkapakkhe ubhatobhāgavimuttotiādīsu ayaṃ sattannampi ariyapuggalānaṃ saṅkhepapakāsanā
atk-s0402a0:175_1: – eko bhikkhu paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭho aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:175_2: pāpuṇāti. So tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0402a0:175_3: kāyasakkhi nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma. Samāpattīhi vikkhambhanavimuttiyā
atk-s0402a0:175_4: maggena samucchedavimuttiyāti dvikkhattuṃ vā dvīhi vā bhāgehi vimuttoti attho. Aparo
atk-s0402a0:175_5: paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭho samāpattiyo nibbattetuṃ asakkonto sukkhavipassakova hutvā
atk-s0402a0:175_6: sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. So tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu
atk-s0402a0:175_7: chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimutto nāma. Aparo saddhādhurena
atk-s0402a0:175_8: abhiniviṭṭho aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. So tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0402a0:175_9: saddhānusārī nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhi nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:175_10: ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma. Aparo saddhādhurena abhiniviṭṭho samāpattiyo nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:175_11: asakkonto sukkhavipassakova hutvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. So tasmiṃ khaṇe saddhānusārī
atk-s0402a0:175_12: nāma hoti, sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimutto nāma.
atk-s0402a0:176: 50. Aṭṭhame visamāti sapakkhalanaṭṭhena visamā. Samāti nipakkhalanaṭṭhena samā. Adhammakammānīti uddhammāni kammāni. Avinayakammānīti ubbinayāni kammāni.
atk-s0402a0:178_0: 52. Dasame adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇādicatubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ. Ādiyantīti gaṇhanti.
atk-s0402a0:178_1: Saññāpentīti jānāpenti. Na ca saññattiṃ upagacchantīti saññāpanatthaṃ na sannipatanti.
atk-s0402a0:178_2: Na ca nijjhāpentīti na pekkhāpenti. Na ca nijjhattiṃ upagacchantīti aññamaññaṃ nijjhāpanatthāya
atk-s0402a0:178_3: na sannipatanti. Asaññattibalāti asaññattiyeva balaṃ etesanti asaññattibalā. Appaṭinissaggamantinoti
atk-s0402a0:178_4: yesaṃ hi evaṃ hoti – “sace amhehi gahitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhissāma.
atk-s0402a0:178_5: Sace adhammikaṃ, vissajjessāmā”ti, te paṭinissaggamantino nāma honti. Ime pana na
atk-s0402a0:178_6: tathā mantentīti appaṭinissaggamantino. Thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissāti diṭṭhithāmena
atk-s0402a0:178_7: ca diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca abhinivisitvā. Idameva saccanti idaṃ amhākaṃ vacanameva saccaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:178_8: Moghamaññanti avasesānaṃ vacanaṃ moghaṃ tucchaṃ. Sukkapakkho uttānatthoyevāti.
atk-s0402a0:179: 53. Dutiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame cakkavattinā saddhiṃ gahitattā “lokānukampāyā”ti na vuttaṃ. Ettha ca cakkavattino uppattiyā dve sampattiyo labhanti, buddhānaṃ uppattiyā tissopi.
atk-s0402a0:181_0: 55. Tatiye bahuno janassa anutappā hotīti mahājanassa anutāpakārī hoti. Tattha cakkavattino
atk-s0402a0:181_1: kālakiriyā ekacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ anutāpaṃ karoti, tathāgatassa kālakiriyā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu.
atk-s0402a0:182: 56. Catutthe thūpārahāti thūpassa yuttā anucchavikā. Cakkavattino hi cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā dve sampattiyo labhanti, buddhānaṃ cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā tissopi.
atk-s0402a0:183: 57. Pañcame buddhāti attano ānubhāvena cattāri saccāni buddhā.
atk-s0402a0:184_0: 58. Chaṭṭhe phalantiyāti saddaṃ karontiyā. Na santasantīti na bhāyanti. Tattha khīṇāsavo
atk-s0402a0:184_1: attano sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā na bhāyati, hatthājānīyo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattāti.
atk-s0402a0:185_0: 61. Navame kiṃpurisāti kinnarā. Mānusiṃ vācaṃ na bhāsantīti manussakathaṃ na kathenti.
atk-s0402a0:185_1: Dhammāsokassa kira ekaṃ kinnaraṃ ānetvā dassesuṃ. So “kathāpetha na”nti āha. Kinnaro
atk-s0402a0:185_2: kathetuṃ na icchati. Eko puriso “ahametaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0402a0:185_3: dve khāṇuke koṭṭetvā ukkhaliṃ āropesi. Sā ubhatopassehi patati. Taṃ disvā kinnaro
atk-s0402a0:185_4: “kiṃ aññaṃ ekaṃ khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ettakameva āha. Puna aparabhāge dve
atk-s0402a0:185_5: kinnare ānetvā dassesuṃ. Rājā “kathāpetha ne”ti āha. Te kathetuṃ na icchiṃsu. Eko
atk-s0402a0:185_6: puriso “ahamete kathāpessāmī”ti te gahetvā antarāpaṇaṃ agamāsi. Tattheko ambapakkañca
atk-s0402a0:185_7: macche ca addasa, eko kabiṭṭhaphalañca ambilikāphalañca. Tattha purimo “mahāvisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:185_8: manussā khādanti, kathaṃ te kilāsino na hontī”ti āha. Itaro “kathaṃ ime etaṃ nissāya
atk-s0402a0:185_9: kuṭṭhino na hontī”ti āha. Evaṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ kathetuṃ sakkontāpi dve atthe sampassamānā na kathentīti.
atk-s0402a0:187_0: 63. Ekādasame asantasannivāsanti asappurisānaṃ sannivāsaṃ. Na vadeyyāti ovādena vā
atk-s0402a0:187_1: anusāsaniyā vā na vadeyya, mā vadatūti attho. Therampāhaṃ na vadeyyanti ahampi theraṃ
atk-s0402a0:187_2: bhikkhuṃ ovādānusāsanivasena na vadeyyaṃ. Ahitānukampīti ahitaṃ icchamāno. No hitānukampīti
atk-s0402a0:187_3: hitaṃ anicchamāno. Noti naṃ vadeyyanti “ahaṃ tava vacanaṃ na karissa”nti naṃ vadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:187_4: Viheṭheyyanti vacanassa akaraṇena viheṭheyyaṃ. Passampissa nappaṭikareyyanti passantopi
atk-s0402a0:187_5: jānantopi ahaṃ tassa vacanaṃ na kareyyaṃ. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:187_6: Sukkapakkhe pana sādhūti naṃ vadeyyanti “sādhu bhaddakaṃ sukathitaṃ tayā”ti tassa
atk-s0402a0:188_0: 64. Dvādasame ubhato vacīsaṃsāroti dvīsupi pakkhesu aññamaññaṃ akkosanapaccakkosanavasena
atk-s0402a0:188_1: saṃsaramānā vācā vacīsaṃsāro. Diṭṭhipaḷāsoti diṭṭhiṃ nissāya uppajjanako yugaggāhalakkhaṇo
atk-s0402a0:188_2: paḷāso diṭṭhipaḷāso nāma. Cetaso āghātoti kopo. So hi cittaṃ āghātento uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:188_3: Appaccayoti atuṭṭhākāro, domanassanti attho. Anabhiraddhīti kopoyeva. So hi anabhirādhanavasena
atk-s0402a0:188_4: anabhiraddhīti vuccati. Ajjhattaṃ avūpasantaṃ hotīti sabbampetaṃ niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte
atk-s0402a0:188_5: attano citte ca saddhivihārikaantevāsikasaṅkhātāya attano parisāya ca avūpasantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:188_6: hoti. Tasmetanti tasmiṃ etaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0402a0:189: 65. Dutiyassa paṭhame gihisukhanti gihīnaṃ sabbakāmanipphattimūlakaṃ sukhaṃ. Pabbajitasukhanti pabbajitānaṃ pabbajjāmūlakaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:190: 66. Dutiye kāmasukhanti kāme ārabbha uppajjanakasukhaṃ. Nekkhammasukhanti nekkhammaṃ vuccati pabbajjā, taṃ ārabbha uppajjanakasukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:192: 68. Catutthe sāsavasukhanti āsavānaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ vaṭṭasukhaṃ. Anāsavasukhanti tesaṃ apaccayabhūtaṃ vivaṭṭasukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:193: 69. Pañcame sāmisanti saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭagāmisukhaṃ. Nirāmisanti nikkilesaṃ vivaṭṭagāmisukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:195: 71. Sattame kāyikanti kāyaviññāṇasahajātaṃ. Cetasikanti manodvārikasukhaṃ. Taṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:196_1: Tattha lokiyasappītikato lokiyanippītikaṃ, lokuttarasappītikato ca lokuttaranippītikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:196_2: agganti evaṃ bhummantaraṃ abhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:197: 73. Navame sātasukhanti tīsu jhānesu sukhaṃ. Upekkhāsukhanti catutthajjhānasukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:198: 74. Dasame samādhisukhanti appanaṃ vā upacāraṃ vā pattasukhaṃ. Asamādhisukhanti tadubhayaṃ appattasukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:199: 75. Ekādasame sappītikārammaṇanti sappītikaṃ jhānadvayaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasukhaṃ. Nippītikārammaṇepi eseva nayo. Dvādasamepi imināva upāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:200_0: 77. Terasame rūpārammaṇanti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānārammaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0402a0:200_1: uppajjanakaṃ vā. Arūpārammaṇanti arūpāvacarajjhānārammaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci arūpaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakaṃ vāti.
atk-s0402a0:201: 78-79. Tatiyassa paṭhame sanimittāti sakāraṇā. Dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Nidānaṃ hetu saṅkhāro paccayo rūpanti sabbānipi hi etāni kāraṇavevacanāneva.
atk-s0402a0:202: 84. Sattame savedanāti paccayabhūtāya sampayuttavedanāya satiyeva uppajjanti, nāsatīti attho. Aṭṭhamanavamesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:203_0: 87. Dasame saṅkhatārammaṇāti paccayanibbattaṃ saṅkhatadhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāva uppajjanti.
atk-s0402a0:203_1: No asaṅkhatārammaṇāti asaṅkhataṃ pana nibbānaṃ ārabbha na uppajjanti. Na hontīti
atk-s0402a0:203_2: maggakkhaṇe na honti nāma, phale patte nāhesunti. Evametesu dasasupi ṭhānesu yāva
atk-s0402a0:204: 88. Catutthassa paṭhame cetovimuttīti phalasamādhi. Paññāvimuttīti phalapaññā.
atk-s0402a0:206: 90. Tatiye nāmanti cattāro arūpakkhandhā. Rūpanti rūpakkhandho. Iti imasmiṃ sutte dhammakoṭṭhāsaparicchedañāṇaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:207: 91. Catutthe vijjāti phalañāṇaṃ. Vimuttīti taṃsampayuttā sesadhammā.
atk-s0402a0:208: 92. Pañcame bhavadiṭṭhīti sassatadiṭṭhi. Vibhavadiṭṭhīti ucchedadiṭṭhi. Chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:209: 95. Aṭṭhame dovacassatāti dubbacabhāvo. Pāpamittatāti pāpamittasevanabhāvo. Navamaṃ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:210: 97. Dasame dhātukusalatāti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dhātūti jānanaṃ. Manasikārakusalatāti tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ aniccādivasena lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā jānanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:211: 98. Ekādasame āpattikusalatāti pañcannañca sattannañca āpattikkhandhānaṃ jānanaṃ. Āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatāti desanāya vā kammavācāya vā āpattīhi vuṭṭhānajānananti.
atk-s0402a0:212_0: 99. Pañcamassa paṭhame anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatīti “sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena
atk-s0402a0:212_1: ca, chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo, pātimokkhaṃ therabhāroti
atk-s0402a0:212_2: vuccatī”ti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ therabhāraṃ navako hutvā therena anajjhiṭṭho karonto anāgataṃ
atk-s0402a0:212_3: bhāraṃ vahati nāma. Āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahatīti thero samāno tameva dasavidhaṃ bhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:212_4: attanā vā akaronto paraṃ vā asamādapento āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati nāma. Dutiyasuttepi
atk-s0402a0:213_0: 101. Tatiye akappiye kappiyasaññīti akappiye sīhamaṃsādimhi “kappiyaṃ ida”nti evaṃsaññī.
atk-s0402a0:214_0: 103. Pañcame anāpattiyā āpattisaññīti āpucchitvā bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovantassa, pattaṃ pacantassa,
atk-s0402a0:214_1: kese chindantassa, gāmaṃ pavisantassātiādīsu anāpatti, tattha “āpatti aya”nti evaṃsaññī.
atk-s0402a0:214_2: Āpattiyā anāpattisaññīti tesaññeva vatthūnaṃ anāpucchākaraṇe āpatti, tattha “anāpattī”ti
atk-s0402a0:214_3: evaṃsaññī. Chaṭṭhepi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Sattamādīni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:215_0: 109. Ekādasame āsavāti kilesā. Na kukkuccāyitabbanti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:215_1: avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ kukkuccāyati. Kukkuccāyitabbanti tasseva
atk-s0402a0:215_2: paṭṭhapanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ, taṃ na kukkuccāyati. Dvādasamādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
atk-s0402a0:216_0: 119. Tatiyassa paṇṇāsakassa paṭhame āsāti taṇhā. Duppajahāti duccajā dunnīharā. Lābhāsāya
atk-s0402a0:216_1: duppajahabhāvena sattā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi saṭṭhipi vassāni “ajja labhissāma,
atk-s0402a0:216_2: sve labhissāmā”ti rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanti, kasikammādīni karonti, ubhatobyūḷhaṃ saṅgāmaṃ
atk-s0402a0:216_3: pakkhandanti, ajapathasaṅkupathādayo paṭipajjanti, nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0402a0:216_4: Jīvitāsāya duppajahattā sampatte maraṇakālepi vassasatajīviṃ attānaṃ maññanti. So
atk-s0402a0:216_5: kammakammanimittādīni passantopi “dānaṃ dehi pūjaṃ, karohī”ti anukampakehi vuccamāno
atk-s0402a0:216_6: “nāhaṃ marissāmi, jīvissāmi”cceva āsāya kassaci vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:217_0: 120. Dutiye pubbakārīti paṭhamaṃ upakārassa kārako. Kataññūkatavedīti tena kataṃ
atk-s0402a0:217_1: ñatvā pacchā kārako. Tesu pubbakārī “iṇaṃ demī”ti saññaṃ karoti, pacchā kārako “iṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:218: 121. Tatiye titto ca tappetā cāti paccekabuddho ca tathāgatasāvako ca khīṇāsavo titto nāma, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho titto ca tappetā ca.
atk-s0402a0:219: 122. Catutthe duttappayāti dāyakena duttappayā tappetuṃ na sukarā. Nikkhipatīti nidahati na paribhuñjati. Vissajjetīti paresaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a0:220: 123. Pañcame na vissajjetīti sabbaṃyeva paresaṃ na deti, attano pana yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā avasesaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a0:223: 126. Aṭṭhame parato ca ghosoti parassa santikā assaddhammasavanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:224: 127. Navame parato ca ghosoti parassa santikā saddhammasavanaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:225_0: 131. Dutiyassa paṭhame evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyyāti saddho bhikkhu uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0402a0:225_1: “yādiso sāriputtatthero paññāya, ahampi tādiso homi. Yādiso mahāmoggallānatthero
atk-s0402a0:225_2: iddhiyā, ahampi tādiso homī”ti evaṃ āyācanto pihento patthento yaṃ atthi, tasseva
atk-s0402a0:225_3: patthitattā sammā pattheyya nāma. Ito uttari patthento micchā pattheyya. Evarūpā
atk-s0402a0:225_4: hi patthanā yaṃ natthi, tassa patthitattā micchāpatthanā nāma hoti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Esā,
atk-s0402a0:225_5: bhikkhave, tulā etaṃ pamāṇanti yathā hi suvaṇṇaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā tulentassa tulā icchitabbā,
atk-s0402a0:225_6: dhaññaṃ minantassa mānanti tulane tulā, minane ca mānaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti, evameva mama
atk-s0402a0:225_7: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ esā tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputtamoggallānā. Te gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:225_8: “ahampi ñāṇena vā iddhiyā vā etampamāṇo homī”ti attānaṃ tuletuṃ vā pamāṇetuṃ vā sakkā, na ito aññathā.
atk-s0402a0:226_0: 132. Dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Idaṃ panettha visesamattaṃ – khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā
atk-s0402a0:226_1: cāti etāsu hi khemā paññāya aggā, uppalavaṇṇā iddhiyā. Tasmā “paññāya vā iddhiyā
atk-s0402a0:226_2: vā etādisī homī”ti sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya. Tathā citto gahapati paññāya aggo, hatthako
atk-s0402a0:226_3: rājakumāro mahiddhikatāya. Tasmā “paññāya vā iddhiyā vā ediso homī”ti sammā āyācamāno
atk-s0402a0:226_4: āyāceyya. Khujjuttarāpi mahāpaññatāya aggā, nandamātā mahiddhikatāya. Tasmā “paññāya
atk-s0402a0:226_5: vā iddhiyā vā etādisī homī”ti sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya.
atk-s0402a0:227_0: 135. Pañcame khatanti guṇānaṃ khatattā khataṃ. Upahatanti guṇānaṃ upahatattā upahataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:227_1: chinnaguṇaṃ naṭṭhaguṇanti attho. Attānaṃ pariharatīti nigguṇaṃ attānaṃ jaggati gopāyati.
atk-s0402a0:227_2: Sāvajjoti sadoso. Sānuvajjoti saupavādo. Pasavatīti paṭilabhati. Ananuviccāti ajānitvā
atk-s0402a0:227_3: avinicchinitvā. Apariyogāhetvāti ananupavisitvā. Avaṇṇārahassāti avaṇṇayuttassa micchāpaṭipannassa
atk-s0402a0:227_4: titthiyassa vā titthiyasāvakassa vā. Vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti “suppaṭipanno esa sammāpaṭipanno”ti
atk-s0402a0:227_5: guṇaṃ katheti. Vaṇṇārahassāti buddhādīsu aññatarassa sammāpaṭipannassa. Avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti
atk-s0402a0:227_6: “duppaṭipanno esa micchāpaṭipanno”ti aguṇaṃ katheti. Avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti
atk-s0402a0:227_7: idhekacco puggalo duppaṭipannānaṃ micchāpaṭipannānaṃ titthiyānaṃ titthiyasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:227_8: “itipi duppaṭipannā itipi micchāpaṭipannā”ti avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:227_9: bhāsatīti suppaṭipannānaṃ sammāpaṭipannānaṃ buddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ “itipi suppaṭipannā
atk-s0402a0:228_0: 136. Chaṭṭhe appasādanīye ṭhāneti appasādakāraṇe. Pasādaṃ upadaṃsetīti duppaṭipadāya
atk-s0402a0:228_1: micchāpaṭipadāya “ayaṃ suppaṭipadā sammāpaṭipadā”ti pasādaṃ janeti. Pasādanīye ṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:228_2: appasādanti suppaṭipadāya sammāpaṭipadāya “ayaṃ duppaṭipadā micchāpaṭipadā”ti appasādaṃ
atk-s0402a0:229_0: 137. Sattame dvīsūti dvīsu okāsesu dvīsu kāraṇesu. Micchāpaṭipajjamānoti micchāpaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:229_1: paṭipajjamāno. Mātari ca pitari cāti mittavindako viya mātari, ajātasattu viya pitari.
atk-s0402a0:230_0: 138. Aṭṭhame tathāgate ca tathāgatasāvake cāti devadatto viya tathāgate, kokāliko
atk-s0402a0:230_1: viya ca tathāgatasāvake. Sukkapakkhe ānandatthero viya tathāgate, nandagopālakaseṭṭhiputto
atk-s0402a0:231_0: 139. Navame sacittavodānanti sakacittassa vodānaṃ, aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:231_1: Na ca kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke ca rūpādīsu dhammesu kiñci ekaṃ dhammampi na gaṇhāti
atk-s0402a0:231_2: na parāmasati. Evamettha anupādānaṃ nāma dutiyo dhammo hoti. Dasamekādasamāni uttānatthānevāti.
atk-s0402a0:232_0: 142. Tatiyassa paṭhame dānānīti diyyanakavasena dānāni, deyyadhammassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:232_1: Savatthukā vā cetanā dānaṃ, sampattipariccāgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Āmisadānanti cattāro paccayā
atk-s0402a0:232_2: diyyanakavasena āmisadānaṃ nāma. Dhammadānanti idhekacco amatapattipaṭipadaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0402a0:233: 143. Dutiye cattāro paccayā yajanakavasena yāgo nāma dhammopi yajanakavasena yāgoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:234: 144. Tatiye āmisassa cajanaṃ āmisacāgo, dhammassa cajanaṃ dhammacāgo. Catutthe upasaggamattaṃ viseso.
atk-s0402a0:235: 146. Pañcame catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ bhuñjanaṃ āmisabhogo, dhammassa bhuñjanaṃ dhammabhogo. Chaṭṭhe upasaggamattaṃ viseso.
atk-s0402a0:236: 148. Sattame catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ saṃvibhajanaṃ āmisasaṃvibhāgo, dhammassa saṃvibhajanaṃ dhammasaṃvibhāgo.
atk-s0402a0:237: 149. Aṭṭhame catūhi paccayehi saṅgaho āmisasaṅgaho, dhammena saṅgaho dhammasaṅgaho.
atk-s0402a0:238: 150. Navame catūhi paccayehi anuggaṇhanaṃ āmisānuggaho, dhammena anuggaṇhanaṃ dhammānuggaho.
atk-s0402a0:239: 151. Dasame catūhi paccayehi anukampanaṃ āmisānukampā, dhammena anukampanaṃ dhammānukampāti.
atk-s0402a0:240_0: 152. Catutthassa paṭhame catūhi paccayehi attano ca parassa ca antarapaṭicchādanavasena
atk-s0402a0:240_1: santharaṇaṃ āmisasanthāro, dhammena santharaṇaṃ dhammasanthāro. Dutiye upasaggamattaṃ viseso.
atk-s0402a0:241: 154. Tatiye vuttappakārassa āmisassa esanā āmisesanā, dhammassa esanā dhammesanā. Catutthe upasaggamattameva viseso.
atk-s0402a0:242: 156. Pañcame matthakappattā āmisapariyesanā āmisapariyeṭṭhi, matthakappattāva dhammapariyesanā dhammapariyeṭṭhīti vuttā.
atk-s0402a0:243: 157. Chaṭṭhe āmisena pūjanaṃ āmisapūjā, dhammena pūjanaṃ dhammapūjā.
atk-s0402a0:245: 159. Aṭṭhame āmisaṃ ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena āmisiddhi, dhammopi ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena dhammiddhi.
atk-s0402a0:246: 160. Navame āmisena vaḍḍhanaṃ āmisavuddhi, dhammena vaḍḍhanaṃ dhammavuddhi.
atk-s0402a0:247: 161. Dasame ratikaraṇaṭṭhena āmisaṃ āmisaratanaṃ, dhammo dhammaratanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:249: 162. Ekādasame āmisassa cinanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ āmisasannicayo, dhammassa cinanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ dhammasannicayo.
atk-s0402a0:250: 163. Dvādasame āmisassa vipulabhāvo āmisavepullaṃ, dhammassa vipulabhāvo dhammavepullanti.
atk-s0402a0:251_0: 164. Pañcamassa paṭhame samāpattikusalatāti āhārasappāyaṃ utusappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā
atk-s0402a0:251_2: kāle viyatto hutvā uṭṭhahanto vuṭṭhānakusalo nāma hoti, evaṃ kusalatā.
atk-s0402a0:253: 166. Tatiye khantīti adhivāsanakhanti. Soraccanti susīlyabhāvena suratabhāvo.
atk-s0402a0:254: 167. Catutthe sākhalyanti saṇhavācāvasena sammodamānabhāvo. Paṭisanthāroti āmisena vā dhammena vā paṭisantharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:255: 168. Pañcame avihiṃsāti karuṇāpubbabhāgo. Soceyyanti sīlavasena sucibhāvo. Chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:257: 172. Navame muṭṭhassacce akampanena satiyeva satibalaṃ. Uddhacce akampanena samādhiyeva samādhibalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:260_2: phalasammādiṭṭhīti sabbāpi pañcavidhā sammādiṭṭhi saṅgahitā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:261: 176. Terasame sīlavisuddhīti visuddhisampāpakaṃ sīlaṃ. Diṭṭhivisuddhīti visuddhisampāpikā catumaggasammādiṭṭhi, pañcavidhāpi vā sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0402a0:262_1: ca padhānanti heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ. Tañhi tassā diṭṭhiyā anurūpattā “yathādiṭṭhissa
atk-s0402a0:263: 178. Pannarasame asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesūti aññatra arahattamaggā kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhibhāvo.
atk-s0402a0:265: 180. Sattarasame apilāpanalakkhaṇā sati. Sammā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ sampajaññanti.
atk-s0402a0:266_0: 181. Ito paresu kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho. Upanandhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Sukatakaraṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0402a0:266_1: makkho. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso. Usūyanalakkhaṇā issā. Pañcamaccherabhāvo macchariyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:266_2: Taṃ sabbampi maccharāyanalakkhaṇaṃ. Katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā. Kerāṭikalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:266_3: sāṭheyyaṃ. Alajjanākāro ahirikaṃ. Upavādato abhāyanākāro anottappaṃ. Akkodhādayo
atk-s0402a0:267_0: 185. Sekkhassa bhikkhunoti sattavidhassāpi sekkhassa upariupariguṇehi parihānāya
atk-s0402a0:267_1: saṃvattanti, puthujjanassa pana paṭhamataraṃyeva parihānāya saṃvattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:268: 187. Yathābhataṃ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā nikkhitto, evaṃ niraye patiṭṭhito vāti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:269: 190. Ekaccoti yassete kodhādayo atthi, so ekacco nāma.
atk-s0402a0:270_0: 191-200. Sāvajjāti sadosā. Anavajjāti niddosā. Dukkhudrayāti dukkhavaḍḍhikā. Sukhudriyāti
atk-s0402a0:270_1: sukhavaḍḍhikā. Sabyābajjhāti sadukkhā. Abyābajjhāti niddukkhā. Ettāvatā vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:271_0: 201. Dveme, bhikkhave, atthavase paṭiccāti, bhikkhave, dve atthe nissāya dve kāraṇāni
atk-s0402a0:271_1: sandhāya. Sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sikkhākoṭṭhāso ṭhapito. Saṅghasuṭṭhutāyāti saṅghassa
atk-s0402a0:271_2: suṭṭhubhāvāya, “suṭṭhu, bhante”ti vatvā sampaṭicchanatthāyāti attho. Saṅghaphāsutāyāti
atk-s0402a0:271_3: saṅghassa phāsuvihāratthāya. Dummaṅkūnanti dussīlānaṃ. Pesalānanti pīyasīlānaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:271_4: āsavānanti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vītikkamapaccayā paṭiladdhabbānaṃ vadhabandhanādidukkhadhammasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:271_5: āsavānaṃ. Saṃvarāyāti pidahanatthāya. Samparāyikānanti tathārūpānaṃyeva apāyadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:271_6: samparāye uppajjanakaāsavānaṃ. Paṭighātāyāti paṭisedhanatthāya. Verānanti akusalaverānampi
atk-s0402a0:271_7: puggalaverānampi. Vajjānanti dosānaṃ. Te eva vā dukkhadhammā vajjanīyattā idha vajjāti
atk-s0402a0:271_8: adhippetā. Bhayānanti cittutrāsabhayānampi bhayahetūnaṃ tesaṃyeva dukkhadhammānampi.
atk-s0402a0:271_9: Akusalānanti akkhamaṭṭhena akusalasaṅkhātānaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ. Gihīnaṃ anukampāyāti
atk-s0402a0:271_10: gihīsu ujjhāyantesu paññattasikkhāpadaṃ gihīnaṃ anukampāya paññattaṃ nāma. Pāpicchānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:271_11: pakkhupacchedāyāti pāpicchā pakkhaṃ nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti tesaṃ pakkhupacchedanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:271_12: Appasannānaṃ pasādāyāti pubbe appasannānampi paṇḍitamanussānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattisampadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:271_13: disvā pasāduppattiatthāya. Pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāyāti pasannānaṃ uparūparipasādabhāvāya.
atk-s0402a0:272_1: pātimokkhaṃ paññattaṃ. Pātimokkhuddesoti bhikkhūnaṃ pañca, bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāroti
atk-s0402a0:272_2: nava pātimokkhuddesā paññattā. Pātimokkhaṭṭhapananti uposathaṭṭhapanaṃ. Pavāraṇā
atk-s0402a0:272_3: paññattāti cātuddasikā pannarasikāti dve pavāraṇā paññattā. Pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ paññattanti
atk-s0402a0:272_4: sāpattikassa bhikkhuno pavāraṇā uttiyā vattamānāya pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ paññattaṃ. Tajjanīyakammādīsu
atk-s0402a0:272_5: bhikkhū vācāsattīhi vitudantānaṃ paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:272_6: Bālassa abyattassa seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paññattaṃ. Kuladūsake assajipunabbasuke
atk-s0402a0:272_7: bhikkhū ārabbha pabbājanīyakammaṃ paññattaṃ. Gihīnaṃ akkosakassa sudhammattherassa
atk-s0402a0:272_8: paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paññattaṃ. Āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:272_9: Garukāpattiṃ āpannassa paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ paññattaṃ. Parivāse antarāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:272_10: āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ paññattaṃ. Paṭicchannāyapi appaṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā
atk-s0402a0:272_11: mānattadānaṃ paññattaṃ. Ciṇṇamānattassa abbhānaṃ paññattaṃ. Sammā vattantassa osāraṇīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:273_1: ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā garudhammūpasampadā ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā dūtena upasampadāti
atk-s0402a0:273_2: aṭṭhavidhā upasampadā paññattā. Ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ navaṭṭhānikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:273_3: ñattikammaṃ paññattaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ sattaṭṭhānikameva
atk-s0402a0:273_4: ñattidutiyakammaṃ paññattaṃ. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ sattaṭṭhānikameva
atk-s0402a0:273_5: ñatticatutthakammaṃ paññattaṃ. Paṭhamapārājikādīnaṃ paṭhamapaññatti apaññatte paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:273_6: Tesaṃyeva anupaññatti paññatte anupaññattaṃ. Dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā saṅghasammukhatā
atk-s0402a0:273_7: puggalasammukhatāti imassa catubbidhassa sammukhībhāvassa vasena sammukhāvinayo paññatto.
atk-s0402a0:273_8: Sativepullappattassa khīṇāsavassa acodanatthāya sativinayo paññatto. Ummattakassa
atk-s0402a0:273_9: bhikkhuno amūḷhavinayo paññatto. Appaṭiññāya cuditakassa āpattiyā ataraṇatthaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:273_10: paññattaṃ. Bahutarānaṃ dhammavādīnaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā adhikaraṇavūpasamanatthaṃ. Yebhuyyasikā
atk-s0402a0:273_11: paññattā. Pāpussannassa puggalassa niggaṇhanatthaṃ tassapāpiyasikā paññattā. Bhaṇḍanādivasena
atk-s0402a0:273_12: bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ katvā āpattiṃ āpannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0402a0:274_0: 231. Rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāyāti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa abhijānanatthaṃ paccakkhakaraṇatthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:274_1: Pariññāyāti parijānanatthaṃ. Parikkhayāyāti parikkhayagamanatthaṃ. Pahānāyāti pajahanatthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:274_2: Khayāya vayāyāti khayavayagamanatthaṃ. Virāgāyāti virajjanatthaṃ. Nirodhāyāti nirujjhanatthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:275_1: sārabbhassa. Mānassāti navavidhamānassa. Atimānassāti atikkamitvā maññanamānassa.
atk-s0402a0:275_2: Madassāti majjanākāramadassa. Pamādassāti sativippavāsassa, pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggassa.
atk-s0402a0:280: 1. Tikanipātassa paṭhame bhayānītiādīsu bhayanti cittutrāso. Upaddavoti anekaggatākāro. Upasaggoti upasaṭṭhākāro tattha tattha lagganākāro.
atk-s0402a0:281_0: Tesaṃ evaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ – pabbatavisamanissitā corā janapadavāsīnaṃ pesenti
atk-s0402a0:281_1: – “mayaṃ asukadivase nāma tumhākaṃ gāmaṃ paharissāmā”ti. Te taṃ pavattiṃ sutakālato
atk-s0402a0:281_2: paṭṭhāya bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti. Ayaṃ cittutrāso nāma. “Yathā no te corā kupitā
atk-s0402a0:281_3: anatthampi āvaheyyu”nti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā dvipadacatuppadehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a0:281_4: tattha tattha bhūmiyaṃ nipajjanti ḍaṃsamakasādīhi khajjamānā, gumbantarāni pavisantā
atk-s0402a0:281_5: khāṇukaṇṭake maddanti. Tesaṃ evaṃ vicarantānaṃ vikkhittabhāvo anekaggatākāro nāma.
atk-s0402a0:281_6: Tato coresu yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesu “tucchakasāsanaṃ bhavissati, gāmaṃ pavisissāmā”ti
atk-s0402a0:281_7: saparikkhārā gāmaṃ pavisanti. Atha tesaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāmaṃ parivāretvā dvāre
atk-s0402a0:281_8: aggiṃ datvā manusse ghātetvā corā sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ vilumpitvā gacchanti. Tesu ghātitāvasesā
atk-s0402a0:281_9: aggiṃ nibbāpetvā koṭṭhakacchāyābhitticchāyādīsu tattha tattha laggitvā nisīdanti
atk-s0402a0:281_10: naṭṭhaṃ anusocamānā. Ayaṃ upasaṭṭhākāro lagganākāro nāma.
atk-s0402a0:282_0: Naḷāgārāti naḷehi channapaṭicchannaagārā. Sesasambhārā panettha rukkhamayā honti.
atk-s0402a0:282_1: Tiṇāgārepi eseva nayo. Kūṭāgārānīti kūṭasaṅgahitāni agārāni. Ullittāvalittānīti anto
atk-s0402a0:282_2: ca bahi ca littāni. Nivātānīti nivāritavātappavesāni. Phusitaggaḷānīti chekehi vaḍḍhakīhi
atk-s0402a0:282_3: katattā piṭṭhasaṅghāṭamhi suṭṭhu phusitakavāṭāni. Pihitavātapānānīti yuttavātapānāni.
atk-s0402a0:282_4: Iminā padadvayena kavāṭavātapānānaṃ niccapihitataṃ akathetvā sampattiyeva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:282_5: Icchiticchitakkhaṇe pana tāni pidhīyanti ca vivarīyanti ca.
atk-s0402a0:283_0: Bālato uppajjantīti bālameva nissāya uppajjanti. Bālo hi apaṇḍitapuriso rajjaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:283_1: oparajjaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento katipaye attanā sadise vidhavaputte
atk-s0402a0:283_2: mahādhutte gahetvā “etha ahaṃ tumhe issare karissāmī”ti pabbatagahanādīni nissāya
atk-s0402a0:283_3: antamante gāme paharanto dāmarikabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā anupubbena nigamepi janapadepi
atk-s0402a0:283_4: paharati. Manussā gehāni chaḍḍetvā khemaṭṭhānaṃ patthayamānā pakkamanti. Te nissāya
atk-s0402a0:283_5: vasantā bhikkhūpi bhikkhuniyopi attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni pahāya pakkamanti. Gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:283_6: bhikkhāpi senāsanampi dullabhaṃ hoti. Evaṃ catunnampi parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva
atk-s0402a0:283_7: hoti. Pabbajjitesupi dve bālā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ paṭṭhapetvā codanaṃ ārabhanti.
atk-s0402a0:283_8: Iti kosambivāsikānaṃ viya mahākalaho uppajjati. Catunnaṃ parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva
atk-s0402a0:283_9: hotīti evaṃ yāni kānici bhayāni uppajjanti, sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjantīti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a0:285_0: 2. Dutiye kāyadvārādipavattaṃ kammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sañjānanakāraṇaṃ assāti kammalakkhaṇo.
atk-s0402a0:285_1: Apadānasobhanī paññāti yā paññā nāma apadānena sobhati, bālā ca paṇḍitā ca attano
atk-s0402a0:285_2: attano cariteneva pākaṭā hontīti attho. Bālena hi gatamaggo rukkhagacchagāmanigamādīni
atk-s0402a0:285_3: jhāpetvā gacchantassa indaggino gatamaggo viya hoti, jhāmaṭṭhānamattameva aṅgāramasichārikāsamākulaṃ
atk-s0402a0:285_4: paññāyati. Paṇḍitena gatamaggo kusobbhādayo pūretvā vividhasassasampadaṃ āvahamānena
atk-s0402a0:285_5: catudīpikameghena gatamaggo viya hoti. Yathā tena gatamagge udakapūrāni ceva vividhasassaphalāphalāni
atk-s0402a0:285_6: ca tāni tāni ṭhānāni paññāyanti, evaṃ paṇḍitena gatamagge sampattiyova paññāyanti
atk-s0402a0:287_0: 3. Tatiye bālalakkhaṇānīti “bālo aya”nti etehi lakkhīyati ñāyatīti bālalakkhaṇāni.
atk-s0402a0:287_1: Tānevassa sañjānanakāraṇānīti bālanimittāni. Bālāpadānānīti bālassa apadānāni. Duccintitacintīti
atk-s0402a0:287_3: bhāsamānopi musāvādādibhedaṃ dubbhāsitameva bhāsati. Dukkaṭakammakārīti karontopi
atk-s0402a0:287_5: veditabbaṃ. Sucintitacintītiādīni cettha manosucaritādīnaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:289_0: 4. Catutthe accayaṃ accayato na passatīti attano aparādhaṃ aparādhato na passati.
atk-s0402a0:289_1: Accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikarotīti “aparaddhaṃ mayā”ti ñatvāpi yo dhammo,
atk-s0402a0:289_2: taṃ na karoti, daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā accayaṃ na deseti nakkhamāpeti. Accayaṃ desentassa
atk-s0402a0:289_3: yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātīti parassa “viraddhaṃ mayā”ti ñatvā daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0402a0:291_0: 5. Pañcame ayoniso pañhaṃ kattā hotīti “kati nu kho, udāyi, anussatiṭṭhānānī”ti vutte
atk-s0402a0:291_1: “pubbenivāso anussatiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā lāḷudāyitthero viya anupāyacintāya
atk-s0402a0:291_2: apañhameva pañhanti kattā hoti. Ayoniso pañhaṃ vissajjetā hotīti evaṃ cintitaṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:291_3: pañhaṃ vissajjentopi “idha, bhante, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
atk-s0402a0:291_4: Seyyathidaṃ, ekampi jāti”ntiādinā nayena soyeva thero viya ayoniso vissajjetā hoti,
atk-s0402a0:291_5: apañhameva pañhanti katheti. Parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehīti ettha padameva atthassa
atk-s0402a0:291_6: byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ. Taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ aparihāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:291_7: vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti, evarūpehi padabyañjanehīti attho. Siliṭṭhehīti padasiliṭṭhatāya
atk-s0402a0:291_8: siliṭṭhehi. Upagatehīti atthañca kāraṇañca upagatehi. Nābbhanumoditāti evaṃ yoniso
atk-s0402a0:291_9: sabbaṃ kāraṇasampannaṃ katvāpi vissajjitaṃ parassa pañhaṃ nābhinumodati nābhinandati
atk-s0402a0:292_0: “Aṭṭhānaṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, anavakāso, yaṃ so atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:292_1: devānaṃ sahabyataṃ aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjeyyāpi
atk-s0402a0:293_0: Yoniso pañhaṃ kattātiādīsu ānandatthero viya yonisova pañhaṃ cintetvā yoniso vissajjitā
atk-s0402a0:293_1: hoti. Thero hi “kati nu kho, ānanda, anussatiṭṭhānānī”ti pucchito “ayaṃ pañho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:293_2: yoniso cintetvā yoniso vissajjento āha – “idha, bhante, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
atk-s0402a0:293_3: catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃbhāvitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:293_4: evaṃbahulīkataṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattatī”ti. Abbhanumoditā hotīti tathāgato
atk-s0402a0:293_5: viya yoniso abbhanumoditā hoti. Tathāgato hi ānandattherena pañhe vissajjite “sādhu
atk-s0402a0:293_6: sādhu, ānanda, tena hi tvaṃ, ānanda, imampi chaṭṭhaṃ anussatiṭṭhānaṃ dhārehi. Idhānanda,
atk-s0402a0:293_7: bhikkhu satova abhikkamati satova paṭikkamatī”tiādimāha. Chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:295: 9. Navame sukkapakkho pubbabhāge dasahipi kusalakammapathehi paricchinno, upari yāva arahattamaggā labbhati. Bahuñca puññaṃ pasavatīti ettha lokiyalokuttaramissakapuññaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:297_0: 10. Dasame dussīlabhāvo dussīlyaṃ, dussīlyameva malaṃ dussīlyamalaṃ. Kenaṭṭhena malanti?
atk-s0402a0:297_1: Anudahanaṭṭhena duggandhaṭṭhena kiliṭṭhakaraṇaṭṭhena ca. Tañhi nirayādīsu apāyesu
atk-s0402a0:297_2: anudahatīti anudahanaṭṭhenapi malaṃ. Tena samannāgato puggalo mātāpitūnampi santike
atk-s0402a0:297_3: bhikkhusaṅghassāpi antare bodhicetiyaṭṭhānesupi jigucchanīyo hoti, sabbadisāsu cassa
atk-s0402a0:297_4: “evarūpaṃ kira tena pāpakammaṃ kata”nti avaṇṇagandho vāyatīti duggandhaṭṭhenapi malaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:297_5: Tena ca samannāgato puggalo gatagataṭṭhāne upatāpañceva labhati, kāyakammādīni cassa
atk-s0402a0:297_6: asucīni honti apabhassarānīti kiliṭṭhakaraṇaṭṭhenapi malaṃ. Apica taṃ devamanussasampattiyo
atk-s0402a0:297_7: ceva nibbānasampattiñca milāpetīti milāpanaṭṭhenapi malanti veditabbaṃ. Issāmalamaccheramalesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:299_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame ñātoti paññāto pākaṭo. Ananulomiketi sāsanassa na anulometīti
atk-s0402a0:299_1: ananulomikaṃ, tasmiṃ ananulomike. Kāyakammeti pāṇātipātādimhi kāyaduccarite. Oḷārikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:299_2: vā etaṃ, na evarūpe samādapetuṃ sakkoti. Disā namassituṃ vaṭṭati, bhūtabaliṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:299_3: vaṭṭatīti evarūpe samādapeti gaṇhāpeti. Vacīkammepi musāvādādīni oḷārikāni, attano
atk-s0402a0:299_4: santakaṃ parassa adātukāmena “natthī”ti ayaṃ vañcanamusāvādo nāma vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti
atk-s0402a0:299_5: evarūpe samādapeti. Manokammepi abhijjhādayo oḷārikā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ visaṃvādetvā kathento
atk-s0402a0:299_6: pana ananulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma dakkhiṇavihāravāsitthero viya. Taṃ kira
atk-s0402a0:299_7: theraṃ eko upaṭṭhāko amaccaputto upasaṅkamitvā “mettāyantena paṭhamaṃ kīdise puggale
atk-s0402a0:299_8: mettāyitabba”nti pucchi. Thero sabhāgavisabhāgaṃ anācikkhitvā “piyapuggale”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:299_9: Tassa ca bhariyā piyā hoti manāpā, so taṃ ārabbha mettāyanto ummādaṃ pāpuṇi. Kathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:299_10: panesa bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hotīti? Evarūpassa hi saddhivihārikādayo ceva upaṭṭhākādayo
atk-s0402a0:299_11: ca tesaṃ ārakkhadevatā ādiṃ katvā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ mittabhūtā yāva brahmalokā sesadevatā
atk-s0402a0:299_12: ca “ayaṃ bhikkhu na ajānitvā karissatī”ti tena katameva karonti, evamesa bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0402a0:300_0: Sukkapakkhe pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādīnaṃyeva vasena kāyakammavacīkammāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:300_1: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana avisaṃvādetvā kathento anulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma koḷitavihāravāsī
atk-s0402a0:300_2: catunikāyikatissatthero viya. Tassa kira jeṭṭhabhātā nandābhayatthero nāma potaliyavihāre
atk-s0402a0:300_3: vasanto ekasmiṃ roge samuṭṭhite kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “āvuso, mayhaṃ sallahukaṃ
atk-s0402a0:300_4: katvā ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī”ti. Kiṃ, bhante, aññena kammaṭṭhānena, kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:300_5: pariggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti? Kimatthiko esa, āvusoti? Bhante, kabaḷīkārāhāro upādārūpaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:300_6: ekasmiñca upādārūpe diṭṭhe tevīsati upādārūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti. So “vaṭṭissati,
atk-s0402a0:300_7: āvuso, ettaka”nti taṃ uyyojetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhitvā upādārūpaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0402a0:300_8: vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha naṃ theraṃ bahivihārā anikkhantameva pakkositvā,
atk-s0402a0:300_9: “āvuso, mahāavassayosi mayhaṃ jāto”ti kaniṭṭhattherassa attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0402a0:300_10: Bahujanahitāyāti etassapi hi saddhivihārikādayo “ayaṃ na ajānitvā karissatī”ti tena
atk-s0402a0:300_11: katameva karontīti bahujanahitāya paṭipanno nāma hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:302_0: 12. Dutiye khattiyassāti jātiyā khattiyassa. Muddhāvasittassāti rājābhisekena muddhani
atk-s0402a0:302_1: abhisittassa. Sāraṇīyāni bhavantīti saritabbāni asammussanīyāni honti. Jātoti nibbatto.
atk-s0402a0:302_2: Yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyanti daharakāle jānitumpi na sakkā, aparabhāge pana mātāpituādīhi
atk-s0402a0:302_3: ñātakehi vā dāsādīhi vā “tvaṃ asukajanapade asukanagare asukadivase asukanakkhatte
atk-s0402a0:302_4: jāto”ti ācikkhite sutvā tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ sarati na sammussati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:303_0: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyanti abhisekaṭṭhānaṃ nāma rañño balavatuṭṭhikaraṃ hoti, tenassa
atk-s0402a0:303_1: taṃ yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ. Saṅgāmavijayaṭṭhānepi eseva nayo. Ettha pana saṅgāmanti
atk-s0402a0:303_2: yuddhaṃ. Abhivijinitvāti jinitvā sattumaddanaṃ katvā. Tameva saṅgāmasīsanti tameva
atk-s0402a0:304_0: Idāni yasmā sammāsambuddhassa rañño jātiṭṭhānādīhi kattabbakiccaṃ natthi, imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:304_1: pana sāsane tappaṭibhāge tayo puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ ābhataṃ, tasmā te dassento
atk-s0402a0:304_2: evameva kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hotīti ettha catupārisuddhisīlampi
atk-s0402a0:304_3: pabbajjānissitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Sāraṇīyaṃ hotīti “ahaṃ asukaraṭṭhe asukajanapade
atk-s0402a0:304_4: asukavihāre asukamāḷake asukadivāṭṭhāne asukacaṅkame asukarukkhamūle pabbajito”ti
atk-s0402a0:304_5: evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ saritabbameva hoti na sammussitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:305_0: Idaṃ dukkhanti ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ atthi. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti
atk-s0402a0:305_1: ettako dukkhasamudayo, na ito uddhaṃ dukkhasamudayo atthīti. Sesapadadvayepi eseva
atk-s0402a0:305_2: nayo. Evamettha catūhi saccehi sotāpattimaggo kathito. Kasiṇaparikammavipassanāñāṇāni
atk-s0402a0:305_3: pana maggasannissitāneva honti. Sāraṇīyaṃ hotīti “ahaṃ asukaraṭṭhe…pe… asukarukkhamūle
atk-s0402a0:305_4: sotāpanno jāto”ti yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:306_0: Āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ khayena. Cetovimuttinti phalasamādhiṃ. Paññāvimuttinti
atk-s0402a0:306_1: phalapaññaṃ. Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāva abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paccakkhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:306_2: katvā. Upasampajja viharatīti paṭilabhitvā viharati. Sāraṇīyanti “mayā asukaraṭṭhe…pe…
atk-s0402a0:306_3: asukarukkhamūle arahattaṃ patta”nti attano arahattapattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:308_0: 13. Tatiye santoti atthi upalabbhanti. Saṃvijjamānāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Lokasminti
atk-s0402a0:308_1: sattaloke. Nirāsoti anāso apatthano. Āsaṃsoti āsaṃsamāno patthayamāno. Vigatāsoti
atk-s0402a0:308_2: apagatāso. Caṇḍālakuleti caṇḍālānaṃ kule. Venakuleti vilīvakārakule. Nesādakuleti
atk-s0402a0:308_3: migaluddakānaṃ kule. Rathakārakuleti cammakārakule. Pukkusakuleti pupphacchaḍḍakakule.
atk-s0402a0:309_0: Ettāvatā kulavipattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā nīcakule jātopi ekacco aḍḍho hoti mahaddhano,
atk-s0402a0:309_1: ayaṃ pana na tādiso, tasmāssa bhogavipattiṃ dassetuṃ daliddetiādimāha. Tattha daliddeti
atk-s0402a0:309_3: dukkhajīvike, yattha vāyāmena payogena jīvitavuttiṃ sādhenti, tathārūpeti attho.
atk-s0402a0:309_4: Yattha kasirena ghāsacchādo labbhatīti yasmiṃ kule dukkhena yāgubhattaghāso ca kopīnamattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:310_0: Idāni yasmā ekacco nīcakule jātopi upadhisampanno hoti attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhito,
atk-s0402a0:310_1: ayañca na tādiso, tasmāssa sarīravipattimpi dassetuṃ so ca hoti dubbaṇṇotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:310_2: Tattha dubbaṇṇoti paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. Duddasikoti vijātamātuyāpi
atk-s0402a0:310_3: amanāpadassano. Okoṭimakoti lakuṇḍako. Kāṇoti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā. Kuṇīti
atk-s0402a0:310_4: ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. Khañjoti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo
atk-s0402a0:310_5: vā. Pakkhahatoti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī. Padīpeyyassāti vaṭṭitelakapallakādino padīpaupakaraṇassa.
atk-s0402a0:310_6: Tassa na evaṃ hotīti. Kasmā na hoti? Nīcakule jātattā.
atk-s0402a0:311_0: Jeṭṭhoti aññasmiṃ jeṭṭhe sati kaniṭṭho āsaṃ na karoti, tasmā jeṭṭhoti āha. Ābhisekoti
atk-s0402a0:311_1: jeṭṭhopi na abhisekāraho āsaṃ na karoti, tasmā ābhisekoti āha. Anabhisittoti abhisekārahopi
atk-s0402a0:311_2: kāṇakuṇiādidosarahito sakiṃ abhisitto puna abhiseke āsaṃ na karoti, tasmā anabhisittoti
atk-s0402a0:311_3: āha. Acalappattoti jeṭṭhopi ābhiseko anabhisitto mando uttānaseyyako, sopi abhiseke
atk-s0402a0:311_4: āsaṃ na karoti. Soḷasavassuddesiko pana paññāyamānamassubhedo acalappatto nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:311_5: mahantampi rajjaṃ vicāretuṃ samattho, tasmā “acalappatto”ti āha. Tassa evaṃ hotīti
atk-s0402a0:312_0: Dussīloti nissīlo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo. Asucīti asucīhi kāyakammādīhi samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:312_1: Saṅkassarasamācāroti saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāro, kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā
atk-s0402a0:312_2: kataṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyasamācāro, attanāyeva vā saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāro,
atk-s0402a0:312_3: sāsaṅkasamācāroti attho. Tassa hi divāṭṭhānādīsu sannipatitvā kiñcideva mantayante
atk-s0402a0:312_4: bhikkhū disvā “ime ekato hutvā mantenti, kacci nu kho mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti
atk-s0402a0:312_5: evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hoti. Paṭicchannakammantoti paṭicchādetabbayuttakena pāpakammena
atk-s0402a0:312_6: samannāgato. Assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiññoti assamaṇo hutvāva samaṇapatirūpakatāya “samaṇo
atk-s0402a0:312_7: aha”nti evaṃ paṭiñño. Abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiññoti aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe
atk-s0402a0:312_8: supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamarājadhānīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente
atk-s0402a0:312_9: disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena tathā paṭipajjanato “ahaṃ brahmacārī”ti paṭiññaṃ dento
atk-s0402a0:312_10: viya hoti. “Ahaṃ bhikkhū”ti vatvā uposathaggādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño
atk-s0402a0:312_11: hotiyeva, tathā saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhanto. Antopūtīti pūtinā kammena anto anupaviṭṭho.
atk-s0402a0:312_12: Avassutoti rāgādīhi tinto. Kasambujātoti sañjātarāgādikacavaro. Tassa na evaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:312_13: Kasmā na hoti? Lokuttaradhammaupanissayassa natthitāya. Tassa evaṃ hotīti. Kasmā
atk-s0402a0:314_0: 14. Catutthe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjetīti rājā. Cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī.
atk-s0402a0:314_1: Vattitaṃ vā anena cakkanti cakkavattī. Dhammo assa atthīti dhammiko. Dhammeneva dasavidhena
atk-s0402a0:314_2: cakkavattivattena rājā jātoti dhammarājā. Sopi na arājakanti sopi aññaṃ nissayarājānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:314_3: alabhitvā cakkaṃ nāma vattetuṃ na sakkotīti attho. Iti satthā desanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0402a0:314_4: yathānusandhiṃ apāpetvāva tuṇhī ahosi. Kasmā? Anusandhikusalā uṭṭhahitvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:314_5: pucchissanti, bahū hi imasmiṃ ṭhāne tathārūpā bhikkhū, athāhaṃ tehi puṭṭho desanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:314_6: vaḍḍhessāmīti. Atheko anusandhikusalo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ pucchanto ko pana, bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:315_0: Tattha dhammoti dasakusalakammapathadhammo. Dhammanti tameva vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:315_1: Nissāyāti tadadhiṭṭhānena cetasā tameva nissayaṃ katvā. Dhammaṃ sakkarontoti yathā
atk-s0402a0:315_2: kato so dhammo suṭṭhu kato hoti, evametaṃ karonto. Dhammaṃ garuṃ karontoti tasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:315_3: gāravuppattiyā taṃ garukaronto. Dhammaṃ apacāyamānoti tasseva dhammassa añjalikaraṇādīhi
atk-s0402a0:315_4: nīcavuttitaṃ karonto. Dhammaddhajo dhammaketūti taṃ dhammaṃ dhajamiva purakkhatvā
atk-s0402a0:315_5: ketumiva ukkhipitvā pavattiyā dhammaddhajo dhammaketu ca hutvāti attho. Dhammādhipateyyoti
atk-s0402a0:315_6: dhammādhipatibhūtāgatabhāvena dhammavaseneva ca sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇena dhammādhipateyyo
atk-s0402a0:315_7: hutvā. Dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahatīti dhammo assā atthīti dhammikā, rakkhā
atk-s0402a0:315_8: ca āvaraṇañca gutti ca rakkhāvaraṇagutti. Tattha “paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:315_9: vacanato khantiādayo rakkhā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “kathañca, bhikkhave, paraṃ rakkhanto
atk-s0402a0:315_10: attānaṃ rakkhati. Khantiyā avihiṃsāya mettacittatāya anuddayāyā”ti. Nivāsanapārupanagehādīni
atk-s0402a0:315_11: āvaraṇaṃ. Corādiupaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ gopāyanā gutti. Taṃ sabbampi suṭṭhu vidahati
atk-s0402a0:316_0: Idāni yattha sā saṃvidahitabbā, taṃ dassento antojanasmintiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho
atk-s0402a0:316_1: – antojanasaṅkhātaṃ puttadāraṃ sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhāpento vatthagandhamālādīni cassa
atk-s0402a0:316_2: dadamāno sabbopaddave cassa nivārayamāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahati
atk-s0402a0:316_3: nāma. Khattiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – abhisittakhattiyā bhadraassājānīyādiratanasampadānenapi
atk-s0402a0:316_4: upagaṇhitabbā, anuyantā khattiyā tesaṃ anurūpayānavāhanasampadānenapi paritosetabbā,
atk-s0402a0:316_5: balakāyo kālaṃ anatikkametvā bhattavetanasampadānenapi anuggahetabbo, brāhmaṇā annapānavatthādinā
atk-s0402a0:316_7: negamā janapadavāsino ca jānapadā. Samitapāpabāhitapāpā pana samaṇabrāhmaṇā samaṇaparikkhārasampadānena
atk-s0402a0:317_0: Dhammeneva cakkaṃ vattetīti dasakusalakammapathadhammeneva cakkaṃ pavatteti. Taṃ
atk-s0402a0:317_1: hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti taṃ tena evaṃ pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:317_2: Kenaci manussabhūtenāti devatā nāma attanā icchiticchitameva karonti, tasmā tā aggaṇhitvā
atk-s0402a0:317_3: “manussabhūtenā”ti vuttaṃ. Paccatthikenāti paṭiatthikena, paṭisattunāti attho. Dhammikoti
atk-s0402a0:317_4: cakkavattī dasakusalakammapathavasena dhammiko, tathāgato pana navalokuttaradhammavasena.
atk-s0402a0:317_5: Dhammarājāti navahi lokuttaradhammehi mahājanaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā. Dhammaṃyevāti
atk-s0402a0:317_6: navalokuttaradhammameva nissāya tameva sakkaronto taṃ garukaronto taṃ apacāyamāno.
atk-s0402a0:317_7: Sovassa dhammo abbhuggataṭṭhena dhajoti dhammaddhajo. Sovassa ketūti dhammaketu.
atk-s0402a0:317_8: Tameva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā viharatīti dhammādhipateyyo. Dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttinti
atk-s0402a0:317_9: lokiyalokuttaradhammadāyikarakkhañca āvaraṇañca guttiñca. Saṃvidahatīti ṭhapeti paññapeti.
atk-s0402a0:317_10: Evarūpanti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ na sevitabbaṃ, sucaritaṃ sevitabbanti evaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0402a0:317_11: attho veditabbo. Saṃvidahitvāti ṭhapetvā kathetvā. Dhammeneva anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0402a0:317_12: pavattetīti navalokuttaradhammeneva asadisaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti. Taṃ hoti cakkaṃ
atk-s0402a0:317_13: appaṭivattiyanti taṃ evaṃ pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ etesu samaṇādīsu ekenapi paṭivattetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:317_14: paṭibāhituṃ na sakkā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:319_1: ceva uposathakaraṇatthāya ca āgantvā patane, sannipātaṭṭhāneti attho. Padanetipi
atk-s0402a0:319_2: pāṭho, ayameva attho. Migadāyeti migānaṃ abhayatthāya dinne. Chahi māsehi chārattūnehīti
atk-s0402a0:319_3: so kira raññā āṇattadivaseyeva sabbūpakaraṇāni sajjetvā antevāsikehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:319_5: ca vivajjetvā sampannapadese ṭhite sabbadosavivajjite nābhiaranemīnaṃ anurūpe rukkhe
atk-s0402a0:319_6: gahetvā taṃ cakkaṃ akāsi. Tassa rukkhe vicinitvā gaṇhantassa ceva karontassa ca ettako
atk-s0402a0:319_7: kālo vītivatto. Tena vuttaṃ – “chahi māsehi chārattūnehī”ti. Nānākaraṇanti nānattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:319_8: Nesanti na esaṃ. Atthesanti atthi esaṃ. Abhisaṅkhārassa gatīti payogassa gamanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:319_9: Ciṅgulāyitvāti paribbhamitvā. Akkhāhataṃ maññeti akkhe pavesetvā ṭhapitamiva.
atk-s0402a0:320_0: Sadosāti sagaṇḍā uṇṇatoṇataṭṭhānayuttā. Sakasāvāti pūtisārena ceva pheggunā ca yuttā.
atk-s0402a0:320_1: Kāyavaṅkātiādīni kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ nāmāni. Evaṃ papatitāti evaṃ guṇapatanena patitā.
atk-s0402a0:320_2: Evaṃ patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ guṇehi patiṭṭhitā. Tattha lokiyamahājanā papatitā nāma, sotāpannādayo
atk-s0402a0:320_3: patiṭṭhitā nāma. Tesupi purimā tayo kilesānaṃ samudācārakkhaṇe papatitā nāma, khīṇāsavā
atk-s0402a0:320_4: pana ekanteneva patiṭṭhitā nāma. Tasmāti yasmā appahīnakāyavaṅkādayo papatanti, pahīnakāyavaṅkādayo
atk-s0402a0:320_5: patiṭṭhahanti, tasmā. Kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ pana evaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ – pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:320_6: micchācāro musāvādo pisuṇāvācā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva cha sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti,
atk-s0402a0:320_7: pharusāvācā byāpādoti dve anāgāmimaggena, abhijjhā samphappalāpoti dve arahattamaggenāti.
atk-s0402a0:322_2: dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti, na takkaggāhena vā nayaggāhena vā. Evaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:322_3: paṭipanno hi bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā manussadevanibbānasampattīhi
atk-s0402a0:322_4: hāyati parihāyati, apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno pana tāhi sampattīhi na parihāyati.
atk-s0402a0:322_5: Atīte kantāraddhānamaggaṃ paṭipannesu dvīsu satthavāhesu yakkhassa vacanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:322_6: bālasatthavāho saddhiṃ satthena anayabyasanaṃ patto, yakkhassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0402a0:322_7: “udakadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chaḍḍessāmā”ti satthake saññāpetvā maggaṃ paṭipanno paṇḍitasatthavāho
atk-s0402a0:325_0: Yoni cassa āraddhā hotīti ettha yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi
atk-s0402a0:325_1: nāmaṃ. “Catasso kho imā, sāriputta, yoniyo”tiādīsu hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma.
atk-s0402a0:325_2: “Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ. “Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi,
atk-s0402a0:325_3: yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ca “tamenaṃ kammajavātā nivattitvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ
atk-s0402a0:325_4: samparivattetvā mātu yonimukhe sampaṭipādentī”ti ca ādīsu passāvamaggo. Idha pana
atk-s0402a0:326_0: Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti ettha āsavantīti āsavā, cakkhutopi…pe… manatopi sandanti pavattantīti
atk-s0402a0:326_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammato yāva gotrabhu, okāsato yāva bhavaggā savantīti vā āsavā, ete
atk-s0402a0:326_2: dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho. Antokaraṇattho hi ayaṃ ākāro.
atk-s0402a0:326_3: Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādayo āsavā, āsavā viyātipi āsavā. Lokasmimpi hi cirapārivāsikā
atk-s0402a0:326_4: madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti, yadi ca cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavā, eteyeva bhavitumarahanti.
atk-s0402a0:326_5: Vuttañhetaṃ – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosī”tiādi.
atk-s0402a0:326_6: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā. Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni
atk-s0402a0:326_7: yattha kilesā āsavāti āgacchanti, tattha yujjanti, pacchimaṃ kammepi. Na kevalañca
atk-s0402a0:326_8: kammakilesāyeva āsavā, apica kho nānappakārā upaddavāpi. Suttesu hi “nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0402a0:326_9: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā
atk-s0402a0:329: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:330_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ ca kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:330_1: saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti ettha parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0402a0:331_0: Te panete āsavā yattha yathā āgatā, tattha tathā veditabbā. Ete hi vinaye tāva “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:331_1: āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti dvedhā āgatā. Saḷāyatane
atk-s0402a0:331_2: “tayo me, āvuso, āsavā kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo”ti tidhā āgatā. Aññesu ca suttantesu
atk-s0402a0:331_3: abhidhamme ca teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saha catudhā āgatā. Nibbedhikapariyāyena “atthi,
atk-s0402a0:331_4: bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigāminiyā, atthi āsavā
atk-s0402a0:331_5: pettivisayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagāminiyā, atthi āsavā devalokagāminiyā”ti
atk-s0402a0:331_6: pañcadhā āgatā. Kammameva cettha āsavāti vuttaṃ. Chakkanipāte “atthi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:331_7: āsavā saṃvarāpahātabbā”tiādinā nayena chadhā āgatā. Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanena
atk-s0402a0:331_8: pahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā. Idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā adhippetāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:332_0: Khayāyāti ettha pana āsavānaṃ sarasabhedopi khīṇākāropi maggaphalanibbānānipi “āsavakkhayo”ti
atk-s0402a0:332_1: vuccati. “Yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha hi
atk-s0402a0:332_2: āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto. “Jānato ahaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:332_3: khayaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppādo khīṇākāro
atk-s0402a0:334: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:335: Ettha maggo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:337: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:338: Ettha nibbānaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte phalaṃ sandhāya “āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti āha, arahattaphalatthāyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:339_0: Indriyesu guttadvāroti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu pihitadvāro. Bhojane mattaññūti bhojanasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:339_1: pamāṇaññū, paṭiggahaṇaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇamattaṃ jānāti pajānātīti attho. Jāgariyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:339_2: anuyuttoti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu jāgaraṇabhāvaṃ anuyutto,
atk-s0402a0:340_0: Evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni tameva ṭhapitapaṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto kathañca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:340_1: bhikkhūtiādimāha. Tattha cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvātiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vitthārito,
atk-s0402a0:340_2: tathā paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāyātiādīnaṃ. Āvaraṇīyehi dhammehīti
atk-s0402a0:340_3: pañcahi nīvaraṇehi dhammehi. Nīvaraṇāni hi cittaṃ āvaritvā tiṭṭhanti, tasmā āvaraṇīyā
atk-s0402a0:340_4: dhammāti vuccanti. Sīhaseyyaṃ kappetīti sīho viya seyyaṃ kappeti. Pāde pādaṃ accādhāyāti
atk-s0402a0:340_5: vāmapādaṃ dakkhiṇapāde atiādhāya. Samaṃ ṭhapite hi pāde jāṇukena jāṇukaṃ gopphakena
atk-s0402a0:340_6: ca gopphakaṃ ghaṭīyati, tato vedanā uṭṭhahanti. Tasmā tassa dosassa parivajjanatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:340_7: thokaṃ atikkamitvā esa pādaṃ ṭhapeti. Tena vuttaṃ – “pāde pādaṃ accādhāyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:341_0: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajaññena ca samannāgato. Kathaṃ panesa niddāyanto
atk-s0402a0:341_1: sato sampajāno nāma hotīti? Purimappavattivasena. Ayaṃ hi caṅkame caṅkamanto niddāya
atk-s0402a0:341_2: okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pavattamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce vā phalake vā nipanno
atk-s0402a0:341_3: niddaṃ upagantvā puna pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne gaṇhantoyeva pabujjhati.
atk-s0402a0:341_4: Tasmā niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hoti. Ayaṃ tāva mūlakammaṭṭhāne nayova. Pariggahakammaṭṭhānavasenāpi
atk-s0402a0:341_5: panesa sato sampajāno nāma hoti. Kathaṃ? Ayaṃ hi caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:341_6: ñatvā pāsāṇaphalake vā mañce vā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjitvā paccavekkhati – “acetano
atk-s0402a0:341_7: kāyo acetane mañce patiṭṭhito, acetano mañco acetanāya pathaviyā, acetanā pathavī
atk-s0402a0:341_8: acetane udake, acetanaṃ udakaṃ acetane vāte, acetano vāto acetane ākāse patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:341_9: Tattha ākāsampi ‘ahaṃ vātaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti na jānāti, vātopi ‘ahaṃ ākāse patiṭṭhito’ti
atk-s0402a0:341_10: na jānāti. Tathā vāto na jānāti. ‘Ahaṃ udakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito’ti…pe… mañco na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:341_11: ‘ahaṃ kāyaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito’ti, kāyo na jānāti ‘ahaṃ mañce patiṭṭhito’ti. Na hi
atk-s0402a0:341_12: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ ābhogo vā samannāhāro vā manasikāro vā cetanā vā patthanā vā atthī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:341_13: Tassa evaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ paccavekkhaṇacittaṃ bhavaṅge otarati. Evaṃ niddāyantopi
atk-s0402a0:342_0: Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvāti “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate cande vā tārakāya vā uṭṭhahissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:342_1: uṭṭhānakālaparicchedikaṃ saññaṃ manasikaritvā, citte ṭhapetvāti attho. Evaṃ karitvā
atk-s0402a0:344: 17. Sattame attabyābādhāyāti attadukkhāya. Parabyābādhāyāti paradukkhāya. Kāyasucaritantiādīni pubbabhāge dasakusalakammapathavasena āgatāni, upari pana yāva arahattā avāritāneva.
atk-s0402a0:346_0: 18. Aṭṭhame aṭṭīyeyyāthāti aṭṭā pīḷitā bhaveyyātha. Harāyeyyāthāti lajjeyyātha. Jiguccheyyāthāti
atk-s0402a0:346_1: gūthe viya tasmiṃ vacane sañjātajigucchā bhaveyyātha. Iti kirāti ettha itīti padasandhibyañjanasiliṭṭhatā,
atk-s0402a0:346_2: kirāti anussavatthe nipāto. Dibbena kira āyunā aṭṭīyathāti evamassa sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:348_0: 19. Navame pāpaṇikoti āpaṇiko, āpaṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā bhaṇḍavikkāyakassa vāṇijassetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:348_1: adhivacanaṃ. Abhabboti abhājanabhūto. Na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti yathā adhiṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:348_2: suadhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti, evaṃ sayaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ karonto nādhiṭṭhāti. Tattha paccūsakāle
atk-s0402a0:348_3: padasaddena uṭṭhāya dīpaṃ jāletvā bhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:348_4: sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma. Ayaṃ hi yaṃ corā rattiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ haritvā “idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:348_5: amhākaṃ hatthato vissajjessāmā”ti āpaṇaṃ gantvā appena agghena denti, yampi bahuverino
atk-s0402a0:348_6: manussā rattiṃ nagare vasitvā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanti, yaṃ vā pana
atk-s0402a0:348_7: janapadaṃ gantukāmā manussā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇanti, tappaccayassa lābhassa assāmiko hoti.
atk-s0402a0:349_0: Aññesaṃ bhojanavelāya pana bhuñjituṃ āgantvā pātova bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā gharaṃ gantvā
atk-s0402a0:349_1: bhuñjitvā niddāyitvā sāyaṃ puna āpaṇaṃ āgacchanto majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:349_2: kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma. So hi yaṃ corā pātova vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu, divākāle
atk-s0402a0:349_3: pana paresaṃ asañcārakkhaṇe āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti, yañca bhojanavelāya puññavanto
atk-s0402a0:349_4: issarā “āpaṇato idañcidañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pahiṇitvā āharāpenti, tappaccayassa
atk-s0402a0:350_0: Yāva yāmabherinikkhamanā pana antoāpaṇe dīpaṃ jālāpetvā anisīdanto sāyanhasamayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:350_1: na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma. So hi yaṃ corā pātopi divāpi vissajjetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:350_2: na sampāpuṇiṃsu, sāyaṃ pana āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti, tappaccayassa lābhassa assāmiko hoti.
atk-s0402a0:351_0: Na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti sakkaccakiriyāya samādhiṃ na samāpajjati.
atk-s0402a0:351_1: Ettha ca pātova cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu vattaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0402a0:351_2: tāva samāpattiṃ appetvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti
atk-s0402a0:351_3: nāma. Pacchābhattaṃ pana piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā yāva
atk-s0402a0:351_4: sāyanhasamayā samāpattiṃ appetvā anisīdanto majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:351_5: adhiṭṭhāti nāma. Sāyaṃ pana cetiyaṃ vanditvā therūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a0:351_6: paṭhamayāmaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā anisīdanto sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:351_7: adhiṭṭhāti nāma. Sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbo. Apicettha “samāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:351_8: appetvā”ti vuttaṭṭhāne samāpattiyā asati vipassanāpi vaṭṭati, samādhinimittanti ca
atk-s0402a0:351_9: samādhiārammaṇampi vaṭṭatiyeva. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “samādhipi samādhinimittaṃ, samādhārammaṇampi samādhinimitta”nti.
atk-s0402a0:353_0: 20. Dasame cakkhumāti paññācakkhunā cakkhumā hoti. Vidhuroti visiṭṭhadhuro uttamadhuro
atk-s0402a0:353_1: ñāṇasampayuttena vīriyena samannāgato. Nissayasampannoti avassayasampanno patiṭṭhānasampanno.
atk-s0402a0:353_2: Paṇiyanti vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ. Ettakaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati ettako udayoti tasmiṃ “evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:353_3: kītaṃ evaṃ vikkāyamāna”nti vuttapaṇiye yena kayena taṃ kītaṃ, taṃ kayasaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ
atk-s0402a0:353_4: ettakaṃ bhavissati. Yo ca tasmiṃ vikkayamāne vikkayo, tasmiṃ vikkaye ettako udayo
atk-s0402a0:354: Kusalo hoti paṇiyaṃ ketuñca vikketuñcāti sulabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kiṇanto dullabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vikkiṇanto ca ettha kusalo nāma hoti, dasaguṇampi vīsatiguṇampi lābhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0402a0:355_0: Aḍḍhāti issarā bahunā nikkhittadhanena samannāgatā. Mahaddhanāti vaḷañjanakavasena
atk-s0402a0:355_1: mahaddhanā. Mahābhogāti upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍena mahābhogā. Paṭibaloti kāyabalena
atk-s0402a0:355_2: ceva ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā samattho. Amhākañca kālena kālaṃ anuppadātunti
atk-s0402a0:355_3: amhākañca gahitadhanamūlikaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ kālena kālaṃ anuppadātuṃ. Nipatantīti nimantenti.
atk-s0402a0:356_0: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāyāti kusaladhammānaṃ sampādanatthāya paṭilābhatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:356_1: Thāmavāti ñāṇathāmena samannāgato. Daḷhaparakkamoti thirena ñāṇaparakkamena samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:356_2: Anikkhittadhuroti “aggamaggaṃ apāpuṇitvā imaṃ vīriyadhuraṃ na ṭhapessāmī”ti evaṃ aṭṭhapitadhuro.
atk-s0402a0:357_0: Bahussutāti ekanikāyādivasena bahu buddhavacanaṃ sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā. Āgatāgamāti
atk-s0402a0:357_1: eko nikāyo eko āgamo nāma, dve nikāyā dve āgamā nāma, pañca nikāyā pañca āgamā nāma,
atk-s0402a0:357_2: etesu āgamesu yesaṃ ekopi āgamo āgato paguṇo pavattito, te āgatāgamā nāma. Dhammadharāti
atk-s0402a0:357_4: Paripucchatīti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ pucchati. Paripañhatīti “imaṃ nāma pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:358_0: Imasmiṃ pana sutte paṭhamaṃ paññā āgatā, pacchā vīriyañca kalyāṇamittasevanā ca.
atk-s0402a0:358_1: Tattha paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā vīriyaṃ katvā kalyāṇamittā sevitabbāti na
atk-s0402a0:358_2: evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo, desanāya nāma heṭṭhimena vā paricchedo hoti uparimena vā dvīhipi
atk-s0402a0:358_3: vā koṭīhi. Idha pana uparimena paricchedo veditabbo. Tasmā kathentena paṭhamaṃ kalyāṇamittaupanissayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:358_4: dassetvā majjhe vīriyaṃ dassetvā pacchā arahattaṃ kathetabbanti.
atk-s0402a0:360_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti
atk-s0402a0:360_1: kāyasakkhi. Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti diṭṭhippatto. Saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimutto.
atk-s0402a0:360_2: Khamatīti ruccati. Abhikkantataroti atisundarataro. Paṇītataroti atipaṇītataro. Saddhindriyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:360_3: adhimattaṃ hotīti samiddhattherassa kira arahattamaggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ
atk-s0402a0:360_4: ahosi, sesāni cattāri sahajātindriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ. Iti thero attanā
atk-s0402a0:360_5: paṭividdhamaggaṃ kathento evamāha. Mahākoṭṭhikattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:360_6: samādhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi, sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:360_7: Tasmā sopi samādhindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:360_8: Sāriputtattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi. Sesāni cattāri
atk-s0402a0:360_9: indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ. Tasmā sopi paññindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento
atk-s0402a0:361_0: Na khvetthāti na kho ettha. Ekaṃsena byākātunti ekantena byākarituṃ. Arahattāya paṭipannoti
atk-s0402a0:361_1: arahattamaggasamaṅgiṃ dasseti. Evametasmiṃ sutte tīhipi therehi attanā paṭividdhamaggova
atk-s0402a0:363_0: 22. Dutiye sappāyānīti hitāni vuddhikarāni. Patirūpanti anucchavikaṃ. Neva vuṭṭhāti
atk-s0402a0:363_1: tamhā ābādhāti iminā atekicchena vātāpamārādinā rogena samannāgato niṭṭhāpattagilāno
atk-s0402a0:363_2: kathito. Vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā khipitakakacchutiṇapupphakajarādibhedo appamattaābādho
atk-s0402a0:363_3: kathito. Labhanto sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhantoti iminā pana yesaṃ paṭijagganena
atk-s0402a0:363_4: phāsukaṃ hoti, sabbepi te ābādhā kathitā. Ettha ca patirūpo upaṭṭhāko nāma gilānupaṭṭhākaaṅgehi
atk-s0402a0:363_5: samannāgato paṇḍito dakkho analaso veditabbo. Gilānupaṭṭhāko anuññātoti bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0402a0:363_6: dātabboti anuññāto. Tasmiñhi gilāne attano dhammatāya yāpetuṃ asakkonte bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0402a0:363_7: tassa bhikkhuno eko bhikkhu ca sāmaṇero ca “imaṃ paṭijaggathā”ti apaloketvā dātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:363_8: Yāva pana te taṃ paṭijagganti, tāva gilānassa ca tesañca dvinnaṃ yenattho, sabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:364_0: Aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbāti itarepi dve gilānā upaṭṭhāpetabbā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Yopi
atk-s0402a0:364_1: hi niṭṭhapattagilāno, so anupaṭṭhiyamāno “sace maṃ paṭijaggeyyuṃ, phāsukaṃ me bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:364_2: Na kho pana maṃ paṭijaggantī”ti manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyya. Paṭijaggiyamānassa
atk-s0402a0:364_3: panassa evaṃ hoti “bhikkhusaṅghena yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ kataṃ. Mayhaṃ pana kammavipāko
atk-s0402a0:364_4: īdiso”ti. So bhikkhusaṅghe mettaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā sagge nibbattissati. Yo pana appamattakena
atk-s0402a0:364_5: byādhinā samannāgato labhantopi alabhantopi vuṭṭhātiyeva, tassa vināpi bhesajjena
atk-s0402a0:364_6: vūpasamanabyādhi bhesajje kate khippataraṃ vūpasammati. So tato buddhavacanaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:364_7: uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissati, samaṇadhammaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkhissati. Iminā kāraṇena “aññepi
atk-s0402a0:365_0: Neva okkamatīti neva pavisati. Niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu
atk-s0402a0:365_1: magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaṃ. Iminā padaparamo puggalo kathito. Dutiyavārena ugghaṭitaññū
atk-s0402a0:365_2: gahito sāsane nālakattherasadiso buddhantare ekavāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santike ovādaṃ
atk-s0402a0:365_3: labhitvā paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo ca. Tatiyavārena vipañcitaññū puggalo kathito,
atk-s0402a0:366_0: Dhammadesanā anuññātāti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā. Aññesampi dhammo
atk-s0402a0:366_1: desetabboti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Padaparamassa hi imasmiṃ attabhāve
atk-s0402a0:366_2: dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati. Yo pana tathāgatassa
atk-s0402a0:366_3: rūpadassanaṃ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi
atk-s0402a0:366_4: dhammaṃ abhisameti, so alabhanto tāva abhisameti. Labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti
atk-s0402a0:366_5: iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ dhammo desetabbo. Tatiyassa pana punappunaṃ desetabbova.
atk-s0402a0:368_0: 23. Tatiye sabyābajjhanti sadukkhaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāranti kāyadvāre cetanārāsiṃ. Abhisaṅkharotīti
atk-s0402a0:368_1: āyūhati rāsiṃ karoti piṇḍaṃ karoti. Vacīmanodvāresupi eseva nayo. Sabyābajjhaṃ lokanti
atk-s0402a0:368_2: sadukkhaṃ lokaṃ. Sabyābajjhā phassā phusantīti sadukkhā vipākaphassā phusanti. Sabyābajjhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:368_3: vedanaṃ vediyatīti sadukkhaṃ vipākavedanaṃ vediyati, sābādhaṃ nirassādanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:368_4: Seyyathāpi sattā nerayikāti yathā niraye nibbattasattā ekantadukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyanti,
atk-s0402a0:368_5: evaṃ vediyatīti attho. Kiṃ pana tattha upekkhāvedanā natthīti? Atthi, dukkhavedanāya
atk-s0402a0:368_6: pana balavabhāvena sā abbohārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitā. Iti nirayova nirayassa upamaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:368_7: āhaṭo. Tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāma kira esā.
atk-s0402a0:369_0: Seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhāti idhāpi devalokova devalokassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo. Yasmā
atk-s0402a0:369_1: pana heṭṭhimesu brahmalokesu sappītikajjhānavipāko vattati, subhakiṇhesu nippītiko
atk-s0402a0:369_2: ekantasukhova, tasmā te aggahetvā subhakiṇhāva kathitā. Iti ayampi tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:370_0: Vokiṇṇasukhadukkhanti vomissakasukhadukkhaṃ. Seyyathāpi manussāti manussānaṃ hi kālena
atk-s0402a0:370_1: sukhaṃ hoti, kālena dukkhaṃ. Ekacce ca devāti kāmāvacaradevā. Tesampi kālena sukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:370_2: hoti, kālena dukkhaṃ. Tesaṃ hi hīnatarānaṃ mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:370_3: hoti, maggā ukkamitabbaṃ, pārutavatthaṃ apanetabbaṃ, añjalikammaṃ kātabbanti taṃ
atk-s0402a0:370_4: sabbampi dukkhaṃ nāma hoti. Ekacce ca vinipātikāti vemānikapetā. Te hi kālena sampattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:370_5: anubhavanti kālena kammanti vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti. Iti imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi sucaritāni
atk-s0402a0:372_0: 24. Catutthe tayome, bhikkhave, puggalāti tayo ācariyapuggalā. Puggalassa bahukārāti
atk-s0402a0:372_1: antevāsikapuggalassa bahūpakārā. Buddhanti sabbaññubuddhaṃ. Saraṇaṃ gato hotīti avassayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:372_2: gato hoti. Dhammanti satantikaṃ navalokuttaradhammaṃ. Saṅghanti aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:372_3: Idañca pana saraṇagamanaṃ aggahitasaraṇapubbassa akatābhinivesassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:372_4: Iti imasmiṃ sutte saraṇadāyako sotāpattimaggasampāpako arahattamaggasampāpakoti tayo
atk-s0402a0:372_5: ācariyā bahukārāti āgatā, pabbajjādāyako buddhavacanadāyako kammavācācariyo sakadāgāmimaggasampāpako
atk-s0402a0:372_6: anāgāmimaggasampāpakoti ime ācariyā na āgatā, kiṃ ete na bahukārāti? No, na bahukārā.
atk-s0402a0:372_7: Ayaṃ pana desanā duvidhena paricchinnā. Tasmā sabbepete bahukārā. Tesu saraṇagamanasmiṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:372_9: honti, upari dve maggā ca phalāni ca arahattamaggasannissitānīti veditabbāni.
