atk-s0402a0:373_0: Iminā puggalenāti iminā antevāsikapuggalena. Na suppatikāraṃ vadāmīti patikāraṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:373_1: na sukaranti vadāmi. Abhivādanādīsu anekasatavāraṃ anekasahassavārampi hi pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0402a0:373_2: nipatitvā vandanto āsanā vuṭṭhāya paccuggacchanto diṭṭhadiṭṭhakkhaṇe añjaliṃ paggaṇhanto
atk-s0402a0:373_3: anucchavikaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ karonto divase divase cīvarasataṃ cīvarasahassaṃ piṇḍapātasataṃ
atk-s0402a0:373_4: piṇḍapātasahassaṃ dadamāno cakkavāḷapariyantena sabbaratanamayaṃ āvāsaṃ karonto sappinavanītādinānappakāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:373_5: bhesajjaṃ anuppadajjamāno neva sakkoti ācariyena katassa patikāraṃ nāma kātunti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:375_2: sadisacitto. Abhisajjatīti laggati. Kuppatīti kopavasena kuppati. Byāpajjatīti pakatibhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:375_3: pajahati, pūtiko hoti. Patitthīyatīti thinabhāvaṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Kopanti
atk-s0402a0:375_4: dubbalakodhaṃ. Dosanti dussanavasena tato balavataraṃ. Appaccayanti atuṭṭhākāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:375_5: domanassaṃ. Duṭṭhārukoti purāṇavaṇo. Kaṭṭhenāti daṇḍakakoṭiyā. Kaṭhalenāti kapālena.
atk-s0402a0:375_6: Āsavaṃ detīti aparāparaṃ savati. Purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāyeva pubbaṃ lohitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:375_7: yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati, ghaṭṭito pana tāni adhikataraṃ savati.
atk-s0402a0:376_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – duṭṭhāruko viya hi kodhanapuggalo, tassa
atk-s0402a0:376_1: attano dhammatāya savanaṃ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātassa viya caṇḍikatassa
atk-s0402a0:376_2: caraṇaṃ, kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṃ viya appamattaṃ vacanaṃ, bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0402a0:376_3: savanaṃ viya “mādisaṃ nāma esa evaṃ vadatī”ti bhiyyosomattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:377_1: Vijjantarikāyāti vijjuppattikkhaṇe. Idhāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – cakkhumā puriso
atk-s0402a0:377_2: viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo, andhakāraṃ viya sotāpattimaggavajjhā kilesā, vijjusañcaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:377_3: viya sotāpattimaggañāṇassa uppattikālo, vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā
atk-s0402a0:377_4: rūpadassanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ, puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:377_5: viya sakadāgāmimaggavajjhā kilesā, puna vijjusañcaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggañāṇassa
atk-s0402a0:377_6: uppādo, vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:377_7: nibbānadassanaṃ, puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya anāgāmimaggavajjhā kilesā, puna vijjusañcaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:377_8: viya anāgāmimaggañāṇassa uppādo, vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:378_0: Vajirūpamacittatāyapi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – vajiraṃ viya hi arahattamaggañāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:378_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ, maṇigaṇṭhipāsāṇagaṇṭhi viya arahattamaggavajjhā kilesā, vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhimpi
atk-s0402a0:378_2: vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhimpi vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthitā viya arahattamaggañāṇena
atk-s0402a0:378_3: acchejjānaṃ kilesānaṃ natthibhāvo, vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apatipūraṇaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:378_4: arahattamaggena chinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0402a0:380_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe sevitabboti upasaṅkamitabbo. Bhajitabboti allīyitabbo. Payirupāsitabboti
atk-s0402a0:380_1: santike nisīdanavasena punappunaṃ upāsitabbo. Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva
atk-s0402a0:380_2: garukārañca katvā. Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:380_3: yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati, so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo. Yo dasa sīlāni
atk-s0402a0:380_4: rakkhati, so catupārisuddhisīlaṃ rakkhantena na sevitabbo. Aññatra anuddayā aññatra
atk-s0402a0:380_5: anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca. Attano atthāyeva hi evarūpo puggalo
atk-s0402a0:380_6: na sevitabbo, anuddayānukampāvasena pana taṃ upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:381_0: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ. Sīlakathā ca no
atk-s0402a0:381_1: bhavissatīti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati. Sā ca
atk-s0402a0:381_2: no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattissati
atk-s0402a0:381_3: na paṭihaññissati. Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca divasampi pavattamānā sīlakathā
atk-s0402a0:381_4: amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati. Samādhipaññākathāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:382_0: Sīlakkhandhanti sīlarāsiṃ. Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha sīlassa asappāye
atk-s0402a0:382_1: anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:382_2: paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma. Samādhipaññākkhandhesupi eseva nayo. Nihīyatīti attano
atk-s0402a0:382_3: hīnataraṃ puggalaṃ sevanto khāraparissāvane āsittaudakaṃ viya satataṃ samitaṃ hāyati
atk-s0402a0:382_4: parihāyati. Tulyasevīti attanā samānasevī. Seṭṭhamupanamanti seṭṭhaṃ puggalaṃ oṇamanto.
atk-s0402a0:382_5: Udeti khippanti khippameva vaḍḍhati. Tasmā attano uttariṃ bhajethāti yasmā seṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:382_6: puggalaṃ upanamanto udeti khippaṃ, tasmā attano uttaritaraṃ visiṭṭhataraṃ bhajetha.
atk-s0402a0:384_0: 27. Sattame jigucchitabboti gūthaṃ viya jigucchitabbo. Atha kho nanti atha kho assa.
atk-s0402a0:384_1: Kittisaddoti kathāsaddo. Evameva khoti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:384_2: Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhammaniahi viya dussīlapuggalo. Gūthakūpato uddhariyamānena
atk-s0402a0:384_3: tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi
atk-s0402a0:384_4: tassa kiriyāya akaraṇabhāvo. Sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahinā gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ
atk-s0402a0:385_0: Tindukālātanti tindukarukkhaalātaṃ. Bhiyyosomattāya cicciṭāyatīti taṃ hi jhāyamānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:385_1: pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāti “ciṭiciṭā”ti saddaṃ karoti, ghaṭṭitaṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:385_2: adhimattaṃ karotīti attho. Evameva khoti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato
atk-s0402a0:385_3: caṇḍikato hutvā carati, appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutakāle “mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadati
atk-s0402a0:385_4: evaṃ vadatī”ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati. Gūthakūpoti gūthapuṇṇakūpo,
atk-s0402a0:385_5: gūtharāsiyeva vā. Opammasaṃsandanaṃ panettha purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tasmā evarūpo
atk-s0402a0:385_6: puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamāno atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi
atk-s0402a0:385_7: kujjhatiyeva, “kiṃ iminā”ti paṭikkamantepi kujjhatiyeva. Tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo
atk-s0402a0:385_8: na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yo hi palālaggiṃ atiupasaṅkamitvā tappati,
atk-s0402a0:385_9: tassa sarīraṃ jhāyati. Yo atipaṭikkamitvā tappati, tassa sītaṃ na vūpasammati. Anupasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0402a0:385_10: apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappantassa sītaṃ vūpasammati, tasmā palālaggi
atk-s0402a0:385_11: viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo, na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:386_0: Kalyāṇamittoti sucimitto. Kalyāṇasahāyoti sucisahāyo. Sahāyā nāma sahagāmino saddhiṃcarā.
atk-s0402a0:386_1: Kalyāṇasampavaṅkoti kalyāṇesu sucipuggalesu sampavaṅko, tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāramānasoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:388_0: 28. Aṭṭhame gūthabhāṇīti yo gūthaṃ viya duggandhakathaṃ katheti. Pupphabhāṇīti yo
atk-s0402a0:388_1: pupphāni viya sugandhakathaṃ katheti. Madhubhāṇīti yo madhu viya madhurakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:388_2: Sabhaggatoti sabhāya ṭhito. Parisaggatoti gāmaparisāya ṭhito. Ñātimajjhagatoti ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:388_3: majjhe ṭhito. Pūgamajjhagatoti seṇīnaṃ majjhe ṭhito. Rājakulamajjhagatoti rājakulassa
atk-s0402a0:388_4: majjhe mahāvinicchaye ṭhito. Abhinītoti pucchanatthāyānīto. Sakkhipuṭṭhoti sakkhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:388_5: katvā pucchito. Ehambho purisāti ālapanametaṃ. Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā
atk-s0402a0:388_6: parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā. Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti
atk-s0402a0:388_7: lañjo adhippeto. Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ antamaso tittiriyavaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassa
atk-s0402a0:388_8: lañjassa hetūti attho. Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:389_0: Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssa elanti nelā, niddosāti attho. “Nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
atk-s0402a0:389_1: ettha vuttasīlaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:389_2: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
atk-s0402a0:389_3: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a0:389_4: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī. Pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
atk-s0402a0:389_5: esātipi porī. Purassa esāti nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā
atk-s0402a0:389_6: honti, pitimattaṃ pitāti, mātimattaṃ mātāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī
atk-s0402a0:389_7: kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā. Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā
atk-s0402a0:391_0: 29. Navame cakkhu na hotīti paññācakkhu na hoti. Phātiṃ kareyyāti phītaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:391_1: kareyya. Sāvajjānavajjeti sadosaniddose. Hīnappaṇīteti adhamuttame. Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgeti
atk-s0402a0:391_2: kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññaṃ paṭibāhanato paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti.
atk-s0402a0:391_3: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – kusale dhamme “kusalā dhammā”ti jāneyya, akusale dhamme
atk-s0402a0:391_4: “akusalā dhammā”ti jāneyya. Sāvajjādīsupi eseva nayo. Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgesu pana
atk-s0402a0:391_6: paññācakkhunā jāneyya, tathārūpampissa cakkhu na hotīti. Iminā nayena sesavāresupi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:392_0: Na ceva bhogā tathārūpāti tathājātikā bhogāpissa na honti. Na ca puññāni kubbatīti
atk-s0402a0:392_1: puññāni ca na karoti. Ettāvatā bhoguppādanacakkhuno ca puññakaraṇacakkhuno ca abhāvo
atk-s0402a0:392_2: vutto. Ubhayattha kaliggāhoti idhaloke ca paraloke cāti ubhayasmimpi aparaddhaggāho,
atk-s0402a0:392_3: parājayaggāho hotīti attho. Atha vā ubhayattha kaliggāhoti ubhayesampi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:392_4: atthānaṃ kaliggāho, parājayaggāhoti attho. Dhammādhammenāti dasakusalakammapathadhammenapi
atk-s0402a0:392_5: dasaakusalakammapathaadhammenapi. Saṭhoti kerāṭiko. Bhogāni pariyesatīti bhoge gavesati.
atk-s0402a0:392_6: Theyyena kūṭakammena, musāvādena cūbhayanti theyyādīsu ubhayena pariyesatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:392_7: Kathaṃ? Theyyena kūṭakammena ca pariyesati, theyyena musāvādena ca pariyesati, kūṭakammena
atk-s0402a0:392_8: musāvādena ca pariyesati. Saṅghātunti saṅgharituṃ. Dhammaladdhehīti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:392_9: akopetvā laddhehi. Uṭṭhānādhigatanti vīriyena adhigataṃ. Abyagghamānasoti nibbicikicchacitto.
atk-s0402a0:392_10: Bhaddakaṃ ṭhānanti seṭṭhaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ. Na socatīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne antosokena na socati.
atk-s0402a0:394_0: 30. Dasame avakujjapaññoti adhomukhapañño. Ucchaṅgapaññoti ucchaṅgasadisapañño. Puthupaññoti
atk-s0402a0:394_1: vitthārikapañño. Ādikalyāṇantiādīsu ādīti pubbapaṭṭhapanā. Majjhanti kathāvemajjhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:394_2: Pariyosānanti sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Itissa te dhammaṃ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi kalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:394_3: bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kathenti, vemajjhepi pariyosānepi. Ettha ca atthi desanāya
atk-s0402a0:394_4: ādimajjhapariyosānāni, atthi sāsanassa. Tattha desanāya tāva catuppadikagāthāya paṭhamapadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:394_5: ādi, dve padāni majjhaṃ, avasānapadaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Ekānusandhikassa suttassa nidānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:394_6: ādi, anusandhi majjhaṃ, idamavocāti appanā pariyosānaṃ. Anekānusandhikassa paṭhamo
atk-s0402a0:394_7: anusandhi ādi, tato paraṃ eko vā aneke vā majjhaṃ, pacchimo pariyosānaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0402a0:394_8: desanāya nayo. Sāsanassa pana sīlaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhaṃ, vipassanā pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:394_9: Samādhi vā ādi, vipassanā majjhaṃ, maggo pariyosānaṃ. Vipassanā vā ādi, maggo majjhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:394_10: phalaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Maggo vā ādi, phalaṃ majjhaṃ, nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Dve dve vā
atk-s0402a0:394_11: kayiramāne sīlasamādhayo ādi, vipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:395_0: Sātthanti sātthakaṃ katvā desenti. Sabyañjananti akkharapāripūriṃ katvā desenti.
atk-s0402a0:395_1: Kevalaparipuṇṇanti sakalaparipuṇṇaṃ anūnaṃ katvā desenti. Parisuddhanti parisuddhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:395_2: nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā desenti. Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsentīti evaṃ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a0:395_3: sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pakāsenti. Neva ādiṃ manasi karotīti
atk-s0402a0:396_0: Kumbhoti ghaṭo. Nikujjoti adhomukho ṭhapito. Evameva khoti ettha kumbho nikujjo viya
atk-s0402a0:396_1: avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo, udakāsiñcanakālo viya dhammadesanāya laddhakālo,
atk-s0402a0:396_2: udakassa vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṃ asamatthakālo, udakassa
atk-s0402a0:397_0: Ākiṇṇānīti pakkhittāni. Satisammosāya pakireyyāti muṭṭhassatitāya vikireyya. Evameva
atk-s0402a0:397_1: khoti ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo, nānākhajjakāni viya nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:397_2: buddhavacanaṃ, ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane
atk-s0402a0:397_3: nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo, vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā pakiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā
atk-s0402a0:398_0: Ukkujjoti uparimukho ṭhapito. Saṇṭhātīti patiṭṭhahati. Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho
atk-s0402a0:398_1: ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo, udakassa āsittakālo viya desanāya
atk-s0402a0:398_2: laddhakālo, udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo, no vivaṭṭanakālo
atk-s0402a0:399_0: Dummedhoti nippañño. Avicakkhaṇoti saṃvidahanapaññāya rahito. Gantāti gamanasīlo.
atk-s0402a0:399_1: Seyyo etena vuccatīti etasmā puggalā uttaritaroti vuccati. Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti
atk-s0402a0:399_2: navalokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. Dukkhassāti
atk-s0402a0:399_3: vaṭṭadukkhassa. Antakaro siyāti koṭikaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:401_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame ajjhāgāreti sake ghare. Pūjitā hontīti yaṃ ghare atthi, tena
atk-s0402a0:401_1: paṭijaggitā gopitā honti. Iti mātāpitupūjakāni kulāni mātāpitūhi sabrahmakānīti pakāsetvā
atk-s0402a0:401_2: idāni nesaṃ sapubbācariyakādibhāvaṃ pakāsento sapubbācariyakānītiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:401_3: brahmātiādīni tesaṃ brahmādibhāvasādhanatthaṃ vuttāni. Bahukārāti puttānaṃ bahūpakārā.
atk-s0402a0:401_4: Āpādakāti jīvitassa āpādakā. Puttakānaṃ hi mātāpitūhi jīvitaṃ āpāditaṃ pālitaṃ ghaṭitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:401_5: anuppabandhena pavattitaṃ. Posakāti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā posetāro.
atk-s0402a0:401_6: Imassa lokassa dassetāroti puttānaṃ hi imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇassa dassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:401_7: nāma mātāpitaro nissāya jātanti imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma.
atk-s0402a0:402_0: Brahmāti mātāpitaroti seṭṭhādhivacanaṃ. Yathā brahmuno catasso bhāvanā avijahitā
atk-s0402a0:402_1: honti mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti, evameva mātāpitūnaṃ puttakesu catasso bhāvanā
atk-s0402a0:402_2: avijahitā honti. Tā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle veditabbā – kucchigatasmiṃ hi dārake “kadā
atk-s0402a0:402_3: nu kho puttakaṃ arogaṃ paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ passissāmā”ti mātāpitūnaṃ mettacittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:402_4: uppajjati. Yadā panesa mando uttānaseyyako ūkāhi vā maṅkulādīhi pāṇakehi daṭṭho dukkhaseyyāya
atk-s0402a0:402_5: vā pana pīḷito parodati viravati, tadāssa saddaṃ sutvā mātāpitūnaṃ kāruññaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:402_6: ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā kīḷanakāle pana lobhanīyavayasmiṃ vā ṭhitakāle dārakaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0402a0:402_7: mātāpitūnaṃ cittaṃ sappimaṇḍe pakkhittasatavihatakappāsapicupaṭalaṃ viya mudukaṃ
atk-s0402a0:402_8: hoti āmoditaṃ pamoditaṃ, tadā tesaṃ muditā labbhati. Yadā panesa putto dārābharaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:402_9: paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāṭiyekkaṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasati, tadā mātāpitūnaṃ “sakkoti dāni no
atk-s0402a0:402_10: puttako attano dhammatāya yāpetu”nti majjhattabhāvo uppajjati, tasmiṃ kāle upekkhā
atk-s0402a0:403_0: Pubbācariyāti vuccareti mātāpitaro hi jātakālato paṭṭhāya “evaṃ nisīda, evaṃ tiṭṭha,
atk-s0402a0:403_1: evaṃ gaccha, evaṃ saya, evaṃ khāda, evaṃ bhuñja, ayaṃ te, tātāti vattabbo, ayaṃ bhātikāti,
atk-s0402a0:403_2: ayaṃ bhaginīti, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ na vaṭṭati, asukaṃ nāma upasaṅkamituṃ
atk-s0402a0:403_3: vaṭṭati, asukaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti gāhāpenti sikkhāpenti. Athāparabhāge aññe ācariyā hatthisippaassasipparathasippadhanusippatharusippamuddāgaṇanādīni
atk-s0402a0:403_4: sikkhāpenti. Añño saraṇāni deti, añño sīlesu patiṭṭhāpeti, añño pabbājeti, añño buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:403_5: uggaṇhāpeti, añño upasampādeti, añño sotāpattimaggādīni pāpeti. Iti sabbepi te pacchācariyā
atk-s0402a0:403_6: nāma honti, mātāpitaro pana sabbapaṭhamā, tenāha – “pubbācariyāti vuccare”ti. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:403_7: vuccareti vuccanti kathiyanti. Āhuneyyā ca puttānanti puttānaṃ āhutaṃ pāhutaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0402a0:403_8: annapānādiṃ arahanti, anucchavikā taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ. Tasmā “āhuneyyā ca puttāna”nti
atk-s0402a0:403_9: vuttaṃ. Pajāya anukampakāti paresaṃ pāṇe acchinditvāpi attano pajaṃ paṭijagganti
atk-s0402a0:404_0: Namasseyyāti namo kareyya. Sakkareyyāti sakkārena paṭimāneyya. Idāni taṃ sakkāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:404_1: dassento “annenā”tiādimāha. Tattha annenāti yāgubhattakhādanīyena. Pānenāti aṭṭhavidhapānena.
atk-s0402a0:404_2: Vatthenāti nivāsanapārupanakena vatthena. Sayanenāti mañcapīṭhānuppadānena. Ucchādanenāti
atk-s0402a0:404_3: duggandhaṃ paṭivinodetvā sugandhakaraṇucchādanena. Nhāpanenāti sīte uṇhodakena, uṇhe
atk-s0402a0:404_4: sītodakena gattāni parisiñcitvā nhāpanena. Pādānaṃ dhovanenāti uṇhodakasītodakehi
atk-s0402a0:404_5: pādadhovanena ceva telamakkhanena ca. Peccāti paralokaṃ gantvā. Sagge pamodatīti
atk-s0402a0:404_6: idha tāva mātāpitūsu pāricariyaṃ disvā pāricariyakāraṇā taṃ paṇḍitamanussā idheva
atk-s0402a0:404_7: pasaṃsanti, paralokaṃ pana gantvā sagge ṭhito so mātāpituupaṭṭhāko dibbasampattīhi āmodati pamodatīti.
atk-s0402a0:406_0: 32. Dutiye tathārūpoti tathājātiko. Samādhipaṭilābhoti cittekaggatālābho. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:406_1: ca saviññāṇaketi ettha attano ca parassa cāti ubhayesampi kāyo saviññāṇakaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:406_2: ekato katvā imasminti vutto. Ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayāti ahaṅkāradiṭṭhi ca mamaṅkārataṇhā
atk-s0402a0:406_3: ca mānānusayo cāti attano ca parassa ca kilesā. Nāssūti na bhaveyyuṃ. Bahiddhā ca
atk-s0402a0:406_4: sabbanimittesūti rūpanimittaṃ, saddanimittaṃ, gandhanimittaṃ, rasanimittaṃ, phoṭṭhabbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:406_5: sassatādinimittaṃ, puggalanimittaṃ dhammanimittanti evarūpesu ca bahiddhā sabbanimittesu.
atk-s0402a0:406_6: Cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttinti phalasamādhiñceva phalañāṇañca. Siyāti bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:407_0: Idhānanda, bhikkhunoti, ānanda, imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhuno. Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti
atk-s0402a0:407_1: nibbānaṃ dassento āha. Nibbānaṃ hi kilesānaṃ santatāya santaṃ nāma, nibbānaṃ santanti
atk-s0402a0:407_2: samāpattiṃ appetvāva divasampi nisinnassa cittuppādo santanteva pavattatītipi santaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:407_3: Paṇītanti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassāpi cittuppādo paṇītanteva pavattatīti nibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:407_5: samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa hi divasabhāgampi cittuppādo sabbasaṅkhārasamathoteva
atk-s0402a0:407_6: pavattati…pe… tathā tīsu bhavesu vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvena nibbānanti laddhanāme
atk-s0402a0:407_7: tasmiṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa cittuppādo nibbānaṃ nibbānanteva pavattatīti
atk-s0402a0:407_8: sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādīni nāmāni labhati. Imasmiṃ pana aṭṭhavidhe ābhogasamannāhāre
atk-s0402a0:407_9: imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekopi labbhati, dvepi sabbepi labbhanteva.
atk-s0402a0:408_0: Saṅkhāyāti ñāṇena jānitvā. Paroparānīti parāni ca oparāni ca. Paraattabhāvasakaattabhāvāni
atk-s0402a0:408_1: hi parāni ca oparāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yassāti yassa arahato. Iñjitanti rāgiñjitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:408_2: dosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritiñjitanti imāni satta iñjitāni calitāni phanditāni.
atk-s0402a0:408_3: Natthi kuhiñcīti katthaci ekārammaṇepi natthi. Santoti paccanīkakilesānaṃ santatāya
atk-s0402a0:408_4: santo. Vidhūmoti kāyaduccaritādidhūmavirahito. Anīghoti rāgādiīghavirahito. Nirāsoti
atk-s0402a0:408_5: nittaṇho. Atārīti tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo samatikkanto. Soti so arahaṃ khīṇāsavo. Jātijaranti
atk-s0402a0:408_6: ettha jātijarāgahaṇeneva byādhimaraṇampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Iti suttantepi
atk-s0402a0:410_1: Saṃkhittavitthārenāti kāle saṃkhittena kāle vitthārena. Aññātāro ca dullabhāti paṭivijjhanakapuggalā
atk-s0402a0:410_2: pana dullabhā. Idaṃ bhagavā “sāriputtattherassa ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭemī”ti adhippāyena kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:410_3: Taṃ sutvā thero kiñcāpi “ahaṃ, bhante, ājānissāmī”ti na vadati, adhippāyena pana
atk-s0402a0:410_4: “vissatthā tumhe, bhante, desetha, ahaṃ tumhehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena
atk-s0402a0:410_5: paṭivijjhissāmi, mamesa bhāro hotū”ti satthāraṃ desanāya ussāhento etassa bhagavā kālotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:411_0: Athassa satthā tasmātihāti desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha imasmiñca saviññāṇaketiādi vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:411_1: Acchecchi taṇhanti maggañāṇasatthena taṇhaṃ chindi. Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi
atk-s0402a0:411_2: saṃyojanaṃ samūlakaṃ ubbattetvā chaḍḍesi. Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassāti
atk-s0402a0:411_3: sammā upāyena sammā paṭipattiyā navavidhassa mānassa pahānābhisamayena vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0402a0:411_4: antamakāsi. Idañca pana metaṃ, sāriputta, sandhāya bhāsitanti, sāriputta, mayā pārāyane
atk-s0402a0:411_5: udayapañhe idaṃ phalasamāpattimeva sandhāya etaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:412_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ dassento pahānaṃ kāmasaññānantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:412_1: Udayapañhe ca etaṃ padaṃ “pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna”nti āgataṃ, idha pana aṅguttarabhāṇakehi
atk-s0402a0:412_2: “kāmasaññāna”nti āropitaṃ. Tattha byañjanameva nānaṃ, attho pana ekoyeva. Kāmasaññānanti
atk-s0402a0:412_3: kāme ārabbha uppannasaññānaṃ, aṭṭhahi vā lobhasahagatacittehi sahajātasaññānaṃ. Domanassāna
atk-s0402a0:412_4: cūbhayanti etāsañca kāmasaññānaṃ cetasikadomanassānañcāti ubhinnampi pahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:412_5: arahattaphalaṃ aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmīti attho. Niddese pana “kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa
atk-s0402a0:412_6: ca ubhinnaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbāna”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:412_7: taṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ. Pahānanti hi khīṇākārasaṅkhāto vūpasamopi vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:412_8: kilese paṭinissajjanto maggopi, kilesapaṭippassaddhisaṅkhātaṃ phalampi, yaṃ āgamma
atk-s0402a0:412_9: kilesā pahīyanti, taṃ amataṃ nibbānampi. Tasmā tattha tāni padāni āgatāni. “Aññāvimokkhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:412_10: pabrūmī”ti vacanato pana arahattaphalameva adhippetaṃ. Thinassa ca panūdanantipi
atk-s0402a0:412_11: thinassa ca panūdanante uppannattā arahattaphalameva adhippetaṃ. Kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇanti
atk-s0402a0:412_12: kukkuccanivāraṇassa maggassa anantaraṃ uppannattā phalameva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:413_0: Upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhanti catutthajjhānike phale uppannāya upekkhāya ca satiyā ca saṃsuddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:413_1: Dhammatakkapurejavanti dhammatakko vuccati sammāsaṅkappo, so ādito hoti, purato hoti,
atk-s0402a0:413_2: pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti dhammatakkapurejavo. Taṃ dhammatakkapurejavaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:413_3: Aññāvimokkhanti aññindriyapariyosāne uppannaṃ vimokkhaṃ, aññāya vā vimokkhaṃ aññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:413_4: paññāvimuttanti attho. Avijjāya pabhedananti avijjāya pabhedanante uppannattā, avijjāya
atk-s0402a0:413_5: pabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ārabbha uppannattā evaṃladdhanāmaṃ arahattaphalameva.
atk-s0402a0:413_6: Iti sabbehipi imehi pahānantiādīhi padehi arahattaphalameva pakāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:415_0: 34. Catutthe nidānānīti kāraṇāni. Kammānanti vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ. Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:415_1: samudayāyāti lubbhanapalubbhanasabhāvo lobho vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0402a0:415_2: nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccayoti attho. Dosoti dussanapadussanasabhāvo doso. Mohoti muyhanapamuyhanasabhāvo moho.
atk-s0402a0:416_0: Lobhapakatanti lobhena pakataṃ, lobhābhibhūtena luddhena hutvā katakammanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:416_1: Lobhato jātanti lobhajaṃ. Lobho nidānamassāti lobhanidānaṃ. Lobho samudayo assāti
atk-s0402a0:416_2: lobhasamudayaṃ. Samudayoti paccayo, lobhapaccayanti attho. Yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattatīti
atk-s0402a0:416_3: yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa lobhajakammavato puggalassa attabhāvo nibbattati, khandhā pātubhavanti.
atk-s0402a0:416_4: Tattha taṃ kammaṃ vipaccatīti tesu khandhesu taṃ kammaṃ vipaccati. Diṭṭhe vā dhammetiādi
atk-s0402a0:416_5: yasmā taṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā hoti upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:416_6: vā, tasmā taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:417_0: Akhaṇḍānīti abhinnāni. Apūtīnīti pūtibhāvena abījattaṃ appattāni. Avātātapahatānīti
atk-s0402a0:417_1: na vātena na ca ātapena hatāni. Sārādānīti gahitasārāni sāravantāni na nissārāni.
atk-s0402a0:417_2: Sukhasayitānīti sannicayabhāvena sukhaṃ sayitāni. Sukhetteti maṇḍakhette. Suparikammakatāya
atk-s0402a0:417_3: bhūmiyāti naṅgalakasanena ceva aṭṭhadantakena ca suṭṭhu parikammakatāya khettabhūmiyā.
atk-s0402a0:417_4: Nikkhittānīti ṭhapitāni ropitāni. Anuppaveccheyyāti anuppaveseyya. Vuddhintiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:417_5: uddhaggamanena vuddhiṃ, heṭṭhā mūlappatiṭṭhānena virūḷhiṃ, samantā vitthārikabhāvena vepullaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:418_0: Yaṃ panettha diṭṭhe vā dhammetiādi vuttaṃ, tattha asammohatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kammavibhatti
atk-s0402a0:418_1: nāma kathetabbā. Suttantikapariyāyena hi ekādasa kammāni vibhattāni. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0402a0:418_3: yadāsannaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ, janakaṃ upatthambhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ upaghātakanti.
atk-s0402a0:418_4: Tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā
atk-s0402a0:418_5: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti kākavaḷiyapuṇṇaseṭṭhīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:418_7: viya ca akusalaṃ. Tathā asakkontaṃ pana ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti, avipākaṃ sampajjati.
atk-s0402a0:418_8: Taṃ migaluddakopamāya sādhetabbaṃ. Yathā hi migaluddakena migaṃ disvā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0402a0:418_9: khitto saro sace na virajjhati, taṃ migaṃ tattheva pāteti, atha naṃ migaluddako niccammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:418_10: katvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ ādāya puttadāraṃ tosento gacchati. Sace pana
atk-s0402a0:418_11: virajjhati, migo palāyitvā puna taṃ disaṃ na oloketi. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:418_12: Sarassa avirajjhitvā migavijjhanaṃ viya hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa kammassa vipākavārapaṭilābho,
atk-s0402a0:419_0: Atthasādhikā pana sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ anantare attabhāve
atk-s0402a0:419_1: vipākaṃ deti. Taṃ panetaṃ kusalapakkhe aṭṭhasamāpattivasena, akusalapakkhe pañcānantariyakammavasena
atk-s0402a0:419_2: veditabbaṃ. Tattha aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ekāya samāpattiyā brahmaloke nibbattati. Pañcannampi
atk-s0402a0:419_3: ānantariyānaṃ kattā ekena kammena niraye nibbattati, sesasamāpattiyo ca kammāni ca
atk-s0402a0:419_4: ahosikammabhāvaṃyeva āpajjanti, avipākāni honti. Ayampi attho purimaupamāyayeva dīpetabbo.
atk-s0402a0:420_0: Ubhinnaṃ antare pana pañcajavanacetanā aparapariyāyavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ anāgate
atk-s0402a0:420_1: yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā vipākaṃ deti. Sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na
atk-s0402a0:420_2: hoti. Taṃ sabbaṃ sunakhaluddakena dīpetabbaṃ. Yathā hi sunakhaluddakena migaṃ disvā
atk-s0402a0:420_3: sunakho vissajjito migaṃ anubandhitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne pāpuṇāti, tasmiṃ yeva ḍaṃsati;
atk-s0402a0:420_4: evamevaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhati, tasmiṃyeva vipākaṃ deti, tena mutto satto nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a0:421_0: Kusalākusalesu pana garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ hoti, taṃ yaggarukaṃ nāma. Tadetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:421_1: kusalapakkhe mahaggatakammaṃ, akusalapakkhe pañcānantariyakammaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:421_2: sati sesāni kusalāni vā akusalāni vā vipaccituṃ na sakkonti, tadeva duvidhampi paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:421_3: deti. Yathā hi sāsapappamāṇāpi sakkharā vā ayaguḷikā vā udakarahade pakkhittā udakapiṭṭhe
atk-s0402a0:421_4: uplavituṃ na sakkoti, heṭṭhāva pavisati; evameva kusalepi akusalepi yaṃ garukaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:422_0: Kusalākusalesu pana yaṃ bahulaṃ hoti, taṃ yabbahulaṃ nāma. Taṃ dīgharattaṃ laddhāsevanavasena
atk-s0402a0:422_1: veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā balavakusalakammesu somanassakaraṃ, akusalakammesu santāpakaraṃ,
atk-s0402a0:422_2: etaṃ yabbahulaṃ nāma. Tadetaṃ yathā nāma dvīsu mallesu yuddhabhūmiṃ otiṇṇesu yo balavā,
atk-s0402a0:422_3: so itaraṃ pātetvā gacchati; evameva itaraṃ dubbalakammaṃ avattharitvā yaṃ āsevanavasena
atk-s0402a0:422_4: vā bahulaṃ, āsannavasena vā balavaṃ, taṃ vipākaṃ deti, duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayarañño kammaṃ viya.
atk-s0402a0:423_0: So kira cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājito vaḷavaṃ āruyha palāyi. Tassa cūḷupaṭṭhāko tissāmacco
atk-s0402a0:423_1: nāma ekakova pacchato ahosi. So ekaṃ aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno jighacchāya bādhayamānāya
atk-s0402a0:423_2: – “bhātika tissa, ativiya no jighacchā bādhati, kiṃ karissāmā”ti āha. Atthi, deva,
atk-s0402a0:423_3: mayā sāṭakantare ṭhapetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇasarakabhattaṃ ābhatanti. Tena hi āharāti. So
atk-s0402a0:423_4: nīharitvā rañño purato ṭhapesi. Rājā disvā, “tāta, cattāro koṭṭhāse karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:423_5: Mayaṃ tayo janā, kasmā devo cattāro koṭṭhāse kārayatīti? Bhātika tissa, yato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:423_6: ahaṃ attānaṃ sarāmi, na me ayyānaṃ adatvā āhāro paribhuttapubbo atthi, svāhaṃ ajjapi
atk-s0402a0:423_7: adatvā na paribhuñjissāmīti. So cattāro koṭṭhāse akāsi. Rājā “kālaṃ ghosehī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:423_8: Chaḍḍitāraññe kuto, ayye, labhissāma devāti. “Nāyaṃ tava bhāro. Sace mama saddhā
atk-s0402a0:423_9: atthi, ayye, labhissāma, vissattho kālaṃ ghosehī”ti āha. So “kālo, bhante, kālo,
atk-s0402a0:424_0: Athassa bodhimātumahātissatthero taṃ saddaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā ‘katthāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:424_1: saddo’ti taṃ āvajjento “ajja duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayamahārājā yuddhaparājito aṭaviṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a0:424_2: nisinno ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse kāretvā ‘ekakova na paribhuñjissāmī’ti
atk-s0402a0:424_3: kālaṃ ghosāpesī”ti ñatvā “ajja mayā rañño saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti manogatiyā āgantvā
atk-s0402a0:424_4: rañño purato aṭṭhāsi. Rājā disvā pasannacitto “passa, bhātika, tissā”ti vatvā theraṃ
atk-s0402a0:424_5: vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante, dethā”ti āha. Thero pattaṃ nīhari. Rājā attano koṭṭhāsena
atk-s0402a0:424_6: saddhiṃ therassa koṭṭhāsaṃ patte pakkhipitvā, “bhante, āhāraparissayo nāma mā kadāci
atk-s0402a0:424_7: hotū”ti vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Tissāmaccopi “mama ayyaputte passante bhuñjituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:424_8: attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte ākiri. Vaḷavāpi cintesi – “mayhampi koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva
atk-s0402a0:424_9: dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Rājā vaḷavaṃ oloketvā “ayampi attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte
atk-s0402a0:424_10: pakkhipanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā tampi tattheva pakkhipitvā theraṃ vanditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0402a0:424_11: Thero taṃ bhattaṃ ādāya gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa ālopasaṅkhepena adāsi.
atk-s0402a0:425_0: Rājāpi cintesi – “ativiyamhā jighacchitā, sādhu vatassa sace atirekabhattasitthāni
atk-s0402a0:425_1: pahiṇeyyā”ti. Thero rañño cittaṃ ñatvā atirekabhattaṃ etesaṃ yāpanamattaṃ katvā pattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:425_2: ākāse khipi, patto āgantvā rañño hatthe patiṭṭhāsi. Bhattaṃ tiṇṇampi janānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:425_3: ahosi. Atha rājā pattaṃ dhovitvā “tucchapattaṃ na pesissāmī”ti uttarisāṭakaṃ mocetvā
atk-s0402a0:425_4: udakaṃ puñchitvā sāṭakaṃ patte ṭhapetvā “patto gantvā mama ayyassa hatthe patiṭṭhātū”ti
atk-s0402a0:425_5: ākāse khipi. Patto gantvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:426_0: Aparabhāge rañño tathāgatassa sarīradhātūnaṃ aṭṭhamabhāgaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vīsaratanasatikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:426_1: mahācetiyaṃ kārentassa apariniṭṭhiteyeva cetiye kālakiriyāsamayo anuppatto. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:426_2: mahācetiyassa dakkhiṇapasse nipannassa pañcanikāyavasena bhikkhusaṅghe sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:426_3: karonte chahi devalokehi cha rathā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhaṃsu. Rājā “puññapotthakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:426_4: āharathā”ti ādito paṭṭhāya puññapotthakaṃ vācāpesi. Atha naṃ kiñci kammaṃ na paritosesi.
atk-s0402a0:426_5: So “parato vācethā”ti āha. Potthakavācako “cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājitena te deva aṭaviṃ
atk-s0402a0:426_6: pavisitvā nisinnena ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse kāretvā bodhimātumahātissattherassa
atk-s0402a0:426_7: bhikkhā dinnā”ti āha. Rājā “ṭhapehī”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi, “bhante, kataro
atk-s0402a0:426_8: devaloko ramaṇīyo”ti? Sabbabodhisattānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ tusitabhavanaṃ mahārājāti.
atk-s0402a0:426_9: Rājā kālaṃ katvā tusitabhavanato āgataratheva patiṭṭhāya tusitabhavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:427_0: Yaṃ pana kusalākusalesu āsannamaraṇe anussarituṃ sakkoti, taṃ yadāsannaṃ nāma. Tadetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:427_1: yathā nāma gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe parabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu
atk-s0402a0:427_2: santesupi yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti antamaso dubbalajaraggavopi, so eva paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0402a0:427_3: nikkhamati, evameva aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a0:428_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – madhuaṅgaṇagāme kira eko damiḷadovāriko pātova baḷisaṃ ādāya
atk-s0402a0:428_1: gantvā macche vadhitvā tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekena taṇḍulaṃ gaṇhāti, ekena dadhiṃ,
atk-s0402a0:428_2: ekaṃ pacati. Iminā nīhārena paññāsa vassāni pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā aparabhāge mahallako
atk-s0402a0:428_3: anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ upagacchati. Tasmiṃ khaṇe girivihāravāsī cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero
atk-s0402a0:428_4: “mā ayaṃ satto mayi passante nassatū”ti gantvā tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Athassa bhariyā,
atk-s0402a0:428_5: “sāmi, thero āgato”ti ārocesi. Ahaṃ paññāsa vassāni therassa santikaṃ na gatapubbo,
atk-s0402a0:428_6: katarena me guṇena thero āgamissati, gacchāti naṃ vadathāti. Sā “aticchatha, bhante”ti
atk-s0402a0:428_7: āha. Thero “upāsakassa kā sarīrappavattī”ti pucchi. Dubbalo, bhanteti. Thero gharaṃ
atk-s0402a0:428_8: pavisitvā satiṃ uppādetvā “sīlaṃ gaṇhissasī”ti āha. Āma, bhante, dethāti. Thero tīṇi
atk-s0402a0:428_9: saraṇāni datvā pañca sīlāni dātuṃ ārabhi. Tassa pañca sīlānīti vacanakāleyeva jivhā
atk-s0402a0:428_10: papati. Thero “vaṭṭissati ettaka”nti nikkhamitvā gato. Sopi kālaṃ katvā cātumahārājikabhavane
atk-s0402a0:428_11: nibbatti. Nibbattakkhaṇeyeva ca “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā mayā idaṃ laddha”nti āvajjento
atk-s0402a0:428_12: theraṃ nissāya laddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā devalokato āgantvā theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:428_13: “Ko eso”ti ca vutte “ahaṃ, bhante, damiḷadovāriko”ti āha. Kuhiṃ nibbattosīti? Cātumahārājikesu,
atk-s0402a0:428_14: bhante, sace me ayyo pañca sīlāni adassa, upari devaloke nibbatto assaṃ. Ahaṃ kiṃ
atk-s0402a0:428_15: karissāmi, tvaṃ gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi, puttakāti. So theraṃ vanditvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0402a0:429_0: Antaragaṅgāya pana mahāvācakālaupāsako nāma ahosi. So tiṃsa vassāni sotāpattimaggatthāya
atk-s0402a0:429_1: dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyitvā “ahaṃ evaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyanto obhāsamattampi nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:429_2: nāsakkhiṃ, buddhasāsanaṃ aniyyānikaṃ bhavissatī”ti diṭṭhivipallāsaṃ patvā kālakiriyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:429_3: katvā mahāgaṅgāya navausabhiko susumārapeto hutvā nibbatti. Ekaṃ samayaṃ kacchakatitthena
atk-s0402a0:429_4: saṭṭhi pāsāṇatthambhasakaṭāni agamaṃsu. So sabbepi te goṇe ca pāsāṇe ca khādi. Idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:430_0: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ aññāṇavasena kataṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ nāma. Taṃ yathā
atk-s0402a0:430_1: nāma ummattakena khittadaṇḍaṃ yattha vā tattha vā gacchati, evameva tesaṃ abhāve
atk-s0402a0:431_0: Janakaṃ nāma ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā pavattiṃ na janeti, pavatte aññaṃ kammaṃ vipākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:431_1: nibbatteti. Yathā hi mātā janetiyeva, dhātiyeva pana jaggati; evamevaṃ mātā viya
atk-s0402a0:431_2: paṭisandhinibbattakaṃ janakakammaṃ, dhāti viya pavatte sampattakammaṃ. Upatthambhakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:431_3: nāma kusalepi labbhati akusalepi. Ekacco hi kusalaṃ katvā sugatibhave nibbattati.
atk-s0402a0:431_4: So tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ kusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā anekāni vassasatasahassāni
atk-s0402a0:431_5: sugatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati. Ekacco akusalaṃ katvā duggatibhave nibbattati. So tattha
atk-s0402a0:431_6: ṭhito punappunaṃ akusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā bahūni vassasatasahassāni
atk-s0402a0:432_0: Aparo nayo – janakaṃ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi. Taṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi
atk-s0402a0:432_1: rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe janeti. Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti, aññena
atk-s0402a0:432_2: kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
atk-s0402a0:432_3: addhānaṃ pavatteti. Upapīḷakaṃ nāma aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke
atk-s0402a0:432_4: uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādheti, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na deti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo
atk-s0402a0:432_5: – kusalakamme vipaccamāne akusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a0:432_6: Akusalakamme vipaccamāne kusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a0:432_7: Yathā vaḍḍhamānakaṃ rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā kocideva daṇḍena vā satthena vā
atk-s0402a0:432_8: bhindeyya vā chindeyya vā, atha so rukkho vā gaccho vā latā vā vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya;
atk-s0402a0:432_9: evamevaṃ kusalaṃ vipaccamānaṃ akusalena upapīḷitaṃ, akusalaṃ vā pana vipaccamānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:432_10: kusalena upapīḷitaṃ vipaccituṃ na sakkoti. Tattha sunakkhattassa akusalakammaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:433_0: Rājagahe kira vātakāḷako paññāsa vassāni coraghātakammaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ rañño ārocesuṃ
atk-s0402a0:433_1: – “deva, vātakāḷako mahallako core ghātetuṃ na sakkotī”ti. “Apanetha naṃ tasmā ṭhānantarāti.
atk-s0402a0:433_2: Amaccā naṃ apanetvā aññaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu. Vātakāḷakopi yāva taṃ kammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0402a0:433_3: tāva ahatavatthāni vā acchādituṃ surabhipupphāni vā piḷandhituṃ pāyāsaṃ vā bhuñjituṃ
atk-s0402a0:433_4: ucchādananhāpanaṃ vā paccanubhotuṃ nālattha. So “dīgharattaṃ me kiliṭṭhavesena carita”nti
atk-s0402a0:433_5: “pāyāsaṃ me pacāhī”ti bhariyaṃ āṇāpetvā nhānīyasambhārāni gāhāpetvā nhānatitthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:433_6: gantvā sīsaṃ nhatvā ahatavatthāni acchādetvā gandhe vilimpitvā pupphāni piḷandhitvā
atk-s0402a0:433_7: gharaṃ āgacchanto sāriputtattheraṃ disvā “saṃkiliṭṭhakammato camhi apagato, ayyo
atk-s0402a0:433_8: ca me diṭṭho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso theraṃ gharaṃ netvā navasappisakkaracuṇṇābhisaṅkhatena
atk-s0402a0:433_9: pāyāsena parivisi. Thero tassa anumodanamakāsi. So anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ
atk-s0402a0:433_10: paṭilabhitvā theraṃ anugantvā nivattamāno antarāmagge taruṇavacchāya gāviyā madditvā
atk-s0402a0:433_11: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpito gantvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. Bhikkhū tathāgataṃ pucchiṃsu
atk-s0402a0:433_12: – “bhante, coraghātako ajjeva kiliṭṭhakammato apanīto, ajjeva kālaṅkato, kahaṃ nu
atk-s0402a0:433_13: kho nibbatto”ti? Tāvatiṃsabhavane, bhikkhaveti. Bhante, coraghātako dīgharattaṃ purise
atk-s0402a0:433_14: ghātesi, tumhe ca evaṃ vadetha, natthi nu kho pāpakammassa phalanti. Mā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:433_15: evaṃ avacuttha, balavakalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ labhitvā dhammasenāpatissa piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:433_16: datvā anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā so tattha nibbattoti.
atk-s0402a0:436_0: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā
atk-s0402a0:436_1: tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti. Evaṃ pana kammena kate
atk-s0402a0:436_2: okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati. Upacchedakantipi etasseva nāmaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:436_3: nayo – kusalakammassa vipaccanakāle ekaṃ akusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0402a0:436_4: pāteti. Akusalakammassapi vipaccanakāle ekaṃ kusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0402a0:436_5: pāteti. Idaṃ upacchedakaṃ nāma. Tattha ajātasattuno kammaṃ kusalacchedakaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:436_6: aṅgulimālattherassa akusalacchedakanti. Evaṃ suttantikapariyāyena ekādasa kammāni vibhattāni.
atk-s0402a0:437_0: Abhidhammapariyāyena pana soḷasa kammāni vibhattāni, seyyathidaṃ – “atthekaccāni
atk-s0402a0:437_1: pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, atthekaccāni pāpakāni
atk-s0402a0:437_2: kammasamādānāni upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni
atk-s0402a0:437_3: kālasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni payogasampattipaṭibāḷhāni
atk-s0402a0:437_4: na vipaccanti. Atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a0:437_5: upadhivipattiṃ, kālavipattiṃ, payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti. Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni
atk-s0402a0:437_6: kammasamādānāni gativipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, upadhivipatti, kālavipatti,
atk-s0402a0:437_7: payogavipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti. Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:437_8: āgamma vipaccanti, upadhisampattiṃ, kālasampattiṃ, payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccantī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:438_0: Tattha pāpakānīti lāmakāni. Kammasamādānānīti kammaggahaṇāni. Gahitasamādinnānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:438_1: kammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantītiādīsu aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe
atk-s0402a0:438_2: kamme vijjamāneyeva sugatibhave nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:438_3: vipaccati nāma. Gatisampattiyā patibāhitaṃ hutvā na vipaccatīti attho. Yo pana pāpakammena
atk-s0402a0:438_4: dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchiyaṃ nibbattitvā upadhisampanno hoti, attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:438_5: tiṭṭhati. Athassa sāmikā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā “nāyaṃ kiliṭṭhakammassānucchaviko”ti
atk-s0402a0:438_6: cittaṃ uppādetvā attano jātaputtaṃ viya bhaṇḍāgārikādiṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā sampattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:438_7: yojetvā pariharanti. Evarūpassa kammaṃ upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:438_8: Yo pana paṭhamakappikakālasadise sulabhasampannarasabhojane subhikkhakāle nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:438_9: tassa vijjamānampi pāpakammaṃ kālasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma. Yo pana sammāpayogaṃ
atk-s0402a0:438_10: nissāya jīvati, upasaṅkamitabbayuttakāle upasaṅkamati, paṭikkamitabbayuttakāle paṭikkamati,
atk-s0402a0:438_11: palāyitabbayuttakāle palāyati. Lañjadānayuttakāle lañjaṃ deti, corikayuttakāle corikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:438_12: karoti, evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ payogasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:439_0: Duggatibhave nibbattassa pana pāpakammaṃ gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma. Yo pana
atk-s0402a0:439_1: dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchismiṃ nibbatto dubbaṇṇo hoti dussaṇṭhāno, “yakkho nu
atk-s0402a0:439_2: kho manusso nu kho”ti vimatiṃ uppādeti. So sace puriso hoti, atha naṃ “nāyaṃ aññassa
atk-s0402a0:439_3: kammassa anucchaviko”ti hatthiṃ vā rakkhāpenti assaṃ vā goṇe vā, tiṇakaṭṭhādīni vā
atk-s0402a0:439_4: āharāpenti, kheḷasarakaṃ vā gaṇhāpenti. Sace itthī hoti, atha naṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:439_5: bhattamāsādīni vā pacāpenti, kacavaraṃ vā chaḍḍāpenti, aññaṃ vā pana jigucchanīyakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:439_6: kārenti. Evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ upadhivipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma. Yo pana dubbhikkhakāle
atk-s0402a0:439_7: vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā nibbattati, tassa pāpakammaṃ kālavipattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:439_8: āgamma vipaccati nāma. Yo pana payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti, upasaṅkamitabbayuttakāle
atk-s0402a0:439_9: upasaṅkamituṃ na jānāti…pe… corikayuttakāle corikaṃ kātuṃ na jānāti, tassa pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:440_0: Yo pana iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva gantvā duggatibhave nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:440_1: tassa taṃ kammaṃ gativipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma. Yo pana puññānubhāvena
atk-s0402a0:440_2: rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ gehe nibbattitvā kāṇo vā hoti kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato
atk-s0402a0:440_3: vā, tassa oparajjasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīni na anucchavikānīti na denti. Iccassa
atk-s0402a0:440_4: taṃ puññaṃ upadhivipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma. Yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle
atk-s0402a0:440_5: vā antarakappe vā manussesu nibbattati, tassa taṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ kālavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:440_6: na vipaccati nāma. Yo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti, tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:441_0: Kalyāṇakammena pana sugatibhave nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati
atk-s0402a0:441_1: nāma. Rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ kule nibbattitvā upadhisampattiṃ pattassa attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:441_2: ṭhitassa devanagare samussitaratanatoraṇasadisaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā “imassa oparajjasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīni
atk-s0402a0:441_3: anucchavikānī”ti daharasseva sato tāni ṭhānantarāni denti, evarūpassa kalyāṇakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:441_4: upadhisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma. Yo paṭhamakappikesu vā sulabhannapānakāle
atk-s0402a0:441_5: vā nibbattati, tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ kālasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma. Yo vuttanayeneva
atk-s0402a0:441_6: payogaṃ sampādetuṃ jānāti, tassa kammaṃ payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:442_0: Aparānipi paṭisambhidāmaggapariyāyena dvādasa kammāni vibhattāni. Seyyathidaṃ – “ahosi
atk-s0402a0:442_1: kammaṃ ahosi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko,
atk-s0402a0:442_2: ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:442_3: na bhavissati kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko,
atk-s0402a0:442_4: atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko, bhavissati
atk-s0402a0:442_5: kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko, bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko”ti.
atk-s0402a0:443_0: Tattha yaṃ kammaṃ atīte āyūhitaṃ atīteyeva vipākavāraṃ labhi, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:443_1: janesi, rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:443_2: vipākavāraṃ na labhi, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:443_3: nāsakkhi, taṃ ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ etarahi
atk-s0402a0:443_4: laddhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetvā
atk-s0402a0:443_5: ṭhitaṃ, taṃ ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ aladdhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:443_6: vā paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi, taṃ ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipākoti
atk-s0402a0:443_7: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:443_8: paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati, taṃ ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti
atk-s0402a0:443_9: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ na labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:443_10: vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati, taṃ ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:444_0: Yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ etarahiyeva vipākavāraṃ labhati, taṃ atthi kammaṃ atthi
atk-s0402a0:444_1: kammavipākoti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana etarahi vipākavāraṃ na labhati, taṃ atthi kammaṃ natthi
atk-s0402a0:444_2: kammavipākoti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:444_3: paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati, taṃ atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti
atk-s0402a0:444_4: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:444_5: vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati, taṃ atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:445_0: Yaṃ panānāgate āyūhissati, anāgateyeva vipākavāraṃ labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:445_1: paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janessati, taṃ bhavissati kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti
atk-s0402a0:445_2: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:445_3: vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati, taṃ bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti
atk-s0402a0:445_4: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapariyāyena dvādasa kammāni vibhattāni.
atk-s0402a0:446_0: Iti imāni ceva dvādasa abhidhammapariyāyena vibhattāni ca soḷasa kammāni attano ṭhānā
atk-s0402a0:446_1: osakkitvā suttantikapariyāyena vuttāni ekādasa kammāniyeva bhavanti. Tānipi tato
atk-s0402a0:446_2: osakkitvā tīṇiyeva kammāni honti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ, upapajjavedanīyaṃ, aparapariyāyavedanīyanti.
atk-s0402a0:446_3: Tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthi, yathāṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhanti. Yadi hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:446_4: kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya, “diṭṭhe vā dhamme”ti
atk-s0402a0:446_5: satthā na vadeyya. Sacepi upapajjavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:446_6: vā bhaveyya, “upapajja vā”ti satthā na vadeyya. Athāpi aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:446_7: vā upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya, “apare vā pariyāye”ti satthā na vadeyya.
atk-s0402a0:447_0: Sukkapakkhepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Ettha pana lobhe vigateti lobhe apagate
atk-s0402a0:447_1: niruddhe. Tālavatthukatanti tālavatthu viya kataṃ, matthakacchinnatālo viya puna
atk-s0402a0:447_2: aviruḷhisabhāvaṃ katanti attho. Anabhāvaṃ katanti anuabhāvaṃ kataṃ, yathā puna nuppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:447_3: evaṃ katanti attho. Evassūti evaṃ bhaveyyuṃ. Evameva khoti ettha bījāni viya kusalākusalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:447_4: kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tāni agginā ḍahanapuriso viya yogāvacaro, aggi viya maggañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:447_5: aggiṃ datvā bījānaṃ ḍahanakālo viya maggañāṇena kilesānaṃ daḍḍhakālo, masikatakālo
atk-s0402a0:447_6: viya pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ chinnamūlake katvā ṭhapitakālo, mahāvāte opunitvā nadiyā
atk-s0402a0:447_7: vā pavāhetvā appavattikatakālo viya upādinnakasantānassa nirodhena chinnamūlakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:447_8: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvena nirujjhitvā puna bhavasmiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:448_0: Mohajañcāpaviddasūti mohajañcāpi aviddasu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ so avidū andhabālo
atk-s0402a0:448_1: lobhajañca dosajañca mohajañcāti kammaṃ karoti, evaṃ karontena yaṃ tena pakataṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:448_2: appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ. Idheva taṃ vedaniyanti taṃ kammaṃ tena bālena idha sake attabhāveyeva
atk-s0402a0:448_3: vedanīyaṃ, tasseva taṃ attabhāve vipaccatīti attho. Vatthuṃ aññaṃ na vijjatīti tassa
atk-s0402a0:448_4: kammassa vipaccanatthāya aññaṃ vatthu natthi. Na hi aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa attabhāve
atk-s0402a0:448_5: vipaccati. Tasmā lobhañca dosañca, mohajañcāpi viddasūti tasmā yo vidū medhāvī paṇḍito
atk-s0402a0:448_6: taṃ lobhajādibhedaṃ kammaṃ na karoti, so vijjaṃ uppādayaṃ bhikkhu, sabbā duggatiyo
atk-s0402a0:448_7: jahe, arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vā pana vijjaṃ uppādento sabbā duggatiyo
atk-s0402a0:448_8: jahati. Desanāsīsamevetaṃ, sugatiyopi pana so khīṇāsavo jahatiyeva. Yampi cetaṃ “tasmā
atk-s0402a0:448_9: lobhañca dosañcā”ti vuttaṃ, etthāpi lobhadosasīsena lobhajañca dosajañca kammameva
atk-s0402a0:448_10: niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ suttantesupi gāthāyapi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:450_0: 35. Pañcame āḷaviyanti āḷaviraṭṭhe. Gomaggeti gunnaṃ gamanamagge. Paṇṇasanthareti
atk-s0402a0:450_1: sayaṃ patitapaṇṇasanthare. Athāti evaṃ gunnaṃ gamanamaggaṃ ujuṃ mahāpathaṃ nissāya
atk-s0402a0:450_2: siṃsapāvane sayaṃ patitapaṇṇāni saṅkaḍḍhitvā katasanthare sugatamahācīvaraṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0402a0:450_3: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinne tathāgate. Hatthako āḷavakoti hatthato hatthaṃ gatattā
atk-s0402a0:450_4: evaṃladdhanāmo āḷavako rājaputto. Etadavocāti etaṃ “kacci, bhante, bhagavā”tiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:450_5: avoca. Kasmā pana sammāsambuddho taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā nisinno, kasmā rājakumāro tattha
atk-s0402a0:450_6: gatoti? Sammāsambuddho tāva aṭṭhuppattikāya dhammadesanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ disvā tattha
atk-s0402a0:450_7: nisinno, rājakumāropi pātova uṭṭhāya pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:450_8: gacchanto mahāmaggā okkamma gopathaṃ gahetvā “buddhānaṃ pūjanatthāya missakamālaṃ
atk-s0402a0:450_9: ocinissāmī”ti gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0402a0:450_10: evaṃ so tattha gatoti. Sukhamasayitthāti sukhaṃ sayittha.
atk-s0402a0:451_0: Antaraṭṭhakoti māghaphagguṇānaṃ antare aṭṭhadivasaparimāṇo kālo. Māghassa hi avasāne
atk-s0402a0:451_1: cattāro divasā, phagguṇassa ādimhi cattāroti ayaṃ “antaraṭṭhako”ti vuccati. Himapātasamayoti
atk-s0402a0:451_2: himassa patanasamayo. Kharāti pharusā kakkhaḷā vā. Gokaṇṭakahatāti navavuṭṭhe deve
atk-s0402a0:451_3: gāvīnaṃ akkantakkantaṭṭhāne khurantarehi kaddamo uggantvā tiṭṭhati, so vātātapena
atk-s0402a0:451_4: sukkho kakacadantasadiso hoti dukkhasamphasso. Taṃ sandhāyāha – “gokaṇṭakahatā bhūmī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:451_5: Gunnaṃ khurantarehi chinnātipi attho. Verambho vāto vāyatīti catūhi disāhi vāyanto
atk-s0402a0:451_6: vāto vāyati. Ekāya disāya vā dvīhi vā disāhi tīhi vā disāhi vāyanto vāto verambhoti na vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:452_0: Tena hi rājakumārāti idaṃ satthā “ayaṃ rājakumāro lokasmiṃ neva sukhavāsino, na dukkhavāsino
atk-s0402a0:452_1: jānāti, jānāpessāmi na”nti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento āha. Tattha yathā te khameyyāti
atk-s0402a0:452_2: yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya. Idhassāti imasmiṃ loke assa. Gonakatthatoti caturaṅgulādhikalomena
atk-s0402a0:452_3: kāḷakojavena atthato. Paṭikatthatoti uṇṇāmayena setattharaṇena atthato. Paṭalikatthatoti
atk-s0402a0:452_5: uttamapaccattharaṇena atthato. Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:452_6: attharitvā sibbitvā karonti. Sauttaracchadoti saha uttaracchadena, upari baddhena
atk-s0402a0:452_7: rattavitānena saddhinti attho. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānoti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti
atk-s0402a0:452_8: pallaṅkassa ubhato ṭhapitalohitakūpadhāno. Pajāpatiyoti bhariyāyo. Manāpena paccupaṭṭhitā
atk-s0402a0:453_0: Kāyikāti pañcadvārakāyaṃ khobhayamānā. Cetasikāti manodvāraṃ khobhayamānā. So rāgo
atk-s0402a0:453_1: tathāgatassa pahīnoti tathārūpo rāgo tathāgatassa pahīnoti attho. Yo pana tassa rāgo,
atk-s0402a0:453_2: na so tathāgatassa pahīno nāma. Dosamohesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:454_0: Brāhmaṇoti bāhitapāpo khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo. Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.
atk-s0402a0:454_1: Na limpati kāmesūti vatthukāmesu ca kilesakāmesu ca taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi na limpati.
atk-s0402a0:454_2: Sītibhūtoti abbhantare tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvena sītibhūto. Nirūpadhīti kilesūpadhīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:454_3: abhāvena nirūpadhi. Sabbā āsattiyo chetvāti āsattiyo vuccanti taṇhāyo, tā sabbāpi
atk-s0402a0:454_4: rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu āsattavisattā āsattiyo chinditvā. Vineyya hadaye daranti hadayanissitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:454_5: darathaṃ vinayitvā vūpasametvā. Santiṃ pappuyya cetasoti cittassa kilesanibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:454_6: pāpuṇitvā. Karaṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ “sabbacetaso samannāharitvā”tiādīsu viya, cetasā
atk-s0402a0:456_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe devadūtānīti devadūtā. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho – devoti maccu, tassa
atk-s0402a0:456_1: dūtāti devadūtā. Jiṇṇabyādhimatā hi saṃvegajananaṭṭhena “idāni te maccusamīpaṃ gantabba”nti
atk-s0402a0:456_2: codenti viya, tasmā devadūtāti vuccanti. Devā viya dūtātipi devadūtā. Yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya
atk-s0402a0:456_3: devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā “tvaṃ asukadivase marissasī”ti vutte tassā vacanaṃ saddhātabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:456_4: hoti; evamevaṃ jiṇṇabyādhimatāpi dissamānā “tvampi evaṃdhammo”ti codenti viya, tesañca
atk-s0402a0:456_5: taṃ vacanaṃ anaññathābhāvitāya devatāya byākaraṇasadisameva hotīti devā viya dūtāti
atk-s0402a0:456_6: devadūtā. Visuddhidevānaṃ dūtātipi devadūtā. Sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite
atk-s0402a0:456_7: disvāva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā nikkhamma pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ visuddhidevānaṃ dūtātipi devadūtā.
atk-s0402a0:457_1: Iminā hi kammena ayaṃ satto niraye nibbattati, atha naṃ tattha yamo rājā devadūte
atk-s0402a0:457_2: samanuyuñjati. Tattha kāyena duccaritaṃ caratīti kāyadvārena tividhaṃ duccaritaṃ
atk-s0402a0:457_3: carati. Vācāyāti vacīdvārena catubbidhaṃ duccaritaṃ carati. Manasāti manodvārena
atk-s0402a0:458_0: Tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālāti ettha ekacce therā “nirayapālā nāma natthi, yantarūpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:458_1: viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti vadanti. Taṃ “atthi niraye nirayapālāti, āmantā.
atk-s0402a0:458_2: Atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva. Yathā hi manussaloke
atk-s0402a0:458_3: kammakāraṇakārakā atthi, evameva niraye nirayapālā atthīti. Yamassa raññoti yamarājā
atk-s0402a0:458_5: anubhavati, ekasmiṃ kāle kammavipākaṃ, dhammiko rājā, na cesa ekova hoti, catūsu
atk-s0402a0:458_6: pana dvāresu cattāro janā honti. Amatteyyoti mātu hito matteyyo, mātari sammā paṭipannoti
atk-s0402a0:458_7: attho. Na matteyyoti amatteyyo, mātari micchā paṭipannoti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva
atk-s0402a0:458_8: nayo. Abrahmaññoti ettha ca khīṇāsavā brāhmaṇā nāma, tesu micchā paṭipanno abrahmañño nāma.
atk-s0402a0:459_0: Samanuyuñjatīti anuyogavattaṃ āropento pucchati, laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpento pana samanuggāhati
atk-s0402a0:459_1: nāma, kāraṇaṃ pucchanto samanubhāsati nāma. Nāddasanti attano santike pahitassa kassaci
atk-s0402a0:460_0: Atha naṃ yamo “nāyaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ sallakkhetī”ti ñatvā atthaṃ sallakkhāpetukāmo
atk-s0402a0:460_1: ambhotiādimāha. Tattha jiṇṇanti jarājiṇṇaṃ. Gopānasivaṅkanti gopānasī viya vaṅkaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:460_2: Bhogganti bhaggaṃ. Imināpissa vaṅkabhāvameva dīpeti. Daṇḍaparāyaṇanti daṇḍapaṭisaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:460_3: daṇḍadutiyaṃ. Pavedhamānanti kampamānaṃ. Āturanti jarāturaṃ. Khaṇḍadantanti jarānubhāvena
atk-s0402a0:460_4: khaṇḍitadantaṃ. Palitakesanti paṇḍarakesaṃ. Vilūnanti luñcitvā gahitakesaṃ viya khallāṭaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:460_5: Khalitasiranti mahākhallāṭasīsaṃ. Valitanti sañjātavaliṃ. Tilakāhatagattanti setatilakakāḷatilakehi
atk-s0402a0:460_6: vikiṇṇasarīraṃ. Jarādhammoti jarāsabhāvo, aparimutto jarāya, jarā nāma mayhaṃ abbhantareyeva
atk-s0402a0:460_7: pavattatīti. Parato byādhidhammo maraṇadhammoti padadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:461_0: Paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvāti ettha jarājiṇṇasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma
atk-s0402a0:461_1: – “passatha, bho, ahampi tumhe viya taruṇo ahosiṃ ūrubalī bāhubalī javasampanno,
atk-s0402a0:461_2: tassa me tā balajavasampattiyo antarahitā, vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:461_3: na karonti, jarāyamhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. Na kho panāhameva, tumhepi jarāya
atk-s0402a0:461_4: aparimuttāva. Yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi jarā āgamissati. Iti tassā pure
atk-s0402a0:461_5: āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Tenevesa devadūto nāma jāto. Ābādhikanti bādhikaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:462_0: Dutiyaṃ devadūtanti etthapi gilānasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma – “passatha, bho,
atk-s0402a0:462_1: ahampi tumhe viya nirogo ahosiṃ, somhi etarahi byādhinā abhihato, sake muttakarīse
atk-s0402a0:462_2: palipanno, uṭṭhātumpi na sakkomi. Vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0402a0:462_3: byādhitomhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. Na kho panāhameva, tumhepi byādhito aparimuttāva.
atk-s0402a0:462_4: Yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi byādhi āgamissati. Iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:463_0: Ekāhamatantiādīsu ekāhaṃ matassa assāti ekāhamato, taṃ ekāhamataṃ. Parato padadvayepi
atk-s0402a0:463_1: eseva nayo. Bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathākkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:463_2: uddhumātattā uddhumātakaṃ. Vinīlo vuccati viparibhinnavaṇṇo, vinīlova vinīlako, taṃ
atk-s0402a0:463_3: vinīlakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ. Vipubbakanti vissandamānapubbakaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:463_4: paribhinnaṭṭhāne hi paggharitena pubbena palimakkhitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:464_0: Tatiyaṃ devadūtanti ettha matakasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma – “passatha, bho,
atk-s0402a0:464_1: maṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvappattaṃ, maraṇatomhi aparimuttatāya ediso
atk-s0402a0:464_2: jāto. Na kho panāhameva, tumhepi maraṇato aparimuttā. Yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi
atk-s0402a0:464_3: maraṇaṃ āgamissati. Iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Tenevassa devadūto nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a0:465_0: Imaṃ pana devadūtānuyogaṃ ko labhati, ko na labhati? Yena tāva bahuṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:465_1: so gantvā niraye nibbattatiyeva. Yena pana parittaṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ, so labhati. Yathā
atk-s0402a0:465_2: hi sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gahetvā kattabbameva karonti na vinicchinanti. Anuvijjitvā gahitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:465_3: pana vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ nayanti, so vinicchayaṃ labhati. Evaṃsampadametaṃ. Parittapāpakammā
atk-s0402a0:465_4: hi attano dhammatāyapi saranti, sārīyamānāpi saranti.
atk-s0402a0:466_0: Tattha dīghajayantadamiḷo nāma attano dhammatāya sari. So kira damiḷo sumanagirimahāvihāre
atk-s0402a0:466_1: ākāsacetiyaṃ rattapaṭena pūjesi, atha niraye ussadasāmante nibbatto aggijālasaddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:466_2: sutvāva attanā pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari, so gantvā sagge nibbatto. Aparopi puttassa daharabhikkhuno
atk-s0402a0:466_3: khalisāṭakaṃ dento pādamūle ṭhapesi, maraṇakālamhi paṭapaṭāti sadde nimittaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0402a0:466_4: sopi ussadasāmante nibbatto jālasaddena taṃ sāṭakaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatto. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:466_5: tāva attano dhammatāya kusalaṃ kammaṃ saritvā sagge nibbattatīti.
atk-s0402a0:467_0: Attano dhammatāya asarante pana tayo devadūte pucchati. Tattha koci paṭhamena devadūtena
atk-s0402a0:467_1: sarati, koci dutiyatatiyehi, koci tīhipi nassarati. Taṃ yamo rājā disvā sayaṃ sāreti.
atk-s0402a0:467_2: Eko kira amacco sumanapupphakumbhena mahācetiyaṃ pūjetvā yamassa pattiṃ adāsi, taṃ
atk-s0402a0:467_3: akusalakammena niraye nibbattaṃ yamassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu. Tasmiṃ tīhipi devadūtehi
atk-s0402a0:467_4: kusalaṃ asarante yamo sayaṃ olokento disvā – “nanu tvaṃ mahācetiyaṃ sumanapupphakumbhena
atk-s0402a0:467_5: pūjetvā mayhaṃ pattiṃ adāsī”ti sāresi, so tasmiṃ kāle saritvā devalokaṃ gato. Yamo
atk-s0402a0:467_6: pana sayaṃ oloketvāpi apassanto – “mahādukkhaṃ nāma anubhavissati ayaṃ satto”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:468_0: Tattaṃ ayokhilanti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:468_1: dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti, tathā vāmahatthādīsu. Yathā ca taṃ
atk-s0402a0:468_2: uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā, evaṃ urenapi vāmapassenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:468_3: te taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva. Saṃvesetvāti jalitāya lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:468_4: nipajjāpetvā. Kuṭhārīhīti mahatīhi gehassa ekapakkhacchadanamattāhi kuṭhārīhi tacchanti,
atk-s0402a0:468_5: lohitaṃ nadī hutvā sandati, lohapathavito jālā uṭṭhahitvā tacchitaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a0:468_6: mahādukkhaṃ uppajjati. Tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dāruṃ viya aṭṭhaṃsampi chaḷaṃsampi
atk-s0402a0:468_7: karonti. Vāsīhīti mahāsuppappamāṇāhi vāsīhi. Rathe yojetvāti saddhiṃ yugayottapakkharathacakkakubbarapājanehi
atk-s0402a0:468_8: sabbato pajjalite rathe yojetvā. Mahantanti mahākūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ. Āropentīti sampajjalitehi
atk-s0402a0:468_9: ayamuggarehi pothentā āropenti. Sakimpi uddhanti supakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulā
atk-s0402a0:469_0: Bhāgaso mitoti bhāge ṭhapetvā vibhatto. Pariyantoti parikkhitto. Ayasāti upari ayapaṭṭena
atk-s0402a0:469_1: chādito. Samantā yojanasataṃ, pharitvā tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, yathā taṃ
atk-s0402a0:469_2: samantā yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā viya nikkhamanti.
atk-s0402a0:470_0: Hīnakāyūpagāti hīnaṃ kāyaṃ upagatā hutvā. Upādāneti taṇhādiṭṭhiggahaṇe. Jātimaraṇasambhaveti
atk-s0402a0:470_1: jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca kāraṇabhūte. Anupādāti catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā. Jātimaraṇasaṅkhayeti
atk-s0402a0:470_3: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesanibbānena nibbutā. Sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagunti sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā.
atk-s0402a0:472_0: 37. Sattame amaccā pārisajjāti paricārikadevatā. Imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantīti aṭṭhamīdivase
atk-s0402a0:472_1: kira sakko devarājā cattāro mahārājāno āṇāpeti – “tātā, ajja aṭṭhamīdivase manussalokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:472_2: anuvicaritvā puññāni karontānaṃ nāmagottaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti. Te gantvā attano
atk-s0402a0:472_3: paricārake pesenti – “gacchatha, tātā, manussalokaṃ vicaritvā puññakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni
atk-s0402a0:472_4: suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā ānethā”ti. Te tathā karonti. Tena vuttaṃ – “imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:472_5: Kacci bahūtiādi tesaṃ upaparikkhākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ upaparikkhantā hi
atk-s0402a0:472_6: te anuvicaranti. Tattha uposathaṃ upavasantīti māsassa aṭṭhavāre uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0402a0:472_7: Paṭijāgarontīti paṭijāgarauposathakammaṃ nāma karonti. Taṃ karontā ekasmiṃ addhamāse
atk-s0402a0:472_9: paccuggacchantā catutthiyaṃ uposathikā honti, anugacchantā chaṭṭhiyaṃ. Aṭṭhamīuposathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:472_10: paccuggacchantā sattamiyaṃ, anugacchantā navamiyaṃ. Cātuddasiṃ paccuggacchantā terasiyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:472_11: pannarasīuposathaṃ anugacchantā pāṭipade uposathikā honti. Puññāni karontīti saraṇagamananiccasīlapupphapūjādhammassavanapadīpasahassaāropanavihārakaraṇādīni
atk-s0402a0:472_12: nānappakārāni puññāni karonti. Te evaṃ anuvicaritvā puññakammakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni
atk-s0402a0:472_13: sovaṇṇamaye paṭṭe likhitvā āharitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ denti. Puttā imaṃ lokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:472_14: anuvicarantīti catūhi mahārājehi purimanayeneva pahitattā anuvicaranti. Tadahūti
atk-s0402a0:473_0: Sace, bhikkhave, appakā hontīti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā tā tā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo
atk-s0402a0:473_1: upasaṅkamanti, tato taṃ upanissāya adhivatthā devatā “mahārājānaṃ amaccā āgatā”ti
atk-s0402a0:473_2: paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti. Te paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā “kacci nu kho
atk-s0402a0:473_3: mārisā bahū manussā matteyyā”ti vuttanayena manussānaṃ puññapaṭipattiṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0402a0:473_4: “āma, mārisa, imasmiṃ gāme asuko ca asuko ca puññāni karontī”ti vutte tesaṃ nāmagottaṃ
atk-s0402a0:473_5: likhitvā aññattha gacchanti. Atha cātuddasiyaṃ catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ puttāpi tameva
atk-s0402a0:473_6: suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā teneva nayena anuvicarantā nāmagottāni likhanti. Tadahuposathe
atk-s0402a0:473_7: pannarase cattāropi mahārājāno teneva nayena tasmiṃyeva suvaṇṇapaṭṭe nāmagottāni
atk-s0402a0:473_8: likhanti. Te suvaṇṇapaṭṭaparimāṇeneva – “imasmiṃ kāle manussā appakā, imasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0402a0:473_9: bahukā”ti jānanti. Taṃ sandhāya “sace, bhikkhave, appakā honti manussā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:473_10: Devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānanti paṭhamaṃ abhinibbatte tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya evaṃladdhanāmānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:473_11: Tesaṃ pana uppattikathā dīghanikāye sakkapañhasuttavaṇṇanāya vitthāritā. Tenāti tena
atk-s0402a0:473_12: ārocanena, tena vā puññakārakānaṃ appakabhāvena. Dibbā vata, bho, kāyā parihāyissantīti
atk-s0402a0:473_13: navanavānaṃ devaputtānaṃ apātubhāvena devakāyā parihāyissanti, ramaṇīyaṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ
atk-s0402a0:473_14: devanagaraṃ suññaṃ bhavissati. Paripūrissanti asurakāyāti cattāro apāyā paripūrissanti.
atk-s0402a0:473_15: Iminā “mayaṃ paripuṇṇe devanagare devasaṅghamajjhe nakkhattaṃ kīḷituṃ na labhissāmā”ti
atk-s0402a0:473_16: anattamanā honti. Sukkapakkhepi imināva upāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:474_0: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindoti attano sakkadevarājakālaṃ sandhāya katheti.
atk-s0402a0:474_1: Ekassa vā sakkassa ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetīti vuttaṃ. Anunayamānoti anubodhayamāno.
atk-s0402a0:475_0: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti ettha pāṭihāriyapakkho nāma antovasse temāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho,
atk-s0402a0:475_1: taṃ asakkontassa dvinnaṃ pavāraṇānaṃ antare ekamāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho, tampi asakkontassa
atk-s0402a0:475_2: paṭhamapavāraṇato paṭṭhāya eko addhamāso pāṭihāriyapakkhoyeva nāma. Aṭṭhaṅgasusamāgatanti
atk-s0402a0:475_3: aṭṭhahi guṇaṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:475_4: Sakkopi kira vuttappakārassa uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānitvā dve devalokasampattiyo
atk-s0402a0:475_5: pahāya māsassa aṭṭha vāre uposathaṃ upavasati. Tasmā evamāha. Aparo nayo – yopissa
atk-s0402a0:475_6: mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso assa, mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti
atk-s0402a0:475_7: attho. Sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena sakkasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a0:476_0: Vusitavāti vutthavāso. Katakaraṇīyoti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:476_2: sadattho vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃ anuppatto. Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanoti yena saṃyojanena
atk-s0402a0:476_3: baddho bhavesu ākaḍḍhīyati, tassa khīṇattā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano. Sammadaññā vimuttoti
atk-s0402a0:476_4: hetunā nayena kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto. Kallaṃ vacanāyāti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:477_0: Yopissa mādiso naroti yopi mādiso khīṇāsavo assa, sopi evarūpaṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyāti
atk-s0402a0:477_1: uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānanto evaṃ vadeyya. Aparo nayo yopissa mādiso naroti yopi
atk-s0402a0:477_2: satto mādiso assa, mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho. Sakkā hi evarūpena
atk-s0402a0:477_3: uposathakammena khīṇāsavasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo. Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:479_0: 39. Navame sukhumāloti niddukkho. Paramasukhumāloti paramaniddukkho. Accantasukhumāloti
atk-s0402a0:479_1: satataniddukkho. Imaṃ bhagavā kapilapure nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya niddukkhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:479_2: gahetvā āha, cariyakāle pana tena anubhūtadukkhassa anto natthīti. Ekatthāti ekissā
atk-s0402a0:479_3: pokkharaṇiyā. Uppalaṃ vappatīti uppalaṃ ropeti. Sā nīluppalavanasañchannā hoti. Padumanti
atk-s0402a0:479_4: paṇḍarapadumaṃ. Puṇḍarīkanti rattapadumaṃ. Evaṃ itarāpi dve padumapuṇḍarīkavanehi
atk-s0402a0:479_5: sañchannā honti. Bodhisattassa kira sattaṭṭhavassikakāle rājā amacce pucchi – “taruṇadārakā
atk-s0402a0:479_6: katarakīḷikaṃ piyāyantī”ti? Udakakīḷikaṃ devāti. Tato rājā kuddālakammakārake sannipātetvā
atk-s0402a0:479_7: pokkharaṇiṭṭhānāni gaṇhāpesi. Atha sakko devarājā āvajjento taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0402a0:479_8: “na yutto mahāsattassa mānusakaparibhogo, dibbaparibhogo yutto”ti vissakammaṃ āmantetvā
atk-s0402a0:479_9: – “gaccha, tāta, mahāsattassa kīḷābhūmiyaṃ pokkharaṇiyo māpehī”ti āha. Kīdisā hontu,
atk-s0402a0:479_12: samannāgatā. Suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayā cettha nāvā hontu, suvaṇṇanāvāya rajatapallaṅko
atk-s0402a0:479_13: hotu, rajatanāvāya suvaṇṇapallaṅko, maṇināvāya pavāḷapallaṅko, pavāḷanāvāya maṇipallaṅko,
atk-s0402a0:479_14: suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayāva udakasecananāḷikā hontu, pañcavaṇṇehi ca padumehi sañchannā
atk-s0402a0:479_15: hontūti. “Sādhu, devā”ti vissakammadevaputto sakkassa paṭissutvā rattibhāge otaritvā
atk-s0402a0:479_16: rañño gāhāpitapokkharaṇiṭṭhānesuyeva teneva niyāmena pokkharaṇiyo māpesi.
atk-s0402a0:480_0: Nanu cetā apagatakalalakaddamā, kathamettha padumāni pupphiṃsūti? So kira tāsu pokkharaṇīsu
atk-s0402a0:480_1: tattha tattha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayā khuddakanāvāyo māpetvā “etā kalalakaddamapūritā
atk-s0402a0:480_2: ca hontu, pañcavaṇṇāni cettha padumāni pupphantū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ pañcavaṇṇāni
atk-s0402a0:480_3: padumāni pupphiṃsu, reṇuvaṭṭiyo uggantvā udakapiṭṭhaṃ ajjhottharitvā vicaranti. Pañcavidhā
atk-s0402a0:480_4: bhamaragaṇā upakūjantā vicaranti. Evaṃ tā māpetvā vissakammo devapurameva gato. Tato
atk-s0402a0:480_5: vibhātāya rattiyā mahājano disvā “mahāpurissassa māpitā bhavissantī”ti gantvā rañño
atk-s0402a0:480_6: ārocesi. Rājā mahājanaparivāro gantvā pokkharaṇiyo disvā “mama puttassa puññiddhiyā
atk-s0402a0:480_7: devatāhi māpitā bhavissantī”ti attamano ahosi. Tato paṭṭhāya mahāpuriso udakakīḷikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:481_0: Yāvadeva mamatthāyāti ettha yāvadevāti payojanāvadhiniyāmavacanaṃ, yāva mameva atthāya,
atk-s0402a0:481_1: natthettha aññaṃ kāraṇanti attho. Na kho panassāhanti na kho panassa ahaṃ. Akāsikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:481_2: candananti asaṇhaṃ candanaṃ. Kāsikaṃ, bhikkhave, su me taṃ veṭhananti, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:481_3: veṭhanampi me kāsikaṃ hoti. Ettha hi suiti ca tanti ca nipātamattaṃ, meti sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:481_4: Veṭhanampi me saṇhameva hotīti dasseti. Kāsikā kañcukāti pārupanakañcukopi saṇhakañcukova.
atk-s0402a0:481_6: hoti. Mā naṃ phusi sītaṃ vāti mā etaṃ bodhisattaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhādīsu vā aññataraṃ phusatūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:482_0: Tayo pāsādā ahesunti bodhisatte kira soḷasavassuddesike jāte suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa
atk-s0402a0:482_1: vasanakapāsāde kāressāmī”ti vaḍḍhakino sannipātāpetvā bhaddakena nakkhattamuhuttena
atk-s0402a0:482_2: navabhūmikataparikammaṃ kāretvā tayo pāsāde kārāpesi. Te sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Hemantikotiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:482_3: yattha sukhaṃ hemante vasituṃ, ayaṃ hemantiko. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panettha
atk-s0402a0:482_4: vacanattho – hemante vāso hemantaṃ, hemantaṃ arahatīti hemantiko. Itaresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:483_0: Tattha hemantiko pāsādo navabhūmako ahosi, bhūmiyo panassa uṇhautuggāhāpanatthāya
atk-s0402a0:483_1: nīcā ahesuṃ. Tattha dvāravātapānāni suphusitakavāṭāni ahesuṃ nibbivarāni. Cittakammampi
atk-s0402a0:483_2: karontā tattha tattha pajjalite aggikkhandheyeva akaṃsu. Bhūmattharaṇaṃ panettha
atk-s0402a0:484_0: Gimhiko pana pañcabhūmako ahosi. Sītautuggāhāpanatthaṃ panettha bhūmiyo uccā asambādhā
atk-s0402a0:484_1: ahesuṃ. Dvāravātapānāni nātiphusitāni savivarāni sajālāni ahesuṃ. Cittakamme uppalāni
atk-s0402a0:484_2: padumāni puṇḍarīkāniyeva akaṃsu. Bhūmattharaṇaṃ panettha dukūlamayaṃ, tathā sāṇivitānanivāsanapārupanaveṭhanāni.
atk-s0402a0:484_3: Vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti.
atk-s0402a0:484_4: Tesu tesu padesesu udakayantāni karonti, yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0402a0:484_5: Antopāsāde tattha tattha kalalapūrā doṇiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni ropayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:484_6: Pāsādamatthake sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ bandhitvā yantaṃ parivattetvā yāva chadanapiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0402a0:484_7: pāsāṇe āropetvā tasmiṃ vissajjenti. Tesaṃ camme pavaṭṭantānaṃ saddo meghagajjitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:484_8: viya hoti. Dvāravātapānāni panettha divā pihitāni honti rattiṃ vivaṭāni.
atk-s0402a0:485_0: Vassiko sattabhūmako ahosi. Bhūmiyo panettha dvinnampi utūnaṃ gāhāpanatthāya nātiuccā
atk-s0402a0:485_1: nātinīcā akaṃsu. Ekaccāni dvāravātapānāni suphusitāni, ekaccāni savivarāni. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:485_2: cittakammampi kesuci ṭhānesu pajjalitaaggikkhandhavasena, kesuci jātassaravasena
atk-s0402a0:485_3: kataṃ. Bhūmattharaṇādīni panettha kambaladukūlavasena ubhayamissakāni. Ekacce dvāravātapānā
atk-s0402a0:485_4: rattiṃ vivaṭā divā pihitā, ekacce divā vivaṭā rattiṃ pihitā. Tayopi pāsādā ubbedhena
atk-s0402a0:486_0: Evaṃ niṭṭhitesu pāsādesu rājā cintesi – “putto me vayappatto, chattamassa ussāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:486_1: rajjasiriṃ passissāmī”ti. So sākiyānaṃ paṇṇāni pahiṇi – “putto me vayappatto, rajje
atk-s0402a0:486_2: naṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmi, sabbe attano attano gehesu vayappattā, dārikā imaṃ gehaṃ pesentū”ti.
atk-s0402a0:486_3: Te sāsanaṃ sutvā – “kumāro kevalaṃ dassanakkhamo rūpasampanno, na kiñci sippaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:486_4: dārabharaṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati, na mayaṃ dhītaro dassāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:486_5: sutvā puttassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocesi. Bodhisatto “kiṃ sippaṃ dassetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:486_6: tātā”ti āha. Sahassathāmadhanuṃ āropetuṃ vaṭṭati, tātāti. Tena hi āharāpethāti. Rājā
atk-s0402a0:486_7: āharāpetvā adāsi. Dhanuṃ purisasahassaṃ āropeti, purisasahassaṃ oropeti. Mahāpuriso
atk-s0402a0:486_8: dhanuṃ āharāpetvā pallaṅke nisinnova jiyaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhake veṭhetvā kaḍḍhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakeneva
atk-s0402a0:486_9: dhanuṃ āropetvā vāmena hatthena daṇḍe gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kaḍḍhitvā jiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:486_10: pothesi. Sakalanagaraṃ uppatanākārappattaṃ ahosi. “Kiṃ saddo eso”ti ca vutte “devo
atk-s0402a0:486_11: gajjatī”ti āhaṃsu. Athaññe “tumhe na jānātha, na devo gajjati, aṅgīrasassa kumārassa
atk-s0402a0:486_12: sahassathāmadhanuṃ āropetvā jiyaṃ pothentassa jiyappahārasaddo eso”ti āhaṃsu. Sākiyā
atk-s0402a0:487_0: Mahāpuriso “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Aṭṭhaṅgulamattabahalaṃ ayopaṭṭaṃ kaṇḍena
atk-s0402a0:487_1: vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Caturaṅgulabahalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:487_2: asanaphalakaṃ vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:487_3: āha. Vidatthibahalaṃ udumbaraphalakaṃ vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Taṃ vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0402a0:487_4: “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Yante baddhaṃ phalakasataṃ vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0402a0:487_5: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Saṭṭhipaṭalaṃ sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:487_6: vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Tampi vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Tato
atk-s0402a0:487_7: vālikasakaṭādīni ācikkhiṃsu. Mahāsatto vālikasakaṭampi palālasakaṭampi vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0402a0:487_8: udake ekusabhappamāṇaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pesesi, thale aṭṭhausabhappamāṇaṃ. Atha naṃ “idāni
atk-s0402a0:487_9: vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu. Tena hi bandhāpethāti. Saddantare
atk-s0402a0:487_10: bajjhatu, tātāti. Purato gacchantu, gāvutantare bandhantūti. Purato gacchantu, addhayojane
atk-s0402a0:487_11: bandhantūti. Purato gacchantu yojane bandhantūti. Bandhāpetha, tātāti yojanamatthake
atk-s0402a0:487_12: vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ bandhāpetvā rattandhakāre meghapaṭalacchannāsu disāsu kaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0402a0:487_13: khipi, taṃ gantvā yojanamatthake vālaṃ phāletvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. Na kevalañca ettakameva,
atk-s0402a0:487_14: taṃ divasaṃ pana mahāsatto loke vattamānasippaṃ sabbameva sandassesi. Sakyarājāno
atk-s0402a0:487_15: attano attano dhītaro alaṅkaritvā pesayiṃsu, cattālīsasahassanāṭakitthiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:487_16: Mahāpuriso tīsu pāsādesu devo maññe paricārento mahāsampattiṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0402a0:488_0: Nippurisehīti purisavirahitehi. Na kevalaṃ cettha tūriyāneva nippurisāni, sabbaṭṭhānānipi
atk-s0402a0:488_1: nippurisāneva. Dovārikāpi itthiyova, nhāpanādiparikammakarāpi itthiyova. Rājā kira
atk-s0402a0:488_2: “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:488_3: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesi. Paricārayamānoti modamāno.
atk-s0402a0:488_4: Na heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohāmīti pāsādato heṭṭhā na otarāmi. Iti maṃ cattāro māse añño
atk-s0402a0:488_5: sikhābaddho puriso nāma passituṃ nālattha. Yathāti yena niyāmena. Dāsakammakaraporisassāti
atk-s0402a0:489_0: Evarūpāya iddhiyāti evaṃjātikāya puññiddhiyā samannāgatassa. Evarūpena ca sukhumālenāti
atk-s0402a0:489_1: evaṃjātikena ca niddukkhabhāvena. Sokhumālenātipi pāṭho. Evaṃ tathāgato ettakena
atk-s0402a0:489_2: ṭhānena attano sirisampattiṃ kathesi. Kathento ca na uppilāvitabhāvatthaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0402a0:489_3: “evarūpāyapi pana sampattiyā ṭhito pamādaṃ akatvā appamattova ahosi”nti appamādalakkhaṇasseva
atk-s0402a0:489_4: dīpanatthaṃ kathesi. Teneva assutavā kho puthujjanotiādimāha. Tattha paranti parapuggalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:489_5: Jiṇṇanti jarājiṇṇaṃ. Aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭo pīḷito hoti. Harāyatīti hiriṃ karoti lajjati.
atk-s0402a0:489_6: Jigucchatīti asuciṃ viya disvā jigucchaṃ uppādeti. Attānaṃyeva atisitvāti jarādhammampi
atk-s0402a0:489_7: samānaṃ attānaṃ atikkamitvā aṭṭīyati harāyatīti attho. Jarādhammoti jarāsabhāvo.
atk-s0402a0:489_8: Jaraṃ anatītoti jaraṃ anatikkanto, anto jarāya vattāmi. Iti paṭisañcikkhatoti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:489_9: paccavekkhantassa. Yobbanamadoti yobbanaṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado. Sabbaso pahīyīti
atk-s0402a0:489_10: sabbākārena pahīno. Maggena pahīnasadiso katvā dassito. Na panesa maggena pahīno,
atk-s0402a0:489_11: paṭisaṅkhānena pahīnova kathitoti veditabbo. Bodhisattassa hi devatā jarāpattaṃ dassesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:489_12: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattā antarā mahāsattassa yobbanamado nāma na uppajjati. Sesapadadvayepi
atk-s0402a0:489_13: eseva nayo. Ettha pana ārogyamadoti ahaṃ nirogoti ārogyaṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado.
atk-s0402a0:489_14: Jīvitamadoti ahaṃ ciraṃ jīvīti taṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado. Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāyāti
atk-s0402a0:489_15: sikkhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. Hīnāyāvattatīti hīnāya lāmakāya gihibhāvāya āvattati.
atk-s0402a0:490_0: Yathādhammāti byādhiādīhi yathāsabhāvā. Tathāsantāti yathā santā eva aviparītabyādhiādisabhāvāva
atk-s0402a0:490_1: hutvāti attho. Jigucchantīti parapuggalaṃ jigucchanti. Mama evaṃ vihārinoti mayhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:490_2: evaṃ jigucchāvihārena viharantassa evaṃ jigucchanaṃ nappatirūpaṃ bhaveyya nānucchavikaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:490_3: Sohaṃ evaṃ viharantoti so ahaṃ evaṃ paraṃ jigucchamāno viharanto, evaṃ vā iminā paṭisaṅkhānavihārena
atk-s0402a0:490_4: viharanto. Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhinti sabbūpadhivirahitaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ ñatvā. Sabbe
atk-s0402a0:490_5: made abhibhosmīti sabbe tayopi made abhibhaviṃ samatikkamiṃ. Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khematanti
atk-s0402a0:490_6: nibbāne khemabhāvaṃ disvā. Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematotipi pāṭho, nibbānaṃ khemato
atk-s0402a0:490_7: disvāti attho. Tassa me ahu ussāhoti tassa mayhaṃ taṃ nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:490_8: abhipassantassa ussāho ahu, vāyāmo ahosīti attho. Nāhaṃ bhabbo etarahi, kāmāni paṭisevitunti
atk-s0402a0:490_9: ahaṃ dāni duvidhepi kāme paṭisevituṃ abhabbo. Anivatti bhavissāmīti pabbajjato ca
