atk-s0402a0:490_10: sabbaññutaññāṇato ca na nivattissāmi, anivattako bhavissāmi. Brahmacariyaparāyaṇoti
atk-s0402a0:490_11: maggabrahmacariyaparāyaṇo jātosmīti attho. Iti imāhi gāthāhi mahābodhipallaṅke attano
atk-s0402a0:492_0: 40. Dasame ādhipateyyānīti jeṭṭhakakāraṇato nibbattāni. Attādhipateyyantiādīsu attānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:492_1: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ guṇajātaṃ attādhipateyyaṃ. Lokaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:492_2: lokādhipateyyaṃ. Navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ dhammādhipateyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:492_3: Na iti bhavābhavahetūti iti bhavo, iti bhavoti evaṃ āyatiṃ, na tassa tassa sampattibhavassa
atk-s0402a0:492_4: hetu. Otiṇṇoti anupaviṭṭho. Yassa hi jāti antopaviṭṭhā, so jātiyā otiṇṇo nāma. Jarādīsupi
atk-s0402a0:492_5: eseva nayo. Kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassāti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkharāsissa. Antakiriyā
atk-s0402a0:492_6: paññāyethāti antakaraṇaṃ paricchedaparivaṭumakaraṇaṃ paññāyeyya. Ohāyāti pahāya.
atk-s0402a0:492_7: Pāpiṭṭhatareti lāmakatare. Āraddhanti paggahitaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ, āraddhattāva asallīnaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:492_8: Upaṭṭhitāti catusatipaṭṭhānavasena upaṭṭhitā. Upaṭṭhitattāva asammuṭṭhā. Passaddho
atk-s0402a0:492_9: kāyoti nāmakāyo ca karajakāyo ca passaddho vūpasantadaratho. Passaddhattāva asāraddho.
atk-s0402a0:492_10: Samāhitaṃ cittanti ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ. Sammā āhitattāva
atk-s0402a0:492_11: ekaggaṃ. Adhipatiṃ karitvāti jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā. Suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatīti suddhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:492_12: nimmalaṃ katvā attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggati, gopāyatīti attho. Ayañca yāva arahattamaggā
atk-s0402a0:492_13: pariyāyena suddhamattānaṃ pariharati nāma, phalappattova pana nippariyāyena suddhamattānaṃ pariharati.
atk-s0402a0:493_0: Svākkhātotiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāni. Jānaṃ passaṃ viharantīti taṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:493_1: jānantā passantā viharanti. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi ādhipateyyānīti ettāvatā tīṇi
atk-s0402a0:494_0: Pakubbatoti karontassa. Attā te purisa jānāti, saccaṃ vā yadi vā musāti yaṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:494_1: karosi, taṃ yadi vā yathāsabhāvaṃ yadi vā no yathāsabhāvanti tava attāva jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:494_2: Iminā ca kāraṇena veditabbaṃ “pāpakammaṃ karontassa loke paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:494_3: natthī”ti. Kalyāṇanti sundaraṃ. Atimaññasīti atikkamitvā maññasi. Attānaṃ parigūhasīti
atk-s0402a0:494_4: yathā me attāpi na jānāti, evaṃ naṃ parigūhāmīti vāyamasi. Attādhipateyyakoti attajeṭṭhako.
atk-s0402a0:494_5: Lokādhipoti lokajeṭṭhako. Nipakoti paññavā. Jhāyīti jhāyanto. Dhammādhipoti dhammajeṭṭhako.
atk-s0402a0:494_6: Saccaparakkamoti thiraparakkamo bhūtaparakkamo. Pasayha māranti māraṃ pasahitvā.
atk-s0402a0:494_7: Abhibhuyya antakanti idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Yo ca phusī jātikkhayaṃ padhānavāti
atk-s0402a0:494_8: yo jhāyī padhānavā māraṃ abhibhavitvā jātikkhayaṃ arahattaṃ phusi. So tādisoti so
atk-s0402a0:494_9: tathāvidho tathāsaṇṭhito. Lokavidūti tayo loke vidite pākaṭe katvā ṭhito. Sumedhoti
atk-s0402a0:494_10: supañño. Sabbesu dhammesu atammayo munīti sabbe tebhūmakadhamme taṇhāsaṅkhātāya tammayatāya
atk-s0402a0:494_11: abhāvena atammayo khīṇāsavamuni kadāci katthaci na hīyati na parihīyatīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:496_0: 41. Pañcamassa paṭhame sammukhībhāvāti sammukhībhāvena, vijjamānatāyāti attho. Pasavatīti
atk-s0402a0:496_1: paṭilabhati. Saddhāya sammukhībhāvāti yadi hi saddhā na bhaveyya, deyyadhammo na
atk-s0402a0:496_2: bhaveyya, dakkhiṇeyyasaṅkhātā paṭiggāhakapuggalā na bhaveyyuṃ, kathaṃ puññakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:496_3: kareyya. Tesaṃ pana sammukhībhāvena sakkā kātunti tasmā “saddhāya sammukhībhāvā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:496_4: Ettha ca dve dhammā sulabhā deyyadhammā ceva dakkhiṇeyyā ca, saddhā pana dullabhā.
atk-s0402a0:496_5: Puthujjanassa hi saddhā athāvarā padavārena nānā hoti, teneva mahāmoggallānasadisopi
atk-s0402a0:496_6: aggasāvako pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ asakkonto āha – “dvinnaṃ kho te ahaṃ, āvuso, dhammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:496_7: pāṭibhogo bhogānañca jīvitassa ca, saddhāya pana tvaṃyeva pāṭibhogo”ti.
atk-s0402a0:498_1: Payatapāṇīti dhotahattho. Assaddho hi satakkhattuṃ hatthe dhovitvāpi malinahatthova
atk-s0402a0:498_2: hoti, saddho pana dānābhiratattā malinahatthopi dhotahatthova. Vossaggaratoti vossaggasaṅkhāte
atk-s0402a0:498_3: dāne rato. Yācayogoti yācituṃ yutto, yācakehi vā yogo assātipi yācayogo. Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti
atk-s0402a0:498_4: dānaṃ dadanto saṃvibhāgañca karonto dānasaṃvibhāgarato nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:499_0: Dassanakāmo sīlavatanti dasapi yojanāni vīsampi tiṃsampi yojanasatampi gantvā sīlasampanne
atk-s0402a0:499_1: daṭṭhukāmo hoti pāṭaliputtakabrāhmaṇo viya saddhātissamahārājā viya ca. Pāṭaliputtassa
atk-s0402a0:499_2: kira nagaradvāre sālāya nisinnā dve brāhmaṇā kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsimahānāgattherassa
atk-s0402a0:499_3: guṇakathaṃ sutvā “amhehi taṃ bhikkhuṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:499_4: Eko antarāmagge kālamakāsi. Eko samuddatīraṃ patvā nāvāya mahātitthapaṭṭane oruyha
atk-s0402a0:499_5: anurādhapuraṃ āgantvā “kāḷavallimaṇḍapo kuhi”nti pucchi. Rohaṇajanapadeti. So anupubbena
atk-s0402a0:499_6: therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā cūḷanagaragāme dhuraghare nivāsaṃ gahetvā therassa āhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:499_7: sampādetvā pātova vuṭṭhāya therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā janapariyante
atk-s0402a0:499_8: ṭhito theraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sakiṃ tattheva ṭhito vanditvā puna upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0402a0:499_9: gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā vandanto “uccā, bhante, tumhe”ti āha. Thero ca nātiucco
atk-s0402a0:499_10: nātirasso pamāṇayuttova, tena naṃ puna āha – “nātiuccā tumhe, tumhākaṃ pana guṇā
atk-s0402a0:499_11: mecakavaṇṇassa samuddassa matthakena gantvā sakalajambudīpatalaṃ ajjhottharitvā gatā,
atk-s0402a0:499_12: ahampi pāṭaliputtanagaradvāre nisinno tumhākaṃ guṇakathaṃ assosi”nti. So therassa
atk-s0402a0:499_13: bhikkhāhāraṃ datvā attano ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa santike pabbajitvā tassovāde
atk-s0402a0:500_0: Saddhātissamahārājāpi, “bhante, mayhaṃ vanditabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ ayyaṃ ācikkhathā”ti
atk-s0402a0:500_1: pucchi. Bhikkhū “maṅgalavāsī kuṭṭatissatthero”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā mahāparivārena pañcayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:500_2: agamāsi. Thero “kiṃ saddo eso, āvuso”ti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi. “Rājā, bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:500_3: dassanatthāya āgato”ti. Thero cintesi – “kiṃ mayhaṃ mahallakakāle rājagehe kamma”nti
atk-s0402a0:500_4: divāṭṭhāne mañce nipajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchi. Rājā “kahaṃ thero”ti
atk-s0402a0:500_5: pucchitvā “divāṭṭhāne”ti sutvā tattha gacchanto theraṃ bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:500_6: disvā “khīṇāsavassa nāma hatthakukkuccaṃ natthi, nāyaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti avanditvāva nivatti.
atk-s0402a0:500_7: Bhikkhusaṅgho theraṃ āha – “bhante, evaṃvidhassa saddhassa pasannassa rañño kasmā
atk-s0402a0:500_8: vippaṭisāraṃ karitthā”ti. “Āvuso, rañño pasādarakkhanaṃ na tumhākaṃ bhāro, mahallakattherassa
atk-s0402a0:500_9: bhāro”ti vatvā aparabhāge anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0402a0:500_10: āha – “mayhaṃ kūṭāgāramhi aññampi pallaṅkaṃ attharathā”ti. Tasmiṃ atthate thero –
atk-s0402a0:500_11: “idaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ antare appatiṭṭhahitvā raññā diṭṭhakāleyeva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhātū”ti
atk-s0402a0:500_12: adhiṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyi. Kūṭāgāraṃ pañcayojanamaggaṃ ākāsena agamāsi. Pañcayojanamagge
atk-s0402a0:500_13: dhajaṃ dhāretuṃ samatthā rukkhā dhajapaggahitāva ahesuṃ. Gacchāpi gumbāpi sabbe kūṭāgārābhimukhā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:501_0: Raññopi paṇṇaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “thero parinibbuto, kūṭāgāraṃ ākāsena āgacchatī”ti. Rājā
atk-s0402a0:501_1: na saddahi. Kūṭāgāraṃ ākāsena gantvā thūpārāmaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā silācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:501_2: agamāsi. Cetiyaṃ saha vatthunā uppatitvā kūṭāgāramatthake aṭṭhāsi, sādhukārasahassāni
atk-s0402a0:501_3: pavattiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahābyagghatthero nāma lohapāsāde sattamakūṭāgāre nisinno
atk-s0402a0:501_4: bhikkhūnaṃ vinayakammaṃ karonto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ saddo eso”ti paṭipucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0402a0:501_5: maṅgalavāsī kuṭṭatissatthero parinibbuto, kūṭāgāraṃ pañcayojanamaggaṃ ākāsena āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:501_6: tattha so sādhukārasaddoti. Āvuso, puññavante nissāya sakkāraṃ labhissāmāti antevāsike
atk-s0402a0:501_7: khamāpetvā ākāseneva āgantvā taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā dutiyamañce nisīditvā anupādisesāya
atk-s0402a0:501_8: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Rājā gandhapupphacuṇṇāni ādāya gantvā ākāse ṭhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:501_9: disvā kūṭāgāraṃ pūjesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kūṭāgāraṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ. Rājā
atk-s0402a0:501_10: mahāsakkārena sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ akāsi. Evarūpā sīlavantānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:502_0: Saddhammaṃ sotumicchatīti tathāgatappaveditaṃ saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti piṇḍapātikattherādayo
atk-s0402a0:502_1: viya. Gaṅgāvanavāliaṅgaṇamhi kira tiṃsa bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā anvaddhamāsaṃ uposathadivase
atk-s0402a0:502_3: āgantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīdi. Atha naṃ eko gonaso jaṅghapiṇḍimaṃsaṃ saṇḍāsena
atk-s0402a0:502_4: gaṇhanto viya ḍaṃsi. Thero olokento gonasaṃ disvā “ajja dhammassavanantarāyaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:502_5: karissāmī”ti gonasaṃ gahetvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā thavikāmukhaṃ bandhitvā avidūre
atk-s0402a0:502_6: ṭhāne ṭhapetvā dhammaṃ suṇantova nisīdi. Aruṇuggamanañca visaṃ vikkhambhetvā therassa
atk-s0402a0:502_7: tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ pāpuṇanañca visassa daṭṭhaṭṭhāneneva otaritvā pathavipavisanañca
atk-s0402a0:502_8: dhammakathikattherassa dhammakathāniṭṭhāpanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi. Tato thero āha
atk-s0402a0:502_9: – “āvuso eko me coro gahito”ti thavikaṃ muñcitvā gonasaṃ vissajjesi. Bhikkhū disvā
atk-s0402a0:502_10: “kāya velāya daṭṭhattha, bhante”ti pucchiṃsu. Hiyyo sāyanhasamaye, āvusoti. Kasmā,
atk-s0402a0:502_11: bhante, evaṃ bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ karitthāti. Āvuso, sacāhaṃ dīghajātikena daṭṭhoti vadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:502_12: nayimaṃ ettakaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ labheyyanti. Idaṃ tāva piṇḍapātikattherassa vatthu.
atk-s0402a0:503_1: tissamahāgāme tissamahāvihāravāsī eko daharo sutvā tato nikkhamitvā ekāheneva navayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:503_2: āgato. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe thero dhammakathaṃ ārabhi. Daharo dūramaggāgamanena sañjātakāyadarathattā
atk-s0402a0:503_3: paṭṭhānagāthāya saddhiṃ avasānagāthaṃyeva vavatthapesi. Tato therassa “idamavocā”ti
atk-s0402a0:503_4: vatvā uṭṭhāya gamanakāle “mayhaṃ āgamanakammaṃ moghaṃ jāta”nti rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:503_5: Eko manusso taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā therassa ārocesi, “bhante, ‘tumhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:503_6: sossāmī’ti eko daharabhikkhu tissamahāvihārā āgato, so ‘kāyadarathabhāvena me āgamanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:503_7: moghaṃ jāta’nti rodamāno ṭhito”ti. Gacchatha saññāpetha naṃ “puna sve kathessāmā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:503_8: So punadivase therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:504_0: Aparāpi ullakolikaṇṇivāsikā ekā itthī puttakaṃ pāyamānā “dīghabhāṇakamahāabhayatthero
atk-s0402a0:504_1: nāma ariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetī”ti sutvā pañcayojanamaggaṃ gantvā divākathikattherassa
atk-s0402a0:504_2: nisinnakāleyeva vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhūmiyaṃ puttaṃ nipajjāpetvā divākathikattherassa
atk-s0402a0:504_3: ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ assosi. Sarabhāṇake there uṭṭhite dīghabhāṇakamahāabhayatthero
atk-s0402a0:504_5: tayo eva paccaye kathetvā uṭṭhānākāraṃ akāsi. Sā upāsikā āha – “ayyo, ‘ariyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0402a0:504_6: kathessāmī’ti siniddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā madhurapānakaṃ pivitvā yaṭṭhimadhukatelādīhi
atk-s0402a0:504_7: bhesajjaṃ katvā kathetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahatī”ti. Thero “sādhu, bhaginī”ti vatvā
atk-s0402a0:504_8: upari bhāvanārāmaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Aruṇuggamanañca therassa “idamavocā”ti vacanañca upāsikāya
atk-s0402a0:505_0: Aparāpi kaḷamparavāsikā itthī aṅkena puttaṃ ādāya “dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti cittalapabbataṃ
atk-s0402a0:505_1: gantvā ekaṃ rukkhaṃ nissāya dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:505_2: Rattibhāgasamanantare eko dīghajātiko tassā passantiyāyeva samīpe nipannadārakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:505_3: catūhi dāṭhāhi ḍaṃsitvā agamāsi. Sā cintesi – “sacāhaṃ ‘putto me sappena daṭṭho’ti
atk-s0402a0:505_4: vakkhāmi, dhammassa antarāyo bhavissati. Anekakkhattuṃ kho pana me ayaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe
atk-s0402a0:505_5: vaṭṭantiyā putto ahosi, dhammameva carissāmī”ti tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ paggaṇhitvā
atk-s0402a0:505_6: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aruṇe uggate saccakiriyāya puttassa visaṃ nimmathetvā puttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:505_7: gahetvā gatā. Evarūpā puggalā dhammaṃ sotukāmā nāma honti.
atk-s0402a0:507_0: 43. Tatiye tayo, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānenāti tayo atthe tīṇi kāraṇāni passantena.
atk-s0402a0:507_1: Alamevāti yuttameva. Yo dhammaṃ desetīti yo puggalo catusaccadhammaṃ pakāseti. Atthappaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-s0402a0:507_2: aṭṭhakathaṃ ñāṇena paṭisaṃvedī. Dhammappaṭisaṃvedīti pāḷidhammaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0402a0:509: 44. Catutthe ṭhānehīti kāraṇehi. Pavattinīti appaṭihatā niyyānikā.
atk-s0402a0:511_0: 45. Pañcame paṇḍitapaññattānīti paṇḍitehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni. Sappurisapaññattānīti
atk-s0402a0:511_1: sappurisehi mahāpurisehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni. Ahiṃsāti karuṇā ceva karuṇāpubbabhāgo
atk-s0402a0:511_2: ca. Saṃyamoti sīlasaṃyamo. Damoti indriyasaṃvaro, uposathavasena vā attadamanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:511_3: puṇṇovāde damoti vuttā khantipi āḷavake vuttā paññāpi imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0402a0:511_4: Mātāpitu upaṭṭhānanti mātāpitūnaṃ rakkhanaṃ gopanaṃ paṭijagganaṃ. Santānanti aññattha
atk-s0402a0:511_5: buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakā santo nāma, idha pana mātāpituupaṭṭhākā adhippetā.
atk-s0402a0:511_6: Tasmā uttamaṭṭhena santānaṃ, seṭṭhacariyaṭṭhena brahmacārīnaṃ. Idaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:511_7: sabbhi upaññātanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sataṃ etāni ṭhānānīti santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:511_8: etāni ṭhānāni kāraṇāni. Ariyo dassanasampannoti idha imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ kāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:511_9: ariyo ceva dassanasampanno ca veditabbo, na buddhādayo na sotāpannā. Atha vā sataṃ
atk-s0402a0:511_10: etāni ṭhānānīti mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānanti etāni ṭhānāni santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:511_11: kāraṇānīti evaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhākavasena imissā gāthāya attho veditabbo. Mātāpituupaṭṭhākoyeva
atk-s0402a0:511_12: hi idha “ariyo dassanasampanno”ti vutto. Sa lokaṃ bhajate sivanti so khemaṃ devalokaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0402a0:513_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe tīhi ṭhānehīti tīhi kāraṇehi. Kāyenātiādīsu bhikkhū āgacchante disvā
atk-s0402a0:513_1: paccuggamanaṃ karontā gacchante anugacchantā āsanasālāya sammajjanaupalepanādīni
atk-s0402a0:513_2: karontā āsanāni paññāpentā pānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentā kāyena puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:513_3: Bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “yāguṃ detha, bhattaṃ detha, sappinavanītādīni
atk-s0402a0:513_4: detha, gandhapupphādīhi pūjetha, uposathaṃ upavasatha, dhammaṃ suṇātha, cetiyaṃ vandathā”tiādīni
atk-s0402a0:513_5: vadantā vācāya puññaṃ pasavanti nāma. Bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante disvā “labhantū”ti
atk-s0402a0:513_6: cintentā manasā puññaṃ pasavanti nāma. Pasavantīti paṭilabhanti. Puññaṃ panettha
atk-s0402a0:515_0: 47. Sattame saṅkhatassāti paccayehi samāgantvā katassa. Saṅkhatalakkhaṇānīti saṅkhataṃ
atk-s0402a0:515_1: etanti sañjānanakāraṇāni nimittāni. Uppādoti jāti. Vayoti bhedo. Ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:515_2: nāma jarā. Tattha saṅkhatanti tebhūmakā dhammā. Maggaphalāni pana asammasanūpagattā
atk-s0402a0:515_3: idha na kathīyanti. Uppādādayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇā nāma. Tesu uppādakkhaṇe uppādo, ṭhānakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:515_4: jarā, bhedakkhaṇe vayo. Lakkhaṇaṃ na saṅkhataṃ, saṅkhataṃ na lakkhaṇaṃ, lakkhaṇena
atk-s0402a0:515_5: pana saṅkhataṃ paricchinnaṃ. Yathā hatthiassagomahiṃsādīnaṃ sattisūlādīni sañjānanalakkhaṇāni
atk-s0402a0:515_6: na hatthiādayo, napi hatthiādayo lakkhaṇāneva, lakkhaṇehi pana te “asukassa hatthī,
atk-s0402a0:515_7: asukassa asso, asukahatthī, asukaasso”ti vā paññāyanti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:517_0: 48. Aṭṭhame asaṅkhatassāti paccayehi samāgantvā akatassa. Asaṅkhatalakkhaṇānīti asaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0402a0:517_1: etanti sañjānanakāraṇāni nimittāni. Na uppādo paññāyatītiādīhi uppādajarābhaṅgānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:517_2: abhāvo vutto. Uppādādīnañhi abhāvena asaṅkhatanti paññāyati.
atk-s0402a0:519_0: 49. Navame mahāsālāti mahārukkhā. Kulapatinti kulajeṭṭhakaṃ. Seloti silāmayo. Araññasminti
atk-s0402a0:519_1: agāmakaṭṭhāne. Brahmāti mahanto. Vaneti aṭaviyaṃ. Vanappatīti vanajeṭṭhakā. Idha
atk-s0402a0:519_2: dhammaṃ caritvāna, maggaṃ sugatigāminanti sugatigāmikamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ caritvā.
atk-s0402a0:521_0: 50. Dasame ātappaṃ karaṇīyanti vīriyaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṃ. Anuppādāyāti anuppādatthāya,
atk-s0402a0:521_1: anuppādaṃ sādhessāmīti iminā kāraṇena kattabbanti attho. Paratopi eseva nayo. Sārīrikānanti
atk-s0402a0:521_2: sarīrasambhavānaṃ. Dukkhānanti dukkhamānaṃ. Tibbānanti bahalānaṃ, tāpanavasena vā
atk-s0402a0:521_3: tibbānaṃ. Kharānanti pharusānaṃ. Kaṭukānanti tikhiṇānaṃ. Asātānanti amadhurānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:521_4: Amanāpānanti manaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ asamatthānaṃ. Pāṇaharānanti jīvitaharānaṃ. Adhivāsanāyāti
atk-s0402a0:522_0: Ettake ṭhāne satthā āṇāpetvā āṇattiṃ pavattetvā idāni samādapento yato kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:522_1: Tattha yatoti yadā. Ātāpīti vīriyavā. Nipakoti sappañño. Satoti satiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:522_2: Dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa paricchedaparivaṭumakiriyāya. Ime ca pana
atk-s0402a0:524_0: 51. Ekādasame mahācoroti mahanto balavacoro. Sandhinti gharasandhiṃ. Nillopanti mahāvilopaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:524_1: Ekāgārikanti ekameva gehaṃ parivāretvā vilumpanaṃ. Paripanthepi tiṭṭhatīti panthadūhanakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:524_2: karoti. Nadīvidugganti nadīnaṃ duggamaṭṭhānaṃ antaradīpakaṃ, yattha sakkā hoti dvīhipi
atk-s0402a0:524_3: tīhipi jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ. Pabbatavisamanti pabbatānaṃ visamaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:524_4: pabbatantaraṃ, yattha sakkā hoti sattahi vā aṭṭhahi vā jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ.
atk-s0402a0:524_5: Tiṇagahananti tiṇena vaḍḍhitvā sañchannaṃ dvattiyojanaṭṭhānaṃ. Rodhanti ghanaṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:524_6: saṃsaṭṭhasākhaṃ ekābaddhaṃ mahāvanasaṇḍaṃ. Pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantīti pariyodahitvā
atk-s0402a0:524_7: taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā atthaṃ kathayissanti. Tyāssāti te assa. Pariyodhāya atthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:524_8: bhaṇantīti kismiñci kiñci vattuṃ āraddheyeva “mā evaṃ avacuttha, mayaṃ etaṃ kulaparamparāya
atk-s0402a0:524_9: jānāma, na esa evarūpaṃ karissatī”ti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā mahantampi dosaṃ
atk-s0402a0:524_10: harantā atthaṃ bhaṇanti. Atha vā pariyodhāyāti paṭicchādetvātipi attho. Te hi tassapi
atk-s0402a0:524_11: dosaṃ paṭicchādetvā atthaṃ bhaṇanti. Khataṃ upahatanti guṇakhananena khataṃ, guṇupaghātena
atk-s0402a0:524_12: upahataṃ. Visamena kāyakammenāti sampakkhalanaṭṭhena visamena kāyadvārikakammena.
atk-s0402a0:524_13: Vacīmanokammesupi eseva nayo. Antaggāhikāyāti dasavatthukāya antaṃ gahetvā ṭhitadiṭṭhiyā.
atk-s0402a0:526_0: 52. Brāhmaṇavaggassa paṭhame jiṇṇāti jarājiṇṇā. Vuddhāti vayovuddhā. Mahallakāti
atk-s0402a0:526_1: jātimahallakā. Addhagatāti tayo addhe atikkantā. Vayoanuppattāti tatiyaṃ vayaṃ anuppattā.
atk-s0402a0:526_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti puttadāre attano vacanaṃ akaronte disvā “samaṇassa
atk-s0402a0:526_3: gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā niyyānikamaggaṃ gavesissāmā”ti cintetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:526_4: Mayamassu, bho gotama, brāhmaṇāti; bho gotama, mayaṃ brāhmaṇā na khattiyā nāmaccā
atk-s0402a0:526_5: na gahapatikāti brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā jiṇṇātiādimāhaṃsu. Akatabhīruttāṇāti akatabhayaparittāṇā.
atk-s0402a0:526_6: Avassayabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhākammaṃ amhehi na katanti dassenti. Tagghāti ekaṃsatthe nipāto,
atk-s0402a0:526_7: sampaṭicchanatthe vā. Ekantena tumhe evarūpā, ahampi kho etaṃ sampaṭicchāmīti ca
atk-s0402a0:526_8: dasseti. Upanīyatīti upasaṃharīyati. Ayaṃ hi jātiyā jaraṃ upanīyati, jarāya byādhiṃ,
atk-s0402a0:526_9: byādhinā maraṇaṃ, maraṇena puna jātiṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “upanīyatī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:527_0: Idāni yasmā te brāhmaṇā mahallakattā pabbajitvāpi vattaṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissanti,
atk-s0402a0:527_1: tasmā ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpento bhagavā yodha kāyena saṃyamotiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:527_2: kāyena saṃyamoti kāyadvārena saṃvaro. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Taṃ tassa petassāti taṃ
atk-s0402a0:527_3: puññaṃ tassa paralokaṃ gatassa tāyanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ, nilīyanaṭṭhena leṇaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:527_4: dīpo, avassayanaṭṭhena saraṇaṃ, uttamagativasena parāyaṇañca hotīti dasseti. Gāthā
atk-s0402a0:527_5: uttānatthāyeva. Evaṃ te brāhmaṇā tathāgatena pañcasu sīlesu samādapitā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:529: 53. Dutiye bhājananti yaṃkiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:531_0: 54. Tatiye sammodanīyanti sammodajananiṃ. Sāraṇīyanti saritabbayuttakaṃ. Vītisāretvāti
atk-s0402a0:531_1: pariyosāpetvā. Kittāvatāti kittakena. Sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotīti sāmaṃ passitabbo
atk-s0402a0:531_2: hoti. Akālikoti na kālantare phaladāyako. Ehipassikoti “ehi passā”ti evaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:531_3: sakkāti āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ pucchati. Opaneyyikoti attano cittaṃ upanetabbo. Paccattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:531_4: veditabboti sāmaṃyeva jānitabbo. Viññūhīti paṇḍitehi. Pariyādinnacittoti ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhacitto
atk-s0402a0:531_5: hutvā. Cetetīti cinteti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Imasmiṃ pana sutte brāhmaṇena lokuttaramaggo
atk-s0402a0:531_6: pucchito, satthārāpi soyeva kathito. So hi sāmaṃ passitabbattā sandiṭṭhiko nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:533: 55. Catutthe brāhmaṇaparibbājakoti brāhmaṇajātiko paribbājako, na khattiyādijātiko. Attatthampīti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ attano atthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:535: 56. Pañcame akālikanti na kālantare pattabbaṃ. Opaneyyikanti paṭipattiyā upagantabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:537_0: 57. Chaṭṭhe ācariyapācariyānanti ācariyānañceva ācariyācariyānañca. Avīci maññe phuṭo
atk-s0402a0:537_1: ahosīti yathā avīci mahānirayo nirantaraphuṭo nerayikasattehi paripuṇṇo, manussehi
atk-s0402a0:537_2: evaṃ paripuṇṇo hoti. Kukkuṭasaṃpātikāti ekagāmassa chadanapiṭṭhito uppatitvā itaragāmassa
atk-s0402a0:537_3: chadanapiṭṭhe patanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpāto etāsu atthīti kukkuṭasaṃpātikā. Kukkuṭasaṃpādikātipi
atk-s0402a0:537_4: pāṭho, gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ kukkuṭānaṃ padasā gamanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpādo etāsu
atk-s0402a0:537_5: atthīti attho. Ubhayampetaṃ ghananivāsataṃyeva dīpeti. Adhammarāgarattāti rāgo nāma
atk-s0402a0:537_6: ekanteneva adhammo, attano parikkhāresu pana uppajjamāno na adhammarāgoti adhippeto,
atk-s0402a0:537_7: paraparikkhāresu uppajjamānova adhammarāgoti. Visamalobhābhibhūtāti lobhassa samakālo
atk-s0402a0:537_8: nāma natthi, ekantaṃ visamova esa. Attanā pariggahitavatthumhi pana uppajjamāno samalobho
atk-s0402a0:537_9: nāma, parapariggahitavatthumhi uppajjamānova visamoti adhippeto. Micchādhammaparetāti
atk-s0402a0:537_10: avatthupaṭisevanasaṅkhātena micchādhammena samannāgatā. Devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatīti
atk-s0402a0:537_11: vassitabbayutte kāle vassaṃ na vassati. Dubbhikkhanti dullabhabhikkhaṃ. Dussassanti
atk-s0402a0:537_12: vividhasassānaṃ asampajjanena dussassaṃ. Setaṭṭhikanti sasse sampajjamāne pāṇakā
atk-s0402a0:537_13: patanti, tehi daṭṭhattā nikkhantanikkhantāni sālisīsāni setavaṇṇāni honti nissārāni.
atk-s0402a0:537_14: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “setaṭṭhika”nti. Salākāvuttanti vapitaṃ vapitaṃ sassaṃ salākāmattameva
atk-s0402a0:537_15: sampajjati, phalaṃ na detīti attho. Yakkhāti yakkhādhipatino. Vāḷe amanusse ossajjantīti
atk-s0402a0:537_16: caṇḍayakkhe manussapathe vissajjenti, te laddhokāsā mahājanaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0402a0:539_0: 58. Sattame mahapphalanti mahāvipākaṃ. Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti ettha dhammo
atk-s0402a0:539_1: nāma kathitakathā, anudhammo nāma kathitassa paṭikathanaṃ. Sahadhammikoti sakāraṇo
atk-s0402a0:539_2: sahetuko. Vādānupātoti vādassa anupāto, anupatanaṃ pavattīti attho. Gārayhaṃ ṭhānanti
atk-s0402a0:539_3: garahitabbayuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhotā gotamena vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti
atk-s0402a0:539_4: kiñcipi gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti. Atha vā tehi parehi vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti
atk-s0402a0:539_5: kiñci gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:540: Antarāyakaro hotīti antarāyaṃ vināsaṃ kicchalābhakaṃ vilomakaṃ karoti. Pāripanthikoti panthadūhanacoro. Khato ca hotīti guṇakhananena khato hoti. Upahatoti guṇupaghāteneva upahato.
atk-s0402a0:541_0: Candanikāyāti asucikalalakūpe. Oligalleti niddhamanakalale. So cāti so sīlavāti vuttakhīṇāsavo.
atk-s0402a0:541_1: Sīlakkhandhenāti sīlarāsinā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:541_2: vuccati paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, taṃ asekkhassa pavattattā asekkhanti vuttaṃ. Itarāni
atk-s0402a0:541_3: sikkhāpariyosānappattatāya sayampi asekkhāneva. Tāni ca pana lokuttarāni, paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:542_0: Rohiṇīsūti rattavaṇṇāsu. Sarūpāsūti attano vacchakehi samānarūpāsu. Pārevatāsūti
atk-s0402a0:542_1: kapotavaṇṇāsu. Dantoti nibbisevano. Puṅgavoti usabho. Dhorayhoti dhuravāho. Kalyāṇajavanikkamoti
atk-s0402a0:542_2: kalyāṇena ujunā javena gantā. Nāssa vaṇṇaṃ parikkhareti assa goṇassa sarīravaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:542_3: na upaparikkhanti, dhuravahanakammameva pana upaparikkhanti. Yasmiṃ kasmiñci jātiyeti
atk-s0402a0:542_4: yattha katthaci kulajāte. Yāsu kāsuci etāsūti etāsu khattiyādippabhedāsu yāsu kāsuci jātīsu.
atk-s0402a0:543_0: Brahmacariyassa kevalīti brahmacariyassa kevalena samannāgato, paripuṇṇabhāvena yuttoti
atk-s0402a0:543_1: attho. Khīṇāsavo hi sakalabrahmacārī nāma hoti. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pannabhāroti oropitabhāro,
atk-s0402a0:543_2: khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ kāmaguṇabhārañca oropetvā ṭhitoti attho. Katakiccoti catūhi
atk-s0402a0:543_3: maggehi kiccaṃ katvā ṭhito. Pāragū sabbadhammānanti sabbadhammā vuccanti pañcakkhandhā
atk-s0402a0:543_4: dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, tesaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ abhiññāpāraṃ, pariññāpāraṃ,
atk-s0402a0:543_5: pahānapāraṃ, bhāvanāpāraṃ, sacchikiriyāpāraṃ, samāpattipārañcāti chabbidhaṃ pāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:543_6: gatattā pāragū. Anupādāyāti aggahetvā. Nibbutoti kilesasantāparahito. Virajeti rāgadosamoharajarahite.
atk-s0402a0:544_0: Avijānantāti khettaṃ ajānantā. Dummedhāti nippaññā. Assutāvinoti khettavinicchayasavanena
atk-s0402a0:544_1: rahitā. Bahiddhāti imamhā sāsanā bahiddhā. Na hi sante upāsareti buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsave
atk-s0402a0:544_2: uttamapurise na upasaṅkamanti. Dhīrasammateti paṇḍitehi sammate sambhāvite. Mūlajātā
atk-s0402a0:544_3: patiṭṭhitāti iminā sotāpannassa saddhaṃ dasseti. Kule vā idha jāyareti idha vā manussaloke
atk-s0402a0:544_4: khattiyabrāhmaṇavessakule jāyanti. Ayameva hi tividhā kulasampatti nāma. Anupubbena
atk-s0402a0:544_5: nibbānaṃ, adhigacchantīti sīlasamādhipaññāti ime guṇe pūretvā anukkamena nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti.
atk-s0402a0:546_0: 59. Aṭṭhame tikaṇṇoti tassa nāmaṃ. Upasaṅkamīti “samaṇo kira gotamo paṇḍito, gacchissāmi
atk-s0402a0:546_1: tassa santika”nti cintetvā bhuttapātarāso mahājanaparivuto upasaṅkami. Bhagavato
atk-s0402a0:546_2: sammukhāti dasabalassa purato nisīditvā. Vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti kasmā bhāsati? So kira
atk-s0402a0:546_3: ito pubbe tathāgatassa santikaṃ agatapubbo. Athassa etadahosi – “buddhā nāma durāsadā,
atk-s0402a0:546_4: mayi paṭhamataraṃ akathente katheyya vā na vā. Sace na kathessati, atha maṃ samāgamaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:546_5: kathentaṃ evaṃ vakkhanti ‘tvaṃ idha kasmā kathesi, yena te samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:546_6: gantvā vacanamattampi na laddha’nti. Tasmā ‘evaṃ me ayaṃ garahā muccissatī”’ti maññamāno
atk-s0402a0:546_7: bhāsati. Kiñcāpi brāhmaṇānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, tathāgatassa pana ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭessāmīti
atk-s0402a0:546_8: adhippāyeneva bhāsati. Evampi tevijjā brāhmaṇāti tevijjakabrāhmaṇā evaṃpaṇḍitā evaṃdhīrā
atk-s0402a0:546_9: evaṃbyattā evaṃbahussutā evaṃvādino, evaṃsammatāti attho. Itipīti iminā tesaṃ paṇḍitādiākāraparicchedaṃ
atk-s0402a0:546_10: dasseti. Ettakena kāraṇena paṇḍitā…pe… ettakena kāraṇena sammatāti ayañhi ettha attho.
atk-s0402a0:547_0: Yathā kathaṃ pana brāhmaṇāti ettha yathāti kāraṇavacanaṃ, kathaṃ panāti pucchāvacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:547_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kathaṃ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā tevijjaṃ paññāpenti. Yathā evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:547_2: sakkā hoti jānituṃ, taṃ kāraṇaṃ vadehīti. Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo “jānanaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ
atk-s0402a0:547_3: sammāsambuddho pucchi, no ajānanaṭṭhāne”ti attamano hutvā idha, bho gotamātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:547_4: Tattha ubhatoti dvīhipi pakkhehi. Mātito ca pitito cāti yassa mātā brāhmaṇī, mātu
atk-s0402a0:547_5: mātā brāhmaṇī, tassāpi mātā brāhmaṇī. Pitā brāhmaṇo, pitu pitā brāhmaṇo, tassāpi
atk-s0402a0:547_6: pitā brāhmaṇo, so ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca. Saṃsuddhagahaṇikoti yassa saṃsuddhā
atk-s0402a0:547_7: mātu gahaṇī, kucchīti attho. “Samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā”ti pana ettha kammajatejodhātu gahaṇīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:548_0: Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho, pitāmahassa yugaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:548_1: Yuganti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccati. Abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:548_2: Tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā. Evaṃ yāva sattamo puriso,
atk-s0402a0:548_3: tāva saṃsuddhagahaṇiko, atha vā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādenāti dasseti. Akkhittoti
atk-s0402a0:548_4: “apanetha etaṃ, kiṃ iminā”ti evaṃ akkhitto anavakkhitto. Anupakkuṭṭhoti na upakkuṭṭho,
atk-s0402a0:548_5: na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo. Kena kāraṇenāti? Jātivādena. “Itipi hīnajātiko
atk-s0402a0:549_0: Ajjhāyakoti idaṃ “na dānime jhāyanti, na dānime jhāyantīti kho, vāseṭṭha, ajjhāyakā
atk-s0402a0:549_1: ajjhāyakāteva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:549_2: brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ. Idāni pana taṃ ajjhāyatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti
atk-s0402a0:549_3: iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti. Mante dhāretīti mantadharo.
atk-s0402a0:550_0: Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti irubbedayajubbedasāmabbedānaṃ. Oṭṭhapahatakaraṇavasena pāraṃ gatoti
atk-s0402a0:550_1: pāragū. Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ. Nighaṇḍūti nāmanighaṇḍurukkhādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:550_2: vevacanapakāsakasatthaṃ. Keṭubhanti kiriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakārāya satthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:550_3: Saha akkharappabhedena sākkharappabhedānaṃ. Akkharappabhedoti sikkhā ca nirutti ca.
atk-s0402a0:550_4: Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa, itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0402a0:550_5: purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto khattavijjāsaṅkhāto vā itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā.
atk-s0402a0:551_0: Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati vedeti cāti padako veyyākaraṇo. Lokāyataṃ
atk-s0402a0:551_1: vuccati vitaṇḍavādasatthaṃ. Mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:551_3: nāma ahesuṃ, yesaṃ vasena “iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti, iminā
atk-s0402a0:551_4: paccekabuddhā, dve aggasāvakā, asīti mahāsāvakā, buddhamātā, buddhapitā, aggupaṭṭhākā,
atk-s0402a0:551_5: aggupaṭṭhāyikā, rājā cakkavattī”ti ayaṃ viseso ñāyati. Anavayoti imesu lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu
atk-s0402a0:551_6: anūno paripūrakārī, avayo na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato
atk-s0402a0:551_7: ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti. Atha vā anavayoti anu avayo, sandhivasena ukāralopo. Anu
atk-s0402a0:552_0: Tena hīti idaṃ bhagavā naṃ āyācantaṃ disvā “idānissa pañhaṃ kathetuṃ kālo”ti ñatvā
atk-s0402a0:552_1: āha. Tassattho – yasmā maṃ āyācasi, tasmā suṇāhīti. Vivicceva kāmehītiādi visuddhimagge
atk-s0402a0:552_2: vitthāritameva. Idha panetaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ vuttanti
atk-s0402a0:552_3: veditabbaṃ. Tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0402a0:553_0: Paṭhamā vijjāti paṭhamaṃ uppannāti paṭhamā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. Kiṃ viditaṃ
atk-s0402a0:553_1: karoti? Pubbenivāsaṃ. Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako
atk-s0402a0:553_2: moho vuccati. Tamoti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati. Ālokoti sāyeva
atk-s0402a0:553_3: vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena ālokoti vuccati. Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho. Sesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:553_4: pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Yojanā panettha ayamassa vijjā adhigatā, athassa adhigatavijjassa
atk-s0402a0:553_5: avijjā vihatā vinaṭṭhāti attho. Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannā. Itarasmimpi padadvaye
atk-s0402a0:553_6: eseva nayo. Yathā tanti ettha yathāti opammaṃ, tanti nipātamattaṃ. Satiyā avippavāsena
atk-s0402a0:553_7: appamattassa. Vīriyātāpena ātāpino. Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa.
atk-s0402a0:553_8: Pesitattassāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa
atk-s0402a0:553_9: viharato avijjā vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya. Tamo vihaññeyya, āloko uppajjeyya,
atk-s0402a0:553_10: evameva tassa avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā. Tamo vihato, āloko uppanno. Etassa tena
atk-s0402a0:554: Cutūpapātakathāyaṃ vijjāti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā. Avijjāti sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhippaṭicchādikā avijjā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:555_0: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:555_1: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti arahattamaggañāṇatthāya. Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato
atk-s0402a0:555_2: āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati, tatra cetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tattha pariyāpannattāti. Cittaṃ abhininnāmetīti
atk-s0402a0:555_3: vipassanācittaṃ abhinīharati. So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito
atk-s0402a0:555_4: bhiyyoti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0402a0:555_5: tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti, tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:555_6: patvā nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ apavattiṃ nibbānaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti. Tassa ca sampāpakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:556_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:556_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa bhikkhuno evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa.
atk-s0402a0:556_2: Saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesi. Kāmāsavāti kāmāsavato. Vimuccatīti iminā
atk-s0402a0:556_3: maggakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati, phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:556_4: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi
atk-s0402a0:556_5: tassa bhūmiṃ. Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto khīṇā jātītiādīni pajānāti. Katamā
atk-s0402a0:556_6: panassa jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ pajānātīti? Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva
atk-s0402a0:556_7: khīṇattā, na anāgatā, anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā, vijjamānattā. Yā pana
atk-s0402a0:556_9: jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā. Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0402a0:556_10: pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiappaṭisandhikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:557_0: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:557_1: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo
atk-s0402a0:557_2: vutthavāso. Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti
atk-s0402a0:557_3: pajānāti. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena
atk-s0402a0:557_4: soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:557_5: karonti, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ
atk-s0402a0:557_6: karaṇīya”nti pajānāti. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti puna itthabhāvāya, evaṃ soḷasavidhakiccabhāvāya
atk-s0402a0:557_7: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti. Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato,
atk-s0402a0:557_8: imasmā evaṃ pakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a0:557_9: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya. Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena
atk-s0402a0:557_10: anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti pajānāti. Idha vijjāti arahattamaggañāṇavijjā.
atk-s0402a0:558_0: Anuccāvacasīlassāti yassa sīlaṃ kālena hāyati, kālena vaḍḍhati, so uccāvacasīlo nāma
atk-s0402a0:558_1: hoti. Khīṇāsavassa pana sīlaṃ ekantavaḍḍhitameva. Tasmā so anuccāvacasīlo nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:558_2: Vasībhūtanti vasippattaṃ. Susamāhitanti suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ, ārammaṇamhi suṭṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:558_3: Dhīranti dhitisampannaṃ. Maccuhāyinanti maccuṃ jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sabbappahāyinanti
atk-s0402a0:558_4: sabbe pāpadhamme pajahitvā ṭhitaṃ. Buddhanti catusaccabuddhaṃ. Antimadehinanti sabbapacchimasarīradhārinaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:558_5: Taṃ namassanti gotamanti taṃ gotamagottaṃ buddhasāvakā namassanti. Atha vā gotamabuddhassa
atk-s0402a0:558_6: sāvakopi gotamo, taṃ gotamaṃ devamanussā namassantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:559_0: Pubbenivāsanti pubbenivutthakkhandhaparamparaṃ. Yovetīti yo aveti avagacchati. Yovedītipi
atk-s0402a0:559_1: pāṭho. Yo avedi, viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ṭhitoti attho. Saggāpāyañca passatīti cha
atk-s0402a0:559_2: kāmāvacare nava brahmaloke cattāro ca apāye passati. Jātikkhayaṃ pattoti arahattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:559_3: patto. Abhiññāvositoti jānitvā kiccavosānena vosito. Munīti moneyyena samannāgato
atk-s0402a0:559_4: khīṇāsavamuni. Etāhīti heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhāhi pubbenivāsañāṇādīhi. Nāññaṃ lapitalāpananti
atk-s0402a0:559_5: yo panañño tevijjoti aññehi lapitavacanamattameva lapati, tamahaṃ tevijjoti na vadāmi,
atk-s0402a0:559_6: attapaccakkhato ñatvā parassapi tisso vijjā kathentamevāhaṃ tevijjoti vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:559_7: Kalanti koṭṭhāsaṃ. Nāgghatīti na pāpuṇāti. Idāni brāhmaṇo bhagavato kathāya pasanno
atk-s0402a0:561_0: 60. Navame yassassūti yassa bhaveyyuṃ. Yaññotiādīsu yajitabboti yañño, deyyadhammassetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:561_1: nāmaṃ. Saddhanti matakabhattaṃ. Thālipākoti varapurisānaṃ dātabbayuttaṃ bhattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:561_2: Deyyadhammanti vuttāvasesaṃ yaṃkiñci deyyadhammaṃ nāma. Tevijjesu brāhmaṇesu dānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:561_3: dadeyyāti sabbametaṃ dānaṃ tevijjesu dadeyya, tevijjā brāhmaṇāva paṭiggahetuṃ yuttāti
atk-s0402a0:563_0: 61. Dasame saṅgāravoti evaṃnāmako rājagahanagare jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇakārako āyuttakabrāhmaṇo.
atk-s0402a0:563_1: Upasaṅkamīti bhuttapātarāso hutvā mahājanaparivuto upasaṅkami. Mayamassūti ettha
atk-s0402a0:563_2: assūti nipātamattaṃ, mayaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā nāmāti idameva atthapadaṃ. Yaññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:563_3: yajāmāti bāhirasamaye sabbacatukkena sabbaṭṭhakena sabbasoḷasakena sabbadvattiṃsāya
atk-s0402a0:563_4: sabbacatusaṭṭhiyā sabbasatena sabbapañcasatenāti ca evaṃ pāṇaghātapaṭisaṃyutto yañño
atk-s0402a0:563_5: nāma hoti. Taṃ sandhāyevamāha. Anekasārīrikanti anekasarīrasambhavaṃ. Yadidanti yā
atk-s0402a0:563_6: esā. Yaññādhikaraṇanti yajanakāraṇā ceva yājanakāraṇā cāti attho. Ekasmiñhi bahūnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:563_7: dadantepi dāpentepi bahūsupi bahūnaṃ dentesupi dāpentesupi puññapaṭipadā anekasārīrikā
atk-s0402a0:563_8: nāma hoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tuyhañca tuyhañca yajāmīti vadantassāpi tvañca
atk-s0402a0:563_9: tvañca yajāhīti āṇāpentassāpi ca anekasārīrikāva hoti. Tampi sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:563_10: Yassa vā tassa vāti yasmā vā tasmā vā. Ekamattānaṃ dametīti attano indriyadamanavasena
atk-s0402a0:563_11: ekaṃ attānameva dameti. Ekamattānaṃ sametīti attano rāgādisamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva
atk-s0402a0:563_12: sameti. Parinibbāpetīti rāgādiparinibbāneneva parinibbāpeti. Evamassāyanti evaṃ santepi ayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:564_0: Evamidaṃ brāhmaṇassa kathaṃ sutvā satthā cintesi – “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pasughātakasaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:564_1: mahāyaññaṃ anekasārīrikaṃ puññapaṭipadaṃ vadeti, pabbajjāmūlakaṃ pana puññuppattipaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:564_2: ekasārīrikanti vadeti. Nevāyaṃ ekasārīrikaṃ jānāti, na anekasārīrikaṃ, handassa ekasārīrikañca
atk-s0402a0:564_3: anekasārīrikañca paṭipadaṃ desessāmī”ti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento tena hi brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:564_4: Tattha yathā te khameyyāti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya. Idha tathāgato loke uppajjatītiādi
atk-s0402a0:564_5: visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. Ethāyaṃ maggoti etha tumhe, ahamanusāsāmi, ayaṃ maggo.
atk-s0402a0:564_6: Ayaṃ paṭipadāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Yathā paṭipannoti yena maggena paṭipanno. Anuttaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:564_7: brahmacariyogadhanti arahattamaggasaṅkhātassa brahmacariyassa anuttaraṃ ogadhaṃ uttamapatiṭṭhābhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a0:565_0: Appaṭṭhatarāti yattha bahūhi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā attho natthi. Appasamārambhatarāti
atk-s0402a0:565_1: yattha bahūnaṃ kammacchedavasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto samārambho natthi. Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ
atk-s0402a0:565_2: gotamo, bhavaṃ cānando, ete me pujjāti yathā bhavaṃ gotamo, bhavañcānando, evarūpā
atk-s0402a0:565_3: mama pūjitā, tumheyeva dve janā mayhaṃ pujjā ca pāsaṃsā cāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:565_4: vadati. Tassa kira evaṃ ahosi – “ānandatthero maṃyeva imaṃ pañhaṃ kathāpetukāmo,
atk-s0402a0:565_5: attano kho pana vaṇṇe vutte padussanako nāma natthī”ti. Tasmā pañhaṃ akathetukāmo
atk-s0402a0:566: Na kho tyāhanti na kho te ahaṃ. Theropi kira cintesi – “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pañhaṃ akathetukāmo parivattati, imaṃ pañhaṃ etaṃyeva kathāpessāmī”ti. Tasmā naṃ evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:567_0: Sahadhammikanti sakāraṇaṃ. Saṃsādetīti saṃsīdāpeti. No vissajjetīti na katheti. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:567_1: parimoceyyanti yaṃnūnāhaṃ ubhopete vihesato parimoceyyaṃ. Brāhmaṇo hi ānandena pucchitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:567_2: pañhaṃ akathento viheseti, ānandopi brāhmaṇaṃ akathentaṃ kathāpento. Iti ubhopete
atk-s0402a0:567_3: vihesato mocessāmīti cintetvā evamāha. Kā nvajjāti kā nu ajja. Antarākathā udapādīti
atk-s0402a0:567_4: aññissā kathāya antarantare katarā kathā uppajjīti pucchati. Tadā kira rājantepure
atk-s0402a0:567_5: tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni ārabbha kathā udapādi, taṃ pucchāmīti satthā evamāha. Atha brāhmaṇo
atk-s0402a0:567_6: “idāni vattuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti rājantepure uppannaṃ kathaṃ ārocento ayaṃ khvajja, bho
atk-s0402a0:567_7: gotamātiādimāha. Tattha ayaṃ khvajjāti ayaṃ kho ajja. Pubbe sudanti ettha sudanti
atk-s0402a0:567_8: nipātamattaṃ. Uttari manussadhammāti dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātā manussadhammā uttariṃ.
atk-s0402a0:567_9: Iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesunti bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā ākāseneva gamiṃsu ceva āgamiṃsu
atk-s0402a0:567_10: cāti evaṃ pubbe pavattaṃ ākāsagamanaṃ sandhāyevamāha. Etarahi pana bahutarā ca bhikkhūti
atk-s0402a0:567_11: idaṃ so brāhmaṇo “pubbe bhikkhū ‘cattāro paccaye uppādessāmā’ti maññe evamakaṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:567_12: idāni paccayānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā soppena ceva pamādena ca vītināmentī”ti laddhiyā evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:568_1: iddhi, paṭiharaṇavasena pāṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiyeva pāṭihāriyaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ. Itaresupi
atk-s0402a0:568_2: eseva nayo. Anekavihitaṃ iddhividhantiādīnaṃ attho ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0402a0:569_0: Nimittena ādisatīti āgatanimittena vā gatanimittena vā ṭhitanimittena vā “idaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:569_1: bhavissatī”ti katheti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira rājā tisso muttā gahetvā purohitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:569_2: pucchi “kiṃ me, ācariya, hatthe”ti. So ito cito ca olokesi, tena ca samayena ekā
atk-s0402a0:569_3: sarabū “makkhikaṃ gahessāmī”ti pakkhantā, gahaṇakāle makkhikā palātā. So makkhikāya
atk-s0402a0:569_4: muttattā “muttā mahārājā”ti āha. Muttā tāva hontu, kati muttāti. So puna nimittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:569_5: olokesi. Athāvidūre kukkuṭo tikkhattuṃ saddaṃ nicchāresi. Brāhmaṇo “tisso mahārājā”ti
atk-s0402a0:569_6: āha. Evaṃ ekacco āgatanimittena katheti. Etenupāyena gataṭhitanimittehipi kathanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:569_7: veditabbaṃ. Evampi te manoti evaṃ tava mano somanassito vā domanassito vā kāmavitakkādisaṃyutto
atk-s0402a0:569_8: vāti. Dutiyaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Itipi te cittanti itipi tava cittaṃ, imañca imañca
atk-s0402a0:569_9: atthaṃ cintayamānaṃ pavattatīti attho. Bahuṃ cepi ādisatīti bahuṃ cepi katheti. Tatheva
atk-s0402a0:569_10: taṃ hotīti yathā kathitaṃ, tatheva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:570_0: Amanussānanti yakkhapisācādīnaṃ. Devatānanti cātumahārājikādīnaṃ. Saddaṃ sutvāti
atk-s0402a0:570_1: aññassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathentānaṃ sutvā. Vitakkavipphārasaddanti vitakkavipphāravasena
atk-s0402a0:570_2: uppannaṃ vippalapantānaṃ suttappamattādīnaṃ saddaṃ. Sutvāti taṃ sutvā. Yaṃ vitakkayato
atk-s0402a0:570_3: tassa so saddo uppanno, tassa vasena “evampi te mano”tiādisati.
atk-s0402a0:571_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – eko kira manusso “aṭṭaṃ karissāmī”ti gāmā nagaraṃ gacchanto
atk-s0402a0:571_1: nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya “vinicchayasabhāyaṃ rañño ca rājamahāmattānañca idaṃ kathessāmi
atk-s0402a0:571_2: idaṃ kathessāmī”ti vitakkento rājakulaṃ gato viya rañño purato ṭhito viya aṭṭakārakena
atk-s0402a0:571_3: saddhiṃ kathento viya ca ahosi, tassa taṃ vitakkavipphāravasena niccharantaṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:571_4: sutvā eko puriso “kenaṭṭhena gacchasī”ti āha. Aṭṭakammenāti. Gaccha, jayo te bhavissatīti.
atk-s0402a0:571_5: So gantvā aṭṭaṃ katvā jayameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:572_0: Aparopi thero moḷiyagāme piṇḍāya cari. Atha naṃ nikkhamantaṃ ekā dārikā aññavihitā
atk-s0402a0:572_1: na addasa. So gāmadvāre ṭhatvā nivattitvā oloketvā taṃ disvā vitakkento agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:572_2: Gacchantoyeva ca “kiṃ nu kho kurumānā dārikā na addasā”ti vacībhedaṃ akāsi. Passe
atk-s0402a0:572_3: ṭhito eko puriso sutvā “tumhe, bhante, moḷiyagāme caritthā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:573_0: Manosaṅkhārā paṇihitāti cittasaṅkhārā suṭṭhapitā. Vitakkessatīti vitakkayissati pavattayissatīti
atk-s0402a0:573_1: pajānāti. Pajānanto ca āgamanena jānāti, pubbabhāgena jānāti, antosamāpattiyaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:573_2: apaloketvā jānāti. Āgamanena jānāti nāma kasiṇaparikammakāleyeva “yenākārenesa kasiṇabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:573_3: āraddho paṭhamajjhānaṃ vā…pe… catutthajjhānaṃ vā aṭṭha vā samāpattiyo nibbattessatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:573_4: jānāti. Pubbabhāgena jānāti nāma paṭhamavipassanāya āraddhāyayeva jānāti, “yenākārena
atk-s0402a0:573_5: esa vipassanaṃ āraddho sotāpattimaggaṃ vā nibbattessati…pe… arahattamaggaṃ vā nibbattessatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:573_6: jānāti. Antosamāpattiyaṃ cittaṃ oloketvā jānāti nāma – “yenākārena imassa manosaṅkhārā
atk-s0402a0:573_7: suṭṭhapitā, imassa nāma cittassa anantarā imaṃ nāma vitakkaṃ vitakkessati, ito vuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0402a0:573_8: etassa hānabhāgiyo vā samādhi bhavissati ṭhitibhāgiyo vā visesabhāgiyo vā nibbedhabhāgiyo
atk-s0402a0:573_9: vā, abhiññāyo vā nibbattessatī”ti jānāti. Tattha puthujjano cetopariyañāṇalābhī puthujjanānaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:573_10: cittaṃ jānāti, na ariyānaṃ. Ariyesupi heṭṭhimo uparimassa cittaṃ na jānāti, uparimo
atk-s0402a0:573_11: pana heṭṭhimassa jānāti. Etesu ca sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati…pe…
atk-s0402a0:573_12: arahā arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Uparimo heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjati. Tesañhi
atk-s0402a0:573_13: heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpatti tatravattiyeva hoti. Tatheva taṃ hotīti etaṃ ekaṃsena
atk-s0402a0:573_14: tatheva hoti. Cetopariyañāṇavasena ñātañhi aññathābhāvi nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a0:574_0: Evaṃ vitakkethāti evaṃ nekkhammavitakkādayo pavattentā vitakketha. Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti
atk-s0402a0:574_1: evaṃ kāmavitakkādayo pavattentā mā vitakkayittha. Evaṃ manasi karothāti evaṃ aniccasaññameva,
atk-s0402a0:574_2: dukkhasaññādīsu vā aññataraṃ manasi karotha. Mā evanti niccantiādinā nayena mā manasā
atk-s0402a0:574_3: karittha. Idanti idaṃ pañcakāmaguṇarāgaṃ pajahatha. Idañca upasampajjāti idaṃ catumaggaphalappabhedaṃ
atk-s0402a0:575_0: Māyāsahadhammarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti māyāya samānakāraṇajātikaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a0:575_1: Māyākāropi hi udakaṃ gahetvā telaṃ karoti, telaṃ gahetvā udakanti evaṃ anekarūpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:575_2: māyaṃ dasseti. Idampi pāṭihāriyaṃ tathārūpamevāti. Idampi me, bho gotama, pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:575_3: māyāsahadhammarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti cintāmaṇikavijjāsarikkhakataṃ sandhāya evaṃ āha.
atk-s0402a0:575_4: Cintāmaṇikavijjaṃ jānantāpi hi āgacchantameva disvā “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma vitakkento āgacchatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:575_5: jānanti. Tathā “idaṃ nāma vitakkento ṭhito, idaṃ nāma vitakkento nisinno, idaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:576_0: Abhikkantataranti sundarataraṃ. Paṇītataranti uttamataraṃ. Bhavañhi gotamo avitakkaṃ
atk-s0402a0:576_1: avicāranti idha brāhmaṇo avasesaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ bāhirakanti na gaṇhi. Idañca
atk-s0402a0:576_2: pana sabbaṃ so brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentoyeva āha. Addhā kho tyāyanti
atk-s0402a0:576_3: ekaṃseneva tayā ayaṃ. Āsajja upanīya vācā bhāsitāti mama guṇe ghaṭṭetvā mameva guṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:576_4: santikaṃ upanītā vācā bhāsitā. Apica tyāhaṃ byākarissāmīti apica te ahameva kathessāmīti.
atk-s0402a0:578_0: 62. Dutiyassa paṭhame titthāyatanānīti titthabhūtāni āyatanāni, titthiyānaṃ vā āyatanāni.
atk-s0402a0:578_1: Tattha titthaṃ jānitabbaṃ, titthakarā jānitabbā, titthiyā jānitabbā, titthiyasāvakā
atk-s0402a0:578_2: jānitabbā. Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo. Titthikarā nāma tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādakā.
atk-s0402a0:578_3: Titthiyā nāma yesaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo ruccanti khamanti. Titthiyasāvakā nāma tesaṃ paccayadāyakā.
atk-s0402a0:578_4: Āyatananti “kambojo assānaṃ āyatanaṃ, gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:581_0: Ettha samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, vimuttāyatanānī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:581_1: Taṃ idha sabbampi labbhati. Sabbepi hi diṭṭhigatikā sañjāyamānā imesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu
atk-s0402a0:581_2: sañjāyanti, samosaraṇamānāpi etesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu samosaranti sannipatanti, diṭṭhigatikabhāve
atk-s0402a0:581_3: ca nesaṃ etāneva tīṇi kāraṇānīti titthabhūtāni sañjātiādinā atthena āyatanānītipi
atk-s0402a0:581_4: titthāyatanāni. Tenevatthena titthiyānaṃ āyatanānītipi titthāyatanāni. Samanuyuñjiyamānānīti
atk-s0402a0:581_5: kā nāmetā diṭṭhiyoti evaṃ pucchiyamānāni. Samanugāhiyamānānīti kiṃkāraṇā etā diṭṭhiyo
atk-s0402a0:581_6: uppannāti evaṃ sammā anuggāhiyamānāni. Samanubhāsiyamānānīti paṭinissajjetha etāni
atk-s0402a0:581_7: pāpakāni diṭṭhigatānīti evaṃ sammā anusāsiyamānāni. Apica tīṇipi etāni anuyogapucchāvevacanāneva.
atk-s0402a0:581_8: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “samanuyuñjatīti vā samanuggāhatīti vā samanubhāsatīti
atk-s0402a0:581_9: vā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:582_0: Parampi gantvāti ācariyaparamparā laddhiparamparā attabhāvaparamparāti etesu yaṃkiñci
atk-s0402a0:582_1: paramparaṃ gantvāpi. Akiriyāya saṇṭhahantīti akiriyamatte saṃtiṭṭhanti. “Amhākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:582_2: ācariyo pubbekatavādī, amhākaṃ pācariyo pubbekatavādī, amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo pubbekatavādī.
atk-s0402a0:582_3: Amhākaṃ ācariyo issaranimmānavādī, amhākaṃ pācariyo issaranimmānavādī, amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo
atk-s0402a0:582_4: issaranimmānavādī. Amhākaṃ ācariyo ahetuapaccayavādī, amhākaṃ pācariyo ahetuapaccayavādī,
atk-s0402a0:582_5: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo ahetuapaccayavādī”ti evaṃ gacchantāni hi etāni ācariyaparamparaṃ
atk-s0402a0:582_6: gacchanti nāma. “Amhākaṃ ācariyo pubbekataladdhiko, amhākaṃ pācariyo…pe… amhākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:582_7: ācariyapācariyo ahetuapaccayaladdhiko”ti evaṃ gacchantāni laddhiparamparaṃ gacchanti
atk-s0402a0:582_8: nāma. “Amhākaṃ ācariyassa attabhāvo pubbekatahetu, amhākaṃ pācariyassa…pe… amhākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:582_9: ācariyapācariyassa attabhāvo ahetu apaccayo”ti evaṃ gacchantāni attabhāvaparamparaṃ
atk-s0402a0:582_10: gacchanti nāma. Evaṃ pana suvidūrampi gacchantāni akiriyamatteyeva saṇṭhahanti, ekopi
atk-s0402a0:582_11: etesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ kattā vā kāretā vā na paññāyati.
atk-s0402a0:583_0: Purisapuggaloti satto. Kāmañca purisotipi vutte puggalotipi vutte sattoyeva vutto
atk-s0402a0:583_1: hoti, ayaṃ pana sammutikathā nāma yo yathā jānāti, tassa tathā vuccati. Paṭisaṃvedetīti
atk-s0402a0:583_2: attano santāne uppannaṃ jānāti paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti, anubhavati vā. Pubbekatahetūti
atk-s0402a0:583_3: pubbekatakāraṇā, pubbekatakammapaccayeneva paṭisaṃvedetīti attho. Iminā kammavedanañca
atk-s0402a0:583_4: kiriyavedanañca paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanameva sampaṭicchanti. Ye vā ime pittasamuṭṭhānā
atk-s0402a0:583_5: ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā vātasamuṭṭhānā sannipātikā utupariṇāmajā visamaparihārajā
atk-s0402a0:583_6: opakkamikā ābādhā kammavipākajā ābādhāti aṭṭha rogā vuttā, tesu satta paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:583_7: ekaṃ vipākavedanaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti. Yepime diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:583_8: aparapariyāyavedanīyanti tayo kammarāsayo vuttā, tesupi dve paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ aparapariyāyakammaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:583_9: sampaṭicchanti. Yepime diṭṭhadhammavedanīyo vipāko upapajjavedanīyo aparapariyāyavedanīyoti
atk-s0402a0:583_10: tayo vipākarāsayo vuttā, tesupi dve paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ aparapariyāyavipākameva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:583_11: Yepime kusalacetanā akusalacetanā vipākacetanā kiriyacetanāti cattāro cetanārāsayo
atk-s0402a0:583_12: vuttā, tesupi tayo paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ vipākacetanaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:584_0: Issaranimmānahetūti issaranimmānakāraṇā, issarena nimmitattā paṭisaṃvedetīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:584_1: Ayaṃ hi tesaṃ adhippāyo – imā tisso vedanā paccuppanne attanā katamūlakena vā āṇattimūlakena
atk-s0402a0:584_2: vā pubbekatena vā ahetuapaccayā vā paṭisaṃvedituṃ nāma na sakkā, issaranimmānakāraṇāyeva
atk-s0402a0:584_3: pana imā paṭisaṃvedetīti. Evaṃvādino panete heṭṭhā vuttesu aṭṭhasu rogesu ekampi
atk-s0402a0:584_4: asampaṭicchitvā sabbe paṭibāhanti, heṭṭhā vuttesu ca tīsu kammarāsīsu tīsu vipākarāsīsu
atk-s0402a0:584_5: catūsu cetanārāsīsu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbepi paṭibāhanti.
atk-s0402a0:585_0: Ahetuapaccayāti hetuñca paccayañca vinā, akāraṇeneva paṭisaṃvedetīti attho. Ayañhi
atk-s0402a0:585_1: nesaṃ adhippāyo – imā tisso vedanā paccuppanne attanā katamūlakena vā āṇattimūlakena
atk-s0402a0:585_2: vā pubbekatena vā issaranimmānahetunā vā paṭisaṃvedituṃ nāma na sakkā, ahetuapaccayāyeva
atk-s0402a0:585_3: pana imā paṭisaṃvedetīti. Evaṃvādino panete heṭṭhā vuttesu rogādīsu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ paṭibāhanti.
atk-s0402a0:586_0: Evaṃ satthā mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā idāni taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ tatra, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:586_1: Tattha evaṃ vadāmīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti dasseti. Laddhiñhi appatiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:586_2: niggayhamānā laddhito laddhiṃ saṅkamanti, bho gotama, na mayaṃ pubbekatavādaṃ vadāmātiādīni
atk-s0402a0:586_3: vadanti. Laddhiyā pana patiṭṭhāpitāya saṅkamituṃ alabhantā suniggahitā honti, iti
atk-s0402a0:586_4: nesaṃ laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti āha. Tenahāyasmantoti tena hi āyasmanto.
atk-s0402a0:586_5: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadi etaṃ saccaṃ, evaṃ sante tena tumhākaṃ vādena. Pāṇātipātino
atk-s0402a0:586_6: bhavissanti pubbekatahetūti ye keci loke pāṇaṃ atipātenti, sabbe te pubbekatahetu
atk-s0402a0:586_7: pāṇātipātino bhavissanti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Na hi pāṇātipātakammaṃ attanā katamūlakena na
atk-s0402a0:586_8: āṇattimūlakena na issaranimmānahetunā na ahetuapaccayā sakkā paṭisaṃvedetuṃ, pubbekatahetuyeva
atk-s0402a0:586_9: paṭisaṃvedetīti ayaṃ vo laddhi. Yathā ca pāṇātipātino, evaṃ pāṇātipātā viramantāpi
atk-s0402a0:586_10: pubbekatahetuyeva viramissantīti. Iti bhagavā tesaṃyeva laddhiṃ gahetvā tesaṃ niggahaṃ
atk-s0402a0:586_11: āropeti. Iminā nayena adinnādāyinotiādīsupi yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:587_0: Sārato paccāgacchatanti sārabhāvena gaṇhantānaṃ. Chandoti kattukamyatāchando. Idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:587_1: vā karaṇīyaṃ idaṃ vā akaraṇīyanti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo – idaṃ vā karaṇīyanti kattabbassa
atk-s0402a0:587_2: karaṇatthāya, idaṃ vā akaraṇīyanti akattabbassa akaraṇatthāya kattukamyatā vā paccattapurisakāro
atk-s0402a0:587_3: vā na hoti. Chandavāyāmesu vā asantesu “idaṃ kattabba”ntipi “idaṃ na kattabba”ntipi
atk-s0402a0:587_4: na hoti. Iti karaṇīyākaraṇīye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamāneti evaṃ kattabbe
atk-s0402a0:587_5: ca akattabbe ca bhūtato thirato apaññāyamāne alabbhamāne. Yadi hi kattabbaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:587_6: akattabbato ca viramituṃ labheyya, karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṃ saccato thetato upalabbheyya.
atk-s0402a0:587_7: Yasmā pana ubhayampi taṃ esa nupalabbhati, tasmā taṃ saccato thetato na upalabbhati,
atk-s0402a0:587_8: evaṃ tasmiṃ ca anupalabbhiyamāneti attho. Muṭṭhassatīnanti naṭṭhassatīnaṃ vissaṭṭhassatīnaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:587_9: Anārakkhānaṃ viharatanti chasu dvāresu nirārakkhānaṃ viharantānaṃ. Na hoti paccattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:587_10: sahadhammiko samaṇavādoti evaṃ bhūtānaṃ tumhākaṃ vā aññesaṃ vā mayaṃ samaṇāti paccattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:587_11: sakāraṇo samaṇavādo na hoti na ijjhati. Samaṇāpi hi pubbekatakāraṇāyeva honti, assamaṇāpi
atk-s0402a0:587_12: pubbekatakāraṇāyevāti. Sahadhammikoti sakāraṇo. Niggaho hotīti mama niggaho hoti,
atk-s0402a0:588: Evaṃ pubbekatavādino niggahetvā idāni issaranimmānavādino niggahetuṃ tatra, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tassattho pubbekatavāde vuttanayeneva veditabbo, tathā ahetukavādepi.
atk-s0402a0:589_0: Evaṃ imesaṃ titthāyatanānaṃ parampi gantvā akiriyāya saṇṭhahanabhāvena tucchabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:589_3: atthadassanatāya abhāvena andhaveṇūpamataṃ saddamatteneva tāni gahetvā sāradiṭṭhikānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:589_4: pathaviyaṃ patitassa beluvapakkassa daddabhāyitasaddaṃ sutvā “pathavī saṃvaṭṭamānā
atk-s0402a0:589_5: āgacchatī”ti saññāya palāyantena sasakena sarikkhabhāvañca dassetvā idāni attanā
atk-s0402a0:589_6: desitassa dhammassa sārabhāvañceva niyyānikabhāvañca dassetuṃ ayaṃ kho pana, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:589_7: Tattha aniggahitoti aññehi aniggahito niggahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo. Asaṃkiliṭṭhoti nikkileso
atk-s0402a0:589_8: parisuddho, “saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ naṃ karissāmā”ti pavattehipi tathā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyo. Anupavajjoti
atk-s0402a0:589_9: upavādavinimutto. Appaṭikuṭṭhoti “kiṃ iminā haratha na”nti evaṃ appaṭibāhito, anupakkuṭṭho
atk-s0402a0:589_10: vā. Viññūhīti paṇḍitehi. Apaṇḍitānañhi ajānitvā kathentānaṃ vacanaṃ appamāṇaṃ. Tasmā viññūhīti āha.
atk-s0402a0:590_0: Idāni tassa dhammassa dassanatthaṃ “katamo ca, bhikkhave”ti pañhaṃ pucchitvā “imā
atk-s0402a0:590_1: cha dhātuyo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā yathāpaṭipāṭiyā vibhajitvā dassento
atk-s0402a0:590_2: puna imā cha dhātuyotiādimāha. Tattha dhātuyoti sabhāvā. Nijjīvanissattabhāvappakāsako
atk-s0402a0:590_3: hi sabhāvaṭṭho dhātvaṭṭho nāma. Phassāyatanānīti vipākaphassānaṃ ākaraṭṭhena āyatanāni.
atk-s0402a0:590_4: Manopavicārāti vitakkavicārapādehi aṭṭhārasasu ṭhānesu manassa upavicārā.
atk-s0402a0:591_0: Pathavīdhātūti patiṭṭhādhātu. Āpodhātūti ābandhanadhātu. Tejodhātūti paripācanadhātu.
atk-s0402a0:591_1: Vāyodhātūti vitthambhanadhātu. Ākāsadhātūti asamphuṭṭhadhātu. Viññāṇadhātūti vijānanadhātu.
atk-s0402a0:591_2: Evamidaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ. Taṃ kho panetaṃ saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepatopi
atk-s0402a0:591_3: vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:591_4: vitthāratova vaṭṭati. Imasmiṃ pana titthāyatanasutte idaṃ saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena
atk-s0402a0:591_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ. Taṃ ubhayathāpi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:592_0: Saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggaṇhantopi evaṃ pariggaṇhāti – pathavīdhātu
atk-s0402a0:592_1: āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti imāni cattāri mahābhūtāni, ākāsadhātu upādārūpaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:592_2: Ekasmiṃ ca upādārūpe diṭṭhe sesāni tevīsati diṭṭhānevāti sallakkhetabbāni. Viññāṇadhātūti
atk-s0402a0:592_3: cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho hoti, tena sahajātā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho,
atk-s0402a0:592_4: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā nāma. Cattāri pana
atk-s0402a0:592_5: mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma. Tattha cattāro
atk-s0402a0:592_6: arūpakkhandhā nāmaṃ, rūpakkhandho rūpanti nāmañca rūpañcāti dveyeva dhammā honti,
atk-s0402a0:592_7: tato uddhaṃ satto vā jīvo vā natthīti evaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena
atk-s0402a0:593_0: Vitthārato pariggaṇhanto pana cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggaṇhitvā ākāsadhātupariggahānusārena
atk-s0402a0:593_1: tevīsati upādārūpāni pariggaṇhāti. Atha nesaṃ paccayaṃ upaparikkhanto puna cattāreva
atk-s0402a0:593_2: mahābhūtāni disvā tesu pathavīdhātu vīsatikoṭṭhāsā, āpodhātu dvādasa, tejodhātu cattāro,
atk-s0402a0:593_3: vāyodhātu chakoṭṭhāsāti koṭṭhāsavasena samodhānetvā dvācattālīsa mahābhūtāni ca vavatthapetvā
atk-s0402a0:593_4: tesu tevīsati upādārūpāni pakkhipitvā pañcasaṭṭhi rūpāni vavatthapeti. Tāni ca vatthurūpena
atk-s0402a0:593_5: saddhiṃ chasaṭṭhi hontīti chasaṭṭhi rūpāni passati. Viññāṇadhātu pana lokiyacittavasena
atk-s0402a0:593_6: ekāsīti cittāni. Tāni sabbānipi viññāṇakkhandho nāma hoti. Tehi sahajātā vedanādayopi
atk-s0402a0:593_7: tattakāyevāti ekāsīti vedanā vedanākkhandho, ekāsīti saññā saññākkhandho, ekāsīti
atk-s0402a0:593_8: cetanā saṅkhārakkhandhoti ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā tebhūmakavasena gayhamānā catuvīsādhikāni
atk-s0402a0:593_9: tīṇi dhammasatāni hontīti iti ime ca arūpadhammā chasaṭṭhi ca rūpadhammāti sabbepi
atk-s0402a0:593_10: samodhānetvā nāmañca rūpañcāti dveva dhammā honti, tato uddhaṃ satto vā jīvo vā natthīti
atk-s0402a0:593_11: nāmarūpavasena pañcakkhandhe vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0402a0:593_12: taṇhāpaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayāti evaṃ paccayaṃ disvā “atītepi imehi paccayehi
atk-s0402a0:593_13: idaṃ vaṭṭaṃ pavattittha, anāgatepi etehi paccayehi pavattissati, etarahipi etehiyeva
atk-s0402a0:593_14: pavattatī”ti tīsu kālesu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:593_15: Evaṃ vitthāratopi chadhātuvasena arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:594_0: Cakkhu phassāyatananti suvaṇṇādīnaṃ suvaṇṇādiākaro viya dve cakkhuviññāṇāni dve sampaṭicchanāni
atk-s0402a0:594_1: tīṇi santīraṇānīti imehi sattahi viññāṇehi sahajātānaṃ sattannaṃ phassānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:594_2: ākaroti āyatanaṃ. Sotaṃ phassāyatanantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Mano phassāyatananti ettha
atk-s0402a0:594_3: pana dvāvīsati vipākaphassā yojetabbā. Iti hidaṃ chaphassāyatanānaṃ vasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:594_4: āgataṃ. Taṃ saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetabbaṃ. Saṅkhepato tāva – ettha hi purimāni
atk-s0402a0:594_5: pañca āyatanāni upādārūpaṃ, tesu diṭṭhesu avasesaṃ upādārūpaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Chaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:594_6: āyatanaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ viññāṇakkhandho hoti, tena sahajātā vedanādayo sesā tayo arūpakkhandhāti
atk-s0402a0:594_7: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:595_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvā. Somanassaṭṭhāniyanti somanassassa
atk-s0402a0:595_1: kāraṇabhūtaṃ. Upavicaratīti tattha manaṃ cārento upavicarati. Sesapadesupi eseva
atk-s0402a0:595_2: nayo. Ettha ca iṭṭhaṃ vā hotu aniṭṭhaṃ vā, yaṃ rūpaṃ disvā somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:595_3: taṃ somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ nāma. Yaṃ disvā domanassaṃ uppajjati, taṃ domanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:595_4: nāma. Yaṃ disvā upekkhā uppajjati, taṃ upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Saddādīsupi
atk-s0402a0:595_5: eseva nayo. Iti idaṃ saṅkhepato kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ. Taṃ kho panetaṃ saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:595_6: saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepato kathetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:595_7: na vaṭṭati. Imasmiṃ pana titthāyatanasutte idaṃ saṅkhepato aṭṭhārasamanopavicāravasena
atk-s0402a0:595_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ. Taṃ saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:596_0: Tattha saṅkhepato tāva – cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo, rūpaṃ saddo gandho rasoti
atk-s0402a0:596_1: imāni nava upādārūpāni, tesu diṭṭhesu sesaṃ upādārūpaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Phoṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:596_2: tīṇi mahābhūtāni, tehi diṭṭhehi catutthaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Mano viññāṇakkhandho,
atk-s0402a0:596_3: tena sahajātā vedanādayo tayo arūpakkhandhāti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṅkhepato ca
atk-s0402a0:597_0: Ariyasaccānīti ariyabhāvakarāni, ariyapaṭividdhāni vā saccāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0402a0:597_1: vitthārato panetaṃ padaṃ visuddhimagge pakāsitaṃ. Channaṃ, bhikkhave, dhātūnanti
atk-s0402a0:597_2: idaṃ kimatthaṃ āraddhaṃ? Sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ. Yassa hi tathāgato dvādasapadaṃ paccayāvaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0402a0:597_3: kathetukāmo hoti, tassa gabbhāvakkanti vaṭṭaṃ dasseti. Gabbhāvakkanti vaṭṭasmiṃ hi
atk-s0402a0:597_4: dassite kathetumpi sukhaṃ hoti paraṃ avabodhe utumpīti sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ idamāraddhanti
atk-s0402a0:597_5: veditabbaṃ. Tattha channaṃ dhātūnanti heṭṭhā vuttānaṃyeva pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ. Upādāyāti
atk-s0402a0:597_6: paṭicca. Etena paccayamattaṃ dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “chadhātupaccayā gabbhassāvakkanti
atk-s0402a0:597_7: hotī”ti. Kassa channaṃ dhātūnaṃ paccayena, kiṃ mātu, udāhu pitūti? Na mātu na pitu,
atk-s0402a0:597_8: paṭisandhiggaṇhanakasattasseva pana channaṃ dhātūnaṃ paccayena gabbhassāvakkanti
atk-s0402a0:597_9: nāma hoti. Gabbho ca nāmesa nirayagabbho tiracchānayonigabbho pettivisayagabbho manussagabbho
atk-s0402a0:597_10: devagabbhoti nānappakāro hoti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne manussagabbho adhippeto. Avakkanti
atk-s0402a0:597_11: hotīti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvo hoti, kathaṃ hotīti? Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātena. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:598_0: “Tiṇṇaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipātā gabbhassāvakkanti hoti. Katamesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:598_1: Idha mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā honti, mātā ca na utunī hoti, gandhabbo ca na paccupaṭṭhito
atk-s0402a0:598_2: hoti. Neva tāva gabbhassāvakkanti hoti. Idha mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā honti, mātā
atk-s0402a0:598_3: ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo ca na paccupaṭṭhito hoti, neva tāva gabbhassāvakkanti hoti.
atk-s0402a0:598_4: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā honti, mātā ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo
atk-s0402a0:598_5: ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti. Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhassāvakkanti hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:599_0: Okkantiyā sati nāmarūpanti “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṭṭhāne vatthudasakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:599_1: kāyadasakaṃ bhāvadasakaṃ tayo arūpino khandhāti tettiṃsa dhammā gahitā, imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:599_2: “okkantiyā sati nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṭṭhāne viññāṇakkhandhampi pakkhipitvā gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:599_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe catuttiṃsa dhammā gahitāti veditabbā. Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanantiādīhi
atk-s0402a0:599_4: yatheva okkantiyā sati nāmarūpapātubhāvo dassito, evaṃ nāmarūpe sati saḷāyatanapātubhāvo,
atk-s0402a0:599_5: saḷāyatane sati phassapātubhāvo, phasse sati vedanāpātubhāvo dassito.
atk-s0402a0:600_0: Vediyamānassāti ettha vedanaṃ anubhavantopi vediyamānoti vuccati jānantopi. “Vediyāmahaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:600_1: bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti ettha hi anubhavanto vediyamāno nāma, “sukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:600_2: vedanaṃ vediyamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātī”ti ettha jānanto. Idhāpi jānantova
atk-s0402a0:600_3: adhippeto. Idaṃ dukkhanti paññapemīti evaṃ jānantassa sattassa “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ettakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:600_4: dukkhaṃ, natthi ito uddhaṃ dukkha”nti paññapemi bodhemi jānāpemi. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:601_0: Tattha dukkhādīsu ayaṃ sanniṭṭhānakathā – ṭhapetvā hi taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā
atk-s0402a0:601_1: dukkhaṃ nāma, tasseva pabhāvikā pubbataṇhā dukkhasamudayo nāma, tesaṃ dvinnampi saccānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:601_2: anuppattinirodho dukkhanirodho nāma, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā
atk-s0402a0:601_3: nāma. Iti bhagavā okkantiyā sati nāmarūpanti kathentopi vediyamānassa jānamānasseva
atk-s0402a0:601_4: kathesi, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatananti kathentopi, saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti kathentopi,
atk-s0402a0:601_5: phassapaccayā vedanāti kathentopi, vediyamānassa kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, idaṃ dukkhanti
atk-s0402a0:601_6: paññapemīti kathentopi, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī
atk-s0402a0:601_7: paṭipadāti paññapemīti kathentopi vediyamānassa jānamānasseva kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:602_0: Idāni tāni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitāni saccāni vitthārento katamañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:602_1: Taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. Tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:602_2: Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha “dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā”ti
atk-s0402a0:602_3: imāya tantiyā āgataṃ, idha “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti paccayākāravasena. Tattha ca
atk-s0402a0:602_4: dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho”ti imāya tantiyā
atk-s0402a0:603_0: Tattha asesavirāganirodhāti asesavirāgena ca asesanirodhena ca. Ubhayampetaṃ aññamaññavevacanameva.
atk-s0402a0:603_1: Saṅkhāranirodhoti saṅkhārānaṃ anuppattinirodho hoti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Imehi
atk-s0402a0:603_2: pana padehi yaṃ āgamma avijjādayo nirujjhanti, atthato taṃ nibbānaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:603_3: Nibbānañhi avijjānirodhotipi saṅkhāranirodhotipi evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ nirodhanāmena
atk-s0402a0:603_4: kathīyati. Kevalassāti sakalassa. Dukkhakkhandhassāti vaṭṭadukkharāsissa. Nirodho
atk-s0402a0:603_5: hotīti appavatti hoti. Tattha yasmā avijjādīnaṃ nirodho nāma khīṇākāropi vuccati
atk-s0402a0:603_6: arahattampi nibbānampi, tasmā idha khīṇākāradassanavasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:603_7: dvādasasuyeva nibbānaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ vuccatīti ettha nibbānameva sandhāya
atk-s0402a0:603_8: idanti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgikoti na aṭṭhahi aṅgehi vinimutto añño maggo nāma atthi. Yathā
atk-s0402a0:603_9: pana pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyanti vutte pañcaṅgamattameva tūriyanti vuttaṃ hoti, evamidhāpi
atk-s0402a0:603_10: aṭṭhaṅgikamattameva maggo hotīti veditabbo. Aniggahitoti na niggahito. Niggaṇhanto
atk-s0402a0:603_11: hi hāpetvā vā dasseti vaḍḍhetvā vā taṃ parivattetvā vā. Tattha yasmā cattāri ariyasaccāni
atk-s0402a0:603_12: “na imāni cattāri, dve vā tīṇi vā”ti evaṃ hāpetvāpi “pañca vā cha vā”ti evaṃ vaḍḍhetvāpi
atk-s0402a0:603_13: “na imāni cattāri ariyasaccāni, aññāneva cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti dassetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a0:603_14: Tasmā ayaṃ dhammo aniggahito nāma. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:605_0: 63. Dutiye amātāputtikānīti mātā ca putto ca mātāputtaṃ, parittātuṃ samatthabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:605_1: natthi ettha mātāputtanti amātāputtikāni. Yanti yasmiṃ samaye. Tattha mātāpi puttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:605_2: nappaṭilabhatīti tasmiṃ aggibhaye uppanne mātāpi puttaṃ passituṃ na labhati, puttopi
atk-s0402a0:605_3: mātaraṃ passituṃ na labhatīti attho. Bhayaṃ hotīti cittutrāsabhayaṃ hoti. Aṭavisaṅkopoti
atk-s0402a0:605_4: aṭaviyā saṅkopo. Aṭavīti cettha aṭavivāsino corā veditabbā. Yadā hi te aṭavito janapadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:605_5: otaritvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo paharitvā vilumpanti, tadā aṭavisaṅkopo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:605_6: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Cakkasamārūḷhāti ettha iriyāpathacakkampi vaṭṭati yānacakkampi.
atk-s0402a0:605_7: Bhayasmiṃ hi sampatte yesaṃ yānakāni atthi, te attano parikkhārabhaṇḍaṃ tesu āropetvā
atk-s0402a0:605_8: palāyanti. Yesaṃ natthi, te kājena vā ādāya sīsena vā ukkhipitvā palāyantiyeva. Te
atk-s0402a0:605_9: cakkasamārūḷhā nāma honti. Pariyāyantīti ito cito ca gacchanti. Kadācīti kismiñcideva
atk-s0402a0:605_10: kāle. Karahacīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhatīti āgacchantaṃ vā gacchantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:605_11: vā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīnaṃ vā passituṃ labhati. Udakavāhakoti nadīpūro. Mātāpi puttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:605_12: paṭilabhatīti kulle vā uḷumpe vā mattikābhājane vā dārukkhaṇḍe vā laggaṃ vuyhamānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:605_13: passituṃ paṭilabhati, sotthinā vā puna uttaritvā gāme vā araññe vā ṭhitaṃ passituṃ labhatīti.
atk-s0402a0:606_0: Evaṃ pariyāyato amātāputtikāni bhayāni dassetvā idāni nippariyāyena dassento tīṇimānītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:606_1: Tattha jarābhayanti jaraṃ paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Vuttampi
atk-s0402a0:606_2: cetaṃ – “jaraṃ paṭicca uppajjati bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso
atk-s0402a0:606_3: utrāso. Byādhiṃ paṭicca, maraṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:606_4: lomahaṃso cetaso utrāso”ti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:608_0: 64. Tatiye kosalesūti evaṃnāmake janapade. Cārikaṃ caramānoti addhānagamanaṃ gacchanto.
atk-s0402a0:608_1: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā hoti turitacārikā ca aturitacārikā cāti. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:608_2: dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:608_3: Sā mahākassapapaccuggamanādīsu daṭṭhabbā. Yaṃ pana gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:608_4: yojanaaddhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ, ayaṃ aturitacārikā
atk-s0402a0:608_5: nāma. Imaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “cārikaṃ caramāno”ti. Vitthārena pana cārikākathā
atk-s0402a0:608_7: brāhmaṇānaṃ samosaraṇagāmopi brāhmaṇagāmoti vuccati, brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmopi. Idha
atk-s0402a0:608_8: samosaraṇagāmo brāhmaṇavasanagāmoti adhippeto. Tadavasarīti tattha avasari, sampattoti
atk-s0402a0:608_9: attho. Vihāro panettha aniyāmito. Tasmā tassa avidūre buddhānaṃ anucchaviko eko vanasaṇḍo
atk-s0402a0:608_10: atthi, satthā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ gatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:609_0: Assosunti suṇiṃsu upalabhiṃsu, sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena jāniṃsu. Khoti
atk-s0402a0:609_1: avadhāraṇatthe, padapūraṇamatte vā nipāto. Tattha avadhāraṇatthena “assosuṃ eva,
atk-s0402a0:609_2: na tesaṃ koci savanantarāyo ahosī”ti ayamattho veditabbo. Padapūraṇena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattameva.
atk-s0402a0:610_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ assosuṃ, taṃ pakāsetuṃ samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:610_1: samitapāpattā samaṇoti veditabbo. Khalūti anussavatthe nipāto. Bhoti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:610_2: ālapanamattaṃ. Gotamoti bhagavato gottavasena paridīpanaṃ, tasmā “samaṇo khalu, bho,
atk-s0402a0:610_3: gotamo”ti ettha samaṇo kira, bho, gotamagottoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Sakyaputtoti
atk-s0402a0:610_4: idaṃ pana bhagavato uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. Sakyakulā pabbajitoti saddhāpabbajitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:610_5: kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti
atk-s0402a0:610_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ kho panāti itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tassa kho pana
atk-s0402a0:610_7: bhoto gotamassāti attho. Kalyāṇoti kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato, seṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:610_8: Kittisaddoti kittiyeva, thutighoso vā. Abbhuggatoti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā
atk-s0402a0:610_9: uggato. Kinti? Itipi so bhagavā…pe… buddho bhagavāti. Tatrāyaṃ padasambandho – so
atk-s0402a0:610_10: bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavāti. Iminā ca iminā ca
atk-s0402a0:611_0: Tattha “ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti
atk-s0402a0:611_1: imehi kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā sabbāneva
atk-s0402a0:611_2: etāni padāni visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritānīti tato nesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
atk-s0402a0:612_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhavaṃ gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ, idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. Sadevakanti
atk-s0402a0:612_1: saha devehi sadevakaṃ. Evaṃ saha mārena samārakaṃ. Saha brahmunā sabrahmakaṃ. Saha
atk-s0402a0:612_2: samaṇabrāhmaṇehi sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ. Pajātattā pajā, taṃ pajaṃ. Saha devamanussehi
atk-s0402a0:612_3: sadevamanussaṃ. Tattha sadevakavacanena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, samārakavacanena
atk-s0402a0:612_7: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattalokova gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:613_0: Aparo nayo – sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito, samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko,
atk-s0402a0:613_2: sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko, avasesasabbasattaloko vā. Porāṇā panāhu – sadevakanti
atk-s0402a0:613_3: devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. Samārakanti mārena saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. Sabrahmakanti
atk-s0402a0:613_4: brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu
atk-s0402a0:613_5: pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādātuṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussanti
atk-s0402a0:613_6: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
atk-s0402a0:614_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti sayanti sāmaṃ, aparaneyyo hutvā. Abhiññāti abhiññāya,
atk-s0402a0:614_1: adhikena ñāṇena ñatvāti attho. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā, etena anumānādipaṭikkhepo
atk-s0402a0:615_0: So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe… pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ
atk-s0402a0:615_1: paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:615_2: desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti, ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva
atk-s0402a0:615_3: katvā deseti, majjhepi, pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:616_0: Tattha atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ, atthi sāsanassa. Desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi
atk-s0402a0:616_1: gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma, tato dve majjhaṃ nāma, ante eko pariyosānaṃ nāma. Ekānusandhikassa
atk-s0402a0:616_2: suttassa nidānaṃ ādi, idamavocāti pariyosānaṃ, ubhinnaṃ antarā majjhaṃ. Anekānusandhikassa
atk-s0402a0:616_3: suttassa paṭhamānusandhi ādi, ante anusandhi pariyosānaṃ, majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū vā majjhameva.
atk-s0402a0:617_0: Sāsanassa sīlasamādhivipassanā ādi nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:617_1: sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti. “Atthi, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena
atk-s0402a0:617_2: abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāma. Phalañceva nibbānañca pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:617_3: nāma. “Tasmātiha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyaṃ etaṃpāraṃ etaṃpariyosāna”nti ettha
atk-s0402a0:617_4: phalaṃ pariyosananti vuttaṃ. “Nibbānogadhañhi, āvuso visākha, brahmacariyaṃ vussati
atk-s0402a0:617_5: nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ettha nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ. Idha
atk-s0402a0:617_6: pana desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi
atk-s0402a0:617_7: sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti. Tena vuttaṃ – “so dhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:617_8: deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇa”nti. Tasmā aññopi dhammakathiko dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0402a0:620_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanānissitā desanā hoti,
atk-s0402a0:620_1: na so sātthaṃ deseti. Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:620_2: desanaṃ deseti. Tasmā “sātthaṃ desetī”ti vuccati. Yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā
atk-s0402a0:620_3: vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā,
atk-s0402a0:620_4: tassa damiḷakirātayavanādimilakkhānaṃ bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā
atk-s0402a0:622: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:623_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0402a0:623_1: Tasmā “sabyañjanaṃ katvā desetī”ti vuccati. Kevalaparipuṇṇanti ettha kevalanti sakalādhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:623_2: Paripuṇṇanti anūnādhikavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sakalaparipuṇṇameva deseti, ekadesanāpi
atk-s0402a0:623_3: aparipuṇṇā natthīti. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Yo hi “imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya
atk-s0402a0:623_4: lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmī”ti deseti, tassa aparisuddhā desanā nāma hoti. Bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:623_5: pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇeneva mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena
atk-s0402a0:623_6: cittena deseti. Tasmā parisuddhaṃ desetīti vuccati. Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha
atk-s0402a0:623_7: brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ. Tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti
atk-s0402a0:623_8: so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe… parisuddhaṃ, evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:623_9: sakalasāsanabrahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Brahmacariyanti seṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:623_10: brahmabhūtaṃ cariyaṃ, brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:624_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana, atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathārūpānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:624_1: arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo, evarūpānaṃ anekehipi kappakoṭisatasahassehi
atk-s0402a0:624_4: loke arahantoti laddhasaddānaṃ arahataṃ. Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā
atk-s0402a0:624_5: dassanamattampi sādhu hoti. Sace pana aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena brahmassarena dhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:624_6: desentassa ekapadampi sotuṃ labhissāma, sādhutaraṃyeva bhavissatīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:624_7: katvā. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti sabbakiccāni pahāya tuṭṭhamānasā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:624_8: Añjaliṃ paṇāmetvāti ete ubhatopakkhikā, te evaṃ cintesuṃ – “sace no micchādiṭṭhikā
atk-s0402a0:624_9: codessanti ‘kasmā tumhe samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vanditthā’ti, tesaṃ ‘kiṃ añjalikaraṇamattenāpi
atk-s0402a0:624_10: vanditaṃ hotī’ti vakkhāma. Sace no sammādiṭṭhikā codessanti ‘kasmā bhagavantaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:624_11: vanditthā’ti, ‘kiṃ sīsena bhūmiṃ paharanteneva vanditaṃ hoti. Nanu añjalikammampi
atk-s0402a0:625_0: Nāmagottanti, “bho gotama, ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idhāgato”ti
atk-s0402a0:625_1: vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma. “Bho gotama, ahaṃ vāseṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idhāgato”ti
atk-s0402a0:625_2: vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma. Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā “parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena
atk-s0402a0:625_3: pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti evaṃ akaṃsu. Ye pana tuṇhībhūtā nisīdiṃsu, te kerāṭikā ceva
atk-s0402a0:625_4: andhabālā ca. Tattha kerāṭikā “ekaṃ dve kathāsallāpe karonte vissāsiko hoti, atha
