atk-s0402a0:625_5: vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhībhūtā
atk-s0402a0:625_6: nisīdanti. Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍā viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0402a0:626_0: Venāgapurikoti venāgapuravāsī. Etadavocāti pādantato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggā tathāgatassa
atk-s0402a0:626_2: sarīrā nikkhamitvā samantato asītihatthappadesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāhi chabbaṇṇāhi
atk-s0402a0:626_3: ghanabuddharaṃsīhi samparivāritaṃ tathāgatassa sarīraṃ disvā sañjātavimhayo vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:627_1: saddhiṃ sambandho. Yāvañca vippasannāni adhimattavippasannānīti attho. Indriyānīti
atk-s0402a0:627_2: cakkhādīni cha indriyāni. Tassa hi pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsassa vippasannataṃ
atk-s0402a0:627_3: disvā tesaṃ vippasannatā pākaṭā ahosi. Yasmā pana sā mane vippasanneyeva hoti, avippasannacittānañhi
atk-s0402a0:627_4: indriyappasādo nāma natthi, tasmāssa manindriyappasādopi pākaṭo ahosi. Taṃ esa vippasannataṃ
atk-s0402a0:627_5: gahetvā “vippasannāni indriyānī”ti āha. Parisuddhoti nimmalo. Pariyodātoti pabhassaro.
atk-s0402a0:627_6: Sāradaṃ badarapaṇḍunti saradakāle jātaṃ nātisuparipakkaṃ badaraṃ. Tañhi parisuddhañceva
atk-s0402a0:627_7: hoti pariyodātañca. Tālapakkanti suparipakkatālaphalaṃ. Sampati bandhanā pamuttanti
atk-s0402a0:627_8: taṃkhaṇaññeva bandhanā pamuttaṃ. Tassa hi bandhanamūlaṃ apanetvā paramukhaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:627_9: phalake ṭhapitassa caturaṅgulamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ olokentānaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ hutvā
atk-s0402a0:627_10: khāyati. Taṃ sandhāyevamāha. Nekkhaṃ jambonadanti surattavaṇṇassa jambonadasuvaṇṇassa
atk-s0402a0:627_12: kataparikammaṃ. Ukkāmukhe sukusalasampahaṭṭhanti suvaṇṇakārauddhane pacitvā sukusalena
atk-s0402a0:627_13: suvaṇṇakārena ghaṭṭanaparimajjanahaṃsanena suṭṭhu pahaṭṭhaṃ suparimadditanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:627_14: Paṇḍukambale nikkhittanti agginā pacitvā dīpidāṭhāya ghaṃsitvā gerukaparikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:627_15: rattakambale ṭhapitaṃ. Bhāsateti sañjātaobhāsatāya bhāsate. Tapateti andhakāraviddhaṃsanatāya
atk-s0402a0:627_16: tapate. Virocatīti vijjotamānaṃ hutvā virocati, sobhatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:628_0: Uccāsayanamahāsayanānīti ettha atikkantappamāṇaṃ uccāsayanaṃ nāma, āyatavitthataṃ
atk-s0402a0:628_1: akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ mahāsayanaṃ nāma. Idāni tāni dassento seyyathidaṃ, āsandītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:628_2: Tattha āsandīti atikkantappamāṇaṃ āsanaṃ. Pallaṅkoti pādesu vāḷarūpāni ṭhapetvā kato.
atk-s0402a0:628_3: Gonakoti dīghalomako mahākojavo. Caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomāni. Cittakoti
atk-s0402a0:628_4: vānacittaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Paṭikāti uṇṇāmayo setattharako. Paṭalikāti ghanapuppho
atk-s0402a0:628_5: uṇṇāmayattharako, yo āmalakapaṭṭotipi vuccati. Tūlikāti tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ aññatarapuṇṇā
atk-s0402a0:628_6: tūlikā. Vikatikāti sīhabyagghādirūpavicitro uṇṇāmayattharako. Uddalomīti ubhatodasaṃ
atk-s0402a0:628_7: uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Keci ekato uggatapupphanti vadanti. Ekantalomīti ekatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:628_8: Keci ubhato uggatapupphanti vadanti. Kaṭṭissanti ratanaparisibbitaṃ koseyyakaṭṭissamayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:628_10: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Hatthattharādayo
atk-s0402a0:628_11: hatthipiṭṭhādīsu attharaṇakaattharakā ceva hatthirūpādīni dassetvā kataattharakā
atk-s0402a0:628_12: ca. Ajinappaveṇīti ajinacammehi mañcappamāṇena sibbitvā katappaveṇī. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:629_0: Nikāmalābhīti atikāmalābhī icchiticchitalābhī. Akicchalābhīti adukkhalābhī. Akasiralābhīti
atk-s0402a0:629_1: vipulalābhī mahantalābhī, uḷāruḷārāneva labhati maññeti sandhāya vadati. Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0402a0:629_2: brāhmaṇo sayanagaruko, so bhagavato vippasannindriyāditaṃ disvā “addhā esa evarūpesu
atk-s0402a0:629_3: uccāsayanamahāsayanesu nisīdati ceva nipajjati ca. Tenassa vippasannāni indriyāni,
atk-s0402a0:629_4: parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto”ti maññamāno imaṃ senāsanavaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:630_0: Laddhā ca pana na kappantīti ettha kiñci kiñci kappati. Suddhakoseyyañhi mañcepi
atk-s0402a0:630_1: attharituṃ vaṭṭati, gonakādayo ca bhūmattharaṇaparibhogena, āsandiyā pāde chinditvā,
atk-s0402a0:630_2: pallaṅkassa vāḷe bhinditvā, tūlikaṃ vijaṭetvā “bimbohanañca kātu”nti vacanato imānipi
atk-s0402a0:630_3: ekena vidhānena kappanti. Akappiyaṃ pana upādāya sabbāneva na kappantīti vuttāni.
atk-s0402a0:631_0: Vanantaññeva pavisāmīti araññaṃyeva pavisāmi. Yadevāti yāniyeva. Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvāti
atk-s0402a0:631_1: samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake
atk-s0402a0:631_2: koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādento ujuṃ kāyaṃ ṭhapetvā. Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:631_3: satiṃ ṭhapetvā, pariggahitaniyyānaṃ vā katvāti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “parīti pariggahaṭṭho.
atk-s0402a0:631_4: Mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho. Satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho. Tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:631_5: Upasampajja viharāmīti paṭilabhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā viharāmi. Evaṃbhūtoti evaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu
atk-s0402a0:631_6: aññatarasamaṅgī hutvā. Dibbo me eso tasmiṃ samaye caṅkamo hotīti cattāri hi rūpajjhānāni
atk-s0402a0:631_7: samāpajjitvā caṅkamantassa caṅkamo dibbacaṅkamo nāma hoti, samāpattito vuṭṭhāya caṅkamantassāpi
atk-s0402a0:631_8: caṅkamo dibbacaṅkamoyeva. Ṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Tathā itaresu dvīsu vihāresu.
atk-s0402a0:632_0: So evaṃ pajānāmi “rāgo me pahīno”ti mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggena pahīnarāgameva
atk-s0402a0:632_1: dassento “so evaṃ pajānāmi rāgo me pahīno”ti āha. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Iminā
atk-s0402a0:632_2: pana kiṃ kathitaṃ hotīti? Paccavekkhaṇā kathitā, paccavekkhaṇāya phalasamāpatti kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:632_3: Phalasamāpattiñhi samāpannassapi samāpattito vuṭṭhitassāpi caṅkamādayo ariyacaṅkamādayo
atk-s0402a0:634_0: 65. Catutthe rājagaheti evaṃnāmake nagare. Gijjhakūṭe pabbateti gijjhasadisānissa
atk-s0402a0:634_1: kūṭāni, gijjhā vā tassa kūṭesu vasantīti gijjhakūṭo, tasmiṃ gijjhakūṭe pabbate. Etenassa
atk-s0402a0:634_2: rājagahaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā viharantassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ. Gijjhakūṭasmiñhi
atk-s0402a0:634_3: tathāgataṃ uddissa vihāro kārito, gijjhakūṭavihārotvevassa nāmaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:634_4: samaye viharatīti. Sarabho nāma paribbājako acirapakkanto hotīti sarabhoti evaṃnāmako
atk-s0402a0:634_5: paribbājako imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva pakkanto hoti, adhunā vibbhantoti
atk-s0402a0:634_6: attho. Sammāsambuddhe hi loke uppanne titthiyā naṭṭhalābhasakkārā ahesuṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:635_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī
atk-s0402a0:635_2: asakkatā honti agarukatā amānitā apūjitā na lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna”nti
atk-s0402a0:636_0: Te evaṃ parihīnalābhasakkārā pañcasatamattā ekasmiṃ paribbājakārāme sannipatitvā
atk-s0402a0:636_1: sammantayiṃsu – “bho, mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya hatalābhasakkārā
atk-s0402a0:636_2: jātā, samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakānañcassa ekaṃ avaṇṇaṃ upadhāretha, avaṇṇaṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0402a0:636_3: etassa sāsanaṃ garahitvā amhākaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ uppādessāmā”ti. Te vajjaṃ olokentā
atk-s0402a0:636_4: – “tīsu dvāresu ājīve cāti catūsupi ṭhānesu samaṇassa gotamassa vajjaṃ passituṃ na
atk-s0402a0:636_5: sakkā, imāni cattāri ṭhānāni muñcitvā aññattha olokethā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ antare
atk-s0402a0:636_6: eko evamāha – “ahaṃ aññaṃ na passāmi, ime anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ sannipatitvā dvāravātapānāni
atk-s0402a0:636_7: pidhāya sāmaṇerānampi pavesanaṃ na denti. Jīvitasadisāpi upaṭṭhākā daṭṭhuṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0402a0:636_8: āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ osāretvā osāretvā janaṃ āvaṭṭetvā āvaṭṭetvā khādanti. Sace taṃ mayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:636_9: āharituṃ sakkhissāma, evaṃ no lābhasakkārauḷāro bhavissatī”ti. Aparopi evameva vadanto
atk-s0402a0:636_10: uṭṭhāsi. Sabbe ekavādā ahesuṃ. Tato āhaṃsu – “yo taṃ āharituṃ sakkhissati, taṃ mayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:637_0: Tato koṭito paṭṭhāya “tvaṃ sakkhissasi, tvaṃ sakkhissasī”ti pucchitvā “ahaṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0402a0:637_1: ahaṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti bahūhi vutte sarabhaṃ pucchiṃsu – “tvaṃ sakkhissasi ācariyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:637_2: So āha – “agaru etaṃ āharituṃ, sace tumhe attano kathāya ṭhatvā maṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ karissathā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:637_3: Agaru etamācariya āhara, tvaṃ katoyevāsi amhehi jeṭṭhakoti. So āha – “taṃ āharantena
atk-s0402a0:637_4: thenetvā vā vilumpitvā vā āharituṃ na sakkā, samaṇassa pana gotamassa sāvakasadisena
atk-s0402a0:637_5: hutvā tassa sāvake vanditvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā tesaṃ patte bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā āharituṃ
atk-s0402a0:637_6: sakkā. Ruccati vo etassa ettakassa kiriyā”ti. Yaṃkiñci katvā āharitvā ca no dehīti.
atk-s0402a0:637_7: Tena hi maṃ disvā apassantā viya bhaveyyāthāti paribbājakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā dutiyadivase
atk-s0402a0:637_8: pātova uṭṭhāya gijjhakūṭamahāvihāraṃ gantvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0402a0:637_9: pāde vandi. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “aññe paribbājakā caṇḍā pharusā, ayaṃ pana saddho bhavissati
atk-s0402a0:637_10: pasanno”ti. Bhante, tumhe ñatvā yuttaṭṭhānasmiṃyeva pabbajitā, mayaṃ pana anupadhāretvā
atk-s0402a0:637_11: atittheneva pakkhantā aniyyānikamagge vicarāmāti. So evaṃ vatvā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe bhikkhū
atk-s0402a0:637_12: punappunaṃ vandati, nhānodakādīni paṭiyādeti, dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ karoti, pāde
atk-s0402a0:638_0: Taṃ iminā nīhārena vasantaṃ eko mahāthero disvā, “paribbājaka, tvaṃ saddho pasanno,
atk-s0402a0:638_1: kiṃ na pabbajasī”ti. Ko maṃ, bhante, pabbājessati. Mayañhi cirakālaṃ bhadantānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:638_2: paccatthikā hutvā vicarimhāti. Thero “sace tvaṃ pabbajitukāmo, ahaṃ taṃ pabbājessāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:638_3: vatvā pabbājesi. So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ vattapaṭivattamakāsi. Atha
atk-s0402a0:638_4: naṃ thero vatte pasīditvā nacirasseva upasampādesi. So uposathadivase bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:638_5: uposathaggaṃ pavisitvā bhikkhū mahantena ussāhena pātimokkhaṃ paggaṇhante disvā “iminā
atk-s0402a0:638_6: nīhārena osāretvā osāretvā lokaṃ khādanti, katipāhena harissāmī”ti cintesi. So pariveṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:638_7: gantvā upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā, “bhante, ko nāmo ayaṃ dhammo”ti pucchi. Pātimokkho nāma,
atk-s0402a0:638_8: āvusoti. Uttamadhammo esa, bhante, bhavissatīti. Āma, āvuso, sakalasāsanadhāraṇī
atk-s0402a0:638_9: ayaṃ sikkhāti. Bhante, sace esa sikkhādhammo uttamo, imameva paṭhamaṃ gaṇhāmīti.
atk-s0402a0:638_10: Gaṇhāvusoti thero sampaṭicchi. So gaṇhanto paribbājake passitvā “kīdisaṃ ācariyā”ti
atk-s0402a0:638_11: pucchito, “āvuso, mā cintayittha, katipāhena āharissāmī”ti vatvā nacirasseva uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0402a0:638_12: upajjhāyaṃ āha – “ettakameva, bhante, udāhu aññampi atthī”ti. Ettakameva, āvusoti.
atk-s0402a0:639_0: So punadivase yathānivatthapārutova gahitanīhāreneva pattaṃ gahetvā gijjhakūṭā nikkhamma
atk-s0402a0:639_1: paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi. Paribbājakā disvā “kīdisaṃ, ācariya, nāsakkhittha maññe
atk-s0402a0:639_2: āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ āharitu”nti taṃ parivārayiṃsu. Mā cintayittha, āvuso, āhaṭā me āvaṭṭanimāyā,
atk-s0402a0:639_3: ito paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ lābhasakkāro mahā bhavissati. Tumhe aññamaññaṃ samaggā hotha,
atk-s0402a0:639_4: mā vivādaṃ akatthāti. Sace te, ācariya, suggahitā, amhepi naṃ vācehīti. So ādito
atk-s0402a0:639_5: paṭṭhāya pātimokkhaṃ osāresi. Atha te sabbepi – “etha, bho, nagare vicarantā samaṇassa
atk-s0402a0:639_6: gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmā”ti anugghāṭitesuyeva nagaradvāresu dvārasamīpaṃ gantvā
atk-s0402a0:639_7: vivaṭena dvārena sabbapaṭhamaṃ pavisiṃsu. Evaṃ saliṅgeneva apakkantaṃ taṃ paribbājakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:639_8: sandhāya – “sarabho nāma paribbājako acirapakkanto hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:640_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana bhagavā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento idaṃ addasa – “ajja sarabho
atk-s0402a0:640_1: paribbājako nagare vicaritvā pakāsanīyakammaṃ karissati, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:640_2: kathento visaṃ siñcitvā paribbājakārāmaṃ gamissati, ahampi tattheva gamissāmi, catassopi
atk-s0402a0:640_3: parisā tattheva osarissanti. Tasmiṃ samāgame caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:640_4: pivissantī”ti. Tato “tassa okāso hotu, yathāruciyā avaṇṇaṃ pattharatū”ti cintetvā
atk-s0402a0:640_5: ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda, aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu bhikkhusaṅghassa mayā
atk-s0402a0:640_6: saddhiṃyeva piṇḍāya carituṃ ārocehī”ti. Thero tathā akāsi. Bhikkhū pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0402a0:640_7: satthārameva parivārayiṃsu. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya dvāragāmasamīpeyeva piṇḍāya
atk-s0402a0:640_8: cari. Sarabhopi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭho tattha tattha parisamajjhe
atk-s0402a0:640_9: rājadvāravīthicatukkādīsu ca gantvā “aññāto mayā samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ dhammo”tiādīni
atk-s0402a0:640_10: abhāsi. Taṃ sandhāya so rājagahe parisati evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsatītiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:640_11: aññātoti ñāto avabuddho, pākaṭaṃ katvā uggahitoti dīpeti. Aññāyāti jānitvā. Apakkantoti
atk-s0402a0:640_12: saliṅgeneva apakkanto. Sace hi samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane koci sāro abhavissa, nāhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:640_13: apakkamissaṃ. Tassa pana sāsanaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ, āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ osāretvā samaṇā lokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:641_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhūti atha evaṃ tasmiṃ paribbājake bhāsamāne araññavāsino
atk-s0402a0:641_1: pañcasatā bhikkhū “asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma satthā piṇḍāya carituṃ gato”ti ajānantā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:641_2: rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Te sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Assosunti suṇiṃsu. Yena bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:642_0: Sippinikātīranti sippinikāti evaṃnāmikāya nadiyā tīraṃ. Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti
atk-s0402a0:642_1: kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā abbhantare khantiṃ dhāretvā citteneva adhivāsesīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:642_2: Evaṃ adhivāsetvā puna cintesi – “kiṃ nu kho ajja mayā sarabhassa vādaṃ maddituṃ gacchantena
atk-s0402a0:642_3: ekakena gantabbaṃ, udāhu bhikkhusaṅghaparivutenā”ti. Athassa etadahosi – sacāhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:642_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gamissāmi, mahājano evaṃ cintessati – “samaṇo gotamo vāduppattiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:642_5: gacchanto pakkhaṃ ukkhipitvā gantvā parisabalena uppannaṃ vādaṃ maddati, paravādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:642_6: sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na detī”ti. Na kho pana mayhaṃ uppanne vāde paraṃ gahetvā maddanakiccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:642_7: atthi, ahameva gantvā maddissāmi. Anacchariyaṃ cetaṃ yvāhaṃ idāni buddhabhūto attano
atk-s0402a0:642_8: uppannaṃ vādaṃ maddeyyaṃ, cariyaṃ caraṇakāle ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattenāpi hi
atk-s0402a0:642_9: mayā vahitabbaṃ dhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma nāhosi. Imassa panatthassa sādhanatthaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:644: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjenti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti. –
atk-s0402a0:645_0: Idaṃ kaṇhajātakaṃ āharitabbaṃ. Atīte kira eko satthavāho ekissā mahallikāya gehe
atk-s0402a0:645_1: nivāsaṃ gaṇhi. Athassa ekissā dhenuyā rattibhāgasamanantare gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:645_2: Sā ekaṃ vacchakaṃ vijāyi. Mahallikāya vacchakaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya puttasineho
atk-s0402a0:645_3: udapādi. Punadivase satthavāhaputto – “tava gehavetanaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti āha. Mahallikā
atk-s0402a0:645_4: “mayhaṃ aññena kiccaṃ na atthi, imameva vacchakaṃ dehī”ti āha. Gaṇha, ammāti. Sā
atk-s0402a0:645_5: taṃ gaṇhitvā khīraṃ pāyetvā yāgubhattatiṇādīni dadamānā posesi. So vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0402a0:645_6: paripuṇṇarūpo balavīriyasampanno ahosi sampannācāro, kāḷako nāma nāmena. Athekassa
atk-s0402a0:645_7: satthavāhassa pañcahi sakaṭasatehi āgacchantassa udakabhinnaṭṭhāne sakaṭacakkaṃ laggi.
atk-s0402a0:645_8: So dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi yojetvā nīharāpetuṃ asakkonto kāḷakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha
atk-s0402a0:645_9: – “tāta, tava vetanaṃ dassāmi, sakaṭaṃ me ukkhipitvā dehī”ti. Evañca pana vatvā taṃ
atk-s0402a0:645_10: ādāya – “añño iminā saddhiṃ dhuraṃ vahituṃ samattho natthī”ti dhurasakaṭe yottaṃ
atk-s0402a0:645_11: bandhitvā taṃ ekakaṃyeva yojesi. So taṃ sakaṭaṃ ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhāpetvā eteneva
atk-s0402a0:645_12: nihārena pañca sakaṭasatāni nīhari. So sabbapacchimasakaṭaṃ nīharitvā mociyamāno
atk-s0402a0:646_0: Satthavāho “ayaṃ ettakāni sakaṭāni ukkhipanto evaṃ na akāsi, vetanatthaṃ maññe karotī”ti
atk-s0402a0:646_1: sakaṭagaṇanāya kahāpaṇe gahetvā pañcasatabhaṇḍikaṃ tassa gīvāya bandhāpesi. So aññesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:646_2: attano santikaṃ allīyituṃ adento ujukaṃ gehameva agamāsi. Mahallikā disvā mocetvā
atk-s0402a0:646_3: kahāpaṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kasmā, putta, evamakāsi, mā tvaṃ ‘mayā kammaṃ katvā ābhatena
atk-s0402a0:646_4: ayaṃ jīvissatī’ti saññamakāsī”ti vatvā goṇaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā telena abbhañjitvā
atk-s0402a0:646_5: “ito paṭṭhāya puna mā evamakāsī”ti ovadi. Evaṃ satthā “cariyaṃ caraṇakāle ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:646_6: nibbattenāpi hi mayā vahitabbadhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma nāhosī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0402a0:646_7: ekakova agamāsi. Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:647_0: Tattha paṭisallānāti puthuttārammaṇehi cittaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā sallānato, phalasamāpattitoti
atk-s0402a0:647_1: attho. Tenupasaṅkamīti paribbājakesu sakalanagare pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā nagarā nikkhamma
atk-s0402a0:647_2: paribbājakārāme sannipatitvā “sace, āvuso sarabha, samaṇo gotamo āgamissati, kiṃ
atk-s0402a0:647_3: karissasī”ti. Samaṇe gotame ekaṃ karonte ahaṃ dve karissāmi, dve karonte cattāri,
atk-s0402a0:647_4: cattāri karonte pañca, pañca karonte dasa, dasa karonte vīsati, vīsati karonte tiṃsaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:647_5: tiṃsaṃ karonte cattālīsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ karonte paññāsaṃ, paññāsaṃ karonte sataṃ, sataṃ
atk-s0402a0:647_6: karonte sahassaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ sīhanādakathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā nisinnesu upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:648_0: Upasaṅkamanto pana yasmā paribbājakārāmassa nagaramajjheneva maggo, tasmā surattadupaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0402a0:648_1: nivāsetvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā vissaṭṭhabalo rājā viya ekakova nagaramajjhena
atk-s0402a0:648_2: agamāsi. Micchādiṭṭhikā disvā “paribbājakā samaṇassa gotamassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ karontā
atk-s0402a0:648_3: avaṇṇaṃ patthariṃsu, so ete anuvattitvā saññāpetuṃ gacchati maññe”ti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:648_4: Sammādiṭṭhikāpi “sammāsambuddho pattacīvaraṃ ādāya ekakova nikkhanto, ajja sarabhena
atk-s0402a0:648_5: saddhiṃ mahādhammasaṅgāmo bhavissati. Mayampi tasmiṃ samāgame kāyasakkhino bhavissāmā”ti
atk-s0402a0:648_6: anubandhiṃsu. Satthā passantasseva mahājanassa paribbājakārāmaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:649_1: disvā “aññadā evarūpo obhāso nāma natthi, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti ulloketvā “samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0402a0:649_2: āgacchatī”ti āhaṃsu. Taṃ sutvāva sarabho jāṇukantare sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā adhomukho nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:649_3: Evaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā taṃ ārāmaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Tathāgato
atk-s0402a0:649_4: hi jambudīpatale aggakule jātattā aggāsanārahotissa sabbattha āsanaṃ paññattameva
atk-s0402a0:649_5: hoti. Evaṃ paññatte mahārahe buddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:650_0: Te paribbājakā sarabhaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavocunti sammāsambuddhe kira sarabhena saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:650_1: ettakaṃ kathenteyeva bhikkhusaṅgho satthu padānupadiko hutvā paribbājakārāmaṃ sampāpuṇi,
atk-s0402a0:650_2: catassopi parisā paribbājakārāmeyeva osariṃsu. Tato te paribbājakā “acchariyaṃ samaṇassa
atk-s0402a0:650_3: gotamassa kammaṃ, sakalanagaraṃ vicaritvā avaṇṇaṃ pattharitvā pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:650_4: āgatānaṃ verīnaṃ paṭisattūnaṃ paccāmittānaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā thokampi viggāhikakathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:650_5: na kathesi, āgatakālato paṭṭhāya satapākatelena makkhento viya amatapānaṃ pāyento
atk-s0402a0:650_6: viya madhurakathaṃ kathetī”ti sabbepi sammāsambuddhaṃ anuvattantā etadavocuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:651_0: Yāceyyāsīti āyāceyyāsi pattheyyāsi piheyyāsi. Tuṇhībhūtoti tuṇhībhāvaṃ upagato. Maṅkubhūtoti
atk-s0402a0:651_1: nittejataṃ āpanno. Pattakkhandhoti onatagīvo. Adhomukhoti heṭṭhāmukho. Sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0402a0:651_2: te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho, sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ paṭijānato
atk-s0402a0:651_3: tava. Anabhisambuddhāti ime nāma dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā. Tatthāti tesu anabhisambuddhāti
atk-s0402a0:651_4: evaṃ dassitadhammesu. Aññena vā aññaṃ paṭicarissatīti aññena vā vacanena aññaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:651_5: paṭicchādessati, aññaṃ pucchito aññaṃ kathessatīti adhippāyo. Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmessatīti
atk-s0402a0:651_6: bahiddhā aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ āharanto purimakathaṃ apanāmessati. Appaccayanti anabhiraddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:651_7: atuṭṭhākāraṃ pātukarissatīti pākaṭaṃ karissati. Ettha ca appaccayena domanassaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:652_0: Evaṃ bhagavā paṭhamavesārajjena sīhanādaṃ naditvā puna dutiyādīhi nadanto yo kho
atk-s0402a0:652_1: maṃ paribbājakātiādimāha. Tattha yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desitoti yassa
atk-s0402a0:652_2: maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāya tayā catusaccadhammo desito. So na niyyātīti so dhammo
atk-s0402a0:652_3: na niyyāti na niggacchati, na taṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Takkarassāti yo naṃ
atk-s0402a0:652_4: karoti, tassa paṭipattipūrakassa puggalassāti attho. Sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti hetunā
atk-s0402a0:652_5: nayena kāraṇena sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa khayāya. Atha vā yassa kho pana te atthāya
atk-s0402a0:652_6: dhammo desitoti yassa te atthāya dhammo desito. Seyyathidaṃ – rāgapaṭighātatthāya
atk-s0402a0:652_7: asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ, dosapaṭighātatthāya mettābhāvanā, mohapaṭighātatthāya pañca dhammā,
atk-s0402a0:652_8: vitakkupacchedāya ānāpānassati. So na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti so
atk-s0402a0:652_9: dhammo yo naṃ yathādesitaṃ karoti, tassa takkarassa sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:652_10: vaṭṭadukkhakkhayāya na niyyāti na niggacchati, taṃ atthaṃ na sādhetīti ayamettha
atk-s0402a0:652_11: attho. Seyyathāpi sarabho paribbājakoti yathā ayaṃ sarabho paribbājako pajjhāyanto
atk-s0402a0:653_0: Evaṃ tīhi padehi sīhanādaṃ naditvā desanaṃ nivattentasseva tathāgatassa tasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:653_1: sannipatitā caturāsītipāṇasahassaparimāṇā parisā amatapānaṃ pivi, satthā parisāya
atk-s0402a0:653_2: amatapānassa pītabhāvaṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pakkāmi. Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha
atk-s0402a0:653_3: kho bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sīhanādanti seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ appaṭinādaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:653_4: Vehāsaṃ pakkāmīti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:653_5: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Evaṃ pakkhando ca pana taṃkhaṇaññeva gijjhakūṭamahāvihāre patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:654_0: Vācāya sannitodakenāti vacanapatodena. Sañjambharimakaṃsūti sambharitaṃ nirantaraphuṭaṃ
atk-s0402a0:654_1: akaṃsu, upari vijjhiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. Brahāraññeti mahāraññe. Sīhanādaṃ nadissāmīti
atk-s0402a0:654_2: sīhassa nadato ākāraṃ disvā “ayampi tiracchānagato, ahampi, imassa cattāro pādā,
atk-s0402a0:654_3: mayhampi, ahampi evameva sīhanādaṃ nadissāmī”ti cintesi. So sīhassa sammukhā nadituṃ
atk-s0402a0:654_4: asakkonto tasmiṃ gocarāya pakkante ekako nadituṃ ārabhi. Athassa siṅgālasaddoyeva
atk-s0402a0:654_5: nicchari. Tena vuttaṃ – siṅgālakaṃyeva nadatīti. Bheraṇḍakanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:654_6: Apica bhinnassaraṃ amanāpasaddaṃ nadatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evameva kho tvanti iminā opammena
atk-s0402a0:654_7: paribbājakā tathāgataṃ sīhasadisaṃ katvā sarabhaṃ siṅgālasadisaṃ akaṃsu. Ambukasañcarīti
atk-s0402a0:654_8: khuddakakukkuṭikā. Purisakaravitaṃ ravissāmīti mahākukkuṭaṃ ravantaṃ disvā “imassapi
atk-s0402a0:654_9: dve pādā dve pakkhā, mayhampi tatheva, ahampi evarūpaṃ ravitaṃ ravissāmī”ti sā tassa
atk-s0402a0:654_10: sammukhā ravituṃ asakkontī tasmiṃ pakkante ravamānā kukkuṭikāravaṃyeva ravi. Tena
atk-s0402a0:654_11: vuttaṃ – ambukasañcariravitaṃyeva ravatīti. Usabhoti goṇo. Suññāyāti tucchāya jeṭṭhakavasabhehi
atk-s0402a0:654_12: virahitāya. Gambhīraṃ naditabbaṃ maññatīti jeṭṭhakavasabhassa nādasadisaṃ gambhīranādaṃ
atk-s0402a0:656_0: 66. Pañcame kālāmānaṃ nigamoti kālāmā nāma khattiyā, tesaṃ nigamo. Kesamuttiyāti
atk-s0402a0:656_2: ca gāhāpetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu. Sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpentīti attanoyeva laddhiṃ kathenti.
atk-s0402a0:656_3: Jotentīti pakāsenti. Khuṃsentīti ghaṭṭenti. Vambhentīti avajānanti. Paribhavantīti
atk-s0402a0:656_4: lāmakaṃ karonti. Omakkhiṃ karontīti ukkhittakaṃ karonti, ukkhipitvā chaḍḍenti. Aparepi,
atk-s0402a0:656_5: bhanteti so kira aṭavimukhe gāmo, tasmā tattha aṭaviṃ atikkantā ca atikkamitukāmā
atk-s0402a0:656_6: ca vāsaṃ kappenti. Tesupi paṭhamaṃ āgatā attano laddhiṃ dīpetvā pakkamiṃsu, pacchā
atk-s0402a0:656_7: āgatā “kiṃ te jānanti, amhākaṃ antevāsikā te, amhākaṃ santike kiñci kiñci sippaṃ
atk-s0402a0:656_8: uggaṇhiṃsū”ti attano laddhiṃ dīpetvā pakkamiṃsu. Kālāmā ekaladdhiyampi saṇṭhahituṃ
atk-s0402a0:656_9: na sakkhiṃsu. Te etamatthaṃ dīpetvā bhagavato evamārocetvā tesaṃ no, bhantetiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:656_10: Tattha hoteva kaṅkhāti hotiyeva kaṅkhā. Vicikicchāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Alanti yuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:657_0: Mā anussavenāti anussavakathāyapi mā gaṇhittha. Mā paramparāyāti paramparakathāyapi
atk-s0402a0:657_1: mā gaṇhittha. Mā itikirāyāti evaṃ kira etanti mā gaṇhittha. Mā piṭakasampadānenāti
atk-s0402a0:657_2: amhākaṃ piṭakatantiyā saddhiṃ sametīti mā gaṇhittha. Mā takkahetūti takkaggāhenapi
atk-s0402a0:657_3: mā gaṇhittha. Mā nayahetūti nayaggāhenapi mā gaṇhittha. Mā ākāraparivitakkenāti sundaramidaṃ
atk-s0402a0:657_4: kāraṇanti evaṃ kāraṇaparivitakkenapi mā gaṇhittha. Mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyāti amhākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:657_5: nijjhāyitvā khamitvā gahitadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sametītipi mā gaṇhittha. Mā bhabbarūpatāyāti
atk-s0402a0:657_6: ayaṃ bhikkhu bhabbarūpo, imassa kathaṃ gahetuṃ yuttantipi mā gaṇhittha. Mā samaṇo
atk-s0402a0:657_7: no garūti ayaṃ samaṇo amhākaṃ garu, imassa kathaṃ gahetuṃ yuttantipi mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_8: Samattāti paripuṇṇā. Samādinnāti gahitā parāmaṭṭhā. Yaṃsa hotīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ tassa
atk-s0402a0:657_9: puggalassa hoti. Alobhādayo lobhādipaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā. Vigatābhijjhotiādīhi
atk-s0402a0:658_0: Idāni mettādikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento mettāsahagatenātiādimāha. Tattha kammaṭṭhānakathāya
atk-s0402a0:658_1: vā bhāvanānaye vā pāḷivaṇṇanāya vā yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva.
atk-s0402a0:658_2: Evaṃ averacittoti evaṃ akusalaverassa ca puggalaverino ca natthitāya averacitto.
atk-s0402a0:658_3: Abyābajjhacittoti kodhacittassa abhāvena niddukkhacitto. Asaṃkiliṭṭhacittoti kilesassa
atk-s0402a0:658_4: natthitāya asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto. Visuddhacittoti kilesamalābhāvena visuddhacitto hotīti
atk-s0402a0:658_5: attho. Tassāti tassa evarūpassa ariyasāvakassa. Assāsāti avassayā patiṭṭhā. Sace
atk-s0402a0:658_6: kho pana atthi paro lokoti yadi imamhā lokā paraloko nāma atthi. Athāhaṃ kāyassa
atk-s0402a0:658_7: bhedā parammaraṇā…pe… upapajjissāmīti atthetaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yenāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā
atk-s0402a0:658_8: sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmīti evaṃ sabbattha nayo veditabbo. Anīghanti niddukkhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:658_9: Sukhinti sukhitaṃ. Ubhayeneva visuddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassāmīti yañca pāpaṃ na karomi,
atk-s0402a0:658_10: yañca karotopi na karīyati, iminā ubhayenāpi visuddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassāmi. Sesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:660_0: 67. Chaṭṭhe migāranattāti migāraseṭṭhino nattā. Sekhuniyanattāti sekhuniyaseṭṭhino
atk-s0402a0:660_1: nattā. Upasaṅkamiṃsūti bhuttapātarāsā dāsakammakaraparivutā upasaṅkamiṃsu. Tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:660_2: kira purebhatte pubbaṇhasamayeyeva gehe eko pañho samuṭṭhito, taṃ pana kathetuṃ okāso
atk-s0402a0:660_3: nāhosi. Te “taṃ pañhaṃ sossāmā”ti therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā tuṇhī nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:660_4: Thero “gāme taṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ pañhaṃ sotuṃ āgatā bhavissantī”ti tesaṃ manaṃ ñatvā tameva
atk-s0402a0:660_5: pañhaṃ ārabhanto etha tumhe sāḷhātiādimāha. Tattha atthi lobhoti lubbhanasabhāvo
atk-s0402a0:660_6: lobho nāma atthīti pucchati. Abhijjhāti kho ahaṃ sāḷhā etamatthaṃ vadāmīti etaṃ lobhasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:660_7: atthaṃ ahaṃ “abhijjhā”ti vadāmi, “taṇhā”ti vadāmīti samuṭṭhitapañhassa atthaṃ dīpento
atk-s0402a0:661_0: So evaṃ pajānātīti so cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā ṭhito ariyasāvako samāpattito
atk-s0402a0:661_1: vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ārabhanto evaṃ pajānāti. Atthi idanti atthi dukkhasaccasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:661_2: khandhapañcakaṃ nāmarūpavasena paricchinditvā pajānanto esa “evaṃ pajānāti atthi
atk-s0402a0:661_3: ida”nti vutto. Hīnanti samudayasaccaṃ. Paṇītanti maggasaccaṃ. Imassa saññāgatassa
atk-s0402a0:661_4: uttari nissaraṇanti imassa vipassanāsaññāsaṅkhātassa saññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:661_5: nāma nibbānaṃ, tamatthīti iminā nirodhasaccaṃ dasseti. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti
atk-s0402a0:661_6: ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ kathitaṃ. Ahu pubbe lobhoti pubbe me lobho ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:661_7: Tadahu akusalanti taṃ akusalaṃ nāma ahosi, tadā vā akusalaṃ nāma ahosi. Iccetaṃ kusalanti
atk-s0402a0:661_8: iti etaṃ kusalaṃ, tasseva akusalassa natthibhāvaṃ kusalaṃ khemanti sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0402a0:661_9: Nicchātoti nittaṇho. Nibbutoti abbhantare santāpakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena nibbuto.
atk-s0402a0:661_10: Sītibhūtoti sītalībhūto. Sukhappaṭisaṃvedīti kāyikacetasikassa sukhassa paṭisaṃveditā.
atk-s0402a0:663_0: 68. Sattame kathāvatthūnīti kathākāraṇāni, kathāya bhūmiyo patiṭṭhāyoti attho. Atītaṃ
atk-s0402a0:663_1: vā, bhikkhave, addhānanti atītamaddhānaṃ nāma kālopi vaṭṭati khandhāpi. Anāgatapaccuppannesupi
atk-s0402a0:663_2: eseva nayo. Tattha atīte kassapo nāma sammāsambuddho ahosi, tassa kikī nāma kāsikarājā
atk-s0402a0:663_3: aggupaṭṭhāko ahosi, vīsati vassasahassāni āyu ahosīti iminā nayena kathento atītaṃ
atk-s0402a0:663_4: ārabbha kathaṃ katheti nāma. Anāgate metteyyo nāma buddho bhavissati, tassa saṅkho
atk-s0402a0:663_5: nāma rājā aggupaṭṭhāko bhavissati, asīti vassasahassāni āyu bhavissatīti iminā nayena
atk-s0402a0:663_6: kathento anāgataṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheti nāma. Etarahi asuko nāma rājā dhammikoti
atk-s0402a0:663_7: iminā nayena kathento paccuppannaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:664_0: Kathāsampayogenāti kathāsamāgamena. Kacchoti kathetuṃ yutto. Akacchoti kathetuṃ na
atk-s0402a0:664_1: yutto. Ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyaṃ pañhantiādīsu, “cakkhu, anicca”nti puṭṭhena, “āma, anicca”nti
atk-s0402a0:664_2: ekaṃseneva byākātabbaṃ. Eseva nayo sotādīsu. Ayaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho. “Aniccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:664_3: nāma cakkhū”ti puṭṭhena pana “na cakkhumeva, sotampi aniccaṃ, ghānampi anicca”nti
atk-s0402a0:664_4: evaṃ vibhajitvā byākātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho. “Yathā cakkhu, tathā
atk-s0402a0:664_5: sotaṃ. Yathā sotaṃ, tathā cakkhū”ti puṭṭhena “kenaṭṭhena pucchasī”ti paṭipucchitvā
atk-s0402a0:664_7: vutte, “āmā”ti byākātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho. “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādīni
atk-s0402a0:664_8: puṭṭhena pana “abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”ti ṭhapetabbo, esa pañho na byākātabbo. Ayaṃ ṭhapanīyo pañho.
atk-s0402a0:665_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne na saṇṭhātīti kāraṇākāraṇe na saṇṭhāti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – sassatavādī yuttena
atk-s0402a0:665_1: kāraṇena pahoti ucchedavādiṃ niggahetuṃ, ucchedavādī tena niggayhamāno “kiṃ panāhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:665_2: ucchedaṃ vadāmī”ti sassatavādibhāvameva dīpeti, attano vāde patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:665_3: Evaṃ ucchedavādimhi pahonte sassatavādī, puggalavādimhi pahonte suññatavādī, suññatavādimhi
atk-s0402a0:665_4: pahonte puggalavādīti evaṃ ṭhānāṭhāne na saṇṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:666_0: Parikappe na saṇṭhātīti idaṃ pañhapucchanepi pañhakathanepi labbhati. Kathaṃ? Ekacco
atk-s0402a0:666_1: hi “pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti kaṇṭhaṃ sodheti, so itarena “idaṃ nāma tvaṃ pucchissasī”ti
atk-s0402a0:666_2: vutto ñātabhāvaṃ ñatvā “na etaṃ, aññaṃ pucchissāmī”ti vadati. Pañhaṃ puṭṭhopi “pañhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:666_3: kathessāmī”ti hanuṃ saṃsodheti, so itarena “idaṃ nāma kathessasī”ti vutto ñātabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:666_4: ñatvā “na etaṃ, aññaṃ kathessāmī”ti vadati. Evaṃ parikappe na saṇṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:667_0: Aññātavāde na saṇṭhātīti aññātavāde jānitavāde na saṇṭhāti. Kathaṃ? Ekacco pañhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:667_1: pucchati, taṃ itaro “manāpo tayā pañho pucchito, kahaṃ te esa uggahito”ti vadati.
atk-s0402a0:667_2: Itaro pucchitabbaniyāmeneva pañhaṃ pucchitvāpi tassa kathāya “apañhaṃ nu kho pucchita”nti
atk-s0402a0:667_3: vimatiṃ karoti. Aparo pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti, tamañño “suṭṭhu te pañho kathito, kattha
atk-s0402a0:667_4: te uggahito, pañhaṃ kathentena nāma evaṃ kathetabbo”ti vadati. Itaro kathetabbaniyāmeneva
atk-s0402a0:667_5: pañhaṃ kathetvāpi tassa kathāya “apañho nu kho mayā kathito”ti vimatiṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:668_0: Paṭipadāya na saṇṭhātīti paṭipattiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati, vattaṃ ajānitvā apucchitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:668_1: pucchatīti attho. Ayaṃ pañho nāma cetiyaṅgaṇe pucchitena na kathetabbo, tathā bhikkhācāramagge
atk-s0402a0:668_2: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya caraṇakāle. Āsanasālāya nisinnakāle yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā gahetvā nisinnakāle
atk-s0402a0:668_3: paribhuñjitvā nisinnakāle divāvihāraṭṭhānagamanakālepi. Divāṭṭhāne nisinnakāle pana
atk-s0402a0:668_4: okāsaṃ kāretvāva pucchantassa kathetabbo, akāretvā pucchantassa na kathetabbo. Idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:668_5: vattaṃ ajānitvā pucchanto paṭipadāya na saṇṭhāti nāma. Evaṃ santāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:668_6: puggalo akaccho hotīti, bhikkhave, etaṃ imasmiṃ ca kāraṇe sati ayaṃ puggalo na kathetuṃ yutto nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:669_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne saṇṭhātīti sassatavādī yuttena kāraṇena pahoti ucchedavādiṃ niggahetuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:669_1: ucchedavādī tena niggayhamānopi “ahaṃ tayā satakkhattuṃ niggayhamānopi ucchedavādīyevā”ti
atk-s0402a0:669_2: vadati. Iminā nayena sassatapuggalasuññatavādādīsupi nayo netabbo. Evaṃ ṭhānāṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:669_3: saṇṭhāti nāma. Parikappe saṇṭhātīti “pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti kaṇṭhaṃ sodhento “tvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:669_4: imaṃ nāma pucchissasī”ti vutte, “āma, etaṃyeva pucchissāmī”ti vadati. Pañhaṃ kathessāmīti
atk-s0402a0:669_5: hanuṃ saṃsodhentopi “tvaṃ imaṃ nāma kathessasī”ti vutte, “āma, etaṃyeva kathessāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:670_0: Aññātavāde saṇṭhātīti imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā “suṭṭhu te pañho pucchito, pucchantena
atk-s0402a0:670_1: nāma evaṃ pucchitabba”nti vutte sampaṭicchati, vimatiṃ na uppādeti. Pañhaṃ kathetvāpi
atk-s0402a0:670_2: “suṭṭhu te pañho kathito, kathentena nāma evaṃ kathetabba”nti vutte sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0402a0:670_3: vimatiṃ na uppādeti. Paṭipadāya saṇṭhātīti gehe nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakādīni datvā
atk-s0402a0:670_4: yāva bhattaṃ niṭṭhāti, tasmiṃ antare nisinno pañhaṃ pucchati. Sappiādīni bhesajjāni
atk-s0402a0:670_5: aṭṭhavidhāni pānakāni vatthacchādanamālāgandhādīni vā ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā tāni datvā
atk-s0402a0:670_6: divāṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā okāsaṃ kāretvā pañhaṃ pucchati. Evañhi vattaṃ ñatvā pucchanto
atk-s0402a0:670_7: paṭipadāya saṇṭhāti nāma. Tassa pañhaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:671_0: Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena vacanena aññaṃ paṭicchādeti, aññaṃ vā pucchito aññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:671_1: katheti. Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti āgantukakathaṃ otārento purimakathaṃ bahiddhā
atk-s0402a0:671_2: apanāmeti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – bhikkhū kira sannipatitvā ekaṃ daharaṃ, “āvuso, tvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:671_3: imañcimañca āpattiṃ āpanno”ti āhaṃsu. So āha – “bhante, nāgadīpaṃ gatomhī”ti. Āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:671_4: na mayaṃ tava nāgadīpagamanena atthikā, āpattiṃ pana āpannoti pucchāmāti. Bhante,
atk-s0402a0:671_5: nāgadīpaṃ gantvā macche khādinti. Āvuso, tava macchakhādanena kammaṃ natthi, āpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:671_6: kirasi āpannoti. So “nātisupakko maccho mayhaṃ aphāsukamakāsi, bhante”ti. Āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:671_7: tuyhaṃ phāsukena vā aphāsukena vā kammaṃ natthi, āpattiṃ āpannosīti. Bhante, yāva
atk-s0402a0:671_8: tattha vasiṃ, tāva me aphāsukameva jātanti. Evaṃ āgantukakathāvasena bahiddhā kathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:672_0: Abhiharatīti ito cito ca suttaṃ āharitvā avattharati. Tepiṭakatissatthero viya. Pubbe
atk-s0402a0:672_1: kira bhikkhū mahācetiyaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā saṅghakiccaṃ katvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā
atk-s0402a0:672_2: aññamaññaṃ pañhasākacchaṃ karonti. Tatthāyaṃ thero tīhi piṭakehi tato tato suttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:672_3: āharitvā divasabhāge ekampi pañhaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ na deti. Abhimaddatīti kāraṇaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0402a0:672_4: maddati. Anupajagghatīti parena pañhe pucchitepi kathitepi pāṇiṃ paharitvā mahāhasitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:672_5: hasati, yena parassa “apucchitabbaṃ nu kho pucchiṃ, akathetabbaṃ nu kho kathesi”nti
atk-s0402a0:672_6: vimati uppajjati. Khalitaṃ gaṇhātīti appamattakaṃ mukhadosamattaṃ gaṇhāti, akkhare
atk-s0402a0:672_7: vā pade vā byañjane vā durutte “evaṃ nāmetaṃ vattabba”nti ujjhāyamāno vicarati. Saupanisoti
atk-s0402a0:673_0: Ohitasototi ṭhapitasoto. Abhijānāti ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ kusaladhammaṃ abhijānāti
atk-s0402a0:673_1: ariyamaggaṃ. Parijānāti ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ dukkhasaccadhammaṃ tīraṇapariññāya parijānāti.
atk-s0402a0:673_2: Pajahati ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ sabbākusaladhammaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti. Sacchikaroti
atk-s0402a0:673_3: ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ arahattaphaladhammaṃ nirodhameva vā paccakkhaṃ karoti. Sammāvimuttiṃ
atk-s0402a0:673_4: phusatīti sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena arahattaphalavimokkhaṃ ñāṇaphassena phusati.
atk-s0402a0:674_0: Etadatthā, bhikkhave, kathāti, bhikkhave, yā esā kathāsampayogenāti kathā dassitā,
atk-s0402a0:674_1: sā etadatthā, ayaṃ tassā kathāya bhūmi patiṭṭhā. Idaṃ vatthu yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa
atk-s0402a0:674_2: vimokkhoti evaṃ sabbapadesu yojanā veditabbā. Etadatthā mantanāti yā ayaṃ kacchākacchesu
atk-s0402a0:674_3: puggalesu kacchena saddhiṃ mantanā, sāpi etadatthāyeva. Etadatthā upanisāti ohitasoto
atk-s0402a0:674_4: saupanisoti evaṃ vuttā upanisāpi etadatthāyeva. Etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānanti tassā upanisāya
atk-s0402a0:674_5: sotāvadhānaṃ, tampi etadatthameva. Anupādāti catūhi upādānehi aggahetvā. Cittassa
atk-s0402a0:674_6: vimokkhoti arahattaphalavimokkho. Arahattaphalatthāya hi sabbametanti suttantaṃ vinivattetvā
atk-s0402a0:674_7: upari gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ye viruddhātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:675_0: Tattha viruddhāti virodhasaṅkhātena kopena viruddhā. Sallapantīti sallāpaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a0:675_1: Viniviṭṭhāti abhiniviṭṭhā hutvā. Samussitāti mānussayena suṭṭhu ussitā. Anariyaguṇamāsajjāti
atk-s0402a0:675_2: anariyaguṇakathaṃ guṇamāsajja kathenti. Guṇaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kathā hi anariyakathā nāma,
atk-s0402a0:675_3: na ariyakathā, taṃ kathentīti attho. Aññoññavivaresinoti aññamaññassa chiddaṃ aparādhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:675_4: gavesamānā. Dubbhāsitanti dukkathitaṃ. Vikkhalitanti appamattakaṃ mukhadosakhalitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:675_5: Sampamohaṃ parājayanti aññamaññassa appamattena mukhadosena sampamohañca parājayañca.
atk-s0402a0:675_6: Abhinandantīti tussanti. Nācareti na carati na katheti. Dhammaṭṭhapaṭisaṃyuttāti
atk-s0402a0:675_7: yā ca dhamme ṭhitena kathitakathā, sā dhammaṭṭhā ceva hoti tena ca dhammena paṭisaṃyuttāti
atk-s0402a0:675_8: dhammaṭṭhapaṭisaṃyuttā. Anunnatena manasāti anuddhatena cetasā. Apaḷāsoti yugaggāhapaḷāsavasena
atk-s0402a0:675_9: apaḷāso hutvā. Asāhasoti rāgadosamohasāhasānaṃ vasena asāhaso hutvā.
atk-s0402a0:676_0: Anusūyāyamānoti na usūyamāno. Dubbhaṭṭhe nāpasādayeti dukkathitasmiṃ na apasādeyya.
atk-s0402a0:676_1: Upārambhaṃ na sikkheyyāti kāraṇuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ upārambhaṃ na sikkheyya. Khalitañca
atk-s0402a0:676_2: na gāhayeti appamattakaṃ mukhakhalitaṃ “ayaṃ te doso”ti na gāhayeyya. Nābhihareti
atk-s0402a0:676_3: nāvatthareyya. Nābhimaddeti ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā na maddeyya. Na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇeti
atk-s0402a0:676_4: saccālikapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇeyya. Aññātatthanti jānanatthaṃ. Pasādatthanti
atk-s0402a0:676_5: pasādajananatthaṃ. Na samusseyya mantayeti na mānussayena samussito bhaveyya. Na
atk-s0402a0:676_6: hi mānussitā hutvā paṇḍitā kathayanti, mānena pana anussitova hutvā mantaye katheyya bhāseyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:678_0: 69. Aṭṭhame bhagavaṃmūlakāti bhagavā mūlaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃmūlakā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0402a0:678_1: – ime, bhante, amhākaṃ dhammā pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhena uppāditā, tasmiṃ parinibbute
atk-s0402a0:678_2: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0402a0:678_3: bhagavato pana no ime dhammā uppāditā. Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma
atk-s0402a0:678_4: paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti. Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:678_5: dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetā yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāva
atk-s0402a0:678_6: dassetāti dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti. Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakadhammā
atk-s0402a0:678_7: sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0402a0:678_8: Paṭisarantīti osaranti samosaranti. Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena
atk-s0402a0:678_9: phasso āgacchati – “ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmo”ti. Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā,
atk-s0402a0:678_10: saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ āgacchati – “ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāma”nti. Tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:678_11: viññāṇaṃ nāmāti. Evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0402a0:678_12: gaṇhanto bhagavā dhamme paṭisaratīti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti
atk-s0402a0:678_13: bhagavatova etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu, tumheyeva no kathetvā dethāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:679_0: Rāgo khoti rajjanavasena pavattarāgo. Appasāvajjoti lokavajjavasenapi vipākavajjavasenapīti
atk-s0402a0:679_1: dvīhipi vajjehi appasāvajjo, appadosoti attho. Kathaṃ? Mātāpitaro hi bhātibhaginiādayo
atk-s0402a0:679_2: ca puttabhātikānaṃ āvāhavivāhamaṅgalaṃ nāma kārenti. Evaṃ tāveso lokavajjavasena
atk-s0402a0:679_3: appasāvajjo. Sadārasantosamūlikā pana apāye paṭisandhi nāma na hotīti evaṃ vipākavajjavasena
atk-s0402a0:679_4: appasāvajjo. Dandhavirāgīti virajjamāno panesa saṇikaṃ virajjati, na sīghaṃ muccati.
atk-s0402a0:679_5: Telamasirāgo viya ciraṃ anubandhati, dve tīṇi bhavantarāni gantvāpi nāpagacchatīti dandhavirāgī.
atk-s0402a0:680_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira puriso bhātu jāyāya micchācāraṃ carati. Tassāpi itthiyā
atk-s0402a0:680_1: attano sāmikato soyeva piyataro ahosi. Sā tamāha – “imasmiṃ kāraṇe pākaṭe jāte mahatī
atk-s0402a0:680_2: garahā bhavissati, tava bhātikaṃ ghātehī”ti. So “nassa, vasali, mā evaṃ puna avacā”ti
atk-s0402a0:680_3: apasādesi. Sā tuṇhī hutvā katipāhaccayena puna kathesi, tassa cittaṃ dvajjhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:680_4: agamāsi. Tato tatiyavāraṃ kathito “kinti katvā okāsaṃ labhissāmī”ti āha. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:680_5: sā upāyaṃ kathentī “tvaṃ mayā vuttameva karohi, asukaṭṭhāne mahākakudhasamīpe titthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:680_6: atthi, tattha tikhiṇaṃ daṇḍakavāsiṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhāhī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Jeṭṭhabhātāpissa
atk-s0402a0:680_7: araññe kammaṃ katvā gharaṃ āgato. Sā tasmiṃ muducittā viya hutvā “ehi sāmi, sīse
atk-s0402a0:680_8: te olikhissāmī”ti olikhantī “upakkiliṭṭhaṃ te sīsa”nti āmalakapiṇḍaṃ datvā “gaccha
atk-s0402a0:680_9: asukaṭṭhāne sīsaṃ dhovitvā āgacchāhī”ti pesesi. So tāya vuttatitthameva gantvā āmalakakakkena
atk-s0402a0:680_10: sīsaṃ makkhetvā udakaṃ oruyha onamitvā sīsaṃ dhovi. Atha naṃ itaro rukkhantarato
atk-s0402a0:680_11: nikkhamitvā khandhaṭṭhike paharitvā jīvitā voropetvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:681_0: Itaro bhariyāya sinehaṃ pariccajitumasakkonto tasmiṃyeva gehe mahādhammani hutvā
atk-s0402a0:681_1: nibbatti. So tassā ṭhitāyapi nisinnāyapi gantvā sarīre patati. Atha naṃ sā “soyeva
atk-s0402a0:681_2: ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti ghātāpesi. So puna tassā sinehena tasmiṃyeva gehe kukkuro hutvā
atk-s0402a0:681_3: nibbatti. So padasā gamanakālato paṭṭhāya tassā pacchato pacchato carati. Araññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:681_4: gacchantiyāpi saddhiṃyeva gacchati. Taṃ disvā manussā “nikkhanto sunakhaluddako,
atk-s0402a0:681_5: kataraṭṭhānaṃ gamissatī”ti uppaṇḍenti. Sā puna taṃ ghātāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:682_0: Sopi puna tasmiṃyeva gehe vacchako hutvā nibbatti. Tatheva tassā pacchato pacchato
atk-s0402a0:682_1: carati. Tadāpi naṃ manussā disvā “nikkhanto gopālako, kattha gāviyo carissantī”ti
atk-s0402a0:682_2: uppaṇḍenti. Sā tasmimpi ṭhāne taṃ ghātāpesi. So tadāpi tassā upari sinehaṃ chindituṃ
atk-s0402a0:682_3: asakkonto catutthe vāre tassāyeva kucchiyaṃ jātissaro hutvā nibbatti. So paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0402a0:682_4: catūsu attabhāvesu tāya ghātitabhāvaṃ disvā “evarūpāya nāma paccatthikāya kucchismiṃ
atk-s0402a0:682_5: nibbattosmī”ti tato paṭṭhāya tassā hatthena attānaṃ phusituṃ na deti. Sace naṃ sā
atk-s0402a0:682_6: phusati, kandati rodati. Atha naṃ ayyakova paṭijaggati. Taṃ aparabhāge vuddhippattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:682_7: ayyako āha – “tāta, kasmā tvaṃ mātu hatthena attānaṃ phusituṃ na desi. Sacepi taṃ
atk-s0402a0:682_8: phusati, mahāsaddena rodasi kandasī”ti. Ayyakena puṭṭho “na esā mayhaṃ mātā, paccāmittā
atk-s0402a0:682_9: esā”ti taṃ pavattiṃ sabbaṃ ārocesi. So taṃ āliṅgitvā roditvā “ehi, tāta, kiṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:682_10: īdise ṭhāne nivāsakicca”nti taṃ ādāya nikkhamitvā ekaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0402a0:683_0: Mahāsāvajjoti lokavajjavasenapi vipākavajjavasenapīti dvīhipi kāraṇehi mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0402a0:683_1: Kathaṃ? Dosena hi duṭṭho hutvā mātaripi aparajjhati, pitaripi bhātibhaginiādīsupi
atk-s0402a0:683_2: pabbajitesupi. So gatagataṭṭhānesu “ayaṃ puggalo mātāpitūsupi aparajjhati, bhātibhaginiādīsupi,
atk-s0402a0:683_3: pabbajitesupī”ti mahatiṃ garahaṃ labhati. Evaṃ tāva lokavajjavasena mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0402a0:683_4: Dosavasena pana katena ānantariyakammena kappaṃ niraye paccati. Evaṃ vipākavajjavasena
atk-s0402a0:683_5: mahāsāvajjo. Khippavirāgīti khippaṃ virajjati. Dosena hi duṭṭho mātāpitūsupi cetiyepi
atk-s0402a0:683_6: bodhimhipi pabbajitesupi aparajjhitvā “mayhaṃ khamathā”ti. Accayaṃ deseti. Tassa
atk-s0402a0:683_7: saha khamāpanena taṃ kammaṃ pākatikameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:684_0: Mohopi dvīheva kāraṇehi mahāsāvajjo. Mohena hi mūḷho hutvā mātāpitūsupi cetiyepi
atk-s0402a0:684_1: bodhimhipi pabbajitesupi aparajjhitvā gatagataṭṭhāne garahaṃ labhati. Evaṃ tāva lokavajjavasena
atk-s0402a0:684_2: mahāsāvajjo. Mohavasena pana katena ānantariyakammena kappaṃ niraye paccati. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:684_3: vipākavajjavasenapi mahāsāvajjo. Dandhavirāgīti saṇikaṃ virajjati. Mohena mūḷhena
atk-s0402a0:684_4: hi katakammaṃ saṇikaṃ muccati. Yathā hi acchacammaṃ satakkhattumpi dhoviyamānaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:684_5: paṇḍaraṃ hoti, evameva mohena mūḷhena katakammaṃ sīghaṃ na muccati, saṇikameva muccatīti.
atk-s0402a0:686_0: 70. Navame akusalamūlānīti akusalānaṃ mūlāni, akusalāni ca tāni mūlāni cāti vā akusalamūlāni.
atk-s0402a0:686_1: Yadapi, bhikkhave, lobhoti yopi, bhikkhave, lobho. Tadapi akusalamūlanti sopi akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:686_2: Akusalamūlaṃ vā sandhāya idha tampīti attho vaṭṭatiyeva. Etenupāyena sabbattha nayo
atk-s0402a0:686_3: netabbo. Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati sampiṇḍeti rāsiṃ karoti. Asatā dukkhaṃ uppādayatīti
atk-s0402a0:686_4: abhūtena avijjamānena yaṃkiñci tassa abhūtaṃ dosaṃ vatvā dukkhaṃ uppādeti. Vadhena
atk-s0402a0:686_5: vātiādi yenākārena dukkhaṃ uppādeti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha jāniyāti dhanajāniyā.
atk-s0402a0:686_6: Pabbājanāyāti gāmato vā raṭṭhato vā pabbājanīyakammena. Balavamhīti ahamasmi balavā.
atk-s0402a0:686_7: Balattho itipīti balena me attho itipi, bale vā ṭhitomhītipi vadati.
atk-s0402a0:687_0: Akālavādīti kālasmiṃ na vadati, akālasmiṃ vadati nāma. Abhūtavādīti bhūtaṃ na vadati,
atk-s0402a0:687_1: abhūtaṃ vadati nāma. Anatthavādīti atthaṃ na vadati, anatthaṃ vadati nāma. Adhammavādīti
atk-s0402a0:687_2: dhammaṃ na vadati, adhammaṃ vadati nāma. Avinayavādīti vinayaṃ na vadati, avinayaṃ vadati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:688_0: Tathā hāyanti tathā hi ayaṃ. Na ātappaṃ karoti tassa nibbeṭhanāyāti tassa abhūtassa
atk-s0402a0:688_1: nibbeṭhanatthāya vīriyaṃ na karoti. Itipetaṃ atacchanti imināpi kāraṇena etaṃ atacchaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:689_0: Duggati pāṭikaṅkhāti nirayādikā duggati icchitabbā, sā assa avassabhāvinī, tatthānena
atk-s0402a0:689_1: nibbattitabbanti attho. Uddhastoti upari dhaṃsito. Pariyonaddhoti samantā onaddho.
atk-s0402a0:689_2: Anayaṃ āpajjatīti avuḍḍhiṃ āpajjati. Byasanaṃ āpajjatīti vināsaṃ āpajjati. Gimhakālasmiñhi
atk-s0402a0:689_3: māluvāsipāṭikāya phalitāya bījāni uppatitvā vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ mūle patanti. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:689_4: yassa rukkhassa mūle tīsu disāsu tīṇi bījāni patitāni honti, tasmiṃ rukkhe pāvussakena
atk-s0402a0:689_5: meghena abhivaṭṭhe tīhi bījehi tayo aṅkurā uṭṭhahitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ allīyanti. Tato
atk-s0402a0:689_6: paṭṭhāya rukkhadevatāyo sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Tepi aṅkurā vaḍḍhamānā
atk-s0402a0:689_7: latābhāvaṃ āpajjitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā sabbaviṭapasākhāpasākhā saṃsibbitvā
atk-s0402a0:689_8: taṃ rukkhaṃ upari pariyonandhanti. So māluvālatāhi saṃsibbito ghanehi mahantehi māluvāpattehi
atk-s0402a0:689_9: sañchanno deve vā vassante vāte vā vāyante tattha tattha palujjitvā khāṇumattameva
atk-s0402a0:690_0: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – sālādīsu aññatararukkho viya hi
atk-s0402a0:690_1: ayaṃ satto daṭṭhabbo, tisso māluvālatā viya tīṇi akusalamūlāni, yāva rukkhasākhā
atk-s0402a0:690_2: asampattā, tāva tāsaṃ latānaṃ ujukaṃ rukkhārohanaṃ viya lobhādīnaṃ dvāraṃ asampattakālo,
atk-s0402a0:690_3: sākhānusārena gamanakālo viya dvāravasena gamanakālo, pariyonaddhakālo viya lobhādīhi
atk-s0402a0:690_4: pariyuṭṭhitakālo, khuddakasākhānaṃ palujjanakālo viya dvārappattānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena
atk-s0402a0:690_5: khuddānukhuddakā āpattiyo āpannakālo, mahāsākhānaṃ palujjanakālo viya garukāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:690_6: āpannakālo, latānusārena otiṇṇena udakena mūlesu tintesu rukkhassa bhūmiyaṃ patanakālo
atk-s0402a0:690_7: viya kamena cattāri pārājikāni āpajjitvā catūsu apāyesu nibbattanakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:691_0: Sukkapakkho vuttavipallāsena veditabbo. Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:691_1: – sālādīsu aññatararukkho viya ayaṃ satto daṭṭhabbo, tisso māluvālatā viya tīṇi akusalamūlāni,
atk-s0402a0:691_2: tāsaṃ appavattiṃ kātuṃ āgatapuriso viya yogāvacaro, kuddālo viya paññā, kuddālapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:691_3: viya saddhāpiṭakaṃ, palikhananakhaṇitti viya vipassanāpaññā, khaṇittiyā mūlacchedanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:691_4: viya vipassanāñāṇena avijjāmūlassa chindanakālo, khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindanakālo viya
atk-s0402a0:691_5: khandhavasena diṭṭhakālo, phālanakālo viya maggañāṇena kilesānaṃ samugghātitakālo,
atk-s0402a0:691_6: masikaraṇakālo viya dharamānakapañcakkhandhakālo, mahāvāte opuṇitvā appavattanakālo
atk-s0402a0:691_7: viya upādinnakakkhandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhitvā punabbhave paṭisandhiaggahaṇakālo
atk-s0402a0:693_0: 71. Dasame tadahuposatheti tasmiṃ ahu uposathe taṃ divasaṃ uposathe, pannarasikauposathadivaseti
atk-s0402a0:693_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamīti uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhamālādihatthā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:693_2: Handāti vavassaggatthe nipāto. Divā divassāti divasassa divā nāma majjhanho, imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:693_3: ṭhite majjhanhike kāleti attho. Kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasīti kiṃ karontī vicarasīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:693_4: Gopālakuposathoti gopālakehi saddhiṃ upavasanauposatho. Nigaṇṭhuposathoti nigaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:693_5: upavasanauposatho. Ariyuposathoti ariyānaṃ upavasanauposatho. Seyyathāpi visākheti
atk-s0402a0:693_6: yathā nāma, visākhe. Sāyanhasamaye sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvāti gopālakā hi devasikavetanena
atk-s0402a0:693_8: Idha pana devasikavetanena rakkhantaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – niyyātetvāti paṭicchāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:693_9: “etā vo gāvo”ti datvā. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti attano gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā mañce
atk-s0402a0:693_10: nipanno evaṃ paccavekkhati. Abhijjhāsahagatenāti taṇhāya sampayuttena. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0402a0:693_11: visākhe, gopālakuposatho hotīti ariyuposathova ayaṃ, aparisuddhavitakkatāya pana
atk-s0402a0:693_12: gopālakauposathaṭṭhāne ṭhito. Na mahapphaloti vipākaphalena na mahapphalo. Na mahānisaṃsoti
atk-s0402a0:693_13: vipākānisaṃsena na mahānisaṃso. Na mahājutikoti vipākobhāsena na mahāobhāso. Na mahāvipphāroti
atk-s0402a0:694_0: Samaṇajātikāti samaṇāyeva. Paraṃ yojanasatanti yojanasataṃ atikkamitvā tato paraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:694_1: Tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhīti tesu yojanasatato parabhāgesu ṭhitesu sattesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipa,
atk-s0402a0:694_2: nikkhittadaṇḍo hohi. Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasminti ahaṃ katthaci kassaci
atk-s0402a0:694_3: parassa kiñcanatasmiṃ na homi. Kiñcanaṃ vuccati palibodho, palibodho na homīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:694_4: hoti. Na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcanatatthīti mamāpi kvacani anto vā bahiddhā
atk-s0402a0:694_5: vā katthaci ekaparikkhārepi kiñcanatā natthi, palibodho natthi, chinnapalibodhohamasmīti
atk-s0402a0:694_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhogeti mañcapīṭhayāgubhattādayo. Adinnaṃyeva paribhuñjatīti punadivase
atk-s0402a0:694_7: mañce nipajjantopi pīṭhe nisīdantopi yāguṃ pivantopi bhattaṃ bhuñjantopi te bhoge
atk-s0402a0:694_8: adinneyeva paribhuñjati. Na mahapphaloti nipphalo. Byañjanameva hi ettha sāvasesaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:694_9: attho pana niravaseso. Evaṃ upavutthassa hi uposathassa appamattakampi vipākaphalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:694_10: iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā nipphalotveva veditabbo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:695_0: Upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassāti idaṃ kasmā āha? Saṃkiliṭṭhena hi cittena upavuttho uposatho
atk-s0402a0:695_1: na mahapphalo hotīti dassitattā visuddhena cittena upavutthassa mahapphalatā anuññātā
atk-s0402a0:695_2: hoti. Tasmā yena kammaṭṭhānena cittaṃ visujjhati, taṃ cittavisodhanakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:695_3: dassetuṃ idamāha. Tattha upakkamenāti paccattapurisakārena, upāyena vā. Tathāgataṃ
atk-s0402a0:695_4: anussaratīti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataguṇe anussarati. Ettha hi itipi so bhagavāti
atk-s0402a0:695_5: so bhagavā itipi sīlena, itipi samādhināti sabbe lokiyalokuttarā buddhaguṇā saṅgahitā.
atk-s0402a0:695_6: Arahantiādīhi pāṭiyekkaguṇāva niddiṭṭhā. Tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdatīti
atk-s0402a0:695_7: lokiyalokuttare tathāgataguṇe anussarantassa cittuppādo pasanno hoti.
atk-s0402a0:696_0: Cittassa upakkilesāti pañca nīvaraṇā. Kakkanti āmalakakakkaṃ. Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti tajjātikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:696_1: tadanucchavikaṃ kakkena makkhanaghaṃsanadhovanavāyāmaṃ. Pariyodapanā hotīti suddhabhāvakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:696_2: hoti. Kiliṭṭhasmiṃ hi sīse pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0402a0:696_3: parisuddhe pana tasmiṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamāno sobhati, evameva
atk-s0402a0:696_4: kiliṭṭhacittena uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uposatho upavuttho na mahapphalo hoti, parisuddhena
atk-s0402a0:696_5: pana cittena uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya upavuttho uposatho mahapphalo hotīti adhippāyena
atk-s0402a0:696_6: evamāha. Brahmuposathaṃ upavasatīti brahmā vuccati sammāsambuddho, tassa guṇānussaraṇavasena
atk-s0402a0:696_7: ayaṃ uposatho brahmuposatho nāma, taṃ upavasati. Brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃvasatīti sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0402a0:696_8: saddhiṃ saṃvasati. Brahmañcassa ārabbhāti sammāsambuddhaṃ ārabbha.
atk-s0402a0:697_0: Dhammaṃ anussaratīti sahatantikaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ anussarati. Sottinti kuruvindakasottiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:697_1: Kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇena hi saddhiṃ lākhaṃ yojetvā maṇike katvā vijjhitvā suttena
atk-s0402a0:697_2: āvuṇitvā taṃ maṇi kalāpapantiṃ ubhato gahetvā piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsenti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:697_3: – “sottiñca paṭiccā”ti. Cuṇṇanti nhānīyacuṇṇaṃ. Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti ubbaṭṭanaghaṃsanadhovanādikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:697_4: tadanurūpavāyāmaṃ. Dhammuposathanti sahatantikaṃ navalokuttaradhammaṃ ārabbha upavutthattā
atk-s0402a0:697_5: ayaṃ uposatho “dhammuposatho”ti vutto. Idhāpi pariyodapanāti pade ṭhatvā purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:698_0: Saṅghaṃ anussaratīti aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe anussarati. Usmañca paṭiccāti
atk-s0402a0:698_1: dve tayo vāre gāhāpitaṃ usumaṃ paṭicca. Usañcātipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Khāranti chārikaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:698_2: Gomayanti gomuttaṃ vā ajalaṇḍikā vā. Pariyodapanāti idhāpi purimanayeneva yojanā
atk-s0402a0:698_3: kātabbā. Saṅghuposathanti aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe ārabbha upavutthattā ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:699_0: Sīlānīti gahaṭṭho gahaṭṭhasīlāni, pabbajito pabbajitasīlāni. Akhaṇḍānītiādīnaṃ attho
atk-s0402a0:699_1: visuddhimagge vitthāritova. Vālaṇḍupakanti assavālehi vā makacivālādīhi vā kataṃ
atk-s0402a0:699_2: aṇḍupakaṃ. Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti telena temetvā malassa tintabhāvaṃ ñatvā chārikaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:699_3: vālaṇḍupakena ghaṃsanavāyāmo. Idha pariyodapanāti pade ṭhatvā evaṃ yojanā kātabbā
atk-s0402a0:699_4: kiliṭṭhasmiñhi ādāse maṇḍitapasādhitopi attabhāvo olokiyamāno na sobhati, parisuddhe
atk-s0402a0:699_5: sobhati. Evameva kiliṭṭhena cittena upavuttho uposatho na mahapphalo hoti, parisuddhena
atk-s0402a0:699_6: pana mahapphalo hotīti. Sīluposathanti attano sīlānussaraṇavasena upavuttho uposatho
atk-s0402a0:699_7: sīluposatho nāma. Sīlena saddhinti attano pañcasīladasasīlena saddhiṃ. Sīlañcassa
atk-s0402a0:700_0: Devatā anussaratīti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇe anussarati.
atk-s0402a0:700_1: Ukkanti uddhanaṃ. Loṇanti loṇamattikā. Gerukanti gerukacuṇṇaṃ. Nāḷikasaṇḍāsanti dhamananāḷikañceva
atk-s0402a0:700_3: anurūpaṃ vāyāmaṃ. Idha pariyodapanāti pade ṭhatvā evaṃ yojanā veditabbā – saṃkiliṭṭhasuvaṇṇamayena
atk-s0402a0:700_4: hi pasādhanabhaṇḍena pasādhitā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamānā na sobhanti, parisuddhasuvaṇṇamayena
atk-s0402a0:700_5: sobhanti. Evameva saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa uposatho na mahapphalo hoti, parisuddhacittassa
atk-s0402a0:700_6: mahapphalo. Devatuposathanti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇe anussarantena
atk-s0402a0:700_7: upavutthauposatho devatuposatho nāma. Sesaṃ imesu buddhānussatiādīsu kammaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0402a0:700_8: yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva.
atk-s0402a0:701_0: Pāṇātipātanti pāṇavadhaṃ. Pahāyāti taṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā.
atk-s0402a0:701_1: Paṭiviratāti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato oratā viratāva. Nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthāti
atk-s0402a0:701_2: parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍā ceva nikkhittasatthā
atk-s0402a0:701_3: cāti attho. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato
atk-s0402a0:701_4: satthanti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:701_5: vā gahetvā vicaranti, na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya. Tasmā nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthātveva
atk-s0402a0:701_6: saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Lajjīti pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgatā. Dayāpannāti
atk-s0402a0:701_7: dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpannā. Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampakā,
atk-s0402a0:701_8: tāya eva dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakāti attho. Ahampajjāti ahampi
atk-s0402a0:701_9: ajja. Imināpi aṅgenāti imināpi guṇaṅgena. Arahataṃ anukaromīti yathā purato gacchantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:701_10: pacchato gacchanto anugacchati nāma, evaṃ ahampi arahantehi paṭhamaṃ kataṃ imaṃ guṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:701_11: pacchā karonto tesaṃ arahantānaṃ anukaromi. Uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatīti
atk-s0402a0:701_12: evaṃ karontena mayā arahatañca anukataṃ bhavissati, uposatho ca upavuttho bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:702_0: Adinnādānanti adinnassa parapariggahitassa ādānaṃ, theyyaṃ corikanti attho. Dinnameva
atk-s0402a0:702_1: ādiyantīti dinnādāyī. Cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhantīti dinnapāṭikaṅkhī. Thenetīti
atk-s0402a0:702_2: theno, na thenena athenena. Athenattāyeva sucibhūtena. Attanāti attabhāvena, athenaṃ
atk-s0402a0:702_3: sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:703_0: Abrahmacariyanti aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ carantīti brahmacārī. Ārācārīti
atk-s0402a0:703_1: abrahmacariyato dūrācārī. Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti
atk-s0402a0:703_2: laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunoti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā. Gāmadhammāti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.
atk-s0402a0:704_0: Musāvādāti alikavacanā tucchavacanā. Saccaṃ vadantīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ saṃdahanti
atk-s0402a0:704_1: ghaṭṭentīti saccasandhā, na antarantarā musā vadantīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci
atk-s0402a0:704_2: musāvādaṃ vadati, kadāci saccaṃ. Tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0402a0:704_3: Tasmā na so saccasandho. Ime pana na tādisā, jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:704_4: saṃdahantiyevāti saccasandhā. Thetāti thirā, ṭhitakathāti attho. Eko puggalo haliddirāgo
atk-s0402a0:704_5: viya thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu viya assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na ṭhitakatho
atk-s0402a0:704_6: hoti. Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya indakhīlo viya ca ṭhitakatho hoti, asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi
atk-s0402a0:704_7: dve kathā na katheti. Ayaṃ vuccati theto. Paccayikāti pattiyāyitabbakā, saddhāyikāti
atk-s0402a0:704_8: attho. Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukena nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0402a0:704_9: “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena
atk-s0402a0:704_10: vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “yadi tena vuttaṃ, idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni paṭikkhipitabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:704_11: natthi, evamevaṃ ida”nti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. Avisaṃvādakā
atk-s0402a0:704_12: lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādentīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:705_1: Ekabhattikāti pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. Tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:705_2: antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike
atk-s0402a0:705_3: dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānāpi ekabhattikāva honti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ekabhattikā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:705_4: Rattibhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatāti rattūparatā. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā
atk-s0402a0:705_5: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā viratā vikālabhojanā.
atk-s0402a0:706_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇibhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ, attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena
atk-s0402a0:706_1: naccañca gītañca vāditañca, antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:706_2: visūkabhūtaṃ dassanañcāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanaṃ. Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:706_3: vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ, na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0402a0:707_0: Mālādīsu mālāti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:707_1: Tattha piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma, ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti nāma, gandhavasena chavirāgavasena
atk-s0402a0:707_2: ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ, tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya
atk-s0402a0:707_3: tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratāti attho. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati
atk-s0402a0:707_4: pamāṇātikkantaṃ, mahāsayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇaṃ, tato paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:708_0: Kīvamahapphaloti kittakaṃ mahapphalo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Pahūtarattaratanānanti
atk-s0402a0:708_1: pahūtena rattasaṅkhātena ratanena samannāgatānaṃ, sakalajambudīpatalaṃ bheritalasadisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:708_2: katvā kaṭippamāṇehi sattahi ratanehi pūritānanti attho. Issariyādhipaccanti issarabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:708_3: vā issariyameva vā ādhipaccaṃ, na ettha sāhasikakammantipi issariyādhipaccaṃ. Rajjaṃ
atk-s0402a0:708_4: kāreyyāti evarūpaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kāreyya. Aṅgānantiādīni tesaṃ janapadānaṃ nāmāni.
atk-s0402a0:708_5: Kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasinti ekaṃ ahorattaṃ upavutthauposathe puññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā
atk-s0402a0:708_6: tato ekaṃ bhāgañca na agghati. Ekarattuposathassa soḷasiyā kalāya yaṃ vipākaphalaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:708_7: taṃyeva tato bahutaraṃ hotīti attho. Kapaṇanti parittakaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:709_0: Abrahmacariyāti aseṭṭhacariyato. Rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojananti uposathaṃ upavasanto
atk-s0402a0:709_1: rattibhojanañca divāvikālabhojanañca na bhuñjeyya. Mañce chamāyaṃva sayetha santhateti
atk-s0402a0:709_2: muṭṭhihatthapādake kappiyamañce vā sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyaṃ vā tiṇapaṇṇapalālādīni
atk-s0402a0:709_3: santharitvā kate santhate vā sayethāti attho. Etaṃ hi aṭṭhaṅgikamāhuposathanti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:709_4: pāṇātipātādīni asamācarantena upavutthaṃ uposathaṃ aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā
atk-s0402a0:709_5: aṭṭhaṅgikanti vadanti. Taṃ pana upavasantena “sve uposathiko bhavissāmī”ti ajjeva
atk-s0402a0:709_6: “idañca idañca kareyyāthā”ti āhārādividhānaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Uposathadivase pātova
atk-s0402a0:709_7: bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā dasasīlalakkhaṇaññuno upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā santike
atk-s0402a0:709_8: vācaṃ bhinditvā uposathaṅgāni samādātabbāni. Pāḷiṃ ajānantena pana “buddhapaññattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:709_9: uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Aññaṃ alabhantena attanāpi adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:709_10: vacībhedo pana kātabboyeva. Uposathaṃ upavasantena parūparodhapaṭisaṃyuttā kammantā
atk-s0402a0:709_11: na vicāretabbā, āyavayagaṇanaṃ karontena na vītināmetabbaṃ, gehe pana āhāraṃ labhitvā
atk-s0402a0:709_12: niccabhattikabhikkhunā viya paribhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammo vā sotabbo, aṭṭhatiṃsāya
atk-s0402a0:710_0: Sudassanāti sundaradassanā. Obhāsayanti obhāsayamānā. Anupariyantīti vicaranti. Yāvatāti
atk-s0402a0:710_1: yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Antalikkhagāti ākāsaṅgamā. Pabhāsantīti jotanti pabhā muñcanti.
atk-s0402a0:710_2: Disāvirocanāti sabbadisāsu virocamānā. Atha vā pabhāsantīti disāhi disā obhāsanti.
atk-s0402a0:710_3: Virocanāti virocamānā. Veḷuriyanti maṇīti vatvāpi iminā jātimaṇibhāvaṃ dasseti. Ekavassikaveḷuvaṇṇañhi
atk-s0402a0:710_4: veḷuriyaṃ jātimaṇi nāma. Taṃ sandhāyevamāha. Bhaddakanti laddhakaṃ. Siṅgīsuvaṇṇanti
atk-s0402a0:710_5: gosiṅgasadisaṃ hutvā uppannattā evaṃ nāmakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ. Kañcananti pabbateyyaṃ pabbate
atk-s0402a0:710_6: jātasuvaṇṇaṃ. Jātarūpanti satthuvaṇṇasuvaṇṇaṃ. Haṭakanti kipillikāhi nīhaṭasuvaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:710_7: Nānubhavantīti na pāpuṇanti. Candappabhāti sāmiatthe paccattaṃ, candappabhāyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:710_8: Upavassuposathanti upavasitvā uposathaṃ. Sukhudrayānīti sukhaphalāni sukhavedanīyāni.
atk-s0402a0:710_9: Saggamupenti ṭhānanti saggasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchanti, kenaci aninditā hutvā devaloke
atk-s0402a0:710_10: uppajjantīti attho. Sesamettha yaṃ antarantarā na vuttaṃ, taṃ vuttānusāreneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0402a0:712_0: 72. Tatiyassa paṭhame channoti evaṃnāmako channaparibbājako. Tumhepi, āvusoti, āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:712_1: yathā mayaṃ rāgādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpema, kiṃ evaṃ tumhepi paññāpethāti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:712_2: Tato thero “ayaṃ paribbājako amhe rāgādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpemāti vadati, natthi panetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:712_3: bāhirasamaye”ti taṃ paṭikkhipanto mayaṃ kho, āvusotiādimāha. Tattha khoti avadhāraṇatthe
atk-s0402a0:712_4: nipāto, mayameva paññāpemāti attho. Tato paribbājako cintesi “ayaṃ thero bāhirasamayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:712_5: luñcitvā haranto ‘mayamevā’ti āha. Kiṃ nu kho ādīnavaṃ disvā ete etesaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpentī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:712_6: Atha theraṃ pucchanto kiṃ pana tumhetiādimāha. Thero tassa byākaronto ratto khotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:712_7: Tattha attatthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ attano atthaṃ. Paratthaubhayatthesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:713_0: Andhakaraṇotiādīsu yassa rāgo uppajjati, taṃ yathābhūtadassananivāraṇena andhaṃ karotīti
atk-s0402a0:713_1: andhakaraṇo. Paññācakkhuṃ na karotīti acakkhukaraṇo. Ñāṇaṃ na karotīti aññāṇakaraṇo.
atk-s0402a0:713_2: Kammassakatapaññā jhānapaññā vipassanāpaññāti imā tisso paññā appavattikaraṇena nirodhetīti
atk-s0402a0:713_3: paññānirodhiko. Aniṭṭhaphaladāyakattā dukkhasaṅkhātassa vighātasseva pakkhe vattatīti
atk-s0402a0:713_4: vighātapakkhiko. Kilesanibbānaṃ na saṃvattetīti anibbānasaṃvattaniko. Alañca panāvuso
atk-s0402a0:713_5: ānanda, appamādāyāti, āvuso ānanda, sace evarūpā paṭipadā atthi, alaṃ tumhākaṃ appamādāya
atk-s0402a0:713_6: yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ, appamādaṃ karotha, āvusoti therassa vacanaṃ anumoditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a0:713_7: Imasmiṃ sutte ariyamaggo lokuttaramissako kathito. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:715_0: 73. Dutiye tena hi gahapatīti thero kira cintesi – “ayaṃ idha āgacchanto na aññātukāmo
atk-s0402a0:715_1: hutvā āgami, pariggaṇhanatthaṃ pana āgato. Iminā pucchitapañhaṃ imināva kathāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:715_2: Iti taṃyeva kathaṃ kathāpetukāmo tena hītiādimāha. Tattha tena hīti kāraṇāpadeso.
atk-s0402a0:715_3: Yasmā tvaṃ evaṃ pucchasi, tasmā taññevettha paṭipucchāmīti. Kesaṃ noti katamesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:715_4: nu. Sadhammukkaṃsanāti attano laddhiyā ukkhipitvā ṭhapanā. Paradhammāpasādanāti paresaṃ
atk-s0402a0:715_5: laddhiyā ghaṭṭanā vambhanā avakkhipanā. Āyataneva dhammadesanāti kāraṇasmiṃyeva dhammadesanā.
atk-s0402a0:715_6: Attho ca vuttoti mayā pucchitapañhāya attho ca pakāsito. Attā ca anupanītoti amhe
atk-s0402a0:715_7: evarūpāti evaṃ attā ca na upanīto. Nupanītotipi pāṭho.
atk-s0402a0:717_0: 74. Tatiye gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhito. Gelaññāti gilānabhāvato. Upasaṅkamīti
atk-s0402a0:717_1: bhuttapātarāso mālāgandhādīni ādāya mahāparivāraparivuto upasaṅkami. Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti
atk-s0402a0:717_2: na bāhāyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhi, nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā dakkhiṇabāhāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:717_3: aṅguṭṭhakena saññaṃ datvā ekamantaṃ apanesīti veditabbo. Athassa “sekhampi kho, mahānāma,
atk-s0402a0:717_4: sīla”ntiādinā nayena sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ sīlañca samādhiñca paññañca kathetvā upari
atk-s0402a0:717_5: arahattaphalavasena asekhā sīlasamādhipaññāyo kathento – “sekhasamādhito sekhaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:717_6: asekhañca phalañāṇaṃ pacchā, sekhavipassanāñāṇato ca asekhaphalasamādhi pacchā uppajjatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:717_7: dīpesi. Yāni pana sampayuttāni samādhiñāṇāni, tesaṃ apacchā apure uppatti veditabbāti.
atk-s0402a0:719_0: 75. Catutthe kūṭāgārasālāyanti dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katāya gandhakuṭiyā.
atk-s0402a0:719_1: Aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātīti appamattakampi asesetvā sabbaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:719_2: paṭijānāti. Satataṃ samitanti sabbakālaṃ nirantaraṃ. Ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitanti
atk-s0402a0:719_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ mayhaṃ upaṭṭhitamevāti dasseti. Purāṇānaṃ kammānanti āyūhitakammānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:719_4: Tapasā byantībhāvanti dukkaratapena vigatantakaraṇaṃ. Navānaṃ kammānanti idāni āyūhitabbakammānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:719_5: Akaraṇāti anāyūhanena. Setughātanti padaghātaṃ paccayaghātaṃ katheti. Kammakkhayā
atk-s0402a0:719_6: dukkhakkhayoti kammavaṭṭakkhayena dukkhakkhayo. Dukkhakkhayā vedanākkhayoti dukkhavaṭṭakkhayena
atk-s0402a0:719_7: vedanākkhayo. Dukkhavaṭṭasmiñhi khīṇe vedanāvaṭṭampi khīṇameva hoti. Vedanākkhayā
atk-s0402a0:719_8: sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ bhavissatīti vedanākkhayena pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇameva
atk-s0402a0:719_9: bhavissati. Sandiṭṭhikāyāti sāmaṃ passitabbāya paccakkhāya. Nijjarāya visuddhiyāti
atk-s0402a0:719_10: kilesajīraṇakapaṭipadāya kilese vā nijjīraṇato nijjarāya sattānaṃ visuddhiyā. Samatikkamo
atk-s0402a0:719_11: hotīti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa atikkamo hoti. Idha, bhante, bhagavā kimāhāti, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:719_12: bhagavā imāya paṭipattiyā kimāha, kiṃ etaṃyeva kilesanijjīraṇakapaṭipadaṃ paññapeti,
atk-s0402a0:720_0: Jānatāti anāvaraṇañāṇena jānantena. Passatāti samantacakkhunā passantena. Visuddhiyāti
atk-s0402a0:720_2: gamanatthāya. Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti saha vipassanāya maggassa adhigamanatthāya. Nibbānassa
atk-s0402a0:720_3: sacchikiriyāyāti apaccayanibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya. Navañca kammaṃ na karotīti
atk-s0402a0:720_4: navaṃ kammaṃ nāyūhati. Purāṇañca kammanti pubbe āyūhitakammaṃ. Phussa phussa byantī
atk-s0402a0:720_5: karotīti phusitvā phusitvā vigatantaṃ karoti, vipākaphassaṃ phusitvā phusitvā taṃ
atk-s0402a0:720_6: kammaṃ khepetīti attho. Sandiṭṭhikāti sāmaṃ passitabbā. Akālikāti na kālantare kiccakārikā.
atk-s0402a0:720_7: Ehipassikāti “ehi passā”ti evaṃ dassetuṃ yuttā. Opaneyyikāti upanaye yuttā allīyitabbayuttā.
atk-s0402a0:720_8: Paccattaṃ veditabbā viññūhīti paṇḍitehi attano attano santāneyeva jānitabbā, bālehi
atk-s0402a0:720_9: pana dujjānā. Iti sīlavasena dve maggā, dve ca phalāni kathitāni. Sotāpannasakadāgāmino
atk-s0402a0:720_10: hi sīlesu paripūrakārinoti. Vivicceva kāmehītiādikāya pana samādhisampadāya tayo
atk-s0402a0:720_11: maggā, tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni. Anāgāmī ariyasāvako hi samādhimhi paripūrakārīti
atk-s0402a0:720_12: vutto. Āsavānaṃ khayātiādīhi arahattaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. Keci pana sīlasamādhayopi arahattaphalasampayuttāva
atk-s0402a0:720_13: idha adhippetā. Ekekassa pana vasena paṭipattidassanatthaṃ visuṃ visuṃ tanti āropitāti.
atk-s0402a0:722_0: 76. Pañcame amaccāti suhajjā. Ñātīti sassusasurapakkhikā. Sālohitāti samānalohitā
atk-s0402a0:722_1: bhātibhaginiādayo. Aveccappasādeti guṇe avecca jānitvā uppanne acalappasāde. Aññathattanti
atk-s0402a0:722_2: bhāvaññathattaṃ. Pathavīdhātuyātiādīsu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākārabhūtāya pathavīdhātuyā,
atk-s0402a0:722_3: dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu yūsagatāya ābandhanabhūtāya āpodhātuyā, catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanabhūtāya
atk-s0402a0:722_4: tejodhātuyā, chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhanabhūtāya vāyodhātuyā siyā aññathattaṃ. Na
atk-s0402a0:722_5: tvevāti imesaṃ hi catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññabhāvūpagamanena siyā aññathattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:722_6: ariyasāvakassa pana na tveva siyāti dasseti. Ettha ca aññathattanti pasādaññathattañca
atk-s0402a0:722_7: gatiaññathattañca. Tañhi tassa na hoti, bhāvaññathattaṃ pana hoti. Ariyasāvako hi
atk-s0402a0:722_8: manusso hutvā devopi hoti brahmāpi. Pasādo panassa bhavantarepi na vigacchati, na
atk-s0402a0:722_9: ca apāyagatisaṅkhātaṃ gatiaññathattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Satthāpi tadeva dassento tatridaṃ
atk-s0402a0:724_0: 77. Chaṭṭhe kāmadhātuvepakkanti kāmadhātuyā vipaccanakaṃ. Kāmabhavoti kāmadhātuyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:724_1: upapattibhavo. Kammaṃ khettanti kusalākusalakammaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena khettaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:724_2: Viññāṇaṃ bījanti sahajātaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ viruhanaṭṭhena bījaṃ. Taṇhā snehoti
atk-s0402a0:724_3: paggaṇhanānubrūhanavasena taṇhā udakaṃ nāma. Avijjānīvaraṇānanti avijjāya āvaritānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:724_4: Taṇhāsaṃyojanānanti taṇhābandhanena baddhānaṃ. Hīnāya dhātuyāti kāmadhātuyā. Viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:724_5: patiṭṭhitanti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ. Majjhimāya dhātuyāti rūpadhātuyā.
atk-s0402a0:726: 78. Sattame cetanāti kammacetanā. Patthanāpi kammapatthanāva. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:728_0: 79. Aṭṭhame sīlabbatanti sīlañceva vatañca. Jīvitanti dukkarakārikānuyogo. Brahmacariyanti
atk-s0402a0:728_1: brahmacariyavāso. Upaṭṭhānasāranti upaṭṭhānena sāraṃ, “idaṃ varaṃ idaṃ niṭṭhā”ti
atk-s0402a0:728_2: evaṃ upaṭṭhitanti attho. Saphalanti saudrayaṃ savaḍḍhikaṃ hotīti pucchati. Na khvettha,
atk-s0402a0:728_3: bhante, ekaṃsenāti, bhante, na kho ettha ekaṃsena byākātabbanti attho. Upaṭṭhānasāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:728_4: sevatoti idaṃ sāraṃ varaṃ niṭṭhāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ sevamānassa. Aphalanti iṭṭhaphalena
atk-s0402a0:728_5: aphalaṃ. Ettāvatā kammavādikiriyavādīnaṃ pabbajjaṃ ṭhapetvā seso sabbopi bāhirakasamayo
atk-s0402a0:728_6: gahito hoti. Saphalanti iṭṭhaphalena saphalaṃ saudrayaṃ. Ettāvatā imaṃ sāsanaṃ ādiṃ
atk-s0402a0:728_7: katvā sabbāpi kammavādikiriyavādīnaṃ pabbajjā gahitā. Na ca panassa sulabharūpo samasamo
atk-s0402a0:728_8: paññāyāti evaṃ sekkhabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā pañhaṃ kathento assa ānandassa paññāya samasamo
atk-s0402a0:728_9: na sulabhoti dasseti. Imasmiṃ sutte sekkhabhūmi nāma kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:730_0: 80. Navame etadavocāti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto dasabalassa vattaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0402a0:730_1: attano divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “imasmiṃ loke mūlagandho nāma atthi, sāragandho nāma
atk-s0402a0:730_2: atthi, pupphagandho nāma atthi. Ime pana tayopi gandhā anuvātaṃyeva gacchanti, na
atk-s0402a0:730_3: paṭivātaṃ. Atthi nu kho kiñci, yassa paṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti cintetvā aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0402a0:730_4: varānaṃ gahaṇakāleyeva kaṅkhuppattisamaye upasaṅkamanavarassa gahitattā takkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:730_5: divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno uppannāya
atk-s0402a0:730_6: kaṅkhāya vinodanatthaṃ etaṃ “tīṇimāni, bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha gandhajātānīti
atk-s0402a0:730_7: gandhajātiyo. Mūlagandhoti mūlavatthuko gandho, gandhasampannaṃ vā mūlameva mūlagandho.
atk-s0402a0:730_8: Tassa hi gandho anuvātaṃ gacchati. Gandhassa pana gandho nāma natthi. Sāragandhapupphagandhesupi
atk-s0402a0:730_9: eseva nayo. Atthānanda, kiñci gandhajātanti ettha saraṇagamanādayo guṇavaṇṇabhāsanavasena
atk-s0402a0:730_10: disāgāmitāya gandhasadisattā gandhā, tesaṃ vatthubhūto puggalo gandhajātaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:730_11: Gandho gacchatīti vaṇṇabhāsanavasena gacchati. Sīlavāti pañcasīlena vā dasasīlena
atk-s0402a0:730_12: vā sīlavā. Kalyāṇadhammoti teneva sīladhammena kalyāṇadhammo sundaradhammo. Vigatamalamaccherenātiādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:730_13: attho visuddhimagge vitthāritova. Disāsūti catūsu disāsu catūsu anudisāsu. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti
atk-s0402a0:731_0: Na pupphagandho paṭivātametīti vassikapupphādīnaṃ gandho paṭivātaṃ na gacchati. Na
atk-s0402a0:731_1: candanaṃ tagaramallikā vāti candanatagaramallikānampi gandho paṭivātaṃ na gacchatīti
atk-s0402a0:731_2: attho. Devalokepi phuṭasumanā nāma hoti, tassā pupphitadivase gandho yojanasataṃ
atk-s0402a0:731_3: ajjhottharati. Sopi paṭivātaṃ vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi gantuṃ na sakkotīti
atk-s0402a0:731_4: vadanti. Satañca gandho paṭivātametīti satañca paṇḍitānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:731_5: sīlādiguṇagandho paṭivātaṃ gacchati. Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyatīti sappuriso paṇḍito
atk-s0402a0:731_6: sīlādiguṇagandhena sabbā disā pavāyati, sabbā disā gandhena avattharatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:733_0: 81. Dasamassa duvidho nikkhepo atthuppattikopi pucchāvasikopi. Kataraatthuppattiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:733_1: kassa pucchāya kathitanti ce? Aruṇavatisuttantaatthuppattiyaṃ ānandattherassa pucchāya
atk-s0402a0:733_2: kathitaṃ. Aruṇavatisuttanto kena kathitoti? Dvīhi buddhehi kathito sikhinā ca bhagavatā
atk-s0402a0:733_3: amhākañca satthārā. Imasmā hi kappā ekatiṃsakappamatthake aruṇavatinagare aruṇavato
atk-s0402a0:733_4: rañño pabhāvatiyā nāma mahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattitvā paripakke ñāṇe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:733_5: nikkhamitvā sikhī bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0402a0:733_6: aruṇavatiṃ nissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0402a0:733_7: “aruṇavatiṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā vihāradvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe ṭhito abhibhuṃ
atk-s0402a0:733_8: nāma aggasāvakaṃ āmantesi – “atippago kho, bhikkhu, aruṇavatiṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ,
atk-s0402a0:734_0: “Atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi
atk-s0402a0:734_1: – ‘āyāma, brāhmaṇa, yena aññataro brahmaloko tenupasaṅkamissāma, na tāva bhattakālo
atk-s0402a0:734_2: bhavissatī’ti. ‘Evaṃ, bhante’ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhū bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0402a0:734_3: arahato sammāsambuddhassa paccassosi. Atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho
atk-s0402a0:734_4: abhibhū ca bhikkhu yena aññataro brahmaloko tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0402a0:735_0: Tattha mahābrahmā sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā attamano paccuggamanaṃ katvā brahmāsanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:735_1: paññāpetvā adāsi, therassāpi anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpayiṃsu. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte
atk-s0402a0:735_2: āsane, theropi attano paññattāsane nisīdi. Mahābrahmāpi dasabalaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:736_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhī bhagavā abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – “paṭibhātu taṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0402a0:736_1: brahmuno ca brahmaparisāya ca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammīkathāti. ‘Evaṃ, bhante’ti
atk-s0402a0:736_2: kho, bhikkhave, abhibhū bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0402a0:736_3: brahmuno ca brahmaparisāya ca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. There
atk-s0402a0:736_4: dhammaṃ kathente brahmagaṇā ujjhāyiṃsu – “cirassañca mayaṃ satthu brahmalokāgamanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:736_5: labhimha, ayañca bhikkhu ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ sayaṃ dhammakathaṃ ārabhī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:737_0: Satthā tesaṃ anattamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca – “ujjhāyanti kho
atk-s0402a0:737_1: te, brāhmaṇa, brahmā ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca. Tena hi tvaṃ – brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0402a0:737_2: bhiyyosomattāya saṃvejehī”ti. Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā anekavihitaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:737_3: katvā sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpento “ārambhatha nikkamathā”ti gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:737_4: Kiṃ pana katvā thero sahassilokadhātuṃ viññāpesīti? Nīlakasiṇaṃ tāva samāpajjitvā
atk-s0402a0:737_5: sabbattha andhakāraṃ phari, tato “kimidaṃ andhakāra”nti sattānaṃ ābhoge uppanne ālokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:737_6: dassesi. “Kiṃ āloko aya”nti vicinantānaṃ attānaṃ dassesi, sahassacakkavāḷe devamanussā
atk-s0402a0:737_7: añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvā paggaṇhitvā theraṃyeva namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero “mahājano
atk-s0402a0:737_8: mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desentassa saraṃ suṇātū”ti imā gāthā abhāsi. Sabbe osaṭāya parisāya
atk-s0402a0:737_9: majjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentassa viya saddaṃ assosuṃ. Atthopi nesaṃ pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:738_0: Atha kho bhagavā saddhiṃ therena aruṇavatiṃ paccāgantvā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:738_1: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi – “assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, abhibhussa
atk-s0402a0:738_2: bhikkhuno brahmaloke ṭhitassa gāthāyo bhāsamānassā”ti. Te “āma, bhante”ti paṭijānitvā
atk-s0402a0:738_3: sutabhāvaṃ āvikarontā tadeva gāthādvayaṃ udāhariṃsu. Satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ
