atk-s0402a0:738_4: datvā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Evaṃ tāva idaṃ suttaṃ ito ekatiṃsakappamatthake sikhinā bhagavatā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:739_0: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavā sabbaññutaṃ patto pavattitavaradhammacakko sāvatthiṃ upanissāya
atk-s0402a0:739_1: jetavane viharanto jeṭṭhamūlamāsapuṇṇamadivase bhikkhū āmantetvā imaṃ aruṇavatisuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:739_2: paṭṭhapesi. Ānandatthero bījaniṃ gahetvā bījayamāno ṭhitakova ādito paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-s0402a0:739_3: pariyosānā ekabyañjanampi ahāpetvā sakalasuttaṃ uggaṇhi. So punadivase piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0402a0:739_4: dasabalassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā saddhivihārikantevāsikesu
atk-s0402a0:739_5: vattaṃ dassetvā pakkantesu hiyyo kathitaṃ aruṇavatisuttaṃ āvajjento nisīdi. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:739_6: sabbaṃ suttaṃ vibhūtaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So cintesi – “sikhissa bhagavato aggasāvako brahmaloke
atk-s0402a0:739_7: ṭhatvā cakkavāḷasahasse andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā attano saddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:739_8: sāvento dhammakathaṃ kathesīti hiyyo satthārā kathitaṃ, sāvakassa tāva visayo evarūpo,
atk-s0402a0:739_9: dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto pana sammāsambuddho kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sarena
atk-s0402a0:739_10: viññāpeyyā”ti. So evaṃ uppannāya vimatiyā vinodanatthaṃ taṅkhaṇeyeva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:739_11: upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi. Etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho āyasmā ānandoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:740_0: Tattha sammukhāti sammukhībhūtena mayā etaṃ sutaṃ, na anussavena, na dūtaparamparāyāti
atk-s0402a0:740_1: iminā adhippāyena evamāha. Kīvatakaṃ pahoti sarena viññāpetunti kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sarīrobhāsena
atk-s0402a0:740_2: vihatandhakāraṃ katvā sarena viññāpetuṃ sakkoti. Sāvako so, ānanda, appameyyā tathāgatāti
atk-s0402a0:740_3: idaṃ bhagavā iminā adhippāyenāha – ānanda, tvaṃ kiṃ vadesi, so padesañāṇe ṭhito sāvako.
atk-s0402a0:740_4: Tathāgatā pana dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattā appameyyā. So tvaṃ nakhasikhāya
atk-s0402a0:740_5: paṃsuṃ gahetvā mahāpathavipaṃsunā saddhiṃ upamento viya kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadesi. Añño
atk-s0402a0:740_6: hi sāvakānaṃ visayo, añño buddhānaṃ. Añño sāvakānaṃ gocaro, añño buddhānaṃ. Aññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:740_7: sāvakānaṃ balaṃ, aññaṃ buddhānanti. Iti bhagavā iminā adhippāyena appameyyabhāvaṃ vatvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:741_0: Thero dutiyampi pucchi. Satthā, “ānanda, tvaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ gahetvā anantākāsena upamento
atk-s0402a0:741_1: viya, cātakasakuṇaṃ gahetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikena supaṇṇarājena upamento viya, hatthisoṇḍāya
atk-s0402a0:741_2: udakaṃ gahetvā mahāgaṅgāya upamento viya, caturatanike āvāṭe udakaṃ gahetvā sattahi
atk-s0402a0:741_3: sarehi upamento viya, nāḷikodanamattalābhiṃ manussaṃ gahetvā cakkavattiraññā upamento
atk-s0402a0:741_4: viya, paṃsupisācakaṃ gahetvā sakkena devaraññā upamento viya, khajjopanakappabhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:741_5: gahetvā sūriyappabhāya upamento viya kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadesīti dīpento dutiyampi appameyyabhāvameva
atk-s0402a0:741_6: vatvā tuṇhī ahosi. Tato thero cintesi – “satthā mayā pucchito na tāva kathesi, handa
atk-s0402a0:741_7: naṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yācitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ nadāpessāmī”ti. So tatiyampi yāci. Taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:741_8: tatiyampi khotiādi vuttaṃ. Athassa bhagavā byākaronto sutā te ānandātiādimāha. Thero
atk-s0402a0:741_9: cintesi – “satthā me ‘sutā te, ānanda, sahassī cūḷanikā lokadhātū’ti ettakameva vatvā
atk-s0402a0:741_10: tuṇhī jāto, idāni buddhasīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti so satthāraṃ yācanto etassa bhagavā kālotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:742_0: Bhagavāpissa vitthārakathaṃ kathetuṃ tena hānandātiādimāha. Tattha yāvatāti yattakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:742_1: ṭhānaṃ. Candimasūriyāti candimā ca sūriyo ca. Pariharantīti vicaranti. Disā bhantīti
atk-s0402a0:742_2: sabbadisā obhāsanti. Virocanāti virocamānā. Ettāvatā ekacakkavāḷaṃ paricchinditvā
atk-s0402a0:742_3: dassitaṃ hoti. Idāni taṃ sahassaguṇaṃ katvā dassento tāva sahassadhā lokoti āha.
atk-s0402a0:742_4: Tasmiṃ sahassadhā loketi tasmiṃ sahassacakkavāḷe. Sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānanti sahassaṃ
atk-s0402a0:742_5: cātumahārājikānaṃ devalokānaṃ. Yasmā pana ekekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe cattāro cattāro mahārājāno,
atk-s0402a0:742_6: tasmā cattāri mahārājasahassānīti vuttaṃ. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:742_7: Cūḷanikāti khuddikā. Ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ visayo. Kasmā panesā ānītāti? Majjhimikāya lokadhātuyā
atk-s0402a0:743_0: Yāvatāti yattakā. Tāva sahassadhāti tāva sahassabhāgena. Dvisahassī majjhimikā lokadhātūti
atk-s0402a0:743_1: ayaṃ sahassacakkavāḷāni sahassabhāgena gaṇetvā dasasatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇā dvisahassī
atk-s0402a0:743_2: majjhimikā nāma lokadhātu. Ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ avisayo, buddhānameva visayo. Ettakepi
atk-s0402a0:743_3: hi ṭhāne tathāgatā andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:743_4: sakkontīti dīpeti. Ettakena buddhānaṃ jātikkhettaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Bodhisattānañhi
atk-s0402a0:743_5: pacchimabhave devalokato cavitvā mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase ca kucchito
atk-s0402a0:744_0: Tisahassī mahāsahassīti sahassito paṭṭhāya tatiyāti tisahassī, sahassaṃ sahassadhā
atk-s0402a0:744_1: katvā gaṇitaṃ majjhimikaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitattā mahantehi sahassehi gaṇitāti
atk-s0402a0:744_2: mahāsahassī. Ettāvatā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇo loko dassito hoti. Bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:744_3: ākaṅkhamāno ettake ṭhāne andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpeyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:744_4: Gaṇakaputtatissatthero pana evamāha – “na tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā evaṃ parimāṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:744_5: Idañhi ācariyānaṃ sajjhāyamuḷhakaṃ vācāya parihīnaṭṭhānaṃ, dasakoṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:744_6: pana ṭhānaṃ tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātu nāmā”ti. Ettāvatā hi bhagavatā āṇākkhettaṃ
atk-s0402a0:744_8: moraparittamettaparittaratanaparittānaṃ āṇā pharati. Yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyāti yattakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:744_9: ṭhānaṃ iccheyya, iminā visayakkhettaṃ dasseti. Buddhānañhi visayakkhettassa pamāṇaparicchedo
atk-s0402a0:744_10: nāma natthi, natthikabhāve cassa imaṃ opammaṃ āharanti – koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷamhi
atk-s0402a0:744_11: yāva brahmalokā sāsapehi pūretvā sace koci puratthimāya disāya ekacakkavāḷe ekaṃ
atk-s0402a0:744_12: sāsapaṃ pakkhipanto āgaccheyya, sabbepi te sāsapā parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na tveva
atk-s0402a0:744_13: puratthimāya disāya cakkavāḷāni. Dakkhiṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Tattha buddhānaṃ avisayo nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a0:745_0: Evaṃ vutte thero cintesi – “satthā evamāha – ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, tathāgato tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:745_1: sarena viññāpeyya, yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā’ti. Visamo kho panāyaṃ loko, anantāni cakkavāḷāni,
atk-s0402a0:745_2: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyo uggato hoti, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne majjhe ṭhito, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne atthaṅgato.
atk-s0402a0:745_3: Ekasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭhamayāmo hoti, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne majjhimayāmo, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacchimayāmo.
atk-s0402a0:745_4: Sattāpi kammappasutā, khiḍḍāpasutā, āhārappasutāti evaṃ tehi tehi kāraṇehi vikkhittā
atk-s0402a0:745_5: ca pamattā ca honti. Kathaṃ nu kho te satthā sarena viññāpeyyā”ti. So evaṃ cintetvā
atk-s0402a0:745_6: vimaticchedanatthaṃ tathāgataṃ pucchanto yathā kathaṃ panātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:746_0: Athassa satthā byākaronto idhānanda, tathāgatotiādimāha. Tattha obhāsena phareyyāti
atk-s0402a0:746_1: sarīrobhāsena phareyya. Pharamāno panesa kiṃ kareyyāti? Yasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyo paññāyati,
atk-s0402a0:746_2: tattha naṃ attano ānubhāvena atthaṃ gameyya. Yattha pana na paññāyati, tattha naṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_3: uṭṭhāpetvā majjhe ṭhapeyya. Tato yattha sūriyo paññāyati, tattha manussā “adhunāva
atk-s0402a0:746_4: sūriyo paññāyittha, so idāneva atthaṅgamito, nāgāvaṭṭo nu kho ayaṃ, bhūtāvaṭṭayakkhāvaṭṭadevatāvaṭṭānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_5: aññataro”ti vittakkaṃ uppādeyyuṃ. Yattha pana na paññāyati, tattha manussā “adhunāva
atk-s0402a0:746_6: sūriyo atthaṅgamito, svāyaṃ idāneva uṭṭhito, kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ nāgāvaṭṭabhūtāvaṭṭayakkhāvaṭṭadevatāvaṭṭānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_7: aññataro”ti vitakkaṃ uppādeyyuṃ. Tato tesu manussesu ālokañca andhakārañca āvajjitvā
atk-s0402a0:746_8: “kiṃ paccayā nu kho ida”nti pariyesamānesu satthā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā bahalandhakāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_9: patthareyya. Kasmā? Tesaṃ kammādippasutānaṃ sattānaṃ santāsajananatthaṃ. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_10: santāsaṃ āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā odātakasiṇasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā paṇḍaraṃ ghanabuddharasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_11: vissajjento candasahassasūriyasahassauṭṭhānakālo viya ekappahāreneva sabbaṃ ekālokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_12: kareyya. Tañca kho tilabījamattena kāyappadesena obhāsaṃ muñcanto. Yo hi cakkavāḷapathaviṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_13: dīpakapallakaṃ katvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ telaṃ katvā sineruṃ vaṭṭiṃ katvā aññasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_14: sinerumuddhani ṭhapetvā jāleyya, so ekacakkavāḷeyeva ālokaṃ kareyya. Tato paraṃ vidatthimpi
atk-s0402a0:746_15: obhāsetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Tathāgato pana tilaphalappamāṇena sarīrappadesena obhāsaṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_16: muñcitvā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ ekobhāsaṃ kareyya tato vā pana bhiyyo. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:747_0: Taṃ ālokaṃ sañjāneyyunti taṃ ālokaṃ disvā “yena sūriyo atthañceva gamito uṭṭhāpito
atk-s0402a0:747_1: ca, bahalandhakārañca vissaṭṭhaṃ, esa so puriso idāni ālokaṃ katvā ṭhito, aho acchariyapuriso”ti
atk-s0402a0:747_2: añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā nisīdeyyuṃ. Saddamanussāveyyāti dhammakathāsaddamanussāveyya.
atk-s0402a0:747_3: Yo hi ekaṃ cakkavāḷapabbataṃ bheriṃ katvā mahāpathaviṃ bhericammaṃ katvā sineruṃ
atk-s0402a0:747_4: daṇḍaṃ katvā aññasmiṃ sinerumatthake ṭhapetvā ākoṭeyya, so ekacakkavāḷeyeva taṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:747_5: sāveyya, parato vidatthimpi atikkāmetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Tathāgato pana pallaṅke vā
atk-s0402a0:747_6: pīṭhe vā nisīditvā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeti, tato vā pana
atk-s0402a0:747_7: bhiyyo, evaṃ mahānubhāvā tathāgatāti. Iti bhagavā iminā ettakena visayakkhettameva dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:748_0: Imañca pana buddhasīhanādaṃ sutvā therassa abbhantare balavapīti uppannā, so pītivasena
atk-s0402a0:748_1: udānaṃ udānento lābhā vata metiādimāha. Tattha yassa me satthā evaṃmahiddhikoti yassa
atk-s0402a0:748_2: mayhaṃ satthā evaṃmahiddhiko, tassa mayhaṃ evaṃmahiddhikassa satthu paṭilābho lābhā
atk-s0402a0:748_3: ceva suladdhañcāti attho. Atha vā yvāhaṃ evarūpassa satthuno pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:748_4: vicarituṃ, pādaparikammaṃ piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ, mukhadhovanaudakanhānodakāni dātuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:748_5: gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ sammajjituṃ, uppannāya kaṅkhāya pañhaṃ pucchituṃ, madhuradhammakathañca
atk-s0402a0:748_6: sotuṃ labhāmi, ete sabbepi mayhaṃ lābhā ceva suladdhañcātipi sandhāya evamāha. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:748_7: ca bhagavato andhakārālokasaddasavanasaṅkhātānaṃ iddhīnaṃ mahantatāya mahiddhikatā,
atk-s0402a0:748_8: tāsaṃyeva anupharaṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā. Udāyīti lāḷudāyitthero. So kira pubbe
atk-s0402a0:748_9: upaṭṭhākatthere āghātaṃ bandhitvā carati. Tasmā idāni okāsaṃ labhitvā imasmiṃ buddhasīhanādapariyosāne
atk-s0402a0:748_10: jalamānaṃ dīpasikhaṃ nibbāpento viya carantassa goṇassa tuṇḍe pahāraṃ dento viya
atk-s0402a0:748_11: bhattabharitaṃ pātiṃ avakujjanto viya therassa pasādabhaṅgaṃ karonto evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:749_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavāti evaṃ udāyittherena vutte bhagavā yathā nāma papātataṭe ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:749_1: pavedhamānaṃ purisaṃ ekamante ṭhito hitesī puriso “ito ehi ito ehī”ti punappunaṃ
atk-s0402a0:749_2: vadeyya, evamevaṃ udāyittheraṃ tasmā vacanā nivārento mā hevaṃ udāyi, mā hevaṃ udāyīti
atk-s0402a0:749_3: āha. Tattha hīti nipātamattaṃ, mā evaṃ avacāti attho. Mahārajjanti cakkavattirajjaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:749_4: Nanu ca satthā ekassa sāvakassa dhammadesanāya uppannapasādassa mahānisaṃsaṃ aparicchinnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:749_5: akāsi, so kasmā imassa buddhasīhanādaṃ ārabbha uppannassa pasādassa ānisaṃsaṃ paricchindatīti?
atk-s0402a0:749_6: Ariyasāvakassa ettakaattabhāvaparimāṇattā. Dandhapaññopi hi sotāpanno sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0402a0:749_7: devesu ca manussesu ca attabhāvaṃ paṭilabhati, tenassa gatiṃ paricchindanto evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:749_8: Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve ṭhatvā. Parinibbāyissatīti appaccayaparinibbānena
atk-s0402a0:749_9: parinibbāyissati. Iti nibbānena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto imaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0402a0:751_0: 82. Catutthassa paṭhame samaṇiyānīti samaṇasantakāni. Samaṇakaraṇīyānīti samaṇena
atk-s0402a0:751_1: kattabbakiccāni. Adhisīlasikkhāsamādānantiādīsu samādānaṃ vuccati gahaṇaṃ, adhisīlasikkhāya
atk-s0402a0:751_2: samādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ pūraṇaṃ adhisīlasikkhāsamādānaṃ. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:751_3: ca sīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ, cittaṃ adhicittaṃ, paññā adhipaññāti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:751_4: Tattha pañcasīlaṃ sīlaṃ nāma, taṃ upādāya dasasīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ nāma, tampi upādāya
atk-s0402a0:751_5: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ nāma. Apica sabbampi lokiyasīlaṃ sīlaṃ nāma, lokuttarasīlaṃ
atk-s0402a0:751_6: adhisīlaṃ, tadeva sikkhitabbato sikkhāti vuccati. Kāmāvacaracittaṃ pana cittaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:751_7: taṃ upādāya rūpāvacaraṃ adhicittaṃ nāma, tampi upādāya arūpāvacaraṃ adhicittaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:751_8: Apica sabbampi lokiyacittaṃ cittameva, lokuttaraṃ adhicittaṃ. Paññāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:751_9: Tasmāti yasmā imāni tīṇi samaṇakaraṇīyāni, tasmā. Tibboti bahalo. Chandoti kattukamyatākusalacchando.
atk-s0402a0:751_10: Iti imasmiṃ suttante tisso sikkhā lokiyalokuttarā kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:753_0: 83. Dutiye piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoti pacchato pacchato. Ahampi dammo ahampi dammoti ahampi
atk-s0402a0:753_1: “dammo dammamāno”ti vadamāno gāvīti. Seyyathāpi gunnanti yathā gāvīnaṃ. Gāvo hi kāḷāpi
atk-s0402a0:753_2: rattāpi setādivaṇṇāpi honti, gadrabhassa pana tādiso vaṇṇo nāma natthi. Yathā ca
atk-s0402a0:753_3: vaṇṇo, evaṃ saropi padampi aññādisameva. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Imasmimpi sutte tisso
atk-s0402a0:755_0: 84. Tatiye paṭikaccevāti paṭhamameva. Sukaṭṭhaṃ karotīti naṅgalena sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:755_1: Sumatikatanti matiyā suṭṭhu samīkataṃ. Kālenāti vapitabbayuttakālena. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:757_0: 85. Catutthe vajjiputtakoti vajjirājakulassa putto. Diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasatanti paṇṇāsādhikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:757_1: sikkhāpadasataṃ. Tasmiṃ samaye paññattāni sikkhāpadāneva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. So kira
atk-s0402a0:757_2: bhikkhu ajjavasampanno ujujātiko avaṅko akuṭilo, tasmā “ahaṃ ettakāni sikkhāpadāni
atk-s0402a0:757_3: rakkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ vā na vā”ti cintetvā satthu ārocesi. Sakkomahanti sakkomi ahaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:757_4: So kira “ettakesu sikkhāpadesu sikkhantassa agaru tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhitu”nti maññamāno
atk-s0402a0:757_5: evamāha. Atha bhagavā yathā nāma paññāsa tiṇakalāpiyo ukkhipituṃ asakkontassa kalāpiyasataṃ
atk-s0402a0:757_6: bandhitvā sīse ṭhapeyya, evameva ekissāpi sikkhāya sikkhituṃ asakkontassa aparā dvepi
atk-s0402a0:757_7: sikkhā upari pakkhipanto tasmātiha tvaṃ bhikkhūtiādimāha. Sukhumālo kira uttaro nāma
atk-s0402a0:757_8: jānapadamanusso lohapāsādavihāre vasati. Atha naṃ daharabhikkhū āhaṃsu – “uttara,
atk-s0402a0:757_9: aggisālā ovassati, tiṇaṃ kappiyaṃ katvā dehī”ti. Taṃ ādāya aṭaviṃ gantvā tena lāyitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:757_10: tiṇaṃyeva karaḷe bandhitvā “paññāsa karaḷe gahetuṃ sakkhissasi uttarā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:757_11: So “na sakkhissāmī”ti āha. Asītiṃ pana sakkhissasīti? Na sakkhissāmi, bhanteti. Ekaṃ
atk-s0402a0:757_12: karaḷasataṃ sakkhissasīti? Āma, bhante, gaṇhissāmīti. Daharabhikkhū karaḷasataṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0402a0:757_13: tassa sīse ṭhapayiṃsu. So ukkhipitvā nitthunanto gantvā aggisālāya samīpe pātesi.
atk-s0402a0:757_14: Atha naṃ bhikkhū “kilantarūposi uttarā”ti āhaṃsu. Āma, bhante, daharā bhikkhū maṃ
atk-s0402a0:757_15: vañcesuṃ, imaṃ ekampi karaḷasataṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkontaṃ maṃ “paṇṇāsa karaḷe ukkhipāhī”ti
atk-s0402a0:757_16: vadiṃsu. Āma, uttara, vañcayiṃsu tanti. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi tisso
atk-s0402a0:759_0: 86. Pañcame ujumaggānusārinoti ujumaggo vuccati ariyamaggo, taṃ anussarantassa paṭipannakassāti
atk-s0402a0:759_1: attho. Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇanti paṭhamameva maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati. Maggo hi kilesānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:759_2: khepanato khayo nāma, taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ khayasmiṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma. Tato aññā anantarāti
atk-s0402a0:759_3: tato catutthamaggañāṇato anantarā aññā uppajjati, arahattaphalaṃ uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:759_4: Aññāvimuttassāti arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimuttassa. Ñāṇaṃ ve hotīti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:759_5: hoti. Iti suttepi gāthāsupi satta sekhā kathitā. Avasāne pana khīṇāsavo dassitoti.
atk-s0402a0:761_0: 87. Chaṭṭhe attakāmāti attano hitakāmā. Yatthetaṃ sabbaṃ samodhānaṃ gacchatīti yāsu
atk-s0402a0:761_1: sikkhāsu sabbametaṃ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Paripūrakārī hotīti
atk-s0402a0:761_2: samattakārī hoti. Mattaso kārīti pamāṇena kārako, sabbena sabbaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti
atk-s0402a0:761_3: attho. Khuddānukhuddakānīti cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā sesasikkhāpadāni. Tatrāpi
atk-s0402a0:761_4: saṅghādisesaṃ khuddakaṃ, thullaccayaṃ anukhuddakaṃ nāma. Thullaccayañca khuddakaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:761_5: pācittiyaṃ anukhuddakaṃ nāma, pācittiyañca khuddakaṃ, pāṭidesaniyadukkaṭadubbhāsitāni
atk-s0402a0:761_6: anukhuddakāni nāma. Ime pana aṅguttaramahānikāyavaḷañjanakaācariyā “cattāri pārājikāni
atk-s0402a0:761_7: ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi khuddānukhuddakānī”ti vadanti. Tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipīti
atk-s0402a0:761_8: ettha pana khīṇāsavo tāva lokavajjaṃ nāpajjati, paṇṇattivajjameva āpajjati. Āpajjanto
atk-s0402a0:761_9: ca kāyenapi vācāyapi cittenapi āpajjati. Kāyena āpajjanto kuṭikārasahaseyyādīni āpajjati,
atk-s0402a0:761_10: vācāya āpajjanto sañcarittapadasodhammādīni, cittena āpajjanto rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:761_11: āpajjati. Sekkhesupi eseva nayo. Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttāti, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:761_12: na hi mayā ettha evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjane ca vuṭṭhāne ca ariyapuggalassa abhabbatā
atk-s0402a0:761_13: kathitā. Ādibrahmacariyakānīti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāni cattāri mahāsīlasikkhāpadāni.
atk-s0402a0:761_15: Tatthāti tesu sikkhāpadesu. Dhuvasīloti nibaddhasīlo. Ṭhitasīloti patiṭṭhitasīlo.
atk-s0402a0:761_16: Sotāpannoti sotasaṅkhātena maggena phalaṃ āpanno. Avinipātadhammoti catūsu apāyesu
atk-s0402a0:761_17: apatanasabhāvo. Niyatoti sotāpattimagganiyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0402a0:762_0: Tanuttāti tanubhāvo. Sakadāgāmino hi rāgādayo abbhapaṭalaṃ viya macchikāpattaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:762_1: ca tanukā honti, na bahalā. Orambhāgiyānanti heṭṭhābhāgiyānaṃ. Saṃyojanānanti bandhanānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:762_2: Parikkhayāti parikkhayena. Opapātiko hotīti uppannako hoti. Tattha parinibbāyīti
atk-s0402a0:762_3: heṭṭhā anotaritvā upariyeva parinibbānadhammo. Anāvattidhammoti yonigativasena anāgamanadhammo.
atk-s0402a0:763_0: Padesaṃ padesakārītiādīsu padesakārī puggalo nāma sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca anāgāmī
atk-s0402a0:763_1: ca, so padesameva sampādeti. Paripūrakārī nāma arahā, so paripūrameva sampādeti.
atk-s0402a0:763_2: Avañjhānīti atucchāni saphalāni saudrayānīti attho. Idhāpi tisso sikkhā missakāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:765_0: 88. Sattame kolaṃkoloti kulā kulaṃ gamanako. Kulanti cettha bhavo adhippeto, tasmā
atk-s0402a0:765_1: “dve vā tīṇi vā kulānī”ti etthapi dve vā tayo vā bhaveti attho veditabbo. Ayañhi
atk-s0402a0:765_2: dve vā bhave sandhāvati tayo vā, uttamakoṭiyā cha vā. Tasmā dve vā tīṇi vā cattāri
atk-s0402a0:765_3: vā pañca vā cha vāti evamettha vikappo daṭṭhabbo. Ekabījīti ekasseva bhavassa bījaṃ
atk-s0402a0:765_4: etassa atthīti ekabījī. Uddhaṃsototiādīsu atthi uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi uddhaṃsoto
atk-s0402a0:765_5: na akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī.
atk-s0402a0:765_6: Tattha yo idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā avihādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari
atk-s0402a0:765_7: nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu
atk-s0402a0:765_8: nibbatto tattheva aparinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭhampi appatvā uparimabrahmaloke parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a0:765_9: ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo ito cavitvā akaniṭṭheyeva nibbattati, ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:765_10: na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu catūsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0402a0:765_11: tattheva parinibbāyati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0402a0:766_0: Yattha katthaci uppanno pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patto sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
atk-s0402a0:766_1: nāma. Asaṅkhārena appayogena patto asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma. Yo pana kappasahassāyukesu
atk-s0402a0:766_2: avihesu nibbattitvā pañcamaṃ kappasataṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patto, ayaṃ upahaccaparinibbāyī
atk-s0402a0:766_3: nāma. Atappādīsupi eseva nayo. Antarāparinibbāyīti yo āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā
atk-s0402a0:766_4: parinibbāyati, so tividho hoti. Kappasahassāyukesu tāva avihesu nibbattitvā eko nibbattadivaseyeva
atk-s0402a0:766_5: arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. No ce nibbattadivase pāpuṇāti, paṭhamassa pana kappasatassa matthake
atk-s0402a0:766_6: pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ paṭhamo antarāparinibbāyī. Aparo evaṃ asakkonto dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:766_7: matthake pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ dutiyo. Aparo evampi asakkonto catunnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake
atk-s0402a0:766_8: pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ tatiyo antarāparinibbāyī. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:767_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā catuvīsati sotāpannā, dvādasa sakadāgāmino, aṭṭhacattālīsa
atk-s0402a0:767_1: anāgāmino, dvādasa ca arahanto kathetabbā. Imasmiṃ hi sāsane saddhādhuraṃ paññādhuranti
atk-s0402a0:767_2: dve dhurāni, dukkhapaṭipadādandhābhiññādayo catasso paṭipadā. Tattheko saddhādhurena
atk-s0402a0:767_3: abhinivisitvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā ekameva bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:767_4: ayameko ekabījī. So paṭipadāvasena catubbidho hoti. Yathā cesa, evaṃ paññādhurena
atk-s0402a0:767_5: abhiniviṭṭhopīti aṭṭha ekabījino. Tathā kolaṃkolā sattakkhattuparamā cāti ime catuvīsati
atk-s0402a0:767_6: sotāpannā nāma. Tīsu pana vimokkhesu suññatavimokkhena sakadāgāmibhūmiṃ pattā catunnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:767_7: paṭipadānaṃ vasena cattāro sakadāgāmino, tathā animittavimokkhena pattā cattāro,
atk-s0402a0:767_8: appaṇihitavimokkhena pattā cattāroti ime dvādasa sakadāgāmino. Avihesu pana tayo
atk-s0402a0:767_9: antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī, eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca
atk-s0402a0:767_10: anāgāmino, te asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañca, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañcāti dasa
atk-s0402a0:767_11: honti, tathā atappādīsu. Akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṃsoto natthi, tasmā tattha cattāro
atk-s0402a0:767_12: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti aṭṭha, ime aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino.
atk-s0402a0:767_13: Yathā pana sakadāgāmino, tatheva arahantopi dvādasa veditabbā. Idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:769_0: 89. Aṭṭhame taṃ vā pana anabhisambhavaṃ appaṭivijjhanti taṃ arahattaṃ apāpuṇanto
atk-s0402a0:769_1: appaṭivijjhanto. Iminā nayena sabbaṭṭhānesu attho veditabbo. Idhāpi tisso sikkhā
atk-s0402a0:769_2: missikāva kathitā. Navamaṃ uttānatthameva. Idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:771: 91. Dasame āsavānaṃ khayāti ettha arahattamaggo adhipaññāsikkhā nāma. Phalaṃ pana sikkhitasikkhassa uppajjanato sikkhāti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:772_0: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti yathā paṭhamaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhati, pacchā tatheva sikkhatīti
atk-s0402a0:772_1: attho. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Yathā adho tathā uddhanti yathā heṭṭhimakāyaṃ asubhavasena
atk-s0402a0:772_2: passati, uparimakāyampi tatheva pharati. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Yathā divā tathā
atk-s0402a0:772_3: rattinti yathā divā tisso sikkhā sikkhati, rattimpi tatheva sikkhatīti attho. Abhibhuyya
atk-s0402a0:772_4: disā sabbāti sabbā disā ārammaṇavasena abhibhavitvā. Appamāṇasamādhināti arahattamaggasamādhinā.
atk-s0402a0:773_0: Sekkhanti sikkhamānaṃ sakaraṇīyaṃ. Paṭipadanti paṭipannakaṃ. Saṃsuddhacāriyanti saṃsuddhacaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:773_1: parisuddhasīlaṃ. Sambuddhanti catusaccabuddhaṃ. Dhīraṃ paṭipadantagunti khandhadhīraāyatanadhīravasena
atk-s0402a0:773_2: dhīraṃ dhitisampannaṃ paṭipattiyā antaṃ gataṃ. Viññāṇassāti carimakaviññāṇassa. Taṇhākkhayavimuttinoti
atk-s0402a0:773_4: nibbānanti padīpanibbānaṃ viya. Vimokkho hoti cetasoti cittassa vimutti vimuccanā
atk-s0402a0:773_5: appavattibhāvo hoti. Taṇhākkhayavimuttino hi khīṇāsavassa carimakaviññāṇanirodhena
atk-s0402a0:773_6: parinibbānaṃ viya cetaso vimokkho hoti, na gataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati, apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoyeva hotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:775_0: 92. Ekādasame saṅkavā nāma kosalānaṃ nigamoti saṅkavāti evaṃnāmako kosalaraṭṭhe nigamo.
atk-s0402a0:775_1: Āvāsikoti bhārahāro nave āvāse samuṭṭhāpeti, purāṇe paṭijaggati. Sikkhāpadapaṭisaṃyuttāyāti
atk-s0402a0:775_2: sikkhāsaṅkhātehi padehi paṭisaṃyuttāya, tīhi sikkhāhi samannāgatāyāti attho. Sandassetīti
atk-s0402a0:775_3: sammukhe viya katvā dasseti. Samādapetīti gaṇhāpeti. Samuttejetīti samussāheti. Sampahaṃsetīti
atk-s0402a0:775_4: paṭiladdhaguṇehi vaṇṇaṃ kathento vodāpeti. Adhisallikhateti ativiya sallikhati, ativiya
atk-s0402a0:775_5: sallikhitaṃ katvā saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ kathetīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:776_0: Accayoti aparādho. Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma adhibhavitvā pavatto. Ahudeva akkhantīti
atk-s0402a0:776_1: ahosiyeva anadhivāsanā. Ahu appaccayoti ahosi atuṭṭhākāro. Paṭiggaṇhātūti khamatu.
atk-s0402a0:776_2: Āyatiṃ saṃvarāyāti anāgate saṃvaratthāya, puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa khalitassa
atk-s0402a0:776_3: vā akaraṇatthāyāti attho. Tagghāti ekaṃsena. Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosīti yathā dhammo
atk-s0402a0:776_4: ṭhito, tathā karosi, khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava
atk-s0402a0:776_5: aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma. Vuddhihesā, kassapa, ariyassa vinayeti esā kassapa buddhassa
atk-s0402a0:776_6: bhagavato sāsane vuddhi nāma. Katamā? Yāyaṃ accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā
atk-s0402a0:776_7: āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā. Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto “yo accayaṃ accayato
atk-s0402a0:776_8: disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti āha. Na sikkhākāmoti tisso
atk-s0402a0:776_9: sikkhā na kāmeti na pattheti na piheti. Sikkhāsamādānassāti sikkhāparipūraṇassa.
atk-s0402a0:776_10: Na vaṇṇavādīti guṇaṃ na katheti. Kālenāti yuttappayuttakālena. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:778_0: 93. Pañcamassa paṭhame accāyikānīti atipātikāni. Karaṇīyānīti avassakiccāni. Yañhi
atk-s0402a0:778_1: na avassaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ kiccanti vuccati. Avassaṃ kātabbaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāma. Sīghaṃ
atk-s0402a0:778_2: sīghanti vegena vegena. Tassa kho tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ. Natthi sā iddhi
atk-s0402a0:778_3: vā ānubhāvo vāti sā vā iddhi so vā ānubhāvo natthi. Uttarasveti tatiyadivase. Utupariṇāminīti
atk-s0402a0:778_4: laddhautupariṇāmāni hutvā. Jāyantipīti tatiyadivase nikkhantasetaṅkurāni honti, sattāhe
atk-s0402a0:778_5: patte nīlaṅkurāni honti. Gabbhīnipi hontīti diyaḍḍhamāsaṃ patvā gahitagabbhāni honti.
atk-s0402a0:778_6: Paccantipīti tayo māse patvā paccanti. Idāni yasmā buddhānaṃ gahapatikena vā sassehi
atk-s0402a0:778_7: vā attho natthi, sāsane pana tappaṭirūpakaṃ puggalaṃ vā atthaṃ vā dassetuṃ taṃ taṃ
atk-s0402a0:778_8: opammaṃ āharanti. Tasmā yamatthaṃ dassetukāmena etaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ dassento evameva
atk-s0402a0:778_9: khotiādimāha. Taṃ atthato uttānameva. Sikkhā pana idhāpi missikā eva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:780_0: 94. Dutiye cīvarapavivekanti cīvaraṃ nissāya uppajjanakakilesehi vivittabhāvaṃ. Sesadvayepi
atk-s0402a0:780_1: eseva nayo. Sāṇānīti sāṇavākacelāni. Masāṇānīti missakacelāni. Chavadussānīti matasarīrato
atk-s0402a0:780_2: chaḍḍitavatthāni, erakatiṇādīni vā ganthetvā katanivāsanāni. Paṃsukūlānīti pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:780_3: chaḍḍitanantakāni. Tirīṭānīti rukkhatacavatthāni. Ajinānīti ajinamigacammāni. Ajinakkhipanti
atk-s0402a0:780_4: tadeva majjhe phālitaṃ, sahakhurakantipi vadanti. Kusacīranti kusatiṇāni ganthetvā
atk-s0402a0:780_5: katacīraṃ. Vākacīraphalakacīresupi eseva nayo. Kesakambalanti manussakesehi katakambalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:780_6: Vālakambalanti assavālādīhi katakambalaṃ. Ulūkapakkhikanti ulūkapattāni ganthetvā katanivāsanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:781_0: Sākabhakkhāti allasākabhakkhā. Sāmākabhakkhāti sāmākataṇḍulabhakkhā. Nīvārādīsu nīvārā
atk-s0402a0:781_1: nāma araññe sayaṃ jātavīhijāti. Daddulanti cammakārehi cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:781_2: Haṭaṃ vuccati silesopi sevālopi kaṇikārādirukkhaniyyāsopi. Kaṇanti kuṇḍakaṃ. Ācāmoti
atk-s0402a0:781_3: bhattaukkhalikāya laggo jhāmaodano. Taṃ chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne gahetvā khādanti, odanakañjiyantipi
atk-s0402a0:781_4: vadanti. Piññākādayo pākaṭāva. Pavattaphalabhojīti patitaphalabhojī. Bhusāgāranti khalasālaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:782_0: Sīlavāti catupārisuddhisīlena samannāgato. Dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṃ hotīti pañca dussīlyāni
atk-s0402a0:782_1: pahīnāni honti. Sammādiṭṭhikoti yāthāvadiṭṭhiko. Micchādiṭṭhīti ayāthāvadiṭṭhi. Āsavāti
atk-s0402a0:782_2: cattāro āsavā. Aggappattoti sīlaggappatto. Sārappattoti sīlasāraṃ patto. Suddhoti
atk-s0402a0:783_0: Seyyathāpīti yathā nāma. Sampannanti paripuṇṇaṃ paripakkasālibharitaṃ. Saṅgharāpeyyāti
atk-s0402a0:783_1: saṅkaḍḍhāpeyya. Ubbahāpeyyāti khalaṭṭhānaṃ āharāpeyya. Bhusikanti bhusaṃ. Koṭṭāpeyyāti
atk-s0402a0:783_2: udukkhale pakkhipāpetvā musalehi paharāpeyya. Aggappattānīti taṇḍulaggaṃ pattāni.
atk-s0402a0:783_3: Sārappattādīsupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Yaṃ panettha “dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:783_4: micchādiṭṭhi cassa pahīnā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sotāpattimaggena pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:785_0: 95. Tatiye viddheti valāhakavigamena dūrībhūte. Deveti ākāse. Abhivihaccāti abhivihanitvā.
atk-s0402a0:785_1: Yatoti yasmiṃ kāle. Virajanti rāgarajādirahitaṃ. Tesaṃyeva malānaṃ vigatattā vītamalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:785_2: Dhammacakkhunti catusaccadhammapariggāhakaṃ sotāpattimaggacakkhuṃ. Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti
atk-s0402a0:785_3: duvidhamevassa saṃyojanaṃ natthi, itarampi pana puna imaṃ lokaṃ ānetuṃ asamatthatāya
atk-s0402a0:785_4: natthīti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte jhānānāgāmī nāma kathitoti.
atk-s0402a0:787_0: 96. Catutthe na bāhulikā hontīti paccayabāhullikā na honti. Na sāthalikāti tisso
atk-s0402a0:787_1: sikkhā sithilaṃ katvā na gaṇhanti. Okkamane nikkhittadhurāti okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:787_2: pañca nīvaraṇāni, tesu nikkhittadhurā. Paviveke pubbaṅgamāti kāyacittaupadhivivekasaṅkhāte
atk-s0402a0:787_3: tividhepi viveke pubbaṅgamā. Vīriyaṃ ārabhantīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanti.
atk-s0402a0:787_5: eseva nayo. Pacchimā janatāti saddhivihārikaantevāsikādayo. Diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatīti
atk-s0402a0:787_6: ācariyupajjhāyehi kataṃ anukaroti. Yaṃ tāya janatāya ācariyupajjhāyesu diṭṭhaṃ, tassa
atk-s0402a0:787_7: anugatiṃ āpajjati nāma. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, aggavatī parisāti, bhikkhave, ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:788_0: Bhaṇḍanajātāti jātabhaṇḍanā. Kalahajātāti jātakalahā. Bhaṇḍananti cettha kalahassa
atk-s0402a0:788_1: pubbabhāgo, hatthaparāmāsādivasena vītikkamo kalaho nāma. Vivādāpannāti viruddhavādaṃ
atk-s0402a0:788_2: āpannā. Mukhasattīhīti guṇavijjhanaṭṭhena pharusā vācā “mukhasattiyo”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0402a0:788_3: tāhi mukhasattīhi. Vitudantā viharantīti vijjhantā vicaranti.
atk-s0402a0:789_0: Samaggāti sahitā. Sammodamānāti samappavattamodā. Khīrodakībhūtāti khīrodakaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:789_1: bhūtā. Piyacakkhūhīti upasantehi mettacakkhūhi. Pīti jāyatīti pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:789_2: Kāyo passambhatīti nāmakāyopi rūpakāyopi vigatadaratho hoti. Passaddhakāyoti asāraddhakāyo.
atk-s0402a0:789_3: Sukhaṃ vediyatīti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ vediyati. Samādhiyatīti ārammaṇe sammā ṭhapīyati.
atk-s0402a0:790_0: Thullaphusitaketi mahāphusitake. Pabbatakandarapadarasākhāti ettha kandaro nāma “ka”nti
atk-s0402a0:790_1: laddhanāmena udakena dārito udakabhinno pabbatappadeso, yo “nitambho”tipi “nadikuñjo”tipi
atk-s0402a0:790_2: vuccati. Padaraṃ nāma aṭṭha māse deve avassante phalito bhūmippadeso. Sākhāti kusobbhagāminiyo
atk-s0402a0:790_3: khuddakamātikāyo. Kusobbhāti khuddakaāvāṭā. Mahāsobbhāti mahāāvāṭā. Kunnadiyoti khuddakanadiyo.
atk-s0402a0:792_0: 97-99. Pañcame aṅgehīti guṇaṅgehi. Rājārahoti rañño araho anucchaviko. Rājabhoggoti
atk-s0402a0:792_1: rañño upabhogabhūto. Rañño aṅganti rañño hatthapādādiaṅgasamatāya aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:792_2: gacchati. Vaṇṇasampannoti sarīravaṇṇena sampanno. Balasampannoti kāyabalena sampanno.
atk-s0402a0:792_3: Āhuneyyoti āhutisaṅkhātaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto. Pāhuneyyoti pāhunakabhattassa
atk-s0402a0:792_5: dakkhiṇāya anucchaviko. Añjalikaraṇīyoti añjalipaggahaṇassa anucchaviko. Anuttaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:793_0: Vaṇṇasampannoti guṇavaṇṇena sampanno. Balasampannoti vīriyabalena sampanno. Javasampannoti
atk-s0402a0:793_1: ñāṇajavena sampanno. Thāmavāti ñāṇathāmena samannāgato. Daḷhaparakkamoti thiraparakkamo.
atk-s0402a0:793_2: Anikkhittadhuroti aṭṭhapitadhuro paggahitadhuro, aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ appatvā vīriyadhuraṃ
atk-s0402a0:793_3: na nikkhipissāmīti evaṃ paṭipanno. Imasmiṃ sutte catusaccavasena sotāpattimaggo,
atk-s0402a0:793_4: sotāpattimaggena ca ñāṇajavasampannatā kathitāti. Chaṭṭhe tīṇi ca maggāni tīṇi ca
atk-s0402a0:793_5: phalāni, tīhi maggaphalehi ca ñāṇajavasampannatā kathitā. Sattame arahattaphalaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:793_6: arahattaphaleneva ca maggakiccaṃ kathitaṃ. Phalaṃ pana javitajavena uppajjanato javoti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:795_0: 100. Aṭṭhame navoti karaṇaṃ upādāya vuccati. Potthakoti vākamayavatthaṃ. Majjhimoti
atk-s0402a0:795_2: dussīloti nissīlo. Dubbaṇṇatāyāti guṇavaṇṇābhāvena dubbaṇṇatāya. Diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantīti
atk-s0402a0:795_3: tena kataṃ anukaronti. Na mahapphalaṃ hotīti vipākaphalena mahapphalaṃ na hoti. Na
atk-s0402a0:795_4: mahānisaṃsanti vipākānisaṃseneva na mahānisaṃsaṃ. Appagghatāyāti vipākagghena appagghatāya.
atk-s0402a0:795_5: Kāsikaṃ vatthanti tīhi kappāsaaṃsūhi suttaṃ kantitvā katavatthaṃ, tañca kho kāsiraṭṭheyeva
atk-s0402a0:795_6: uṭṭhitaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Sīlaṃ panettha missakaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:797_0: 101. Navame yathā yathāyanti yathā yathā ayaṃ. Tathā tathā tanti tathā tathā taṃ
atk-s0402a0:797_1: kammaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo evaṃ vadeyya – “yathā yathā kammaṃ karoti, tathā tathāssa
atk-s0402a0:797_2: vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyateva. Na hi sakkā katassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0402a0:797_3: yattakaṃ kammaṃ karoti, tattakassa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyatevā”ti. Evaṃ santanti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:797_4: sante. Brahmacariyavāso na hotīti yaṃ maggabhāvanato pubbe upapajjavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:797_5: kataṃ, tassa avassaṃ paṭisaṃvedanīyattā brahmacariyaṃ vutthampi avutthameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:797_6: Okāso na paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti yasmā ca evaṃ sante tena kammāyūhanañceva
atk-s0402a0:797_7: vipākānubhavanā ca hoti, tasmā hetunā nayena vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya okāso na paññāyati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:798_0: Yathā yathā vedanīyanti yena yenākārena veditabbaṃ. Tathā tathāssa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyatīti
atk-s0402a0:798_1: tena tenākārena assa vipākaṃ paccanubhoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadetaṃ sattasu javanesu
atk-s0402a0:798_2: paṭhamajavanakammaṃ sati paccaye vipākavāraṃ labhantameva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:798_3: asati ahosikammaṃ nāma. Yañca sattamajavanakammaṃ sati paccaye upapajjavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:798_4: hoti, asati ahosikammaṃ nāma. Yañca majjhe pañcajavanakammaṃ yāva saṃsārappavatti,
atk-s0402a0:798_5: tāva aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ nāma hoti. Etesu ākāresu yena yenākārena veditabbaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:798_6: ayaṃ puriso karoti, tena tenevassa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyati nāma. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi
atk-s0402a0:798_7: laddhavipākavārameva kammaṃ yathāvedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:798_9: vāso nāma hoti, vutthaṃ suvutthameva hotīti attho. Okāso paññāyati sammā dukkhassa
atk-s0402a0:798_10: antakiriyāyāti yasmā evaṃ sante tena tena maggena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena
atk-s0402a0:798_11: tesu tesu bhavesu āyatiṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na uppajjati, tasmā okāso paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
atk-s0402a0:799_0: Idāni taṃ yathāvedanīyakammasabhāvaṃ dassento idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:799_1: Tattha appamattakanti parittaṃ thokaṃ mandaṃ lāmakaṃ. Tādisaṃyevāti taṃsarikkhakameva.
atk-s0402a0:799_2: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti tasmiṃ kammeyeva diṭṭhadhamme vipaccitabbaṃ vipākavāraṃ labhantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:799_3: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti. Nāṇupi khāyatīti dutiye attabhāve aṇupi na khāyati, aṇumattampi
atk-s0402a0:799_4: dutiye attabhāve vipākaṃ na detīti attho. Bahudevāti bahukaṃ pana vipākaṃ kimeva
atk-s0402a0:799_5: dassatīti adhippāyo. Abhāvitakāyotiādīhi kāyabhāvanārahito vaṭṭagāmī puthujjano dassito.
atk-s0402a0:799_6: Parittoti parittaguṇo. Appātumoti ātumā vuccati attabhāvo, tasmiṃ mahantepi guṇaparittatāya
atk-s0402a0:799_7: appātumoyeva. Appadukkhavihārīti appakenapi pāpena dukkhavihārī. Bhāvitakāyotiādīhi
atk-s0402a0:799_8: khīṇāsavo dassito. So hi kāyānupassanāsaṅkhātāya kāyabhāvanāya bhāvitakāyo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:799_9: Kāyassa vā vaḍḍhitattā bhāvitakāyo. Bhāvitasīloti vaḍḍhitasīlo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva
atk-s0402a0:799_10: nayo. Pañcadvārabhāvanāya vā bhāvitakāyo. Etena indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ, bhāvitasīloti
atk-s0402a0:799_11: iminā sesāni tīṇi sīlāni. Aparittoti na parittaguṇo. Mahattoti attabhāve parittepi
atk-s0402a0:799_12: guṇamahantatāya mahatto. Appamāṇavihārīti khīṇāsavassetaṃ nāmameva. So hi pamāṇakarānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:800_0: Paritteti khuddake. Udakamallaketi udakasarāve. Orabbhikoti urabbhasāmiko. Urabbhaghātakoti
atk-s0402a0:800_1: sūnakāro. Jāpetuṃ vāti dhanajāniyā jāpetuṃ. Jhāpetuntipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Yathāpaccayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:800_2: vā kātunti yathā icchati, tathā kātuṃ. Urabbhadhananti eḷakaagghanakamūlaṃ. So panassa
atk-s0402a0:800_3: sace icchati, deti. No ce icchati, gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nikkaḍḍhāpeti. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0402a0:800_4: veditabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:802_0: 102. Dasame dhovatīti vikkhāleti. Sandhovatīti suṭṭhu dhovati, punappunaṃ dhovati.
atk-s0402a0:802_1: Niddhovatīti niggaṇhitvā dhovati. Aniddhantakasāvanti anīhatadosaṃ anapanītakasāvaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:802_2: Pabhaṅgūti pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ, adhikaraṇīyaṃ ṭhapetvā muṭṭhikāya pahaṭamattaṃ bhijjati.
atk-s0402a0:803_0: Adhicittanti samathavipassanācittaṃ. Anuyuttassāti bhāventassa. Sacetasoti cittasampanno.
atk-s0402a0:803_1: Dabbajātikoti paṇḍitajātiko. Kāmavitakkādīsu kāme ārabbha uppanno vitakko kāmavitakko.
atk-s0402a0:803_3: ñātakā bahū puññavantā”tiādinā nayena ñātake ārabbha uppanno vitakko ñātivitakko.
atk-s0402a0:803_4: “Asuko janapado khemo subhikkho”tiādinā nayena janapadamārabbha uppanno vitakko janapadavitakko.
atk-s0402a0:803_5: “Aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyu”nti evaṃ uppanno vitakko anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0402a0:803_6: vitakko nāma. Dhammavitakkāvasissantīti dhammavitakkā nāma dasavipassanupakkilesavitakkā.
atk-s0402a0:803_7: So hoti samādhi na ceva santoti so avasiṭṭhadhammavitakko vipassanāsamādhi avūpasantakilesattā
atk-s0402a0:803_8: santo na hoti. Na paṇītoti na atappako. Nappaṭippassaddhiladdhoti na kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā
atk-s0402a0:803_9: laddho. Na ekodibhāvādhigatoti na ekaggabhāvappatto. Sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagatoti
atk-s0402a0:803_10: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā vārito, na kilesānaṃ chinnante
atk-s0402a0:804_0: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayoti ettha samayo nāma utusappāyaṃ āhārasappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:804_1: puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ sappāyānaṃ paṭilābhakālo.
atk-s0402a0:804_2: Yaṃ taṃ cittanti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanācittaṃ. Ajjhattaṃyeva santiṭṭhatīti attaniyeva
atk-s0402a0:804_3: tiṭṭhati. Niyakajjhattañhi idha ajjhattaṃ nāma. Gocarajjhattampi vaṭṭati. Puthuttārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:804_4: pahāya ekasmiṃ nibbānagocareyeva tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sannisīdatīti suṭṭhu nisīdati.
atk-s0402a0:804_5: Ekodi hotīti ekaggaṃ hoti. Samādhiyatīti sammā ādhiyati. Santotiādīsu paccanīkakilesavūpasamena
atk-s0402a0:804_6: santo. Atappakaṭṭhena paṇīto. Kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā paṭippassaddhaladdho.
atk-s0402a0:804_7: Ekaggabhāvaṃ gatattā ekodibhāvādhigato. Kilesānaṃ chinnante uppannattā na sappayogena
atk-s0402a0:804_8: kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā vāritoti na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato. Ettāvatā ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:804_9: bhikkhu vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:805_0: Idāni khīṇāsavassa sato abhiññāpaṭipadaṃ dassento yassa yassa cātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:805_1: abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassāti abhijānitvā paccakkhaṃ kātabbassa. Sati satiāyataneti
atk-s0402a0:805_2: pubbahetusaṅkhāte ceva idāni ca paṭiladdhabbe abhiññāpādakajjhānādibhede ca sati
atk-s0402a0:805_3: satikāraṇe. Vitthārato pana ayaṃ abhiññākathā visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:805_4: Āsavānaṃ khayātiādi cettha phalasamāpattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:807_0: 103. Ekādasamepi adhicittaṃ samathavipassanācittameva. Tīṇi nimittānīti tīṇi kāraṇāni.
atk-s0402a0:807_1: Kālena kālanti kāle kāle, yuttakāleti attho. Kālena kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasikātabbantiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:807_2: taṃ taṃ kālaṃ sallakkhetvā ekaggatāya yuttakāle ekaggatā manasikātabbā. Ekaggatā
atk-s0402a0:807_3: hi idha samādhinimittanti vuttā. Tatra vacanattho – samādhiyeva nimittaṃ samādhinimittaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:807_4: Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Paggahoti pana vīriyassa nāmaṃ, upekkhāti majjhattabhāvassa.
atk-s0402a0:807_5: Tasmā vīriyassa yuttakāle vīriyaṃ manasikātabbaṃ, majjhattabhāvassa yuttakāle majjhattabhāve
atk-s0402a0:807_6: ṭhātabbanti. Ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyyāti kāraṇaṃ vijjati yena taṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:807_7: kosajjabhāve tiṭṭheyya. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Upekkhānimittaṃyeva manasi kareyyāti
atk-s0402a0:807_8: ettha ca ñāṇajavaṃ upekkheyyāti ayamattho. Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti arahattaphalatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:808_0: Ukkaṃ bandheyyāti aṅgārakapallaṃ sajjeyya. Ālimpeyyāti tattha aṅgāre pakkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:808_1: aggiṃ datvā nāḷikāya dhamanto aggiṃ gāhāpeyya. Ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyāti aṅgāre viyūhitvā
atk-s0402a0:808_2: aṅgāramatthake vā ṭhapeyya, mūsāya vā pakkhipeyya. Ajjhupekkhatīti pakkāpakkabhāvaṃ upadhāreti.
atk-s0402a0:809_0: Sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāyāti arahattaphalatthāya sammā ṭhapīyati. Ettāvatā
atk-s0402a0:809_1: hi vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappatto bhikkhu dassito. Idāni tassa khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0402a0:809_2: abhiññāya paṭipadaṃ dassento yassa yassa cātiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:811_0: 104. Tatiyassa paṭhame pubbeva sambodhāti sambodhito pubbeva, ariyamaggappattito
atk-s0402a0:811_1: aparabhāgeyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Anabhisambuddhassāti appaṭividdhacatusaccassa. Bodhisattasseva
atk-s0402a0:811_2: satoti bujjhanakasattasseva sato, sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ ārabhantasseva sato,
atk-s0402a0:811_3: sambodhiyā vā sattasseva laggasseva sato. Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena
atk-s0402a0:811_4: abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato sammāsambodhiṃ satto laggo “pattabbā mayā
atk-s0402a0:811_5: esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṃ amuñcantoyeva āgato, tasmā bodhisattoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:811_6: Ko nu khoti katamo nu kho. Lokoti saṅkhāraloko. Assādoti madhurākāro. Ādīnavoti anabhinanditabbākāro.
atk-s0402a0:811_7: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṃ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṃ. Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti
atk-s0402a0:811_8: nibbānaṃ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca chandarāgo vinayaṃ gacchati pahīyati, tasmā nibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:811_9: “chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna”nti vuccati. Idaṃ lokanissaraṇanti idaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:811_10: lokato nissaṭattā lokanissaraṇanti vuccati. Yāvakīvanti yattakaṃ pamāṇaṃ kālaṃ. Abbhaññāsinti
atk-s0402a0:811_11: abhivisiṭṭhena ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṃ. Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti dvīhipi padehi
atk-s0402a0:813_0: 105. Dutiye assādapariyesanaṃ acarinti assādapariyesanatthāya acariṃ. Kuto paṭṭhāyāti?
atk-s0402a0:813_1: Sumedhakālato paṭṭhāya. Paññāyāti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya. Sudiṭṭhoti suppaṭividdho.
atk-s0402a0:813_2: Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Tatiyaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:815_0: 107. Catutthe sāmaññatthanti catubbidhaṃ ariyaphalaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sāmaññatthena
atk-s0402a0:815_1: vā cattāro maggā, brahmaññatthena cattāri phalāni. Imesu pana catūsupi suttesu khandhalokova kathito.
atk-s0402a0:817_0: 108. Pañcamaṃ atthuppattiyā nikkhittaṃ. Katarāya atthuppattiyā? Chabbaggiyānaṃ anācāre.
atk-s0402a0:817_1: Te kira gāyantā naccantā hasantā vicariṃsu. Bhikkhū dasabalassa ārocayiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0402a0:817_2: te pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ ovādatthāya idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi. Tattha ruṇṇanti roditaṃ. Ummattakanti
atk-s0402a0:817_3: ummattakakiriyā. Komārakanti kumārakehi kattabbakiccaṃ. Dantavidaṃsakahasitanti dante
atk-s0402a0:817_4: dassetvā pāṇiṃ paharantānaṃ mahāsaddena hasitaṃ. Setughāto gīteti gīte vo paccayaghāto
atk-s0402a0:817_5: hotu, sahetukaṃ gītaṃ pajahathāti dīpeti. Naccepi eseva nayo. Alanti yuttaṃ. Dhammappamoditānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:817_6: satanti ettha dhammo vuccati kāraṇaṃ, kenacideva kāraṇena pamuditānaṃ santānaṃ. Sitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:817_7: sitamattāyāti tasmiṃ sitakāraṇe sati yaṃ sitaṃ karotha, taṃ vo sitamattāya aggadante
atk-s0402a0:819_0: 109. Chaṭṭhe soppassāti niddāya. Paṭisevanāya natthi tittīti yathā yathā paṭisevati,
atk-s0402a0:819_1: tathā tathā ruccatiyevāti titti nāma natthi. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Sace hi
atk-s0402a0:819_2: mahāsamudde udakaṃ surā bhaveyya, surāsoṇḍo ca maccho hutvā nibbatteyya, tassa tattha
atk-s0402a0:819_3: carantassapi sayantassapi titti nāma na bhaveyya. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:821_0: 110. Sattame avassutaṃ hotīti tintaṃ hoti. Na bhaddakaṃ maraṇaṃ hotīti apāye paṭisandhipaccayatāya
atk-s0402a0:821_1: na laddhakaṃ hoti. Kālakiriyāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sukkapakkhe sagge paṭisandhipaccayatāya
atk-s0402a0:821_2: bhaddakaṃ hoti laddhakaṃ. Taṃ pana ekantena sotāpannādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:823: 111. Aṭṭhame byāpannanti pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasutte vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:825_0: 112. Navame nidānānīti kāraṇāni. Kammānaṃ samudayāyāti vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ piṇḍakaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:825_1: Lobhapakatanti lobhena pakataṃ. Sāvajjanti sadosaṃ. Taṃ kammaṃ kammasamudayāya saṃvattatīti
atk-s0402a0:825_2: taṃ kammaṃ aññesampi vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya saṃvattati. Na
atk-s0402a0:825_3: taṃ kammaṃ kammanirodhāyāti taṃ pana kammaṃ vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ nirodhatthāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0402a0:825_4: Sukkapakkhe kammānaṃ samudayāyāti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayatthāya. Iminā nayena
atk-s0402a0:827_0: 113. Dasame kammānanti vaṭṭagāmikammānameva. Chandarāgaṭṭhāniyeti chandarāgassa kāraṇabhūte.
atk-s0402a0:827_1: Ārabbhāti āgamma sandhāya paṭicca. Chandoti taṇhāchando. Yo cetaso sārāgoti yo cittassa
atk-s0402a0:827_2: rāgo rajjanā rajjitattaṃ, etamahaṃ saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi, bandhanaṃ vadāmīti attho. Sukkapakkhe
atk-s0402a0:827_3: kammānanti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ. Tadabhinivattetīti taṃ abhinivatteti. Yadā vā tena
atk-s0402a0:827_4: vipāko ñāto hoti vidito, tadā te ceva dhamme tañca vipākaṃ abhinivatteti. Iminā ca
atk-s0402a0:827_5: padena vipassanā kathitā, tadabhinivattetvāti iminā maggo. Cetasā abhinivijjhitvāti
atk-s0402a0:827_6: iminā ca maggova. Paññāya ativijjha passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya nibbijjhitvā
atk-s0402a0:827_7: passati. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pana sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:829_0: 114. Dutiyassa paṭhame apāyaṃ gacchissantīti āpāyikā. Nirayaṃ gacchissantīti nerayikā.
atk-s0402a0:829_1: Idamappahāyāti idaṃ brahmacāripaṭiññatādiṃ pāpadhammattayaṃ avijahitvā. Brahmacāripaṭiññoti
atk-s0402a0:829_2: brahmacāripaṭirūpako, tesaṃ vā ākappaṃ avijahanena “ahampi brahmacārī”ti evaṃpaṭiñño.
atk-s0402a0:829_3: Anuddhaṃsetīti akkosati paribhāsati codeti. Natthi kāmesu dosoti kilesakāmena vatthukāme
atk-s0402a0:829_4: sevantassa natthi doso. Pātabyatanti pivitabbataṃ paribhuñjitabbataṃ nirāsaṅkena
atk-s0402a0:829_5: cittena pipāsitassa pānīyapivanasadisaṃ paribhuñjitabbataṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:831: 115. Dutiye kataññū katavedīti “iminā mayhaṃ kata”nti tena katakammaṃ ñatvā viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā paṭikaraṇakapuggalo.
atk-s0402a0:833_0: 116. Tatiye sukhena metabboti suppameyyo. Dukkhena metabboti duppameyyo. Pametuṃ
atk-s0402a0:833_1: na sakkotīti appameyyo. Unnaḷoti uggatanaḷo, tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:833_2: Capaloti pattamaṇḍanādinā cāpallena samannāgato. Mukharoti mukhakharo. Vikiṇṇavācoti
atk-s0402a0:833_3: asaññatavacano. Asamāhitoti cittekaggatārahito. Vibbhantacittoti bhantacitto bhantagāvibhantamigasappaṭibhāgo.
atk-s0402a0:835_0: 117. Catutthe tadassādetīti taṃ jhānaṃ assādeti. Taṃ nikāmetīti tadeva pattheti.
atk-s0402a0:835_1: Tena ca vittiṃ āpajjatīti tena jhānena tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjati. Tatra ṭhitoti tasmiṃ jhāne
atk-s0402a0:835_2: ṭhito. Tadadhimuttoti tattheva adhimutto. Tabbahulavihārīti tena bahulaṃ viharanto.
atk-s0402a0:835_3: Sahabyataṃ upapajjatīti sahabhāvaṃ upapajjati, tasmiṃ devaloke nibbattatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:835_4: Nirayampi gacchatītiādi nirayādīhi avippamuttattā aparapariyāyavasena tattha gamanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:835_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃ akusalaṃ atthi, yena anantaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:835_6: apāye nibbatteyya. Bhagavato pana sāvakoti sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0402a0:835_7: Tasmiṃyeva bhaveti tattheva arūpabhave. Parinibbāyatīti appaccayaparinibbānena parinibbāyati.
atk-s0402a0:835_8: Adhippayāsoti adhikappayogo. Sesamettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte
atk-s0402a0:835_9: puthujjanassa upapattijjhānaṃ kathitaṃ, ariyasāvakassa tadeva upapattijjhānañca vipassanāpādakajjhānañca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:837_0: 118. Pañcame sīlavipattīti sīlassa vipannākāro. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Natthi dinnanti
atk-s0402a0:837_1: dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yiṭṭhaṃ vuccati mahāyogo. Hutanti paheṇakasakkāro
atk-s0402a0:837_2: adhippeto. Tampi ubhayaṃ phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sukatadukkaṭānanti
atk-s0402a0:837_3: sukatadukkatānaṃ, kusalākusalānanti attho. Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti
atk-s0402a0:837_4: vā vuccati, taṃ natthīti vadati. Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi,
atk-s0402a0:837_5: natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassāpi paraloko natthi, sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantīti
atk-s0402a0:837_6: dasseti. Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena
atk-s0402a0:837_7: vadati. Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadati. Sampadāti
atk-s0402a0:837_8: pāripūriyo. Sīlasampadāti sīlassa paripuṇṇaavekallabhāvo. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:839_0: 119. Chaṭṭhe apaṇṇako maṇīti chahi talehi samannāgato pāsako. Sugatiṃ sagganti cātumahārājikādīsu
atk-s0402a0:839_1: aññataraṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte sīlañca sammādiṭṭhi cāti ubhayampi missakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:841_0: 121. Aṭṭhame soceyyānīti sucibhāvā. Kāyasoceyyanti kāyadvāre sucibhāvo. Sesadvayepi
atk-s0402a0:841_1: eseva nayo. Imesu pana paṭipāṭiyā catūsu suttesu agārikapaṭipadā kathitā. Sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:843_0: 122. Navame ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ. Kāmacchandanti kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. Byāpādādīsupi
atk-s0402a0:843_1: eseva nayo. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Gāthāya pana kāyasucinti kāyadvāre suciṃ,
atk-s0402a0:843_2: kāyena vā suciṃ. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Ninhātapāpakanti sabbe pāpe ninhāpetvā dhovitvā
atk-s0402a0:843_3: ṭhitaṃ. Iminā suttenapi gāthāyapi khīṇāsavova kathitoti.
atk-s0402a0:845_0: 123. Dasame moneyyānīti munibhāvā. Kāyamoneyyanti kāyadvāre munibhāvo sādhubhāvo
atk-s0402a0:845_1: paṇḍitabhāvo. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kāyamoneyyanti idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:845_2: tividhakāyaduccaritappahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ nāma. Apica tividhaṃ kāyasucaritampi kāyamoneyyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:845_3: tathā kāyārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato
atk-s0402a0:845_4: maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāye chandarāgassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāranirodho
atk-s0402a0:846_0: Ayaṃ panettha viseso – yathā idha catutthajjhānasamāpatti, evaṃ tattha vacīsaṅkhāranirodho
atk-s0402a0:846_1: dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyanti veditabbā. Manomoneyyampi imināva nayena atthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:846_3: Kāyamuninti kāyadvāre muniṃ uttamaṃ parisuddhaṃ, kāyena vā muniṃ. Sesadvayepi eseva
atk-s0402a0:846_4: nayo. Sabbappahāyinanti khīṇāsavaṃ. Khīṇāsavo hi sabbappahāyī nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:848_0: 124. Tatiyassa paṭhame kusinārāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍeti evaṃnāmake
atk-s0402a0:848_1: vanasaṇḍe. Tattha kira bhūtabalikaraṇatthaṃ baliṃ haranti, tasmā baliharaṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:848_2: Ākaṅkhamānoti icchamāno. Sahatthāti sahatthena. Sampavāretīti alaṃ alanti vācāya
atk-s0402a0:848_3: ceva hatthavikārena ca paṭikkhipāpeti. Sādhu vata māyanti sādhu vata maṃ ayaṃ. Gathitoti
atk-s0402a0:848_4: taṇhāgedhena gathito. Mucchitoti taṇhāmucchanāyayeva mucchito. Ajjhopannoti taṇhāya
atk-s0402a0:848_5: gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā pavatto. Anissaraṇapaññoti chandarāgaṃ pahāya saṃkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0402a0:848_6: paribhuñjanto nissaraṇapañño nāma hoti, ayaṃ na tādiso, sacchandarāgo paribhuñjatīti
atk-s0402a0:848_7: anissaraṇapañño. Sukkapakkho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Nekkhammavitakkādayo panettha
atk-s0402a0:850: 125. Dutiye pajahiṃsūti pajahanti. Bahulamakaṃsūti punappunaṃ karonti. Idhāpi tayo vitakkā missakāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:852_0: 126. Tatiye gotamake cetiyeti gotamakayakkhassa bhavane. Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:852_1: vīsati vassāni kadāci cāpāle cetiye, kadāci sārandade, kadāci bahuputte, kadāci gotamaketi
atk-s0402a0:852_2: evaṃ yebhuyyena devakulesuyeva vihāsi. Imasmiṃ pana kāle vesāliṃ upanissāya gotamakassa
atk-s0402a0:852_3: yakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “gotamake cetiye”ti. Etadavocāti etaṃ
atk-s0402a0:853_0: Idañca bhagavatā suttaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Kataraatthuppattiyanti?
atk-s0402a0:853_1: Mūlapariyāyaatthuppattiyaṃ. Sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā attanā uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:853_2: nissāya jānanamadaṃ uppādetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ na gacchanti – “sammāsambuddho kathento
atk-s0402a0:853_3: amhehi ñātameva kathessati, no aññāta”nti. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Satthā
atk-s0402a0:853_4: te bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mukhapaṭiññaṃ gahetvā mūlapariyāyaṃ desesi. Te bhikkhū desanāya
atk-s0402a0:853_5: neva āgataṭṭhānaṃ, na gataṭṭhānaṃ addasaṃsu. Apassantā “sammāsambuddho ‘mayhaṃ kathā
atk-s0402a0:853_6: niyyātī’ti mukhasampattameva kathetī”ti cintayiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ manaṃ jānitvā imaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:854_0: Tattha abhiññāyāti “ime pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, bāvīsatindriyāni,
atk-s0402a0:854_1: cattāri saccāni, nava hetū, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta cetanā, satta saññā,
atk-s0402a0:854_2: satta cittānī”ti jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā, tathā – “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā
atk-s0402a0:854_3: nayena te te dhamme jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhameva katvāti attho. Sanidānanti
atk-s0402a0:854_4: sappaccayameva katvā kathemi, no appaccayaṃ. Sappāṭihāriyanti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena
atk-s0402a0:854_5: sappāṭihāriyameva katvā kathemi, no appāṭihāriyaṃ. Alañca pana voti yuttañca pana
atk-s0402a0:854_6: tumhākaṃ. Tuṭṭhiyāti “sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti
atk-s0402a0:854_7: tīṇi ratanāni guṇato anussarantānaṃ tumhākaṃ yuttameva tuṭṭhiṃ kātunti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:855_0: Akampitthāti chahi ākārehi akampittha. Evarūpo hi pathavikampo bodhimaṇḍepi ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:855_1: Bodhisatte kira dakkhiṇadisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṃ abhiruḷhe dakkhiṇadisābhāgo heṭṭhā
atk-s0402a0:855_2: avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, uttarabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. Pacchimadisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:855_3: gate pacchimabhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, pācīnabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:855_4: abhihananto viya. Uttaradisaṃ gate uttaradisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a0:855_5: dakkhiṇadisābhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. Pācīnadisaṃ gate pācīnadisābhāgo
atk-s0402a0:855_6: heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya, pacchimabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya.
atk-s0402a0:855_7: Bodhirukkhopi sakiṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya, sakiṃ uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto
atk-s0402a0:855_8: viya. Tasmimpi divase evaṃ chahi ākārehi cakkavāḷasahassī mahāpathavī akampittha.
atk-s0402a0:857_0: 127. Catutthe kevalakappanti sakalakappaṃ. Anvāhiṇḍantoti vicaranto. Nāddasāti kiṃ
atk-s0402a0:857_1: kāraṇā na addasa? Ayaṃ kira bharaṇḍu kālāmo sakyānaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0402a0:857_2: Tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampattakāle ekā dhammadesanā samuṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:857_3: evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, yathā añño āvasatho na paññāyittha. Tasmā na addasa. Purāṇasabrahmacārīti
atk-s0402a0:857_4: porāṇako sabrahmacārī. So kira āḷārakālāmakāle tasmiṃyeva assame ahosi, taṃ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0402a0:857_5: Santharaṃ paññāpehīti santharitabbaṃ santharāhīti attho. Santharaṃ paññāpetvāti kappiyamañcake
atk-s0402a0:857_6: paccattharaṇaṃ paññāpetvā. Kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpetīti ettha pariññā nāma samatikkamo,
atk-s0402a0:857_7: tasmā kāmānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ paññāpeti. Na rūpānaṃ pariññanti rūpānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:857_8: samatikkamabhūtaṃ arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ na paññāpeti. Na vedanānaṃ pariññanti vedanānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:857_9: samatikkamaṃ nibbānaṃ na paññāpeti. Niṭṭhāti gati nipphatti. Udāhu puthūti udāhu nānā.
atk-s0402a0:859_0: 128. Pañcame abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu
atk-s0402a0:859_1: dissati. Tattha “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho,
atk-s0402a0:859_2: uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:859_3: imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0402a0:860: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0402a0:862_0: Evamādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā”ti evamādīsu abbhanumodane. Idha pana
atk-s0402a0:862_1: sundare. Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:862_2: Abhikkantavaṇṇāti idha abhikkantasaddo abhirūpe, vaṇṇasaddo pana chavithutikulavaggakāraṇasaṇṭhānapamāṇarūpāyatanādīsu
atk-s0402a0:862_3: dissati. Tattha “suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā”ti evamādīsu chaviyaṃ. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana
atk-s0402a0:862_4: te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ. “Cattārome, bho gotama,
atk-s0402a0:862_5: vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu kulavagge. “Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0402a0:862_6: kāraṇe. “Mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”ti evamādīsu saṇṭhāne. “Tayo pattassa
atk-s0402a0:862_7: vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu pamāṇe. “Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā”ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane. So idha
atk-s0402a0:862_8: chaviyā daṭṭhabbo. Tena abhikkantavaṇṇāti abhirūpacchavi, iṭṭhavaṇṇā manāpavaṇṇāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:863_1: Tathā hissa “kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya”nti evamādīsu anavasesatā
atk-s0402a0:863_2: attho. “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti
atk-s0402a0:863_3: evamādīsu yebhuyyatā. “Kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti evamādīsu abyāmissatā.
atk-s0402a0:863_4: “Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ nūna ayamāyasmā”ti evamādīsu anatirekatā. “Āyasmato, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:863_5: anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0402a0:863_6: daḷhatthatā. “Kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu visaṃyogo. Idha
atk-s0402a0:864_1: Tathā hissa “okappaniyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
atk-s0402a0:864_2: evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:864_3: paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0402a0:864_4: kālo. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti evamādīsu paññatti. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0402a0:864_5: chedanaṃ. “Kappati dvaṅgulakappo”ti evamādīsu vikappo. “Atthi kappo nipajjitu”nti
atk-s0402a0:864_6: evamādīsu leso. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā”ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo. Idha
atk-s0402a0:864_7: panassa samantabhāvo attho adhippeto. Tasmā kevalakappaṃ jetavananti ettha anavasesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:865_0: Obhāsetvāti ābhāya pharitvā. Vālukāyāti saṇhāya vālukāya. Na saṇṭhātīti na patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a0:865_1: Oḷārikanti brahmadevatāya hi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhānakāle attabhāvo oḷāriko māpetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:865_2: vaṭṭati pathavī vā, tasmā evamāha. Dhammāti iminā pubbe uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:865_3: Nappavattino ahesunti sajjhāyamūḷhakā vācā parihīnāyeva ahesuṃ. Appaṭivānoti anivatto anukkaṇṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:866_0: Dassanassāti cakkhuviññāṇena dassanassa. Upaṭṭhānassāti catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhānassa.
atk-s0402a0:866_1: Adhisīlanti dasavidhaṃ sīlaṃ. Tañhi pañcasīlaṃ upādāya adhisīlanti vuccati. Avihaṃ
atk-s0402a0:868_0: 129. Chaṭṭhe goyogapilakkhasminti gāvīnaṃ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike.
atk-s0402a0:868_1: Rittassādanti jhānasukhābhāvena rittassādaṃ. Bāhirassādanti kāmaguṇasukhavasena bāhirassādaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:868_2: Kaṭuviyanti ucchiṭṭhaṃ. Āmagandhenāti kodhasaṅkhātena vissagandhena. Avassutanti
atk-s0402a0:868_3: tintaṃ. Makkhikāti kilesamakkhikā. Nānupatissantīti uṭṭhāya na anubandhissanti. Nānvāssavissantīti
atk-s0402a0:868_4: anubandhitvā na khādissanti. Saṃvegamāpādīti sotāpanno jāto.
atk-s0402a0:869_0: Kaṭuviyakatoti ucchiṭṭhakato. Ārakā hotīti dūre hoti. Vighātasseva bhāgavāti dukkhasseva
atk-s0402a0:869_1: bhāgī. Caretīti carati gacchati. Dummedhoti duppañño. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:869_2: gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti. Sattame vaṭṭameva bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:871_0: 131. Aṭṭhame idaṃ te mānasminti ayaṃ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamānoti attho. Idaṃ te
atk-s0402a0:871_1: uddhaccasminti idaṃ tava uddhaccaṃ cittassa uddhatabhāvo. Idaṃ te kukkuccasminti
atk-s0402a0:873_0: 132. Navame āvahantīti niyyanti. Paṭicchanno āvahatīti paṭicchannova hutvā niyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:873_1: Vivaṭo virocatīti ettha ekato ubhato attato sabbatthakatoti catubbidhā vivaṭatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:873_2: Tattha ekato vivaṭaṃ nāma asādhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ. Ubhato vivaṭaṃ nāma sādhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:873_3: Attato vivaṭaṃ nāma paṭiladdhadhammaguṇo. Sabbatthakavivaṭaṃ nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:875_0: 133. Dasame abhiṇhanti abhikkhaṇaṃ nirantaraṃ. Āgāḷhenāti gāḷhena kakkhaḷena. Pharusenāti
atk-s0402a0:875_1: pharusavacanena. Gāḷhaṃ katvā pharusaṃ katvā vuccamānopīti attho. Amanāpenāti manaṃ
atk-s0402a0:875_2: anallīyantena avaḍḍhantena. Sandhiyatimevāti ghaṭiyatiyeva. Saṃsandatimevāti nirantarova
atk-s0402a0:875_3: hoti. Sammodatimevāti ekībhāvameva gacchati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:877_0: 134. Catutthassa paṭhame yuddhaṃ upajīvatīti yodhājīvo. Rājārahoti rañño anucchaviko.
atk-s0402a0:877_1: Rājabhoggoti rañño upabhogaparibhogo. Aṅganteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti hattho viya pādo
atk-s0402a0:877_2: viya ca avassaṃ icchitabbattā aṅganti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Dūre pātī hotīti udake usabhamattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:877_3: thale aṭṭhusabhamattaṃ, tato vā uttarinti dūre kaṇḍaṃ pāteti. Duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayassa
atk-s0402a0:877_4: hi yodhājīvo navausabhamattaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pātesi, pacchimabhave bodhisatto yojanappamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:877_5: Akkhaṇavedhīti avirādhitavedhī, akkhaṇaṃ vā vijju vijjantarikāya vijjhituṃ samatthoti
atk-s0402a0:877_6: attho. Mahato kāyassa padāletāti ekatobaddhaṃ phalakasatampi mahiṃsacammasatampi
atk-s0402a0:877_8: udumbarapadarampi dīghantena vālikasakaṭampi vinivijjhituṃ samatthoti attho. Yaṃkiñci
atk-s0402a0:877_9: rūpantiādi visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. Netaṃ mamātiādi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipaṭikkhepavasena
atk-s0402a0:877_10: vuttaṃ. Sammappaññāya passatīti sammā hetunā kāraṇena sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya
atk-s0402a0:879_0: 135. Dutiye ukkācitavinītāti appaṭipucchitvā vinītā dubbinītaparisā. Paṭipucchāvinītāti
atk-s0402a0:879_1: pucchitvā vinītā suvinītaparisā. Yāvatāvinītāti pamāṇavasena vinītā, pamāṇaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0402a0:879_2: vinītaparisāti attho. “Yāvatajjhā”ti pāḷiyā pana yāva ajjhāsayāti attho, ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:879_3: ñatvā vinītaparisāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatiyaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:881_1: Sabbe saṅkhārāti catubhūmakasaṅkhārā. Aniccāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā. Dukkhāti
atk-s0402a0:881_2: sampaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā. Anattāti avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā. Iti imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0402a0:883_0: 138. Pañcame tantāvutānaṃ vatthānanti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ, tantehi vāyitavatthānīti
atk-s0402a0:883_1: attho. Kesakambaloti manussakesehi vāyitakambalo. Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇavādānanti idampi
atk-s0402a0:883_2: paccatte sāmivacanaṃ. Paṭikiṭṭhoti pacchimako lāmako. Moghapurisoti tucchapuriso.
atk-s0402a0:883_3: Paṭibāhatīti paṭisedheti. Khippaṃ uḍḍeyyāti kuminaṃ oḍḍeyya. Chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:885_0: 141. Aṭṭhame assakhaḷuṅkoti assapoto. Idamassa javasmiṃ vadāmīti ayamassa ñāṇajavoti
atk-s0402a0:885_1: vadāmi. Idamassa vaṇṇasmiṃ vadāmīti ayamassa guṇavaṇṇoti vadāmi. Idamassa ārohapariṇāhasminti
atk-s0402a0:887_0: 142. Navame assaparasseti assesu parasse. Purisaparasseti purisesu parasse, purisapuriseti
atk-s0402a0:887_1: attho. Imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi maggaphalāni kathitāni. Tattha ayaṃ tīhi maggehi ñāṇajavasampannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:889_0: 143. Dasame bhadreti bhaddake. Assājānīyeti kāraṇākāraṇaṃ jānanake asse. Purisājānīyesupi
atk-s0402a0:889_1: eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ sutte arahattaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ arahattamaggena ñāṇajavasampannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:891: 144. Ekādasame accantaniṭṭhoti antaṃ atikkantaniṭṭho, akuppaniṭṭho dhuvaniṭṭhoti attho. Sesaṃ sadisameva.
atk-s0402a0:893: 145. Dvādasame iddhipāṭihāriyenāti ijjhanakapāṭihāriyena. Ādesanāpāṭihāriyenāti ādisitvā apadisitvā kathanaanukathanakathāpāṭihāriyena.
atk-s0402a0:895_0: 146. Terasame sammādiṭṭhiyāti phalasamāpattatthāya sammādiṭṭhiyā. Sammāñāṇenāti phalañāṇena.
atk-s0402a0:895_1: Sammāvimuttiyāti sesehi phalasamāpattidhammehi. Imesu tīsupi suttesu khīṇāsavova kathitoti.
atk-s0402a0:897_0: 147-155. Pañcamassa paṭhame yathābhataṃ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā ṭhapito. Dutiye
atk-s0402a0:897_1: sāvajjenāti sadosena. Tatiye visamenāti sapakkhalanena. Samenāti apakkhalanena. Catutthe
atk-s0402a0:897_2: asucināti gūthasadisena aparisuddhena amejjhena. Sucināti parisuddhena mejjhena.
atk-s0402a0:899_0: 156. Dasame sunakkhattantiādīsu yasmiṃ divase tayo sucaritadhammā pūritā honti, so
atk-s0402a0:899_1: divaso laddhanakkhattayogo nāma, tenassa sadā sunakkhattaṃ nāma hotīti vuccati. Sveva
atk-s0402a0:899_2: divaso katamaṅgalo nāma hoti, tenassa sadā sumaṅgalanti vuccati. Pabhātampissa sadā
atk-s0402a0:899_3: suppabhātameva, sayanato uṭṭhānampi suhuṭṭhitameva, khaṇopi sukkhaṇova, muhuttopi
atk-s0402a0:899_4: sumuhuttova. Ettha ca dasaccharapamāṇo kālo khaṇo nāma, tena khaṇena dasakkhaṇo kālo
atk-s0402a0:899_5: layo nāma, tena layena ca dasalayo kālo khaṇalayo nāma, tena dasaguṇo muhutto nāma,
atk-s0402a0:899_6: tena dasaguṇo khaṇamuhutto nāmāti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Suyiṭṭhaṃ brahmacārisūti
atk-s0402a0:899_7: yasmiṃ divase tīṇi sucaritāni pūritāni, tadāssa seṭṭhacārīsu dinnadānaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:899_8: nāma hoti. Padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammanti taṃ divasaṃ tena kataṃ kāyakammaṃ vaḍḍhikāyakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:899_9: nāma hoti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Padakkhiṇāni katvānāti vaḍḍhiyuttāni kāyakammādīni
atk-s0402a0:899_10: katvā. Labhantatthe padakkhiṇeti padakkhiṇe vaḍḍhiattheyeva labhati. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:901_0: 157-163. Ito paresu āgāḷhā paṭipadāti gāḷhā kakkhaḷā lobhavasena thiraggahaṇā. Nijjhāmāti
atk-s0402a0:901_1: attakilamathānuyogavasena suṭṭhu jhāmā santattā paritattā. Majjhimāti neva kakkhaḷā
atk-s0402a0:901_2: na jhāmā majjhe bhavā. Acelakoti niccelo naggo. Muttācāroti vissaṭṭhācāro, uccārakammādīsu
atk-s0402a0:901_3: lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti, passāvaṃ karoti, khādati
atk-s0402a0:901_4: bhuñjati. Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati,
atk-s0402a0:901_5: uccārampi katvā hatthasmiṃyeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalekhati. Bhikkhāya
atk-s0402a0:901_6: gahaṇatthaṃ “ehi, bhadante”ti vutto na etīti na ehibhadantiko. “Tena hi tiṭṭha, bhante”ti
atk-s0402a0:901_7: vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti na tiṭṭhabhadantiko. Tadubhayampi kira so “etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ
atk-s0402a0:901_8: bhavissatī”ti na karoti. Abhihaṭanti puretaraṃ gahetvā āhaṭabhikkhaṃ. Uddissakatanti
atk-s0402a0:901_9: idaṃ tumhe uddissa katanti evamārocitabhikkhaṃ. Nimantananti “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:901_10: vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:901_11: Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā dīyamānaṃ bhikkhampi na gaṇhāti. Na kaḷopimukhāti
atk-s0402a0:901_12: kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā, tatopi na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? “Kumbhikaḷopiyo maṃ nissāya
atk-s0402a0:901_13: kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantī”ti. Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā dīyamānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:901_14: na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? “Ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatī”ti. Daṇḍamusalesupi eseva
atk-s0402a0:901_15: nayo. Dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Kabaḷantarāyo hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:902_0: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati, pāyantiyā dārakassa
atk-s0402a0:902_1: khīrantarāyo hoti, purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotīti na gaṇhāti. Na saṅkittīsūti
atk-s0402a0:902_2: saṅkittetvā katabhattesu. Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya
atk-s0402a0:902_3: tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti, ukkaṭṭhācelako tato na paṭiggaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:902_4: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho “piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī”ti upaṭṭhito hoti, tattha tassa
atk-s0402a0:902_5: adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti. Saṇḍasaṇḍacārinīti samūhasamūhacārinī.
atk-s0402a0:902_6: Sace hi acelakaṃ disvā “imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti manussā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0402a0:902_7: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti,
atk-s0402a0:902_8: tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? “Maṃ nissāya makkhikānaṃ gocarantarāyo jāto”ti.
atk-s0402a0:903_0: Thusodakanti sabbasassasambhārehi katasovīrakaṃ. Ettha ca surāpānameva sāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:903_1: ayaṃ pana sabbesu sāvajjasaññī. Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0402a0:903_2: nivattati. Ekālopikoti ekeneva ālopena yāpeti. Dvāgārikādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekissāpi
atk-s0402a0:903_3: dattiyāti ekāya dattiyā. Datti nāma ekā khuddakapāti hoti, yattha aggabhikkhaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:903_4: ṭhapenti. Ekāhikanti ekadivasantarikaṃ. Addhamāsikanti addhamāsantarikaṃ. Pariyāyabhattabhojananti
atk-s0402a0:903_5: vārabhattabhojanaṃ, ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena addhamāsavārenāti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:904_1: gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati. Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake
atk-s0402a0:904_2: vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti.
atk-s0402a0:904_3: Seyyanti sayantopi tattheva seyyaṃ kappeti. Sāyaṃ tatiyamassāti sāyatatiyakaṃ. Pāto
atk-s0402a0:904_4: majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ “pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī”ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.
atk-s0402a0:905_0: Kāye kāyānupassītiādīni heṭṭhā ekakanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:905_1: vuccati, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadāti, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogañca
atk-s0402a0:905_2: attakilamathānuyogañcāti dve ante anupagatā, sassatucchedantehi vā vimuttā majjhimā
atk-s0402a0:906_1: abhijānanatthaṃ. Suññato samādhītiādīhi tīhipi samādhīhi vipassanāva kathitā. Vipassanā
atk-s0402a0:906_2: hi niccābhinivesa-niccanimitta-niccapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvā imāni nāmāni labhati. Pariññāyāti
atk-s0402a0:911_0: 1. Catukkanipātassa paṭhame ananubodhāti abujjhanena ajānanena. Appaṭivedhāti appaṭivijjhanena
atk-s0402a0:911_1: apaccakkhakiriyāya. Dīghamaddhānanti cirakālaṃ. Sandhāvitanti bhavato bhavaṃ gamanavasena
atk-s0402a0:911_2: sandhāvitaṃ. Saṃsaritanti punappunaṃ gamanāgamanavasena saṃsaritaṃ. Mamañceva tumhākañcāti
atk-s0402a0:911_3: mayā ca tumhehi ca. Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva
atk-s0402a0:911_4: tumhākañca ahosīti evamettha attho veditabbo. Ariyassāti niddosassa. Sīlaṃ samādhi
atk-s0402a0:911_5: paññāti ime pana tayo dhammā maggaphalasampayuttāva veditabbā, vimuttināmena phalameva
atk-s0402a0:911_6: niddiṭṭhaṃ. Bhavataṇhāti bhavesu taṇhā. Bhavanettīti bhavarajju. Taṇhāya eva etaṃ
atk-s0402a0:911_7: nāmaṃ. Tāya hi sattā goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ nīyanti, tasmā bhavanettīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:912_0: Anuttarāti lokuttarā. Dukkhassantakaroti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro. Cakkhumāti pañcahi
atk-s0402a0:912_1: cakkhūhi cakkhumā. Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. Idamassa bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0402a0:912_2: paṭhamaparinibbānaṃ, pacchā pana yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0402a0:914_0: 2. Dutiye papatitoti patito cuto. Appapatitoti apatito patiṭṭhito. Tattha lokiyamahājano
atk-s0402a0:914_1: patitoyeva nāma, sotāpannādayo kilesuppattikkhaṇe patitā nāma, khīṇāsavo ekantapatiṭṭhito nāma.
atk-s0402a0:915_0: Cutā patantīti ye cutā, te patanti nāma. Patitāti ye patitā, te cutā nāma. Cutattā
atk-s0402a0:915_1: patitā, patitattā cutāti attho. Giddhāti rāgarattā. Punarāgatāti puna jātiṃ puna
atk-s0402a0:915_2: jaraṃ puna byādhiṃ puna maraṇaṃ āgatā nāma honti. Kataṃ kiccanti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:915_3: kataṃ. Rataṃ rammanti ramitabbayuttake guṇajāte ramitaṃ. Sukhenānvāgataṃ sukhanti
atk-s0402a0:915_4: sukhena sukhaṃ anuāgataṃ sampattaṃ. Mānusakasukhena dibbasukhaṃ, jhānasukhena vipassanāsukhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:915_5: vipassanāsukhena maggasukhaṃ, maggasukhena phalasukhaṃ, phalasukhena nibbānasukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:917_0: 3. Tatiyaṃ dukanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Gāthāsu pana nindiyanti ninditabbayuttakaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:917_1: Nindatīti garahati. Pasaṃsiyoti pasaṃsitabbayutto. Vicināti mukhena so kalinti yo
atk-s0402a0:917_2: evaṃ pavatto, tena mukhena kaliṃ vicināti nāma. Kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindatīti tena
atk-s0402a0:917_3: ca kalinā sukhaṃ na paṭilabhati. Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanāti sabbenapi sakena dhanena
atk-s0402a0:917_4: ceva attanā ca saddhiṃ yo parājayo, so appamattakova kalīti attho. Yo sugatesūti
atk-s0402a0:917_5: yo pana sammaggatesu puggalesu cittaṃ padusseyya, ayaṃ cittapadosova tato kalito
atk-s0402a0:917_6: mahantataro kali. Idāni tassa mahantatarabhāvaṃ dassento sataṃ sahassānantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:917_7: Tattha sataṃ sahassānanti nirabbudagaṇanāya satasahassaṃ. Chattiṃsatīti aparāni ca
atk-s0402a0:917_8: chattiṃsati nirabbudāni. Pañca cāti abbudagaṇanāya ca pañca abbudāni. Yamariyagarahīti
atk-s0402a0:917_9: yaṃ ariye garahanto nirayaṃ upapajjati, tattha ettakaṃ āyuppamāṇanti.
atk-s0402a0:919_0: 4. Catutthe mātari pitari cātiādīsu mittavindako mātari micchāpaṭipanno nāma, ajātasattu
atk-s0402a0:919_1: pitari micchāpaṭipanno nāma, devadatto tathāgate micchāpaṭipanno nāma, kokāliko tathāgatasāvake
atk-s0402a0:919_2: micchāpaṭipanno nāma. Bahuñcāti bahukameva. Pasavatīti paṭilabhati. Tāyāti tāya micchāpaṭipattisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0402a0:919_3: adhammacariyāya. Peccāti ito gantvā. Apāyaṃ gacchatīti nirayādīsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattati.
atk-s0402a0:921_0: 5. Pañcame anusotaṃ gacchatīti anusotagāmī. Kilesasotassa paccanīkapaṭipattiyā paṭisotaṃ
atk-s0402a0:921_1: gacchatīti paṭisotagāmī. Ṭhitattoti ṭhitasabhāvo. Tiṇṇoti oghaṃ taritvā ṭhito. Pāraṅgatoti
atk-s0402a0:921_2: paratīraṃ gato. Thale tiṭṭhatīti nibbānathale tiṭṭhati. Brāhmaṇoti seṭṭho niddoso.
atk-s0402a0:921_3: Idhāti imasmiṃ loke. Kāme ca paṭisevatīti kilesakāmehi vatthukāme paṭisevati. Pāpañca
atk-s0402a0:921_4: kammaṃ karotīti pāpañca pāṇātipātādikammaṃ karoti. Pāpañca kammaṃ na karotīti pañcaverakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:921_5: na karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ṭhitattoti ayaṃ anāgāmī puggalo tasmā lokā puna
atk-s0402a0:922_0: Taṇhādhipannāti taṇhāya adhipannā ajjhotthaṭā, taṇhaṃ vā adhipannā ajjhogāḷhā. Paripuṇṇasekhoti
atk-s0402a0:922_1: sikkhāpāripūriyā ṭhito. Aparihānadhammoti aparihīnasabhāvo. Cetovasippattoti cittavasībhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:922_2: patto. Evarūpo khīṇāsavo hoti, idha pana anāgāmī kathito. Samāhitindriyoti samāhitachaḷindriyo.
atk-s0402a0:922_3: Paroparāti parovarā uttamalāmakā, kusalākusalāti attho. Sameccāti ñāṇena samāgantvā.
atk-s0402a0:922_4: Vidhūpitāti viddhaṃsitā jhāpitā vā. Vusitabrahmacariyoti maggabrahmacariyaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0402a0:922_5: ṭhito. Lokantagūti tividhassāpi lokassa antaṃ gato. Pāragatoti chahākārehi pāragato.
atk-s0402a0:922_6: Idha khīṇāsavova kathito. Iti suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:924_1: nāḷakasuttatuvaṭakasuttāni, aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:924_2: Sabbampi sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyanti veditabbaṃ, visesena saṃyuttake sakalopi sagāthāvaggo.
atk-s0402a0:924_3: Sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, niggāthakasuttaṃ, yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:924_4: buddhavacanaṃ, taṃ veyyākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ. Dhammapada-theragāthā-therigāthā suttanipāte
atk-s0402a0:924_5: nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā. Somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-s0402a0:924_6: dveasīti suttantā udānanti veditabbā. “Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā”tiādinayappavattā dasuttarasatasuttantā
atk-s0402a0:924_7: itivuttakanti veditabbā. Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti
atk-s0402a0:924_8: veditabbāni. “Cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayappavattā
atk-s0402a0:924_10: sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitā suttantā vedallanti veditabbā. Na
atk-s0402a0:924_11: atthamaññāya na dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca ajānitvā. Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti
atk-s0402a0:924_12: navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ sahasīlaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipanno
atk-s0402a0:924_13: hoti. Iminā upāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Paṭhamavāre panettha appassutadussīlo
atk-s0402a0:924_14: kathito, dutiye appassutakhīṇāsavo, tatiye bahussutadussīlo, catutthe bahussutakhīṇāsavo.
atk-s0402a0:925_0: Sīlesu asamāhitoti sīlesu aparipūrakārī. Sīlato ca sutena cāti sīlabhāgena ca sutabhāgena
atk-s0402a0:925_1: ca “ayaṃ dussīlo appassuto”ti evaṃ taṃ garahantīti attho. Tassa sampajjate sutanti
atk-s0402a0:925_2: tassa puggalassa yasmā tena sutena sutakiccaṃ kataṃ, tasmā tassa sutaṃ sampajjati
atk-s0402a0:925_3: nāma. Nāssa sampajjateti sutakiccassa akatattā na sampajjati. Dhammadharanti sutadhammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:925_4: ādhārabhūtaṃ. Sappaññanti supaññaṃ. Nekkhaṃ jambonadassevāti jambunadaṃ vuccati jātisuvaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:925_5: tassa jambunadassa nekkhaṃ viya, pañcasuvaṇṇaparimāṇaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭikaṃ viyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:927_0: 7. Sattame viyattāti paññāveyyattiyena samannāgatā. Vinītāti vinayaṃ upetā suvinītā.
atk-s0402a0:927_1: Visāradāti vesārajjena somanassasahagatena ñāṇena samannāgatā. Dhammadharāti sutadhammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:927_2: ādhārabhūtā. Bhikkhu ca sīlasampannoti gāthāya kiñcāpi ekekasseva ekeko guṇo kathito,
atk-s0402a0:929_0: 8. Aṭṭhame vesārajjānīti ettha sārajjapaṭipakkho vesārajjaṃ, catūsu ṭhānesu sārajjābhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:929_1: paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:929_2: uttamaṭṭhānaṃ. Āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānanti attho. Apica gavasatajeṭṭhako
atk-s0402a0:929_3: usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. Vajasatajeṭṭhako vā usabho, vajasahassajeṭṭhako
atk-s0402a0:929_4: vasabho, sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi
atk-s0402a0:929_5: asampakampiyo nisabho, so idha usabhoti adhippeto. Idampi hi tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:929_6: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ. Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā vavatthānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:929_7: Idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho catūhi pādehi
atk-s0402a0:929_8: pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati, evaṃ tathāgatopi catūhi vesārajjapādehi
atk-s0402a0:929_9: aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo
atk-s0402a0:929_10: acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati
atk-s0402a0:929_11: na paccakkhāti, attani āropeti. Tena vuttaṃ “āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānātī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:930_0: Parisāsūti aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadati, sīhanādasadisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:930_1: vā nādaṃ nadati. Ayamattho sīhanādasuttena dassetabbo. Yathā vā sīho sahanato ca
atk-s0402a0:930_2: hananato ca sīhoti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca
atk-s0402a0:930_3: hananato sīhoti vuccati. Evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Tattha yathā sīho
