atk-s0402a0:930_4: sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:930_5: tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso
atk-s0402a0:930_6: “iti rūpa”ntiādinā nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:931: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visuddhaṃ. Cakkasaddo panāyaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:934: Dhammacakke idha mato, tañca dvedhā vibhāvaye”.
atk-s0402a0:935_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:935_1: sampattiyaṃ dissati. “Pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī”ti ettha lakkhaṇe. “Cakkaṃva vahato
atk-s0402a0:935_2: pada”nti ettha rathaṅge. “Catucakkaṃ navadvāra”nti ettha iriyāpathe. “Dadaṃ bhuñja
atk-s0402a0:935_3: mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇina”nti ettha dāne. “Dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pāturahosī”ti
atk-s0402a0:935_4: ettha ratanacakke. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti ettha dhammacakke. “Icchāhatassa posassa,
atk-s0402a0:935_5: cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha uracakke. “Khurapariyantena cepi cakkenā”ti ettha
atk-s0402a0:935_6: paharaṇacakke. “Asanivicakka”nti ettha asanimaṇḍale. Idha panāyaṃ dhammacakke mato.
atk-s0402a0:936_0: Taṃ panetaṃ dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca. Tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:936_1: attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ, karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ ariyaphalāvahaṃ
atk-s0402a0:936_2: desanāñāṇaṃ. Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi abhinikkhamanato
atk-s0402a0:936_3: yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Tusitabhavanato vā yāva
atk-s0402a0:936_4: mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Dīpaṅkarato
atk-s0402a0:936_5: paṭṭhāya vā yāva bodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:936_6: Desanāñāṇampi pavattamānaṃ pavattanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattimaggā
atk-s0402a0:936_7: pavattamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāma. Tesu paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ, desanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:936_8: lokiyaṃ. Ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ, buddhānaṃyeva orasañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:937_0: Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho, sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā”ti
atk-s0402a0:937_1: evaṃ paṭijānato tava. Anabhisambuddhāti ime nāma dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā. Tatra
atk-s0402a0:937_2: vatāti tesu “anabhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ dassitadhammesu. Sahadhammenāti sahetunā sakāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:937_3: vacanena. Nimittametanti ettha puggalopi dhammopi nimittanti adhippeto. Taṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:937_4: na passāmi, yo maṃ paṭicodessati. Taṃ dhammaṃ na passāmi, yaṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:937_5: dhammo tayā anabhisambuddho”ti maṃ paṭicodessatīti ayamettha attho. Khemappattoti
atk-s0402a0:937_6: khemaṃ patto. Sesapadadvayaṃ imasseva vevacanaṃ. Sabbampetaṃ vesārajjañāṇameva sandhāya
atk-s0402a0:937_7: vuttaṃ. Dasabalassa hi “ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddho”ti codakaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:937_8: vā codanākāraṇaṃ anabhisambuddhadhammaṃ vā apassato “sabhāvabuddhoyeva vata samāno
atk-s0402a0:937_9: ahaṃ buddhosmīti vadāmī”ti paccavekkhantassa balavataraṃ somanassaṃ uppajjati, tena
atk-s0402a0:937_10: sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ vesārajjaṃ nāma. Taṃ sandhāya “khemappatto”tiādimāha. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:938_0: Antarāyikā dhammāti ettha pana antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā. Te atthato sañcicca
atk-s0402a0:938_1: vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā. Sañcicca vītikkantaṃ hi antamaso dukkaṭadubbhāsitampi
atk-s0402a0:938_2: maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ karoti. Idha pana methunadhammo adhippeto. Methunaṃ sevato
atk-s0402a0:938_3: hi yassa kassaci nissaṃsayameva maggaphalānaṃ antarāyo hoti.
atk-s0402a0:939_0: Yassa kho pana te atthāyāti rāgakkhayādīsu yassa atthāya. Dhammo desitoti asubhabhāvanādidhammo
atk-s0402a0:939_1: kathito. Tatra vata manti tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhamme maṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:940_0: Vādapathāti vādāyeva. Puthūti bahū. Sitāti upanibaddhā abhisaṅkhatā. Atha vā puthussitāti
atk-s0402a0:940_1: puthubhāvaṃ sitā upagatā, puthūhi vā sitātipi puthussitā. Yaṃ nissitāti etarahipi
atk-s0402a0:940_2: yaṃ vādapathaṃ nissitā. Na te bhavantīti te vādapathā na bhavanti bhijjanti vinassanti.
atk-s0402a0:940_3: Dhammacakkanti desanāñāṇassapi paṭivedhañāṇassapi etaṃ nāmaṃ. Tesu desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:940_4: paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ. Kevalīti sakalaguṇasamannāgato. Tādisanti tathāvidhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:942_0: 9. Navame uppajjati etesūti uppādā. Kā uppajjati? Taṇhā. Taṇhāya uppādā taṇhuppādā,
atk-s0402a0:942_1: taṇhāvatthūni taṇhākāraṇānīti attho. Cīvarahetūti “kattha manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:942_2: cīvarakāraṇā uppajjati. Itibhavābhavahetūti ettha itīti nidassanatthe nipāto. Yathā
atk-s0402a0:942_3: cīvarādihetu, evaṃ bhavābhavahetupīti attho. Bhavābhavoti cettha paṇītatarāni sappinavanītādīni
atk-s0402a0:943_0: Taṇhādutiyoti ayañhi satto anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe saṃsaranto na ekakova saṃsarati,
atk-s0402a0:943_1: taṇhaṃ pana dutiyikaṃ labhantova saṃsarati. Tena vuttaṃ “taṇhādutiyo”ti. Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti
atk-s0402a0:943_2: ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṃ attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo nāma anāgatattabhāvo. Evarūpo
atk-s0402a0:943_3: vā aññopi attabhāvo itthabhāvo nāma, na evarūpo aññathābhāvo nāma. Taṃ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:943_4: Saṃsāranti khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ paṭipāṭiṃ. Nātivattatīti nātikkamati. Evamādīnavaṃ
atk-s0402a0:943_5: ñatvāti evaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannesu khandhesu ādīnavaṃ jānitvā. Taṇhaṃ dukkhassa
atk-s0402a0:943_6: sambhavanti taṇhaṃ ca “ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhasambhūto sabhāvo kāraṇa”nti evaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:943_7: Ettāvatā imassa bhikkhuno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattabhāvo dassito. Idāni
atk-s0402a0:943_8: taṃ khīṇāsavaṃ thomento vītataṇhotiādimāha. Tattha anādānoti niggahaṇo. Sato bhikkhu
atk-s0402a0:943_9: paribbajeti satisampajaññe vepullappatto khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sato sampajāno careyya
atk-s0402a0:943_10: vihareyyāti attho. Iti suttante vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:945_0: 10. Dasame vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti yogā. Kāmayogotiādīsu pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo kāmayogo.
atk-s0402a0:945_1: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo bhavayogo, tathā jhānanikanti. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca
atk-s0402a0:945_2: rāgo dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca diṭṭhiyogo. Catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāyogo. Kāmesu
atk-s0402a0:945_3: vā yojetīti kāmayogo. Bhavesu yojetīti bhavayogo. Diṭṭhīsu yojetīti diṭṭhiyogo. Avijjāya
atk-s0402a0:946_0: Idāni te vitthāretvā dassento katamo ca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha samudayanti uppattiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:946_1: Atthaṅgamanti bhedaṃ. Assādanti madhurabhāvaṃ. Ādīnavanti amadhurabhāvaṃ dosaṃ. Nissaraṇanti
atk-s0402a0:946_2: nissaṭabhāvaṃ. Kāmesūti vatthukāmesu. Kāmarāgoti kāme ārabbha uppannarāgo. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0402a0:946_3: eseva nayo. Anusetīti nibbattati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kāmayogoti, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:946_4: idaṃ kāmesu yojanakāraṇaṃ bandhanakāraṇaṃ vuccatīti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:947_0: Phassāyatanānanti cakkhādīnaṃ cakkhusamphassādikāraṇānaṃ. Avijjā aññāṇanti ñāṇapaṭipakkhabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:947_1: aññāṇasaṅkhātā avijjā. Iti kāmayogoti ettha iti saddo catūhipi yogehi saddhiṃ yojetabbo
atk-s0402a0:947_2: “evaṃ kāmayogo, evaṃ bhavayogo”ti. Saṃyuttoti parivārito. Pāpakehīti lāmakehi. Akusalehīti
atk-s0402a0:947_3: akosallasambhūtehi. Saṃkilesikehīti saṃkilesanakehi, pasannassa cittassa pasannabhāvadūsakehīti
atk-s0402a0:947_4: attho. Ponobbhavikehīti punabbhavanibbattakehi. Sadarehīti sadarathehi. Dukkhavipākehīti
atk-s0402a0:947_5: vipākakāle dukkhuppādakehi. Āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇikehīti anāgate punappunaṃ jātijarāmaraṇanibbattakehi.
atk-s0402a0:947_6: Tasmā ayogakkhemīti vuccatīti yasmā appahīnayogo puggalo etehi dhammehi sampayutto
atk-s0402a0:947_7: hoti, tasmā catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ anadhigatattā na yogakkhemīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:948_1: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Tattha asubhajjhānaṃ kāmayogavisaṃyogo, taṃ pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:948_2: adhigato anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva kāmayogavisaṃyogo nāma. Arahattamaggo bhavayogavisaṃyogo
atk-s0402a0:948_3: nāma, sotāpattimaggo diṭṭhiyogavisaṃyogo nāma, arahattamaggo avijjāyogavisaṃyogo
atk-s0402a0:948_4: nāma. Idāni te vitthāravasena dassento katamo ca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tassattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:949_0: Bhavayogena cūbhayanti bhavayogena ca saṃyuttā, kiñci bhiyyo ubhayenāpi sampayuttā,
atk-s0402a0:949_1: yena kenaci yogena samannāgatāti attho. Purakkhatāti purato katā, parivāritā vā.
atk-s0402a0:949_2: Kāme pariññāyāti duvidhepi kāme parijānitvā. Bhavayogañca sabbasoti bhavayogañca
atk-s0402a0:949_3: sabbameva parijānitvā. Samūhaccāti samūhanitvā. Virājayanti virājento, virājetvā
atk-s0402a0:949_4: vā. “Virājento”ti hi vutte maggo kathito hoti, “virājetvā”ti vutte phalaṃ. Munīti
atk-s0402a0:949_5: khīṇāsavamuni. Iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:951_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame adhivāsetīti cittaṃ adhiropetvā vāseti. Nappajahatīti na pariccajati.
atk-s0402a0:951_1: Na vinodetīti na nīharati. Na byantīkarotīti na vigatantaṃ paricchinnaparivaṭumaṃ
atk-s0402a0:951_2: karoti. Na anabhāvaṃ gametīti na anuabhāvaṃ avaḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ gameti. Carampīti carantopi.
atk-s0402a0:951_3: Anātāpīti nibbīriyo. Anottāpīti upavādabhayarahito. Satatanti niccaṃ. Samitanti nirantaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:951_4: Evaṃ sabbattha atthaṃ ñatvā sukkapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:952: Gāthāsu gehanissitanti kilesanissitaṃ. Mohaneyyesūti mohajanakesu ārammaṇesu. Abhabboti abhājanabhūto. Phuṭṭhuṃ sambodhimuttamanti arahattamaggasaṅkhātaṃ uttamañāṇaṃ phusituṃ.
atk-s0402a0:954_1: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutāti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvutā pihitā upetā hutvā viharatha.
atk-s0402a0:954_2: Ācāragocarasampannāti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannā samupāgatā bhavatha. Aṇumattesu
atk-s0402a0:954_3: vajjesūti aṇuppamāṇesu dosesu. Bhayadassāvinoti tāni aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato dassanasīlā.
atk-s0402a0:954_4: Samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesūti sabbasikkhākoṭṭhāsesu samādātabbaṃ samādāya gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:954_6: samādāpetvā ceva paṭiladdhaguṇesu ca vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni uttari kātabbaṃ dassento
atk-s0402a0:955_0: Yataṃ careti yathā caranto yato hoti saṃyato, evaṃ careyya. Esa nayo sabbattha. Accheti
atk-s0402a0:955_1: nisīdeyya. Yatamenaṃ pasārayeti yaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ pasāreyya, taṃ yataṃ saṃyatameva
atk-s0402a0:955_2: katvā pasāreyya. Uddhanti upari. Tiriyanti majjhaṃ. Apācīnanti adho. Ettāvatā atītā
atk-s0402a0:955_3: paccuppannā anāgatā ca pañcakkhandhā kathitā. Yāvatāti paricchedavacanaṃ. Jagato
atk-s0402a0:955_4: gatīti lokassa nipphatti. Samavekkhitā ca dhammānaṃ, khandhānaṃ udayabbayanti etesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:955_5: sabbaloke atītādibhedānaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammānaṃ udayañca vayañca samavekkhitā. “Pañcakkhandhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:955_6: udayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni
atk-s0402a0:955_7: passatī”ti vuttehi samapaññāsāya lakkhaṇehi sammā avekkhitā hoti. Cetosamathasāmīcinti
atk-s0402a0:955_8: cittasamathassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ. Sikkhamānanti paṭipajjamānaṃ, pūrayamānanti
atk-s0402a0:955_9: attho. Pahitattoti pesitatto. Āhūti kathayanti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:955_10: sutte sīlaṃ missakaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu khīṇāsavo kathito.
atk-s0402a0:957_0: 13. Tatiye sammappadhānānīti sundarapadhānāni uttamavīriyāni. Sammappadhānāti paripuṇṇavīriyā.
atk-s0402a0:957_2: ṭhitā. Te asitāti te khīṇāsavā anissitā nāma. Jātimaraṇabhayassāti jātiñca maraṇañca
atk-s0402a0:957_3: paṭicca uppajjanakabhayassa, jātimaraṇasaṅkhātasseva vā bhayassa. Pāragūti pāraṅgatā.
atk-s0402a0:957_4: Te tusitāti te khīṇāsavā tuṭṭhā nāma. Jetvā māraṃ savāhininti sasenakaṃ māraṃ jinitvā
atk-s0402a0:957_5: ṭhitā. Te anejāti te khīṇāsavā taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya anejā niccalā nāma. Namucibalanti
atk-s0402a0:957_6: mārabalaṃ. Upātivattāti atikkantā. Te sukhitāti te khīṇāsavā lokuttarasukhena sukhitā nāma. Tenevāha –
atk-s0402a0:958: “Sukhitā vata arahanto, taṇhā nesaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0402a0:961_0: 14. Catutthe padhānānīti vīriyāni. Saṃvarappadhānanti cakkhādīni saṃvarantassa uppannavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:961_2: sambojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannavīriyaṃ. Anurakkhaṇāppadhānanti samādhinimittaṃ anurakkhantassa uppannavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:962_0: Vivekanissitantiādīsu viveko, virāgo, nirodhoti tīṇipi nibbānassa nāmāni. Nibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:962_1: hi upadhivivekattā viveko, taṃ āgamma rāgādayo virajjantīti virāgo, nirujjhantīti
atk-s0402a0:962_2: nirodho. Tasmā vivekanissitantiādīsu ārammaṇavasena vā adhigantabbavasena vā nibbānanissitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:963_0: Vossaggapariṇāminti ettha dve vossaggā – pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo
atk-s0402a0:963_1: ca. Tattha vipassanā tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca rāgaṃ pariccajatīti pariccāgavossaggo.
atk-s0402a0:963_2: Maggo ārammaṇavasena nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti pakkhandanavossaggo. Tasmā vossaggapariṇāminti
atk-s0402a0:963_3: yathā bhāviyamāno satisambojjhaṅgo vossaggatthāya pariṇamati, vipassanābhāvañca maggabhāvañca
atk-s0402a0:963_4: pāpuṇāti, evaṃ taṃ bhāvetīti ayamettha attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Bhaddakanti
atk-s0402a0:963_5: laddhakaṃ. Samādhinimittaṃ vuccati aṭṭhikasaññādivasena adhigato samādhiyeva. Anurakkhatīti
atk-s0402a0:963_6: samādhipāripanthikadhamme rāgadosamohe sodhento rakkhati. Ettha ca aṭṭhikasaññādikā
atk-s0402a0:963_7: pañceva saññā vuttā, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne dasapi asubhāni vitthāretvā kathetabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:963_8: Tesaṃ vitthāro visuddhimagge vuttoyeva. Gāthāya saṃvarādinipphādakaṃ vīriyameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:963_9: Khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇeti dukkhakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:965_1: Yadidaṃ rāhu asurindoti yo esa rāhu asurindo ayaṃ aggoti. Ettha rāhu kira asurindo
atk-s0402a0:965_2: cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni ucco, bāhantaramassa dvādasayojanasatāni,
atk-s0402a0:965_3: hatthatalapādatalānaṃ puthulatā tīṇi yojanasatāni. Aṅgulipabbāni paṇṇāsa yojanāni,
atk-s0402a0:965_4: bhamukantaraṃ paṇṇāsayojanaṃ, nalāṭaṃ tiyojanasataṃ, sīsaṃ navayojanasataṃ. Kāmabhogīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:965_5: yadidaṃ rājā mandhātāti yo esa rājā mandhātā nāma, ayaṃ dibbepi mānusakepi kāme paribhuñjanakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:965_6: sattānaṃ aggo nāma. Esa hi asaṅkheyyāyukesu manussesu nibbattitvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:965_7: hiraññavassaṃ vassāpento mānusake kāme dīgharattaṃ paribhuñji. Devaloke pana yāva
atk-s0402a0:965_8: chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjīti kāmabhogīnaṃ aggo
atk-s0402a0:965_9: nāma jāto. Ādhipateyyānanti adhipatiṭṭhānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ karontānaṃ. Tathāgato
atk-s0402a0:965_10: aggamakkhāyatīti lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi tathāgato aggo seṭṭho uttamo akkhāyati.
atk-s0402a0:966_0: Iddhiyā yasasā jalanti dibbasampattisamiddhiyā ca parivārasaṅkhātena yasasā ca jalantānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:966_1: Uddhaṃ tiriyaṃ apācīnanti upari ca majjhe ca heṭṭhā ca. Yāvatā jagato gatīti yattakā lokanipphatti.
atk-s0402a0:968_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe sokhummānīti sukhumalakkhaṇapaṭivijjhanakāni ñāṇāni. Rūpasokhummena samannāgato
atk-s0402a0:968_1: hotīti rūpe saṇhasukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakena ñāṇena samannāgato hoti. Paramenāti
atk-s0402a0:968_2: uttamena. Tena ca rūpasokhummenāti tena yāva anulomabhāvaṃ pattena sukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakañāṇena.
atk-s0402a0:968_3: Na samanupassatīti natthibhāveneva na passati. Na patthetīti natthibhāveneva na pattheti.
atk-s0402a0:969_1: sukhumataṃ jānitvā. Vedanānañca sambhavanti vedanākkhandhassa ca pabhavaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:969_2: Saññā yato samudetīti yasmā kāraṇā saññākkhandho samudeti nibbattati, tañca jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:969_3: Atthaṃ gacchati yattha cāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nirujjhati, tañca jānitvā. Saṅkhāre parato
atk-s0402a0:969_4: ñatvāti saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ aniccatāya lujjanabhāvena parato jānitvā. Iminā hi padena
atk-s0402a0:969_5: aniccānupassanā kathitā. Dukkhato no ca attatoti iminā dukkhānattānupassanā. Santoti
atk-s0402a0:969_6: kilesasantatāya santo. Santipade ratoti nibbāne rato. Iti suttante catūsu ṭhānesu
atk-s0402a0:971_0: 17-19. Sattame agatigamanānīti nagatigamanāni. Chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti chandena agatiṃ
atk-s0402a0:971_1: gacchati, akattabbaṃ karoti. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Chandā dosā bhayā mohāti chandena,
atk-s0402a0:971_2: dosena, bhayena, mohena. Ativattatīti atikkamati. Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānameva. Navame tathābujjhanakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:973_0: 20. Dasame bhattuddesakoti salākabhattādīnaṃ uddesako. Kāmesu asaṃyatāti vatthukāmesu
atk-s0402a0:973_1: kilesakāmehi asaṃyatā. Parisākasaṭo ca panesa vuccatīti ayañca pana so evarūpā parisākacavaro
atk-s0402a0:973_2: nāma vuccatīti attho. Samaṇenāti buddhasamaṇena. Parisāya maṇḍo ca panesa vuccatīti
atk-s0402a0:973_3: ayaṃ evarūpā parisā vippasannena parisāmaṇḍoti vuccatīti.
atk-s0402a0:975_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame uruvelāyanti ettha uruvelāti mahāvelā, mahāvālikarāsīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:975_1: Atha vā urūti vālukā vuccati, velāti mariyādā. Velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti
atk-s0402a0:975_2: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassā kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0402a0:975_3: pabbajitvā tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0402a0:975_4: “kāyakammavacīkammāni nāma paresampi pākaṭāni honti, manokammaṃ pana apākaṭaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0402a0:975_5: yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi, tassa añño codako
atk-s0402a0:975_6: nāma natthi. So attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālukaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:975_7: ākiratu, idamassa daṇḍakamma”nti. Tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, so
atk-s0402a0:975_8: tattha pattapuṭena vālukaṃ ākirati, evaṃ tattha anukkamena mahāvālukarāsi jāto. Tato
atk-s0402a0:975_9: naṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “uruvelāti
atk-s0402a0:975_10: mahāvelā, mahāvālikarāsīti attho”ti. Tameva sandhāya vuttaṃ – “atha vā urūti vālukā
atk-s0402a0:975_11: vuccati, velāti mariyādā, velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-s0402a0:976_0: Najjā nerañjarāya tīreti uruvelagāmaṃ nissāya nerañjarānadītīre viharāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:976_1: Ajapālanigrodheti ajapālakā tassa nigrodhassa chāyāya nisīdantipi tiṭṭhantipi, tasmā
atk-s0402a0:976_2: so ajapālanigrodhotveva saṅkhaṃ gato, tassa heṭṭhāti attho. Paṭhamābhisambuddhoti
atk-s0402a0:976_3: sambuddho hutvā paṭhamameva. Udapādīti ayaṃ vitakko pañcame sattāhe udapādi. Kasmā
atk-s0402a0:976_4: udapādīti? Sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇattā ceva pubbāsevanatāya ca. Tattha pubbāsevanāya
atk-s0402a0:976_5: pakāsanatthaṃ tittirajātakaṃ āharitabbaṃ. Hatthivānaratittirā kira ekasmiṃ padese
atk-s0402a0:976_6: viharantā “yo amhākaṃ mahallako, tasmiṃ sagāravā viharissāmā”ti nigrodhaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0402a0:976_7: “ko nu kho amhākaṃ mahallako”ti vīmaṃsantā tittirassa mahallakabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa
atk-s0402a0:976_8: jeṭṭhāpacāyanakammaṃ katvā aññamaññaṃ samaggā sammodamānā viharitvā saggaparāyaṇā
atk-s0402a0:976_9: ahesuṃ. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā rukkhe adhivatthā devatā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0402a0:978: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a0:979_0: Evaṃ ahetukatiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi tathāgato sagāravavāsaṃ rocesi, idāni kasmā
atk-s0402a0:979_1: na rocessatīti. Agāravoti aññasmiṃ gāravarahito, kañci garuṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:979_2: Appatissoti patissayarahito, kañci jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvāti attho. Samaṇaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:979_3: brāhmaṇaṃ vāti ettha samitapāpabāhitapāpāyeva samaṇabrāhmaṇā adhippetā. Sakkatvā
atk-s0402a0:979_4: garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva katvā garukārañca upaṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0402a0:980_0: Sadevake loketiādīsu saddhiṃ devehi sadevake. Devaggahaṇena cettha mārabrahmesu gahitesupi
atk-s0402a0:980_1: māro nāma vasavattī sabbesaṃ upari vasaṃ vatteti, brahmā nāma mahānubhāvo, ekaṅguliyā
atk-s0402a0:980_2: ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi dvīsu, dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0402a0:980_3: ālokaṃ pharati. So iminā sīlasampannataroti vattuṃ mā labhantūti samārake sabrahmaketi
atk-s0402a0:980_4: visuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā samaṇā nāma ekanikāyādivasena bahussutā sīlavanto paṇḍitā, brāhmaṇāpi
atk-s0402a0:980_5: vatthuvijjādivasena bahussutā paṇḍitā. Te iminā sampannatarāti vattuṃ mā labhantūti
atk-s0402a0:980_6: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyāti vuttaṃ. Sadevamanussāyāti idaṃ pana nippadesato dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:980_7: gahitameva gahetvā vuttaṃ. Apicettha purimāni tīṇi padāni lokavasena vuttāni, pacchimāni
atk-s0402a0:980_8: dve pajāvasena. Sīlasampannataranti sīlena sampannataraṃ, adhikataranti attho. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:980_9: ca sīlādayo cattāro dhammā lokiyalokuttarā kathitā, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ lokiyameva.
atk-s0402a0:980_10: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇameva hetaṃ. Pāturahosīti “ayaṃ satthā avīcito yāva bhavaggā sīlādīhi
atk-s0402a0:980_11: attanā adhikataraṃ apassanto ‘mayā paṭividdhanavalokuttaradhammameva sakkatvā upanissāya
atk-s0402a0:980_12: viharissāmī’ti cinteti, kāraṇaṃ bhagavā cinteti, atthaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ visesaṃ cinteti,
atk-s0402a0:980_13: gacchāmissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti cintetvā purato pākaṭo ahosi, abhimukhe aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:981: Vihaṃsu viharanti cāti ettha yo vadeyya – “viharantīti vacanato paccuppannepi bahū buddhā”ti, so “bhagavāpi bhante etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti iminā vacanena paṭibāhitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:982: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
atk-s0402a0:984_0: Ādīhi cassa suttehi aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvo dīpetabbo. Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi buddhā
atk-s0402a0:984_1: saddhammagaruno, tasmā. Mahattamabhikaṅkhatāti mahantabhāvaṃ patthayamānena. Saraṃ
atk-s0402a0:985_0: Yatoti yasmiṃ kāle. Mahattena samannāgatoti rattaññumahattaṃ vepullamahattaṃ brahmacariyamahattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:985_1: lābhaggamahattanti iminā catubbidhena mahattena samannāgato. Atha me saṅghepi gāravoti
atk-s0402a0:985_2: atha mayhaṃ saṅghepi gāravo jāto. Kismiṃ pana kāle bhagavatā saṅghe gāravo katoti?
atk-s0402a0:985_3: Mahāpajāpatiyā dussayugadānakāle. Tadā hi bhagavā attano upanītaṃ dussayugaṃ “saṅghe,
atk-s0402a0:985_4: gotami, dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti vadanto saṅghe gāravaṃ akāsi nāma.
atk-s0402a0:987_0: 22. Dutiye sambahulāti bahukā. Brāhmaṇāti huhukkajātikena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ āgatā
atk-s0402a0:987_1: brāhmaṇā. Jiṇṇāti jarājiṇṇā. Vuḍḍhāti vayovuddhā. Mahallakāti jātimahallakā. Addhagatāti
atk-s0402a0:987_2: tayo vaye addhe atikkantā. Sutametanti amhehi sutaṃ etaṃ. Tayidaṃ bho, gotama, tathevāti
atk-s0402a0:987_3: bho, gotama, etaṃ amhehi sutakāraṇaṃ tathā eva. Tayidaṃ bho, gotama, na sampannamevāti
atk-s0402a0:988_0: Akālavādītiādīsu akāle vadatīti akālavādī. Asabhāvaṃ vadatīti abhūtavādī. Anatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:988_1: vadati, no atthanti anatthavādī. Adhammaṃ vadati, no dhammanti adhammavādī. Avinayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:988_2: vadati, no vinayanti avinayavādī. Anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti na hadaye nidhetabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:988_3: vācaṃ bhāsitā. Akālenāti kathetuṃ ayuttakālena. Anapadesanti apadesarahitaṃ, sāpadesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:988_4: sakāraṇaṃ katvā na katheti. Apariyantavatinti pariyantarahitaṃ, na paricchedaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0402a0:988_5: katheti. Anatthasaṃhitanti na lokiyalokuttaraatthanissitaṃ katvā katheti. Bālo therotveva
atk-s0402a0:988_6: saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti andhabālo theroti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:989: Kālavādītiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. Paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti paṇḍiccena samannāgatattā paṇḍito, thirabhāvappattiyā theroti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:990_0: Bahussuto hotīti bahuṃ assa sutaṃ hoti, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena
atk-s0402a0:990_1: uggahitaṃ hotīti attho. Sutadharoti sutassa ādhārabhūto. Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito
atk-s0402a0:990_2: palāyati, chiddaghaṭe udakaṃ viya na tiṭṭhati, parisamajjhe ekasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:990_3: vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti, ayaṃ na sutadharo nāma. Yassa pana uggahitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:990_4: buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti, dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa
atk-s0402a0:990_5: neva nassati, ayaṃ sutadharo nāma. Sutasannicayoti sutassa sannicayabhūto. Yassa
atk-s0402a0:990_6: hi sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāya lekhā viya suvaṇṇapatte pakkhittasīhavasā
atk-s0402a0:990_7: viya ca tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ sutasannicayo nāma. Dhātāti dhātā paguṇā. Ekaccassa hi uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:990_8: dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalikaṃ na hoti, “asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte
atk-s0402a0:990_9: “sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmī”ti vadati. Ekaccassa dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:990_10: bhavaṅgasotasadisaṃ hoti, “asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte uddharitvā
atk-s0402a0:990_11: tameva katheti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “dhātā”ti. Vacasā paricitāti suttadasaka-vaggadasakapaṇṇāsadasakavasena
atk-s0402a0:990_12: vācāya sajjhāyitā. Manasānupekkhitāti cittena anupekkhitā. Yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:990_13: buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti, mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa
atk-s0402a0:990_14: rūpagataṃ viya paññāyati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato
atk-s0402a0:991_0: Ābhicetasikānanti abhicetoti abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ cittaṃ vuccati, adhicittaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a0:991_1: abhicetasi jātāni ābhicetasikāni, abhicetosannissitānīti vā ābhicetasikāni. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānanti
atk-s0402a0:991_2: diṭṭhadhamme sukhavihārānaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkho attabhāvo vuccati, tattha sukhavihārabhūtānanti
atk-s0402a0:991_3: attho. Rūpāvacarajjhānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:991_5: vuccati. Nikāmalābhīti nikāmena lābhī, attano icchāvasena lābhī, icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:991_6: samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Akicchalābhīti sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0402a0:991_7: samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Akasiralābhīti akasirānaṃ lābhī vipulānaṃ, yathāparicchedena
atk-s0402a0:991_8: vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi lābhīyeva hoti, na pana icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:991_9: sakkoti samāpajjituṃ. Ekacco sakkoti tathāsamāpajjituṃ, pāripanthike ca pana kicchena
atk-s0402a0:991_10: vikkhambheti. Ekacco tathā ca samāpajjati, pāripanthike ca akiccheneva vikkhambheti,
atk-s0402a0:991_11: na sakkoti nāḷikayantaṃ viya yathāparicchedeyeva vuṭṭhātuṃ. Yassa pana ayaṃ tividhāpi
atk-s0402a0:991_12: sampadā atthi, so “akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti vuccati. Āsavānaṃ khayātiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:991_13: Evamidha sīlampi bāhusaccampi khīṇāsavasseva sīlaṃ bāhusaccañca, jhānānipi khīṇāsavasseva
atk-s0402a0:991_14: vaḷañjanakajjhānāni kathitāni. “Āsavānaṃ khayā”tiādīhi pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ. Phalena
atk-s0402a0:992_0: Uddhatenāti uddhaccasahagatena. Samphanti palāpakathaṃ. Asamāhitasaṅkappoti aṭṭhapitasaṅkappo.
atk-s0402a0:992_1: Magoti magasadiso. Ārāti dūre. Thāvareyyamhāti thāvarabhāvato. Pāpadiṭṭhīti lāmakadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0402a0:992_2: Anādaroti ādararahito. Sutavāti sutena upagato. Paṭibhānavāti duvidhena paṭibhānena
atk-s0402a0:992_3: samannāgato. Paññāyatthaṃ vipassatīti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya catunnaṃ saccānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:992_4: atthaṃ vinivijjhitvā passati. Pāragū sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ khandhādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:992_5: pāraṃ gato, abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, pahānapāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, sacchikiriyāpāragū,
atk-s0402a0:992_6: samāpattipāragūti evaṃ chabbidhena pāragamanena sabbadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:992_7: gato. Akhiloti rāgakhilādivirahito. Paṭibhānavāti duvidheneva paṭibhānena samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:994_0: 23. Tatiye lokoti dukkhasaccaṃ. Abhisambuddhoti ñāto paccakkho kato. Lokasmāti dukkhasaccato.
atk-s0402a0:994_1: Pahīnoti mahābodhimaṇḍe arahattamaggañāṇena pahīno. Tathāgatassa bhāvitāti tathāgatena bhāvitā.
atk-s0402a0:995_0: Evaṃ ettakena ṭhānena catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā idāni tathāgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:995_1: kathetuṃ yaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha diṭṭhanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:995_2: Mutanti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. Viññātanti
atk-s0402a0:995_3: sukhadukkhādi dhammārammaṇaṃ. Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. Pariyesitanti
atk-s0402a0:995_4: pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. Anuvicaritaṃ manasāti cittena anusañcaritaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:996_0: Tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti iminā etaṃ dasseti – yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa
atk-s0402a0:996_1: sadevakassa lokassa nīlaṃ pītakantiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_2: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto
atk-s0402a0:996_3: vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0402a0:996_4: imassa sadevakassa lokassa bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddotiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:996_5: āgacchati, mūlagandho tacagandhotiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_6: mūlaraso khandharasotiādi rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, kakkhaḷaṃ mudukantiādi
atk-s0402a0:996_8: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano
atk-s0402a0:996_9: vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0402a0:996_10: lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhadukkhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvārassa
atk-s0402a0:996_11: āpāthaṃ āgacchati, “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ vijānitvā sumano
atk-s0402a0:996_12: vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Yañhi,
atk-s0402a0:996_13: bhikkhave, imesaṃ sabbasattānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ, tattha tathāgatena
atk-s0402a0:996_14: adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi, imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā
atk-s0402a0:996_15: appattampi atthi, apariyesitvā appattampi atthi, pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā
atk-s0402a0:996_16: pattampi atthi, sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:997_0: Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatīti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ, tassa tatheva gatattā tathāgatoti
atk-s0402a0:997_1: vuccati. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “abhisambuddha”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ gatasaddena ekatthaṃ. Iminā
atk-s0402a0:997_2: nayena sabbavāresu tathāgatoti nigamassa attho veditabbo. Tassa yutti ekapuggalavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:997_3: tathāgatasaddavitthāre vuttāyeva. Apicettha aññadatthūti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. Dakkhatīti
atk-s0402a0:998_0: Sabbaṃ lokaṃ abhiññāti tedhātukaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ jānitvā. Sabbaṃ loke yathātathanti
atk-s0402a0:998_1: tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ yathātathaṃ aviparītaṃ
atk-s0402a0:998_2: jānitvā. Visaṃyuttoti catunnaṃ yogānaṃ pahānena visaṃyutto. Anūpayoti taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi
atk-s0402a0:998_3: virahito. Sabbābhibhūti rūpādīni sabbārammaṇāni abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Dhīroti dhitisampanno.
atk-s0402a0:998_4: Sabbaganthappamocanoti sabbe cattāropi ganthe mocetvā ṭhito. Phuṭṭhassāti phuṭṭhā
atk-s0402a0:998_5: assa. Idañca karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Paramā santīti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi tena ñāṇaphusanena
atk-s0402a0:998_6: phuṭṭhaṃ. Tenevāha – nibbānaṃ akutobhayanti. Atha vā paramāsantīti uttamā santi.
atk-s0402a0:998_7: Katarā sāti? Nibbānaṃ. Yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthi, tasmā taṃ akutobhayanti
atk-s0402a0:998_8: vuccati. Vimutto upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā
atk-s0402a0:998_9: vimutto. Sīho anuttaroti parissayānaṃ sahanaṭṭhena kilesānañca hiṃsanaṭṭhena tathāgato
atk-s0402a0:998_10: anuttaro sīho nāma. Brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ. Itīti evaṃ tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā. Saṅgammāti
atk-s0402a0:998_11: samāgantvā. Taṃ namassantīti taṃ tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā namassanti. Idāni yaṃ
atk-s0402a0:998_12: vadantā te namassanti, taṃ dassetuṃ dantotiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1000_0: 24. Catutthaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ nikkhittaṃ. Katarāya atthuppattiyanti? Dasabalaguṇakathāya.
atk-s0402a0:1000_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira dhītā cūḷasubhaddā “sāketanagare kāḷakaseṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1000_2: gacchissāmī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, ahaṃ micchādiṭṭhikakulaṃ gacchāmi.
atk-s0402a0:1000_3: Sace tattha sakkāraṃ labhissāmi, ekasmiṃ purise pesiyamāne papañco bhavissati, maṃ
atk-s0402a0:1000_4: āvajjeyyātha bhagavā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā agamāsi. Seṭṭhi “suṇisā me āgatā”ti maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1000_5: karontova bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādetvā pañca acelakasatāni nimantesi. So
atk-s0402a0:1000_6: tesu nisinnesu “dhītā me āgantvā arahante vandatū”ti cūḷasubhaddāya pesesi. Āgataphalā
atk-s0402a0:1000_7: ariyasāvikā arahanteti vuttamatteyeva “lābhā vata me”ti uṭṭhahitvā gatā te nissirikadassane
atk-s0402a0:1000_8: acelake disvāva “samaṇā nāma na evarūpā honti, tāta, yesaṃ neva ajjhattaṃ hirī, na
atk-s0402a0:1000_9: bahiddhā ottappaṃ atthī”ti vatvā “na ime samaṇā, dhīdhī”ti kheḷaṃ pātetvā nivattitvā
atk-s0402a0:1001_0: Tato acelakā “mahāseṭṭhi kuto te evarūpā kālakaṇṇī laddhā, kiṃ sakalajambudīpe aññā
atk-s0402a0:1001_1: dārikā natthī”ti seṭṭhiṃ paribhāsiṃsu. So “ācariyā jānitvā vā kataṃ hotu ajānitvā
atk-s0402a0:1001_2: vā, ahamettha jānissāmī”ti acelake uyyojetvā subhaddāya santikaṃ gantvā “amma, kasmā
atk-s0402a0:1001_3: evarūpaṃ akāsi, kasmā arahante lajjāpesī”ti āha. Tāta, arahantā nāma evarūpā na hontīti. Atha naṃ so āha –
atk-s0402a0:1002: “Kīdisā samaṇā tuyhaṃ, bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasi;
atk-s0402a0:1003: Kiṃsīlā kiṃsamācārā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1009_0: Evañca pana vatvā seṭṭhissa pure ṭhatvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi. Seṭṭhi tassā
atk-s0402a0:1009_1: vacanaṃ sutvā “yadi evaṃ, tava samaṇe ānetvā maṅgalaṃ karomā”ti. Sā pucchi “kadā
atk-s0402a0:1009_2: karissatha, tātā”ti. Seṭṭhi cintesi – “katipāhaccayenāti vutte pesetvā pakkosāpeyyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1009_3: Atha naṃ “sve ammā”ti āha. Sā sāyanhasamaye uparipāsādaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ pupphasamuggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1009_4: gahetvā satthu guṇe anussaritvā aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo dasabalassa vissajjetvā añjaliṃ
atk-s0402a0:1009_5: paggayha namassamānā aṭṭhāsi. Evañca avaca – “bhagavā sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1009_6: mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Tāni pupphāni gantvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā
atk-s0402a0:1009_7: aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ addasa. Dhammadesanāpariyosāne anāthapiṇḍikamahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0402a0:1009_8: dasabalaṃ vanditvā “sve, bhante, pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mama gehe bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1009_9: gaṇhathā”ti āha. Cūḷasubhaddāya nimantitamha seṭṭhīti. Na, bhante, kañci āgataṃ passāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:1009_10: Āma, seṭṭhi, saddhā pana upāsikā dūre yojanasatamatthakepi yojanasahassamatthakepi
atk-s0402a0:1011: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:1012: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Anāthapiṇḍiko “bhante, mama, dhītu saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a0:1013_0: Satthā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ahaṃ, ānanda, sāketaṃ gamissāmi, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1013_1: salākaṃ dehi. Dadanto ca chaḷabhiññānaṃyeva dadeyyāsī”ti. Thero tathā akāsi. Cūḷasubhaddā
atk-s0402a0:1013_2: rattibhāgasamanantare cintesi – “buddhā nāma bahukiccā bahukaraṇīyā, maṃ sallakkheyya
atk-s0402a0:1013_3: vā na vā, kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇo mahārājā cūḷasubhaddāya
atk-s0402a0:1013_4: kathesi – “bhadde, mā kho tvaṃ vimanā ahosi, mā dummanā. Adhivutthaṃ te bhagavatā
atk-s0402a0:1013_5: svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti. Sā tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā dānameva saṃvidahi.
atk-s0402a0:1013_6: Sakkopi kho devarājā vissakammaṃ āmantesi – “tāta, dasabalo cūḷasubhaddāya santikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1013_7: sāketanagaraṃ gacchissati, pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Satthā
atk-s0402a0:1013_8: pañcahi chaḷabhiññasatehi parivuto kūṭāgārayānena maṇivaṇṇaṃ ākāsaṃ vilikhanto viya
atk-s0402a0:1014_0: Subhaddā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha –
atk-s0402a0:1014_1: “bhante, mayhaṃ sasurapakkho micchādiṭṭhiko, sādhu tesaṃ anucchavikadhammaṃ kathethā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1014_2: Satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Kāḷakaseṭṭhi sotāpanno hutvā attano uyyānaṃ dasabalassa adāsi.
atk-s0402a0:1014_3: Acelakā “amhākaṃ paṭhamaṃ dinna”nti nikkhamituṃ na icchanti. “Gacchatha nīharitabbaniyāmena
atk-s0402a0:1014_4: te nīharathā”ti sabbe nīharāpetvā tattheva satthu vihāraṃ kāretvā brahmadeyyaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:1014_5: udakaṃ pātesi. So kāḷakena kāritatāya kāḷakārāmo nāma jāto. Bhagavā tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0402a0:1014_6: tattha viharati. Tena vuttaṃ – “sākete viharati kāḷakārāme”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1015_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti pañcasate bhikkhū āmantesi. Te kira sāketanagaravāsino kulaputtā
atk-s0402a0:1015_1: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā upaṭṭhānasālāya nisinnā “aho
atk-s0402a0:1015_2: buddhaguṇā nāma mahantā, evarūpaṃ nāma micchādiṭṭhikaṃ kāḷakaseṭṭhiṃ diṭṭhito mocetvā
atk-s0402a0:1015_3: sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ satthārā devalokasadisaṃ kata”nti dasabalassa
atk-s0402a0:1015_4: guṇaṃ kathenti. Satthā tesaṃ guṇaṃ kathentānaṃ cittaṃ upaparikkhitvā – “mayi gate
atk-s0402a0:1015_5: mahatī desanā samuṭṭhissati, desanāpariyosāne ca ime pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahissanti,
atk-s0402a0:1015_6: mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampissatī”ti dhammasabhaṃ gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0402a0:1015_7: nisinno te bhikkhū ādiṃ katvā yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassāti imaṃ desanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1015_8: ārabhi. Evamidaṃ suttaṃ guṇakathāya nikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1016_0: Tattha “tamahaṃ jānāmī”ti padapariyosāne mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
atk-s0402a0:1016_1: Abbhaññāsinti abhiaññāsiṃ, jāninti attho. Viditanti pākaṭaṃ katvā ñātaṃ. Iminā etaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1016_2: dasseti – aññe jānantiyeva, mayā pana pākaṭaṃ katvā viditanti. Imehi tīhi padehi
atk-s0402a0:1016_3: sabbaññutabhūmi nāma kathitā. Taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsīti taṃ chadvārikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1016_4: tathāgato taṇhāya vā diṭṭhiyā vā na upaṭṭhāsi na upagañchi. Ayañhi passati bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:1016_5: cakkhunā rūpaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto so bhagavā. Suṇāti bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:1016_6: sotena saddaṃ. Ghāyati bhagavā ghānena gandhaṃ. Sāyati bhagavā jivhāya rasaṃ. Phusati
atk-s0402a0:1016_7: bhagavā kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ. Vijānāti bhagavā manasā dhammaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato
atk-s0402a0:1016_8: natthi, suvimuttacitto so bhagavā. Tena vuttaṃ – “taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1017_0: Taṃ mamassa musāti taṃ me vacanaṃ musāvādo nāma bhaveyya. Taṃ passa tādisamevāti
atk-s0402a0:1017_1: tampi musāvādo bhaveyya. Taṃ mamassa kalīti taṃ vacanaṃ mayhaṃ doso bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1018_0: Daṭṭhā daṭṭhabbanti disvā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Diṭṭhaṃ na maññatīti taṃ diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1018_1: “ahaṃ mahājanena diṭṭhameva passāmī”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na maññati. Adiṭṭhaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:1018_2: maññatīti “ahaṃ mahājanena adiṭṭhameva etaṃ passāmī”ti evampi taṇhādīhi maññanāhi
atk-s0402a0:1018_3: na maññati. Daṭṭhabbaṃ na maññatīti “mahājanena diṭṭhaṃ passāmī”ti evampi tāhi maññanāhi
atk-s0402a0:1018_4: na maññati. Daṭṭhabbañhi adiṭṭhampi hotiyeva. Evarūpāni hi vacanāni tīsupi kālesu
atk-s0402a0:1018_5: labbhanti, tenassa attho vutto. Daṭṭhāraṃ na maññatīti passitāraṃ ekasattaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:1018_6: tāhi maññanāhi na maññatīti attho. Sesaṭṭhānesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1018_7: Iminā ettakena ṭhānena suññatābhūmi nāma kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:1019_0: Iti kho, bhikkhaveti evaṃ kho, bhikkhave. Tādīyeva tādīti tāditā nāma ekasadisatā.
atk-s0402a0:1019_1: Tathāgato ca yādiso lābhādīsu, tādisova alābhādīsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “lābhepi tādī,
atk-s0402a0:1019_2: alābhepi tādī. Yasepi tādī, ayasepi tādī. Nindāyapi tādī, pasaṃsāyapi tādī. Sukhepi
atk-s0402a0:1019_3: tādī, dukkhepi tādī”ti. Imāya tāditāya tādī. Tamhā ca pana tādimhāti tato tathāgatatādito
atk-s0402a0:1019_4: añño uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā tādī natthīti ettāvatā tādibhūmi nāma kathitā. Imāhi
atk-s0402a0:1019_5: pañcabhūmīhi desanaṃ niṭṭhāpentassa pañcasupi ṭhānesu mahāpathavī sakkhibhāvena akampittha.
atk-s0402a0:1019_6: Desanāpariyosāne te pañcasate adhunāpabbajite kulaputte ādiṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ pattānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1020_0: Bhagavāpi suttaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto yaṃkiñcītiādimāha. Tattha ajjhositaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1020_1: saccamutaṃ paresanti paresaṃ saddhāya parapattiyāyanāya saccamutanti maññitvā ajjhositaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1020_2: gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahitaṃ. Sayasaṃvutesūti sayameva saṃvaritvā piyāyitvā gahitagahaṇesu,
atk-s0402a0:1020_3: diṭṭhigatikesūti attho. Diṭṭhigatikā hi sayaṃ saṃvutāti vuccanti. Saccaṃ musā vāpi
atk-s0402a0:1020_4: paraṃ daheyyāti tesu sayaṃ saṃvutasaṅkhātesu diṭṭhigatikesu tathāgato tādī tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1020_5: ekampi vacanaṃ “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti evaṃ saccaṃ musā vāpi paraṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1020_6: katvā na odaheyya, na saddaheyya, na pattiyāyeyya. Etañca sallanti etaṃ diṭṭhisallaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1020_7: Paṭikacca disvāti puretaraṃ bodhimūleyeva disvā. Visattāti laggā lagitā palibuddhā.
atk-s0402a0:1020_8: Jānāmi passāmi tatheva etanti yathāyaṃ pajā ajjhositā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā visattā
atk-s0402a0:1020_9: laggā lagitā, evaṃ ahampi jānāmi passāmi. Tathā evaṃ yathā etāya pajāya gahitanti
atk-s0402a0:1022_0: 25. Pañcame janakuhanatthanti tīhi kuhanavatthūhi janassa kuhanatthāya. Na janalapanatthanti
atk-s0402a0:1022_1: na janassa upalāpanatthaṃ. Na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsatthanti na cīvarādithutivacanatthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1022_2: Na itivādappamokkhānisaṃsatthanti na tena tena kāraṇena katavādānisaṃsatthaṃ, na
atk-s0402a0:1022_3: vādassa pamokkhānisaṃsatthaṃ. Na iti maṃ jano jānātūti na “evaṃ kira esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0402a0:1022_4: evaṃ kira esa bhikkhū”ti janassa jānanatthāya. Saṃvaratthanti pañcahi saṃvarehi saṃvaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:1022_5: Pahānatthanti tīhi pahānehi pajahanatthāya. Virāgatthanti rāgādīnaṃ virajjanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:1022_6: Nirodhatthanti tesaṃyeva nirujjhanatthāya. Anītihanti itihaparivajjitaṃ, aparapattiyanti
atk-s0402a0:1022_7: attho. Nibbānogadhagāminanti nibbānassa antogāminaṃ. Maggabrahmacariyañhi nibbānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1022_8: ārammaṇaṃ karitvā nibbānassa antoyeva vattati pavattati. Paṭipajjantīti duvidhampi
atk-s0402a0:1022_9: paṭipajjanti. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1024_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe kuhāti kuhakā. Thaddhāti kodhena ca mānena ca thaddhā. Lapāti upalāpakā.
atk-s0402a0:1024_1: Siṅgīti “tattha katamaṃ siṅgaṃ, yaṃ siṅgaṃ siṅgāratā cāturatā cāturiyaṃ parikkhattatā
atk-s0402a0:1024_2: pārikkhattiya”nti evaṃ vuttehi siṅgasadisehi pākaṭakilesehi samannāgatā. Unnaḷāti
atk-s0402a0:1024_3: uggatanaḷā tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitā. Asamāhitāti cittekaggamattassāpi alābhino.
atk-s0402a0:1024_4: Na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakāti te mayhaṃ bhikkhū mama santakā na honti. “Te
atk-s0402a0:1024_5: mayha”nti idaṃ pana satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajitattā vuttaṃ. Te kho me, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:1024_6: bhikkhū māmakāti idhāpi meti attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitattā vadati, sammāpaṭipannattā
atk-s0402a0:1024_7: pana “māmakā”ti āha. Vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantīti sīlādīhi guṇehi vaḍḍhanato
atk-s0402a0:1024_8: vuddhiṃ, niccalabhāvena virūḷhiṃ, sabbattha patthaṭatāya vepullaṃ pāpuṇanti. Te panete
atk-s0402a0:1024_9: yāva arahattamaggā viruhanti, arahattaphalaṃ patte virūḷhā nāma honti. Iti imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1026_0: 27. Sattame appānīti parittāni. Sulabhānīti sukhena laddhabbāni, yattha katthaci
atk-s0402a0:1026_1: sakkā honti labhituṃ. Anavajjānīti niddosāni. Piṇḍiyālopabhojananti jaṅghāpiṇḍiyabalena
atk-s0402a0:1026_2: caritvā ālopamattaṃ laddhaṃ bhojanaṃ. Pūtimuttanti yaṃkiñci muttaṃ. Yathā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi
atk-s0402a0:1026_3: kāyo pūtikāyoti vuccati, evaṃ abhinavampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva.
atk-s0402a0:1027_0: Vighātoti vigataghāto, cittassa dukkhaṃ na hotīti attho. Disā nappaṭihaññatīti yassa
atk-s0402a0:1027_1: hi “asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gato cīvarādīni labhissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa disā
atk-s0402a0:1027_2: paṭihaññati nāma. Yassa evaṃ na uppajjati, tassa nappaṭihaññati nāma. Dhammāti paṭipattidhammā.
atk-s0402a0:1027_3: Sāmaññassānulomikāti samaṇadhammassa anulomā. Adhiggahitāti sabbete tuṭṭhacittassa
atk-s0402a0:1027_4: bhikkhuno adhiggahitā honti antogatā na paribāhirāti.
atk-s0402a0:1029_0: 28. Aṭṭhamassa ajjhāsayiko nikkhepo. Imaṃ kira mahāariyavaṃsasuttantaṃ bhagavā jetavanamahāvihāre
atk-s0402a0:1029_1: dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno attanopi parapuggalānampi ajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0402a0:1029_2: parivāretvā nisinnāni cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni, “bhikkhave”ti āmantetvā cattārome,
atk-s0402a0:1029_3: bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsāti ārabhi. Tattha ariyavaṃsāti ariyānaṃ vaṃsā. Yathā hi khattiyavaṃso
atk-s0402a0:1029_4: brāhmaṇavaṃso vessavaṃso suddavaṃso samaṇavaṃso kulavaṃso rājavaṃso, evaṃ ayampi
atk-s0402a0:1029_5: aṭṭhamo ariyavaṃso ariyatanti ariyapaveṇī nāma hoti. So kho panāyaṃ ariyavaṃso imesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1030_0: Ke pana te ariyā, yesaṃ ete vaṃsāti? Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā
atk-s0402a0:1030_1: ca, etesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. Ito pubbe hi satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1030_2: asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro, saraṇaṅkaro, dīpaṅkaroti cattāro
atk-s0402a0:1030_3: buddhā uppannā, te ariyā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato
atk-s0402a0:1030_4: aparabhāge asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma buddho uppanno…pe… imasmiṃ kappe
atk-s0402a0:1030_5: kakusandho, koṇāgamano, kassapo, amhākaṃ bhagavā gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā,
atk-s0402a0:1030_6: tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. Apica atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ sabbabuddha-paccekabuddha-buddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1031_0: Te kho panete aggaññā aggāti jānitabbā, rattaññā dīgharattaṃ pavattāti jānitabbā,
atk-s0402a0:1031_1: vaṃsaññā vaṃsāti jānitabbā. Porāṇā na adhunuppattikā. Asaṃkiṇṇā avikiṇṇā anapanītā.
atk-s0402a0:1031_2: Asaṃkiṇṇapubbā atītabuddhehipi na saṃkiṇṇapubbā, “ki imehī”ti na apanītapubbā. Na
atk-s0402a0:1031_3: saṃkīyantīti idānipi na apanīyanti. Na saṃkīyissantīti anāgatabuddhehipi na apanīyissanti.
atk-s0402a0:1031_4: Ye loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi appaṭikuṭṭhā, samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi aninditā agarahitā.
atk-s0402a0:1032_0: Santuṭṭho hotīti paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭho hoti. Itarītarenāti na thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1032_1: yena kenaci, atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1032_2: Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti.
atk-s0402a0:1032_3: Piṇḍapātādīsupi eseva nayo. Tesaṃ vitthārakathā “santuṭṭhassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā
atk-s0402a0:1032_4: ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjantī”ti imasmiṃ sutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Iti ime tayo
atk-s0402a0:1032_5: santose sandhāya “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, yathāladdhādīsu yena kenaci
atk-s0402a0:1033_0: Ettha ca cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, paṃsukūlaṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1033_1: jānitabbo, cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni. Tattha cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti
atk-s0402a0:1033_2: khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarāni jānitabbāni. Imāni dvādasa
atk-s0402a0:1033_3: kappiyacīvarāni. Kusacīraṃ, vākacīraṃ, phalakacīraṃ, kesakambalaṃ, vāḷakambalaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1033_4: potthako, cammaṃ, ulūkapakkhaṃ, rukkhadussaṃ, latādussaṃ, erakadussaṃ, kadalidussaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1034_0: Cīvarakkhettanti “saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena, paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1034_1: vā”ti evaṃ uppajjanato cha khettāni, aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasena aṭṭha khettāni jānitabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1035_0: Paṃsukūlanti sosānikaṃ, pāpaṇikaṃ, rathiyaṃ, saṅkārakūṭakaṃ, sotthiyaṃ, sinānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1035_1: titthaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ, aggidaḍḍhaṃ, gokhāyitaṃ, upacikakhāyitaṃ, undūrakhāyitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1035_2: antacchinnaṃ, dasacchinnaṃ, dhajāhaṭaṃ, thūpaṃ, samaṇacīvaraṃ, sāmuddiyaṃ, ābhisekiyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1035_3: panthikaṃ, vātāhaṭaṃ, iddhimayaṃ, devadattiyanti tevīsati paṃsukūlāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1035_4: Ettha ca sotthiyanti gabbhamalaharaṇaṃ. Gatapaccāgatanti matakasarīraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0402a0:1035_5: susānaṃ netvā ānītacīvaraṃ. Dhajāhaṭanti dhajaṃ ussāpetvā tato ānītaṃ. Thūpanti vammike
atk-s0402a0:1035_6: pūjitacīvaraṃ. Sāmuddiyanti samuddavīcīhi thalaṃ pāpitaṃ. Panthikanti panthaṃ gacchantehi
atk-s0402a0:1035_7: corabhayena pāsāṇehi koṭṭetvā pārutacīvaraṃ. Iddhimayanti ehibhikkhucīvaraṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1036_0: Cīvarasantosoti vīsati cīvarasantosā – cīvare vitakkasantoso, gamanasantoso, pariyesanasantoso,
atk-s0402a0:1036_3: parimāṇasantoso, suttasantoso, sibbanasantoso, rajanasantoso, kappasantoso, paribhogasantoso,
atk-s0402a0:1037_0: Tattha sādakabhikkhunā temāsaṃ nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitvā ekamāsamattaṃ vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:1037_1: So hi pavāretvā cīvaramāse cīvaraṃ karoti, paṃsukūliko aḍḍhamāseneva karoti. Idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1037_2: māsaḍḍhamāsamattaṃ vitakkanaṃ vitakkasantoso nāma. Vitakkasantosena pana santuṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:1038_0: Thero kira “cetiyapabbatavihāre cetiyaṃ vandissāmī”ti āgato cetiyaṃ vanditvā cintesi
atk-s0402a0:1038_1: – “mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ, bahūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne labhissāmī”ti. So mahāvihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0402a0:1038_2: saṅghattheraṃ disvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā tattha vuttho punadivase cīvaraṃ ādāya
atk-s0402a0:1038_3: āgantvā theraṃ vandi. Thero “kiṃ, āvuso”ti āha. Gāmadvāraṃ, bhante, gamissāmīti.
atk-s0402a0:1038_4: Ahampāvuso, gamissāmīti. Sādhu, bhanteti gacchanto mahābodhidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:1038_5: “puññavantānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti cintetvā “aparisuddho me vitakko”ti
atk-s0402a0:1038_6: tatova paṭinivatti. Punadivase ambaṅgaṇasamīpato, punadivase mahācetiyassa uttaradvārato
atk-s0402a0:1038_7: tattheva paṭinivattitvā catutthadivase therassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Thero “imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0402a0:1038_8: vitakko na parisuddho bhavissatī”ti cīvaraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃyeva pañhaṃ pucchamāno
atk-s0402a0:1038_9: gāmaṃ pāvisi. Tañca rattiṃ eko manusso uccārapalibuddho sāṭakeyeva vaccaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0402a0:1038_10: saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍesi. Paṃsukūlikatthero taṃ nīlamakkhikāhi samparikiṇṇaṃ disvā
atk-s0402a0:1038_11: añjaliṃ paggahesi. Mahāthero “kiṃ, āvuso, saṅkāraṭṭhānassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhāsī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1038_12: Nāhaṃ, bhante, saṅkāraṭṭhānassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhāmi, mayhaṃ pitu dasabalassa paggaṇhāmi,
atk-s0402a0:1038_13: puṇṇadāsiyā sarīraṃ pārupitvā chaḍḍitaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ tumbamatte pāṇake vidhunitvā susānato
atk-s0402a0:1038_14: gaṇhantena dukkarataraṃ kataṃ, bhanteti. Mahāthero “parisuddho vitakko paṃsukūlikassā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1038_15: cintesi. Paṃsukūlikattheropi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tīṇi phalāni
atk-s0402a0:1038_16: patto taṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā cīvaraṃ katvā pārupitvā pācīnakhaṇḍarājiṃ gantvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:1039_0: Cīvaratthāya gacchantassa pana “kattha labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-s0402a0:1039_1: gamanaṃ gamanasantoso nāma. Pariyesantassa pana yena vā tena vā saddhiṃ apariyesitvā
atk-s0402a0:1039_2: lajjiṃ pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā pariyesanaṃ pariyesanasantoso nāma. Evaṃ pariyesantassa
atk-s0402a0:1039_3: āhariyamānaṃ cīvaraṃ dūrato disvā “etaṃ manāpaṃ bhavissati, etaṃ amanāpa”nti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1039_4: avitakketvā thūlasukhumādīsu yathāladdheneva santussanaṃ paṭilābhasantoso nāma. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1039_5: laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpi “ettakaṃ dupaṭṭassa bhavissati, ettakaṃ ekapaṭṭassā”ti attano
atk-s0402a0:1039_6: pahonakamatteneva santussanaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma. Cīvaraṃ pariyesantassa
atk-s0402a0:1039_7: pana “asukassa gharadvāre manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1040_0: Lūkhapaṇītesu yena kenaci yāpetuṃ sakkontassa yathāladdheneva yāpanaṃ yathālābhasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1040_1: nāma. Attano thāmaṃ jānitvā yena yāpetuṃ sakkoti, tena yāpanaṃ yathābalasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1040_2: Manāpaṃ aññassa datvā attanā yena kenaci yāpanaṃ yathāsāruppasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1041_0: “Kattha udakaṃ manāpaṃ, kattha amanāpa”nti avicāretvā yena kenaci dhovanūpagena udakena
atk-s0402a0:1041_1: dhovanaṃ udakasantoso nāma. Paṇḍumattikagerukapūtipaṇṇarasakiliṭṭhāni pana udakāni
atk-s0402a0:1041_2: vajjetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dhovantassa pana muggarādīhi apaharitvā hatthehi madditvā dhovanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1041_3: dhovanasantoso nāma. Tathā asujjhantaṃ paṇṇāni pakkhipitvā tāpitaudakenāpi dhovituṃ
atk-s0402a0:1041_4: vaṭṭati. Evaṃ dhovitvā karontassa “idaṃ thūlaṃ, idaṃ sukhuma”nti akopetvā pahonakanīhāreneva
atk-s0402a0:1041_5: karaṇaṃ karaṇasantoso nāma. Timaṇḍalapaticchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ parimāṇasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1041_6: nāma. Cīvarakaraṇatthāya pana manāpaṃ suttaṃ pariyesissāmīti avicāretvā rathikādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1041_7: vā devaṭṭhāne vā āharitvā pādamūle vā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃkiñcideva suttaṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ suttasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1042_0: Kusibandhanakāle pana aṅgulamatte satta vāre na vijjhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ karontassa hi
atk-s0402a0:1042_1: yo bhikkhu sahāyo na hoti, tassa vattabhedopi natthi. Tivaṅgulamatte pana satta vāre
atk-s0402a0:1042_2: vijjhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ karontassa maggappaṭipannenāpi sahāyena bhavitabbaṃ. Yo na hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1042_3: tassa vattabhedo. Ayaṃ sibbanasantoso nāma. Rajantena pana kāḷakacchakādīni pariyesantena
atk-s0402a0:1042_4: na caritabbaṃ, somavakkalādīsu yaṃ labhati, tena rajitabbaṃ. Alabhantena pana manussehi
atk-s0402a0:1042_5: araññe vākaṃ gahetvā chaḍḍitarajanaṃ vā bhikkhūhi pacitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ vā gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1042_6: rajitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ rajanasantoso nāma. Nīlakaddamakāḷasāmesu yaṃkiñci gahetvā hatthipiṭṭhe
atk-s0402a0:1043_0: Hirikopīnappaṭicchādanamattavasena paribhuñjanaṃ paribhogasantoso nāma. Dussaṃ pana
atk-s0402a0:1043_1: labhitvā suttaṃ vā sūciṃ vā kārakaṃ vā alabhantena ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, labhantena na
atk-s0402a0:1043_2: vaṭṭati. Katampi sace antevāsikādīnaṃ dātukāmo hoti, te ca asannihitā, yāva āgamanā
atk-s0402a0:1043_3: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Āgatamattesu dātabbaṃ. Dātuṃ asakkontena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Aññasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1043_4: cīvare sati paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati. Anadhiṭṭhitameva hi sannidhi hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1043_5: adhiṭṭhitaṃ na hotīti mahāsīvatthero āha. Ayaṃ sannidhiparivajjanasantoso nāma. Vissajjentena
atk-s0402a0:1043_6: pana na mukhaṃ oloketvā dātabbaṃ, sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvā vissajjetabbanti ayaṃ vissajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1044_0: Cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgañceva tecīvarikaṅgañca. Tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1044_1: vitthārakathā visuddhimagge veditabbā. Iti cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno
atk-s0402a0:1044_2: bhikkhu imāni dve dhutaṅgāni gopeti. Imāni gopento cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsavasena santuṭṭho hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:1045_0: Vaṇṇavādīti eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti. Eko na santuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1045_1: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:1045_2: Eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Taṃ dassetuṃ “itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0402a0:1046_1: ayuttaṃ. Aladdhā cāti alabhitvā. Yathā ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:1046_2: puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0402a0:1046_3: santuṭṭho bhikkhu evaṃ aladdhā cīvaraṃ na paritassati. Laddhā cāti dhammena samena
atk-s0402a0:1046_4: labhitvā. Agadhitoti vigatalobhagiddho. Amucchitoti adhimattataṇhāya mucchaṃ anāpanno.
atk-s0402a0:1046_5: Anajjhopannoti taṇhāya anotthato apariyonaddho. Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca
atk-s0402a0:1046_6: gedhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno. Nissaraṇapaññoti “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1047_0: Itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyāti yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭhiyā. Nevattānukkaṃsetīti
atk-s0402a0:1047_1: “ahaṃ paṃsukūliko, mayā upasampadamāḷeyeva paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ gahitaṃ, ko mayā sadiso
atk-s0402a0:1047_2: atthī”ti attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. No paraṃ vambhetīti “ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1047_3: vā, “paṃsukūlikaṅgamattampi etesaṃ natthī”ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti. Yo hi tattha
atk-s0402a0:1047_4: dakkhoti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose vaṇṇavādādīsu vā dakkho cheko byatto. Analasoti
atk-s0402a0:1047_5: sātaccakiriyāya ālasiyavirahito. Sampajāno paṭissatoti sampajānapaññāya ceva satiyā
atk-s0402a0:1047_6: ca yutto. Ariyavaṃse ṭhitoti ariyavaṃse patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:1048_0: Itarītarena piṇḍapātenāti yena kenaci piṇḍapātena. Etthāpi piṇḍapāto jānitabbo, piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1048_1: jānitabbaṃ, piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabbo, piṇḍapātappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1048_2: Tattha piṇḍapātoti odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsaṃ khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1048_3: telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ yāgu khādanīyaṃ sāyanīyaṃ lehanīyanti soḷasa piṇḍapātā.
atk-s0402a0:1049_0: Piṇḍapātakkhettanti saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1049_1: uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikabhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1049_2: dhurabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ vihārabhattanti pannarasa piṇḍapātakkhettāni.
atk-s0402a0:1050_0: Piṇḍapātasantosoti piṇḍapāte vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1051_0: Tattha sādako bhikkhu mukhaṃ dhovitvā vitakketi. Piṇḍapātikena pana gaṇena saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1051_1: caratā sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānakāle “sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmāti? Asukagāme, bhante”ti
atk-s0402a0:1051_2: ettakaṃ cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya na vitakketabbaṃ. Ekacārikena vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:1051_3: vitakketabbaṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro. Ayaṃ vitakkasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1052_0: Piṇḍāya pavisantena “kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1052_1: gamanasantoso nāma. Pariyesantena yaṃ vā taṃ vā aggahetvā lajjiṃ pesalameva gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1052_2: pariyesitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pariyesanasantoso nāma. Dūratova āhariyamānaṃ disvā “etaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1052_3: etaṃ amanāpa”nti cittaṃ na uppādetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭilābhasantoso nāma. “Imaṃ manāpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1052_4: gaṇhissāmi, imaṃ amanāpaṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti acintetvā yaṃkiñci yāpanamattaṃ gahetabbameva.
atk-s0402a0:1053_0: Ettha pana deyyadhammo bahu, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Deyyadhammopi
atk-s0402a0:1053_1: bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, pamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. Deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyakopi
atk-s0402a0:1053_2: appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyako pana bahuṃ dātukāmo,
atk-s0402a0:1053_3: pamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇasmiñhi mattaṃ ajānanto manussānaṃ pasādaṃ makkheti,
atk-s0402a0:1053_4: saddhādeyyaṃ vinipāteti, sāsanaṃ na karoti, vijātamātuyāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:1053_5: Iti mattaṃ jānitvāva paṭiggahetabbanti ayaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma. Aḍḍhakulāniyeva
atk-s0402a0:1053_6: agantvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ. Ayaṃ loluppavivajjanasantoso nāma. Yathālābhasantosādayo
atk-s0402a0:1054_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā “samaṇadhammaṃ anupālessāmī”ti evaṃ upakāraṃ ñatvā paribhuñjanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1054_1: upakārasantoso nāma. Pattaṃ pūretvā ānītaṃ na paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Anupasampanne sati
atk-s0402a0:1054_2: tena gāhāpetabbaṃ, asati harāpetvā paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ parimāṇasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1054_3: nāma. “Jighacchāya paṭivinodanaṃ idamettha nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ paribhogasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1054_4: nāma. Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbanti ayaṃ sannidhiparivajjanasantoso nāma. Mukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1054_5: anoloketvā sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitena vissajjetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vissajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1055_0: Piṇḍapātappaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1055_1: ekāsanikaṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅganti. Tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0402a0:1055_2: vuttā. Iti piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni
atk-s0402a0:1055_3: gopeti, imāni gopento piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti. Vaṇṇavādītiādīni
atk-s0402a0:1056_0: Senāsanenāti idha senāsanaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1056_1: jānitabbo, senāsanappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tattha senāsananti mañco
atk-s0402a0:1056_2: pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohanaṃ vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā leṇaṃ aṭṭo māḷo veḷugumbo
atk-s0402a0:1056_3: rukkhamūlaṃ yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti imāni pannarasa senāsanāni.
atk-s0402a0:1057: Senāsanakkhettanti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vāti cha khettāni.
atk-s0402a0:1058_0: Senāsanasantosoti senāsane vitakkasantosādayo pannarasa santosā. Te piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva
atk-s0402a0:1058_1: veditabbā. Senāsanappaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni āraññikaṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1058_2: abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsanthatikaṅganti. Tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0402a0:1058_3: vuttā. Iti senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni
atk-s0402a0:1058_4: gopeti. Imāni gopento senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1059: Gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāteyeva paviṭṭho. Tattha yathālābhayathābalayathāsāruppasantoseneva santussitabbaṃ. Nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:1062_0: Iti bhagavā pathaviṃ pattharamāno viya sāgarakucchiṃ pūrayamāno viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayamāno
atk-s0402a0:1062_1: viya ca paṭhamaṃ cīvarasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sūriyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1062_2: ullaṅghento viya ca dutiyaṃ piṇḍapātasantosaṃ kathetvā sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya tatiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1062_3: senāsanasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā idāni sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ catutthaṃ bhāvanārāmaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1062_4: ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetuṃ puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotīti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:1063_0: Tattha āramaṇaṃ ārāmo, abhiratīti attho. Bhāvanāya ārāmo assāti bhāvanārāmo. Bhāvanāya
atk-s0402a0:1063_1: ratoti bhāvanārato. Pañcavidhe pahāne ārāmo assāti pahānārāmo. Apica bhāvento ramatīti
atk-s0402a0:1063_2: bhāvanārāmo. Pajahanto ramatīti pahānārāmoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ayañhi cattāro
atk-s0402a0:1063_3: satipaṭṭhāne bhāvento ramati, ratiṃ vindatīti attho. Tathā cattāro sammappadhāne.
atk-s0402a0:1063_4: Cattāro iddhipāde, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge, satta anupassanā,
atk-s0402a0:1063_5: aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā, sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme, aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo
atk-s0402a0:1063_6: bhāvento ramati, ratiṃ vindati. Kāmacchandādayo pana kilese pajahanto ramati, ratiṃ vindati.
atk-s0402a0:1064_0: Imesu pana catūsu ariyavaṃsesu purimehi tīhi terasannaṃ dhutaṅgānaṃ catupaccayasantosassa
atk-s0402a0:1064_1: ca vasena sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1064_2: Imaṃ pana bhāvanārāmaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathentena bhikkhunā paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā
atk-s0402a0:1064_3: kathetabbo, dīghanikāye dasuttarasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo, majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena
atk-s0402a0:1066_0: “Nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto ramati. Abyāpādaṃ, byāpādaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1066_1: ālokasaññaṃ… thinamiddhaṃ… avikkhepaṃ, uddhaccaṃ… dhammavavatthānaṃ… vicikicchaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1066_2: ñāṇaṃ… avijjaṃ… pāmojjaṃ… aratiṃ… paṭhamajjhānaṃ, pañca nīvaraṇe… dutiyajjhānaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1066_3: vitakkavicāre… tatiyajjhānaṃ… pītiṃ… catutthajjhānaṃ… sukhadukkhe… ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1066_4: bhāvento ramati, rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati. Viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1066_5: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ bhāvento ramati, ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati.
atk-s0402a0:1067_0: “Aniccānupassanaṃ bhāvento ramati, niccasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati. Dukkhānupassanaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1067_1: sukhasaññaṃ… anattānupassanaṃ… attasaññaṃ… nibbidānupassanaṃ… nandiṃ… virāgānupassanaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1067_2: rāgaṃ… nirodhānupassanaṃ… samudayaṃ… paṭinissaggānupassanaṃ… ādānaṃ… khayānupassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1067_3: … ghanasaññaṃ… vayānupassanaṃ… āyūhanaṃ… vipariṇāmānupassanaṃ… dhuvasaññaṃ… animittānupassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1067_4: … nimittaṃ… appaṇihitānupassanaṃ… paṇidhiṃ… suññatānupassanaṃ… abhinivesaṃ… adhipaññādhammavipassanaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1067_7: sotāpattimaggaṃ… diṭṭhekaṭṭhe kilese… sakadāgāmimaggaṃ… oḷārike kilese… anāgāmimaggaṃ…
atk-s0402a0:1067_8: anusahagate kilese… arahattamaggaṃ bhāvento ramati, sabbakilese pajahanto ramatī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1070_0: “Ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati…pe… dasa dhamme bhāvento
atk-s0402a0:1070_1: ramati, dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati. Katamaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati? Kāyagatāsatiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1070_2: sātasahagataṃ, imaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati. Katamaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto
atk-s0402a0:1070_3: ramati? Asmimānaṃ, imaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati. Katame dve dhamme…pe… katame
atk-s0402a0:1070_4: dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati? Dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, ime dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati.
atk-s0402a0:1070_5: Katame dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati? Dasa micchatte, ime dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati.
atk-s0402a0:1070_6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1073_0: “Ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo…pe… yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya. Anissito
atk-s0402a0:1073_1: ca viharati, na ca kiñci loke upādiyati. Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo
atk-s0402a0:1073_2: hoti bhāvanārato. Pahānārāmo hoti pahānarato. Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto
atk-s0402a0:1073_3: vā gacchāmīti pajānāti…pe… puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1073_4: sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ…pe… pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni. So imameva kāyaṃ upasaṃharati ‘ayampi
atk-s0402a0:1073_5: kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto’ti. Iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharati…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1073_6: evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1075_0: Abhidhamme niddesapariyāyenāti sabbepi saṅkhate “aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato
atk-s0402a0:1075_1: …pe… saṃkilesikadhammato passanto ramati, evaṃ kho bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1076_0: Nevattānukkaṃsetīti “ajja me saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti
atk-s0402a0:1076_1: vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti evaṃ attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:1076_2: No paraṃ vambhetīti “aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassanāmattakampi natthi, kiṃ ime vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā
atk-s0402a0:1076_3: carantī”ti evaṃ paravambhanaṃ na karoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:1077_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ariyavaṃsāti, bhikkhave, ime cattāro ariyavaṃsā ariyatantiyo
atk-s0402a0:1077_1: ariyapaveṇiyo ariyañjasā ariyavaṭumānīti suttantaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā idāni mahāariyavaṃsaparipūrakassa
atk-s0402a0:1077_2: bhikkhuno vasanadisā dassento imehi ca pana, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha sveva aratiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1077_3: sahatīti soyeva aratiṃ anabhiratiṃ ukkaṇṭhitaṃ sahati abhibhavati. Na taṃ arati sahatīti
atk-s0402a0:1077_4: taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ yā esā pantesu senāsanesu adhikusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya arati
atk-s0402a0:1077_5: nāma hoti, sā sahituṃ adhibhavituṃ na sakkoti. Aratiratisahoti aratiñca pañcakāmaguṇaratiñca
atk-s0402a0:1078_0: Idāni gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto nāratītiādimāha. Tattha dhīranti vīriyavantaṃ. Nārati
atk-s0402a0:1078_1: dhīraṃ sahatīti idaṃ purimasseva kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā sā dhīraṃ na sahati nappahoti
atk-s0402a0:1078_2: dhīraṃ sahituṃ adhibhavituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā nārati sahati dhīraṃ. Dhīro hi aratissahoti
atk-s0402a0:1078_3: aratisahattā hi so dhīro nāma, tasmā aratiṃ sahatīti attho. Sabbakammavihāyīnanti
atk-s0402a0:1078_4: sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ cajitvā paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ. Panuṇṇaṃ ko
atk-s0402a0:1078_5: nivārayeti kilese panuditvā ṭhitaṃ ko nāma rāgo vā doso vā nivāreyya. Nekkhaṃ jambonadasseva,
atk-s0402a0:1078_6: ko taṃ ninditumarahatīti jambonadasaṅkhātassa jātirattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasadisaṃ garahitabbadosavimuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1078_7: ko taṃ puggalaṃ nindituṃ arahati. Brahmunāpi pasaṃsitoti mahābrahmunāpi esa puggalo
atk-s0402a0:1078_8: pasaṃsitoyevāti. Desanāpariyosāne cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:1080_1: anabhijjhā, byāpādapaṭikkhepena abyāpādo, micchāsatipaṭikkhepena sammāsati, micchāsamādhipaṭikkhepena
atk-s0402a0:1081_0: Anabhijjhālūti nittaṇho hutvā. Abyāpannena cetasāti sabbakālaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantena
atk-s0402a0:1081_1: cittena. Sato ekaggacittassāti satiyā samannāgato ārammaṇe ekaggacitto assa. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1081_2: susamāhitoti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu ṭhapitacitto imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāyapi vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1083_0: 30. Dasame abhiññātāti ñātā pākaṭā. Annabhārotiādīni tesaṃ nāmāni. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti
atk-s0402a0:1083_1: phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito. Sā hi idha paṭisallānanti adhippetā. Paccakkhāyāti paṭikkhipitvā.
atk-s0402a0:1083_2: Abhijjhālunti sataṇhaṃ. Kāmesu tibbasārāganti vatthukāmesu bahalarāgaṃ. Tamahaṃ tattha
atk-s0402a0:1083_3: evaṃ vadeyyanti taṃ ahaṃ tasmiṃ kāraṇe evaṃ vadeyyaṃ. Paṭikkositabbaṃ maññeyyāti
atk-s0402a0:1083_4: paṭikkositabbāni paṭibāhitabbani vā maññeyya. Sahadhammikāti sakāraṇā. Vādānupātāti
atk-s0402a0:1083_5: dhammikavāde ghaṭṭayamānā adhammikavādānupātā, vādappavattiyoti attho. Gārayhā ṭhānāti
atk-s0402a0:1084_0: Ukkalāti ukkalajanapadavāsino. Vassabhaññāti vasso ca bhañño cāti dve janā. Ahetukavādāti
atk-s0402a0:1084_1: “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tievamādivādino. Akiriyavādāti “karoto
atk-s0402a0:1084_2: na karīyati pāpa”nti evaṃ kiriyapaṭikkhepavādino. Natthikavādāti “natthi dinna”ntiādivādino.
atk-s0402a0:1084_3: Te imesu tīsupi dassanesu okkantaniyāmā ahesuṃ. Kathaṃ pana tesu niyāmo hotīti? Yo
atk-s0402a0:1084_4: hi evarūpaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinno sajjhāyati vīmaṃsati,
atk-s0402a0:1084_5: tassa “natthi hetu natthi paccayo karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ…pe… natthi dinnaṃ…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1084_6: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1084_7: hoti, javanāni javanti. Paṭhamajavane satekiccho hoti, tathā dutiyādīsu, sattame
atk-s0402a0:1084_8: buddhānampi atekiccho anivatti ariṭṭhakaṇṭakasadiso hoti. Tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1084_9: okkamati, koci dve, koci tīṇipi. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hoti, patto saggamaggāvaraṇañceva
atk-s0402a0:1084_10: mokkhamaggāvaraṇañca, abhabbo tassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ saggampi gantuṃ, pageva
atk-s0402a0:1084_11: mokkhaṃ. Vaṭṭakhāṇuko nāmesa satto pathavigopako, yebhuyyena evarūpassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1084_12: natthi. Vassabhaññāpi edisā ahesuṃ. Nindābyārosanaupārambhabhayāti attano nindabhayena
atk-s0402a0:1084_13: ghaṭṭanabhayena upavādabhayena cāti attho. Abhijjhāvinaye sikkhanti abhijjhāvinayo
atk-s0402a0:1084_14: vuccati arahattaṃ, arahatte sikkhamāno appamatto nāma vuccatīti suttante vaṭṭaviṭṭaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1086_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame cakkānīti sampattiyo. Catucakkaṃ vattatīti cattāri sampatticakkāni
atk-s0402a0:1086_1: vattanti ghaṭiyantiyevāti attho. Patirūpadesavāsoti yattha catasso parisā sandissanti,
atk-s0402a0:1086_2: evarūpe anucchavike dese vāso. Sappurisāvassayoti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ avassayanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1086_3: sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ, na rājānaṃ. Attasammāpaṇidhīti attano sammā ṭhapanaṃ, sace pubbe
atk-s0402a0:1086_4: assaddhādīhi samannāgato hoti, tāni pahāya saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ. Pubbe ca katapuññatāti
atk-s0402a0:1086_5: pubbe upacitakusalatā. Idameva cettha pamāṇaṃ. Yena hi ñāṇasampayuttacittena kusalakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1086_6: kataṃ hoti, tadeva kusalaṃ taṃ purisaṃ patirūpadese upaneti, sappurise bhajāpeti,
atk-s0402a0:1086_7: so eva ca puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti. Puññakatoti katapuñño. Sukhañcetaṃdhivattatīti
atk-s0402a0:1086_8: sukhañca etaṃ puggalaṃ adhivattati, avattharatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1088_0: 32. Dutiye saṅgahavatthūnīti saṅgaṇhanakāraṇāni. Dānañcātiādīsu ekacco hi dāneneva
atk-s0402a0:1088_1: saṅgaṇhitabbo hoti, tassa dānameva dātabbaṃ. Peyyavajjanti piyavacanaṃ. Ekacco hi
atk-s0402a0:1088_2: “ayaṃ dātabbaṃ nāma deti, ekekena pana vacanena sabbaṃ makkhetvā nāseti, kiṃ tassa
atk-s0402a0:1088_3: dāna”nti vattā hoti. Ekacco “ayaṃ kiñcāpi dānaṃ na deti, kathento pana telena viya
atk-s0402a0:1088_4: makkheti. Esa detu vā mā vā, vacanamevassa sahassaṃ agghatī”ti vattā hoti. Evarūpo
atk-s0402a0:1088_5: puggalo dānaṃ na paccāsīsati, piyavacanameva paccāsīsati. Tassa piyavacanameva vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1088_6: Atthacariyāti atthavaḍḍhanakathā. Ekacco hi neva dānaṃ, na piyavacanaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0402a0:1088_7: attano hitakathaṃ vaḍḍhikathameva paccāsīsati. Evarūpassa puggalassa “idaṃ te kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1088_8: idaṃ na kātabbaṃ, evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo, evarūpo na sevitabbo”ti evaṃ atthacariyakathāva
atk-s0402a0:1088_9: kathetabbā. Samānattatāti samānasukhadukkhabhāvo. Ekacco hi dānādīsu ekampi na paccāsīsati,
atk-s0402a0:1088_10: ekāsane nisajjaṃ, ekapallaṅke sayanaṃ, ekato bhojananti evaṃ samānasukhadukkhataṃ
atk-s0402a0:1088_11: paccāsīsati. So sace gahaṭṭhassa jātiyā pabbajitassa sīlena sadiso hoti, tassāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1088_12: samānattatā kātabbā. Tattha tattha yathārahanti tesu tesu dhammesu yathānucchavikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1088_13: samānattatāti attho. Rathassāṇīva yāyatoti yathā rathassa gacchato āṇi saṅgaho nāma
atk-s0402a0:1088_14: hoti, sā rathaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, evamime saṅgahā lokaṃ saṅgaṇhanti. Na mātā puttakāraṇāti
atk-s0402a0:1088_15: yadi mātā ete saṅgahe puttassa na kareyya, puttakāraṇā mānaṃ vā pūjaṃ vā na labheyya.
atk-s0402a0:1088_16: Saṅgahā eteti upayogavacane paccattaṃ. Saṅgahe eteti vā pāṭho. Samavekkhantīti sammā
atk-s0402a0:1088_17: pekkhanti. Pāsaṃsā ca bhavantīti pasaṃsanīyā ca bhavanti.
atk-s0402a0:1090_0: 33. Tatiye sīhoti cattāro sīhā – tiṇasīho, kāḷasīho, paṇḍusīho, kesarasīhoti. Tesu
atk-s0402a0:1090_1: tiṇasīho kapotavaṇṇagāvisadiso tiṇabhakkho ca hoti. Kāḷasīho kāḷagāvisadiso tiṇabhakkhoyeva.
atk-s0402a0:1090_3: mukhena agganaṅguṭṭhena catūhi ca pādapariyantehi samannāgato, matthakatopissa paṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:1090_4: lākhātūlikāya katā viya tisso rājiyo piṭṭhimajjhena gantvā antarasatthimhi dakkhiṇāvattā
atk-s0402a0:1090_5: hutvā ṭhitā. Khandhe panassa satasahassagghanikakambalaparikkhepo viya kesarabhāro
atk-s0402a0:1090_6: hoti, avasesaṭṭhānaṃ parisuddhasālipiṇḍasaṅkhacuṇṇapiṇḍavaṇṇaṃ hoti. Imesu catūsu
atk-s0402a0:1091_0: Migarājāti sabbamigagaṇassa rājā. Āsayāti vasanaṭṭhānato, suvaṇṇaguhato vā rajatamaṇiphalikamanosilāguhato
atk-s0402a0:1091_1: vā nikkhamatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nikkhamamāno panesa catūhi kāraṇehi nikkhamati andhakārapīḷito
atk-s0402a0:1091_2: vā ālokatthāya, uccārapassāvapīḷito vā tesaṃ vissajjanatthāya, jighacchāpīḷito vā
atk-s0402a0:1091_3: gocaratthāya, sambhavapīḷito vā assaddhammapaṭisevanatthāya. Idha pana gocaratthāya
atk-s0402a0:1092_0: Vijambhatīti suvaṇṇatale vā rajatamaṇiphalikamanosilātalānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ dve
atk-s0402a0:1092_1: pacchimapāde samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā purimapāde purato pasāretvā sarīrassa pacchābhāgaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1092_2: ākaḍḍhitvā purimabhāgaṃ abhiharitvā piṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā asanisaddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1092_3: karonto viya nāsapuṭāni pothetvā sarīralaggaṃ rajaṃ vidhunanto vijambhati. Vijambhanabhūmiyañca
atk-s0402a0:1092_4: pana taruṇavacchako viya aparāparaṃ javati, javato panassa sarīraṃ andhakāre paribbhamantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1093_0: Anuviloketīti kasmā anuviloketi? Parānuddayatāya. Tasmiṃ kira sīhanādaṃ nadante papātāvāṭādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1093_1: visamaṭṭhānesu carantā hatthigokaṇṇamahiṃsādayo pāṇā papātepi āvāṭepi patanti, tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1093_2: anuddayāya anuviloketi. Kiṃ panassa luddassa paramaṃsakhādino anuddayā nāma atthīti?
atk-s0402a0:1093_3: Āma atthi. Tathā hi “kiṃ me bahūhi ghātitehī”ti attano gocaratthāyāpi khuddake pāṇe
atk-s0402a0:1093_4: na gaṇhāti. Evaṃ anuddayaṃ karoti, vuttampi cetaṃ – “māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate
atk-s0402a0:1094_0: Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti tikkhattuṃ tāva abhītanādaṃ nadati. Evañca panassa vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1094_1: ṭhatvā nadantassa saddo samantā tiyojanapadesaṃ ekaninnādaṃ karoti, tamassa ninnādaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1094_2: sutvā tiyojanabbhantaragatā dvipadacatuppadagaṇā yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Gocarāya
atk-s0402a0:1094_3: pakkamatīti āhāratthāya gacchati. Kathaṃ? So hi vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā dakkhiṇato
atk-s0402a0:1094_4: vā vāmato vā uppatanto usabhamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti, uddhaṃ uppatanto cattāripi aṭṭhapi
atk-s0402a0:1094_5: usabhaṭṭhānāni uppatati, same ṭhāne ujukaṃ pakkhandanto soḷasausabhamattampi vīsatiusabhamattampi
atk-s0402a0:1094_6: ṭhānaṃ pakkhandati, thalā vā pabbatā vā pakkhandanto saṭṭhiusabhamattampi asītiusabhamattampi
atk-s0402a0:1094_7: ṭhānaṃ pakkhandati, antarāmagge rukkhaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā taṃ pariharanto vāmato
atk-s0402a0:1094_8: vā dakkhiṇato vā uddhaṃ vā usabhamattaṃ apakkamati. Tatiyaṃ pana sīhanādaṃ naditvā
atk-s0402a0:1094_9: teneva saddhiṃ tiyojane ṭhāne paññāyati, tiyojanaṃ gantvā nivattitvā ṭhito attanova
atk-s0402a0:1094_10: nādassa anunādaṃ suṇāti. Evaṃ sīghena javena pakkamati.
atk-s0402a0:1095_0: Yebhuyyenāti pāyena. Bhayaṃ santāsaṃ saṃveganti sabbaṃ cittutrāsasseva nāmaṃ. Sīhassa
atk-s0402a0:1095_1: hi saddaṃ sutvā bahū bhāyanti, appakā na bhāyanti. Ke pana teti? Samasīho hatthājānīyo
atk-s0402a0:1095_2: assājānīyo usabhājānīyo purisājānīyo khīṇāsavoti. Kasmā panete na bhāyantīti? Samasīho
atk-s0402a0:1095_3: tāva “jātigottakulasūrabhāvehi samānosmī”ti na bhāyati, hatthājānīyādayo attano sakkāyadiṭṭhibalavatāya
atk-s0402a0:1095_4: na bhāyanti, khīṇāsavo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā na bhāyati.
atk-s0402a0:1096_0: Bilāsayāti bile sayantā bilavāsino ahinakulagodhādayo. Udakāsayāti udakavāsino macchakacchapādayo.
atk-s0402a0:1096_1: Vanāsayāti vanavāsino hatthiassagokaṇṇamigādayo. Pavisantīti “idāni āgantvā gaṇhissatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:1096_2: maggaṃ oloketvā pavisanti. Daḷhehīti thirehi. Varattehīti cammarajjūhi. Mahiddhikotiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1096_3: vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā dakkhiṇapassādīhi usabhamattaṃ, ujuṃ vīsatiusabhamattādilaṅghanavasena
atk-s0402a0:1096_4: mahiddhikatā, sesamigānaṃ adhipatibhāvena mahesakkhatā, samantā tiyojanaṭṭhāne saddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1097_0: Evameva khoti bhagavā tesu tesu suttantesu tathā tathā attānaṃ kathesi. “Sīhoti kho,
atk-s0402a0:1097_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti imasmiṃ tāva
atk-s0402a0:1097_2: sutte sīhasadisaṃ attānaṃ kathesi. “Bhisakko sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1097_3: adhivacana”nti imasmiṃ vejjasadisaṃ, “brāhmaṇoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1097_4: adhivacana”nti imasmiṃ brāhmaṇasadisaṃ, “puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1097_5: adhivacana”nti imasmiṃ maggadesakapurisasadisaṃ, “rājāhamasmi, selā”ti imasmiṃ rājasadisaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1097_6: Imasmiṃ pana sutte sīhasadisameva katvā attānaṃ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:1098_0: Tatrāyaṃ sadisatā – sīhassa kañcanaguhādīsu vasanakālo viya hi tathāgatassa dīpaṅkarapādamūle
atk-s0402a0:1098_1: katābhinīhārassa aparimitakālaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā pacchimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇena
atk-s0402a0:1098_2: ceva mātukucchito nikkhamanena ca dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampetvā vuddhimanvāya dibbasampattisadisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1098_3: sampattiṃ anubhavamānassa tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo daṭṭhabbo. Sīhassa kañcanaguhādito
atk-s0402a0:1098_4: nikkhantakālo viya tathāgatassa ekūnatiṃsasaṃvacchare vivaṭena dvārena kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha
atk-s0402a0:1098_5: channasahāyassa nikkhamitvā tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomānadītīre brahmunā dinnāni
atk-s0402a0:1098_6: kāsāyāni paridahitvā pabbajitassa sattame divase rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha piṇḍāya
atk-s0402a0:1098_7: caritvā paṇḍavagiripabbhāre katabhattakiccassa sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamameva magadharaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1099_0: Sīhassa vijambhanakālo viya tathāgatassa dinnapaṭiññassa āḷārakālāmaupasaṅkamanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1099_1: ādiṃ katvā yāva sujātāya dinnapāyāsassa ekūnapaṇṇāsāya piṇḍehi paribhuttakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1099_2: Sīhassa sarīravidhunanaṃ viya sāyanhasamaye sottiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1099_3: dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi thomiyamānassa gandhādīhi pūjiyamānassa tikkhattuṃ bodhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1099_4: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha cuddasahatthubbedhe ṭhāne tiṇasantharaṃ attharitvā
atk-s0402a0:1099_5: caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisinnassa taṃkhaṇaññeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā tīsu yāmesu
atk-s0402a0:1099_6: tisso vijjā visodhetvā anulomappaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamahāsamuddaṃ yamakañāṇamanthanena
atk-s0402a0:1099_7: manthentassa sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭividdhe tadanubhāvena dasasahassilokadhātukampanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
