atk-s0402a0:1100_0: Sīhassa catudisāvilokanaṃ viya paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇassa sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0402a0:1100_2: paṭiggahetvā tattha viharantassa ekādasame divase “sve āsāḷhipuṇṇamā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:1100_3: paccūsasamaye “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti āḷārudakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1100_4: ñatvā dhammadesanatthāya pañcavaggiyānaṃ olokanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīhassa gocaratthāya
atk-s0402a0:1100_5: tiyojanaṃ gamanakālo viya attano pattacīvaraṃ ādāya “pañcavaggiyānaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1100_6: pavattessāmī”ti pacchābhatte ajapālanigrodhato vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gamanakālo.
atk-s0402a0:1101_0: Sīhassa sīhanādakālo viya tathāgatassa aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā pañcavaggiye
atk-s0402a0:1101_1: saññāpetvā acalapallaṅke nisinnassa dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi sannipatitena devagaṇena
atk-s0402a0:1101_2: parivutassa “dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”tiādinā nayena dhammacakkappavattanakālo
atk-s0402a0:1101_3: veditabbo. Imasmiṃ ca pana pade desiyamāne tathāgatasīhassa dhammaghoso heṭṭhā avīciṃ
atk-s0402a0:1101_4: upari bhavaggaṃ gahetvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ paṭicchādesi. Sīhassa saddena khuddakapāṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1101_5: santāsāpajjanakālo viya tathāgatassa tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dīpetvā cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi
atk-s0402a0:1101_6: saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi vibhajitvā dhammaṃ kathentassa dīghāyukānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇasantāsassa
atk-s0402a0:1102_0: Aparo nayo – sīho viya sabbaññutaṃ patto tathāgato, āsayabhūtāya kanakaguhāya nikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1102_1: viya gandhakuṭito nikkhamanakālo, vijambhanaṃ viya dhammasabhaṃ upasaṅkamanakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1102_2: disāvilokanaṃ viya parisāvilokanaṃ, sīhanādanadanaṃ viya dhammadesanākālo, gocarāya
atk-s0402a0:1103_0: Aparo nayo – sīho viya tathāgato, himavantanissitāya kañcanaguhāya nikkhamanaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:1103_1: ārammaṇavasena nibbānanissitāya phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ, vijambhanaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1103_2: disāvilokanaṃ viya veneyyasattavilokanaṃ, sīhanādo viya sampattaparisāya dhammadesanā,
atk-s0402a0:1103_3: gocarāya pakkamanaṃ viya asampattānaṃ veneyyasattānaṃ santikūpasaṅkamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1104_0: Yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Tathāgatoti heṭṭhā vuttehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgato. Loketi
atk-s0402a0:1104_1: sattaloke. Uppajjatīti abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva bodhipallaṅkā vā arahattamaggañāṇā
atk-s0402a0:1104_2: vā uppajjati nāma, arahattaphale pana patte uppanno nāma. Arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotiādīni
atk-s0402a0:1105_0: Iti sakkāyoti ayaṃ sakkāyo, ettako sakkāyo, na ito bhiyyo sakkāyo atthīti. Ettāvatā
atk-s0402a0:1105_1: sabhāvato sarasato pariyantato paricchedato parivaṭumato sabbepi pañcupādānakkhandhā
atk-s0402a0:1105_2: dassitā honti. Iti sakkāyasamudayoti ayaṃ sakkāyassa samudayo nāma. Ettāvatā “āhārasamudayā
atk-s0402a0:1105_3: rūpasamudayo”tiādi sabbaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Iti sakkāyassa atthaṅgamoti ayaṃ sakkāyassa
atk-s0402a0:1105_4: atthaṅgamo. Imināpi “āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”tiādi sabbaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1106_0: Vaṇṇavantoti sarīravaṇṇena vaṇṇavanto. Dhammadesanaṃ sutvāti pañcasu khandhesu paṇṇāsalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1106_1: tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā. Yebhuyyenāti idha ke ṭhapeti? Ariyasāvake deve.
atk-s0402a0:1106_2: Tesaṃ hi khīṇāsavattā cittutrāsabhayampi na uppajjati, saṃviggassa yoniso padhānena
atk-s0402a0:1106_3: pattabbaṃ pattatāya ñāṇasaṃvegopi. Itarāsaṃ pana devatānaṃ “tāso heso, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:1106_6: Iti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhe vaṭṭadosaṃ dassetvā tilakkhaṇāhataṃ katvā dhammaṃ desente
atk-s0402a0:1107_0: Abhiññāyāti jānitvā. Dhammacakkanti paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1107_1: nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhiyā ca
atk-s0402a0:1107_2: nayasahassehi paṭivijjhi. Desanāñāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1107_3: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Ubhayampetaṃ dasabalassa ure jātañāṇameva. Tesu dhammadesanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1107_4: gahetabbaṃ. Taṃ panesa yāva aṭṭhārasabrahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ aññākoṇḍaññattherassa sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1107_5: na uppajjati, tāva pavatteti nāma. Tasmiṃ uppanne pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1107_6: Appaṭipuggaloti sadisapuggalarahito. Yasassinoti parivārasampannā. Tādinoti lābhālābhādīhi ekasadisassa.
atk-s0402a0:1109_0: 34. Catutthe aggesu pasādā, aggā vā pasādāti aggappasādā. Yāvatāti yattakā. Apadāti
atk-s0402a0:1109_1: nippadā ahimacchādayo. Dvipadāti manussapakkhiādayo. Catuppadāti hatthiassādayo.
atk-s0402a0:1109_2: Bahuppadāti satapadiādayo. Nevasaññināsaññinoti bhavagge nibbattasattā. Aggamakkhāyatīti
atk-s0402a0:1109_3: guṇehi aggo uttamo seṭṭhoti akkhāyati. Asaṅkhatāti nibbānameva gahetvā vuttaṃ. Virāgotiādīni
atk-s0402a0:1109_4: nibbānasseva nāmāni. Tañhi āgamma sabbakilesā virajjanti, sabbe rāgamadādayo madā
atk-s0402a0:1109_5: nimmadā honti, abhāvaṃ gacchanti, sabbā pipāsā vinayaṃ upenti, sabbe ālayā samugghātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1109_6: gacchanti, vaṭṭāni upacchijjanti, taṇhā khīyanti, vaṭṭadukkhā nirujjhanti, sabbe
atk-s0402a0:1109_7: pariḷāhā nibbāyanti. Tasmā etāni nāmāni labhati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1111_0: 35. Pañcame anussaritāti anugantvā saritā, aparāparaṃ sarituṃ samatthoti attho. Dakkhoti
atk-s0402a0:1111_1: cheko. Tatrupāyāyāti “imasmiṃ kāle imaṃ nāma kattabba”nti evaṃ tattha tattha upāyabhūtāya
atk-s0402a0:1111_2: paññāya samannāgato. Anumoditabbanti abhinanditabbaṃ. Paṭikkositabbanti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1111_3: Neva kho tyāhanti neva kho te ahaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ bhagavā nābhinandati, nappaṭikkhipatīti?
atk-s0402a0:1111_4: Lokiyattā nābhinandati, lokiyaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā ṭhitattā nappaṭikkosati. Bahussa janatāti
atk-s0402a0:1111_5: bahu assa janatā. Idañca karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ariye ñāyeti sahavipassanake
atk-s0402a0:1111_6: magge. Kalyāṇadhammatā kusaladhammatātipi tasseva nāmāni. Yaṃ vitakkanti nekkhammavitakkādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1111_7: aññataraṃ. Na taṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketīti kāmavitakkādīsu ekampi na vitakketi. Itaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1111_8: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Vitakkapatheti ettha vitakkoyeva vitakkapatho. Ahañhi brāhmaṇātiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1111_9: paṭhamanayena khīṇāsavassa sīlañceva bāhusaccañca kathitaṃ, dutiyatatiyehi khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0402a0:1111_10: kiriyavitakkāni ceva kiriyajjhānāni ca, catutthena khīṇāsavabhāvo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1112: Maccupāsappamocananti maccupāsā pamocanakaṃ maggaṃ. Ñāyaṃ dhammanti sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ. Disvā ca sutvā cāti ñāṇeneva passitvā ca suṇitvā ca. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:1114_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe antarā ca ukkaṭṭhaṃ antarā ca setabyanti ettha ukkaṭṭhāti ukkāhi dhārīyamānāhi
atk-s0402a0:1114_1: māpitattā evaṃladdhavohāraṃ nagaraṃ. Setabyanti atīte kassapasammāsambuddhassa jātanagaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1114_2: Antarāsaddo pana kāraṇakhaṇacittavemajjhavivarādīsu vattati. “Tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya
atk-s0402a0:1114_3: aññatra tathāgatā”ti ca, “janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1114_4: kāraṇe. “Addasā maṃ, bhante, aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1114_5: khaṇe. “Yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu citte. “Antarāvosānamāpādī”tiādīsu vemajjhe.
atk-s0402a0:1114_6: “Apicāyaṃ tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare. Svāyamidha
atk-s0402a0:1114_7: vivare vattati. Tasmā ukkaṭṭhāya ca setabyassa ca vivareti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1114_8: Antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā
atk-s0402a0:1114_9: “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payuñjanti, so dutiyapadenapi
atk-s0402a0:1114_10: yojetabbo hoti, ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Idha pana yojetvā eva vutto.
atk-s0402a0:1115_0: Addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotīti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti, dīghamagganti
atk-s0402a0:1115_1: attho. Kasmā paṭipannoti? Taṃ divasaṃ kira bhagavā idaṃ addasa “mayi taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanne
atk-s0402a0:1115_2: doṇo brāhmaṇo mama padacetiyāni passitvā padānupadiko hutvā mama nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0402a0:1115_3: pañhaṃ pucchissati. Athassāhaṃ ekaṃ saccadhammaṃ desessāmi. Brāhmaṇo tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni
atk-s0402a0:1115_4: paṭivijjhitvā dvādasapadasahassaparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma vaṇṇaṃ vatvā mayi parinibbute
atk-s0402a0:1115_5: sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājessatī”ti. Iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:1115_6: paṭipanno. Doṇopi sudaṃ brāhmaṇoti doṇo brāhmaṇopi tayo vede paguṇe katvā pañcasate
atk-s0402a0:1115_7: māṇavake sippaṃ vācento taṃdivasaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā satagghanakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1115_8: nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ ekaṃsavaragataṃ katvā āmuttayaññasutto rattavaṭṭikā
atk-s0402a0:1115_9: upāhanā ārohitvā pañcasatamāṇavakaparivāro tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1116_0: Pādesūti pādehi akkantaṭṭhānesu. Cakkānīti lakkhaṇacakkāni. Kiṃ pana bhagavato gacchantassa
atk-s0402a0:1116_1: akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ paññāyatīti? Na paññāyati. Kasmā? Sukhumattā mahābalattā mahājanānuggahena
atk-s0402a0:1116_2: ca. Buddhānañhi sukhumacchavitāya akkantaṭṭhānaṃ tūlapicuno patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:1116_3: hoti, padavaḷañjo na paññāyati. Yathā ca balavato vātajavasindhavassa paduminipattepi
atk-s0402a0:1116_4: akkantamattameva hoti, evaṃ mahābalatāya tathāgatena akkantaṭṭhānaṃ akkantamattameva
atk-s0402a0:1116_5: hoti, na tattha padavaḷañjo paññāyati. Buddhānañca anupadaṃ mahājanakāyo gacchati,
atk-s0402a0:1116_6: tassa satthu padavaḷañjaṃ disvā maddituṃ avisahantassa gamanavicchedo bhaveyya. Tasmā
atk-s0402a0:1116_7: akkantaakkantaṭṭhāne yopi padavaḷañjo bhaveyya, so antaradhāyateva. Doṇo pana brāhmaṇo
atk-s0402a0:1116_8: tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānavasena passi. Bhagavā hi yassa padacetiyaṃ dassetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1116_9: taṃ ārabbha “asuko nāma passatū”ti adhiṭṭhāti. Tasmā māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo viya ayampi
atk-s0402a0:1117_0: Pāsādikanti pasādajanakaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Uttamadamathasamathamanuppattanti
atk-s0402a0:1117_1: ettha uttamadamatho nāma arahattamaggo, uttamasamatho nāma arahattamaggasamādhi,
atk-s0402a0:1117_2: tadubhayaṃ pattanti attho. Dantanti nibbisevanaṃ. Guttanti gopitaṃ. Saṃyatindriyanti
atk-s0402a0:1117_3: rakkhitindriyaṃ. Nāganti chandādīhi agacchanato, pahīnakilese puna anāgacchanato,
atk-s0402a0:1117_4: āguṃ akaraṇato, balavantaṭṭhenāti catūhi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1118_0: Devo no bhavaṃ bhavissatīti ettha “devo no bhava”nti ettāvatāpi pucchā niṭṭhitā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:1118_1: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo “anāgate mahesakkho eko devarājā bhavissatī”ti anāgatavasena pucchāsabhāgeneva
atk-s0402a0:1118_2: kathento evamāha. Bhagavāpissa pucchāsabhāgeneva kathento na kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0402a0:1118_3: devo bhavissāmīti āha. Esa nayo sabbattha. Āsavānanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ. Pahīnāti
atk-s0402a0:1118_4: bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇādhigameneva pahīnā. Anupalitto lokenāti taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1118_5: pahīnattā saṅkhāralokena anupalitto. Buddhoti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattā buddho iti maṃ dhārehi.
atk-s0402a0:1119_0: Yenāti yena āsavena. Devūpapatyassāti devūpapatti assa mayhaṃ bhaveyya. Vihaṅgamoti
atk-s0402a0:1119_1: ākāsacaro gandhabbakāyikadevo. Viddhastāti vidhamitā. Vinaḷīkatāti vigatanaḷā vigatabandhanā
atk-s0402a0:1119_2: katā. Vaggūti sundaraṃ. Toyena nupalippatīti udakato ratanamattaṃ accuggamma ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1119_3: saraṃ sobhayamānaṃ bhamaragaṇaṃ hāsayamānaṃ toyena na lippati. Tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇāti
atk-s0402a0:1119_4: desanāpariyosāne tīṇi maggaphalāni pāpuṇitvā dvādasahi padasahassehi doṇagajjitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1119_5: nāma vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, tathāgate ca parinibbute jambudīpatale uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1121_0: 37. Sattame nibbānasseva santiketi nibbānasantikeyeva carati. Sīle patiṭṭhitoti pātimokkhasīle
atk-s0402a0:1121_1: patiṭṭhito. Evaṃ vihārīti evaṃ viharanto. Ātāpīti ātāpena vīriyena samannāgato. Yogakkhemassāti
atk-s0402a0:1121_2: catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa. Pamāde bhayadassivāti pamādaṃ bhayato passanto.
atk-s0402a0:1123_0: 38. Aṭṭhame panuṇṇapaccekasaccoti “idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, idameva sacca”nti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1123_1: pāṭiekkaṃ gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni panuṇṇāni nīhaṭāni pahīnāni assāti
atk-s0402a0:1123_2: panuṇṇapaccekasacco. Samavayasaṭṭhesanoti ettha avayāti anūnā, saṭṭhāti vissaṭṭhā,
atk-s0402a0:1123_3: sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano, sammā vissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1123_4: Patilīnoti nilīno ekībhāvaṃ upagato. Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānanti bahūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1123_5: Ettha ca samaṇāti pabbajjūpagatā, brāhmaṇāti bhovādino. Puthupaccekasaccānīti bahūni
atk-s0402a0:1123_6: pāṭekkasaccāni. Nuṇṇānīti nīhaṭāni. Panuṇṇānīti suṭṭhu nīhaṭāni. Cattānīti vissaṭṭhāni.
atk-s0402a0:1123_7: Vantānīti vamitāni. Muttānīti chinnabandhanāni katāni. Pahīnānīti pajahitāni. Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti
atk-s0402a0:1123_8: yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti, evaṃ paṭinissajjitāni. Sabbānevetāni gahitagahaṇassa
atk-s0402a0:1124_0: Kāmesanā pahīnā hotīti anāgāmimaggena pahīnā. Bhavesanā pana arahattamaggena pahīyati.
atk-s0402a0:1124_2: arahattamaggeneva paṭippassaddhiṃ vūpasamaṃ gacchati. Diṭṭhibrahmacariyesanā pana
atk-s0402a0:1124_3: sotāpattimaggeneva paṭippasambhatīti veditabbā. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhaveti evaṃ catutthajjhānena
atk-s0402a0:1124_4: passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro vūpasantaassāsapassāso nāma hoti. Asmimānoti asmīti uppajjanako navavidhamāno.
atk-s0402a0:1125_0: Gāthāsu kāmesanā bhavesanāti etā dve esanā, brahmacariyesanā sahāti tāhiyeva saha
atk-s0402a0:1125_1: brahmacariyesanāti tissopi etā. Idha ṭhatvā esanā paṭinissaṭṭhāti iminā padena saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1125_2: yojanā kātabbā. Iti saccaparāmāso, diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samussayāti “iti saccaṃ iti sacca”nti
atk-s0402a0:1125_3: gahaṇaparāmāso ca diṭṭhisaṅkhātāyeva diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca ye samussitattā uggantvā ṭhitattā
atk-s0402a0:1125_4: samussayāti vuccanti, te sabbepi. Idha ṭhatvā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti iminā padena
atk-s0402a0:1125_5: saddhiṃ yojanā kātabbā. Kassa pana etā esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā, ete ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti?
atk-s0402a0:1125_6: Sabbarāgavirattassa taṇhākkhayavimuttino. Yo hi sabbarāgehipi viratto, taṇhākkhaye
atk-s0402a0:1125_7: ca nibbāne pavattāya arahattaphalavimuttiyā samannāgato, etassa esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā,
atk-s0402a0:1125_8: diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca samūhatā. Sa ve santoti so evarūpo kilesasantatāya santo. Passaddhoti
atk-s0402a0:1125_9: dvīhi kāyacittapassaddhīhi passaddho. Aparājitoti sabbakilese jinitvā ṭhitattā kenaci
atk-s0402a0:1125_10: aparājito. Mānābhisamayāti mānassa pahānābhisamayena. Buddhoti cattāri saccāni bujjhitvā
atk-s0402a0:1125_11: ṭhito. Iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi khīṇāsavova kathitoti.
atk-s0402a0:1127_0: 39. Navame saṅghātaṃ āpajjantīti vadhaṃ maraṇaṃ āpajjanti. Niccadānanti salākabhattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_1: Anukulayaññanti amhākaṃ pitūhi pitāmahehi dinnattā evaṃ kulānukulavasena yajitabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1127_2: dātabbanti attho. Assamedhantiādīsu assamettha medhantīti assamedho, dvīhi pariyaññehi
atk-s0402a0:1127_3: yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa
atk-s0402a0:1127_4: yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Purisamettha medhantīti purisamedho, catūhi pariyaññehi
atk-s0402a0:1127_5: yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_6: Sammamettha pāsantīti sammāpāso, divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ
atk-s0402a0:1127_7: katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena
atk-s0402a0:1127_8: yajitabbassa sabbayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vājamettha pivantīti vājapeyyaṃ, ekena
atk-s0402a0:1127_9: pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa
atk-s0402a0:1127_10: yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Natthi ettha aggaḷāti niraggaḷo. Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa
atk-s0402a0:1127_11: saddhiṃ bhūmiyā purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0402a0:1127_12: assamedhavikappassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Mahārambhāti mahākiccā mahākaraṇīyā. Apica pāṇātipātasamārambhassa
atk-s0402a0:1127_13: mahantatāyapi mahārambhāyeva. Na te honti mahapphalāti ettha niravasesatthe sāvasesarūpanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1127_14: kataṃ. Tasmā iṭṭhaphalena nipphalāva hontīti attho. Idañca pāṇātipātasamārambhameva
atk-s0402a0:1127_15: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana tattha antarantarā dānaṃ diyyati, taṃ iminā samārambhena
atk-s0402a0:1127_16: upahatattā mahapphalaṃ na hoti, mandaphalaṃ hotīti attho. Haññareti haññanti. Yajanti
atk-s0402a0:1127_17: anukulaṃ sadāti ye aññe anukulaṃ yajanti, pubbapurisehi yiṭṭhattā pacchimapurisāpi
atk-s0402a0:1127_18: yajantīti attho. Seyyo hotīti visesova hoti. Na pāpiyoti pāpaṃ kiñci na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1129_0: 40. Dasame abhisaṅkhatanti rāsikataṃ. Nirārambhanti pāṇasamārambharahitaṃ. Yaññanti
atk-s0402a0:1129_1: deyyadhammaṃ. Tañhi yajitabbattā yaññanti vuccati. Kālenāti yuttappattakālena. Upasaṃyantīti
atk-s0402a0:1129_2: upagacchanti. Kulaṃ gatinti vaṭṭakulañceva vaṭṭagatiñca atikkantā. Yaññassa kovidāti
atk-s0402a0:1129_3: catubhūmakayaññe kusalā. Yaññeti pakatidāne. Saddheti matakadāne. Habyaṃ katvāti
atk-s0402a0:1129_4: hunitabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upakappetvā. Sukhette brahmacārisūti brahmacārisaṅkhāte sukhettamhīti
atk-s0402a0:1129_5: attho. Suppattanti suṭṭhu pattaṃ. Dakkhiṇeyyesu yaṃ katanti yaṃ dakkhiṇāya anucchavikesu
atk-s0402a0:1129_6: upakappitaṃ, taṃ suhutaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ suppattanti attho. Saddhoti buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1129_7: saddahanatāya saddho. Muttena cetasāti vissaṭṭhena cittena. Imināssa muttacāgaṃ dīpetīti.
atk-s0402a0:1131_1: Divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti divāti evaṃ saññaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Yathā divā tathā rattinti
atk-s0402a0:1131_2: yathā divā ālokasaññā manasi katā, tatheva taṃ rattimpi manasi karoti. Dutiyapadepi
atk-s0402a0:1131_3: eseva nayo. Sappabhāsanti dibbacakkhuñāṇobhāsena sahobhāsaṃ. Kiñcāpi ālokasadisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1131_4: kataṃ, attho panettha na evaṃ sallakkhetabbo. Dibbacakkhuñāṇāloko hi idhādhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:1132_0: Viditāti pākaṭā hutvā. Kathaṃ pana vedanā viditā uppajjanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti?
atk-s0402a0:1132_1: Idha bhikkhu vatthuṃ pariggaṇhāti, ārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhāti. Tassa pariggahitavatthārammaṇatāya
atk-s0402a0:1132_2: tā vedanā “evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ ṭhatvā evaṃ nirujjhantī”ti viditā uppajjanti, viditā
atk-s0402a0:1132_3: tiṭṭhanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti nāma. Saññāvitakkesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1133_0: Udayabbayānupassīti udayañca vayañca passanto. Iti rūpanti evaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1133_1: na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti. Iti rūpassa samudayoti evaṃ rūpassa uppādo. Atthaṅgamoti
atk-s0402a0:1133_2: pana bhedo adhippeto. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Idañca pana metaṃ, bhikkhave, sandhāya
atk-s0402a0:1133_3: bhāsitanti, bhikkhave, yaṃ mayā etaṃ puṇṇakapañhe “saṅkhāya lokasmi”ntiādi bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1133_4: taṃ idaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ sandhāya bhāsitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1134_0: Tattha saṅkhāyāti ñāṇena jānitvā. Lokasminti sattaloke. Paroparānīti uccāvacāni uttamādhamāni.
atk-s0402a0:1134_1: Iñjitanti calitaṃ. Natthi kuhiñci loketi lokasmiṃ katthaci ekakkhandhepi ekāyatanepi
atk-s0402a0:1134_2: ekadhātuyāpi ekārammaṇepi natthi. Santoti paccanīkakilesavūpasamena santo. Vidhūmoti
atk-s0402a0:1134_3: kodhadhūmena vigatadhūmo. Evamettha suttante maggekaggatampi kathetvā gāthāya phalasamāpattiyeva kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:1136_0: 42. Dutiye yo ca tesaṃ tattha tattha, jānāti anudhammatanti yo etesaṃ pañhānaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1136_1: tasmiṃ ṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ jānāti. Catupañhassa kusalo, āhu bhikkhuṃ tathāvidhanti tathāvidhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1136_2: bhikkhuṃ tesu catūsu pañhesu kusaloti evaṃ vadanti. Durāsado duppasahoti parehi ghaṭṭetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:1136_3: vā abhibhavituṃ vā na sakkā. Gambhīroti sattasīdantaramahāsamuddo viya gambhīro.
atk-s0402a0:1136_4: Duppadhaṃsiyoti dummocāpayo, gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ na sakkāti attho. Atthe
atk-s0402a0:1136_5: anatthe cāti vaḍḍhiyañca avaḍḍhiyañca. Atthābhisamayāti atthasamāgamena. Dhīro paṇḍitoti
atk-s0402a0:1136_6: pavuccatīti dhitisampanno puggalo “paṇḍito aya”nti evaṃ pavuccati.
atk-s0402a0:1138: 43-44. Tatiye kodhagaru na saddhammagarūti kodhaṃ gāravena garuṃ katvā gaṇhāti, na saddhammaṃ, saddhammaṃ pana agāravena lāmakaṃ katvā gaṇhāti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1139: Virūhantīti vaḍḍhanti, sañjātamūlāya vā saddhāya patiṭṭhahanti acalā bhavanti. Catutthe kodhagarutāti kodhamhi sagāravatā. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0402a0:1141_0: 45. Pañcame yatthāti cakkavāḷalokassa ekokāse bhummaṃ. Na cavati na upapajjatīti
atk-s0402a0:1141_1: idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena gahitaṃ. Gamanenāti padagamanena. Lokassa antanti
atk-s0402a0:1141_2: satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati. Ñāteyyantiādīsu ñātabbaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1141_3: pattabbanti attho. Iti devaputtena cakkavāḷalokassa anto pucchito, satthārā saṅkhāralokassa
atk-s0402a0:1141_4: kathito. So pana “attano pañhena saddhiṃ satthu byākaraṇaṃ sametī”ti saññāya sampahaṃsanto
atk-s0402a0:1142_0: Daḷhadhammāti daḷhadhanu uttamappamāṇena dhanunā samannāgato. Dhanuggahoti dhanuācariyo.
atk-s0402a0:1142_1: Sikkhitoti dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito. Katahatthoti usabhappamāṇepi vālaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1142_2: vijjhituṃ samatthabhāvena katahattho. Katūpāsanoti katasarakkhepo dassitasippo. Asanenāti
atk-s0402a0:1142_3: kaṇḍena. Atipāteyyāti atikkameyya. Yāvatā so tālacchādiṃ atikkameyya, tāvatā kālena
atk-s0402a0:1142_4: ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ atikkamāmīti attano javasampattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:1143_0: Puratthimā samuddā pacchimoti yathā puratthimā samuddā pacchimasamuddo dūre, evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1143_1: me dūre padavītihāro ahosīti vadati. So kira pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhito pādaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1143_2: pasāretvā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkamati, puna dutiyapādaṃ pasāretvā paracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1143_3: atikkamati. Icchāgatanti icchā eva. Aññatrevāti nippapañcataṃ dasseti. Bhikkhācārakāle
atk-s0402a0:1143_4: kiresa nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā kāle sampatte uttarakurumhi
atk-s0402a0:1143_5: piṇḍāya caritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisinno bhattakiccaṃ karoti, tattha muhuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1143_6: vissamitvā puna javati. Vassasatāyukoti tadā dīghāyukakālo hoti, ayaṃ pana vassasatāvasiṭṭhe
atk-s0402a0:1143_7: āyumhi gamanaṃ ārabhi. Vassasatajīvīti taṃ vassasataṃ anantarāyena jīvanto. Antarāyeva
atk-s0402a0:1143_8: kālaṅkatoti cakkavāḷalokassa antaṃ appatvā antarāva mato. So pana tattha kālaṃ katvāpi
atk-s0402a0:1144_0: Appatvāti saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ appatvā. Dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhassa. Antakiriyanti
atk-s0402a0:1144_1: pariyantakaraṇaṃ. Kaḷevareti attabhāve. Sasaññimhi samanaketi sasaññe sacittake.
atk-s0402a0:1144_2: Lokanti dukkhasaccaṃ. Lokasamudayanti samudayasaccaṃ. Lokanirodhanti nirodhasaccaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1144_3: Paṭipadanti maggasaccaṃ. Iti “nāhaṃ, āvuso, imāni cattāri saccāni tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1144_4: paññapemi, imasmiṃ pana catumahābhūtike kāyasmiṃyeva paññapemī”ti dasseti. Samitāvīti
atk-s0402a0:1144_5: samitapāpo. Nāsīsatīti na pattheti. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1146_0: 47. Sattame suvidūravidūrānīti kenaci pariyāyena anāsannāni hutvā suvidūrāneva vidūrāni.
atk-s0402a0:1146_1: Nabhañca, bhikkhave, pathavī cāti ākāsañca mahāpathavī ca. Tattha kiñcāpi pathavito
atk-s0402a0:1146_2: ākāsaṃ nāma na dūre, dvaṅgulamattepi hoti. Aññamaññaṃ alagganaṭṭhena pana “suvidūravidūre”ti
atk-s0402a0:1146_3: vuttaṃ. Verocanoti sūriyo. Satañca, bhikkhave, dhammoti catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedo sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammo.
atk-s0402a0:1147_0: Pabhaṅkaroti ālokakaro. Abyāyiko hotīti avigacchanasabhāvo hoti. Sataṃ samāgamoti
atk-s0402a0:1147_1: paṇḍitānaṃ mittasanthavavasena samāgamo. Yāvāpi tiṭṭheyyāti yattakaṃ addhānaṃ tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0402a0:1147_2: Tatheva hotīti tādisova hoti, pakatiṃ na jahati. Khippaṃ hi vetīti sīghaṃ vigacchati.
atk-s0402a0:1149_0: 48. Aṭṭhame pañcālaputtoti pañcālabrāhmaṇiyā putto. Poriyā vācāyāti paripuṇṇavācāya.
atk-s0402a0:1149_1: Vissaṭṭhāyāti apalibuddhāya. Anelagalāyāti niddosāya ceva agaḷitāya ca apatitapadabyañjanāya.
atk-s0402a0:1149_2: Pariyāpannāyāti vivaṭṭapariyāpannāya. Anissitāyāti vaṭṭaṃ anissitāya. Vivaṭṭanissitameva
atk-s0402a0:1149_3: katvā katheti, vaṭṭanissitaṃ katvā na kathetīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a0:1150_0: Nābhāsamānanti na akathentaṃ. Amataṃ padanti nibbānapadaṃ. Bhāsayeti obhāseyya. Jotayeti
atk-s0402a0:1150_1: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhajanti abbhuggataṭṭhena navalokuttaradhammo
atk-s0402a0:1150_2: isīnaṃ dhajo nāma vuccati, tameva paggaṇheyya ukkhipeyya, uccaṃ katvā katheyyāti
atk-s0402a0:1150_3: attho. Navalokuttaradhammadīpakaṃ subhāsitaṃ dhajo etesanti subhāsitadhajā. Isayoti
atk-s0402a0:1150_4: buddhādayo ariyā. Dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajoti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva lokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:1152_0: 49. Navame saññāvipallāsāti saññāya vipallatthabhāvā, catasso viparītasaññāyoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1152_1: Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāsoti anicce vatthusmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1152_2: “niccaṃ ida”nti evaṃ gahetvā uppajjanakasaññā, saññāvipallāsoti attho. Iminā nayena
atk-s0402a0:1153_0: Anattani ca attāti anattani “attā”ti evaṃsaññinoti attho. Micchādiṭṭhihatāti na kevalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1153_1: saññinova, saññāya viya uppajjamānāya micchādiṭṭhiyāpi hatā. Khittacittāti te saññādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0402a0:1153_2: viya uppajjamānena khittena cittena samannāgatā. Visaññinoti desanāmattametaṃ, viparītasaññācittadiṭṭhinoti
atk-s0402a0:1153_3: attho. Te yogayuttā mārassāti te mārassa yoge yuttā nāma honti. Ayogakkheminoti catūhi
atk-s0402a0:1153_4: yogehi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ appattā. Sattāti puggalā. Buddhāti catusaccabuddhā. Imaṃ dhammanti
atk-s0402a0:1153_5: catusaccadhammaṃ. Sacittaṃ paccaladdhāti sakaṃ cittaṃ paṭilabhitvā. Aniccato dakkhunti
atk-s0402a0:1153_6: aniccabhāvena addasaṃsu. Asubhataddasunti asubhaṃ asubhatoyeva addasaṃsu. Sammādiṭṭhisamādānāti
atk-s0402a0:1153_7: gahitasammādassanā. Sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagunti sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkantā.
atk-s0402a0:1155_0: 50. Dasame upakkilesāti virocituṃ adatvā upakkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇena upakkilesā. Mahikāti
atk-s0402a0:1155_1: himaṃ. Dhūmo rajoti dhūmo ca rajo ca. Rāhūti purimā tayo asampattaupakkilesā, rāhu
atk-s0402a0:1155_2: pana sampattaupakkilesavasena kathitoti veditabbo. Samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti na bhāsanti
atk-s0402a0:1155_3: na virocantīti guṇappatāpena na tapanti, guṇobhāsena na bhāsanti, guṇavirocanena
atk-s0402a0:1155_4: na virocanti. Surāmerayapānā appaṭiviratāti pañcavidhāya surāya catubbidhassa merayassa ca pānato aviratā.
atk-s0402a0:1156_0: Avijjānivutāti avijjāya nivāritā pihitā. Piyarūpābhinandinoti piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1156_1: abhinandamānā tussamānā. Sādiyantīti gaṇhanti. Aviddasūti andhabālā. Sanettikāti
atk-s0402a0:1156_2: taṇhāyotteneva sayottā. Kaṭasinti attabhāvaṃ. Ghoranti kakkhaḷaṃ. Imasmiṃ suttepi
atk-s0402a0:1158_0: 51. Dutiyassa paṭhame puññābhisandāti puññassa abhisandā, puññappattiyoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1158_1: Kusalābhisandāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Te panete sukhaṃ āharantīti sukhassāhārā. Suṭṭhu
atk-s0402a0:1158_2: aggānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ dāyakāti sovaggikā. Sukho nesaṃ vipākoti sukhavipākā. Sagge upapatti
atk-s0402a0:1158_3: saggo, saggāya saṃvattantīti saggasaṃvattanikā. Cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamānoti cīvaratthāya
atk-s0402a0:1158_4: vatthaṃ labhitvā sūcisuttādīnaṃ abhāvena taṃ nikkhipantopi karontopi pārupantopi
atk-s0402a0:1158_5: jiṇṇakāle paccattharaṇaṃ karontopi paccattharitumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ karontopi
atk-s0402a0:1158_7: vuccati. Yadā pana “pādapuñchanampi na sakkā ida”nti sammajjitvā chaḍḍitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1158_8: tadā paribhuñjamāno nāma na hoti. Appamāṇaṃ cetosamādhinti arahattaphalasamādhiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1158_9: Appamāṇo tassa puññābhisandoti iminā dāyakassa puññacetanāya appamāṇataṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:1158_10: Tassa hi “khīṇāsavo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”ti punappunaṃ anussaraṇavasena pavattā
atk-s0402a0:1158_11: puññacetanā appamāṇā hoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Piṇḍapātādīsu pana yo piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1158_12: paribhuñjitvā sattāhampi teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na paribhuñjati, so sattāhampi taṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:1158_13: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjamāno nāma hoti. Ekasmiṃ pana senāsane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1158_14: caṅkamantopi yāva taṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya aññaṃ na gaṇhāti, tāva paribhuñjamāno nāma
atk-s0402a0:1158_15: hoti. Ekena pana bhesajjena byādhimhi vūpasante yāva aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ na paribhuñjati,
atk-s0402a0:1159_0: Bahubheravanti bahūhi bheravārammaṇehi samannāgataṃ. Ratanavarānanti sattannampi
atk-s0402a0:1159_1: vararatanānaṃ. Ālayanti nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Puthū savantīti bahukā hutvā sandamānā. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:1161: 52. Dutiye ariyakantehīti maggaphalasampayuttehi. Tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni honti piyāni manāpāni. Sesaṃ suttante tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva.
atk-s0402a0:1162_0: Gāthāsu pana saddhāti sotāpannassa saddhā adhippetā. Sīlampi sotāpannassa sīlameva.
atk-s0402a0:1162_1: Ujubhūtañca dassananti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvena khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ ujubhūtadassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1162_2: nāma. Āhūti kathayanti. Pasādanti buddhadhammasaṅghesu pasādaṃ. Dhammadassananti
atk-s0402a0:1164_0: 53. Tatiye sambahulāpi kho gahapatī ca gahapatāniyo cāti bahukā gahapatayo ca gahapatāniyo
atk-s0402a0:1164_1: ca āvāhavivāhakaraṇatthāya gacchantā tameva maggaṃ paṭipannā honti. Saṃvāsāti sahavāsā
atk-s0402a0:1164_2: ekatovāsā. Chavo chavāyāti guṇamaraṇena matattā chavo guṇamaraṇeneva matāya chavāya
atk-s0402a0:1164_3: saddhiṃ. Deviyā saddhinti guṇehi devibhūtāya saddhiṃ. Dussīloti nissīlo. Pāpadhammoti
atk-s0402a0:1164_4: lāmakadhammo. Akkosakaparibhāsakoti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosako, bhayaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0402a0:1164_5: santajjanena paribhāsako. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1165_0: Kadariyāti thaddhamaccharino. Jānipatayoti jayampatikā. Vadaññūti yācakānaṃ vacanassa
atk-s0402a0:1165_1: atthaṃ jānanti. Saññatāti sīlasaṃyamena samannāgatā. Dhammajīvinoti dhamme ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:1165_2: jīvikaṃ kappentīti dhammajīvino. Atthāsaṃ pacurā hontīti vaḍḍhisaṅkhātā atthā etesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1165_3: bahū honti. Phāsukaṃ upajāyatīti aññamaññaṃ phāsuvihāro jāyati. Kāmakāminoti kāme kāmayamānā.
atk-s0402a0:1167: 54. Catutthe kammapathavasena desanā pavattitā. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu agārikapaṭipadā kathitā. Sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:1169_0: 55-56. Pañcame tenupasaṅkamīti kimatthaṃ upasaṅkami? Anuggaṇhanatthaṃ. Tathāgato
atk-s0402a0:1169_1: hi taṃ raṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇanto imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthāya pāpuṇāti. Nakulapitā
atk-s0402a0:1169_2: kira pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa pitā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni mahāpitā, pañca jātisatāni
atk-s0402a0:1169_3: cūḷapitā. Nakulamātāpi pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa mātā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni
atk-s0402a0:1169_4: mahāmātā, pañca jātisatāni cūḷamātā. Te satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya puttasinehaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1169_5: paṭilabhitvā “hantāta, hantātā”ti vacchakaṃ disvā vacchagiddhinī gāvī viya viravamānā
atk-s0402a0:1169_6: upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpannā jātā. Nivesane pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1169_7: āsanāni sadā paññattāneva honti. Iti bhagavā tesaṃ anuggaṇhanatthāya upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:1169_8: Aticaritāti atikkamitā. Abhisamparāyañcāti paraloke ca. Samasaddhāti saddhāya samā
atk-s0402a0:1169_9: ekasadisā. Sīlādīsupi eseva nayo. Chaṭṭhaṃ kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ desitaṃ. Sesamettha tādisameva.
atk-s0402a0:1171_0: 57. Sattame pajjanikanti tassa nigamassa nāmaṃ. Koliyānanti kolarājakulānaṃ. Āyuṃ
atk-s0402a0:1171_1: kho pana datvāti āyudānaṃ datvā. Āyussa bhāginī hotīti āyubhāgapaṭilābhinī hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1171_2: āyuṃ vā bhajanikā hoti, āyuppaṭilābhinīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1172_0: Rasasā upetanti rasena upetaṃ rasasampannaṃ. Ujjugatesūti kāyavaṅkādirahitattā ujukameva
atk-s0402a0:1172_1: gatesu khīṇāsavesu. Caraṇūpapannesūti pañcadasahi caraṇadhammehi samannāgatesu. Mahaggatesūti
atk-s0402a0:1172_2: mahattaṃ gatesu. Khīṇāsavānaññevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Puññena puññaṃ saṃsandamānāti puññena
atk-s0402a0:1172_3: saddhiṃ puññaṃ ghaṭayamānā. Mahapphalā lokavidūna vaṇṇitāti evarūpā dānasaṅkhātā
atk-s0402a0:1172_4: dakkhiṇā tividhalokaṃ viditaṃ katvā ṭhitattā lokavidūnaṃ buddhānaṃ vaṇṇitā, buddhehi
atk-s0402a0:1172_5: pasatthāti attho. Yaññamanussarantāti yaññaṃ dānaṃ anussarantā. Vedajātāti tuṭṭhijātā.
atk-s0402a0:1174_0: 58. Aṭṭhame saññatānanti kāyavācāhi saṃyatānaṃ. Paradattabhojinanti parehi dinnameva
atk-s0402a0:1174_1: bhuñjitvā yāpentānaṃ. Kālenāti yuttappattakālena. Sakkacca dadātīti sahatthā sakkāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1174_2: katvā dadāti. Cattāri ṭhānāni anuppavecchatīti cattāri kāraṇāni anuppaveseti dadāti.
atk-s0402a0:1174_3: Yasavā hotīti mahāparivāro hoti. Navamaṃ kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathitaṃ. Sesamettha tādisameva.
atk-s0402a0:1176: 60. Dasame gihisāmīcipaṭipadanti gihīnaṃ anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ. Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti atiharitvā dātukāmatāya patiupaṭṭhito hoti upagato, bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaraṃ detīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1177_0: Upaṭṭhitāti upaṭṭhāyako. Tesaṃ divā ca ratto cāti ye evaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0402a0:1177_1: tesaṃ divā ca rattiñca pariccāgavasena ca anussaraṇavasena ca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
atk-s0402a0:1177_2: Saggañca kamatiṭṭhānanti tādiso ca bhaddakaṃ kammaṃ katvā saggaṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0402a0:1177_3: Imesu catūsupi suttesu āgāriyapaṭipadā kathitā. Sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:1179_0: 61. Dutiyassa paṭhame aniṭṭhapaṭikkhepena iṭṭhā. Mane kamanti pavisantīti kantā.
atk-s0402a0:1179_1: Manaṃ appāyanti pavaḍḍhentīti manāpā. Dullabhāti paramadullabhā. Bhogāti bhuñjitabbā
atk-s0402a0:1179_2: rūpādayo visayā. Sahadhammenāti dhammeneva saddhiṃ uppajjantu, mā dhammūpaghātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1179_3: katvā adhammenāti. Athavā sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena, tena tena senāpatiseṭṭhiṭṭhānādikāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:1179_4: saddhiṃyeva uppajjantūti attho. Yasoti parivārasampatti. Saha ñātībhīti ñātakehi
atk-s0402a0:1179_5: saddhiṃ. Saha upajjhāyehīti sukhadukkhesu upanijjhāyitabbattā upajjhāyasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0402a0:1180_0: Akiccaṃ karotīti akātabbaṃ karoti. Kiccaṃ aparādhetīti kattabbayuttakaṃ kiccaṃ akaronto
atk-s0402a0:1180_1: taṃ aparādheti nāma. Dhaṃsatīti patati parihāyati. Abhijjhāvisamalobhanti abhijjhāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1180_2: visamalobhaṃ. Pajahatīti nudati nīharati. Mahāpaññoti mahantapañño. Puthupaññoti
atk-s0402a0:1180_3: puthulapañño. Āpātadasoti taṃ taṃ atthaṃ āpāteti tameva passati, sukhumampissa atthajātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1181_1: bāhābalena paricitehi vaḍḍhitehi. Sedāvakkhittehīti avakkhittasedehi, sedaṃ muñcitvā
atk-s0402a0:1181_2: vāyāmena payogena samadhigatehīti attho. Dhammikehīti dhammayuttehi. Dhammaladdhehīti
atk-s0402a0:1181_3: dasakusalakammapathadhamme akopetvā laddhehi. Pattakammānīti yuttakammāni anucchavikakammāni.
atk-s0402a0:1181_4: Sukhetīti sukhitaṃ karoti. Pīṇetīti pīṇitaṃ balasampannaṃ karoti. Ṭhānagataṃ hotīti
atk-s0402a0:1181_5: kāraṇagataṃ hoti. Kiṃ pana tanti? Catūsu pattakammesu ekaṃ bhogehi kattabbakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1181_6: bhogajātameva ṭhānagataṃ. Pattagatanti yuttappattaṭṭhānagataṃ. Āyatanaso paribhuttanti
atk-s0402a0:1182_0: Pariyodhāya saṃvattatīti pidahitvā vattati. Yathā aggiādīhi uppannāsu āpadāsu, evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1182_1: ādittagehanibbāpanādīnaṃ atthāya dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā tāsaṃ āpadānaṃ maggaṃ pidahati
atk-s0402a0:1182_2: nivāreti. Sotthiṃ attānaṃ karotīti nirupaddavaṃ khemaṃ attānaṃ karoti. Ñātibalinti
atk-s0402a0:1182_3: ñātakānaṃ baliṃ. Atithibalinti āgantukānaṃ baliṃ. Pubbapetabalinti paralokagatānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1182_4: ñātakānaṃ baliṃ. Rājabalinti rañño kattabbayuttakaṃ rājabaliṃ. Devatābalinti devatānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1182_5: kattabbabaliṃ. Sabbametaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ yathānucchavikavasena dātabbadānassa adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1183_0: Khantisoracce niviṭṭhāti adhivāsanakkhantiyañca susīlatāya ca niviṭṭhā. Ekamattānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1183_1: damentīti ekaṃ attanova attabhāvaṃ indriyadamena damenti. Samentīti attano cittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1183_4: Saggassa hitāti tatrupapattijananato sovaggikā. Nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sukhova vipāko
atk-s0402a0:1183_5: assāti sukhavipākā. Suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ dasannaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato
atk-s0402a0:1184_0: Ariyadhamme ṭhitoti pañcasīladhamme patiṭṭhito. Pecca sagge pamodatīti paralokaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1184_1: gantvā yattha sagge paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti, tattha modati. Sotāpannasakadāgāmino vā
atk-s0402a0:1184_2: hontu anāgāmī vā, sabbesaṃ ayaṃ paṭipadā labbhatevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1186_0: 62. Dutiye adhigamanīyānīti pattabbāni. Kāmabhogināti vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca
atk-s0402a0:1186_1: paribhuñjantena. Atthisukhādīsu atthīti uppajjanakasukhaṃ atthisukhaṃ nāma. Bhoge
atk-s0402a0:1186_2: paribhuñjantassa uppajjanakasukhaṃ bhogasukhaṃ nāma. Anaṇosmīti uppajjanakasukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1186_3: ānaṇyasukhaṃ nāma. Niddoso anavajjosmīti uppajjanakasukhaṃ anavajjasukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1187_0: Bhuñjanti bhuñjamāno. Paññā vipassatīti paññāya vipassati. Ubho bhāgeti dve koṭṭhāse,
atk-s0402a0:1187_1: heṭṭhimāni tīṇi ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ, anavajjasukhaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsanti evaṃ paññāya passamāno
atk-s0402a0:1187_2: dve koṭṭhāse jānātīti attho. Anavajjasukhassetanti etaṃ tividhampi sukhaṃ anavajjasukhassa
atk-s0402a0:1189: 63. Tatiyaṃ tikanipāte vaṇṇitameva. Sapubbadevatānīti padamattameva ettha visesoti. Catutthe sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:1191_0: 65. Pañcame rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno rūpappamāṇo nāma. Rūpappasannoti tasseva
atk-s0402a0:1191_1: atthavacanaṃ. Ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ghosappamāṇo nāma. Cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu
atk-s0402a0:1191_2: pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno lūkhappamāṇo nāma. Dhamme pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno dhammappamāṇo
atk-s0402a0:1191_3: nāma. Itarāni tesaṃyeva atthavacanāni. Sabbasatte ca tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā
atk-s0402a0:1191_4: rūpappamāṇā, eko na rūpappamāṇo. Pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā,
atk-s0402a0:1191_5: eko na ghosappamāṇo. Dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā, eko na lūkhappamāṇo.
atk-s0402a0:1191_6: Satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo, sesā na dhammappamāṇāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1192_0: Rūpe pamāṇiṃsūti ye rūpaṃ disvā pasannā, te rūpe pamāṇiṃsu nāma, pasīdiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1192_1: Ghosena anvagūti ghosena anugatā, ghosappamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasannāti attho. Chandarāgavasūpetāti
atk-s0402a0:1192_2: chandassa ca rāgassa ca vasaṃ upetā. Ajjhattañca na jānātīti niyakajjhatte tassa
atk-s0402a0:1192_3: guṇaṃ na jānāti. Bahiddhā ca na passatīti bahiddhāpissa paṭipattiṃ na passati. Samantāvaraṇoti
atk-s0402a0:1192_4: samantato āvārito, samantā vā āvaraṇamassāti samantāvaraṇo. Ghosena vuyhatīti ghosena
atk-s0402a0:1192_5: niyati, na guṇena. Ajjhattañca na jānāti, bahiddhā ca vipassatīti niyakajjhatte guṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1192_6: na jānāti, bahiddhā panassa paṭipattiṃ passati. Bahiddhā phaladassāvīti tassa parehi
atk-s0402a0:1192_7: kataṃ bahiddhā sakkāraphalaṃ passanto. Vinīvaraṇadassāvīti vivaṭadassāvī. Na so ghosena
atk-s0402a0:1194_0: 66. Chaṭṭhe mohajaṃ cāpaviddasūti mohajaṃ cāpi aviddasū apaṇḍitā. Savighātanti sadukkhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1194_1: Dukhudrayanti āyatiñca dukkhavaḍḍhidāyakaṃ. Acakkhukāti paññācakkhurahitā. Yathā
atk-s0402a0:1194_2: dhammā tathā santāti yathā rāgādayo dhammā ṭhitā, tathā sabhāvāva hutvā. Na tassevanti
atk-s0402a0:1194_3: maññareti mayaṃ evaṃsantā evaṃsabhāvāti tassa na maññare, na maññantīti attho. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1196_0: 67. Sattame imāni cattāri ahirājakulānīti idaṃ daṭṭhavisāneva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ye
atk-s0402a0:1196_1: hi keci daṭṭhavisā, sabbete imesaṃ catunnaṃ ahirājakulānaṃ abbhantaragatāva honti.
atk-s0402a0:1196_2: Attaguttiyāti attano guttatthāya. Attarakkhāyāti attano rakkhaṇatthāya. Attaparittāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1196_3: attano parittāṇatthāya. Parittaṃ nāma anujānāmīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1197_0: Idāni yathā taṃ parittaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ dassento virūpakkhehi metiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0402a0:1197_1: virūpakkhehīti virūpakkhanāgakulehi. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Apādakehīti apādakasattehi.
atk-s0402a0:1197_2: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Sabbe sattāti ito pubbe ettakena ṭhānena odissakamettaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0402a0:1197_3: idāni anodissakamettaṃ kathetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ. Tattha sattā pāṇā bhūtāti sabbānetāni
atk-s0402a0:1197_4: puggalavevacanāneva. Bhadrāni passantūti bhadrāni ārammaṇāni passantu. Mā kañci pāpamāgamāti
atk-s0402a0:1197_5: kañci sattaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mā āgacchatu. Appamāṇo buddhoti ettha buddhoti buddhaguṇā
atk-s0402a0:1197_6: veditabbā. Te hi appamāṇā nāma. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Pamāṇavantānīti guṇappamāṇena
atk-s0402a0:1197_7: yuttāni. Uṇṇanābhīti lomasanābhiko makkaṭako. Sarabūti gharagolikā. Katā me rakkhā,
atk-s0402a0:1197_8: katā me parittāti mayā ettakassa janassa rakkhā ca parittāṇañca kataṃ. Paṭikkamantu
atk-s0402a0:1197_9: bhūtānīti sabbepi me kataparittāṇā sattā apagacchantu, mā maṃ viheṭhayiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1199_0: 68. Aṭṭhame acirapakkante devadatteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā nacirapakkante. Parābhavāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1199_1: avaḍḍhiyā vināsāya. Assatarīti vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa jātā. Attavadhāya
atk-s0402a0:1199_2: gabbhaṃ gaṇhātīti taṃ assena saddhiṃ sampayojenti, sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte
atk-s0402a0:1199_3: vijāyituṃ nasakkontī pādehi bhūmiṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati. Athassā cattāro pāde catūsu
atk-s0402a0:1199_4: khāṇūsu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti. Sā tattheva marati. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1201_0: 69. Navame kilesānaṃ saṃvaratthāya pavesanadvāraṃ pidahanatthāya padhānaṃ saṃvarappadhānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1201_1: pajahanatthāya padhānaṃ pahānappadhānaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ brūhanatthāya vaḍḍhanatthāya
atk-s0402a0:1201_2: padhānaṃ bhāvanāppadhānaṃ, tesaṃyeva anurakkhaṇatthāya padhānaṃ anurakkhaṇāppadhānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1203_0: 70. Dasame adhammikā hontīti porāṇakarājūhi ṭhapitaṃ dasabhāgabaliñceva aparādhānurūpañca
atk-s0402a0:1203_1: daṇḍaṃ aggahetvā atirekabalino ceva atirekadaṇḍassa ca gahaṇena adhammikā. Rājāyuttāti
atk-s0402a0:1203_2: rañño janapadesu kiccasaṃvidhāyakā āyuttakapurisā. Brāhmaṇagahapatikāti antonagaravāsino
atk-s0402a0:1203_3: brāhmaṇagahapatayo. Negamajānapadāti nigamavāsino ceva janapadavāsino ca. Visamanti
atk-s0402a0:1203_4: visamā hutvā, asamayena vāyantīti attho. Visamāti na samā, atithaddhā vā atimudukā
atk-s0402a0:1203_5: vāti attho. Apañjasāti maggato apagatā, ummaggagāmino hutvā vāyantīti attho. Devatā
atk-s0402a0:1203_6: parikupitā bhavantīti vātesu hi visamesu apañjasesu vāyantesu rukkhā bhijjanti, vimānāni
atk-s0402a0:1203_7: bhijjanti. Tasmā devatā parikupitā bhavanti, tā devassa sammā vassituṃ na denti.
atk-s0402a0:1203_8: Tena vuttaṃ devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatīti. Visamapākāni sassāni bhavantīti
atk-s0402a0:1203_9: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne gabbhīni honti, ekasmiṃ sañjātakhīrāni, ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccatīti evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1204_0: Samaṃ nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni parivattantīti yathā kattikapuṇṇamā kattikanakkhattameva
atk-s0402a0:1204_1: labhati, migasirapuṇṇamā migasiranakkhattamevāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ māse sā sā puṇṇamā
atk-s0402a0:1204_2: taṃ taṃ nakkhattameva labhati, tathā sammā parivattanti. Samaṃ vātā vāyantīti avisamā
atk-s0402a0:1204_3: hutvā samayasmiṃyeva vāyanti, cha māse uttarā vātā, cha māsedakkhiṇāti evaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1204_4: tesaṃ janapadānaṃ anurūpe samaye vāyanti. Samāti samappavattino nātithaddhā nātimudū.
atk-s0402a0:1204_5: Pañjasāti maggappaṭipannā, maggeneva vāyanti, no amaggenāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1205_0: Jimhaṃ gacchatīti kuṭilaṃ gacchati, atitthaṃ gaṇhāti. Nette jimhaṃ gate satīti nayatīti
atk-s0402a0:1205_1: nettā. Tasmiṃ nette jimhaṃ gate kuṭilaṃ gantvā atitthaṃ gaṇhante itarāpi atitthameva
atk-s0402a0:1205_2: gaṇhantīti attho. Netetipi pāṭho. Dukkhaṃ setīti dukkhaṃ sayati, dukkhitaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1207: 71. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame apaṇṇakappaṭipadanti aviraddhappaṭipadaṃ. Yoni cassa āraddhā hotīti kāraṇañcassa paripuṇṇaṃ hoti. Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti arahattatthāya. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:1209_0: 73. Tatiye avaṇṇoti aguṇo. Pātu karotīti katheti, pākaṭaṃ karoti. Pañhābhinītoti
atk-s0402a0:1209_1: pañhatthāya abhinīto. Ahāpetvā alambitvāti aparihīnaṃ alambitaṃ katvā. Ettha ca asappuriso
atk-s0402a0:1209_2: pāpicchatāya attano avaṇṇaṃ chādeti, sappuriso lajjitāya attano vaṇṇaṃ. Idāni yasmā
atk-s0402a0:1209_3: asappuriso hirottapparahito saṃvāsena avajānāti, sappuriso pana hirottappasamannāgato
atk-s0402a0:1209_4: saṃvāsenāpi nāvajānāti. Tasmā asappurisabhāvasādhakaṃ adhunāgatavadhukopammaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0402a0:1209_5: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vadhukātiādimāha. Tattha vadhukāti suṇisā. Tibbanti bahalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1211_0: 74-75. Catutthe sīlagganti aggappattaṃ uttamasīlaṃ. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Pañcame
atk-s0402a0:1211_1: rūpagganti yaṃ rūpaṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, idaṃ rūpaggaṃ nāma. Sesesupi
atk-s0402a0:1211_2: eseva nayo. Bhavagganti ettha pana yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, etaṃ bhavaggaṃ nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:1213_0: 76. Chaṭṭhe upavattaneti pācīnagatāya sālapantiyā uttarena nivattitvā ṭhitāya vemajjhaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0402a0:1213_1: Antarena yamakasālānanti dvinnaṃ sālarukkhānaṃ antare. Kaṅkhāti dveḷhakaṃ. Vimatīti
atk-s0402a0:1213_2: vinicchituṃ asamatthatā. “Buddho nu kho na buddho nu kho, dhammo nu kho na dhammo
atk-s0402a0:1213_3: nu kho, saṅgho nu kho na saṅgho nu kho, maggo nu kho na maggo nu kho, paṭipadā nu
atk-s0402a0:1213_4: kho na paṭipadā nu kho”ti yassa saṃsayo uppajjeyya, taṃ vo vadāmi pucchatha, bhikkhaveti
atk-s0402a0:1213_5: ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Satthugāravenapi na puccheyyāthāti “mayaṃ satthu santike
atk-s0402a0:1213_6: pabbajimha, cattāro paccayāpi no satthu santakāva. Te mayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1213_7: akatvā na arahāma ajja pacchime kāle kaṅkhaṃ kātu”nti sace evaṃ satthari gāravena
atk-s0402a0:1213_8: na pucchatha. Sahāyakopi, bhikkhave, sahāyakassa ārocetūti tumhākaṃ yo yassa bhikkhussa
atk-s0402a0:1213_9: sandiṭṭho sambhatto, so tassa ārocetu, ahaṃ ekassa bhikkhussa kathessāmi, tassa kathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1213_10: sutvā sabbe nikkaṅkhā bhavathāti dasseti. Evaṃ pasannoti evaṃ saddahāmi ahanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1213_11: Ñāṇamevāti nikkaṅkhabhāvapaccakkhakaraṇañāṇaṃyeva ettha tathāgatassa, na saddhāmattanti
atk-s0402a0:1213_12: attho. Imesañhi, ānandāti imesaṃ antosāṇiyaṃ nisinnānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1213_13: Yo pacchimakoti yo guṇavasena pacchimako, ānandattheraṃyeva sandhāyāha.
atk-s0402a0:1215_0: 77. Sattame acinteyyānīti cintetuṃ ayuttāni. Na cintetabbānīti acinteyyattāyeva na
atk-s0402a0:1215_1: cintetabbāni. Yāni cintentoti yāni kāraṇāni cintento. Ummādassāti ummattakabhāvassa.
atk-s0402a0:1215_2: Vighātassāti dukkhassa. Buddhavisayoti buddhānaṃ visayo, sabbaññutaññāṇādīnaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1215_3: pavatti ca ānubhāvo ca. Jhānavisayoti abhiññājhānavisayo. Kammavipākoti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1215_4: kammānaṃ vipāko. Lokacintāti “kena nu kho candimasūriyā katā, kena mahāpathavī, kena
atk-s0402a0:1215_5: mahāsamuddo, kena sattā uppāditā, kena pabbatā, kena ambatālanāḷikerādayo”ti evarūpā lokacintā.
atk-s0402a0:1217_0: 78. Aṭṭhame dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyoti dānasaṅkhātāya dakkhiṇāya visujjhanakāraṇāni. Dāyakato
atk-s0402a0:1217_1: visujjhatīti mahapphalabhāvena visujjhati, mahapphalā hotīti attho. Kalyāṇadhammoti
atk-s0402a0:1217_2: sucidhammo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo. Dāyakato visujjhatīti ettha vessantaramahārājā
atk-s0402a0:1217_3: kathetabbo. So hi jūjakabrāhmaṇassa dārake datvā mahāpathaviṃ kampesi. Paṭiggāhakato
atk-s0402a0:1217_4: visujjhatīti ettha kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāravāsī kevaṭṭo kathetabbo. So kira dīghasumattherassa
atk-s0402a0:1217_5: tikkhattuṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā maraṇamañce nipanno “ayyassa maṃ dīghasumattherassa dinnapiṇḍapāto
atk-s0402a0:1217_6: uddharatī”ti āha. Neva dāyakatoti ettha vaḍḍhamānavāsī luddako kathetabbo. So kira
atk-s0402a0:1217_7: petadakkhiṇaṃ dento ekassa dussīlasseva tayo vāre adāsi. Tatiyavāre “amanusso dussīlo
atk-s0402a0:1217_8: maṃ vilumpatī”ti viravi. Ekassa sīlavato bhikkhuno datvā pāpitakāleyevassa pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:1217_9: Dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato cāti ettha asadisadānaṃ kathetabbanti.
atk-s0402a0:1219_0: 79. Navame tādisā vāti taṃsadisāva taṃsarikkhakāva. Chedagāminī hotīti chedaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:1219_1: Yaṃ patthitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nassatīti attho. Na yathādhippāyā hotīti yathājjhāsayā
atk-s0402a0:1219_2: na hoti. Parādhippāyā hotīti parajjhāsayā ajjhāsayato adhikataraphalā hoti. Samaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1219_3: vā brāhmaṇaṃ vāti ettha samitapāpabāhitapāpatāhi samaṇabrāhmaṇatā veditabbā. Vadatu,
atk-s0402a0:1219_4: bhante, paccayenāti, bhante, catubbidhena cīvarādinā paccayena vadeyyāsīti evaṃ pavāreti
atk-s0402a0:1219_5: nimanteti. Yena pavāretīti paricchinditvā yattakena pavāreti. Taṃ na detīti taṃ sabbasova
atk-s0402a0:1219_6: na deti. Na yathādhippāyaṃ detīti yathā tassa ajjhāsayo, evaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, hāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:1219_7: appakaṃ deti. Yathādhippāyaṃ detīti yattakaṃ so icchati, tattakameva deti. Parādhippāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1219_8: detīti appakaṃ pavāretvā avattharitvā bahuṃ deti.
atk-s0402a0:1221_0: 80. Dasame neva sabhāyaṃ nisīdatīti vinicchayakaraṇatthaṃ vinicchayasabhāyaṃ neva
atk-s0402a0:1221_1: nisīdati. Na kammantaṃ payojetīti kasivaṇijjādimahākammantaṃ nappayojeti. Na kambojaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1221_2: gacchatīti bhoge sambharaṇatthāya kambojaraṭṭhaṃ na gacchati. Desanāmattameva cetaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1221_3: yaṃ kiñci tiroraṭṭhaṃ na gacchatīti attho. Kodhanotiādīsu kodhanatāya kodhapariyuṭṭhito
atk-s0402a0:1221_4: atthānatthaṃ na jānāti, issukitāya parasampattiṃ na sahati, maccharitāya dhanaṃ datvā
atk-s0402a0:1221_5: kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, nippaññatāya kiccaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ na sakkoti. Tasmā etāni
atk-s0402a0:1223_0: 81-85. Catutthassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Pañcame “nīce kule paccājāto”tiādikena
atk-s0402a0:1223_1: tamena yuttoti tamo. Kāyaduccaritādīhi puna nirayatamūpagamanato tamaparāyaṇo. Iti
atk-s0402a0:1223_2: ubhayenapi khandhatamova kathito hoti. “Aḍḍhe kule paccājāto”tiādikena jotinā yuttato
atk-s0402a0:1223_3: joti, ālokabhūtoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyasucaritādīhi puna sagguppattijotibhāvūpagamanato
atk-s0402a0:1223_4: jotiparāyaṇo. Iminā nayena itarepi dve veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1224_0: Venakuleti vilīvakārakule. Nesādakuleti migaluddakādīnaṃ kule. Rathakārakuleti cammakārakule.
atk-s0402a0:1224_1: Pukkusakuleti pupphachaḍḍakakule. Kasiravuttiketi dukkhavuttike. Dubbaṇṇoti paṃsupisācako
atk-s0402a0:1224_2: viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. Duddasikoti vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano. Okoṭimakoti lakuṇḍako.
atk-s0402a0:1224_3: Kāṇoti ekacchikāṇo vā ubhayacchikāṇo vā. Kuṇīti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī
atk-s0402a0:1224_4: vā. Khañjoti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo vā. Pakkhahatoti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī.
atk-s0402a0:1224_5: Padīpeyyassāti telakapallādino dīpaupakaraṇassa. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhaveti ettha eko
atk-s0402a0:1224_6: puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātu kucchimhiyeva kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto
atk-s0402a0:1224_7: sakalampi kappaṃ saṃsarati. Sopi tamotamaparāyaṇova. So pana kuhakapuggalo bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:1224_8: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nipphatti hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1225_0: Ettha ca “nīce kule”tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva paccuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-s0402a0:1225_3: lābhī”tiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca, “kāyena duccarita”ntiādīhi
atk-s0402a0:1227_0: 86. Chaṭṭhe oṇatoṇatoti idāni nīcako āyatimpi nīcako bhavissati. Oṇatuṇṇatoti idāni
atk-s0402a0:1227_1: nīco āyatiṃ ucco bhavissati. Uṇṇatoṇatoti idāni ucco āyatiṃ nīco bhavissati. Uṇṇatuṇṇatoti
atk-s0402a0:1227_2: idāni ucco āyatimpi ucco bhavissati. Vitthāro pana nesaṃ purimasuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1229_0: 87. Sattame samaṇamacaloti samaṇaacalo, makāro padasandhikaro, niccalasamaṇoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1229_1: Iminā sattavidhampi sekhaṃ dasseti. So hi sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0402a0:1229_2: acalo nāma. Samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti puṇḍarīkasadiso samaṇo. Puṇḍarīkaṃ nāma ūnasatapattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1229_3: saroruhaṃ. Iminā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavaṃ dasseti. So hi jhānābhiññānaṃ abhāvena
atk-s0402a0:1229_4: aparipuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapuṇḍarīko nāma hoti. Samaṇapadumoti padumasadiso samaṇo.
atk-s0402a0:1229_5: Padumaṃ nāma paripuṇṇasatapattaṃ saroruhaṃ. Iminā ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1229_6: dasseti. So hi jhānābhiññānaṃ bhāvena paripuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapadumo nāma hoti. Samaṇesu
atk-s0402a0:1229_7: samaṇasukhumāloti sabbesupi etesu samaṇesu sukhumālasamaṇo muducittasarīro kāyikacetasikadukkharahito
atk-s0402a0:1229_8: ekantasukhī. Etena attānañceva attasadise ca dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:1230_0: Evaṃ mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā idāni paṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto kathañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1230_1: Tattha sekhoti sattavidhopi sekho. Pāṭipadoti paṭipannako. Anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1230_2: patthayamāno viharatīti arahattaṃ patthayanto viharati. Muddhāvasittassāti muddhani
atk-s0402a0:1230_3: avasittassa, katābhisekassāti attho. Ābhisekoti abhisekaṃ kātuṃ yutto. Anabhisittoti
atk-s0402a0:1230_4: na tāva abhisitto. Macalappattoti rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa puttabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:1230_5: ceva puttesu jeṭṭhakabhāvena ca na tāva abhisittabhāvena ca abhisekappattiatthāya
atk-s0402a0:1230_6: acalappatto niccalapatto. Makāro nipātamattaṃ. Kāyena phusitvāti nāmakāyena phusitvā.
atk-s0402a0:1231_0: Yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatīti “idaṃ, bhante, paribhuñjathā”ti evaṃ dāyakehi
atk-s0402a0:1231_1: yācamāneheva upanītaṃ cīvaraṃ bahuṃ paribhuñjati, kiñcideva ayācitaṃ, bākulatthero
atk-s0402a0:1231_2: viya. Piṇḍapātaṃ khadiravanamagge sīvalitthero viya. Senāsanaṃ aṭṭhakanāgarasutte
atk-s0402a0:1231_3: ānandatthero viya. Gilānapaccayaṃ pilindavacchathero viya. Tyassāti te assa. Manāpenevāti
atk-s0402a0:1231_4: manaṃ allīyanakena. Samudācarantīti kattabbakiccāni karonti pavattanti vā. Upahāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1231_5: upaharantīti kāyikacetasikaupahāraṃ upaharanti upanīyanti. Sannipātikānīti tiṇṇampi
atk-s0402a0:1231_6: sannipātena nibbattāni. Utupariṇāmajānīti utupariṇāmato atisītaatiuṇhaututo jātāni.
atk-s0402a0:1231_8: vadhabandhanādiupakkamena nibbattāni. Kammavipākajānīti vināpi imehi kāraṇehi kevalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1231_9: pubbe katakammavipākavaseneva jātāni. Catunnaṃ jhānānanti ettha khīṇāsavānampi buddhānampi
atk-s0402a0:1233_0: 88. Aṭṭhame sāsane laddhappatiṭṭhattā sotāpannova samaṇamacaloti vutto, nātibahuguṇattā
atk-s0402a0:1233_1: na bahupattaṃ viya saroruhaṃ sakadāgāmī samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti, tato bahutaraguṇattā satapattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1233_2: viya saroruhaṃ anāgāmī samaṇapadumoti, thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattā
atk-s0402a0:1235_0: 89. Navame sammādiṭṭhikotiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena paṭhamasutte viya satta sekhā
atk-s0402a0:1235_2: saddhiṃ, aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena vā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo kathito, tatiyavāre ubhatobhāgavimutto,
atk-s0402a0:1235_3: catutthavāre tathāgato ca tathāgatasadisakhīṇāsavo cāti. Iti idaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamasutte
atk-s0402a0:1235_4: kathitapuggalānaṃ vaseneva kathitaṃ, desanāmattameva panettha nānanti.
atk-s0402a0:1237_0: 90. Dasame paṭhamavāre arahattatthāya payogaṃ anārabhitvā ṭhito pamādavihārī sekhapuggalo
atk-s0402a0:1237_1: kathito. Dutiyavāre anuppāditajjhāno āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī sekhapuggalo
atk-s0402a0:1237_2: kathito. Tatiyavāre āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī sekhapuggalo
atk-s0402a0:1239: 91. Pañcamassa paṭhame asuroti asurasadiso bībhaccho. Devoti devasadiso guṇavasena abhirūpo pāsādiko.
atk-s0402a0:1241_0: 92. Dutiye ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassāti niyakajjhatte appanācittasamādhissa. Adhipaññādhammavipassanāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1243_0: 93. Tatiye yogo karaṇīyoti yuttappayuttatā kattabbā. Chandoti kattukamyatāchando.
atk-s0402a0:1243_1: Vāyāmoti payogo. Ussāhoti tato adhimattataraṃ vīriyaṃ. Ussoḷhīti paṅkalaggasakaṭauddharaṇasadisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1245_0: 94. Catutthe evaṃ kho, āvuso, saṅkhārā daṭṭhabbātiādīsu, āvuso, saṅkhārā nāma aniccato
atk-s0402a0:1245_1: daṭṭhabbā, aniccato sammasitabbā, aniccato passitabbā. Tathā dukkhato, anattatoti
atk-s0402a0:1245_2: evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ kho, āvuso, cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbantiādīsupi paṭhamajjhānavasena,
atk-s0402a0:1245_3: āvuso, cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasena sannisādetabbaṃ, paṭhamajjhānavasena
atk-s0402a0:1245_4: ekodi kātabbaṃ, paṭhamajjhānavasena samādahitabbaṃ. Tathā dutiyajjhānādivasenāti
atk-s0402a0:1245_5: evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. Imesu tīsupi suttesu samathavipassanā lokiyalokuttarāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:1247_0: 95. Pañcame chavālātanti susāne alātaṃ. Majjhe gūthagatanti majjhaṭṭhāne gūthamakkhitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1247_1: Neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharatīti kūṭagopānasithambhasopānādīnaṃ atthāya anupaneyyatāya
atk-s0402a0:1247_2: gāme na kaṭṭhatthaṃ sādheti, khettakuṭipādaṃ vā mañcapādaṃ vā kātuṃ anupaneyyatāya
atk-s0402a0:1247_3: na araññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ sādheti. Dvīsu koṭīsu gayhamānaṃ hatthaṃ ḍahati, majjhe gayhamānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1247_4: gūthena makkheti. Tathūpamanti taṃsarikkhakaṃ. Abhikkantataroti sundarataro. Paṇītataroti
atk-s0402a0:1247_5: uttamataro. Gavā khīranti gāvito khīraṃ. Khīramhā dadhītiādīsu paraṃ paraṃ purimato
atk-s0402a0:1247_6: purimato aggaṃ, sappimaṇḍo pana tesu sabbesupi aggameva. Aggotiādīsu guṇehi aggo
atk-s0402a0:1247_7: ceva seṭṭho ca pamukho ca uttamo ca pavaro cāti veditabbo. Chavālātūpamāya na dussīlo
atk-s0402a0:1247_8: puggalo kathito, appassuto pana vissaṭṭhakammanto goṇasadiso puggalo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1249_0: 97. Sattame khippanisantīti khippanisāmano sīghaṃ jānituṃ samattho. Sutānañca dhammānanti
atk-s0402a0:1249_1: sutappaguṇānaṃ tantidhammānaṃ. Atthūpaparikkhīti atthaṃ upaparikkhako. Atthamaññāya
atk-s0402a0:1249_2: dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā. Dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotīti navalokuttaradhammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1249_3: anurūpadhammabhūtaṃ sasīlakaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti. No ca kalyāṇavācoti
atk-s0402a0:1249_4: na sundaravacano. Na kalyāṇavākkaraṇoti na sundaravacanaghoso hoti. Poriyātiādīhi
atk-s0402a0:1249_5: saddhiṃ no-kāro yojetabboyeva. Guṇaparipuṇṇāya apalibuddhāya adosāya agaḷitapadabyañjanāya
atk-s0402a0:1249_6: atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ samatthāya vācāya samannāgato na hotīti attho. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1251: 98-99. Aṭṭhamaṃ puggalajjhāsayavasenāpi dasabalassa desanāñāṇavilāsenāpi kathitaṃ, navamaṃ pañcaveravasena.
atk-s0402a0:1253_0: 100. Dasame kālenāti yuttappattakālena. Khamatīti ruccati. Yadidaṃ tattha tattha
atk-s0402a0:1253_1: kālaññutāti yā esā tattha tattha kālaṃ jānanā. Taṃ taṃ kālaṃ ñatvā hi avaṇṇārahassa
atk-s0402a0:1253_2: avaṇṇakathanaṃ vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇakathanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ pakatīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:1255_0: 101-2. Tatiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame valāhakāti meghā. Bhāsitā hoti no kattāti “idañcidañca
atk-s0402a0:1255_1: karissāmī”ti kevalaṃ bhāsatiyeva, na karoti. Kattā hoti no bhāsitāti akathetvāva
atk-s0402a0:1255_2: “idañcidañca mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kattā hoti. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. Dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:1257: 103. Tatiye kumbhāti ghaṭā. Tuccho pihitoti rittako pihitamukho. Pūro vivaṭoti udakapuṇṇo apārutamukho. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1259: 104. Catutthe uttāno gambhīrobhāsotiādīsu purāṇapaṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇo kāḷaudako gambhīrobhāso nāma, acchavippasannamaṇivaṇṇaudako uttānobhāso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1261: 105-6. Pañcame āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇīti āmakaṃ hutvā olokentānaṃ pakkasadisaṃ khāyati. Evaṃ sabbapadāni daṭṭhabbāni. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:1263: 107. Sattame yo āvāṭaṃ khaṇati, na ca tattha vasati, so gādhaṃ kattā no vasitāti vuccati. Khantātipi pāṭho. Iminā nayena sabbapadāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1265: 108. Aṭṭhame yo attano gogaṇaṃ maddati, na paragogaṇaṃ, ayaṃ sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍoti evaṃ sabbapadāni veditabbāni. Ubbejetā hotīti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbegapattaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:1267: 109. Navame pheggu phegguparivāroti nissāro pheggurukkho pheggurukkheheva parivuto. Sāraparivāroti khadirādīhi sārarukkheheva parivuto. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0402a0:1269: 110. Dasame āgataviso na ghoravisoti yassa visaṃ āgacchati, ghoraṃ pana na hoti, cirakālaṃ na pīḷeti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti.
atk-s0402a0:1271_0: 111. Dutiyassa paṭhame kesīti tassa nāmaṃ. Assadamme sāretīti assadammasārathi. Saṇhenapi
atk-s0402a0:1271_1: vinetītiādīsu tassa anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā madhurapānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1271_2: pāyetvā muduvacanena samudācaritvā damento saṇhena dameti nāma, jāṇubandhanamukhabandhanādīhi
atk-s0402a0:1271_3: ceva patodavijjhanakasābhighātapharusavacanehi ca damento pharusena dameti nāma,
atk-s0402a0:1271_4: kālena kālaṃ tadubhayaṃ karonto saṇhapharusena dameti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1273_0: 112. Dutiye ajjavenāti ujukabhāvena. Javenāti padavegena. Khantiyāti adhivāsanakkhantiyā.
atk-s0402a0:1273_1: Soraccenāti sucibhāvasīlena. Puggalaguṇaṅgesu javenāti ñāṇajavena. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:1275_0: 113. Tatiye patodacchāyanti vijjhanatthaṃ ukkhittassa patodassa chāyaṃ. Saṃvijjatīti
atk-s0402a0:1275_1: “javo me gahetabbo”ti sallakkhaṇavasena saṃvijjati. Saṃvegaṃ āpajjatīti saṃvegaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1275_2: paṭipajjati lomavedhaviddhoti lomakūpe patodavedhena viddhamatto. Cammavedhaviddhoti
atk-s0402a0:1275_3: chavicammaṃ chindantena patodavedhena viddho. Aṭṭhivedhaviddhoti aṭṭhiṃ bhindantena
atk-s0402a0:1275_4: vedhena viddho. Kāyenāti nāmakāyena. Paramasaccanti nibbānaṃ. Sacchikarotīti passati.
atk-s0402a0:1277_0: 114. Catutthe aṭṭhiṃ katvāti aṭṭhiko hutvā. Tiṇavaninnādasaddānanti ettha tiṇavoti
atk-s0402a0:1277_1: ḍiṇḍimo, ninnādasaddoti sabbesampi ekatomissito mahāsaddo. Ḍaṃsādīsu ḍaṃsāti piṅgalamakkhikā,
atk-s0402a0:1279_0: 115. Pañcame ṭhānānīti kāraṇāni. Anatthāya saṃvattatīti ahitāya avaḍḍhiyā saṃvattati.
atk-s0402a0:1279_2: pāpakammaṃ veditabbaṃ, dutiyaṃ samajīvikānaṃ gihīnaṃ pupphacchaḍḍakādikammaṃ sudhākoṭṭana-gehacchādanaasuciṭṭhānasammajjanādikammañca
atk-s0402a0:1279_4: pavattaṃ pāṇātipātādikammañca veditabbaṃ, catutthaṃ dhammassavanatthāya gamanakāle
atk-s0402a0:1279_5: suddhavatthacchādana-mālāgandhādīnaṃ ādāya gamanaṃ cetiyavandanaṃ bodhivandanaṃ madhuradhammakathāsavanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1279_6: pañcasīlasamādānanti evamādīsu somanassasampayuttaṃ kusalakammaṃ veditabbaṃ. Purisathāmeti
atk-s0402a0:1281_0: 116. Chaṭṭhe yato khoti yadā kho. Samparāyikassāti desanāmattametaṃ, khīṇāsavo pana
atk-s0402a0:1281_1: neva samparāyikassa, na diṭṭhadhammikassa maraṇassa bhāyati. Sova idha adhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:1281_2: Keci pana “sammādiṭṭhi bhāvitāti vacanato sotāpannaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi ariyā adhippetā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:1283_0: 117. Sattame attarūpenāti attano anurūpena anucchavikena, hitakāmenāti attho. Rajanīyesūti
atk-s0402a0:1283_1: rāgassa paccayabhūtesu. Dhammesūti sabhāvesu, iṭṭhārammaṇesūti attho. Evaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0402a0:1283_2: nayo veditabbo. Na rajjatīti diṭṭhivasena na rajjati. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Na
atk-s0402a0:1283_3: ca pana samaṇavacanahetupi gacchatīti samaṇānaṃ paravādīnaṃ vacanahetupi attano diṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1283_4: pahāya tesaṃ diṭṭhivasena na gacchatīti attho. Idhāpi khīṇāsavova adhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:1285_1: Navame jātibhayanti jātiṃ ārabbha uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Dasame
atk-s0402a0:1285_2: aggibhayanti aggiṃ paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1287_0: 121. Tatiyassa paṭhame attānuvādabhayanti attānaṃ anuvadantassa uppajjanakabhayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1287_1: Parānuvādabhayanti parassa anuvādato uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Daṇḍabhayanti dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇā
atk-s0402a0:1287_2: paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Duggatibhayanti cattāro apāye paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1287_3: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, attānuvādabhayantiādīsu attānuvādabhayaṃ tāva paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0402a0:1287_4: ajjhattaṃ hirī samuṭṭhāti, sāssa tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ janeti, tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro
atk-s0402a0:1287_5: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti. So tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale
atk-s0402a0:1287_6: patiṭṭhāti. Parānuvādabhayaṃ pana paccavekkhantassa bahiddhā ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0402a0:1287_7: tadassa tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ janeti, tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1287_8: So tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāti. Duggatibhayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1287_9: paccavekkhantassa ajjhattaṃ hirī samuṭṭhāti, sāssa tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ janeti,
atk-s0402a0:1287_10: tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti. So tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1289_0: 122. Dutiye udakorohantassāti udakaṃ otarantassa. Pāṭikaṅkhitabbānīti icchitabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1289_1: Susukābhayanti caṇḍamacchabhayaṃ. Mukhāvaraṇaṃ maññe karontīti mukhapidahanaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:1289_2: karonti. Odarikattassāti mahodaratāya mahagghasabhāvassa. Arakkhiteneva kāyenātiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1289_3: kāyadvāre tividhassa saṃvarassa abhāvato arakkhitena kāyena. Vacīdvāre catubbidhassa
atk-s0402a0:1291_0: 123. Tatiye tadassādetīti taṃ jhānaṃ sukhassādena assādeti. Nikāmetīti pattheti.
atk-s0402a0:1291_1: Vittiṃ āpajjatīti tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjati. Tadadhimuttoti tasmiṃ adhimutto, taṃ vā adhimutto.
atk-s0402a0:1291_2: Tabbahulavihārīti tena jhānena bahulaṃ viharanto. Sahabyataṃ upapajjatīti sahabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1291_3: gacchati, tattha nibbattatīti attho. Kappo āyuppamāṇanti ettha paṭhamajjhānaṃ atthi
atk-s0402a0:1291_4: hīnaṃ, atthi majjhimaṃ, atthi paṇītaṃ. Tattha hīnena uppannānaṃ kappassa tatiyo koṭṭhāso
atk-s0402a0:1291_5: āyuppamāṇaṃ, majjhimena upaḍḍhakappo, paṇītena kappo. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Nirayampi
atk-s0402a0:1291_6: gacchatīti nirayagamanīyassa kammassa appahīnattā aparāparaṃ gacchati, na anantarameva.
atk-s0402a0:1291_7: Tasmiṃyeva bhave parinibbāyatīti tasmiṃyeva rūpabhave ṭhatvā parinibbāyati, na heṭṭhā
atk-s0402a0:1291_8: otarati. Yadidaṃ gatiyā upapattiyā satīti yaṃ idaṃ gatiyā ca upapattiyā ca sati sekhassa
atk-s0402a0:1291_9: ariyasāvakassa paṭisandhivasena heṭṭhā anotaritvā tasmiṃyeva rūpabhave upari dutiyatatiyādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1291_10: aññatarasmiṃ brahmaloke parinibbānaṃ, puthujjanassa pana nirayādigamanaṃ, idaṃ nānākaraṇanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1292_0: Dve kappāti etthāpi dutiyajjhānaṃ vuttanayeneva tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha paṇītabhāvanena
atk-s0402a0:1292_1: nibbattānaṃ aṭṭhakappā āyuppamāṇaṃ, majjhimena cattāro, hīnena dve. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1292_2: vuttaṃ. Cattāro kappāti ettha yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ “kappo, dve kappā”ti, tampi āharitvā
atk-s0402a0:1292_3: attho veditabbo. Kappoti ca guṇassapi nāmaṃ, tasmā kappo dve kappā cattāro kappāti
atk-s0402a0:1292_4: ayamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo paṭhamaṃ vutto kappo, so dve vāre
atk-s0402a0:1292_5: gaṇetvā ekena guṇena dve kappā honti, dutiyena cattāro, puna te cattāro kappāti imehi
atk-s0402a0:1292_6: catūhi guṇehi guṇitā ekena guṇena aṭṭha honti, dutiyena soḷasa, tatiyena dvattiṃsa,
atk-s0402a0:1292_7: catutthena catusaṭṭhīti. Evamidha paṇītajjhānavasena catusaṭṭhi kappā gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1292_8: Pañca kappasatānīti idaṃ paṇītasseva upapattijjhānassa vasena vuttaṃ. Vehapphalesu
atk-s0402a0:1292_9: vā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiādīsu viya tiṇṇaṃ brahmalokānaṃ abhāvato ettakameva āyuppamāṇaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1294_0: 124. Catutthe rūpameva rūpagataṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Aniccatotiādīsu hutvā
atk-s0402a0:1294_1: abhāvaṭṭhena aniccato, ābādhaṭṭhena rogato, anto padussanaṭṭhena gaṇḍato, anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:1294_2: sallato, sadukkhaṭṭhena aghato, sampīḷanaṭṭhena ābādhato, avidheyyaṭṭhena parato,
atk-s0402a0:1294_3: palujjanaṭṭhena palokato, nissattaṭṭhena suññato, avasavattanaṭṭhena anattato. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:1294_4: ca “aniccato palokato”ti dvīhi padehi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ, “suññato anattato”ti
atk-s0402a0:1294_5: dvīhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ, sesehi dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Samanupassatīti
atk-s0402a0:1294_6: ñāṇena passati. Evaṃ pañcakkhandhe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā passanto tayo magge tīṇi
atk-s0402a0:1294_7: phalāni sacchikaroti. Suddhāvāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatīti tattha ṭhito
atk-s0402a0:1296: 125-126. Pañcame paṭhamajjhānavasena mettā, dutiyādivasena karuṇādayo dassitā. Chaṭṭhaṃ catutthe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1298_0: 127. Sattame pātubhāvāti pātubhāvena. Kucchiṃ okkamatīti ettha kucchiṃ okkanto hotīti
atk-s0402a0:1298_1: attho. Okkante hi tasmiṃ evaṃ hoti, na okkamamāne. Appamāṇoti vuḍḍhippamāṇo, vipuloti
atk-s0402a0:1298_2: attho. Uḷāroti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Devānaṃ devānubhāvanti ettha devānaṃ ayamānubhāvo
atk-s0402a0:1298_3: – nivatthavatthassa pabhā dvādasa yojanāni pharati, tathā sarīrassa, tathā vimānassa,
atk-s0402a0:1298_4: taṃ atikkamitvāti attho. Lokantarikāti tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekeko lokantariko
atk-s0402a0:1298_5: hoti, tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhapitānaṃ majjhe okāso
atk-s0402a0:1298_6: viya. So pana lokantarikanirayo parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo hoti. Aghāti
atk-s0402a0:1298_7: niccavivaṭā. Asaṃvutāti heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā. Andhakārāti tamabhūtā. Andhakāratimisāti
atk-s0402a0:1298_8: cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇato andhabhāvakaraṇatimisāya samannāgatā. Tattha kira cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1298_9: na jāyati. Evaṃmahiddhikānanti candimasūriyā kira ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyanti,
atk-s0402a0:1298_10: evaṃmahiddhikā. Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā
atk-s0402a0:1298_11: ālokaṃ dassenti, evaṃmahānubhāvā. Ābhā nānubhontīti pabhā nappahonti. Te kira cakkavāḷapabbatassa
atk-s0402a0:1298_12: vemajjhena caranti cakkavāḷapabbatañca atikkamitvā lokantaranirayā. Tasmā tesaṃ tattha ābhā nappahonti.
atk-s0402a0:1299_0: Yepi tattha sattāti yepi tasmiṃ lokantaramahāniraye sattā upapannā. Kiṃ pana kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1299_1: katvā tattha uppajjantīti? Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca
atk-s0402a0:1299_2: upari aparādhaṃ, aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādisāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti
atk-s0402a0:1299_3: tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya. Tesaṃ attabhāvo tigāvutiko hoti, vaggulīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1299_4: viya dīghanakhā honti. Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapabbatapāde lagganti.
atk-s0402a0:1299_5: Yadā saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsagatā honti, atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti maññamānā
atk-s0402a0:1299_6: tattha byāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārakaudake patanti, vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni
atk-s0402a0:1299_7: viya chijjitvā udake patanti, patitamattāva accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0402a0:1299_8: Aññepi kira bho santi sattāti bho yathā mayaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāma, evaṃ aññepi
atk-s0402a0:1299_9: kira sattā idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanatthāya idhūpapannāti taṃdivasaṃ passanti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1299_10: pana obhāso ekayāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati. Yāvatā niddāyitvā pabuddho ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1299_11: vibhāveti, tattakaṃ kālaṃ hoti. Dīghabhāṇakā pana “accharāsaṅghātamattameva vijjuobhāso
atk-s0402a0:1299_12: viya niccharitvā kiṃ idanti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:1301_0: 128. Aṭṭhame taṇhādiṭṭhīhi allīyitabbaṭṭhena ālayoti pañca kāmaguṇā, sakalameva vā
atk-s0402a0:1301_1: vaṭṭaṃ. Āramanti etthāti ārāmo, ālayo ārāmo etissāti ālayārāmā. Ālaye ratāti ālayaratā.
atk-s0402a0:1301_2: Ālaye sammuditāti ālayasammuditā. Anālaye dhammeti ālayapaṭipakkhe vivaṭṭūpanissite
atk-s0402a0:1301_3: ariyadhamme. Sussūsatīti sotukāmo hoti. Sotaṃ odahatīti sotaṃ ṭhapeti. Aññā cittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1301_4: upaṭṭhapetīti ājānanatthāya cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti. Mānoti maññanā, maññitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:1301_5: vā sakalaṃ vaṭṭameva. Mānavinaye dhammeti mānavinayadhamme. Upasamapaṭipakkho anupasamo,
atk-s0402a0:1301_6: anupasantaṭṭhena vā vaṭṭameva anupasamo nāma. Opasamiketi upasamakare vivaṭṭūpanissite.
atk-s0402a0:1301_7: Avijjāya gatā samannāgatāti avijjāgatā. Avijjaṇḍakosena pariyonaddhattā aṇḍaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:1301_8: bhūtāti aṇḍabhūtā. Samantato onaddhāti pariyonaddhā. Avijjāvinayeti avijjāvinayo
atk-s0402a0:1301_9: vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃnissite dhamme desiyamāneti attho. Iti imasmiṃ sutte catūsu
atk-s0402a0:1303_0: 129. Navame bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāyāti ye bhagavantaṃ passitukāmā theraṃ upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0402a0:1303_1: ye vā “āyasmā kirānando samantapāsādiko abhirūpo dassanīyo bahussuto saṅghasobhano”ti
atk-s0402a0:1303_2: therassa guṇe sutvā āgacchanti, te sandhāya “bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:1303_3: vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Attamanāti “savanena no dassanaṃ sametī”ti sakamanā tuṭṭhacittā.
atk-s0402a0:1303_4: Dhammanti “kacci, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci yonisomanasikārakammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1303_5: karotha, ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ pūrethā”ti evarūpaṃ paṭisanthāradhammaṃ. Tattha bhikkhunīsu
atk-s0402a0:1303_6: “kacci, bhaginiyo, aṭṭha garudhamme samādāya vattathā”ti idampi nānākaraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1303_7: Upāsakesu “svāgataṃ, upāsaka, na te kiñci sīsaṃ vā aṅgaṃ vā rujjati, arogā te puttabhātaro”ti
atk-s0402a0:1303_8: na evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti, evaṃ pana karoti – “kathaṃ, upāsakā, tīṇi saraṇāni
atk-s0402a0:1303_9: pañca sīlāni rakkhatha, māsassa aṭṭha uposathe karotha, mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhānavattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1303_10: pūretha, dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe paṭijaggathā”ti. Upāsikāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1305_0: 130. Dasame khattiyaparisāti abhisittā anabhisittā ca khattiyā. Te hi kira “rājā
atk-s0402a0:1305_1: cakkavattī nāma abhirūpo pāsādiko hoti, ākāsena vicaranto rajjaṃ anusāsati, dhammiko
atk-s0402a0:1305_2: dhammarājā”ti tassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā savanena dassanamhi samente attamanā honti.
atk-s0402a0:1305_3: Bhāsatīti “kathaṃ, tātā, rājadhammaṃ pūretha, paveṇiṃ rakkhathā”ti paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1305_4: karoti. Brāhmaṇesu pana “kathañca, ācariyā, mante vācetha, antevāsikā mante gaṇhanti,
atk-s0402a0:1305_5: dakkhiṇaṃ vā vatthāni vā sīlaṃ vā labhathā”ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti. Gahapatīsu
atk-s0402a0:1305_6: “kathaṃ, tātā, na vo rājakulato daṇḍena vā bandhanena vā pīḷā atthi, sammā devo dhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1305_7: anuppavecchati, sassāni sampajjantī”ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti. Samaṇesu “kathaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1305_8: bhante, kacci pabbajitaparikkhārā sulabhā, samaṇadhamme nappamajjathā”ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karotīti.
atk-s0402a0:1307_0: 131. Catutthassa paṭhame upapattipaṭilābhiyānīti yehi anantarā upapattiṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a0:1307_1: Bhavapaṭilābhiyānīti upapattibhavassa paṭilābhāya paccayāni. Sakadāgāmissāti idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1307_2: appahīnasaṃyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṃ. Yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa
atk-s0402a0:1307_3: antarā upapatti natthi, yaṃ pana so tattha jhānaṃ samāpajjati, taṃ kusalattā “upapattibhavassa
atk-s0402a0:1307_4: paccayo” teva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Tasmāssa “upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni,
atk-s0402a0:1307_5: bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṃ. Orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṃ upādāya
atk-s0402a0:1307_6: sakadāgāmissa avisesena “orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:1309: 132. Dutiye yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhānoti pañhaṃ kathento yuttameva katheti, sīghaṃ pana na katheti, saṇikameva kathetīti attho. Iminā nayena sabbapadāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1311: 133. Tatiye catunnampi puggalānaṃ iminā suttena viseso veditabbo –
atk-s0402a0:1312_0: “Katamo ca puggalo ugghaṭitaññū, yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0402a0:1312_1: hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ugghaṭitaññū. Katamo ca puggalo vipañcitaññū, yassa puggalassa
atk-s0402a0:1312_2: vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū.
atk-s0402a0:1312_3: Katamo ca puggalo neyyo, yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto
atk-s0402a0:1312_4: kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0402a0:1312_5: puggalo neyyo. Katamo ca puggalo padaparamo, yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi
atk-s0402a0:1312_6: bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1314_0: 134. Catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva
atk-s0402a0:1314_1: labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti, taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ nappaṭilabhati,
atk-s0402a0:1314_2: ayaṃ uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī na kammaphalūpajīvī nāma. Cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:1314_3: sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato kammaphalūpajīvino
atk-s0402a0:1314_4: na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino nāma. Rājarājamahāmattādayo uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino ca kammaphalūpajīvino
atk-s0402a0:1314_5: ca. Nerayikasattā neva uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino na kammaphalūpajīvino. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0402a0:1314_6: puññaphalameva kammaphalanti adhippetaṃ, tañca tesaṃ natthi.
atk-s0402a0:1316_0: 135. Pañcame paṭhamo andhabālaputhujjano, dutiyo antarantarā kusalakārako lokiyaputhujjano,
atk-s0402a0:1316_1: tatiyo sotāpanno, sakadāgāmianāgāminopi eteneva saṅgahitā. Catuttho khīṇāsavo. So
atk-s0402a0:1318_0: 136-137. Chaṭṭhe paṭhamo lokiyamahājano, dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī
atk-s0402a0:1318_1: ca, tatiyo anāgāmī. So hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a0:1318_2: tasmā sukkhavipassakopi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārīyeva. Catuttho khīṇāsavoyeva. So
atk-s0402a0:1318_3: hi sabbesaṃ sīlādipaccanīkānaṃ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma. Sattamepi chaṭṭhe
atk-s0402a0:1320_0: 138. Aṭṭhame nikaṭṭhakāyoti niggatakāyo. Anikaṭṭhacittoti anupaviṭṭhacitto. Kāyeneva
atk-s0402a0:1320_1: gāmato nikkhanto, cittena araññe vasantopi gāmameva paviṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā
atk-s0402a0:1322: 139. Navame asahitanti atthena asaṃyuttaṃ. Na kusalā hotīti na chekā hoti. Sahitāsahitassāti atthanissitassa vā anissitassa vā. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1324_0: 140. Dasame atthato pariyādānaṃ gacchatīti aṭṭhakathaṃ pucchito pariyādānaṃ parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1324_1: gacchati, kathetuṃ na sakkoti. No byañjanatoti byañjanaṃ panassa pavattati na pariyādiyati.
atk-s0402a0:1326: 141. Pañcamassa paṭhame ābhāsanavasena candova candābhā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1328_0: 142-145. Dutiyādīsupi pabhāsanavasena candova candappabhā. Ālokanavasena candova
atk-s0402a0:1328_1: candāloko. Obhāsanavasena candova candobhāso. Pajjotanavasena candova candapajjototi.
atk-s0402a0:1330: 146. Chaṭṭhe kālāti yuttappayuttakālā. Kālena dhammassavananti yuttappayuttakāle dhammassavanaṃ. Dhammasākacchāti pañhapucchanavissajjanavasena pavattā saṃsandanakathā.
atk-s0402a0:1332_0: 147. Sattame kālāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle dhammassavanādivasena pavattānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1332_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Te bhāviyanti ceva anuparivattiyanti ca. Āsavānaṃ khayanti arahattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1334: 149-150. Navame saṇhā vācāti mudukavācā. Mantabhāsāti mantasaṅkhātāya paññāya paricchinditvā kathitakathā. Dasame sīlasāroti sārasampāpakaṃ sīlaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1336_0: 151. Catutthassa paṭhame saddhādhurena indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti saddhindriyaṃ. Sesesupi
atk-s0402a0:1336_1: eseva nayo. Dutiye assaddhiye akampanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tatiye
atk-s0402a0:1338_0: 156. Chaṭṭhe saṃvaṭṭatīti ettha tayo saṃvaṭṭā āposaṃvaṭṭo, tejosaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti.
atk-s0402a0:1338_1: Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti. Yadā kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:1338_2: ābhassarato heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. Yadā āpena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena
atk-s0402a0:1338_3: vilīyati. Yadā vātena saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsati. Vitthārato
atk-s0402a0:1338_4: pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārakathā pana
atk-s0402a0:1340_0: 157. Sattame vighātavāti mahicchāpaccayena vighātena dukkhena samannāgato. Asantuṭṭhoti
atk-s0402a0:1340_1: catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi asantuṭṭho. Anavaññappaṭilābhāyāti parehi anavajānanassa
atk-s0402a0:1340_3: lābhasakkārassa ceva vaṇṇabhaṇanasaṅkhātassa silokassa ca paṭilābhatthāya. Saṅkhāya
atk-s0402a0:1340_4: kulāni upasaṅkamatīti “iti maṃ ete jānissantī”ti jānanatthāya kulāni upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0402a0:1342_0: 158. Aṭṭhame gambhīresūti atthagambhīresu. Ṭhānāṭhānesūti kāraṇākāraṇesu. Na kamatīti
atk-s0402a0:1342_1: nāvagāhati nappavattati. Paññācakkhūti ettha uggahaparipucchāpaññāpi vaṭṭati, sammasanappaṭivedhapaññāpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0402a0:1344_0: 159. Navame ehi tvanti there paṭibaddhacittā taṃ pahiṇituṃ evamāha. Sasīsaṃ pārupitvāti
atk-s0402a0:1344_1: saha sīsena kāyaṃ pārupitvā. Mañcake nipajjīti vegena mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā tattha
atk-s0402a0:1344_2: nipajji. Etadavocāti tassākāraṃ sallakkhetvā lobhappahānatthāya saṇheneva asubhakathaṃ
