atk-s0402a0:1344_3: kathetuṃ etaṃ avoca. Āhārasambhūtoti āhārena sambhūto āhāraṃ nissāya vaḍḍhito. Āhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1344_4: nissāya āhāraṃ pajahatīti paccuppannaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ nissāya taṃ evaṃ yoniso sevamāno
atk-s0402a0:1344_5: pubbakammasaṅkhātaṃ āhāraṃ pajahati. Paccuppannepi pana kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantitaṇhā pajahitabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1345_0: Taṇhaṃ pajahatīti idāni evaṃ pavattaṃ paccuppannataṇhaṃ nissāya vaṭṭamūlikaṃ pubbataṇhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1345_1: pajahati. Ayaṃ pana paccuppannataṇhā kusalā akusalāti? Akusalā. Sevitabbā na sevitabbāti?
atk-s0402a0:1345_2: Sevitabbā. Paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati nākaḍḍhatīti? Nākaḍḍhati. Etissāpi pana paccuppannāya
atk-s0402a0:1345_3: sevitabbataṇhāya nikanti pajahitabbāyeva. So hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṃ khayā upasampajja
atk-s0402a0:1345_4: viharissati, kimaṅgaṃ panāhanti ettha kimaṅgaṃ panāti kāraṇaparivitakkanametaṃ. Idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1345_5: vuttaṃ hoti – so āyasmā arahattaphalaṃ sacchikatvā viharissati, ahaṃ kena kāraṇena
atk-s0402a0:1345_6: na sacchikatvā viharissāmi. Sopi hi āyasmā sammāsambuddhasseva putto, ahampi sammāsambuddhasseva
atk-s0402a0:1345_7: putto, mayhampetaṃ uppajjissatīti. Mānaṃ nissāyāti idaṃ evaṃ uppannasevitabbamānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1345_8: nissāya. Mānaṃ pajahatīti vaṭṭamūlakaṃ pubbamānaṃ pajahati. Yaṃ nissāya panesa taṃ
atk-s0402a0:1345_9: pajahati, sopi taṇhā viya akusalo ceva sevitabbo ca, no ca paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
atk-s0402a0:1346_0: Setughāto vutto bhagavatāti padaghāto paccayaghāto buddhena bhagavatā kathito. Iti
atk-s0402a0:1346_1: imehi catūhi aṅgehi there desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente tassā bhikkhuniyā theraṃ ārabbha uppanno
atk-s0402a0:1346_2: chandarāgo apagañchi. Sāpi theraṃ khamāpetuṃ accayaṃ desesi, theropissā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0402a0:1346_3: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho sā bhikkhunītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1348_0: 160. Dasame duggahitanti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitaṃ. Pariyāpuṇantīti vaḷañjenti kathenti.
atk-s0402a0:1348_1: Padabyañjanehīti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato byañjananti vuttaṃ. Dunnikkhittassāti
atk-s0402a0:1348_2: duṭṭhu nikkhittassa uppaṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitassa. Atthopi dunnayo hotīti aṭṭhakathā nīharitvā
atk-s0402a0:1348_3: kathetuṃ na sakkā hoti. Chinnamūlakoti mūlabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upacchinnattā chinnamūlako.
atk-s0402a0:1348_4: Appaṭisaraṇoti appatiṭṭho. Bāhulikāti paccayabāhullāya paṭipannā. Sāthalikāti tisso
atk-s0402a0:1348_5: sikkhā sithilaggahaṇena gaṇhanakā. Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti pañca nīvaraṇāni avagamanato
atk-s0402a0:1348_6: okkamananti vuccanti, tattha pubbaṅgamāti attho. Paviveketi tividhe viveke. Nikkhittadhurāti
atk-s0402a0:1348_7: nibbīriyā. Iminā nayena pana sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1350_0: 161. Dutiyassa paṭhame sukhapaṭikkhepena dukkhā paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadā etissāti
atk-s0402a0:1350_1: dukkhāpaṭipadā. Asīghappavattitāya garubhāvena dandhā abhiññā etissāti dandhābhiññā.
atk-s0402a0:1352_0: 162. Dutiye abhikkhaṇanti abhiṇhaṃ. Ānantariyanti anantaravipākadāyakaṃ maggasamādhiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1352_1: Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti arahattaphalatthāya. Pañcindriyānīti vipassanāpañcamakāni pañcindriyāni.
atk-s0402a0:1352_2: Paññindriyanti hi ettha vipassanāpaññāva paññindriyanti adhippetaṃ. Sesamettha pāḷivasena uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:1353_0: Imāsaṃ pana paṭipadānaṃ ayaṃ āvibhāvakathā – idha bhikkhu pubbe akatābhiniveso pubbabhāge
atk-s0402a0:1353_1: rūpapariggahe kilamati, arūpapariggahe kilamati, paccayapariggahe kilamati, tīsu
atk-s0402a0:1353_2: addhāsu kilamati, maggāmagge kilamati. Evaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu kilamanto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1353_3: pāpuṇāti. Vipassanaṃ patvāpi udayabbayānupassane, bhaṅgānupassane, bhayatupaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0402a0:1353_5: gotrabhuñāṇeti imesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesupi kilamitvāva lokuttaramaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:1353_6: Tassa so lokuttaramaggo evaṃ dukkhena garubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño
atk-s0402a0:1353_7: nāma jāto. Yo pana pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamanto aparabhāge navasu vipassanāñāṇesu
atk-s0402a0:1353_8: akilamitvāva maggaṃ sacchikaroti, tassa so maggo evaṃ dukkhena agarubhāvena sacchikatattā
atk-s0402a0:1353_9: dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño nāma jāto. Iminā upāyena itarāpi dve veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1354_0: Goṇapariyesakaupamāhi cetā vibhāvetabbā – ekassa hi purisassa cattāro goṇā palāyitvā
atk-s0402a0:1354_1: aṭaviṃ paviṭṭhā. So sakaṇṭake sagahane vane te pariyesanto gahanamaggeneva kicchena
atk-s0402a0:1354_2: kasirena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāneyeva nilīne goṇepi kicchena kasirena addasa. Eko kicchena
atk-s0402a0:1354_3: gantvā abbhokāse ṭhite khippameva addasa. Aparo abbhokāsamaggena sukhena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:1354_4: nilīne kicchena kasirena addasa. Aparo abbhokāsamaggeneva sukhena gantvā abbhokāse
atk-s0402a0:1354_5: ṭhiteyeva khippaṃ addasa. Tattha cattāro goṇā viya cattāro ariyamaggā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0402a0:1354_6: goṇapariyesako puriso viya yogāvacaro, gahanamaggena kicchena kasirena gamanaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:1354_7: pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamato dukkhāpaṭipadā. Gahanaṭṭhāne nilīnānaṃ kiccheneva
atk-s0402a0:1354_8: dassanaṃ viya aparabhāge navasu ñāṇesu kilamantassa ariyamaggānaṃ dassanaṃ. Iminā
atk-s0402a0:1356_0: 163. Tatiye asubhānupassī kāye viharatīti attano karajakāye “yathā etaṃ, tathā ida”nti
atk-s0402a0:1356_1: iminā nayena bahiddhā diṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ asubhānaṃ upasaṃharaṇavasena asubhānupassī
atk-s0402a0:1356_2: viharati, attano kāyaṃ asubhato paṭikūlato ñāṇena passatīti attho. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññīti
atk-s0402a0:1356_3: navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlasaññī. Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññīti
atk-s0402a0:1356_4: sabbasmimpi tedhātuke lokasannivāse anabhiratāya ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgato. Sabbasaṅkhāresu
atk-s0402a0:1356_5: aniccānupassīti sabbepi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccato anupassanto. Maraṇasaññāti maraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1356_6: ārabbha uppannasaññā. Ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā
atk-s0402a0:1356_7: hoti. Ettāvatā balavavipassanā kathitā. Sekhabalānīti sikkhanakānaṃ balāni. Sesamettha
atk-s0402a0:1356_8: pāḷivasena uttānameva. “Asubhānupassī”tiādīni pana dukkhāya paṭipadāya dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1356_9: vuttāni, paṭhamajjhānādīni sukhāya. Asubhādīni hi paṭikūlārammaṇāni, tesu pana pakatiyāva
atk-s0402a0:1356_10: sampiyāyamānaṃ cittaṃ allīyati. Tasmā tāni bhāvento dukkhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno nāma
atk-s0402a0:1356_11: hoti. Paṭhamajjhānādīni paṇītasukhāni, tasmā tāni paṭipanno sukhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1357_0: Ayaṃ panettha sabbasādhāraṇā upamā – saṅgāmāvacarapuriso hi phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:1357_1: pañcāvudhāni sannayhitvā saṅgāmaṃ pavisati, so antarā vissamitukāmo phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1357_2: pavisitvā vissamati ceva pānabhojanādīni ca paṭisevati. Tato puna saṅgāmaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a0:1357_3: kammaṃ karoti. Tattha saṅgāmo viya kilesasaṅgāmo daṭṭhabbo, phalakakoṭṭhako viya
atk-s0402a0:1357_4: pañcanissayabalāni, saṅgāmapavisanapuriso viya yogāvacaro, pañcāvudhasannāho viya
atk-s0402a0:1357_5: vipassanāpañcamāni indriyāni, saṅgāmaṃ pavisanakālo viya vipassanāya kammakaraṇakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1357_7: viya vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa cittuppādassa nirassādakkhaṇe pañca balāni nissāya
atk-s0402a0:1357_8: cittaṃ sampahaṃsanakālo, vissamitvā khāditvā pivitvā ca puna saṅgāmassa pavisanakālo
atk-s0402a0:1357_9: viya pañcahi balehi cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā puna vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa vivaṭṭetvā
atk-s0402a0:1357_10: arahattaggahaṇakālo veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pana sutte balāni ceva indriyāni ca missakāneva kathitānīti.
atk-s0402a0:1359_0: 164. Catutthe akkhamāti anadhivāsikapaṭipadā. Khamāti adhivāsikapaṭipadā. Damāti
atk-s0402a0:1359_1: indriyadamanapaṭipadā. Samāti akusalavitakkānaṃ vūpasamanapaṭipadā. Rosantaṃ paṭirosatīti
atk-s0402a0:1359_2: ghaṭṭentaṃ paṭighaṭṭeti. Bhaṇḍantaṃ paṭibhaṇḍatīti paharantaṃ paṭipaharati. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:1361_0: 167. Sattame mahāmoggallānattherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā
atk-s0402a0:1361_1: ahesuṃ, arahattamaggo dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño. Tasmā evamāha – “yāyaṃ paṭipadā
atk-s0402a0:1361_2: dukkhā khippābhiññā, imaṃ me paṭipadaṃ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta”nti.
atk-s0402a0:1363_0: 168. Aṭṭhame dhammasenāpatittherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā,
atk-s0402a0:1363_1: arahattamaggo sukhapaṭipado khippābhiñño. Tasmā “yāyaṃ paṭipadā sukhā khippābhiññā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1363_2: āha. Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu missikāva paṭipadā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1365_0: 169. Navame paṭhamadutiyapuggalā sukkhavipassakā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1365_1: upaṭṭhapenti. Tesu eko vipassanindriyānaṃ balavattā idheva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a0:1365_2: eko indriyānaṃ dubbalatāya idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1365_3: paṭilabhitvā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0402a0:1365_4: parinibbāyati, tatiyacatutthā samathayānikā. Tesaṃ eko asaṅkhārena appayogena indriyānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1365_5: balavattā idheva kilese khepeti, eko indriyānaṃ dubbalattā idha asakkonto anantare
atk-s0402a0:1365_6: attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭilabhitvā asaṅkhārena appayogena kilese khepetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1367_0: 170. Dasame samathapubbaṅgamanti samathaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Maggo sañjāyatīti
atk-s0402a0:1367_1: paṭhamo lokuttaramaggo nibbattati. So taṃ magganti ekacittakkhaṇikamaggassa āsevanādīni
atk-s0402a0:1367_2: nāma natthi, dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotīti
atk-s0402a0:1367_3: vuccati. Vipassanāpubbaṅgamanti vipassanaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā samathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1367_4: bhāveti, pakatiyā vipassanālābhī vipassanāya ṭhatvā samādhiṃ uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1368_0: Yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetīti yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāveti. Tattha teneva cittena samāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1368_1: samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṃ na sakkā. Ayaṃ pana yāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati,
atk-s0402a0:1368_2: tāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati. Yāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati, tāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati.
atk-s0402a0:1368_3: Kathaṃ? Paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjati, tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasati, saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0402a0:1368_4: dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpajjati. Tato vuṭṭhāya puna saṅkhāre sammasati. Saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0402a0:1368_5: tatiyajjhānaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre
atk-s0402a0:1368_6: sammasati. Evamayaṃ samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1369_1: uddhaccena viggahitaṃ, suggahitanti attho. So, āvuso, samayoti iminā sattannaṃ sappāyānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1369_2: paṭilābhakālo kathito. Yaṃ taṃ cittanti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ okkamitvā
atk-s0402a0:1369_3: pavattaṃ cittaṃ. Ajjhattameva santiṭṭhatīti vipassanāvīthiṃ paccottharitvā tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:1369_4: gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati. Sannisīdatīti ārammaṇavasena sammā nisīdati.
atk-s0402a0:1369_5: Ekodi hotīti ekaggaṃ hoti. Samādhiyatīti sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhapitaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0402a0:1371_0: 171. Tatiyassa paṭhame kāyeti kāyadvāre, kāyaviññattiyā satīti attho. Kāyasañcetanāhetūtiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1371_1: kāyasañcetanā nāma kāyadvāre cetanā pakappanā. Sā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalavasena aṭṭhavidhā,
atk-s0402a0:1371_2: akusalavasena dvādasavidhāti vīsatividhā. Tathā vacīsañcetanā, tathā manosañcetanā.
atk-s0402a0:1371_3: Apicettha nava mahaggatacetanāpi labbhanti. Kāyasañcetanāhetūti kāyasañcetanāpaccayā.
atk-s0402a0:1371_4: Uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhanti aṭṭhakusalakammapaccayā niyakajjhatte sukhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:1371_5: dvādasaakusalakammapaccayā dukkhaṃ. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Avijjāpaccayāvāti avijjākāraṇeneva.
atk-s0402a0:1371_6: Sace hi avijjā chādayamānā paccayo hoti, evaṃ sante tīsu dvāresu sukhadukkhānaṃ paccayabhūtā
atk-s0402a0:1371_7: cetanā uppajjati. Iti mūlabhūtāya avijjāya vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1372_0: Sāmaṃ vātiādīsu parehi anāṇatto sayameva abhisaṅkharonto sāmaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti
atk-s0402a0:1372_1: nāma. Yaṃ pana pare samādapetvā āṇāpetvā kārenti, tassa taṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ pare abhisaṅkharonti
atk-s0402a0:1372_2: nāma. Yo pana kusalaṃ kusalanti akusalaṃ akusalanti kusalavipākaṃ kusalavipākoti
atk-s0402a0:1372_3: akusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākoti jānanto kāyadvāre vīsatividhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti,
atk-s0402a0:1372_4: ayaṃ sampajāno abhisaṅkharoti nāma. Yo evaṃ ajānanto abhisaṅkharoti, ayaṃ asampajāno
atk-s0402a0:1373_0: Tattha asampajānakammaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – daharadārakā “mātāpitūhi kataṃ karomā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1373_1: cetiyaṃ vandanti, pupphapūjaṃ karonti, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vandanti, tesaṃ kusalanti ajānantānampi
atk-s0402a0:1373_2: taṃ kusalameva hoti. Tathā migapakkhiādayo tiracchānā dhammaṃ suṇanti, saṅghaṃ vandanti,
atk-s0402a0:1373_3: cetiyaṃ vandanti, tesaṃ jānantānampi ajānantānampi taṃ kusalameva hoti. Daharadārakā
atk-s0402a0:1373_4: pana mātāpitaro hatthapādehi paharanti, bhikkhūnaṃ talasattikaṃ uggiranti, daṇḍaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1373_5: khipanti, akkosanti. Gāviyo bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anubandhanti, sunakhā anubandhanti, ḍaṃsanti,
atk-s0402a0:1373_6: sīhabyagghādayo anubandhanti, jīvitā voropenti. Tesaṃ jānantānampi ajānantānampi
atk-s0402a0:1374_0: Idāni tīsupi dvāresu āyūhanacetanā samodhānetabbā. Seyyathidaṃ – kāyadvāre sayaṃkatamūlikā
atk-s0402a0:1374_1: vīsati cetanā, āṇattimūlikā vīsati, sampajānamūlikā vīsati, asampajānamūlikā vīsatīti
atk-s0402a0:1374_2: asīti cetanā honti, tathā vacīdvāre. Manodvāre pana ekekasmimpi vikappe ekūnatiṃsa
atk-s0402a0:1374_3: katvā satañca soḷasa ca honti. Iti sabbāpi tīsu dvāresu dve satāni chasattati ca
atk-s0402a0:1374_4: cetanā. Tā sabbāpi saṅkhārakkhandhoteva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti, taṃsampayutto vedayitākāro
atk-s0402a0:1374_5: vedanākkhandho, sañjānanākāro saññākkhandho, cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, kāyo upādārūpaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1374_6: tassa paccayā catasso dhātuyo cattāri bhūtānīti ime pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1375_0: Imesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu avijjā anupatitāti imesu vuttappabhedesu cetanādhammesu
atk-s0402a0:1375_1: avijjā sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena ca anupatitā. Evaṃ vaṭṭañceva vaṭṭamūlikā
atk-s0402a0:1376_0: Ettāvatā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassa khīṇāsavassa idāni thutiṃ karonto
atk-s0402a0:1376_2: ceva asesanirodhena ca. So kāyo na hotīti khīṇāsavassa kāyena karaṇakammaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0402a0:1376_4: evamādi. Kāyadvāre panassa vīsati cetanā avipākadhammataṃ āpajjanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1376_5: – “so kāyo na hoti, yaṃ paccayāssa taṃ uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkha”nti. Kāyadvārappavattā
atk-s0402a0:1376_6: hi cetanā idha kāyoti adhippetā. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Khettantiādīnipi kusalākusalakammasseva
atk-s0402a0:1376_7: nāmāni. Tañhi vipākassa viruhanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena khettaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu, kāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:1377_0: Iti satthā ettakena ṭhānena tīhi dvārehi āyūhitakammaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa kammassa
atk-s0402a0:1377_1: vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ cattārome bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha attabhāvappaṭilābhāti
atk-s0402a0:1377_2: paṭiladdhaattabhāvā. Attasañcetanā kamatīti attanā pakappitacetanā vahati pavattati.
atk-s0402a0:1378_0: Attasañcetanāhetu tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhā kāyā cuti hotītiādīsu khiḍḍāpadosikā devā
atk-s0402a0:1378_2: kīḷantānaṃ pānabhojane sati sammussati, te āhārupacchedena ātape khittamālā viya
atk-s0402a0:1378_3: milāyanti. Manopadosikā devā parasañcetanāhetu cavanti, ete cātumahārājikā devā.
atk-s0402a0:1378_4: Tesu kira eko devaputto “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0402a0:1378_5: Athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā “kiṃ, bho, ayaṃ kapaṇo adiṭṭhapubbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1378_6: viya etaṃ disvā pītiyā uddhumāto viya gajjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati. Purato
atk-s0402a0:1378_7: gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā kuddhā nāma suvijānā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa
atk-s0402a0:1378_8: ñatvā “tvaṃ kuddho mayhaṃ kiṃ karissasi, ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0402a0:1378_9: laddhā, na tuyhaṃ vasenā”ti paṭikujjhati. Ekasmiñhi kuddhe itaro akuddho rakkhati,
atk-s0402a0:1378_10: ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti, tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo
atk-s0402a0:1378_11: hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti. Manussā attasañcetanā ca parasañcetanā
atk-s0402a0:1378_12: ca hetu cavanti, attasañcetanāya ca parasañcetanāya ca hetubhūtāya cavantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1378_13: Manussā hi kujjhitvā attanāva attānaṃ hatthehipi daṇḍehipi paharanti, rajjubandhanādīhipi
atk-s0402a0:1378_14: bandhanti, asināpi sīsaṃ chindanti, visampi khādanti, papātepi patanti, udakampi
atk-s0402a0:1378_15: pavisanti, aggimpi pavisanti, parepi daṇḍena vā satthane vā paharitvā mārenti. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1379_0: Katame tena devā daṭṭhabbāti katame nāma te devā daṭṭhabbāti attho. Tena vā attabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:1379_1: katame devā daṭṭhabbātipi attho. Kasmā pana thero imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, kiṃ attanā
atk-s0402a0:1379_2: kathetuṃ nappahotīti? Pahoti, idaṃ pana padaṃ attano sabhāvena buddhavisayaṃ pañhanti
atk-s0402a0:1379_3: thero na kathesi. Tena daṭṭhabbāti tena attabhāvena daṭṭhabbā. Ayaṃ pana pañho heṭṭhā
atk-s0402a0:1379_4: kāmāvacarepi rūpāvacarepi labbhati, bhavaggena pana paricchinditvā kathito nippadesena
atk-s0402a0:1380_0: Āgantāro itthattanti itthabhāvaṃ kāmāvacarapañcakkhandhabhāvameva āgantāro, neva
atk-s0402a0:1380_1: tatrūpapattikā na uparūpapattikā honti. Anāgantāro itthattanti imaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1380_2: anāgantāro, heṭṭhūpapattikā na honti, tatrūpapattikā vā uparūpapattikā vā tattheva
atk-s0402a0:1380_3: vā parinibbāyino hontīti attho. Ettha ca heṭṭhimabhave nibbattānaṃ vasena uparūpapattikā
atk-s0402a0:1380_4: veditabbā. Bhavagge panetaṃ natthi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1382_0: 172. Dutiye atthapaṭisambhidāti pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ. Odhisoti kāraṇaso.
atk-s0402a0:1382_1: Byañjanasoti akkharaso. Anekapariyāyenāti anekehi kāraṇehi. Ācikkhāmīti kathemi.
atk-s0402a0:1382_2: Desemīti pākaṭaṃ katvā kathemi. Paññāpemīti jānāpemi. Paṭṭhapemīti paṭṭhapetvā pavattetvā
atk-s0402a0:1382_3: kathemi. Vivarāmīti vivaṭaṃ katvā kathemi. Vibhajāmīti vibhajitvā kathemi. Uttānīkaromīti
atk-s0402a0:1382_4: gambhīraṃ uttānakaṃ katvā kathemi. So maṃ pañhenāti so maṃ pañhena upagacchatu. Ahaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1382_5: veyyākaraṇenāti ahamassa pañhakathanena cittaṃ ārādhessāmi. Yo no dhammānaṃ sukusaloti
atk-s0402a0:1382_6: yo amhākaṃ adhigatadhammānaṃ sukusalo satthā, so esa sammukhībhūto. Yadi mayā atthapaṭisambhidā
atk-s0402a0:1382_7: na sacchikatā, “sacchikarohi tāva sāriputtā”ti vatvā maṃ paṭibāhissatīti satthu purato
atk-s0402a0:1382_8: nisinnakova sīhanādaṃ nadati. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Imāsu ca pana
atk-s0402a0:1382_9: paṭisambhidāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā, atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttarāti.
atk-s0402a0:1384_0: 173. Tatiye phassāyatanānanti phassākarānaṃ, phassassa uppattiṭṭhānānanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1384_1: Atthaññaṃ kiñcīti etesu asesato niruddhesu tato paraṃ koci appamattakopi kileso atthīti
atk-s0402a0:1384_2: pucchati. Natthaññaṃ kiñcīti idhāpi “appamattakopi kileso natthī”ti pucchati. Sesadvayepi
atk-s0402a0:1384_3: eseva nayo. Ime pana cattāropi pañhe sassatucchedaekaccasassataamarāvikkhepavasena
atk-s0402a0:1384_4: pucchati. Tenassa thero pucchitapucchitaṃ paṭibāhanto mā hevanti āha. Ettha hiiti
atk-s0402a0:1384_5: nipātamattaṃ, evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho. Attūpaladdhivaseneva “atthaññaṃ kiñci añño koci
atk-s0402a0:1384_6: attā nāma atthī”ti sassatādiākārena pucchati. Kiṃ panesa attūpaladdhikoti? Na attūpaladdhiko.
atk-s0402a0:1384_7: Evaṃladdhiko pana tattheko bhikkhu nisinno, so pucchituṃ na sakkoti. Tassa laddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1384_8: vissajjāpanatthaṃ evaṃ pucchati. Yepi ca anāgate evaṃladdhikā bhavissanti, tesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1385_0: Appapañcaṃ papañcetīti na papañcetabbaṭṭhāne papañcaṃ karoti, anācaritabbaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1385_1: carati. Tāvatā papañcassa gatīti yattakā channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ gati, tattakāva
atk-s0402a0:1385_2: taṇhādiṭṭhimānappabhedassa papañcassa gati. Channaṃ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṃ asesavirāganirodhā
atk-s0402a0:1385_3: papañcanirodho papañcavūpasamoti etesu chasu āyatanesu sabbaso niruddhesu papañcāpi
atk-s0402a0:1385_4: niruddhāva honti, vūpasantāva hontīti attho. Āruppe pana puthujjanadevatānaṃ kiñcāpi
atk-s0402a0:1385_5: pañca phassāyatanāni niruddhāni, chaṭṭhassa pana aniruddhattā tayopi papañcā appahīnāva.
atk-s0402a0:1385_6: Apica pañcavokārabhavavaseneva pañho kathitoti. Catutthe imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1387_0: 175-176. Pañcame vijjāyantakaro hotīti vijjāya vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro hoti, sakalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1387_1: vaṭṭadukkhaṃ paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā tiṭṭhatīti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1387_2: Saupādānoti sagahaṇova hutvā. Antakaro abhavissāti vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ katvā ṭhito
atk-s0402a0:1387_3: abhavissa. Caraṇasampannoti pannarasadhammabhedena caraṇena samannāgato. Yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1387_4: jānaṃ passaṃ antakaro hotīti yathāsabhāvaṃ maggapaññāya jānitvā passitvā vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0402a0:1387_5: antaṃ katvā ṭhito nāma hotīti arahattanikūṭena pañhaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Chaṭṭhaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0402a0:1389_0: 177. Sattame ajjhattikāti kesādīsu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākāralakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0402a0:1389_1: Bāhirāti bahiddhā anindriyabaddhesu pāsāṇapabbatādīsu thaddhākāralakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0402a0:1389_2: Imināva nayena sesāpi dhātuyo veditabbā. Netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti
atk-s0402a0:1389_3: idaṃ tayaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ. Sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbanti
atk-s0402a0:1389_4: hetunā kāraṇena maggapaññāya passitabbaṃ. Disvāti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya passitvā.
atk-s0402a0:1389_5: Acchecchi taṇhanti maggavajjhataṇhaṃ samūlakaṃ chindi. Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi
atk-s0402a0:1389_6: saṃyojanaṃ vivattayi ubbattetvā pajahi. Sammā mānābhisamayāti hetunā kāraṇena navavidhassa
atk-s0402a0:1389_7: mānassa pahānābhisamayā. Antamakāsi dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1389_8: akāsi, katvā ṭhitoti attho. Iti satthārā saṃyuttamahānikāye rāhulovāde vipassanā
atk-s0402a0:1389_9: kathitā, cūḷarāhulovādepi vipassanā kathitā, ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovāde daharasseva sato
atk-s0402a0:1389_10: musāvādā veramaṇī kathitā, mahārāhulovāde vipassanā kathitā. Imasmiṃ aṅguttaramahānikāye
atk-s0402a0:1391_0: 178. Aṭṭhame santaṃ cetovimuttinti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ samāpattiṃ. Sakkāyanirodhanti
atk-s0402a0:1391_1: tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātassa sakkāyassa nirodhaṃ, nibbānanti attho. Na pakkhandatīti
atk-s0402a0:1391_2: ārammaṇavasena na pakkhandati. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Na pāṭikaṅkhoti na pāṭikaṅkhitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1392_0: Imasmiñca panatthe nadīpāraṃ gantukāmapurisopammaṃ āharitabbaṃ – eko kira puriso
atk-s0402a0:1392_1: caṇḍasotāya vāḷamacchākulāya nadiyā pāraṃ gantukāmo “orimaṃ tīraṃ sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1392_2: pārimaṃ tīraṃ khemaṃ appaṭibhayaṃ, kiṃ nu kho katvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”ti paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0402a0:1392_3: ṭhite aṭṭha kakudharukkhe disvā “sakkā imāya rukkhapaṭipāṭiyā gantu”nti manasikatvā
atk-s0402a0:1392_4: “kakudharukkhā nāma maṭṭhasākhā honti, sākhāya hatthā na saṇṭhaheyyu”nti nigrodhapilakkharukkhādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1392_5: aññatarassa lākhāya hatthapāde makkhetvā dakkhiṇahatthena ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhi. Hattho
atk-s0402a0:1392_6: tattheva lagi. Puna vāmahatthena dakkhiṇapādena vāmapādenāti cattāropi hatthapādā
atk-s0402a0:1392_7: tattheva lagiṃsu. So adhosiro lambamāno uparinadiyaṃ deve vuṭṭhe puṇṇāya nadiyā sote
atk-s0402a0:1393_0: Tattha nadīsotaṃ viya saṃsārasotaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sotassa pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya
atk-s0402a0:1393_1: yogāvacaro, orimatīraṃ viya sakkāyo, pārimatīraṃ viya nibbānaṃ, paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā
atk-s0402a0:1393_2: aṭṭha kakudharukkhā viya aṭṭha samāpattiyo, lepamakkhitena hatthena sākhāgahaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1393_3: viya jhānavipassanānaṃ pāripanthike asodhetvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ, catūhi hatthapādehi
atk-s0402a0:1393_4: sākhāya baddhassa olambanaṃ viya paṭhamajjhāne nikantiyā laggakālo, uparisote vuṭṭhi
atk-s0402a0:1393_5: viya chasu dvāresu kilesānaṃ uppannakālo, nadiyā puṇṇāya sote nimuggassa kumbhīlādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1393_6: bhakkhabhūtakālo viya saṃsārasote nimuggassa catūsu apāyesu dukkhānubhavanakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1394_0: Suddhena hatthenāti sudhotena parisuddhahatthena. Imasmimpi atthe tādisameva opammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1394_1: kātabbaṃ – tatheva hi pāraṃ gantukāmo puriso “kakudharukkhā nāma maṭṭhasākhā, kiliṭṭhahatthena
atk-s0402a0:1394_2: gaṇhantassa hattho parigaleyyā”ti hatthapāde sudhote katvā ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhitvā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1394_3: rukkhaṃ āruḷho. Tato otaritvā dutiyaṃ…pe… tato otaritvā aṭṭhamaṃ, aṭṭhamarukkhato
atk-s0402a0:1395_0: Tattha “imehi rukkhehi pārimatīraṃ gamissāmī”ti tassa purisassa cintitakālo viya
atk-s0402a0:1395_1: yogino “aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:1395_2: cintitakālo, suddhena hatthena sākhāgahaṇaṃ viya jhānavipassanānaṃ pāripanthikadhamme
atk-s0402a0:1395_3: sodhetvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ. Tattha paṭhamarukkhārohaṇakālo viya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattikālo,
atk-s0402a0:1395_4: paṭhamarukkhato oruyha dutiyaṃ āruḷhakālo viya paṭhamajjhāne nikantiyā abaddhassa
atk-s0402a0:1395_5: tato vuṭṭhāya dutiyajjhānasamāpannakālo…pe… sattamarukkhato oruyha aṭṭhamaṃ āruḷhakālo
atk-s0402a0:1395_6: viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ nikantiyā abaddhassa tato vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpannakālo.
atk-s0402a0:1395_7: Aṭṭhamarukkhato oruyha pārimatīraṃ khemantabhūmiṃ gatakālo viya nevasaññānāsaññāyatane
atk-s0402a0:1395_8: nikantiyā abaddhassa samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattappattakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1396_0: Avijjāppabhedaṃ manasi karotīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtāya gaṇabahalamahāavijjāya
atk-s0402a0:1396_1: pabhedasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ manasi karoti. Na pakkhandatīti ārammaṇavaseneva na pakkhandati.
atk-s0402a0:1396_2: Jambālīti gāmato nikkhantassa mahāudakassa patiṭṭhānabhūto mahāāvāṭo. Anekavassagaṇikāti
atk-s0402a0:1396_3: gāmassa vā nagarassa vā uppannakāleyeva uppannattā anekāni vassagaṇāni uppannāya
atk-s0402a0:1396_4: etissāti anekavassagaṇikā. Āyamukhānīti catasso pavisanakandarā. Apāyamukhānīti apavāhanacchiddāni.
atk-s0402a0:1396_5: Na āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhoti na pāḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhitabbo. Na hi tato udakaṃ uṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:1396_6: pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ gahetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:1397_0: Imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ uyyānagavesakaopammaṃ āharitabbaṃ. Eko kira nagaravāsiko
atk-s0402a0:1397_1: kulaputto uyyānaṃ gavesanto nagarato nātidūre naccāsanne mahantaṃ jambāliṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a0:1397_2: So “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ramaṇīyaṃ uyyānaṃ bhavissatī”ti sallakkhetvā kuddālaṃ ādāya cattāripi
atk-s0402a0:1397_3: kandarāni pidhāya apavāhanacchiddāni vivaritvā aṭṭhāsi. Devo na sammā vassi, avasesaudakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1397_4: apavāhanacchiddena parissavitvā gataṃ. Cammakhaṇḍapilotikādīni tattheva pūtikāni
atk-s0402a0:1397_5: jātāni, pāṇakā saṇṭhitā, samantā anupagamanīyā jātā. Upagatānampi nāsāpuṭe pidhāya
atk-s0402a0:1397_6: pakkamitabbaṃ hoti. So katipāhena āgantvā paṭikkamma ṭhito oloketvā “na sakkā upagantu”nti pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a0:1398_0: Tattha nagaravāsī kulaputto viya yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo, uyyānaṃ gavesantena gāmadvāre
atk-s0402a0:1398_1: jambāliyā diṭṭhakālo viya cātumahābhūtikakāyo, āyamukhānaṃ pihitakālo viya dhammassavanodakassa
atk-s0402a0:1398_2: aladdhakālo, apāyamukhānaṃ vivaṭakālo viya chadvārikasaṃvarassa vissaṭṭhakālo, devassa
atk-s0402a0:1398_3: sammā avuṭṭhakālo viya sappāyakammaṭṭhānassa aladdhakālo, avasesaudakassa apāyamukhehi
atk-s0402a0:1398_4: parissavitvā gatakālo viya abbhantare guṇānaṃ parihīnakālo, udakassa uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1398_5: bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asamatthakālo viya arahattamaggena
atk-s0402a0:1398_6: avijjāpāḷiṃ bhinditvā kilesarāsiṃ vidhamitvā nibbānaṃ sacchikātuṃ asamatthakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1398_7: cammakhaṇḍapilotikādīnaṃ tattheva pūtibhāvo viya abbhantare rāgādikilesehi paripūritakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1398_8: tassa āgantvā disvā vippaṭisārino gatakālo viya vaṭṭasamaṅgipuggalassa vaṭṭe abhiratakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1399: Āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhoti pāḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhitabbo. Tato hi udakaṃ uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1400_0: Idhāpi tadeva opammaṃ āharitabbaṃ. Tattha āyamukhānaṃ vivaṭakālo viya sappāyadhammassavanassa
atk-s0402a0:1400_1: laddhakālo, apāyamukhānaṃ pihitakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa paccupaṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1400_2: devassa sammā vuṭṭhakālo viya sappāyakammaṭṭhānassa laddhakālo, udakassa uṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:1400_3: pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pattakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1400_4: bhinditvā akusalarāsiṃ vidhamitvā arahattaṃ sacchikatakālo, āyamukhehi paviṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:1400_5: udakena sarassa paripuṇṇakālo viya abbhantare lokuttaradhammehi paripuṇṇakālo, samantato
atk-s0402a0:1400_6: vatiṃ katvā rukkhe ropetvā uyyānamajjhe pāsādaṃ māpetvā nāṭakāni paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0402a0:1400_7: subhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa nisinnakālo viya dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1400_8: appetvā nisinnakālo veditabbo. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Desanā pana lokiyalokuttaramissikā kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:1402_0: 179. Navame hānabhāgiyā saññātiādīsu “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā
atk-s0402a0:1402_1: samudācaranti, hānabhāginī paññā”ti abhidhamme vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1404_0: 180. Dasame bhoganagare viharatīti parinibbānasamaye cārikaṃ caranto taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1404_1: patvā tattha viharati. Ānandacetiyeti ānandayakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitavihāre.
atk-s0402a0:1404_2: Mahāpadeseti mahāokāse mahāapadese vā, buddhādayo mahante mahante apadisitvā vuttāni
atk-s0402a0:1404_3: mahākāraṇānīti attho. Neva abhinanditabbanti haṭṭhatuṭṭhehi sādhukāraṃ datvā pubbeva
atk-s0402a0:1404_4: na sotabbaṃ. Evaṃ kate hi pacchā “idaṃ na sametī”ti vuccamānopi “kiṃ pubbeva ayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1404_5: dhammo, idāni na dhammo”ti vatvā laddhiṃ na vissajjeti. Nappaṭikkositabbanti “kiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1404_6: esa bālo vadatī”ti evaṃ pubbeva na vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ vutte hi vattuṃ yuttampi na vakkhati.
atk-s0402a0:1404_7: Tenāha – anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvāti. Padabyañjanānīti padasaṅkhātāni byañjanāni.
atk-s0402a0:1404_8: Sādhukaṃ uggahetvāti “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāḷi vuttā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho vutto, imasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1404_9: ṭhāne anusandhi kathitā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne pubbāparaṃ kathita”nti suṭṭhu gahetvā. Sutte
atk-s0402a0:1404_10: otāretabbānīti sutte otaritabbāni. Vinaye sandassetabbānīti vinaye saṃsandetabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1405_0: Ettha ca suttanti vinayo vutto. Yathāha – “kattha paṭikkhittaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ suttavibhaṅge”ti
atk-s0402a0:1405_1: vinayoti khandhako. Yathāha – “vinayātisāre”ti. Evaṃ vinayapiṭakampi na pariyādiyati.
atk-s0402a0:1405_2: Ubhatovibhaṅgā pana suttaṃ, khandhakaparivārā vinayoti evaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ pariyādiyati.
atk-s0402a0:1405_3: Atha vā suttantapiṭakaṃ suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evaṃ dveyeva piṭakāni pariyādiyanti.
atk-s0402a0:1405_4: Suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni vā suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evampi tīṇi piṭakāni
atk-s0402a0:1405_5: na tāva pariyādiyanti. Asuttanāmakañhi buddhavacanaṃ nāma atthi. Seyyathidaṃ – jātakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1405_6: paṭisambhidā niddeso suttanipāto dhammapadaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu
atk-s0402a0:1406: Sudinnatthero pana “asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ natthī”ti taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “tīṇi piṭakāni suttaṃ, vinayo pana kāraṇa”nti āha. Tato taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento idaṃ suttamāhari –
atk-s0402a0:1407_0: “Ye kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-s0402a0:1407_1: saṃyogāya saṃvattanti no visaṃyogāya, saupādānāya saṃvattanti no anupādānāya, mahicchatāya
atk-s0402a0:1407_2: saṃvattanti no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no santuṭṭhiyā, kosajjāya saṃvattanti
atk-s0402a0:1407_3: no vīriyārambhāya, saṅgaṇikāya saṃvattanti no pavivekāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti no
atk-s0402a0:1407_4: apacayāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami, jāneyyāsi ‘neso dhammo neso vinayo netaṃ satthu sāsana’nti.
atk-s0402a0:1408_0: “Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya,
atk-s0402a0:1408_1: visaṃyogāya saṃvattanti no saṃyogāya. Anupādānāya saṃvattanti no saupādānāya, appicchatāya
atk-s0402a0:1408_2: saṃvattanti no mahicchatāya, santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no asantuṭṭhiyā, vīriyārambhāya
atk-s0402a0:1408_3: saṃvattanti no kosajjāya, pavivekāya saṃvattanti no saṅgaṇikāya, apacayāya saṃvattanti
atk-s0402a0:1408_4: no ācayāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami, jāneyyāsi ‘eso dhammo eso vinayo etaṃ satthu sāsana”’nti.
atk-s0402a0:1409_0: Tasmā sutteti tepiṭakabuddhavacane otāretabbāni. Vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe
atk-s0402a0:1409_1: saṃsandetabbānīti ayamettha attho. Na ceva sutte otarantīti suttapaṭipāṭiyā katthaci
atk-s0402a0:1409_3: aññatarato āgatāni paññāyantīti attho. Evaṃ āgatāni hi rāgādivinaye ca apaññāyamānāni
atk-s0402a0:1409_4: chaḍḍetabbāni honti. Tena vuttaṃ – “iti hidaṃ, bhikkhave, chaḍḍeyyāthā”ti. Etenupāyena
atk-s0402a0:1409_5: sabbattha attho veditabbo. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, catutthaṃ mahāpadesaṃ dhāreyyāthāti imaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1411: 181. Catutthassa paṭhame ṭhānakusaloti yena ṭhānena ṭhito avirādhetvā vijjhituṃ sakkoti, tasmiṃ ṭhāne kusalo. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1413: 182. Dutiye natthi koci pāṭibhogoti ahaṃ te pāṭibhogoti evaṃ pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ samattho nāma natthi. Jarādhammanti jarāsabhāvaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0402a0:1415: 183. Tatiye natthi tato dosoti tasmiṃ doso nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1417_0: 184. Catutthe kicchājīvitakāraṇaṭṭhena rogova rogātaṅko nāma. Phuṭṭhassāti tena rogātaṅkena
atk-s0402a0:1417_1: samannāgatassa. Urattāḷiṃ kandatīti uraṃ tāḷetvā rodati. Akatakalyāṇotiādīsu kalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1417_2: vuccati puññakammaṃ, taṃ akataṃ etenāti akatakalyāṇo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Puññakammameva
atk-s0402a0:1417_3: hi kosallasambhūtattā kusalaṃ, bhītassa parittāyakattā bhīruttāṇanti vuccati. Katapāpotiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1417_4: pāpaṃ vuccati lāmakaṃ akusalakammaṃ. Luddanti kakkhaḷakammaṃ. Kibbisanti samalaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1417_5: aparisuddhakammaṃ. Kaṅkhī hotīti buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇesu ceva sikkhāya ca pubbante
atk-s0402a0:1417_6: ca aparante ca pubbantāparante ca paṭiccasamuppāde cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kaṅkhāya
atk-s0402a0:1417_7: samannāgato hoti. Vicikicchīti vicikicchāya samannāgato sāsanasaddhamme na niṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1417_8: gato, uggahaparipucchāvasena niṭṭhaṃ gantuṃ na sakkoti. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1419_0: 185. Pañcame brāhmaṇasaccānīti brāhmaṇānaṃ saccāni tathāni. So tena na samaṇoti maññatīti
atk-s0402a0:1419_1: so khīṇāsavo tena saccena “ahaṃ samaṇo”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na maññati. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0402a0:1419_2: eseva nayo. Yadeva tattha saccaṃ, tadabhiññāyāti yaṃ tattha “sabbe pāṇā avajjhā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1419_3: paṭipattiyā saccaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ. Iminā vacīsaccaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā paramatthasaccaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1419_4: nibbānaṃ dasseti. Tadabhiññāyāti taṃ ubhayampi abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitvā. Anuddayāya
atk-s0402a0:1419_5: anukampāya paṭipanno hotīti anuddayatthāya ca anukampatthāya ca yā paṭipadā, taṃ
atk-s0402a0:1419_6: paṭipanno hoti, pūretvā ṭhitoti attho. Sesapaṭipadāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1420_0: Sabbe kāmāti sabbe vatthukāmakilesakāmā. Iti vadaṃ brāhmaṇo saccamāhāti evampi vadanto
atk-s0402a0:1420_1: khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo saccameva āha. Sabbe bhavāti kāmabhavādayo tayopi. Nāhaṃ kvacanīti
atk-s0402a0:1420_2: ettha pana catukkoṭikasuññatā kathitā. Ayañhi “nāhaṃ kvacanī”ti kvaci attānaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:1420_3: passati, kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1420_4: na passati, bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1420_5: maññitvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mamasaddaṃ tāva
atk-s0402a0:1420_6: ṭhapetvā “na ca kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatī”ti ayamattho. Idāni “mamasaddaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1420_7: āharitvā mama kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthī”ti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve
atk-s0402a0:1420_8: atthīti na passati, attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:1420_9: vā parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1420_10: na passatīti attho. Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ parassa
atk-s0402a0:1420_11: kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1420_12: attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passatīti. Iti vadaṃ brāhmaṇoti evaṃ catukkoṭikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1420_13: suññataṃ vadantopi khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo tassā paṭipadāya sammā paṭividdhattā saccameva
atk-s0402a0:1420_14: āha, na musāti sabbesupi vāresu maññanānaṃ pahīnattāyeva na maññatīti ca attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1420_15: Ākiñcaññaṃyeva paṭipadanti kiñcanabhāvavirahitaṃ nippalibodhaṃ niggahaṇameva paṭipadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1421_0: Imāni kho paribbājakā cattāri brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānīti
atk-s0402a0:1421_1: yāni tumhe bhovādibrāhmaṇānaṃ saccāni vadetha, tehi aññāni mayā imāni bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0402a0:1421_2: cattāri saccāni catūhi maggehi soḷasavidhena kiccena jānitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā paveditāni
atk-s0402a0:1421_3: desitāni jotitānīti attho. Iti imasmiṃ sutte catūsupi ṭhānesu khīṇāsavassa vacīsaccameva kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:1423_0: 186. Chaṭṭhe parikassatīti ākaḍḍhiyati. Ummaggoti ummujjanaṃ, paññāgamananti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1423_1: Paññā eva vā ummujjanaṭṭhena ummaggoti vuccati. Sāva paṭibhānaṭṭhena paṭibhānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1423_2: Cittassa uppannassa vasaṃ gacchatīti ye cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃyevettha gahaṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1423_3: veditabbaṃ. Atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti atthañca pāḷiñca jānitvā. Dhammānudhammappaṭipanno
atk-s0402a0:1423_4: hotīti lokuttaradhammassa anucchavikadhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno
atk-s0402a0:1423_5: hoti. Nibbedhikapaññoti nibbijjhanakapañño. Idaṃ dukkhanti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ sesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1423_6: tebhūmakakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhanti sutaṃ hoti. Paññāyāti maggapaññāya. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti
atk-s0402a0:1423_7: vaṭṭamūlakataṇhā tassa dukkhassa samudayoti sutaṃ hoti. Iminā upāyena sesadvayepi
atk-s0402a0:1423_8: attho veditabbo. Catutthapañhavissajjanena arahattaphalaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1425_0: 187. Sattame todeyyassāti tudigāmavāsikassa. Parisatīti sannipatitāya parisāya. Parūpārambhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1425_1: vattentīti paragarahaṃ pavattenti kathenti. Bālo ayaṃ rājātiādi yaṃ te upārambhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1425_2: vattenti, tassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Samaṇe rāmaputteti udake rāmaputte. Abhippasannoti
atk-s0402a0:1425_3: atikkamma pasanno. Paramanipaccakāranti uttamanipātakiriyaṃ nīcavuttiṃ. Parihārakāti
atk-s0402a0:1425_4: paricārakā. Yamakotiādīni tesaṃ nāmāni. Tesu hi eko yamako nāma, eko moggallo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:1425_5: eko uggo nāma, eko nāvindakī nāma, eko gandhabbo nāma, eko aggivesso nāma. Tyāssudanti
atk-s0402a0:1425_6: ettha assudanti nipātamattaṃ, te attano parisati nisinneti attho. Iminā nayena netīti
atk-s0402a0:1425_7: iminā kāraṇena anuneti jānāpeti. Karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesūti paṇḍitehi kattabbakiccesu
atk-s0402a0:1425_8: ca atirekakattabbakiccesu ca. Vacanīyādhivacanīyesūti vattabbesu ca atirekavattabbesu
atk-s0402a0:1425_9: ca. Alamatthadasatarehīti ettha atthe passituṃ samatthā alamatthadasā, te atisitvā
atk-s0402a0:1425_10: ṭhitā alamatthadasatarā, tehi alamatthadasatarehi. Alamatthadasataroti alamatthadasatāya
atk-s0402a0:1425_11: uttaritaro, chekehi chekataro paṇḍitehi paṇḍitataroti pucchanto evamāha. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:1425_12: te paṭipucchantā evaṃ bhotiādimāhaṃsu. Iti brāhmaṇo attano sappurisatāya taṃ eḷeyyarājānampi
atk-s0402a0:1425_13: tassa parivārikepi udakampi rāmaputtaṃ pasaṃsi. Andho viya hi asappuriso, cakkhumā
atk-s0402a0:1425_14: viya sappuriso. Yathā andho neva anandhaṃ na andhaṃ passati, evaṃ asappuriso neva
atk-s0402a0:1425_15: sappurisaṃ na asappurisaṃ jānāti. Yathā cakkhumā andhampi anandhampi passati, evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1425_16: sappuriso sappurisampi asappurisampi jānāti. Todeyyopi sappurisatāya asappurise aññāsīti
atk-s0402a0:1425_17: imamatthavasaṃ paṭicca tuṭṭhamānaso brāhmaṇo acchariyaṃ bho, gotamātiādīni vatvā
atk-s0402a0:1427_0: 188. Aṭṭhame upakoti tassa nāmaṃ. Maṇḍikāputtoti maṇḍikāya putto. Upasaṅkamīti so
atk-s0402a0:1427_1: kira devadattassa upaṭṭhāko, “kiṃ nu kho satthā mayi attano santikaṃ upagate vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1427_2: kathessati, udāhu avaṇṇa”nti pariggaṇhanatthaṃ upasaṅkami. “Nerayiko devadatto kappaṭṭho
atk-s0402a0:1427_3: atekiccho”ti vacanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ghaṭṭetukāmo upasaṅkamītipi vadanti. Parūpārambhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1427_4: vattetīti paragarahaṃ katheti. Sabbo so na upapādetīti sabbopi so kusaladhammaṃ na
atk-s0402a0:1427_5: uppādeti, attano vā vacanaṃ upapādetuṃ anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. Anupapādento
atk-s0402a0:1427_6: gārayho hotīti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkonto attano ca vacanaṃ upapannaṃ anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1427_7: kātuṃ asakkonto gārayho hoti. Upavajjoti upavaditabbo ca hoti, vajjena vā upeto hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1428_0: Atha bhagavā tassa vādaṃ gahetvā tasseva gīvāya paṭimuñcanto parūpārambhantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1428_1: Ummujjamānakaṃyevāti udakato sīsaṃ ukkhipantaṃyeva. Tattha aparimāṇā padātiādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1428_2: tasmiṃ akusalanti paññāpane padānipi akkharānipi dhammadesanāpi aparimāṇāyeva. Itipidaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1428_3: akusalanti idampi akusalaṃ idampi akusalaṃ imināpi kāraṇena imināpi kāraṇena akusalanti
atk-s0402a0:1428_4: evaṃ akusalapaññattiyaṃ āgatānipi aparimāṇāni. Athāpi aññenākārena tathāgato taṃ
atk-s0402a0:1428_5: dhammaṃ deseyya, evampissa desanā aparimāṇā bhaveyya. Yathāha – “apariyādinnāvassa
atk-s0402a0:1428_6: tathāgatassa dhammadesanā, apariyādinnaṃ dhammapadabyañjana”nti. Iminā upāyena sabbavāresu
atk-s0402a0:1428_7: attho veditabbo. Yāva dhaṃsī vatāyanti yāva guṇadhaṃsī vata ayaṃ. Loṇakāradārakoti
atk-s0402a0:1428_8: loṇakāragāmadārako. Yatra hi nāmāti yo hi nāma. Āsādetabbaṃ maññissatīti ghaṭṭetabbaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1428_9: maññissati. Apehīti apagaccha, mā me purato aṭṭhāsi. Evañca pana vatvā gīvāya gaṇhāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:1430_0: 189. Navame kāyenāti nāmakāyena. Sacchikaraṇīyāti paccakkhaṃ kātabbā. Satiyāti pubbenivāsānussatiyā.
atk-s0402a0:1430_1: Cakkhunāti dibbacakkhunā. Paññāyāti jhānapaññāya vipassanāpaññā sacchikātabbā, vipassanāpaññāya
atk-s0402a0:1430_2: maggapaññā, maggapaññāya phalapaññā, phalapaññāya paccavekkhaṇapaññā sacchikātabbā,
atk-s0402a0:1430_3: pattabbāti attho. Āsavānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ pana arahattaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena paccavekkhaṇapaññāya
atk-s0402a0:1432_0: 190. Dasame tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yato yato anuviloketi, tato tato tuṇhībhūtameva.
atk-s0402a0:1432_1: Bhikkhū āmantesīti paṭipattisampanne bhikkhū pasannehi cakkhūhi anuviloketvā uppannadhammapāmojjo
atk-s0402a0:1432_2: thometukāmatāya āmantesi. Apalāpāti palāparahitā. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Suddhāti
atk-s0402a0:1432_3: nimmalā. Sāre patiṭṭhitāti sīlādisāre patiṭṭhitā. Alanti yuttaṃ. Yojanagaṇanānīti
atk-s0402a0:1432_4: ekaṃ yojanaṃ yojanameva, dasapi yojanāni yojanāneva. Tato uddhaṃ “yojanagaṇanānī”ti
atk-s0402a0:1432_5: vuccati. Idha pana yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi adhippetaṃ. Puṭosenāpīti puṭosaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1432_6: vuccati pātheyyaṃ, pātheyyaṃ gahetvāpi upasaṅkamituṃ yuttamevāti attho. Puṭaṃsenātipi
atk-s0402a0:1432_7: pāṭho. Tassattho – puṭo aṃse assāti puṭaṃso, tena puṭaṃsena, aṃsena pātheyyapuṭaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1433_0: Idāni evarūpehi evarūpehi ca guṇehi samannāgatā ettha bhikkhū atthīti dassetuṃ santi
atk-s0402a0:1433_1: bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha devappattāti upapattidevanibbattakaṃ dibbavihāraṃ dibbavihārena
atk-s0402a0:1433_2: ca arahattaṃ pattā. Brahmappattāti niddosaṭṭhena brahmabhāvasādhakaṃ brahmavihāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1433_3: brahmavihārena ca arahattaṃ pattā. Āneñjappattāti aniñjanabhāvasādhakaṃ āneñjaṃ āneñjena
atk-s0402a0:1433_4: ca arahattaṃ pattā. Ariyappattāti puthujjanabhāvaṃ atikkamma ariyabhāvaṃ pattā. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1433_5: kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu devappatto hotītiādīsu evaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:1433_6: cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto devappatto nāma hoti, catūsu brahmavihāresu ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:1433_7: cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto brahmappatto nāma, catūsu arūpajjhānesu ṭhatvā
atk-s0402a0:1433_8: cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto āneñjappatto nāma. Idaṃ dukkhantiādīhi catūhi saccehi
atk-s0402a0:1433_9: cattāro maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni. Tasmā imaṃ ariyadhammaṃ patto bhikkhu ariyappatto nāma hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:1435_0: 191. Pañcamassa paṭhame sotānugatānanti pasādasotaṃ odahitvā ñāṇasotena vavatthapitānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1435_1: Cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhāti cattāro guṇānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā. Idaṃ pana bhagavatā
atk-s0402a0:1435_4: liṅgavacanavibhattipadabyañjanādīhi kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati, aññātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1435_5: kiṃ kathessatī”ti dhammassavanatthaṃ na gacchanti. Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā te pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:1435_6: “kasmā evaṃ karotha, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātha, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantānañca sajjhāyantānañca
atk-s0402a0:1435_7: ime ettakā ānisaṃsā”ti dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:1436_0: Tattha dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātīti suttaṃ geyyantiādikaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ tantidhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1436_1: vaḷañjeti. Sotānugatā hontīti sotaṃ anuppattā anupaviṭṭhā honti. Manasānupekkhitāti
atk-s0402a0:1436_2: cittena olokitā. Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suṭṭhu paṭividdhā
atk-s0402a0:1436_3: paccakkhaṃ katā. Muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumānoti nayidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ anussaraṇasatiyā
atk-s0402a0:1436_4: abhāvena vuttaṃ, puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ. Puthujjano hi muṭṭhassati
atk-s0402a0:1436_5: kālaṃ karoti nāma. Upapajjatīti suddhasīle patiṭṭhito devaloke nibbattati. Dhammapadā
atk-s0402a0:1436_6: plavantīti antarābhave nibbattamuṭṭhassatino, yepi pubbe sajjhāyamūlikā vācāparicitabuddhavacanadhammā,
atk-s0402a0:1436_7: te sabbe pasanne ādāse chāyā viya plavanti, pākaṭā hutvā paññāyanti. Dandho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a0:1436_8: satuppādoti buddhavacanānussaraṇasatiyā uppādo dandho garu. Atha so satto khippaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:1437_0: Iddhimā cetovasippattoti iddhisampanno cittassa vasibhāvapatto khīṇāsavo. Ayaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:1437_1: so dhammavinayoti ettha vibhāvanattho vā-saddo. Yatthāti yasmiṃ dhammavinaye. Brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1437_2: acarinti brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasiṃ. Idampi buddhavacanaṃ mayā pubbe vaḷañjitanti buddhavacanānussaraṇavasenetaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1437_3: vuttaṃ. Devaputtoti pañcālacaṇḍo viya hatthakamahābrahmā viya sanaṅkumārabrahmā viya
atk-s0402a0:1437_4: ca eko dhammakathikadevaputto. Opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāretīti paṭhamaṃ uppanno devaputto
atk-s0402a0:1437_5: pacchā uppannaṃ sāreti. Sahapaṃsukīḷikāti etena nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ kataparicayabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1437_6: dasseti. Samāgaccheyyunti sālāya vā rukkhamūle vā sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1437_7: vadeyyāti sālāya vā rukkhamūle vā paṭhamataraṃ nisinno pacchā āgataṃ evaṃ vadeyya.
atk-s0402a0:1439_0: 192. Dutiye ṭhānānīti kāraṇāni. Ṭhānehīti kāraṇehi. Soceyyanti sucibhāvo. Saṃvasamānoti
atk-s0402a0:1439_1: ekato vasamāno. Na santatakārīti na satatakārī. Na santatavutti sīlesūti satataṃ
atk-s0402a0:1439_2: sabbakālaṃ sīlajīvitaṃ na jīvatīti attho. Saṃvohāramānoti kathento. Ekena eko voharatīti
atk-s0402a0:1439_3: ekena saddhiṃ eko hutvā katheti. Vokkamatīti okkamati. Purimavohārā pacchimavohāranti
atk-s0402a0:1439_4: purimakathāya pacchimakathaṃ, purimakathāya ca pacchimakathā, pacchimakathāya ca
atk-s0402a0:1440_0: Ñātibyasanenātiādīsu ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ ñātibyasanaṃ, ñātivināsoti attho. Dutiyapadepi
atk-s0402a0:1440_1: eseva nayo. Rogabyasane pana rogoyeva ārogyavināsanato byasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ. Anuparivattantīti
atk-s0402a0:1440_2: anubandhanti. Lābho cātiādīsu ekaṃ attabhāvaṃ lābho anuparivattati, ekaṃ alābhoti
atk-s0402a0:1440_3: evaṃ nayo netabbo. Sākacchāyamānoti pañhapucchanavissajjanavasena sākacchaṃ karonto.
atk-s0402a0:1440_4: Yathāti yenākārena. Ummaggoti pañhummaggo. Abhinīhāroti pañhābhisaṅkharaṇavasena
atk-s0402a0:1440_5: cittassa abhinīhāro. Samudāhāroti pañhapucchanaṃ. Santanti paccanīkasantatāya santaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1440_6: katvā na kathetīti attho. Paṇītanti atappakaṃ. Atakkāvacaranti yathā takkena nayaggāhena
atk-s0402a0:1440_7: gahetuṃ sakkā hoti, evaṃ na kathetīti attho. Nipuṇanti saṇhaṃ. Paṇḍitavedanīyanti
atk-s0402a0:1440_8: paṇḍitehi jānitabbakaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1442_0: 193. Tatiye upasaṅkamīti bhuttapātarāso hutvā mālāgandhavilepanaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1442_1: vandissāmīti upasaṅkami. Mā anussavenātiādīsu anussavavacanena mama kathaṃ mā gaṇhathāti
atk-s0402a0:1442_2: iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Sārambhoti karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho. Alobhādayo
atk-s0402a0:1442_4: paṭilābhatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ime cepi, bhaddiya, mahāsālāti purato ṭhite sālarukkhe
atk-s0402a0:1442_5: dassento evamāha. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0402a0:1442_6: Satthari pana desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente bhaddiyo sotāpanno jātoti.
atk-s0402a0:1444_0: 194. Catutthe sāmugiyāti sāmuganigamavāsino. Byagghapajjāti te ālapanto evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:1444_1: Kolanagarassa hi kolarukkhe hāretvā katattā kolanagaranti ca byagghapathe māpitattā
atk-s0402a0:1444_2: byagghapajjanti ca dve nāmāni. Etesañca pubbapurisā tattha vasiṃsūti byagghapajjavāsitāya
atk-s0402a0:1444_3: byagghapajjavāsino byagghapajjāti vuccanti. Te ālapanto evamāha. Pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgānīti
atk-s0402a0:1444_4: pārisuddhiatthāya padhāniyaṅgāni padahitabbavīriyassa aṅgāni, koṭṭhāsāti attho. Sīlapārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti
atk-s0402a0:1444_6: sīlapārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti
atk-s0402a0:1444_7: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanāpaññāya anuggahessāmi. Yo tattha chandotiādīsu yo tasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1444_8: anuggaṇhane kattukāmatāchandoti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Satisampajaññaṃ panettha
atk-s0402a0:1444_9: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā vīriyapaggahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Rajanīyesu
atk-s0402a0:1444_10: dhammesu cittaṃ virājetīti rāgapaccayesu iṭṭhārammaṇesu yathā cittaṃ virajjati, evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1444_11: karoti. Vimocanīyesu dhammesu cittaṃ vimocetīti yehi ārammaṇehi cittaṃ vimocetabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1444_12: tesu yathā vimuccati, evaṃ karoti. Virājetvāti ettha maggakkhaṇe virājeti nāma, phalakkhaṇe
atk-s0402a0:1444_13: virattaṃ nāma hoti. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Sammāvimuttiṃ phusatīti hetunā nayena
atk-s0402a0:1446_0: 195. Pañcame vappoti dasabalassa cūḷapitā sakyarājā. Nigaṇṭhasāvakoti vesāliyaṃ sīhasenāpati
atk-s0402a0:1446_1: viya nāḷandāyaṃ upāligahapati viya ca nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upaṭṭhāko. Kāyena
atk-s0402a0:1446_2: saṃvutoti kāyadvārassa saṃvutattā pihitattā kāyena saṃvuto nāma. Sesadvayepi eseva
atk-s0402a0:1446_3: nayo. Avijjāvirāgāti avijjāya khayavirāgena. Vijjuppādāti maggavijjāya uppādena.
atk-s0402a0:1446_4: Taṃ ṭhānanti taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Avipakkavipākanti aladdhavipākavāraṃ. Tatonidānanti taṃhetu
atk-s0402a0:1446_5: tappaccayā. Dukkhavedaniyā āsavā assaveyyunti dukkhavedanāya paccayabhūtā kilesā
atk-s0402a0:1446_6: assaveyyuṃ, tassa purisassa uppajjeyyunti attho. Abhisamparāyanti dutiye attabhāve.
atk-s0402a0:1446_7: Kāyasamārambhapaccayāti kāyakammapaccayena. Āsavāti kilesā. Vighātapariḷāhāti ettha
atk-s0402a0:1446_8: vighātoti dukkhaṃ. Pariḷāhoti kāyikacetasiko pariḷāho. Phussa phussa byantīkarotīti
atk-s0402a0:1446_9: ñāṇavajjhaṃ kammaṃ ñāṇaphassena phusitvā phusitvā khayaṃ gameti, vipākavajjhaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1446_10: vipākaphassena phusitvā phusitvā khayaṃ gameti. Nijjarāti kilesajīraṇakapaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a0:1446_11: Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Idha ṭhatvā ayaṃ bhikkhu khīṇāsavo kātabbo, cattāri mahābhūtāni
atk-s0402a0:1446_12: nīharitvā catusaccavavatthānaṃ dassetvā yāva arahattaphalaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1447_0: Idāni pana tassa khīṇāsavassa satatavihāre dassetuṃ evaṃ sammā vimuttacittassātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1447_1: Tattha sammā vimuttacittassāti hetunā kāraṇena sammā vimuttassa. Satatavihārāti niccavihārā
atk-s0402a0:1447_2: nibaddhavihārā. Neva sumano hotīti iṭṭhārammaṇe rāgavasena na somanassajāto hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1447_3: Na dummanoti aniṭṭhārammaṇe paṭighavasena na domanassajāto hoti. Upekkhako viharati
atk-s0402a0:1447_4: sato sampajānoti satisampajaññapariggahitāya majjhattākāralakkhaṇāya upekkhāya tesu
atk-s0402a0:1448_0: Kāyapariyantikanti kāyantikaṃ kāyaparicchinnaṃ, yāva pañcadvārakāyo pavattati, tāva
atk-s0402a0:1448_1: pavattaṃ pañcadvārikavedananti attho. Jīvitapariyantikanti jīvitantikaṃ jīvitaparicchinnaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1448_2: yāva jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva pavattaṃ manodvārikavedananti attho. Tattha pañcadvārikavedanā
atk-s0402a0:1448_3: pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati, manodvārikavedanā paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā
atk-s0402a0:1448_4: nirujjhati. Sā hi paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthurūpasmiṃyeva patiṭṭhāti. Pañcadvārikā pavatte
atk-s0402a0:1448_6: adhimattā balavatī hoti, paṇṇāsavassakāle ṭhitā hoti, saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:1448_7: parihāyamānā, asītinavutivassakāle mandā hoti. Tadā hi sattā “cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā
atk-s0402a0:1448_8: nipajjimhā”ti vadantepi na jānāmāti vadanti. Adhimattānipi rūpādiārammaṇāni na passāma,
atk-s0402a0:1448_9: sugandhaduggandhaṃ vā sāduasāduṃ vā thaddhamudukaṃ vāti na jānāmātipi vadanti. Iti
atk-s0402a0:1448_10: nesaṃ pañcadvārikavedanā bhaggā hoti, manodvārikā pavattati. Sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā
atk-s0402a0:1448_11: maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva nissāya pavattati. Yāva panesā pavattati, tāva satto
atk-s0402a0:1448_12: jīvatīti vuccati. Yadā nappavattati, tadā “mato niruddho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:1449_0: Svāyamattho vāpiyā dīpetabbo – yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya.
atk-s0402a0:1449_1: Paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya.
atk-s0402a0:1449_2: Punappunaṃ deve vassante udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1449_3: tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ. Atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme
atk-s0402a0:1449_4: kayiramāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ, sassapākakāle udakaṃ nikkhantaṃ udakaṃ parihīnaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1449_5: “macche gaṇhāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjeyya. Tato katipāhena āvāṭesuyeva udakaṃ saṇṭhaheya.
atk-s0402a0:1449_6: Yāva pana taṃ āvāṭesu hoti, tāva mahāvāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Yadā
atk-s0402a0:1449_7: pana tattha chijjati, tadā “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ natthī”ti vuccati. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1450_0: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi
atk-s0402a0:1450_1: paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe manodvārikavedanāya vatthurūpe patiṭṭhitakālo, punappunaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1450_2: deve vassante pañcamaggānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavatti,
atk-s0402a0:1450_3: gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena
atk-s0402a0:1450_4: tassa adhimattabalavabhāvo, yāva vāpito udakaṃ na niggacchati, tāva pūrāya vāpiyā
atk-s0402a0:1450_5: ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassa ṭhitakālo, niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kamme
atk-s0402a0:1450_6: kayiramāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassa parihāni,
atk-s0402a0:1450_7: udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittaudakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutikāle pañcadvārikavedanāya
atk-s0402a0:1450_8: mandakālo, āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhitakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvāre
atk-s0402a0:1450_9: vedanāya pavattikālo, āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti vattabbakālo
atk-s0402a0:1450_10: viya yāva sā pavattati, tāva “satto jīvatī”ti vuccati. Yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne
atk-s0402a0:1450_11: “natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka”nti vuccati, evaṃ manodvārikavedanāya appavattamānāya satto
atk-s0402a0:1450_12: matoti vuccati. Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1451_0: Kāyassa bhedāti kāyassa bhedena. Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato uddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1451_1: Idhevāti paṭisandhivasena parato agantvā idheva. Sītī bhavissantīti pavattivipphandanadaratharahitāni
atk-s0402a0:1452_0: Thūṇaṃ paṭiccāti rukkhaṃ paṭicca. Kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāyāti kuddālañca khaṇittiñca pacchiñca
atk-s0402a0:1452_1: gahetvāti attho. Desanā pana kuddālavaseneva katā. Mūle chindeyyāti mūlamhi kuddālena
atk-s0402a0:1453_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – rukkho viya hi attabhāvo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:1453_1: rukkhaṃ paṭicca chāyā viya kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ, chāyaṃ appavattaṃ kātukāmo puriso
atk-s0402a0:1453_2: viya yogāvacaro, kuddālo viya paññā, piṭakaṃ viya samādhi, khaṇitti viya vipassanā,
atk-s0402a0:1453_3: khaṇittiyā mūlānaṃ palikhaṇanakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjāya chedanakālo, khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1453_4: karaṇakālo viya khandhavasena diṭṭhakālo, phālanakālo viya āyatanavasena diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1453_5: sakalīkaraṇakālo viya dhātuvasena diṭṭhakālo, vātātapena visosanakālo viya kāyikacetasikassa
atk-s0402a0:1453_6: vīriyassa karaṇakālo, agginā ḍahanakālo viya ñāṇena kilesānaṃ ḍahanakālo, masikaraṇakālo
atk-s0402a0:1453_7: viya vattamānaka-pañcakkhandhakālo, mahāvāte ophunanakālo viya nadīsote pavāhanakālo
atk-s0402a0:1453_8: viya ca chinnamūlakānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodho, ophunanappavāhanehi
atk-s0402a0:1453_9: apaññattikabhāvūpagamo viya punabbhave vipākakkhandhānaṃ anuppādena apaṇṇattikabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1454_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti satthari desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā etaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1454_1: “seyyathāpi, bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha udayatthikoti vaḍḍhiatthiko. Assapaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1454_2: poseyyāti pañca assapotasatāni kiṇitvā pacchā vikkiṇissāmīti poseyya. Sahassagghanakassa
atk-s0402a0:1454_3: assassa pañcasatamattaṃ upakaraṇaṃ gandhamālādivasena posāvanikaṃyeva agamāsi. Athassa
atk-s0402a0:1454_4: te assā ekadivaseneva rogaṃ phusitvā sabbe jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇeyyunti iminā adhippāyena
atk-s0402a0:1454_5: evamāha. Udayañceva nādhigaccheyyāti vaḍḍhiñca gehato nīharitvā dinnamūlañca kiñci
atk-s0402a0:1454_6: na labheyya. Payirupāsinti catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃ. Svāhaṃ udayañceva nādhigacchinti
atk-s0402a0:1454_7: so ahaṃ neva udayaṃ na gehato dinnadhanaṃ adhigacchiṃ, paṇiyaassajagganako nāma jātosmīti
atk-s0402a0:1456_0: 196. Chaṭṭhe dvayenāti dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi. Oghassa nittharaṇanti caturoghanittharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1456_1: Tapojigucchāhetūti dukkarakārikasaṅkhātena tapena pāpajigucchanahetu. Aññataraṃ sāmaññaṅganti
atk-s0402a0:1456_2: ekaṃ samaṇadhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Aparisuddhakāyasamācārātiādīsu purimehi tīhi padehi kāyikavācasikacetasikasīlānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1456_3: aparisuddhataṃ dassetvā pacchimena padena aparisuddhājīvataṃ dasseti. Ñāṇadassanāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1456_4: maggañāṇasaṅkhātāya dassanāya. Anuttarāya sambodhāyāti arahattāya, arahattañāṇaphassena
atk-s0402a0:1456_5: phusituṃ abhabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sālalaṭṭhinti sālarukkhaṃ. Navanti taruṇaṃ. Akukkuccakajātanti
atk-s0402a0:1456_6: “bhaveyya nu kho, na bhaveyyā”ti ajanetabbakukkuccaṃ. Lekhaṇiyā likheyyāti avalekhanamattakena
atk-s0402a0:1456_7: avalikheyya. Dhoveyyāti ghaṃseyya. Anto avisuddhāti abbhantare asuddhā apanītasārā.
atk-s0402a0:1457_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – sālalaṭṭhi viya hi attabhāvo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:1457_1: nadīsotaṃ viya saṃsārasotaṃ, pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1457_2: ṭhitapuriso, sālalaṭṭhiyā bahiddhā suparikammakatakālo viya bahiddhā tapacaraṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1457_3: gāḷhaṃ katvā gahitakālo, anto asuddhakālo viya abbhantare sīlānaṃ aparisuddhakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1457_4: sālalaṭṭhiyā saṃsīditvā adhogamanaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikassa saṃsārasote saṃsīdanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1458_0: Phiyārittaṃ bandheyyāti phiyañca arittañca yojeyya. Evamevāti etthāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1458_1: – sālalaṭṭhi viya attabhāvo, nadīsotaṃ viya saṃsārasotaṃ, pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya
atk-s0402a0:1458_2: yogāvacaro, bahiddhā suparikammakatakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa paccupaṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1458_3: anto suvisodhitabhāvo viya abbhantare parisuddhasīlabhāvo, phiyārittabandhanaṃ viya
atk-s0402a0:1458_4: kāyikacetasikavīriyakaraṇaṃ, sotthinā pārimatīragamanaṃ viya anupubbena sīlaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0402a0:1458_5: samādhiṃ pūretvā paññaṃ pūretvā nibbānagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1459_1: anekāni kaṇḍehi kattabbacitrāni. Atha kho so tīhi ṭhānehīti so evaṃ bahūni kaṇḍacitrakāni
atk-s0402a0:1459_2: jānantopi na rājāraho hoti, tīhiyeva pana ṭhānehi hotīti attho. Sammāsamādhi hotīti
atk-s0402a0:1459_3: maggasamādhinā ca phalasamādhinā ca samāhito hotīti ayamettha attho. Sammādiṭṭhīti
atk-s0402a0:1459_4: maggasammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato. Idaṃ dukkhantiādīhi catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā
atk-s0402a0:1459_5: tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni. Ayaṃ pana maggeneva avirādhitaṃ vijjhati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1459_6: Sammāvimuttīti arahattaphalavimuttiyā samannāgato. Avijjākkhandhaṃ padāletīti arahattamaggena
atk-s0402a0:1459_7: padāleti nāmāti vuccati. Iminā hi heṭṭhā arahattamaggena avijjākkhandho padālito,
atk-s0402a0:1459_8: idha pana padālitaṃ upādāya padāletīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0402a0:1461_0: 197. Sattame mallikā devīti pasenadirañño devī. Yena midhekacco mātugāmoti yena idhekaccā
atk-s0402a0:1461_1: itthī. Dubbaṇṇāti bībhacchavaṇṇā. Durūpāti dussaṇṭhitā. Supāpikāti suṭṭhu pāpikā
atk-s0402a0:1461_2: suṭṭhu lāmikā. Dassanāyāti passituṃ. Daliddāti dhanadaliddā. Appassakāti sakena dhanena
atk-s0402a0:1461_3: rahitā. Appabhogāti upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍakarahitā. Appesakkhāti appaparivārā. Aḍḍhāti
atk-s0402a0:1461_4: issarā. Mahaddhanāti vaḷañjanakadhanena mahaddhanā. Mahābhogāti upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍabhogena
atk-s0402a0:1461_5: mahābhogā. Mahesakkhāti mahāparivārā. Abhirūpāti uttamarūpā. Dassanīyāti dassanayuttā.
atk-s0402a0:1461_6: Pāsādikāti dassanena pāsādikā. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānena ca.
atk-s0402a0:1462_0: Abhisajjatīti laggati. Byāpajjatīti pakatiṃ pajahati. Patitthīyatīti kodhavasena
atk-s0402a0:1462_1: thinabhāvaṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Na dātā hotīti na dāyikā hoti. Seyyāvasathapadīpeyyanti
atk-s0402a0:1462_2: ettha seyyāti mañcapallaṅkādisayanaṃ. Āvasathoti āvasathāgāraṃ. Padīpeyyaṃ vuccati
atk-s0402a0:1462_3: vaṭṭitelādipadīpūpakaraṇaṃ. Issāmanikāti issāya sampayuttacittā. Iminā nayena sabbattha
atk-s0402a0:1462_4: attho veditabbo. Kodhanā ahosinti kodhamanā ahosiṃ. Anissāmanikā ahosinti issāvirahitacittā
atk-s0402a0:1464_0: 198. Aṭṭhame attantapādīsu attānaṃ tapati dukkhāpetīti attantapo. Attano paritāpanānuyogaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1464_1: attaparitāpanānuyogaṃ. Paraṃ tapatīti parantapo. Paresaṃ paritāpanānuyogaṃ paraparitāpanānuyogaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1464_2: Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Nicchātoti chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā, sā assa
atk-s0402a0:1464_3: natthīti nicchāto. Sabbakilesānaṃ nibbutattā nibbuto. Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā
atk-s0402a0:1464_4: sītalo jātoti sītībhūto. Jhānamaggaphalanibbānasukhāni paṭisaṃvedetīti sukhappaṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0402a0:1465_0: Acelakotiādīni vuttatthāneva. Orabbhikādīsu urabbhā vuccanti eḷakā, urabbhe hanatīti
atk-s0402a0:1465_1: orabbhiko. Sūkarikādīsupi eseva nayo. Luddoti dāruṇo kakkhaḷo. Macchaghātakoti macchabandho
atk-s0402a0:1466_0: Muddhāvasittoti khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisitto. Puratthimena nagarassāti nagarato
atk-s0402a0:1466_1: puratthimāya disāya. Santhāgāranti yaññasālaṃ. Kharājinaṃ nivāsetvāti sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1466_2: nivāsetvā. Sappitelenāti sappinā ceva telena ca. Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci
atk-s0402a0:1466_3: sneho telanti vuccati. Kaṇḍuvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍuvamāno.
atk-s0402a0:1466_4: Anantarahitāyāti asanthatāya. Sarūpavacchāyāti sadisavacchāya. Sace gāvī setā hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1466_5: vacchopi setakova. Sace kapilā vā rattā vā, vacchakopi tādisovāti evaṃ sarūpavacchāya.
atk-s0402a0:1466_6: So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti. Vacchatarāti taruṇavacchakabhāvaṃ atikkantā balavavacchā.
atk-s0402a0:1466_7: Vacchatarīsupi eseva nayo. Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.
atk-s0402a0:1467_0: Catutthapuggalaṃ buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ idha, bhikkhave, tathāgatotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1467_1: Tattha tathāgatotiādīni vuttatthāneva. Taṃ dhammanti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1467_2: Suṇāti, gahapati, vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisati? Nihatamānattā ussannattā
atk-s0402a0:1467_3: ca. Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti. Brāhmaṇakulā
atk-s0402a0:1467_4: pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti, hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya
atk-s0402a0:1467_5: patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1467_6: pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti. Te
atk-s0402a0:1467_7: pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya
atk-s0402a0:1467_8: kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ. Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā
atk-s0402a0:1467_9: na bahukā, gahapatikāva bahukā. Iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-s0402a0:1468_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Paccājātoti patijāto. Tathāgate
atk-s0402a0:1468_1: saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammasāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho
atk-s0402a0:1468_2: vata bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evaṃ paccavekkhati. Sambādho
atk-s0402a0:1468_3: gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0402a0:1468_4: tathāpi nesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova. Rajāpathoti rāgarajādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1468_5: uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Āgamanapathotipi vaṭṭati. Alagganaṭṭhena
atk-s0402a0:1468_6: abbhokāso viyāti abbhokāso. Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu
atk-s0402a0:1468_7: paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “abbhokāso
atk-s0402a0:1468_8: pabbajjā”ti. Apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsābhāvato, rajāpatho
atk-s0402a0:1468_9: asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ, kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato. Abbhokāso pabbajjā
atk-s0402a0:1469_0: Nayidaṃ sukaraṃ…pe… pabbajeyyanti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā – yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1469_1: ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ, ekadivasampi
atk-s0402a0:1469_2: ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1469_3: likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ. Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1469_4: ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca
atk-s0402a0:1469_5: massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0402a0:1469_6: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti. Ettha
atk-s0402a0:1469_7: ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya
atk-s0402a0:1469_8: natthi, tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyāti ñātabbā, taṃ anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajeyyanti paṭipajjeyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1470_0: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti, sahassato paṭṭhāya mahā.
atk-s0402a0:1470_1: Ābandhanaṭṭhena ñātiyeva ñātiparivaṭṭo. So vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo nāma hoti, vīsatiyā
atk-s0402a0:1470_2: paṭṭhāya mahā. Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā
atk-s0402a0:1470_3: sikkhā, tañca, yattha cete saha jīvanti, ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, taṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0402a0:1470_4: paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1470_5: sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. Samāpannoti sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā
atk-s0402a0:1471_0: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādīni vuttatthāneva. Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike
atk-s0402a0:1471_1: sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1471_2: vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1471_3: evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā. Anuppadātāti sandhānānuppadātā,
atk-s0402a0:1471_4: dve jane samagge disvā “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1471_5: anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti samaggārāmo.
atk-s0402a0:1471_6: Yattha samaggā natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. Samaggarāmotipi pāḷi,
atk-s0402a0:1471_7: ayameva attho. Samaggaratoti samaggesu rato, te pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na icchatīti
atk-s0402a0:1471_8: attho. Samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti samagganandī. Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti
atk-s0402a0:1471_9: yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggiguṇaparidīpikameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.
atk-s0402a0:1472_0: Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho “nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
atk-s0402a0:1472_1: ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1472_2: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
atk-s0402a0:1472_3: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a0:1472_4: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī. Pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
atk-s0402a0:1472_5: esātipi porī, nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti, pitimattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1472_6: pitāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0402a0:1473_0: Kāle vadatīti kālavādī, vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1473_2: vadatīti atthavādī. Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī. Saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1473_3: katvā vadatīti vinayavādī. Nidhānaṃ vuccati ṭhapanokāso, nidhānamassā atthīti nidhānavatī.
atk-s0402a0:1473_4: Hadaye nidhetabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti attho. Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca
atk-s0402a0:1473_5: “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati, yuttakālaṃ pana avekkhitvāva
atk-s0402a0:1473_6: bhāsatīti attho. Sāpadesanti saupamaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1473_7: dassetvā, yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati, evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi
atk-s0402a0:1473_8: nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ vā so
atk-s0402a0:1473_9: atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na
atk-s0402a0:1473_10: aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1474_0: Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti
atk-s0402a0:1474_1: pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca
atk-s0402a0:1475_0: Ekabhattikoti pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. Tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1475_1: antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike
atk-s0402a0:1475_2: dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ekabhattiko”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1475_3: Rattiyā bhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatoti rattūparato. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā
atk-s0402a0:1475_4: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā virato vikālabhojanā.
atk-s0402a0:1476_0: Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1476_1: gacchanti. Tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva taṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti,
atk-s0402a0:1477_1: āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1477_2: na vaṭṭatiyeva. Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1477_3: paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasananti.
atk-s0402a0:1478_0: Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha itthīti purisantaragatā, itarā kumārikā nāma, tāsaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1478_1: paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva. Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva
atk-s0402a0:1478_2: tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati, “kappiyakārakaṃ dammi, ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte
atk-s0402a0:1478_3: pana vaṭṭati. Ajeḷakādīsupi khettavatthupariyosānesu kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena
atk-s0402a0:1478_4: upaparikkhitabbo. Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1478_5: aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo
atk-s0402a0:1479_0: Dūteyyaṃ vuccati dūtakammaṃ gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1479_1: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. Anuyogo nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1479_2: Tasmā duteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogoti evamettha attho veditabbo. Kayavikkayāti kayā
atk-s0402a0:1479_3: ca vikkayā ca. Tulākūṭādīsu kūṭanti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ tāva rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1479_4: gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā
atk-s0402a0:1479_5: samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:1479_6: gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge. Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-s0402a0:1479_7: gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:1479_8: anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
atk-s0402a0:1480_0: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:1480_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti. Tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1480_2: pavisitvā “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā
atk-s0402a0:1480_3: honti. Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1480_4: suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:1481_0: Mānakūṭaṃ nāma hadayabheda-sikhābheda-rajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
atk-s0402a0:1481_1: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1481_2: vatvā attano bhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1481_3: pūretvā deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1481_4: sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. Rajjubhedo
atk-s0402a0:1481_5: khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0402a0:1482_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. Vañcananti tehi tehi
atk-s0402a0:1482_1: upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
atk-s0402a0:1482_2: gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto “kiṃ bho migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako”ti āha. “Migo
atk-s0402a0:1482_3: dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1482_4: thokaṃ gantvā nivatto “na me bho migapotakenattho, migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena hi
atk-s0402a0:1482_5: dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. So āha – “nanu te bho mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti? Āma
atk-s0402a0:1482_6: dinnoti. Imampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotako”ti
atk-s0402a0:1482_7: dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1482_8: migaṃ adāsīti. Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1482_9: maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo.
atk-s0402a0:1482_10: Etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti
atk-s0402a0:1482_11: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti,
atk-s0402a0:1483_0: Chedanādīsu chedananti hatthacchedanādi. Vadhoti māraṇaṃ. Bandhoti rajjubandhanādīhi
atk-s0402a0:1483_1: bandhanaṃ. Viparāmosoti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yaṃ himapātasamaye
atk-s0402a0:1483_2: himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. Yaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1483_3: gumbādīhi paṭicchannā musanti, ayaṃ gumbaviparāmoso. Ālopo vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1483_4: vilopakaraṇaṃ. Sahasākāroti sāhasikakiriyā, gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1483_5: ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. Evametasmā chedana…pe… sahasākārā paṭivirato hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1484_0: So santuṭṭho hotīti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena
atk-s0402a0:1484_1: itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti. Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena
atk-s0402a0:1484_2: samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti – tīṇi cīvarāni, patto, dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi,
atk-s0402a0:1484_3: ekā sūci, kāyabandhanaṃ parissāvananti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:1485: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0402a0:1487_0: Te sabbe kāyaparihārikāpi honti, kucchiparihārikāpi. Kathaṃ? Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā
atk-s0402a0:1487_1: pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti. Cīvarakaṇṇena
atk-s0402a0:1487_2: udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle, khāditabbaphalāphalaṃ gahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati
atk-s0402a0:1487_3: posetīti kucchiparihārikaṃ hoti. Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nhānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle
atk-s0402a0:1487_4: ca kāyaparihāriko hoti, āhāraṃ gahetvā bhuñjanakāle kucchiparihāriko. Vāsipi tāya
atk-s0402a0:1487_7: kāyaparihārikā hoti, pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā. Kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1487_8: bandhitvā vicaraṇakāle kāyaparihārikaṃ, ucchuādīni bandhitvā gahaṇakāle kucchiparihārikaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1487_9: Parissāvanaṃ tena udakaṃ parissāvetvā nhānakāle senāsanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihārikaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1487_10: pānīyapānakaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca
atk-s0402a0:1488_0: Navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā
atk-s0402a0:1488_1: vā vaṭṭati. Dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati. Ekādasaparikkhārikassa
atk-s0402a0:1488_2: kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati. Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1488_3: vā vaṭṭati. Etesu ca aṭṭhaparikkhārikova santuṭṭho, itare asantuṭṭhā mahicchā mahābhārāti
atk-s0402a0:1488_4: na vattabbā. Etepi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova. Bhagavā pana
atk-s0402a0:1488_5: na imaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi, aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena kathesi. So hi khuddakavāsiñca
atk-s0402a0:1488_6: sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā ticīvaraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1488_7: kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati, paṭinivattitvā gahetabbaṃ nāmassa
atk-s0402a0:1488_8: na hoti. Iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarenātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1489_1: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1489_2: katvāva gacchati, “mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”tissa saṅgo vā bandho vā na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1489_3: So jiyā mutto saro viya, yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1489_4: vanasaṇḍaṃ, rukkhamūlaṃ, navaṃ pabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati,
atk-s0402a0:1495_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento seyyathāpītiādimāha. Tattha pakkhī sakuṇoti pakkhayutto
atk-s0402a0:1495_1: sakuṇo. Ḍetīti uppatati. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ padese
atk-s0402a0:1495_2: rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni
atk-s0402a0:1495_3: vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti, “idaṃ ajjatanāya, idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti nesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1495_4: na hoti. Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pakkhaṃ vā
atk-s0402a0:1495_5: pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti, atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkhā hutvā yo
atk-s0402a0:1495_6: yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati, so tena sapattabhārova uppatitvā gacchati. Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu
