atk-s0402a0:1495_7: nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati, samādāyeva pakkamati. Ariyenāti niddosena. Ajjhattanti
atk-s0402a0:1496_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena
atk-s0402a0:1496_1: rūpaṃ passitvāti attho. Sesapadesupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge
atk-s0402a0:1496_2: vuttaṃ. Abyāsekasukhanti kilesehi anāsittasukhaṃ, avikiṇṇasukhantipi vuttaṃ. Indriyasaṃvarasukhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1496_3: hi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1497_0: So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu
atk-s0402a0:1497_1: imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññavasena sampajānakārī
atk-s0402a0:1497_2: hoti. Tattha abhikkantanti purato gamanaṃ. Paṭikkantanti pacchāgamanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1498_1: asammohasampajaññanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ satisampayuttānaṃ sampajaññānaṃ vasena satiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1498_2: upaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇena paricchinditvāyeva tāni abhikkantapaṭikkantāni karoti. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0402a0:1498_3: eseva nayo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana icchantena dīghanikāye sāmaññaphalavaṇṇanāto
atk-s0402a0:1499_0: So iminā cātiādinā kiṃ dasseti? Araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. Yassa hi
atk-s0402a0:1499_1: ime cattāro paccayā natthi, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati, tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi
atk-s0402a0:1499_2: vā saddhiṃ vatthabbataṃ āpajjati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno
atk-s0402a0:1499_3: araññavāsenā”ti bheravasaddaṃ sāventi, hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a0:1499_4: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammamakāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0402a0:1499_5: Yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati. So hi attano sīlaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1499_6: paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato
atk-s0402a0:1499_7: vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1499_8: bhāsanti. Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1500_0: Tattha vivittanti suññaṃ, appasaddaṃ, appanigghosanti attho. Etadeva hi sandhāya
atk-s0402a0:1500_1: vibhaṅge “vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi,
atk-s0402a0:1500_2: tena taṃ vivitta”nti vuttaṃ. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ. Mañcapīṭhānametaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1500_3: adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha – “senāsananti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi, bhisipi, bimbohanampi,
atk-s0402a0:1500_4: vihāropi, aḍḍhayogopi, pāsādopi, hammiyampi, guhāpi, aṭṭopi, māḷopi, leṇampi, veḷugumbopi,
atk-s0402a0:1500_5: rukkhamūlampi, maṇḍapopi senāsanaṃ, yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1500_6: senāsana”nti. Apica vihāro, aḍḍhayogo, pāsādo, hammiyaṃ, guhāti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1500_7: nāma. Mañco, pīṭhaṃ, bhisi, bimbohananti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. Cimilikā,
atk-s0402a0:1500_8: cammakhaṇḍo, tiṇasanthāro, paṇṇasanthāroti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. Yattha vā
atk-s0402a0:1500_9: pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti etaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1501_0: Imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikaṃ dassento araññaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1501_1: rukkhamūlantiādimāha. Tattha araññanti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti
atk-s0402a0:1501_2: “idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ. “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1501_3: pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese
atk-s0402a0:1501_4: vuttaṃ. Rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci sītacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti selaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1501_5: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu
atk-s0402a0:1501_6: khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti kaṃ vuccati
atk-s0402a0:1501_7: udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ udakabhinnaṃ pabbatapadesaṃ, yaṃ nitambantipi nadīnikuñjantipi
atk-s0402a0:1501_8: vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā hoti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1501_9: maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni
atk-s0402a0:1501_10: sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1501_11: karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ, ekasmiṃyeva vā
atk-s0402a0:1501_12: umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. Susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1501_13: atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti na vapanti. Tenevāha –
atk-s0402a0:1501_15: Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsiṃ. Mahāpalālapuñjato
atk-s0402a0:1501_16: hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari
atk-s0402a0:1501_17: palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1502_0: Pacchābhattanti bhattassa pacchato. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti piṇḍapātapariyesanato paṭikkanto.
atk-s0402a0:1502_1: Pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Ābhujitvāti bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1502_2: uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0402a0:1502_3: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā
atk-s0402a0:1502_4: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1502_5: hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati. Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti
atk-s0402a0:1502_6: kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe vā katvāti attho. Teneva vibhaṅge
atk-s0402a0:1502_7: vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā. Tena
atk-s0402a0:1502_8: vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti. Atha vā “parīti pariggahaṭṭho. Mukhanti
atk-s0402a0:1502_9: niyyānaṭṭho. Satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho. Tena vuccati – ‘parimukhaṃ sati”’nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1502_10: vuttanayena panettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepo “pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satiṃ katvā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1503_0: Abhijjhaṃ loketi ettha lujjana-palujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko. Tasmā pañcasu
atk-s0402a0:1503_1: upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho. Vigatābhijjhenāti
atk-s0402a0:1503_2: vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti attho. Abhijjhāya
atk-s0402a0:1503_3: cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti, yathā naṃ sā muñcati ceva muñcitvā
atk-s0402a0:1503_4: ca na puna gaṇhāti, evaṃ karotīti attho. Byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1503_5: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti byāpādo. Vikārappattiyā
atk-s0402a0:1503_6: padussati, paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti padoso. Ubhayampetaṃ kodhasseva adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1503_7: Thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikagelaññaṃ. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1503_8: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhaālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya
atk-s0402a0:1503_9: saññāya samannāgato. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. Idaṃ ubhayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1503_10: ālokasaññāya upakārakattā vuttaṃ. Uddhaccañca kukkuccañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ. Tiṇṇavicikicchoti
atk-s0402a0:1503_11: vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. “Kathamidaṃ kathamida”nti evaṃ nappavattatīti
atk-s0402a0:1503_12: akathaṃkathī. Kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjesu dhammesu. “Ime nu kho kusalā, kathamime
atk-s0402a0:1503_13: kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Imesu pana
atk-s0402a0:1503_14: nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1503_15: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti yasmā ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya
atk-s0402a0:1503_16: paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti, uppannāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā
atk-s0402a0:1503_17: pātenti. Tasmā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇāti vuccanti. Vivicceva kāmehītiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāni.
atk-s0402a0:1504_0: Ime āsavātiādi aparenāpi pariyāyena catusaccappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1504_1: pajānātīti ettāvatā heṭṭhā tīhi aṅgehi bāhirasamayassa nipphalabhāvaṃ dassetvā catutthena
atk-s0402a0:1504_2: aṅgena attano sāsanassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā desanāya arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0402a0:1504_3: Idāni desanaṃ appento evaṃ kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1506_0: 199. Navame jālininti jālasadisaṃ. Yathā hi jālaṃ samantato saṃsibbitaṃ ākulabyākulaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1506_1: evaṃ taṇhāpīti jālasadisattā jālinīti vuttā. Tayo vā bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāya
atk-s0402a0:1506_2: etissā tattha tattha attano koṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ jālaṃ atthītipi jālinī. Saritanti tattha
atk-s0402a0:1506_3: tattha saritvā saṃsaritvā ṭhitaṃ. Visaṭanti patthaṭaṃ vikkhittaṃ. Visattikanti tattha
atk-s0402a0:1506_4: tattha visattaṃ laggaṃ lagitaṃ. Apica “visamūlāti visattikā. Visaphalāti visattikā”tiādināpi
atk-s0402a0:1506_5: nayenettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Uddhastoti upari dhaṃsito. Pariyonaddhoti samantā veṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:1506_6: Tantākulakajātoti tantaṃ viya ākulajāto. Yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1506_7: pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ākulaṃ hoti, “idaṃ aggaṃ idaṃ mūla”nti aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1506_8: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti, evaṃ sattā imāya taṇhāya pariyonaddhā ākulabyākulā
atk-s0402a0:1506_9: na sakkonti attano nissaraṇamaggaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ. Gulāguṇṭhikajātoti gulāguṇṭhikaṃ vuccati
atk-s0402a0:1506_10: pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ. Gulā nāma sakuṇikā, tassā kulāvakotipi eke. Yathā tadubhayampi
atk-s0402a0:1506_11: ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaranti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1506_12: Muñjapabbajabhūtoti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūto, tādiso jāto. Yathā
atk-s0402a0:1506_13: tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajjuṃ jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1506_14: “idaṃ aggaṃ idaṃ mūla”nti aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ. Tampi
atk-s0402a0:1506_15: ca paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ, ṭhapetvā pana bodhisatte
atk-s0402a0:1506_16: añño satto attano dhammatāya taṇhājālaṃ padāletvā attano nissaraṇamaggaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:1506_17: samattho nāma natthi. Evamayaṃ loko taṇhājālena pariyonaddho apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1506_19: Sabbepi hi te vaḍḍhisaṅkhātassa āyassa abhāvato apāyāti vuccanti. Tathā dukkhassa
atk-s0402a0:1506_20: gatibhāvato duggati. Sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā vinipāto. Itaro pana –
atk-s0402a0:1509_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ nātivattati nātikkamati, atha kho cutito paṭisandhiṃ paṭisandhito cutinti
atk-s0402a0:1509_1: evaṃ punappunaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo gaṇhamāno tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu
atk-s0402a0:1509_2: sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittanāvā viya yante
atk-s0402a0:1510_0: Ajjhattikassa upādāyāti ajjhattikaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya. Idañhi upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1510_1: Bāhirassa upādāyāti bāhiraṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya, idampi upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1510_2: Asmīti, bhikkhave, satīti, bhikkhave, yadetaṃ ajjhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0402a0:1510_3: samūhaggāhato asmīti hoti, tasmiṃ satīti attho. Itthasmīti hotītiādīsu pana evaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1510_4: samūhato ahanti gahaṇe sati tato anupanidhāya ca upanidhāya cāti dvidhā gahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1510_5: Tattha anupanidhāyāti aññaṃ ākāraṃ anupagamma sakabhāvameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā itthasmīti
atk-s0402a0:1510_6: hoti, khattiyādīsu idaṃpakāro ahanti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti attho. Idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1510_7: tāva anupanidhāya gahaṇaṃ. Upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti samato ca asamato
atk-s0402a0:1510_8: ca. Taṃ dassetuṃ evaṃsmīti aññathāsmīti ca vuttaṃ. Tattha evaṃsmīti idaṃ samato upanidhāya
atk-s0402a0:1510_9: gahaṇaṃ, yathāyaṃ khattiyo yathāyaṃ brāhmaṇo, evamahampīti attho. Aññathāsmīti idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1510_10: pana asamato gahaṇaṃ, yathāyaṃ khattiyo yathāyaṃ brāhmaṇo, tato aññathā ahaṃ, hīno
atk-s0402a0:1510_11: vā adhiko vāti attho. Imāni tāva paccuppannavasena cattāri taṇhāvicaritāni.
atk-s0402a0:1511_0: Asasmīti satasmīti imāni pana dve yasmā atthīti asaṃ, niccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sīdatīti
atk-s0402a0:1511_1: sataṃ, aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā sassatucchedavasena vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1511_2: Ito parāni santi evamādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena vuttāni. Santi hotīti
atk-s0402a0:1511_3: evamādīsu ahaṃ siyanti hotīti evamattho veditabbo. Adhippāyo panettha purimacatukke
atk-s0402a0:1511_4: vuttanayeneva gahetabbo. Apihaṃ santiādīni pana cattāri api nāma ahaṃ bhaveyyanti
atk-s0402a0:1511_5: evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni. Tānipi purimacatukke vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1511_6: Bhavissantiādīni pana cattāri anāgatavasena vuttāni. Tesampi purimacatukke vuttanayeneva
atk-s0402a0:1514_0: Etesu hi asasmi, satasmīti ete dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma. Asmi, santi, apihaṃ santi, bhavissanti
atk-s0402a0:1514_1: ete cattāro suddhasīsā eva. Itthasmītiādayo tayo tayoti dvādasa sīsamūlakā nāmāti
atk-s0402a0:1514_2: evamete dve diṭṭhisīsā cattāro suddhasīsā dvādasa sīsamūlakāti aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritadhammā
atk-s0402a0:1514_3: veditabbā. Imāni tāva ajjhattikassa upādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni. Bāhirassa
atk-s0402a0:1514_4: upādāya taṇhāvicaritesupi eseva nayo. Imināti iminā rūpena vā…pe… viññāṇena vāti
atk-s0402a0:1515_0: Iti evarūpāni atītāni chattiṃsāti ekamekassa puggalassa atīte addhani chattiṃsa.
atk-s0402a0:1515_1: Anāgatāni chattiṃsāti ekamekasseva puggalassa ca anāgate addhani chattiṃsa. Paccuppannāni
atk-s0402a0:1515_2: chattiṃsāti ekassa vā puggalassa yathāsambhavato bahūnaṃ vā paccuppanne addhani chattiṃsāva.
atk-s0402a0:1515_3: Sabbasattānaṃ pana niyameneva atīte addhani chattiṃsa, anāgate chattiṃsa, paccuppanne
atk-s0402a0:1515_4: chattiṃsa. Anantā hi asadisataṇhāmānadiṭṭhibhedā sattā. Aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1515_5: hontīti ettha pana aṭṭhasatasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāvicaritaṃ hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1517_0: 200. Dasame na ussenetīti diṭṭhivasena na ukkhipati. Na paṭisenetīti paṭiviruddho
atk-s0402a0:1517_1: hutvā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena na ukkhipati. Na dhūpāyatīti ajjhattikassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritavasena
atk-s0402a0:1517_2: na dhūpāyati. Na pajjalatīti bāhirassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritavasena na pajjalati.
atk-s0402a0:1517_3: Na sampajjhāyatīti asmimānavasena na sampajjhāyati. Sesaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1519_0: 201. Pañcamassa paṭhame asappurisanti lāmakapurisaṃ tucchapurisaṃ mūḷhapurisaṃ avijjāya
atk-s0402a0:1519_1: andhīkataṃ bālaṃ. Asappurisataranti atirekena asappurisaṃ. Itare dve vuttapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-s0402a0:1519_2: veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresu pañcasu. Etesu
atk-s0402a0:1519_3: hi paṭhamaṃ pañcaveravasena desitaṃ, dutiyaṃ assaddhammavasena, tatiyaṃ kāyavacīdvāravasena,
atk-s0402a0:1519_4: catutthaṃ manodvāravasena, pañcamaṃ aṭṭhamicchattavasena, chaṭṭhaṃ dasamicchattavasena.
atk-s0402a0:1521_0: 207-210. Sattame pāpanti lāmakaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhapuggalaṃ. Kalyāṇanti bhaddakaṃ anavajjapuggalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1521_1: Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo. Navame pāpadhammanti lāmakadhammaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1521_2: Kalyāṇadhammanti anavajjadhammaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Dasamepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1521_3: Imasmiṃ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā. Sacepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino
atk-s0402a0:1523: 211. Dutiyassa paṭhame parisaṃ dūsentīti parisadūsanā. Parisaṃ sobhentīti parisasobhanā.
atk-s0402a0:1525: 212. Dutiye manoduccarite pariyāpannāpi micchādiṭṭhi mahāsāvajjatāya visuṃ vuttā, tassā ca paṭipakkhavasena sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0402a0:1527: 213. Tatiye akataññutā akataveditāti akataññutāya akataveditāya. Ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekameva. Sukkapakkhepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1529_0: 214-217. Catutthaṃ catunnaṃ kammakilesānaṃ tappaṭipakkhassa ca vasena vuttaṃ, pañcamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1529_1: sukkapakkhānaṃ ādito catunnaṃ micchattānaṃ vasena, chaṭṭhaṃ avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1529_3: assaddhammānaṃ vasena vuttāni. Sabbasuttesu pana sukkapakkhadhammā lokiyalokuttaramissakāva
atk-s0402a0:1529_4: kathitā. Navasu suttesu kiñcāpi “sagge”ti vuttaṃ, tayo pana maggā tīṇi ca phalāni labbhantiyevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1530_0: 221-231. Tatiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Dasame yo cintetvā kabyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:1530_1: ayaṃ cintākavi nāma. Yo sutvā karoti, ayaṃ sutakavi nāma. Yo ekaṃ atthaṃ nissāya
atk-s0402a0:1530_2: karoti, ayaṃ atthakavi nāma. Yo taṅkhaṇaññeva vaṅgīsatthero viya attano paṭibhānena
atk-s0402a0:1532_0: 232. Catutthassa paṭhame kaṇhanti kāḷakaṃ dasaakusalakammapathakammaṃ. Kaṇhavipākanti
atk-s0402a0:1532_1: apāye nibbattanato kāḷakavipākaṃ. Sukkanti paṇḍarakaṃ kusalakammapathakammaṃ. Sukkavipākanti
atk-s0402a0:1532_2: sagge nibbattanato paṇḍarakavipākaṃ. Kaṇhasukkanti missakakammaṃ. Kaṇhasukkavipākanti
atk-s0402a0:1532_3: sukhadukkhavipākaṃ. Missakakammañhi katvā akusalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānādīsu
atk-s0402a0:1532_4: uppanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ vediyati. Kusalena rājakulepi nibbatto akusalena
atk-s0402a0:1532_5: pavatte dukkhaṃ vediyati. Akaṇhaṃ asukkanti kammakkhayakaraṃ catumaggañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1532_6: Tañhi yadi kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya. Yadi sukkaṃ bhaveyya, sukkavipākaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1532_7: dadeyya. Ubhayavipākassa pana appadānato akaṇhaṃ asukkanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a0:1534_0: 233. Dutiye sabyābajjhanti sadosaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāranti kāyadvāracetanaṃ. Abhisaṅkharotīti
atk-s0402a0:1534_1: āyūhati sampiṇḍeti. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Sabyābajjhaṃ lokanti sadukkhaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1534_2: Sabyābajjhā phassāti sadukkhā vipākaphassā. Sabyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyatīti sābādhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1534_3: vipākavedanaṃ vediyati. Ekantadukkhanti ekanteneva dukkhaṃ, na sukhasammissaṃ. Seyyathāpi
atk-s0402a0:1534_4: sattā nerayikāti ettha seyyathāpīti nidassanatthe nipāto. Tena kevalaṃ nerayikasatte
atk-s0402a0:1534_5: dasseti, aññe pana taṃsarikkhakā nāma natthi. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1534_6: Seyyathāpi manussātiādīsu pana manussānaṃ tāva kālena sukhā vedanā uppajjati, kālena
atk-s0402a0:1534_7: dukkhā vedanā. Ekacce ca devāti ettha pana kāmāvacaradevā daṭṭhabbā. Tesañhi mahesakkhatarā
atk-s0402a0:1534_8: devatā disvā nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhānaṃ, pārutauttarāsaṅgassa otāraṇaṃ, añjalipaggaṇhanantiādīnaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1534_9: vasena kālena dukkhaṃ uppajjati, dibbasampattiṃ anubhavantānaṃ kālena sukhaṃ. Ekacce
atk-s0402a0:1534_10: ca vinipātikāti ettha vemānikapetā daṭṭhabbā. Te nirantarameva ekasmiṃ kāle sukhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1534_11: ekasmiṃ kāle dukkhaṃ vediyanti. Nāgasupaṇṇahatthiassādayo pana manussā viya vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva
atk-s0402a0:1534_12: honti. Pahānāya yā cetanāti ettha vivaṭṭagāminī maggacetanā veditabbā. Sā hi kammakkhayāya saṃvattatīti.
atk-s0402a0:1536_0: 234. Tatiye sikhāmoggallānoti sīsamajjhe ṭhitāya mahatiyā sikhāya samannāgato moggallānagotto
atk-s0402a0:1536_1: brāhmaṇo. Purimānīti atītānantaradivasato paṭṭhāya purimāni, dutiyādito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:1536_2: purimatarāni veditabbāni. Soṇakāyanoti tasseva antevāsiko. Kammasaccāyaṃ bho lokoti
atk-s0402a0:1536_3: bho ayaṃ loko kammasabhāvo. Kammasamārambhaṭṭhāyīti kammasamārambhena tiṭṭhati. Kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1536_4: āyūhantova tiṭṭhati, anāyūhanto ucchijjatīti dīpeti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:1538_0: 235. Catutthādīnipi uttānatthāneva. Maggaṅgesu pana yasmā satiyā upaṭṭhapetvā paññāya
atk-s0402a0:1538_1: paricchindati, tasmā ubhayameva kammaṃ. Sesā aṅgāneva honti, no kammanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1538_2: Bojjhaṅgesupi eseva nayo. Abhidhamme pana sabbampetaṃ avisesena cetanāsampayuttakammanteva vaṇṇitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1540_0: 241. Dasame idhevāti imasmiṃyeva sāsane. Ayaṃ pana niyamo sesapadesupi veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1540_1: Dutiyādayopi hi samaṇā idheva, na aññattha. Suññāti rittā tucchā. Parappavādāti cattāro
atk-s0402a0:1540_2: sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatikā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā,
atk-s0402a0:1540_3: dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññivādā, aṭṭha asaññivādā, aṭṭha nevasaññināsaññivādā,
atk-s0402a0:1540_4: satta ucchedavādā, pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti ime sabbepi brahmajāle āgatadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0402a0:1540_5: ito bāhirānaṃ paresaṃ pavādā parappavādā nāma. Te sabbepi imehi catūhi phalaṭṭhakasamaṇehi
atk-s0402a0:1540_6: suññā. Na hi te ettha santi. Na kevalañca eteheva suññā, catūhi pana maggaṭṭhakasamaṇehipi,
atk-s0402a0:1540_7: catunnaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya āraddhavipassakehipīti dvādasahipi samaṇehi suññā eva.
atk-s0402a0:1540_8: Idameva atthaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā mahāparinibbāne vuttaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:1547_0: “Dutiyopi samaṇo natthi, tatiyopi samaṇo natthi, catutthopi samaṇo natthi, suññā
atk-s0402a0:1547_1: parappavādā samaṇehi aññehī”ti. Ettha hi padesavattīti āraddhavipassako adhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:1547_2: Tasmā sotāpattimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā
atk-s0402a0:1547_3: “samaṇopi natthī”ti āha, sakadāgāmimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti
atk-s0402a0:1547_4: tayopi ekato katvā “dutiyopi samaṇo natthī”ti āha. Itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. Ekādasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1549_0: 243. Pañcamassa paṭhame api nu taṃ, ānanda, adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1549_1: adhikaraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa uppajji, satthā tassa vūpasantabhāvaṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:1549_2: Kuto taṃ, bhanteti, bhante, kuto kinti kena kāraṇena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamissatīti
atk-s0402a0:1549_3: vadati. Kevalakappanti sakalaṃ samantato. Saṅghabhedāya ṭhitoti saṅghena saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:1549_4: vādatthāya kathitaṃ paṭikathentova ṭhito. Tatrāyasmāti tasmiṃ evaṃ ṭhite āyasmā anuruddho.
atk-s0402a0:1549_5: Na ekavācikampi bhaṇitabbaṃ maññatīti “mā, āvuso, saṅghena saddhiṃ evaṃ avacā”ti
atk-s0402a0:1549_6: ekavacanampi vattabbaṃ na maññati. Voyuñjatīti anuyuñjati anuyogaṃ āpajjati. Atthavaseti
atk-s0402a0:1549_7: kāraṇavase. Nāsessantīti uposathappavāraṇaṃ upagantuṃ adatvā nikkaḍḍhissanti. Sesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1551_0: 244. Dutiye khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvāti pañca sikhaṇḍake ṭhapetvā khurena muṇḍaṃ karitvā.
atk-s0402a0:1551_1: Kharassarenāti kakkhaḷasaddena. Paṇavenāti vajjhabheriyā. Thalaṭṭhassāti ekamante
atk-s0402a0:1551_2: ṭhitassa. Sīsacchejjanti sīsacchedārahaṃ. Yatra hi nāmāti yaṃ nāma. So vatassāhanti
atk-s0402a0:1551_3: so vata ahaṃ assaṃ, yaṃ evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ na kareyyanti attho. Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarissatīti
atk-s0402a0:1551_4: dhammānurūpaṃ paṭikarissati, sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhassatīti attho. Kāḷavatthaṃ paridhāyāti
atk-s0402a0:1551_5: kāḷapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā. Mosallanti musalābhipātārahaṃ. Yathādhammanti idha āpattito
atk-s0402a0:1551_6: vuṭṭhāya suddhante patiṭṭhahanto yathādhammaṃ karoti nāma. Bhasmapuṭanti chārikābhaṇḍikaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1551_7: Gārayhaṃ bhasmapuṭanti garahitabbachārikāpuṭena matthake abhighātārahaṃ. Yathādhammanti
atk-s0402a0:1551_8: idha āpattiṃ desento yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti nāma. Upavajjanti upavādārahaṃ. Pāṭidesanīyesūti
atk-s0402a0:1551_9: paṭidesetabbesu. Iminā sabbāpi sesāpattiyo saṅgahitā. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri
atk-s0402a0:1551_10: āpattibhayānīti, bhikkhave, imāni cattāri āpattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayāni nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:1553_0: 245. Tatiye sikkhā ānisaṃsā etthāti sikkhānisaṃsaṃ. Paññā uttarā etthāti paññuttaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1553_1: Vimutti sāro etthāti vimuttisāraṃ. Sati ādhipateyyā etthāti satādhipateyyaṃ. Etesaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1553_2: hi sikkhādisaṅkhātānaṃ ānisaṃsādīnaṃ atthāya vussatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ābhisamācārikāti
atk-s0402a0:1553_3: uttamasamācārikā. Vattavasena paññattasīlassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tathā tathā so tassā
atk-s0402a0:1553_4: sikkhāyāti tathā tathā so sikkhākāmo bhikkhu tasmiṃ sikkhāpade.
atk-s0402a0:1554_0: Ādibrahmacariyikāti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtānaṃ catunnaṃ mahāsīlānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1554_1: Sabbasoti sabbākārena. Dhammāti catusaccadhammā. Paññāya samavekkhitā hontīti sahavipassanāya
atk-s0402a0:1554_2: maggapaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti. Vimuttiyā phusitā hontīti arahattaphalavimuttiyā ñāṇaphassena
atk-s0402a0:1554_3: phuṭṭhā honti. Ajjhattaṃyeva sati sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti niyakajjhatteyeva sati suṭṭhu
atk-s0402a0:1554_4: upaṭṭhitā hoti. Paññāya anuggahessāmīti vipassanāpaññāya anuggahessāmi. Paññāya samavekkhissāmīti
atk-s0402a0:1554_5: idhāpi vipassanāpaññā adhippetā. Phusitaṃ vā dhammaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti
atk-s0402a0:1556_0: 246. Catutthe petāti kālakatā vuccanti. Uttānā sentīti te yebhuyyena uttānakāva sayanti.
atk-s0402a0:1556_1: Atha vā pettivisaye nibbattā petā nāma, te appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghātajaṭitā
atk-s0402a0:1556_2: ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti. Anattamano hotīti tejussadattā
atk-s0402a0:1556_3: sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ, pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1556_5: dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati. Divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno
atk-s0402a0:1556_6: na uttasanto pabujjhati, sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0402a0:1556_7: sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, “nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā, na sūrabhāvassa
atk-s0402a0:1556_8: anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati, na gocarāya pakkamati. Idaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0402a0:1556_9: vuttaṃ – “anattamano hotī”ti. Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa
atk-s0402a0:1556_10: ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhanaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:1556_11: vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati. Tena vuttaṃ – “attamano hotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1558_0: 247. Pañcame rājā cakkavattīti ettha kasmā bhagavā agāramajjhe vasitvā kālakatassa
atk-s0402a0:1558_1: rañño thūpakaraṇaṃ anujānāti, na sīlavato puthujjanabhikkhussāti? Anacchariyattā.
atk-s0402a0:1558_2: Puthujjanabhikkhūnañhi thūpe anuññāyamāne tambapaṇṇidīpe tāva thūpānaṃ okāso na bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:1558_3: tathā aññesu ṭhānesu. Tasmā “anacchariyā te bhavissantī”ti nānujānāti. Cakkavattī
atk-s0402a0:1558_4: rājā ekova nibbattati, tenassa thūpo acchariyo hoti. Puthujjanasīlavato pana parinibbutabhikkhuno
atk-s0402a0:1558_5: viya mahantampi sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a0:1560: 250. Aṭṭhame anariyavohārāti anariyānaṃ kathā. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:1562_0: 254-256. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame abhiññāyāti jānitvā. Samatho ca vipassanā cāti cittekaggatā
atk-s0402a0:1562_1: ca saṅkhārapariggahavipassanāñāṇañca. Vijjā ca vimutti cāti maggañāṇavijjā ca sesā
atk-s0402a0:1562_2: sampayuttakadhammā ca. Dutiye anariyapariyesanāti anariyānaṃ esanā gavesanā. Jarādhammanti
atk-s0402a0:1562_3: jarāsabhāvaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tatiyaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0402a0:1564_0: 257. Catutthe mālukyaputtoti mālukyabrāhmaṇiyā putto. Etthāti etasmiṃ tava ovādayācane.
atk-s0402a0:1564_1: Iminā theraṃ apasādetipi ussādetipi. Kathaṃ? Ayaṃ kira daharakāle paccayesu laggo
atk-s0402a0:1564_2: hutvā pacchā mahallakakāle araññavāsaṃ patthento kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0402a0:1564_3: “ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma, mālukyaputto viya tumhepi taruṇakāle paccayesu laggitvā
atk-s0402a0:1564_4: mahallakakāle araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyyāthā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto
atk-s0402a0:1564_5: theraṃ apasādeti nāma. Yasmā pana thero mahallakakāleva araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1564_6: kātukāmo, tasmā bhagavā “ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma, ayaṃ amhākaṃ mālukyaputto mahallakakālepi
atk-s0402a0:1564_7: araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati. Tumhe tāva taruṇakālepi
atk-s0402a0:1564_8: vīriyaṃ na karothā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ ussādeti nāmāti yojanā.
atk-s0402a0:1566_0: 258-263. Pañcame ādhipacce ṭhapentīti bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhapenti. Chaṭṭhe vaṇṇasampannoti
atk-s0402a0:1566_1: sarīravaṇṇena samannāgato. Balasampannoti kāyabalena samannāgato. Bhikkhuvāre vaṇṇasampannoti
atk-s0402a0:1566_2: guṇavaṇṇena samannāgato. Balasampannoti vīriyabalena samannāgato. Javasampannoti
atk-s0402a0:1566_3: ñāṇajavena samannāgato. Sattamepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1568: 274-783. Rāgapeyyālaṃ arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
